original: uttāno nipajji. Bhikkhū tiṃsamatte patte nīharitvā udakaṃ āharitvā āharitvā tassa
analyzed: uttānaḥ nipajji bhikkhū tiṃsa matte patte nīharitvā udakam āharitvā āharitvā tassa

original: mukhe āsiñciṃsu. Tesaṃ tathā karontānaṃyeva velā upakaṭṭhā jātā. Tato “bhikkhācārakālo
analyzed: mukhe āsiñciṃsu tesam tathā karontānam yeva velā upakaṭṭhā jātā tatas bhikkhācāra kālo

original: amhākaṃ, sappurisa; kacci te assādamattā laddhā”ti āhaṃsu. Peto “sace me, bhante,
analyzed: amhākam sappurisa kacci te assāda mattā laddhā ati āhaṃsu sace me bhante

original: tiṃsamattānaṃ ayyānaṃ tiṃsamattehi pattehi āsittaudakato aḍḍhapasatamattampi paragalagataṃ,
analyzed: tiṃsa mattānam ayyānam tiṃsa mattehi pattehi āsitta udakataḥ aḍḍhapasata mattam pi para gala gatam

original: petattabhāvato mokkho mā hotū”ti āha. Evaṃ pipāsāya ruppanaṃ pettivisaye pākaṭaṃ.
analyzed: petatta bhāvataḥ mokkhaḥ mā hotu iti āha evam pipāsāya ruppanam petti visaye pākaṭam

original: Ḍaṃsādīhi ruppanaṃ ḍaṃsamakkhikādisambabahulesu padesesu pākaṭaṃ. Ettha ca ḍaṃsāti

original: piṅgalamakkhikā, makasāti makasāva vātāti kucchivātapiṭṭhivātādivasena veditabbā.
analyzed: piṅgalamakkhikā makasā ati makasā ava vātā ti kucchi vāta piṭṭhi vāta ādi vasena veditabbā

original: Sarīrasmiñhi vātarogo uppajjitvā hatthapādapiṭṭhiādīni bhindati, kāṇaṃ karoti, khujjaṃ

analyzed: karoti pīṭha sappim karoti tena ruppanam maru kantāra ādīsu pākaṭam

original: Ekā kira itthī marukantāre rattiṃ satthato ohīnā divā sūriye uggacchante vālikāya
analyzed: ekā kira itthī maru kantāre rattim satthatas ohīnā divā sūriye uggacchante vālikāya

original: tappamānāya pāde ṭhapetuṃ asakkontī sīsato pacchiṃ otāretvā akkami. Kamena pacchiyā

original: uṇhābhitattāya ṭhātuṃ asakkontī tassā upari sāṭakaṃ ṭhapetvā akkami. Tasmimpi santatte

original: aṅkena gahitaṃ puttakaṃ adhomukhaṃ nipajjāpetvā kandantaṃ kandantaṃ akkamitvā saddhiṃ

original: tena tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne uṇhābhitattā kālamakāsi.

original: Sarīsapāti ye keci dīghajātikā sarantā gacchanti. Tesaṃ samphassena ruppanaṃ āsīvisadaṭṭhādīnaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sarīsapā ti ye keci dīgha jātikā sarantā gacchanti tesam samphassena ruppanam āsīvisadaṭṭha ādīnam vasena veditabbam

original: Idāni ‘yaṃ kiñci rūpa’nti padena saṃgahitaṃ pañcavīsatikoṭṭhāsachannavutikoṭṭhāsappabhedaṃ

original: sabbampi rūpaṃ atītādikoṭṭhāsesu pakkhipitvā dassetuṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannanti āha.
analyzed: sabbam pi rūpam atīta ādi koṭṭhāsesu pakkhipitvā dassetum atīta anāgata paccuppannam ti āha

original: Tato paraṃ tadeva ajjhattadukādīsu catūsu dukesu pakkhipitvā dassetuṃ ajjhattaṃ vā

original: bahiddhā vātiādi vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ sabbampetaṃ ekādasasu padesesu pariyādiyitvā
analyzed: bahiddhā vā iti ādi vuttam tatas param sabbam petam ekādasasu padesesu

original: dassitaṃ rūpaṃ ekato piṇḍaṃ katvā dassetuṃ tadekajjhantiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dassitam rūpam ekatas piṇḍam katvā dassetum tat ekajjha tiādi vuttaṃ

original: Tattha tadekajjhanti taṃ ekajjhaṃ; abhisaññūhitvāti abhisaṃharitvā; abhisaṅkhipitvāti
analyzed: tattha tat ekajjhanti tam ekajjham abhisaññūhitvā ati abhisaṃharitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā ati

original: saṅkhepaṃ katvā; idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sabbampetaṃ vuttappakāraṃ rūpaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇasaṅkhāte
analyzed: saṅkhepam katvā idam vuttam hoti sabbam petam vutta ppakāram rūpam ruppana lakkhaṇa saṅkhāte

original: ruppanalakkhaṇe rāsibhāvūpagamanena rūpakkhandhoti dassitaṃ hoti. Na hi rūpato añño

original: rūpakkhandho nāma atthi. Yathā ca rūpaṃ, evaṃ vedanādayopi vedayitalakkhaṇādīsu rāsibhāvūpagamanena.

original: Na hi vedanādīhi aññe vedanākkhandhādayo nāma atthi.
analyzed: na hi vedanā ādīhi aññe vedanā khandha ādayaḥ nāma atthi

original: 3. Idāni ekekasmiṃ okāse pakkhittaṃ rūpaṃ visuṃ visuṃ bhājetvā dassento tattha katamaṃ
analyzed: idāni ekekasmin okāse pakkhittam rūpam visum visum bhājetvā dassento tattha katamaṃ

original: bhummaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – atītānāgatapaccuppannantiādinā nayena ṭhapitāya mātikāya
analyzed: bhummam idam vuttam hoti atīta anāgata paccuppanna nti ādinā nayena ṭhapitāya mātikāya

original: Atītaṃ niruddhantiādīni padāni nikkhepakaṇḍassa atītattikabhājanīyavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttāneva.
analyzed: atītam niruddha nti ādīni padāni nikkhepa kaṇḍassa atīta ttika bhājanīya vaṇṇanāyam vuttāni eva

analyzed: cattāro ca mahābhūtā ti idam atītam ti vutta rūpassa sabhāva dassanam yathā ca ittha evam

original: sabbattha attho veditabbo. Iminā idaṃ dasseti – atītarūpampi bhūtāni ceva bhūtāni

original: upādāya nibbattarūpañca, anāgatampi…pe… dūrasantikampi. Na hi bhūtehi ceva bhūtāni

original: upādāya pavattarūpato ca aññaṃ rūpaṃ nāma atthīti.
analyzed: upādāya pavatta rūpato ca aññam rūpam nāma atthi iti

original: Aparo nayo – atītaṃsena saṅgahitanti atītakoṭṭhāseneva saṅgahitaṃ, ettheva gaṇanaṃ

original: gataṃ. Kinti? Cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpanti. Evaṃ sabbattha

original: attho veditabbo. Anāgatapaccuppannaniddesapadānipi heṭṭhā vuttatthāneva.

original: Idaṃ pana atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ nāma suttantapariyāyato abhidhammaniddesatoti duvidhaṃ.
analyzed: idam pana atīta anāgata paccuppannam nāma suttanta pariyāyataḥ abhidhamma niddesato ti duvidham

original: Taṃ suttantapariyāye bhavena paricchinnaṃ. Paṭisandhito hi paṭṭhāya atītabhavesu
analyzed: tam suttanta pariyāye bhavena paricchinnam paṭisandhitaḥ hi paṭṭhāya atīta bhavesu

original: nibbattaṃ rūpaṃ, anantarabhave vā nibbattaṃ hotu kappakoṭisatasahassamatthake vā,
analyzed: nibbattam rūpam anantara bhave vā nibbattam hotu kappa koṭi sata sahassa matthake vā

original: pavattarūpaṃ paccuppannaṃ nāma. Abhidhammaniddese pana khaṇena paricchinnaṃ. Tayo
analyzed: pavattarūpam paccuppannam nāma abhidhamma niddese pana khaṇena paricchinnam tayo

original: hi rūpassa khaṇā – uppādo, ṭhiti, bhaṅgoti. Ime tayo khaṇe patvā niruddhaṃ rūpaṃ,

original: samanantaraniruddhaṃ vā hotu atīte kappakoṭisatasahassamatthake vā, sabbaṃ atītameva
analyzed: samanantara niruddham vā hotu atīte kappa koṭi sata sahassa matthake vā sabbam atītam eva

analyzed: nāma khaṇe a sampattam rūpam eka citta khaṇa mattena vā a sampattam hotu anāgate

original: kappakoṭisatasahassamatthake vā, sabbaṃ anāgatameva nāma. Ime tayo khaṇe sampattaṃ

analyzed: abhidhamma niddesena iva atīta anāgata paccuppanna rūpam niddiṭṭhanti veditabbam

original: Aparo nayo – idañhi rūpaṃ addhāsantatisamayakhaṇavasena catudhā atītaṃ nāma hoti.
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ idam hi rūpam addhā santati samaya khaṇa vasena catudhā atītam nāma

analyzed: eka āhāra samuṭṭhānam ca pubba apariya vasena pavattamānam api paccuppannam tatas pubbe visabhāga otu āhāra samuṭṭhānam

analyzed: atītam pacchā anāgatam citta jam eka vīthi eka javana eka samāpatti samuṭṭhānam paccuppannam

original: Tato pubbe atītaṃ, pacchā anāgataṃ. Kammasamuṭṭhānassa pāṭiyekkaṃ santativasena atītādibhedo
analyzed: tatas pubbe atītam pacchā anāgatam kamma samuṭṭhānassa pāṭiyekkam santati vasena atīta ādi bhedaḥ

original: veditabbo. Samayavasena ekamuhuttapubbaṇhasāyanharattidivādīsu samayesu santānavasena
analyzed: veditabbaḥ samaya vasena eka muhutta pubbaṇha sāyanharatti divā ādīsu samayesu santāna vasena

analyzed: pavattamānam tam tam samayam paccuppannam nāma tatas pubbe atītam pacchā anāgatam

original: Khaṇavasena uppādādikkhaṇattayapariyāpannaṃ paccuppannaṃ nāma. Tato pubbe atītaṃ, pacchā anāgataṃ.
analyzed: khaṇa vasena uppāda ādi khaṇa ttaya pariyāpannam paccuppannam nāma tatas pubbe atītam pacchā anāgatam

original: Apica atikkahetupaccayakiccaṃ atītaṃ. Niṭṭhitahetukiccaṃ aniṭṭhitapaccayakiccaṃ paccuppannaṃ.
analyzed: apica atikka hetu paccaya kiccam atītam niṭṭhita hetu kiccam aniṭṭhita paccaya kiccam paccuppannam

original: Ubhayakiccamasampattaṃ anāgataṃ. Sakiccakkhaṇe vā paccuppannaṃ. Tato pubbe atītaṃ,
analyzed: ubhaya kiccam asampattam anāgatam sa kicca khaṇe vā paccuppannam tatas pubbe atītam

original: pacchā anāgataṃ. Ettha ca khaṇādikathāva nippariyāyā, sesā sapariyāyā. Tāsu nippariyāyakathā
analyzed: pacchā anāgatam ettha ca nippariyāyā sesā sa pariyāyā tāsu nippariyāya kathā

original: idha adhippetā. Ajjhattadukassāpi niddesapadāni heṭṭhā ajjhattattikaniddese vuttatthāneva.
analyzed: idha adhippetā ajjhatta dukassa api niddesa padāni heṭṭhā ajjhatta ttika niddese vutta tthānā eva

original: Oḷārikādīni rūpakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttatthāneva.
analyzed: oḷārikā ādīni rūpa kaṇḍa vaṇṇanāyam vutta tthānā eva

original: 6. Hīnadukaniddese tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānanti bahūsu sattesu sāmivacanaṃ. Aparassāpi
analyzed: hīna duka niddese tesam tesam sattānam ti bahūsu sattesu sāmi vacanam aparassa api

original: aparassāpīti hi vuccamāne divasampi kappasatasahassampi vadanto ettakameva vadeyya.
analyzed: aparassa api iti hi vuccamāne divasam pi kappa sata sahassam pi vadantaḥ ettakam eva vadeyya

original: Iti satthā dvīheva padehi anavasese satte pariyādiyanto ‘tesaṃ tesaṃ sattāna’nti
analyzed: iti satthā dvīhā iva padehi anavasese satte pariyādiyantaḥ tesam tesam sattānanti

original: āha. Ettakena hi sabbampi aparadīpanaṃ siddhaṃ hoti. Uññātanti avamataṃ. Avaññātanti
analyzed: āha ettakena hi sabbam pi apara dīpanam siddham hoti uññātanti avamatam avaññātanti

original: vambhetvā ñātaṃ. Rūpantipi na viditaṃ. Hīḷitanti agahetabbaṭṭhena khittaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ,
analyzed: vambhetvā ñātam na viditam a gahetabba ṭṭhena khittam chaḍḍitam

original: jigucchitantipi vadanti. Paribhūtanti kimetenāti vācāya paribhavitaṃ. Acittīkatanti
analyzed: vadanti kim etena ati vācāya paribhavitam

original: na garukataṃ. Hīnanti lāmakaṃ. Hīnamatanti hīnanti mataṃ, lāmakaṃ katvā ñātaṃ. Hīnasammatanti
analyzed: na garu katam hīna nti lāmakam hīna matanti hīna nti matam lāmakam katvā ñātam hīna sammatanti

original: hīnanti loke sammataṃ, hīnehi vā sammataṃ, gūthabhakkhehi gūtho viya. Aniṭṭhanti
analyzed: hīna nti loke sammatam hīnehi vā sammatam gūtha bhakkhehi gūthaḥ viya aniṭṭhanti

original: appiyaṃ, paṭilābhatthāya vā apariyesitaṃ. Sacepi naṃ koci pariyeseyya, pariyesatu.
analyzed: appiyam paṭilābha tthāya vā a pariyesitam sace pi nam koci pariyeseyya pariyesatu

original: Etassa pana ārammaṇassa etadeva nāmaṃ. Akantanti akāmitaṃ, nissirikaṃ vā. Amanāpanti
analyzed: etassa pana ārammaṇassa etat eva nāmam a kantanti a kāmitam nissirikam vā amanāpanti

original: manasmiṃ na appitaṃ. Tādisañhi ārammaṇaṃ manasmiṃ na appīyati. Atha vā manaṃ appāyati
analyzed: manasmim na appitam tādisam hi ārammaṇam manasmim na appīyati atha vā manam appāyati

original: vaḍḍhetīti manāpaṃ, na manāpaṃ amanāpaṃ.
analyzed: vaḍḍheti iti manāpam na manāpam a manāpam

original: Aparo nayo – aniṭṭhaṃ sampattivirahato. Taṃ ekantena kammasamuṭṭhānesu akusalakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ aniṭṭham sampatti virahataḥ tam ekantena kamma samuṭṭhānesu akusala kamma samuṭṭhānam

original: Akantaṃ sukhassa ahetubhāvato. Amanāpaṃ dukkhassa hetubhāvato. Rūpā saddāti idamassa
analyzed: akantam sukhassa ahetu bhāvataḥ amanāpam dukkhassa hetu bhāvataḥ rūpā idam assa

original: sabhāvadīpanaṃ. Imasmiñhi pade akusalakammajavasena aniṭṭhā pañca kāmaguṇā vibhattā.
analyzed: imasmin hi pade akusala kamma ja vasena aniṭṭhā pañca kāmaguṇāḥ vibhattā

original: Kusalakammajaṃ pana aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi, sabbaṃ iṭṭhameva.
analyzed: kusala kamma jam pana aniṭṭham nāma natthi sabbam iṭṭham eva

original: Paṇītapadaniddeso vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo. Imasmiṃ pana pade kusalakammajavasena
iṭṭhā pañca kāmaguṇā vibhattā. Kusalakammajañhi aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi, sabbaṃ iṭṭhameva.

original: rucivasena kathitaṃ.
analyzed: ruci vasena kathitam

original: Yathāha –
analyzed: yathā āha

original: cāti. Tattha lakkhaṇato dūreti na kathitaṃ, taṃ okāsato kathetabbaṃ. Tasmā dūreti

original: akathitaṃ. Oḷārikarūpaṃ okāsato dūreti dassetuṃ aniyyātetvāva yaṃ vā panaññampītiādimāha.

original: Santikapadaniddesepi eseva nayo. Tattha anāsanneti na āsanne, anupakaṭṭheti nissaṭe,
analyzed: santika pada niddese pi esa eva nayaḥ tattha anāsannā iti na āsanne anupakaṭṭhā iti nissaṭe

original: dūreti dūramhi, asantiketi na santike. Idaṃ vuccati rūpaṃ dūreti idaṃ paṇṇarasavidhaṃ

original: dūreti vuccati. Santikapadaniddeso uttānatthoyeva.
analyzed: dūrā iti vuccati santika pada niddeso uttāna tthaḥ yeva

original: Idaṃ vuccati rūpaṃ santiketi idaṃ dasavidhaṃ oḷārikarūpaṃ lakkhaṇato santike, pañcadasavidhaṃ

analyzed: pana sukhuma rūpam yevāpanaka vasena okāsato santikā iti vuccati kittakato paṭṭhāya

original: pana rūpaṃ okāsavasena santike nāma? Kittakato paṭṭhāya dūre nāmāti? Pakatikathāya

original: okāsatopi santike hoti; dūre hontaṃ okāsatova dūre hoti, na lakkhaṇato.

original: Taṃ taṃ vā panāti ettha na heṭṭhimanayo oloketabbo. Heṭṭhā hi bhindamāno gato. Idha

analyzed: ettha dassitam attanaḥ hi rūpam santike nāma antokucchi gatassa api parassa dūre antokucchi gatassa

original: santike; bahiṭhitassa dūre. Ekamañce sayitassa santike; bahipamukhe ṭhitassa dūre.

original: Antopariveṇe rūpaṃ santike; bahipariveṇe dūre. Antosaṅghārāme rūpaṃ santike; bahisaṅghārāme

original: dūre. Antosīmāya rūpaṃ santike; bahisīmāya dūre. Antogāmakhette rūpaṃ santike; bahigāmakkhette
analyzed: dūre anto sīmāya rūpam santike bahi sīmāya dūre antar gāma khette rūpam santike bahi gāma khette

original: dūre. Antojanapade rūpaṃ santike; bahijanapade dūre. Antorajjasīmāya rūpaṃ santike;
analyzed: dūre antar janapade rūpam santike bahi janapade dūre antar rajja sīmāya rūpam santike

original: bahirajjasīmāya dūre. Antosamudde rūpaṃ santike; bahisamudderūpaṃ dūre. Antocakkavāḷe

original: rūpaṃ santike; bahicakkavāḷe dūreti.
analyzed: rūpam santike bahi cakkavāḷe dūra iti

original: Ayaṃ rūpakkhandhaniddeso.
analyzed: ayam rūpakkhandha niddesaḥ

original: 2. Vedanākkhandhaniddeso
analyzed: vedanā khandha niddeso

original: 8. Vedanākkhandhaniddesādīsu heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ pahāya apubbameva vaṇṇayissāma.
analyzed: vedanā khandha niddesa ādīsu heṭṭhā vutta sadisam pahāya apubbam eva vaṇṇayissāma

original: Yā kāci vedanāti catubhūmikavedanaṃ pariyādiyati. Sukhā vedanātiādīni atītādivasena
analyzed: yā kāci catu bhūmika vedanam sukhā atīta ādi vasena

original: niddiṭṭhavedanaṃ sabhāvato dassetuṃ vuttāni. Tattha sukhā vedanā atthi kāyikā, atthi
analyzed: niddiṭṭha vedanam sabhāvataḥ dassetum vuttāni tattha sukhā vedanā atthi kāyikā atthi

original: cetasikā. Tathā dukkhā vedanā. Adukkhamasukhā pana cakkhādayo pasādakāye sandhāya
analyzed: cetasikā tathā dukkhā vedanā adukkham asukhā pana cakkha ādayo pasāda kāye sandhāya

original: pariyāyena ‘atthi kāyikā, atthi cetasikā’. Tattha sabbāpi kāyikā kāmāvacarā. Tathā
analyzed: pariyāyena atthi kāyikā atthi cetasikā tattha sabbā api kāyikā kāmāvacarā tathā

original: cetasikā dukkhā vedanā. Cetasikā sukhā pana tebhūmikā. Adukkhamasukhā catubhūmikā.
analyzed: cetasikā dukkhā vedanā cetasikā sukhā pana tebhūmikā adukkhamasukhā catu bhūmikā

original: Tassā sabbappakārāyapi santativasena, khaṇādivasena ca atītādibhāvo veditabbo.
analyzed: santati vasena khaṇa ādi vasena ca atīta ādi bhāvaḥ veditabbo

original: Tattha santativasena ekavīthiekajavanaekasamāpattipariyāpannā, ekavidhavisayasamāyogappavattā
analyzed: tattha santati vasena eka vīthi eka javana eka samāpatti pariyāpannā ekavidha visaya samāyoga ppavattā

original: ca paccuppannā. Tato pubbe atītā, pacchā anāgatā. Khaṇādivasena khaṇattayapariyāpannā
analyzed: ca paccuppannā tatas pubbe atītā pacchā anāgatā khaṇa ādi vasena khaṇa ttaya pariyāpannā

original: pubbantāparantamajjhagatā sakiccañca kurumānā vedanā paccuppannā. Tato pubbe atītā,
analyzed: pubbanta aparanta majjha gatā sa kiccañca kurumānā vedanā paccuppannā tatas pubbe atītā

original: pacchā anāgatā. Tattha khaṇādivasena atītādibhāvaṃ sandhāya ayaṃ niddeso katoti veditabbo.
analyzed: pacchā anāgatā tattha khaṇa ādi vasena atīta ādi bhāvam sandhāya ayam niddeso kato ti veditabbo

original: 11. Oḷārikasukhumaniddese akusalā vedanātiādīni jātito oḷārikasukhumabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: oḷārika sukhuma niddese akusalā vedanā ti ādīni jātitaḥ oḷārika sukhuma bhāvam dassetuṃ

analyzed: vuttāni dukkhā vedanā oḷārikā ti ādīni sabhāvataḥ asamāpannassa vedanā ti ādīni puggalato

original: Sāsavātiādīni lokiyalokuttarato oḷārikasukhumabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttāni. Tattha akusalā
analyzed: sāsava ati ādīni lokiya lokuttarataḥ oḷārika sukhuma bhāvam dassetum vuttāni tattha akusalā

original: ca sukhumā. Abyākatā nirussāhaṭṭhena avipākaṭṭhena ca sukhumā. Kusalākusalā saussāhaṭṭhena
analyzed: ca sukhumā abyākatā nirussāha ṭṭhena avipāka ṭṭhena ca sukhumā kusala akusalā saussāha ṭṭhena

analyzed: sa vipāka ṭṭhena ca oḷārikā abyākatā vutta nayena iva sukhumā

original: Dukkhā asātaṭṭhena dukkhaṭṭhena ca oḷārikā. Sukhā sātaṭṭhena sukhaṭṭhena ca sukhumā.
analyzed: dukkhā asāta ṭṭhena dukkha ṭṭhena ca oḷārikā sukhā sāta ṭṭhena sukha ṭṭhena ca sukhumā

original: Adukkhamasukhā santaṭṭhena paṇītaṭṭhena ca sukhumā. Sukhadukkhā khobhanaṭṭhena pharaṇaṭṭhena
analyzed: adukkhamasukhā santa ṭṭhena paṇīta ṭṭhena ca sukhumā sukha dukkhā khobhana ṭṭhena pharaṇa ṭṭhena

original: ca oḷārikā. Sukhavedanāpi hi khobheti pharati. Tathā dukkhavedanāpi. Sukhañhi uppajjamānaṃ
analyzed: ca oḷārikā sukha vedanā api hi khobheti pharati tathā dukkha vedanā api sukham hi uppajjamānam

original: sakalasarīraṃ khobhentaṃ āluḷentaṃ abhisandayamānaṃ maddayamānaṃ chādayamānaṃ sītodakaghaṭena
analyzed: sakala sarīram khobhentam āluḷentam abhisandayamānam maddayamānam chādayamānam sītā udaka ghaṭena

original: āsiñcayamānaṃ viya uppajjati. Dukkhaṃ uppajjamānaṃ tattaphālaṃ anto pavesantaṃ viya
analyzed: āsiñcayamānam viya uppajjati dukkham uppajjamānam tatta phālam antar pavesantam viya

original: tiṇukkāya bahi jhāpayamānaṃ viya uppajjati. Adukkhamasukhā pana vuttanayeneva sukhumā.
analyzed: tiṇukkāya bahi jhāpayamānam viya uppajjati adukkhamasukhā pana vutta nayena iva sukhumā

original: Asamāpannassa vedanā nānārammaṇe vikkhittabhāvato oḷārikā. Samāpannassa vedanā ekattanimitteyeva
analyzed: asamāpannassa vedanā nānā ārammaṇe vikkhitta bhāvataḥ oḷārikā samāpannassa vedanā ekatta nimittā iya eva

original: caratīti sukhumā. Sāsavā āsavuppattihetuto oḷārikā. Āsavacāro nāma ekantaoḷāriko.
analyzed: carati iti sukhumā sa āsavā āsava uppatti hetutaḥ oḷārikā āsava cāraḥ nāma ekanta oḷārikaḥ

original: Anāsavā vuttavipariyāyena sukhumā.
analyzed: anāsavā vutta vipariyāyena sukhumā

original: Tattha eko neva kusalattike kovido hoti, na vedanāttike. So ‘kusalattikaṃ rakkhāmī’ti
analyzed: tattha ekaḥ na iva kusala attike kovidaḥ hoti na vedanā attike so kusala attikam rakkhāmi iti

original: vedanāttikaṃ bhindati; ‘vedanāttikaṃ rakkhāmī’ti kusalattikaṃ bhindati. Eko ‘tikaṃ
analyzed: vedanā ttikam bhindati vedanā ttikam rakkhāmi iti kusala ttikam bhindati ekaḥ tikam

original: rakkhāmī’ti bhūmantaraṃ bhindati. Eko na bhindati. Kathaṃ? “Sukhadukkhā vedanā oḷārikā,
analyzed: rakkhāmi iti bhūmantaram bhindati ekaḥ na bhindati katham sukha dukkhā vedanā oḷārikā

original: adukkhamasukhā vedanā sukhumā”ti hi vedanāttike vuttaṃ. Taṃ eko paṭikkhipati – na
analyzed: adukkham asukhā vedanā sukhumā ti hi vedanā attike vuttam tam ekaḥ paṭikkhipati na

analyzed: sabbā adukkhamasukhā sukhumā sā hi kusalā api atthi akusalā api abyākatā api tattha kusala akusalā

original: oḷārikā, abyākatā sukhumā. Kasmā? Kusalattike pāḷiyaṃ āgatattāti. Evaṃ kusalattiko
analyzed: oḷārikā abyākatā sukhumā kasmā kusala attike pāḷiyam evam kusala attikaḥ

original: rakkhito hoti, vedanāttiko pana bhinno.
analyzed: rakkhitaḥ hoti vedanā attiko pana bhinno

original: Kusalākusalā vedanā oḷārikā, abyākatā vedanā sukhumā”ti yaṃ pana kusalattike vuttaṃ,
analyzed: kusala akusalā vedanā oḷārikā abyākatā vedanā sukhumā iti yat pana kusala ttike vuttam

original: taṃ eko paṭikkhipati – na sabbā abyākatā sukhumā. Sā hi sukhāpi atthi dukkhāpi adukkhamasukhāpi.
analyzed: tam ekaḥ paṭikkhipati na sabbā abyākatā sukhumā sā hi sukhā api atthi dukkhā api adukkhamasukhā api

original: Tattha sukhadukkhā oḷārikā, adukkhamasukhā sukhumā. Kasmā? Vedanāttike pāḷiyaṃ āgatattāti.
analyzed: tattha sukha dukkhā oḷārikā adukkham asukhā sukhumā kasmā vedanā attike pāḷiyam āgata ttā ti

original: Evaṃ vedanāttiko rakkhito hoti, kusalattiko pana bhinno. Kusalattikassa pana āgataṭṭhāne

analyzed: vedanā ttikam anoloketvā vedanā ttikassa āgata ṭṭhāne kusala ttikam anoloketvā kusala ādīnam

original: kusalattikalakkhaṇena, sukhādīnaṃ vedanāttikalakkhaṇena oḷārikasukhumataṃ kathento na bhindati nāma.
analyzed: kusala ttika lakkhaṇena sukha ādīnam vedanā ttika lakkhaṇena oḷārika sukhumatam kathentaḥ na bhindati nāma

original: Yampi “kusalākusalā vedanā oḷārikā, abyākatā vedanā sukhumā”ti kusalattike vuttaṃ,
analyzed: yat api kusala akusalā vedanā oḷārikā abyākatā vedanā sukhumā iti kusala ttike vuttam

analyzed: tattha ekaḥ kusalā lokuttara vedanā api samānā oḷārikāḥ nāma vipākāḥ antamasaḥ dvi pañca viññāṇa sahajātā api

analyzed: karontaḥ tikam rakkhissāmi iti bhūmantaram bhindati nāma tattha tattha bhūmiyam kusalam

analyzed: pana taṃtaṃbhūmi vipākena iva saddhim yojetvā kathentaḥ na bhindati nāma tatra ayam nayaḥ

analyzed: oḷārikā rūpāvacara arūpāvacara lokuttara vipākā sukhumā ati iminā nīhārena kathentaḥ na bhindati nāma

analyzed: tipiṭakacūḷanāga theraḥ pana āha akusale oḷārika sukhuma tā nāma na uddharitabbā tat hi

original: Imaṃ kathaṃ āharitvā tipiṭakacūḷābhayattherassa kathayiṃsu – evaṃ therena kathitanti.
analyzed: imam katham āharitvā tipiṭakacūḷābhaya therassa kathayiṃsu evam therena kathitam ti

original: Tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero āha – “sammāsambuddhena abhidhammaṃ patvā ekapadassāpi dvinnampi
analyzed: tipiṭakacūḷābhaya theraḥ āha sammāsambuddhena abhidhammam patvā eka padassa api dvinnam pi

original: padānaṃ āgataṭṭhāne nayaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne nayo adinno nāma natthi, nayaṃ kātuṃ

analyzed: uddharitā ati evam ca pana vatvā idam suttam āhari tatra bhante yā ayam paṭipadā

original: dukkhā dandhābhiññā, ayaṃ, bhante, paṭipadā ubhayeneva hīnā akkhāyati – dukkhattā

original: dandhattā cā”ti. Ettha hi catasso paṭipadā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.

original: Taṃ taṃ vā panāti ettha na heṭṭhimanayo oloketabbo. Taṃtaṃvāpanavaseneva kathetabbaṃ.
analyzed: tam tam vā pana ati ettha na heṭṭhima nayaḥ oloketabbo taṃ taṃ vāpana vasena iva kathetabbam

original: Duvidhā hi akusalā – lobhasahagatā dosasahagatā ca. Tattha dosasahagatā oḷārikā,
analyzed: duvidhā hi akusalā lobha sahagatā dosa sahagatā ca tattha dosa sahagatā oḷārikā

original: lobhasahagatā sukhumā. Dosasahagatāpi duvidhā – niyatā aniyatā ca. Tattha niyatā

analyzed: oḷārikā aniyatā sukhumā niyatā api kappa ṭṭhitikā oḷārikā nokappa ṭṭhitikā sukhumā

original: Kappaṭṭhitikāpi asaṅkhārikā oḷārikā, sasaṅkhārikā sukhumā. Lobhasahagatāpi dvidhā

original: sukhumā. Diṭṭhisampayuttāpi niyatā oḷārikā, aniyatā sukhumā. Sāpi asaṅkhārikā oḷārikā,
analyzed: sukhumā diṭṭhi sampayuttā api niyatā oḷārikā aniyatā sukhumā sā api asaṅkhārikā oḷārikā

original: sasaṅkhārikā sukhumā.
analyzed: sa saṅkhārikā su khumā

original: oḷārikā, rūpāvacarakusalā sukhumā. Sāpi oḷārikā, arūpāvacarakusalā sukhumā. Sāpi
analyzed: oḷārikā rūpāvacara kusalā sukhumā sā api oḷārikā arūpāvacara kusalā sukhumā sā api

original: oḷārikā, lokuttarakusalā sukhumā. Ayaṃ tāva bhūmīsu abhedato nayo.
analyzed: oḷārikā lokuttara kusalā su khumā ayam tāva bhūmīsu abhedataḥ nayaḥ

original: Bhedato pana kāmāvacarā dānasīlabhāvanāmayavasena tividhā. Tattha dānamayā oḷārikā,
analyzed: bhedato pana kāma avacarā dāna sīla bhāvanā maya vasena tividhā tattha dāna mayā oḷārikā

original: sīlamayā sukhumā. Sāpi oḷārikā, bhāvanāmayā sukhumā. Sāpi duhetukā tihetukāti duvidhā.
analyzed: sīla mayā sukhumā sā api oḷārikā bhāvanā mayā sukhumā sā api du hetukā ti hetukā ati duvidhā

original: Tattha duhetukā oḷārikā, tihetukā sukhumā. Tihetukāpi sasaṅkhārikaasaṅkhārikabhedato
analyzed: tattha du hetukā oḷārikā ti hetukā sukhumā ti hetukā api sa saṅkhārika asaṅkhārika bhedato

original: duvidhā. Tattha sasaṅkhārikā oḷārikā, asaṅkhārikā sukhumā. Rūpāvacare paṭhamajjhānakusalavedanā

original: oḷārikā, dutiyajjhānakusalavedanā sukhumā…pe… catutthajjhānakusalavedanā sukhumā.
analyzed: oḷārikā dutiya jhāna kusala vedanā sukhumā āpe catuttha jhāna kusala vedanā sukhumā

original: Sāpi oḷārikā, ākāsānañcāyatanakusalavedanā sukhumā ākāsānañcāyatanakusalavedanā oḷārikā…pe….
analyzed: sā api oḷārikā ākāsa anañcāyatana kusala vedanā sukhumā ākāsa anañcāyatana kusala vedanā oḷārikā ape

original: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalavedanā sukhumā. Sāpi oḷārikā, vipassanāsahajātā sukhumā.
analyzed: nevasaññā nāsañña āyatana kusala vedanā sukhumā sā api oḷārikā vipassanā sahajātā sukhumā

original: Sāpi oḷārikā, sotāpattimaggasahajātā sukhumā. Sāpi oḷārikā…pe… arahattamaggasahajātā sukhumā.
analyzed: sā api oḷārikā sotāpatti magga sahajātā sukhumā sā api oḷārikā ape arahatta magga sahajātā sukhumā

original: Catubbidhe vipāke kāmāvacaravipākavedanā oḷārikā, rūpāvacaravipākavedanā sukhumā. Sāpi oḷārikā…pe… lokuttaravipākavedanā sukhumā. Evaṃ tāva abhedato.
analyzed: catubbidhe vipāke kāmāvacara vipāka vedanā oḷārikā rūpāvacara vipāka vedanā sukhumā sā api lokuttara vipāka vedanā sukhumā evam tāva abhedato

original: Bhedato pana kāmāvacaravipākā atthi ahetukā, atthi sahetukā. Sahetukāpi atthi duhetukā,
analyzed: bhedato pana kāmāvacara vipākā atthi ahetukā atthi sa hetukā sa hetukā api atthi du hetukā

original: atthi tihetukā. Tattha ahetukā oḷārikā, sahetukā sukhumā. Sāpi duhetukā oḷārikā,
analyzed: atthi ti hetukā tattha ahetukā oḷārikā sa hetukā sukhumā sā api du hetukā oḷārikā

original: tihetukā sukhumā. Tatthāpi sasaṅkhārikā oḷārikā, asaṅkhārikā sukhumā. Paṭhamajjhānavipākā
analyzed: ti hetukā sukhumā tattha api sa saṅkhārikā oḷārikā asaṅkhārikā sukhumā paṭhama jhāna vipākā

original: oḷārikā, dutiyajjhānavipākā sukhumā…pe… catutthajjhānavipākā sukhumā. Sāpi oḷārikā,
analyzed: oḷārikā dutiya jhāna vipākā sukhumā āpe catuttha jhāna vipākā sukhumā sā api oḷārikā

original: ākāsānañcāyatanavipākā sukhumā. Sāpi oḷārikā…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavipākā sukhumā.
analyzed: ākāsa anañcāyatana vipākā sukhumā sā api oḷārikā āpe nevasaññānāsaññāyatana vipākā sukhumā

original: Sāpi oḷārikā, sotāpattiphalavedanā sukhumā. Sāpi oḷārikā, sakadāgāmi…pe… arahattaphalavedanā sukhumā.
analyzed: sā api oḷārikā sa utāpatti phala vedanā sukhumā sā api oḷārikā sakadāgāmi pe arahatta phala vedanā sukhumā

original: Tīsu kiriyāsu kāmāvacarakiriyavedanā oḷārikā, rūpāvacarakiriyavedanā sukhumā. Sāpi
analyzed: tīsu kiriyāsu kāmāvacara kiriya vedanā oḷārikā rūpāvacara kiriya vedanā sukhumā sā api

original: oḷārikā, arūpāvacarakiriyavedanā sukhumā. Evaṃ tāva abhedato. Bhedato pana ahetukādivasena
analyzed: oḷārikā arūpāvacara kiriya vedanā sukhumā evam tāva abhedataḥ bhedataḥ pana ahetuka ādi vasena

original: bhinnāya kāmāvacarakiriyāya ahetukakiriyavedanā oḷārikā, sahetukā sukhumā. Sāpi duhetukā
analyzed: bhinnāya kāmāvacara kiriyāya ahetuka kiriya vedanā oḷārikā sa hetukā sukhumā sā api du hetukā

original: oḷārikā, tihetukā sukhumā. Tatthāpi sasaṅkhārikā oḷārikā, asaṅkhārikā sukhumā. Paṭhamajjhāne
analyzed: oḷārikā ti hetukā sukhumā tattha api sa saṅkhārikā oḷārikā asaṅkhārikā sukhumā paṭhama jhāne

original: kiriyavedanā oḷārikā, dutiyajjhāne sukhumā. Sāpi oḷārikā, tatiye…pe… catutthe sukhumā.
analyzed: kiriya vedanā oḷārikā dutiya jhāne sukhumā sā api oḷārikā catutthe sukhumā

original: Sāpi oḷārikā, ākāsānañcāyatanakiriyavedanā sukhumā. Sāpi oḷārikā, viññāṇañcā…pe…
analyzed: sā api oḷārikā ākāsa anañcāyatana kiriya vedanā sukhumā sā api oḷārikā viññāṇañca ape

original: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakiriyavedanā sukhumā. Yā oḷārikā sā hīnā. Yā sukhumā sā paṇītā.
analyzed: nevasaññā nāsañña āyatana kiriya vedanā sukhumā yā oḷārikā sā hīnā yā sukhumā sā paṇītā

original: 13. Dūradukaniddese akusalavedanā visabhāgaṭṭhena visaṃsaṭṭhena ca kusalābyākatāhi
analyzed: dūra duka niddese akusala vedanā visa bhāga ṭṭhena visaṃsa ṭṭhena ca

original: dūre. Iminā nayena sabbapadesu dūratā veditabbā. Sacepi hi akusalādivedanāsamaṅgino
analyzed: dūre iminā nayena sabba padesu dūra tā veditabbā sace pi hi akusala ādi vedanā samaṅginaḥ

analyzed: dukkha ādi vedanā samaṅgino ca tayo tayo janāḥ eka mañce nisinnāḥ honti tesam pi tā vedanā

original: visabhāgaṭṭhena visaṃsaṭṭhena ca dūreyeva nāma. Samāpannavedanādisamaṅgīsupi eseva
analyzed: visa bhāga aṭṭhena visaṃsaṭṭhena ca nāma samāpanna vedanā ādi samaṅgī supi esā iva

original: nayo. Akusalā pana akusalāya sabhāgaṭṭhena sarikkhaṭṭhena ca santike nāma. Iminā
analyzed: nayaḥ akusalā pana akusalāya sabhāga ṭṭhena sarikkha ṭṭhena ca santike nāma iminā

original: nayena sabbapadesu santikatā veditabbā. Sacepi hi akusalādivedanāsamaṅgīsu tīsu janesu
analyzed: nayena sabba padesu santika tā veditabbā sace pi hi akusala ādi vedanā samaṅgīsu tīsu janesu

original: eko kāmabhave, eko rūpabhave, eko arūpabhave, tesampi tā vedanā sabhāgaṭṭhena sarikkhaṭṭhena
analyzed: ekaḥ kāma bhave ekaḥ rūpa bhave ekaḥ arūpa bhave tesam pi tā vedanā sa bhāga ṭṭhena sa rikkha ṭṭhena

original: ca santikeyeva nāma. Kusalādivedanāsamaṅgīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: ca santikeyā iva nāma kusala ādi vedanā samaṅgī supi esā iva nayo

original: Taṃ taṃ vā panāti ettha heṭṭhimanayaṃ anoloketvā taṃ taṃ vāpanavaseneva kathetabbaṃ.
analyzed: tam tam vā panāti ettha heṭṭhima nayam tam tam vāpana vasena iva kathetabbam

original: Kathentena ca na dūrato santikaṃ uddharitabbaṃ, santikato pana dūraṃ uddharitabbaṃ.
analyzed: kathentena ca na dūratas santikam uddharitabbam santikataḥ pana dūram uddharitabbam

original: Duvidhā hi akusalā – lobhasahagatā dosasahagatā ca. Tattha lobhasahagatā lobhasahagatāya
analyzed: duvidhā hi akusalā lobha sahagatā dosa sahagatā ca tattha lobha sahagatā lobha sahagatāya

original: santike nāma, dosasahagatāya dūre nāma. Dosasahagatā dosasahagatāya santike nāma,
analyzed: santike nāma dosa sahagatāya dūre nāma dosa sahagatāḥ dosa sahagatāya santike nāma

original: lobhasahagatāya dūre nāma. Dosasahagatāpi niyatā niyatāya santike nāmāti. Evaṃ aniyatā.
analyzed: lobha sahagatāya dūre nāma dosa sahagatā api niyatā niyatāya santike nāma ati evam aniyatā

original: Kappaṭṭhitikaasaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikabhedaṃ lobhasahagatādīsu ca diṭṭhisampayuttādibhedaṃ

analyzed: eva santike itarā itarāya dūrā iti veditabbā ati

analyzed: ayam vedanā khandha niddeso

analyzed: saññā khandha niddeso

analyzed: sabbā catu bhūmika saññā

analyzed: manaḥ samphassaḥ nāma tasmim manaḥ samphasse tasmā vā manaḥ samphassā jātā ati manaḥ samphassa jā

analyzed: tathā sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇam manaḥ nāma tena sahajātaḥ phassaḥ manaḥ samphassaḥ nāma

original: Tasmiṃ manosamphasse, tasmā vā manosamphassā jātāti manosamphassajā.
analyzed: tasmim manaḥ samphasse tasmai vā manaḥ samphassā jātā ati manaḥ samphassa jā

analyzed: tatra idam vatthu dve kira itthiyaḥ nisīditvā suttam kantanti dvīsu daharesu gāme

analyzed: carantesu ekaḥ puratas gacchantaḥ ekam itthim olokesi itarā tam pucchi kasmai nu kho

original: evaṃ veditabbo – gabbhaseyyakasattānañhi paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā apacchāapure

original: ekato pātubhavanti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe pātubhūtā kalalasaṅkhātā rūpasantati parittā hoti.
analyzed: ekatas pātubhavanti tasmin khaṇe pātubhūtā kalala saṅkhātā rūpa santati parittā hoti

original: Khuddakamakkhikāya ekavāyāmena pātabbamattāti vatvā puna ‘atibahuṃ etaṃ, saṇhasūciyā
analyzed: khuddaka makkhikāya eka vāyāmena vatvā puna atibahum etam saṇha sūciyā

original: tele pakkhipitvā ukkhittāya paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumatta’nti vuttaṃ. Tampi paṭikkhipitvā
analyzed: tele pakkhipitvā ukkhittāya paggharitvā agge ṭhita bindumattanti vuttam tam pi paṭikkhipitvā

original: ‘ekakese telato uddharitvā gahite tassa paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumatta’nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: eka kese telataḥ uddharitvā gahite tassa paggharitvā agge ṭhita bindumattanti vuttam

original: Tampi paṭikkhipitvā ‘imasmiṃ janapade manussānaṃ kese aṭṭhadhā phālite tato ekakoṭṭhāsappamāṇo
analyzed: tam pi paṭikkhipitvā imasmin janapade manussānam kese aṭṭhadhā phālite tatas eka koṭṭhāsa ppamāṇaḥ

original: uttarakurukānaṃ keso; tassa pasannatilatelato uddhaṭassa agge ṭhitabindumatta’nti
analyzed: uttarakurukānam kesaḥ tassa pasanna tila telataḥ uddhaṭassa agge ṭhita bindu mattanti

original: vuttaṃ. Tampi paṭikkhipitvā ‘etaṃ bahu, jātiuṇṇā nāma sukhumā; tassā ekaaṃsuno pasannatilatele
analyzed: vuttam tam pi paṭikkhipitvā etam bahu jātiuṇṇā nāma sukhumā tassāḥ eka aṃsuno pasanna tila tele

original: pakkhipitvā uddhaṭassa paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumatta’nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ acchaṃ
analyzed: pakkhipitvā uddhaṭassa paggharitvā agge ṭhita bindu mattanti vuttam tam pana etam accham

original: hoti vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ parisuddhaṃ pasannatilatelabindusamānavaṇṇaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
analyzed: hoti vippasannam anāvilam parisuddham pasanna tila tela bindu samāna vaṇṇam vuttam pi

original: Tilatelassa yathā bindu, sappimaṇḍo anāvilo;
analyzed: tila telassa yathā bindu sappi maṇḍaḥ anāvilaḥ

original: Evaṃ vaṇṇapaṭibhāgaṃ, kalalanti pavuccatīti.
analyzed: evam vaṇṇa paṭibhāgam kalalanti pavuccati iti

original: Evaṃ parittāya rūpasantatiyā tīṇi santatisīsāni honti – vatthudasakaṃ, kāyadasakaṃ,
analyzed: evam parittāya rūpa santatiyā tīṇi santati sīsāni honti vatthu dasakam kāya dasakam

original: itthiyā itthindriyavasena purisassa purisindriyavasena bhāvadasakanti. Tattha vatthurūpaṃ,
analyzed: itthiyāḥ itthi indriya vasena purisassa purisa indriya vasena bhāva dasakanti tattha vatthu rūpam

original: tassa nissayāni cattāri mahābhūtāni, taṃnissitā vaṇṇagandharasojā, jīvitanti – idaṃ
analyzed: tassa nissayāni cattāri mahābhūtāni tad nissitā vaṇṇa gandha rasojā jīvitanti idam

original: vatthudasakaṃ nāma. Kāyapasādo, tassa nissayāni cattāri mahābhūtāni, tannissitā vaṇṇagandharasojā,
analyzed: vatthudasakam nāma kāyapasādo tassa nissayāni cattāri mahābhūtāni tad nissitā vaṇṇa gandha rasojā

original: jīvitanti – idaṃ kāyadasakaṃ nāma. Itthiyā itthibhāvo, purisassa purisabhāvo, tassa
analyzed: jīvitanti idam kāyadasakam nāma itthiyāḥ itthi bhāvo purisassa purisa bhāvo tassa

original: nissayāni cattāri mahābhūtāni, tannissitā vaṇṇagandharasojā, jīvitanti – idaṃ bhāvadasakaṃ nāma.
analyzed: nissayāni cattāri mahābhūtāni tad nissitā vaṇṇa gandha rasojā jīvitan ti idam bhāvadasakam nāma

original: Evaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena samatiṃsa kammajarūpāni
analyzed: evam gabbhaseyyakānam paṭisandhiyam ukkaṭṭha paricchedena kamma ja rūpāni

original: rūpakkhandho nāma hoti. Paṭisandhicittena pana sahajātā vedanā vedanākkhandho, saññā
analyzed: rūpa kkhandho nāma hoti paṭisandhi cittena pana sahajātā vedanā vedanā kkhandho saññā

original: saññākkhandho, saṅkhārā saṅkhārakkhandho, paṭisandhicittaṃ viññāṇakkhandhoti. Evaṃ
analyzed: saññā kkhandho saṅkhārā saṅkhāra kkhandho paṭisandhi cittam viññāṇa kkhandho ti evam

original: gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā paripuṇṇā honti. Sace pana napuṃsakapaṭisandhi
analyzed: gabbhaseyyakānam paṭisandhi kkhaṇe pañca khandhāḥ paripuṇṇāḥ honti sace pana napuṃsaka paṭisandhi

original: hoti, bhāvadasakaṃ hāyati. Dvinnaṃ dasakānaṃ vasena samavīsati kammajarūpāni rūpakkhandho
analyzed: hoti bhāva dasakam hāyati dvinnam dasakānam vasena kamma ja rūpāni rūpa kkhandho

original: nāma hoti. Vedanākkhandhādayo vuttappakārā evāti. Evampi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: nāma hoti vedanā khandha ādayaḥ vutta ppakārāḥ eva ati evam pi gabbhaseyyakānam paṭisandhi khaṇe

original: pañcakkhandhā paripuṇṇā honti.
analyzed: pañca kkhandhāḥ paripuṇṇāḥ honti

original: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne tisamuṭṭhānikappaveṇī kathetabbā bhaveyya. Taṃ pana akathetvā ‘opapātikasamuggamo’
analyzed: imasmin ṭhāne ti samuṭṭhānika ppaveṇī kathetabbā bhaveyya tam pana a kathetvā opapātika samuggamaḥ

original: nāma dassito. Opapātikānañhi paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe heṭṭhā vuttāni tīṇi,
analyzed: nāma dassito opapātikānam hi paripuṇṇa āyatanānam paṭisandhi kkhaṇe heṭṭhā vuttāni tīṇi

original: cakkhusotaghānajivhādasakāni cāti satta rūpasantatisīsāni pātubhavanti. Tattha cakkhudasakādīni
analyzed: cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā dasakāni ca ati satta rūpa santati sīsāni pātubhavanti tattha cakkhu dasaka ādīni

original: kāyadasakasadisāneva. Napuṃsakassa pana bhāvadasakaṃ natthi. Evaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ
analyzed: kāya dasaka sadisānam eva napuṃsakassa pana bhāva dasakam natthi evam paripuṇṇa āyatanānam

original: opapātikānaṃ samasattati ceva samasaṭṭhi ca kammajarūpāni rūpakkhandho nāma. Vedanākkhandhādayo
analyzed: opapātikānam ca iva ca kamma ja rūpāni rūpakkhandhaḥ nāma vedanā khandha ādayaḥ

original: vuttappakārā evāti. Evaṃ opapātikānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā paripuṇṇā honti.
analyzed: vutta ppakārāḥ eva ati evam opapātikānam paṭisandhi khaṇe pañca khandhāḥ paripuṇṇāḥ honti

original: Ayaṃ ‘opapātikasamuggamo’ nāma. Evaṃ tāva pañcakkhandhā ‘samuggamato’ veditabbā.
analyzed: ayam opapātika samuggamaḥ nāma evam tāva pañca kkhandhā samuggamataḥ veditabbā

original: ‘Pubbāparato’ti evaṃ pana gabbhaseyyakānaṃ apacchāapure uppannesu pañcasu khandhesu
analyzed: pubba aparato ti evam pana gabbhaseyyakānam apacchā apure uppannesu pañcasu khandhesu

original: kiṃ rūpaṃ paṭhamaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti udāhu arūpanti? Rūpaṃ rūpameva samuṭṭhāpeti,
analyzed: kim rūpam paṭhamam rūpam samuṭṭhāpeti udāhu arūpam ti rūpam rūpam eva samuṭṭhāpeti

original: na arūpaṃ. Kasmā? Paṭisandhicittassa na rūpajanakattā. Sabbasattānañhi paṭisandhicittaṃ,
analyzed: na arūpam kasmā paṭisandhi cittassa na rūpa janaka ttā sabba sattānam hi paṭisandhi cittam

original: khīṇāsavassa cuticittaṃ, dvipañcaviññāṇāni, cattāri arūppavipākānīti soḷasa cittāni
analyzed: khīṇāsavassa cuti cittam dvi pañca viññāṇāni cattāri arūppa vipākāni iti soḷasa cittāni

original: rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti. Tattha paṭisandhicittaṃ tāva vatthuno dubbalatāya appatiṭṭhitatāya
analyzed: rūpam na samuṭṭhāpenti tattha paṭisandhi cittam tāva vatthuno dubbala tāya appatiṭṭhita tāya

original: paccayavekallatāya āgantukatāya ca rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti. Tattha hi sahajātaṃ vatthu
analyzed: paccaya vekalla tāya āgantuka tāya ca rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti tattha hi sahajātam vatthu

original: uppādakkhaṇe dubbalaṃ hotīti vatthuno dubbalatāya rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti. Yathā ca
analyzed: uppāda kkhaṇe dubbalam hoti iti vatthunaḥ dubbala tāya rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti yathā ca

original: papāte patanto puriso aññassa nissayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ etampi kammavegakkhittattā
analyzed: papāte patantaḥ puriso aññassa nissayaḥ bhavitum na sakkoti evam etam pi kamma vega kkhitta ttā

original: papāte patamānaṃ viya appatiṭṭhitaṃ. Iti kammavegakkhittattā, appatiṭṭhitatāyapi
analyzed: papāte patamānam viya appatiṭṭhitam iti kamma vega kkhitta ttā appatiṭṭhita tāya api

original: rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti

original: Paṭisandhicittañca vatthunā saddhiṃ apacchāapure uppannaṃ. Tassa vatthu purejātaṃ
analyzed: paṭisandhi cittam ca vatthunā saddhim a pacchā apure uppannam tassa vatthu purejātam

analyzed: hutvā paccayaḥ bhavitum na sakkoti sace sakkuṇeyya rūpam samuṭṭhāpeyya yatra api

original: vatthu purejātaṃ hutvā paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti, paveṇī ghaṭiyati, tatrāpi cittaṃ
analyzed: vatthu purejātam hutvā paccayaḥ bhavitum sakkoti paveṇī tatra api cittam

original: aṅgato aparihīnaṃyeva rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Yadi hi cittaṃ ṭhānakkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe
analyzed: aṅgataḥ a parihīnam yeva rūpam samuṭṭhāpeti yadi hi cittam ṭhāna kkhaṇe vā bhaṅga kkhaṇe

original: vā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeyya, paṭisandhicittampi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeyya. Na pana cittaṃ tasmiṃ
analyzed: vā rūpam samuṭṭhāpeyya paṭisandhi cittam pi rūpam samuṭṭhāpeyya na pana cittam tasmin

original: khaṇadvaye rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Yathā pana ahicchattakamakulaṃ pathavito uṭṭhahantaṃ
analyzed: khaṇa dvaye rūpam samuṭṭhāpeti yathā pana ahicchattaka makulam pathavitaḥ uṭṭhahantam

analyzed: paṃsu cuṇṇam gahetvā ava uṭṭhahati evam cittam purejātam vatthum nissāya uppāda kkhaṇe

original: aṭṭha rūpāni gahetvāva uṭṭhahati. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ca vatthu purejātaṃ hutvā paccayo
analyzed: aṭṭha rūpāni gahetvā ava uṭṭhahati paṭisandhi kkhaṇe ca vatthu purejātam hutvā paccayaḥ

analyzed: bhavitum na sakkoti iti paccaya vekalla tāya pi paṭisandhi cittam rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti

original: Yathā ca āgantukapuriso agatapubbaṃ padesaṃ gato aññesaṃ – ‘etha bho, antogāme vo

analyzed: anna pāna gandha mālā ādīni dassāmi iti vattum na sakkoti attanaḥ avisaya tāya appahuta tāya

original: evameva paṭisandhicittaṃ āgantukanti attano āgantukatāyapi rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: evam eva paṭisandhi cittam āgantukanti rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti

original: Apica samatiṃsa kammajarūpāni cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ ṭhānaṃ gahetvā ṭhitānītipi paṭisandhicittaṃ
analyzed: apica kamma ja rūpāni citta samuṭṭhāna rūpānam ṭhānam gahetvā ṭhitāni iti pi paṭisandhi cittam

original: rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti

original: Khīṇāsavassa pana cuticittaṃ vaṭṭamūlassa vūpasantattā na samuṭṭhāpeti. Tassa hi
analyzed: khīṇāsavassa pana cuti cittam vaṭṭa mūlassa vūpasanta ttā na samuṭṭhāpeti tassa hi

analyzed: sabba bhavesu vaṭṭa mūlam vūpasantam abhabbuppattikam punabbhave paveṇī nāma natthi

original: Sotāpannassa pana satta bhave ṭhapetvā aṭṭhameva vaṭṭamūlaṃ vūpasantaṃ. Tasmā tassa
analyzed: sotāpannassa pana satta bhave ṭhapetvā aṭṭham eva vaṭṭa mūlam vūpasantam tasmā tassa

original: cuticittaṃ sattasu bhavesu rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sakadāgāmino dvīsu, anāgāmino ekasmiṃ.
analyzed: cuti cittam sattasu bhavesu rūpam samuṭṭhāpeti sakadāgāminaḥ dvīsu anāgāminaḥ ekasmin

original: Khīṇāsavassa sabbabhavesu vaṭṭamūlassa vūpasantattā neva samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: khīṇa āsavassa sabba bhavesu vaṭṭa mūlassa vūpasanta ttā na iva samuṭṭhāpeti

original: Dvipañcaviññāṇesu pana jhānaṅgaṃ natthi, maggaṅgaṃ natthi, hetu natthīti cittaṅgaṃ
analyzed: dvi pañca viññāṇesu pana jhāna aṅgam natthi magga aṅgam natthi hetu natthi iti citta aṅgam

original: dubbalaṃ hotīti cittaṅgadubbalatāya tāni rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti. Cattāri arūpavipākāni
analyzed: dubbalam hoti iti cittaṅga dubbala tāya tāni rūpam na samuṭṭhāpenti cattāri arūpa vipākāni

original: tasmiṃ bhave rūpassa natthitāya rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti. Na kevalañca tāneva, yāni
analyzed: tasmin bhave rūpassa na atthitāya rūpam na samuṭṭhāpenti na kevalam ca tāni eva yāni

original: aññānipi tasmiṃ bhave aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalāni, dasa akusalāni, nava kiriyacittāni,
analyzed: aññāni pi tasmin bhave aṭṭha kāmāvacara kusalāni dasa akusalāni nava kiriya cittāni

original: cattāri āruppakusalāni, catasso āruppakiriyā, tīṇi maggacittāni, cattāri phalacittānīti
analyzed: cattāri āruppa kusalāni catasso āruppa kiriyā tīṇi magga cittāni cattāri phala cittāni iti

original: dvecattālīsa cittāni uppajjanti, tānipi tattha rūpassa natthitāya eva rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti.
analyzed: dvecattālīsa cittāni uppajjanti tāni pi tattha rūpassa natthitāya eva rūpam na samuṭṭhāpenti

original: Evaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: evam paṭisandhi cittam rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti

original: Utu pana paṭhamaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Ko esa utu nāmāti? Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppannānaṃ
analyzed: utu pana paṭhamam rūpam samuṭṭhāpeti kaḥ esa utu nāma ati paṭisandhi khaṇe uppannānam

original: samatiṃsakammajarūpānaṃ abbhantarā tejodhātu. Sā ṭhānaṃ patvā aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: sama tiṃsa kamma ja rūpānam abbhantarā tejodhātu sā ṭhānam patvā aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti

original: Utu nāma cesa dandhanirodho; cittaṃ khippanirodhaṃ. Tasmiṃ dharanteyeva soḷasa cittāni
analyzed: nāma ca isa dandha nirodho cittam khippa nirodham tasmin dharanteya iva soḷasa cittāni

original: uppajjitvā nirujjhanti. Tesu paṭisandhianantaraṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgacittaṃ uppādakkhaṇeyeva
analyzed: uppajjitvā nirujjhanti tesu paṭisandhi anantaram paṭhama bhavaṅga cittam uppāda kkhaṇe yeva

original: aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti. Yadā pana saddassa uppattikālo bhavissati, tadā utucittāni
analyzed: aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti yadā pana saddassa uppatti kālaḥ bhavissati tadā utu cittāni

original: saddanavakaṃ nāma samuṭṭhāpessanti. Kabaḷīkārāhāropi ṭhānaṃ patvā aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: sadda navakam nāma samuṭṭhāpessanti kabaḷīkāra āhāraḥ api ṭhānam patvā aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti

original: Kuto panassa kabaḷīkārāhāroti? Mātito. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
analyzed: kutas panassa kabaḷīkāra āhāro ti mātitaḥ vuttam pi ca itam

original: “Yañcassa bhuñjatī mātā, annaṃ pānañca bhojanaṃ;
analyzed: yat ca assa bhuñjatī mātā annam pānam ca bhojanam

original: Tena so tattha yāpeti, mātukucchigato naro”ti. ;
analyzed: tena saḥ tattha yāpeti mātukucchi gataḥ

original: Evaṃ kucchigato dārako mātarā ajjhohaṭaannapānaojāya yāpeti. Sāva ṭhānappattā aṭṭha
analyzed: evam kucchi gataḥ dārakaḥ mātarā ajjhohaṭa anna pāna ojāya yāpeti sā ava ṭhāna ppattā aṭṭha

original: rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti. Nanu ca sā ojā kharā? Vatthu sukhumaṃ? Kathaṃ tattha patiṭṭhātīti?
analyzed: rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti nanu ca sā ojā kharā vatthu sukhumam katham tattha patiṭṭhāti iti

original: Paṭhamaṃ tāva na patiṭṭhāti; ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā sattāhānaṃ gatakāle patiṭṭhāti.
analyzed: paṭhamam tāva na patiṭṭhāti ekassa vā dvinnam vā satta ahānam gata kāle patiṭṭhāti

original: Tato pana pure vā patiṭṭhātu pacchā vā; yadā mātarā ajjhohaṭaannapānaojā dārakassa
analyzed: tatas pana pure vā patiṭṭhātu pacchā vā yadā mātarā ajjhohaṭa anna pāna ojāḥ dārakassa

original: sarīre patiṭṭhāti, tadā aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: sarīre patiṭṭhāti tadā aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti

original: Opapātikassāpi pakatipaṭiyattānaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyānaṃ atthiṭṭhāne nibbattassa tāni
analyzed: opapātikassa api pakati paṭiyattānam khādanīya bhojanīyānam atthi ṭṭhāne nibbattassa tāni

original: gahetvā ajjhoharato ṭhānappattā ojā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Eko annapānarahite araññe
analyzed: gahetvā ajjhoharataḥ ṭhāna ppattā ojā rūpam samuṭṭhāpeti ekaḥ anna pāna rahite araññe

original: nibbattati, mahāchātako hoti, attanova jivhāya kheḷaṃ parivattetvā gilati. Tatrāpissa
analyzed: nibbattati mahā chātakaḥ hoti attanā iva jivhāya kheḷam parivattetvā gilati tatra apissa

original: ṭhānappattā ojā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: ṭhāna ppattā ojā rūpam samuṭṭhāpeti

original: Evaṃ pañcavīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu dveva rūpāni rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti – tejodhātu ca kabaḷīkārāhāro
analyzed: evam pañcavīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu dve iva rūpāni rūpam samuṭṭhāpenti tejaḥ dhātu ca kabaḷīkāra āhāraḥ

original: ca. Arūpepi dveyeva dhammā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti – cittañceva kammacetanā ca. Tattha
analyzed: ca arūpe pi dveyeva dhammā rūpam samuṭṭhāpenti cittam ca iva kamma cetanā ca tattha

original: rūpaṃ uppādakkhaṇe ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca dubbalaṃ, ṭhānakkhaṇe balavanti ṭhānakkhaṇe
analyzed: rūpam uppāda kkhaṇe ca bhaṅga kkhaṇe ca dubbalam ṭhāna kkhaṇe balavanti ṭhāna kkhaṇe

original: rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Cittaṃ ṭhānakkhaṇe ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca dubbalaṃ, uppādakkhaṇeyeva
analyzed: rūpam samuṭṭhāpeti cittam ṭhāna khaṇe ca bhaṅga khaṇe ca dubbalam uppāda kkhaṇe yeva

original: balavanti uppādakkhaṇeyeva rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Kammacetanā niruddhāva paccayo hoti.
analyzed: balavanti uppāda kkhaṇe yeva rūpam samuṭṭhāpeti kamma cetanā niruddhā va paccayaḥ hoti

original: Atīte kappakoṭisatasahassamatthakepi hi āyūhitaṃ kammaṃ etarahi paccayo hoti. Etarahi
analyzed: atīte kappa koṭi sata sahassa matthake pi hi āyūhitam kammaṃ etarahi paccayaḥ hoti etarahi

original: āyūhitaṃ anāgate kappakoṭisatasahassapariyosānepi paccayo hotīti. Evaṃ ‘pubbāparato’ veditabbā.
analyzed: āyūhitam anāgate kappa koṭi sata sahassa pariyosāne pi paccayaḥ hoti iti evam pubba aparatas veditabbā

original: ‘Addhānaparicchedato’ti rūpaṃ kittakaṃ addhānaṃ tiṭṭhati? Arūpaṃ kittakanti? Rūpaṃ
analyzed: addhāna paricchedataḥ ti rūpam kittakam addhānam tiṭṭhati arūpam kittakam ti rūpam

original: garupariṇāmaṃ dandhanirodhaṃ. Arūpaṃ lahupariṇāmaṃ khippanirodhaṃ. Rūpe dharanteyeva
analyzed: garu pariṇāmam dandha nirodham arūpam lahu pariṇāmam khippa nirodham rūpe

original: soḷasa cittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti. Taṃ pana sattarasamena cittena saddhiṃ nirujjhati.
analyzed: soḷasa cittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti tam pana sattarasamena cittena saddhim nirujjhati

original: Yathā hi puriso ‘phalaṃ pātessāmī’ti muggarena rukkhasākhaṃ pahareyya, phalāni ca
analyzed: yathā hi purisaḥ phalam pātessāmi iti muggarena rukkha sākham pahareyya phalāni ca

original: pattāni ca ekakkhaṇeyeva vaṇṭato mucceyyuṃ. Tattha phalāni attano bhārikatāya paṭhamataraṃ
analyzed: pattāni ca vaṇṭataḥ mucceyyum tattha phalāni attanaḥ bhārika tāya paṭhamataram

original: pathaviyaṃ patanti, pattāni lahukatāya pacchā. Evameva muggarappahārena pattānañca
analyzed: pathaviyam patanti pattāni lahuka tāya pacchā evam eva muggara ppahārena pattānam ca

original: phalānañca ekakkhaṇe vaṇṭato muttakālo viya paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ekakkhaṇe
analyzed: phalānaṃ ca eka kkhaṇe vaṇṭataḥ mutta kālaḥ viya paṭisandhi kkhaṇe rūpa arūpa dhammānam eka kkhaṇe

original: pātubhāvo; phalānaṃ bhārikatāya paṭhamataraṃ pathaviyaṃ patanaṃ viya rūpe dharanteyeva
analyzed: pātubhāvaḥ bhārikatāya paṭhamataram pathaviyam patanam rūpe

original: soḷasannaṃ cittānaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhanaṃ; pattānaṃ lahukatāya pacchā pathaviyaṃ
analyzed: cittānam uppajjitvā nirujjhanam pattānam lahuka tāya pacchā pathaviyam

original: patanaṃ viya rūpassa sattarasamena cittena saha nirujjhanaṃ.
analyzed: patanam viya rūpassa sattarasamena cittena saha nirujjhanam

original: Tattha kiñcāpi rūpaṃ dandhanirodhaṃ garupariṇāmaṃ, cittaṃ khippanirodhaṃ lahupariṇāmaṃ,
analyzed: tattha kiñca api rūpam dandha nirodham garu pariṇāmam cittam khippa nirodham lahu pariṇāmam

original: rūpaṃ pana arūpaṃ arūpaṃ vā rūpaṃ ohāya pavattituṃ na sakkonti. Dvinnampi ekappamāṇāva
analyzed: rūpam pana arūpam arūpam vā rūpam ohāya pavattitum na sakkonti dvinnam pi eka ppamāṇā ava

original: pavatti. Tatrāyaṃ upamā – eko puriso lakuṇṭakapādo, eko dīghapādo. Tesu ekato maggaṃ
analyzed: upamā ekaḥ puriso lakuṇṭaka pādo ekaḥ dīgha pādo tesu ekatas maggam

original: gacchantesu yāva dīghapādo ekapadavāraṃ akkamati, tāva itaro pade padaṃ akkamitvā
analyzed: gacchantesu yāva dīgha pādaḥ eka pada vāram akkamati tāva itaraḥ pade padam akkamitvā

original: soḷasapadavārena gacchati. Dīghapādo lakuṇṭakapādassa soḷasa padavāre attano pādaṃ
analyzed: soḷasa pada vārena gacchati dīgha pādaḥ lakuṇṭaka pādassa soḷasa pada vāre attano pādam

original: añchitvā ākaḍḍhitvā ekameva padavāraṃ karoti. Iti ekopi ekaṃ atikkamituṃ na sakkoti.
analyzed: añchitvā ākaḍḍhitvā ekam eva padavāram karoti iti ekaḥ api ekam atikkamitum na sakkoti

original: Dvinnampi gamanaṃ ekappamāṇameva hoti. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Lakuṇṭakapādapuriso
analyzed: dvinnam pi gamanam eka ppamāṇam eva hoti evaṃsampadam idam daṭṭhabbam lakuṇṭaka pāda puriso

original: viya arūpaṃ; dīghapādapuriso viya rūpaṃ; dīghapādassa ekaṃ padavāraṃ akkamaṇakāle
analyzed: viya arūpam dīgha pāda purisaḥ viya rūpam dīgha pādassa ekam pada vāram akkamaṇa kāle

original: itarassa soḷasapadavāraakkamanaṃ viya rūpe dharanteyeva arūpadhammesu soḷasannaṃ
analyzed: itarassa viya rūpe arūpa dhammesu

original: cittānaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhanaṃ; dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ lakuṇṭakapādapurisassa soḷasa
analyzed: cittānam uppajjitvā nirujjhanam dvinnam purisānam lakuṇṭakapāda purisassa soḷasa

original: padavāre itarassa attano pādaṃ añchitvā ākaḍḍhitvā ekapadavārakaraṇaṃ viya rūpassa
analyzed: padavāre itarassa attano pādam añchitvā ākaḍḍhitvā eka padavāra karaṇam viya rūpassa

original: sattarasamena cittena saddhiṃ nirujjhanaṃ; dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anohāya ekappamāṇeneva
analyzed: sattarasamena cittena saddhim nirujjhanam dvinnam purisānam aññamaññam anohāya eka ppamāṇena iva

original: gamanaṃ viya arūpassa rūpaṃ rūpassa arūpaṃ anohāya ekappamāṇeneva pavattananti. Evaṃ
analyzed: gamanam viya arūpassa rūpam rūpassa arūpam anohāya eka pamāṇena iva evam

original: ‘addhānaparicchedato’ veditabbā.
analyzed: addhāna paricchedataḥ veditabbā

original: ‘Ekuppādanānānirodhato’ti idaṃ pacchimakammajaṃ ṭhapetvā dīpetabbaṃ. Paṭhamañhi paṭisandhicittaṃ,
analyzed: eka uppāda nānā nirodhato ti idam pacchima kamma jam ṭhapetvā dīpetabbam paṭhamam hi paṭisandhi cittam

original: dutiyaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ, tatiyaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ…pe… soḷasamaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ. Tesu ekekassa uppādaṭṭhitibhaṅgavasena
analyzed: dutiyam bhavaṅgam tatiyam bhavaṅgam pe soḷasamam bhavaṅgam tesu ekekassa uppāda ṭṭhiti bhaṅga vasena

original: tayo tayo khaṇā. Tattha ekekassa cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu samatiṃsa samatiṃsa kammajarūpāni
analyzed: tayaḥ tayaḥ khaṇā tattha ekekassa cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu samatiṃsa samatiṃsa kamma ja rūpāni

original: uppajjanti. Tesu paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ kammajarūpaṃ sattarasamassa
analyzed: uppajjanti tesu paṭisandhi cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe samuṭṭhitam kamma ja rūpam sattarasamassa

original: bhavaṅgacittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati; ṭhitikkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇeyeva;
analyzed: bhavaṅga cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe yeva nirujjhati ṭhiti kkhaṇe samuṭṭhitam ṭhiti kkhaṇe yeva

original: bhaṅgakkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati. Evaṃ dutiyabhavaṅgacittaṃ ādiṃ
analyzed: bhaṅga kkhaṇe samuṭṭhitam bhaṅga kkhaṇe iya iva nirujjhati evam dutiya bhavaṅga cittam ādim

original: katvā attano attano sattarasamena cittena saddhiṃ yojetvā nayo netabbo. Iti soḷasa
analyzed: katvā attanaḥ attanaḥ sattarasamena cittena saddhim yojetvā nayaḥ netabbaḥ iti soḷasa

original: tikā aṭṭhacattālīsa honti. Ayaṃ aṭṭhacattālīsakammajarūpapaveṇī nāma. Sā panesā rattiñca
analyzed: tikāḥ aṭṭhacattālīsa honti ayam aṭṭhacattālīsakammajarūpapaveṇī nāma sā panesā rattiñca

original: divā ca khādantānampi bhuñjantānampi suttānampi pamattānampi nadīsoto viya ekantaṃ
analyzed: divā ca khādantānam pi bhuñjantānam pi suttānam pi pamattānam pi nadī sotaḥ viya ekantam

original: pavattati yevāti. Evaṃ ‘ekuppādanānānirodhato’ veditabbā.
analyzed: pavattati yā iva ati evam eka uppāda nānā nirodhataḥ veditabbā

original: ‘Nānuppādaekanirodhatā’ pacchimakammajena dīpetabbā. Tattha āyusaṃkhārapariyosāne
analyzed: na anuppāda eka nirodha tā pacchima kamma jena dīpetabbā tattha āyu saṃkhāra pariyosāne

original: soḷasannaṃ cittānaṃ vāre sati heṭṭhāsoḷasakaṃ uparisoḷasakanti dve ekato yojetabbāni.
analyzed: cittānam vāre sati heṭṭhā soḷasakam upari soḷasakanti dve ekatas yojetabbāni

original: Heṭṭhāsoḷasakasmiñhi paṭhamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ samatiṃsakammajarūpaṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhā soḷasakasmin hi paṭhamacittassa uppāda kkhaṇe samuṭṭhitam sama tiṃsa kamma ja rūpam

original: uparisoḷasakasmiṃ paṭhamacittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati; ṭhitikkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ
analyzed: upari soḷasakasmim paṭhama cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe yeva nirujjhati ṭhiti kkhaṇe samuṭṭhitam

original: tassa ṭhitikkhaṇeyeva bhaṅgakkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ tassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati.
analyzed: tassa ṭhiti kkhaṇe yeva bhaṅga kkhaṇe samuṭṭhitam tassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe yeva nirujjhati

original: Heṭṭhimasoḷasakasmiṃ pana dutiyacittassa…pe… soḷasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ
analyzed: pana soḷasama cittassa pe soḷasama cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe samuṭṭhitam

original: samatiṃsakammajarūpaṃ cuticittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati; tassa ṭhitikkhaṇe
analyzed: sama tiṃsa kamma ja rūpam cuti cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe yeva nirujjhati tassa ṭhiti kkhaṇe

original: samuṭṭhitaṃ cuticittassa ṭhitikkhaṇeyeva; bhaṅgakkhaṇe samuṭṭhitaṃ cuticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeyeva
analyzed: samuṭṭhitam cuti cittassa ṭhiti kkhaṇe yeva bhaṅga kkhaṇe samuṭṭhitam cuti cittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe yeva

original: nirujjhati. Tato paṭṭhāya kammajarūpapaveṇī na pavattati. Yadi pavatteyya, sattā
analyzed: nirujjhati tatas paṭṭhāya kamma ja rūpa paveṇī na pavattati yadi pavatteyya sattā

original: akkhayā avayā ajarā amarā nāma bhaveyyuṃ.
analyzed: akkhayāḥ avayāḥ ajarāḥ amarāḥ nāma bhaveyyuṃ

original: Ettha pana yadetaṃ ‘sattarasamassa bhavaṅgacittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhatī’tiādinā
analyzed: ettha pana yat etam sattarasamassa bhavaṅga cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe iva nirujjhati iti ādinā

original: nayena ‘ekassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ rūpaṃ aññassa uppādakkhaṇe nirujjhatī’ti
analyzed: nayena ekassa cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe uppannam rūpam aññassa uppāda kkhaṇe nirujjhati iti

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā vuttaṃ, taṃ “yassa kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhati, tassa cittasaṅkhāro
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāyam āgata ttā vuttam tam yassa kāya saṅkhāro nirujjhati tassa citta saṅkhāro

original: nirujjhatī”ti? “Āmantā”ti imāya pāḷiyā virujjhati. Kathaṃ? Kāyasaṅkhāro hi cittasamuṭṭhāno
analyzed: nirujjhati iti āmantā ati imāya pāḷiyā virujjhati katham kāya saṅkhāraḥ hi citta samuṭṭhānaḥ

original: assāsapassāsavāto. Cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañca cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppajjitvā yāva aññāni
analyzed: assāsa passāsa vātaḥ citta samuṭṭhāna rūpañca cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe uppajjitvā yāva aññāni

original: soḷasa cittāni uppajjanti tāva tiṭṭhati. Tesaṃ soḷasannaṃ sabbapacchimena saddhiṃ
analyzed: soḷasa cittāni uppajjanti tāva tiṭṭhati tesam soḷasannam sabbapacchimena saddhiṃ

original: nirujjhati. Iti yena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjati, tato paṭṭhāya sattarasamena saddhiṃ
analyzed: nirujjhati iti yena cittena saddhim uppajjati tatas paṭṭhāya sattarasamena saddhim

original: nirujjhati; na kassaci cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vā ṭhitikkhaṇe vā nirujjhati, nāpi ṭhitikkhaṇe
analyzed: nirujjhati na kassaci cittassa uppāda khaṇe vā ṭhiti khaṇe vā nirujjhati na api ṭhiti khaṇe

original: vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā uppajjati. Esā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa dhammatāti niyamato cittasaṅkhārena
analyzed: vā bhaṅga kkhaṇe vā uppajjati esā citta samuṭṭhāna rūpassa dhamma tā ati niyamataḥ citta saṅkhārena

original: saddhiṃ ekakkhaṇe nirujjhanato “āmantā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: saddhim eka khaṇe nirujjhanataḥ āmantā iti vuttam

original: Yo cāyaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānassa khaṇaniyamo vutto kammādisamuṭṭhānassāpi ayameva khaṇaniyamo.
analyzed: yaḥ ca ayam citta samuṭṭhānassa khaṇa niyamaḥ vuttaḥ kamma ādi samuṭṭhānassa api ayam eva khaṇa niyamaḥ

original: Tasmā paṭisandhicittena sahuppannaṃ kammajarūpaṃ tato paṭṭhāya sattarasamena saddhiṃ
analyzed: tasmā paṭisandhi cittena sahuppannam kamma ja rūpam tatas paṭṭhāya sattarasamena saddhiṃ

original: nirujjhati. Paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe uppannaṃ aṭṭhārasamassa uppādakkhaṇe nirujjhati.
analyzed: nirujjhati paṭisandhi cittassa ṭhiti kkhaṇe uppannam aṭṭhārasamassa uppāda kkhaṇe nirujjhati

original: Paṭisandhicittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ aṭṭhārasamassa ṭhānakkhaṇe nirujjhatīti
analyzed: paṭisandhi cittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe uppannam aṭṭhārasamassa ṭhāna kkhaṇe nirujjhati iti

original: iminā nayenettha yojanā kātabbā. Tato paraṃ pana utusamuṭṭhānikapaveṇīyeva tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: iminā nayena ittha yojanā kātabbā tatas param pana utu samuṭṭhānika paveṇīyā iva tiṭṭhati

original: ‘Nīharitvā jhāpethā’ti vattabbaṃ hoti. Evaṃ ‘nānuppādaekanirodhato’ veditabbā.
analyzed: nīharitvā jhāpetha iti vattabbam hoti evam na anuppāda eka nirodhataḥ veditabbā

original: ‘Ekuppādaekanirodhato’ti rūpaṃ pana rūpena saha ekuppādaṃ ekanirodhaṃ. Arūpaṃ arūpena saha ekuppādaṃ ekanirodhaṃ. Evaṃ ‘ekuppādaekanirodhato’ veditabbā.
analyzed: eka uppāda eka nirodhato ti rūpam pana rūpena saha ekuppādam eka nirodham arūpam arūpena saha ekuppādam eka nirodham evam eka uppāda eka nirodhataḥ veditabbā

original: ‘Nānuppādanānānirodhatā’ pana catusantatirūpena dīpetabbā. Imassa hi uddhaṃ pādatalā
analyzed: na anuppāda nānā nirodha tā pana catu santati rūpena dīpetabbā imassa hi uddham pāda talā

original: adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantassa sarīrassa tattha tattha catusantatirūpaṃ ghanapuñjabhāvena
analyzed: adho kesa matthakā taca pariyantassa sarīrassa tattha tattha catu santati rūpam ghana puñja bhāvena

original: vattati. Evaṃ vattamānassāpissa na ekuppādāditā sallakkhetabbā. Yathā pana upacikarāji
analyzed: vattati evam vattamānassa api issa na eka uppāda ādi tā sallakkhetabbā yathā pana

original: vā kipillikarāji vā olokiyamānā ekābaddhā viya hoti, na pana ekābaddhā. Aññissā hi
analyzed: vā kipillika rāji vā olokiyamānā ekābaddhā viya hoti na pana ekābaddhā aññissā hi

original: sīsasantike aññissā sīsampi udarampi pādāpi, aññissā udarasantike aññissā sīsampi
analyzed: sīsa santike aññissā sīsam pi udaram pi pādā api aññissā udara santike aññissā sīsam pi

original: udarampi pādāpi, aññissā pādasantike aññissā sīsampi udarampi pādāpi honti. Evameva
analyzed: udaram pi pādā api aññissā pāda santike aññissā sīsam pi udaram pi pādā api honti evam eva

original: catusantatirūpānampi aññassa uppādakkhaṇe aññassa uppādopi hoti ṭhitipi bhaṅgopi,
analyzed: catu santati rūpānam pi aññassa uppāda kkhaṇe aññassa uppādo api hoti ṭhiti pi bhaṅgo api

original: aññassa ṭhitikkhaṇe aññassa uppādopi hoti ṭhitipi bhaṅgopi, aññassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
analyzed: aññassa ṭhiti kkhaṇe aññassa uppādaḥ api hoti ṭhiti pi bhaṅgaḥ api aññassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe

analyzed: evam pi pheṇa piṇḍa sadisam yathā ca pheṇa piṇḍaḥ uṭṭhita mattaḥ api bhijjati thokam gantvā api

original: samuddaṃ patvā pana avassameva bhijjati; evameva rūpampi kalalabhāvepi bhijjati,
analyzed: samuddam patvā pana avassam eva bhijjati evam eva rūpam pi kalala bhāve pi bhijjati

original: abbudādibhāve, antarā pana abhejjamānampi vassasatāyukānaṃ vassasataṃ patvā avassameva
analyzed: abbuda ādi bhāve antarā pana a bhejjamānam pi vassa sata āyukānam vassa satam patvā a vassam eva

original: bhijjati, maraṇamukhe cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hoti. Evampi pheṇapiṇḍasadisaṃ.
analyzed: bhijjati maraṇa mukhe cuṇṇa vicuṇṇam hoti evam pi pheṇa piṇḍa sadisam

original: Yathā pana pubbuḷo asāro, evaṃ vedanāpi. Yathā ca so abalo, agayhupago, na sakkā
analyzed: yathā pana pubbuḷaḥ asāraḥ evam vedanā api yathā ca so abalaḥ a gayhupagaḥ na sakkā

original: taṃ gahetvā phalakaṃ vā āsanaṃ vā kātuṃ, gahitaggahitopi bhijjateva; evaṃ vedanāpi

original: abalā, agayhupagā, na sakkā ‘niccā’ti vā ‘dhuvā’ti vā gahetuṃ, gahitāpi na tathā
analyzed: abalāḥ a gayhupagāḥ na sakkāḥ vā dhuvāti vā gahetum gahitā api na tathā

original: tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ agayhupagatāyapi vedanā ‘pubbuḷasadisā’. Yathā pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
analyzed: tiṭṭhati evam vedanā pubbuḷa sadisā yathā pana tasmin tasmin

original: udakabindumhi pubbuḷo uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca, na ciraṭṭhitiko hoti; evaṃ vedanāpi
analyzed: udaka bindumhi pubbuḷaḥ uppajjati ca iva nirujjhati ca na cira ṭṭhitikaḥ hoti evam vedanā api

original: uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca, na ciraṭṭhitikā hoti, ekaccharakkhaṇe koṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā
analyzed: uppajjati ca iva nirujjhati ca na cira ṭṭhitikā hoti ekaccha rakkhaṇe koṭi sata sahassa saṅkhyā

original: uppajjitvā nirujjhati. Yathā ca pubbuḷo udakatalaṃ, udakabinduṃ, udakajallakaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā
analyzed: uppajjitvā nirujjhati yathā ca pubbuḷaḥ udaka talam udaka bindum udaka jallakam saṅkaḍḍhitvā

original: puṭaṃ katvā gahaṇavātañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati; evaṃ vedanāpi vatthuṃ,
analyzed: puṭam katvā gahaṇa vātam ca ati cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati evam vedanā api vatthum

original: ārammaṇaṃ, kilesajālaṃ, phassasaṅghaṭṭanañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati.
analyzed: ārammaṇam kilesa jālam phassa saṅghaṭṭanam ca ati cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati

original: Evampi vedanā pubbuḷasadisā.
analyzed: evam pi vedanā pubbuḷa sadisā

original: Saññāpi asārakaṭṭhena ‘marīcisadisā’. Tathā agayhupagaṭṭhena; na hi sakkā taṃ gahetvā
analyzed: saññā api asārakaṭṭhena marīci sadisā tathā agayhupagaṭṭhena na hi sakkā tam gahetvā

original: pivituṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā bhājanaṃ vā pūretuṃ. Apica yathā marīci vipphandati, sañjātūmivego
analyzed: pivitum vā nhāyitum vā bhājanam vā pūretum apica yathā marīci vipphandati san jātu umi vegaḥ

original: viya khāyati; evaṃ nīlasaññādibhedā saññāpi nīlādianubhavanatthāya phandati vipphandati.
analyzed: viya khāyati evam nīla saññā ādi bhedā saññā api nīla ādi anubhavana tthāya phandati vipphandati

original: Yathā ca marīci mahājanaṃ vippalambheti, ‘paripuṇṇavāpī viya paripuṇṇanadī viya dissatī’ti

original: vadāpeti; evaṃ saññāpi vippalambheti, ‘idaṃ nīlakaṃ subhaṃ sukhaṃ nicca’nti vadāpeti.
analyzed: vadāpa iti evam saññā api vippalambheti idam nīlakam subham sukham niccanti vadāpa iti

original: Pītakādīsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ vippalambhanenāpi marīcisadisā.
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ evam vippalambhanena api marīci sadisā

original: Saṅkhārāpi asārakaṭṭhena ‘kadalikkhandhasadisā’. Tathā agayhupagaṭṭhena. Yatheva
analyzed: saṅkhārā api asārakaṭṭhena kadali kkhandha sadisā tathā agayhupagaṭṭhena yathā iva

original: hi kadalikkhandhato kiñci gahetvā na sakkā gopānasīādīnamatthāya upanetuṃ, upanītampi
analyzed: hi kadali kkhandhato kiñci gahetvā na sakkā gopānasī ādīnam atthāya upanetum upanītam pi

original: na tathā hoti; evaṃ saṅkhārāpi na sakkā niccādivasena gahetuṃ, gahitāpi na tathā
analyzed: na tathā hoti evam saṅkhārā api na sakkā nicca ādi vasena gahetum gahitā api na tathā

original: honti. Yathā ca kadalikkhandho bahuvaṭṭisamodhāno hoti, evaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhopi bahudhammasamodhāno.
analyzed: honti yathā ca kadali kkhandhaḥ bahu vaṭṭi samodhānaḥ hoti evam saṅkhāra kkhandhaḥ api bahu dhamma samodhānaḥ

original: Yathā ca kadalikkhandho nānālakkhaṇo, aññoyeva hi bāhirāya pattavaṭṭiyā vaṇṇo, añño

original: tato abbhantarabbhantarānaṃ; evameva saṅkhārakkhandhopi aññadeva phassassa lakkhaṇaṃ,

original: kadalikkhandhasadiso.
analyzed: kadali khandha sadisaḥ

original: Viññāṇampi asārakaṭṭhena ‘māyāsadisaṃ’. Tathā agayhupagaṭṭhena. Yathā ca māyā ittarā

analyzed: lahu paccupaṭṭhānā evam viññāṇam tat hi tatas pi ittarataram ca iva lahu paccupaṭṭhānataram ca

original: Teneva hi cittena puriso āgato viya, gato viya, ṭhito viya, nisinno viya hoti. Aññadeva
analyzed: tena iva hi cittena purisaḥ āgataḥ viya gataḥ viya ṭhitaḥ viya nisinnaḥ viya hoti aññadeva

original: vañceti, teneva cittena āgacchantaṃ viya, gacchantaṃ viya, ṭhitaṃ viya, nisinnaṃ
analyzed: vañca iti tena iva cittena āgacchantam viya gacchantam viya ṭhitam viya nisinnam

analyzed: māyā sadisam visesato ca subha ārammaṇam pi oḷārikam pi ajjhattika rūpam asubhanti daṭṭhabbam

original: Vedanā tīhi dukkhatāhi avinimuttato dukkhāti saññāsaṅkhārā avidheyyato anattāti viññāṇaṃ

analyzed: udaya bbaya dhammataḥ aniccanti daṭṭhabbam

analyzed: bhava yogena visaṃyujjati bhava āsavena anāsavaḥ byāpāda kāya gantham bhindati

analyzed: parijānāti an attani attā ati vipallāsam pajahati diṭṭha ogham uttarati diṭṭhi yogena
