original: Evaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ, vadhakādivasena dassanaṃ yasmā;
analyzed: evam mahā nisaṃsam vadhaka ādi vasena dassanam yasmā

original: Tasmā khandhe dhīro, vadhakādivasena passeyyāti.
analyzed: khandhe dhīraḥ vadhaka ādi vasena passeyya ati

original: Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā.
2. Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
32. Idāni abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ hoti. Tattha rūpakkhandhaniddeso heṭṭhā rūpakaṇḍe vitthāritanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: idāni abhidhamma bhājanīyam hoti tattha rūpa khandha niddesaḥ heṭṭhā rūpa kaṇḍe vitthārita nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: 34. Vedanākkhandhaniddese ekavidhenāti ekakoṭṭhāsena. Phassasampayuttoti phassena
analyzed: vedanā khandha niddese ekavidhena ati eka koṭṭhāsena phassa sampayutto ti phassena

original: sampayutto. Sabbāpi catubhūmikavedanā. Sahetukaduke sahetukā catubhūmikavedanā, ahetukā
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ sabbā api catu bhūmika vedanā sa hetuka duke sa hetukā catu bhūmika vedanā ahetukā

original: kāmāvacarāva. Iminā upāyena kusalapadādīhi vuttā vedanā jānitabbā. Apicāyaṃ vedanākkhandho
analyzed: iminā upāyena kusala pada ādīhi vuttā vedanā jānitabbā api ca ayam vedanā khandho

original: ekavidhena phassasampayuttato dassito, duvidhena sahetukāhetukato, tividhena jātito,
analyzed: ekavidhena phassa sampayuttataḥ dassitaḥ duvidhena sa hetuka ahetukato tividhena jātitaḥ

original: catubbidhena bhūmantarato, pañcavidhena indriyato. Tattha sukhindriyadukkhindriyāni
analyzed: catubbidhena bhūmantarato pañcavidhena indriyato tattha sukha indriya dukkha indriyāni

original: kāyappasādavatthukāni kāmāvacarāneva. Somanassindriyaṃ chaṭṭhavatthukaṃ vā avatthukaṃ
analyzed: kāya pasāda vatthukāni kāmāvacarān eva somanassindriyam chaṭṭha vatthukam vā a vatthukam

original: vā tebhūmakaṃ. Domanassindriyaṃ chaṭṭhavatthukaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ. Upekkhindriyaṃ cakkhādicatuppasādavatthukaṃ
analyzed: vā tebhūmakam domanassindriyam chaṭṭha vatthukam kāmāvacaram upekkhindriyam cakkhu ādi catu pasāda vatthukam

original: chaṭṭhavatthukaṃ avatthukañca catubhūmakaṃ. Chabbidhena vatthuto dassito. Tattha
analyzed: chaṭṭhavatthukam avatthukam ca catu bhūmakam chabbidhena vatthutaḥ dassito tattha

original: purimā pañca vedanā pañcappasādavatthukā kāmāvacarāva chaṭṭhā avatthukā vā savatthukā vā catubhūmikā.
analyzed: purimā pañca vedanā pañca ppasāda vatthukā chaṭṭhā avatthukā vā sa vatthukā vā catu bhūmikā

original: Sattavidhena tattha manosamphassajā bhedato dassitā, aṭṭhavidhena tattha kāyasamphassajā
analyzed: sattavidhena tattha manaḥ samphassa jā bhedataḥ dassitā aṭṭhavidhena tattha kāya samphassa jā

original: bhedato, navavidhena sattavidhabhede manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā bhedato, dasavidhena
analyzed: bhedataḥ navavidhena sattavidha bhede manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu samphassa jāḥ bhedataḥ dasavidhena

original: aṭṭhavidhabhede manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā bhedato. Etesu hi sattavidhabhede manosamphassajā
analyzed: aṭṭhavidha bhede manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu samphassa jāḥ bhedataḥ etesu hi sattavidha bhede manaḥ samphassa jāḥ

original: manodhātusamphassajā, manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajāti dvidhā bhinnā. Aṭṭhavidhabhede
analyzed: manaḥ dhātu samphassa jā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu samphassa jā ti dvidhā bhinnā aṭṭhavidha bhede

original: tāya saddhiṃ kāyasamphassajāpi sukhā dukkhāti dvidhā bhinnā. Navavidhabhede sattavidhe
analyzed: tāya saddhim kāya samphassa jā api sukhā dukkhā ati dvidhā bhinnā navavidha bhede sattavidhe

original: vuttā manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā kusalādivasena tidhā bhinnā. Dasavidhabhede aṭṭhavidhe
analyzed: vuttā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu samphassa jā kusala ādi vasena tidhā bhinnā dasavidha bhede aṭṭhavidhe

original: vuttā manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā kusalādivaseneva tidhā bhinnā.
analyzed: vuttā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu samphassa jā kusala ādi vasena iva tidhā bhinnā

original: Kusalattiko cettha kevalaṃ pūraṇatthameva vutto. Sattavidhaaṭṭhavidhanavavidhabhedesu
analyzed: kusalattikaḥ ca ittha kevalam pūraṇa attham eva vutto sattavidha aṭṭhavidha navavidha bhedesu

original: pana nayaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne nayo dinno. Abhidhammañhi patvā tathāgatena nayaṃ dātuṃ
analyzed: pana nayam dātum yutta ṭṭhāne nayaḥ dinnaḥ abhidhammañ hi patvā tathāgatena nayam dātum

original: yuttaṭṭhāne nayo adinno nāma natthi. Ayaṃ tāva dukamūlake eko vāro.
analyzed: yutta ṭṭhāne nayaḥ adinno nāma natthi ayam tāva duka mūlake ekaḥ vāro

original: Satthā hi imasmiṃ abhidhammabhājanīye vedanākkhandhaṃ bhājento tike gahetvā dukesu
analyzed: satthā hi imasmin abhidhamma bhājanīye vedanā khandham bhājentaḥ tike gahetvā dukesu

original: pakkhipi, duke gahetvā tikesu pakkhipi, tike ca duke ca ubhatovaḍḍhananīhārena āhari;
analyzed: pakkhipi duke gahetvā tikesu pakkhipi tike ca duke ca ubhatovaḍḍhana nīhārena āhari

original: sattavidhena, catuvīsatividhena, tiṃsavidhena, bahuvidhenāti sabbathāpi bahuvidhena
analyzed: sattavidhena catuvīsatividhena tiṃsavidhena bahuvidhena ati sabbathā api bahuvidhena

original: vedanākkhandhaṃ dassesi. Kasmā? Puggalajjhāsayena ceva desanāvilāsena ca. Dhammaṃ
analyzed: vedanā khandham dassesi kasmā puggala jhāsayena ca iva desanā vilāsena ca dhammaṃ

original: sotuṃ nisinnadevaparisāya hi ye devaputtā tike ādāya dukesu pakkhipitvā kathiyamānaṃ
analyzed: sotum nisinna deva parisāya hi ye deva puttā tike ādāya dukesu pakkhipitvā kathiyamānam

original: paṭivijjhituṃ sakkonti, tesaṃ sappāyavasena tathā katvā desesi. Ye itarehi ākārehi
analyzed: paṭivijjhitum sakkonti tesam sappāya vasena tathā katvā desesi ye itarehi ākārehi

original: kathiyamānaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ sakkonti, tesaṃ tehākārehi desesīti. Ayamettha ‘puggalajjhāsayo’.
analyzed: kathiyamānam paṭivijjhitum sakkonti tesam tehi ākārehi desesi iti ayam ettha puggala jjhāsayaḥ

original: Sammāsambuddho pana attano mahāvisayatāya tike vā dukesu pakkhipitvā, duke vā tikesu
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ pana attanaḥ mahā visaya tāya tike vā dukesu pakkhipitvā duke vā tikesu

original: ubhatovaḍḍhanena vā, sattavidhādinayena vā, yathā yathā icchati tathā tathā desetuṃ
analyzed: ubhatas vaḍḍhanena vā sattavidha ādinayena vā yathā yathā icchati tathā tathā desetum

original: sakkoti. Tasmāpi imehākārehi desesīti ayamassa ‘desanāvilāso’.
analyzed: sakkoti tasmā api imehi ākārehi desesi iti ayam assa desanā vilāso

original: Tattha tike ādāya dukesu pakkhipitvā desitavāro dukamūlako nāma. Duke ādāya tikesu
analyzed: tattha tike ādāya dukesu pakkhipitvā desitavāraḥ dukamūlakaḥ nāma duke ādāya tikesu

original: pakkhipitvā desitavāro tikamūlako nāma. Tike ca duke ca ubhato vaḍḍhetvā desitavāro
analyzed: pakkhipitvā desita vāro tikamūlakaḥ nāma tike ca duke ca ubhatas vaḍḍhetvā desita vāro

original: ubhatovaḍḍhitako nāma. Avasāne sattavidhenātiādivāro bahuvidhavāro nāmāti ime tāva cattāro mahāvārā.
analyzed: ubhatovaḍḍhitakaḥ nāma avasāne sattavidhena ati ādi vāraḥ bahuvidhavāraḥ nāma ati ime tāva cattāraḥ mahā vārā

original: Tattha dukamūlake dukesu labbhamānena ekekena dukena saddhiṃ tikesu alabbhamāne vedanāttikapītittikasanidassanattike
analyzed: tattha duka mūlake dukesu labbhamānena ekekena dukena saddhim tikesu a labbhamāne

original: apanetvā, sese labbhamānake ekūnavīsati tike yojetvā, dutiyadukapaṭhamattikayojanavārādīni
analyzed: apanetvā sese labbhamānake ekūnavīsati tike yojetvā dutiya duka paṭhama ttika yojana vāra ādīni

original: navavārasatāni paññāsañca vārā honti. Te sabbepi pāḷiyaṃ saṃkhipitvā tattha tattha
analyzed: nava vāra satāni paññāsañca vārāḥ honti te sabbe pi pāḷiyam saṃkhipitvā tattha tattha

original: dassetabbayuttakaṃ dassetvā vuttā. Asammuyhantena pana vitthārato veditabbā.
analyzed: dassetabba yuttakam dassetvā vuttā asammuyhantena pana vitthārataḥ veditabbā

original: Tikamūlakepi tikesu labbhamānena ekekena tikena saddhiṃ dukesu alabbhamāne paṭhamadukādayo
analyzed: tika mūlake pi tikesu labbhamānena ekekena tikena saddhim dukesu a labbhamāne paṭhama duka ādayaḥ

original: duke apanetvā, sese labbhamānake sahetukadukādayo paññāsa duke yojetvā, paṭhamattikadutiyadukayojanavārādīni
analyzed: duke apanetvā sese labbhamānake sa hetuka duka ādayo paññāsa duke yojetvā paṭhama ttika dutiya duka yojana vāra ādīni

original: navavārasatāni paññāsañca vārā honti. Tepi sabbe pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhipitvā tattha tattha
analyzed: nava vāra satāni paññāsañca vārāḥ honti te pi sabbe pāḷiyam saṅkhipitvā tattha tattha

original: dassetabbayuttakaṃ dassetvā vuttā. Asammuyhantena pana vitthārato veditabbā.
analyzed: dassetabba yuttakam dassetvā vuttā asammuyhantena pana vitthārataḥ veditabbā

original: Ubhatovaḍḍhitake duvidhabhede dutiyadukaṃ tividhabhede ca paṭhamatikaṃ ādiṃ katvā
analyzed: ubhatovaḍḍhitake duvidha bhede dutiya dukam tividha bhede ca paṭhama tikam ādim katvā

original: labbhamānehi ekūnavīsatiyā dukehi labbhamāne ekūnavīsatitike yojetvā dutiyadukapaṭhamatikayojanavārādayo
analyzed: labbhamānehi ekūnavīsatiyā dukehi labbhamāne ekūnavīsati tike yojetvā dutiya duka paṭhama tika yojana vāra ādayo

original: ekūnavīsativārā vuttā. Esa dukatikānaṃ vasena ubhatovaḍḍhitattā ubhatovaḍḍhitako
analyzed: ekūnavīsati vārāḥ vuttāḥ esa dukatikānam vasena ubhatovaḍḍhita ttā ubhatovaḍḍhitako

original: nāma tatiyo mahāvāro.
analyzed: nāma tatiyaḥ mahāvāraḥ

original: Bahuvidhavārassa sattavidhaniddese ādito paṭṭhāya labbhamānesu ekūnavīsatiyā tikesu
analyzed: bahuvidha vārassa sattavidha niddese āditaḥ paṭṭhāya labbhamānesu ekūnavīsatiyā tikesu

original: ekekena saddhiṃ catasso bhūmiyo yojetvā ekūnavīsati sattavidhavārā vuttā. Catuvīsatividhaniddesepi
analyzed: ekekena saddhim catasso bhūmiyaḥ yojetvā ekūnavīsati sattavidha vārā vuttā catuvīsatividha niddese pi

original: tesaṃyeva tikānaṃ vasena ekūnavīsativārā vuttā. Tathā bahuvidhavāre cāti. Tiṃsavidhavāro
analyzed: tesam yeva tikānam vasena ekūnavīsati vārā vuttā tathā bahuvidha vāre ca ati tiṃsavidha vāro

original: ekoyevāti sabbepi aṭṭhapaññāsa vārā honti. Ayaṃ tāvettha vāraparicchedavasena pāḷivaṇṇanā.
analyzed: ekoya iva āti sabbe pi aṭṭha paññāsa vārāḥ honti ayam tāva ettha vāra pariccheda vasena pāḷi vaṇṇanā

original: Idāni atthavaṇṇanā hoti. Tattha sattavidhaniddeso tāva uttānatthoyeva. Catuvīsatividhaniddese
analyzed: idāni attha vaṇṇanā hoti tattha sattavidha niddeso tāva catuvīsatividha niddese

original: cakkhusamphassapaccayā vedanākkhandho atthi kusaloti kāmāvacaraaṭṭhakusalacittavasena
analyzed: cakkhu samphassa paccayā vedanā kkhandho atthi kusalaḥ ti kāmāvacara aṭṭha kusala citta vasena

original: veditabbo. Atthi akusaloti dvādasaakusalacittavasena veditabbo. Atthi abyākatoti
analyzed: veditabbaḥ atthi akusalo ti dvādasa akusala citta vasena veditabbaḥ atthi abyākato ti

original: tisso manodhātuyo, tisso ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo, aṭṭha mahāvipākāni, dasa kāmāvacarakiriyāti
analyzed: tissaḥ manaḥ dhātuyo tissaḥ ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyo aṭṭha mahā vipākāni dasa kāmāvacara kiriyā ati

original: catuvīsatiyā cittānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
analyzed: catuvīsatiyā cittānam vasena veditabbo

original: Tattha aṭṭha kusalāni dvādasa akusalāni ca javanavasena labbhanti. Kiriyamanodhātu
analyzed: tattha aṭṭha kusalāni dvādasa akusalāni ca javana vasena labbhanti kiriya manaḥ dhātu

original: āvajjanavasena labbhati. Dve vipākamanodhātuyo sampaṭicchanavasena, tisso vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyo
analyzed: āvajjana vasena labbhati dve vipāka manaḥ dhātuyo sampaṭicchana vasena tisso vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyo

original: santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena, kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanavasena, aṭṭha
mahāvipākacittāni tadārammaṇavasena, nava kiriyacittāni javanavasena labbhanti. Sotaghānajivhākāyadvāresupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: mahā vipāka cittāni tad ārammaṇa vasena nava kiriya cittāni javana vasena labbhanti sota ghāna jivhā kāya dvāresu pi esa eva nayo

original: Manodvāre pana atthi kusaloti catubhūmakakusalavasena kathitaṃ, atthi akusaloti dvādasaakusalavasena.
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre pana atthi kusalo ti catu bhūmaka kusala vasena kathitam atthi akusalo ti dvādasa akusala vasena

original: Atthi abyākatoti ekādasannaṃ kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ, dasannaṃ kiriyānaṃ, navannaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakiriyānaṃ,
analyzed: atthi ekādasannam kāmāvacara vipākānam dasannam kiriyānam navannam rūpāvacara arūpāvacara kiriyānam

original: catunnaṃ sāmaññaphalānanti catuttiṃsacittuppādavasena kathitaṃ. Tattha catubhūmakakusalañceva
analyzed: catunnam sāmañña phalānam ti catuttiṃsa cittuppāda vasena kathitam tattha catu bhūmaka kusalam ca iva

original: akusalañca javanavasena labbhati. Kiriyato ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu āvajjanavasena,
analyzed: akusalam ca javana vasena labbhati kiriyataḥ ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu āvajjana vasena

original: ekādasa vipākacittāni tadārammaṇavasena, tebhūmakakiriyā ceva sāmaññaphalāni ca javanavaseneva
analyzed: ekādasa vipāka cittāni tad ārammaṇa vasena tebhūmaka kiriyā ca iva sāmañña phalāni ca javana vasena iva

original: labbhanti. Tāni sattavidhādīsu yattha katthaci ṭhatvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭanti. Tiṃsavidhe
analyzed: labbhanti tāni sattavidha ādīsu yattha katthaci ṭhatvā kathetum vaṭṭanti tiṃsavidhe

original: pana ṭhatvā dīpiyamānāni sukhadīpanāni hontīti tiṃsavidhasmiṃyeva ṭhatvā dīpayiṃsu.
analyzed: pana ṭhatvā dīpiyamānāni sukha dīpanāni honti iti tiṃsavidhasmin eva ṭhatvā

original: Etāni hi sabbānipi cittāni cakkhudvāre upanissayakoṭiyā, samatikkamavasena, bhāvanāvasenāti
analyzed: etāni hi sabbāni api cittāni cakkhu dvāre upanissaya koṭiyā samatikkama vasena bhāvanā vasena ati

original: tīhākārehi labbhanti. Tathā sotadvāramanodvāresupi. Ghānajivhākāyadvāresu pana samatikkamavasena,
analyzed: tīhākārehi labbhanti tathā sota dvāra manaḥ dvāresu pi ghāna jivhā kāya dvāresu pana samatikkama vasena

original: bhāvanāvasenāti dvīhevākārehi labbhantīti veditabbāni. Kathaṃ? Idha bhikkhu vihāracārikaṃ
analyzed: bhāvanā vasena ati dvīhā iva ākārehi labbhanti iti veditabbāni katham idha bhikkhu vihāra cārikam

original: caramāno kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ disvā ‘kiṃ nāmeta’nti pucchitvā ‘kasiṇamaṇḍala’nti vutte
analyzed: caramāno kasiṇa maṇḍalam disvā kim nāma etat ti pucchitvā kasiṇa maṇḍalam ti vutte

original: puna ‘kiṃ iminā karontī’ti pucchati. Athassa ācikkhanti – ‘evaṃ bhāvetvā jhānāni
analyzed: puna kim iminā karonti iti pucchati athassa ācikkhanti evam bhāvetvā jhānāni

original: uppādetvā, samāpattipadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā, arahattaṃ pāpuṇantī’ti. Ajjhāsayasampanno
analyzed: uppādetvā samāpatti padaṭṭhānam vipassanam vaḍḍhetvā arahattam pāpuṇanti iti ajjhāsaya sampannaḥ

analyzed: kula puttaḥ bhāriyam etat ti a sallakkhetvā mayā api esa guṇaḥ nibbattetum vaṭṭati na

original: kho pana sakkā esa nipajjitvā niddāyantena nibbattetuṃ, āditova vīriyaṃ kātuṃ sīlaṃ
analyzed: kho pana sakkā esa nipajjitvā niddāyantena nibbattetum āditas va vīriyam kātum sīlam

original: sodhetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti cintetvā sīlaṃ sodheti. Tato sīle patiṭṭhāya dasa palibodhe upacchinditvā,

analyzed: rūpāvacara arūpāvacarā magga phala vedanā lokuttarā ti evam cakkhu viññāṇam catu bhūmika vedanā nibbattiyā

original: ‘upanissayavasena’ labbhanti.
analyzed: upanissaya vasena labbhanti

original: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthagate ‘iṭṭhe me ārammaṇe rāgo uppanno, aniṭṭhe paṭigho,

analyzed: arahattam pāpuṇāti tattha sabbā api parikamma vedanā kāmāvacarā aṭṭha samāpatti vedanā

original: rūpāvacarārūpāvacarā, maggaphalavedanā lokuttarāti evaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ catubhūmikavedanā

analyzed: evam tāva upanissaya vasena labbhanti

analyzed: sota dvāre pana sadde āpātha gatā iti sabbam cakkhu dvāre vutta nayena iva veditabbam evam

original: uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā paññāyanti. Anattalakkhaṇaṃ vinā buddhuppādā na
analyzed: uppādāḥ vā tathāgatānam anuppādāḥ vā paññāyanti anatta lakkhaṇam vinā buddha ppādāḥ na

original: paññāyati, buddhuppādeyeva paññāyati. Mahiddhikā hi mahānubhāvā tāpasaparibbājakā
analyzed: paññāyati buddha uppādeya iva paññāyati mahiddhikāḥ hi mahā anubhāvā tāpasa paribbājakā

original: sarabhaṅgasatthārādayopi ‘aniccaṃ dukkha’nti vattuṃ sakkonti, ‘anattā’ti vattuṃ na
analyzed: sarabhaṅga satthāra ādayaḥ api aniccam dukkham ti vattum sakkonti anattā ati vattum na

original: sakkonti. Sace hi te sampattaparisāya anattāti vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyuṃ, sampattaparisāya
analyzed: sakkonti sace hi te sampatta parisāya anattā ati vattum sakkuṇeyyum sampatta parisāya

original: maggaphalapaṭivedho bhaveyya. Anattalakkhaṇapaññāpanañhi aññassa kassaci avisayo,
analyzed: magga phala paṭivedhaḥ bhaveyya anatta lakkhaṇa paññāpanam hi aññassa kassaci avisayaḥ

original: sabbaññubuddhānameva visayo. Evametaṃ anattalakkhaṇaṃ apākaṭaṃ. Tasmā satthā anattalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: sabbaññu buddhānam eva visayaḥ evam etam anatta lakkhaṇam apākaṭam tasmā satthā anatta lakkhaṇam

original: dassento aniccena vā dassesi, dukkhena vā, aniccadukkhehi vā. Idha pana taṃ aniccadukkhehi
analyzed: dassentaḥ aniccena vā dassesi dukkhena vā anicca dukkhehi vā idha pana tam anicca dukkhehi

original: dassesīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: dassesi iti veditabbam

original: Imāni pana lakkhaṇāni kissa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, kena paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhahanti?
analyzed: imāni pana lakkhaṇāni kissa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā kena paṭicchanna ttā na upaṭṭhahanti

original: Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ tāva udayabbayānaṃ amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, santatiyā paṭicchannattā,
analyzed: anicca lakkhaṇam tāva udayabbayānam a manasikārā appaṭivedhā santatiyā paṭicchanna ttā

original: na upaṭṭhāti. Dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā, iriyāpathehi
analyzed: na upaṭṭhāti dukkha lakkhaṇam abhiṇha sampaṭipīḷanassa a manasikārāḥ a paṭivedhāḥ iriyāpathehi

original: paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhāti. Anattalakkhaṇaṃ nānādhātuvinibbhogassa amanasikārā
analyzed: paṭicchanna ttā na upaṭṭhāti anatta lakkhaṇam nānā dhātu vinibbhogassa a manasikārā

original: appaṭivedhā, ghanena paṭicchannattā, na upaṭṭhāti. Udayabbayaṃ pana pariggahetvā
analyzed: appaṭivedhā ghanena paṭicchanna ttā na upaṭṭhāti udaya bbayam pana pariggahetvā

original: santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ
analyzed: santatiyā vikopitāya anicca lakkhaṇam yāthāvasa rasataḥ upaṭṭhāti abhiṇha sampaṭipīḷanam

original: manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Nānādhātuyo
analyzed: manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkha lakkhaṇam yāthāvasarasataḥ upaṭṭhāti nānā dhātuyo

original: vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhoge kate anattalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
analyzed: vinibbhujitvā ghana vinibbhoge kate anatta lakkhaṇam yāthāvasarasataḥ upaṭṭhāti

original: Ettha ca aniccaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, dukkhaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ, anattā anattalakkhaṇanti
analyzed: ettha ca aniccam anicca lakkhaṇam dukkham dukkha lakkhaṇam anattā anatta lakkhaṇanti

original: ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha aniccanti khandhapañcakaṃ. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā,
analyzed: ayam vibhāgaḥ veditabbo tattha aniccanti khandha pañcakam kasmā

original: hutvā abhāvato vā; uppādavayaññathattaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, hutvā abhāvasaṅkhāto ākāravikāro
analyzed: hutvā abhāvataḥ vā uppāda vayaññathattam anicca lakkhaṇam hutvā abhāva saṅkhātaḥ ākāra vikāro

original: vā. “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato pana tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ dukkhaṃ. Kasmā?
analyzed: vā yat aniccam tam dukkhan ti vacanato pana tat eva khandha pañcakam dukkham kasmā

original: Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanato; abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanākāro dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ. “Yaṃ dukkhaṃ taṃ
analyzed: abhiṇha sampaṭipīḷanataḥ abhiṇha sampaṭipīḷana ākāraḥ dukkha lakkhaṇam yat dukkham tam

original: anattā”ti pana vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ anattā. Kasmā? Avasavattanato; avasavattanākāro
analyzed: anattā ati pana vacanato tat eva khandha pañcakam anattā kasmai avasavattanataḥ avasavattana ākāro

original: anattalakkhaṇaṃ. Iti aññadeva aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, aññāni aniccadukkhānattalakkhaṇāni.
analyzed: anatta lakkhaṇam iti aññat eva aniccam dukkham anattā aññāni anicca dukkha anatta lakkhaṇāni

original: Pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti idañhi sabbampi aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
analyzed: pañca kkhandhāḥ dvādasa āyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo ti idam hi sabbam pi aniccam dukkham

original: anattā nāma. Vuttappakārākāravikārā aniccadukkhānattalakkhaṇānīti.
analyzed: anattā nāma vutta ppakāra ākāra vikārāḥ anicca dukkha anatta lakkhaṇāni iti

original: Saṅkhepato panettha dasāyatanāni kāmāvacarāni, dve tebhūmakāni. Sabbesupi sammasanacāro kathitoti veditabbo.
analyzed: saṅkhepato pana ittha dasa āyatanāni kāmāvacarāni dve tebhūmakāni sabbesu pi sammasana cāro kathito ti veditabbo

original: Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā.
2. Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
155. Abhidhammabhājanīye yathā heṭṭhā vipassakānaṃ upakāratthāya “cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpāyatana”nti
analyzed: abhidhamma bhājanīye yathā heṭṭhā vipassakānam upakāra atthāya cakkhāyatanam rūpāyatananti

original: yugalato āyatanāni vuttāni, tathā avatvā ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ sabbākārato sabhāvadassanatthaṃ
analyzed: yugalataḥ āyatanāni vuttāni tathā avatvā ajjhattika bāhirānam sabba ākārato sabhāva dassana attham

original: “cakkhāyatanaṃ sotāyatana”nti evaṃ ajjhattikabāhiravavatthānanayena vuttāni.
analyzed: cakkhāyatanam sotāyatanan ti evam ajjhattika bāhira vavatthāna nayena vuttāni

original: 156. Tesaṃ niddesavāre tattha katamaṃ cakkhāyatanantiādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
analyzed: tesam niddesa vāre tattha katamam cakkha āyatana nti ādīni heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbāni

original: 167. Yaṃ panetaṃ dhammāyatananiddese “tattha katamā asaṅkhatā dhātu? Rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo
analyzed: yam pana itam dhamma āyatana niddese tattha katamā asaṅkhatā dhātu rāga kkhayaḥ dosa kkhayo

original: mohakkhayo”ti vuttaṃ, tatrāyamattho – asaṅkhatā dhātūti asaṅkhatasabhāvaṃ nibbānaṃ.
analyzed: moha kkhayaḥ ti vuttam tatra ayam atthaḥ asaṅkhatā dhātū ti asaṅkhata sabhāvam nibbānam

original: Yasmā panetaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyanti, tasmā rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti
analyzed: yasmā pana itam āgamma rāga ādayaḥ khīyanti tasmā rāga kkhayaḥ dosa kkhayaḥ moha kkhayo ti

original: vuttaṃ. Ayamettha ācariyānaṃ samānatthakathā.
analyzed: vuttam ayam ettha ācariyānam samāna attha kathā

original: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha – ‘pāṭiyekkaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma natthi, kilesakkhayova nibbāna’nti.
analyzed: vitaṇḍa vādī pana āha pāṭiyekkam nibbānam nāma natthi kilesa khayaḥ va nibbānanti

original: ‘Suttaṃ āharā’ti ca vutte “nibbānaṃ nibbānanti kho, āvuso sāriputta, vuccati; katamaṃ
analyzed: suttam āhara ati ca vutte nibbānam nibbānanti kho āvuso sāriputta vuccati katamam

original: nu kho, āvuso, nibbānanti? Yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo – idaṃ
analyzed: nu kho āvuso nibbānam ti yaḥ kho āvuso rāga khayaḥ dosa kkhayaḥ moha kkhayaḥ idam

original: vuccati nibbāna”nti etaṃ jambukhādakasuttaṃ āharitvā ‘iminā suttena veditabbaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ
analyzed: vuccati nibbānam ti etam jambukhādaka suttam āharitvā iminā suttena veditabbam pāṭiyekkam

original: nibbānaṃ nāma natthi, kilesakkhayova nibbāna’nti āha. So vattabbo – ‘kiṃ pana yathā
analyzed: nibbānam nāma natthi kilesa khayaḥ va nibbānanti āha saḥ vattabbaḥ kim pana yathā

original: cetaṃ suttaṃ tathā attho’ti? Addhā vakkhati – ‘āma, natthi suttato muñcitvā attho’ti.
analyzed: ca itam suttam tathā attho ti addhā vakkhati āma natthi suttataḥ muñcitvā attho ti

original: Tato vattabbo – ‘idaṃ tāva te suttaṃ ābhataṃ; anantarasuttaṃ āharā’ti. Anantarasuttaṃ
analyzed: tatas vattabbaḥ idam tāva te suttam ābhatam anantara suttam āharāti anantara suttam

original: nāma – “arahattaṃ arahattanti, āvuso sāriputta, vuccati; katamaṃ nu kho, āvuso, arahattanti?
analyzed: nāma arahattam arahattanti āvuso sāriputta vuccati katamam nu kho āvuso arahattanti

original: Yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo – idaṃ vuccati arahatta”nti idaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ kho āvuso rāga khayaḥ dosa khayaḥ moha kkhayaḥ idam vuccati arahattam ti idam

original: tassevānantaraṃ ābhatasuttaṃ.
analyzed: tassa iva anantaram ābhata suttam

original: Imasmiṃ pana naṃ ābhate āhaṃsu – ‘nibbānaṃ nāma dhammāyatanapariyāpanno dhammo, arahattaṃ
analyzed: imasmin pana nam ābhate āhaṃsu nibbānam nāma dhamma āyatana pariyāpannaḥ dhammaḥ arahattam

original: cattāro khandhā. Nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā viharanto dhammasenāpati nibbānaṃ pucchitopi
analyzed: cattāro khandhāḥ nibbānam sacchikatvā viharantaḥ dhamma senāpati nibbānam pucchitaḥ pi

original: arahattaṃ pucchitopi kilesakkhayameva āha. Kiṃ pana nibbānañca arahattañca ekaṃ udāhu
analyzed: arahattam pucchitaḥ api kilesa kkhayam eva āha kim pana nibbānam ca arahattam ca ekam udāhu

original: nāna’nti? ‘Ekaṃ vā hotu nānaṃ vā. Ko ettha tayā atibahuṃ cuṇṇīkaraṇaṃ karontena attho’?
analyzed: ekam vā hotu nānam vā kaḥ ettha tayā ati bahum cuṇṇīkaraṇam karontena attho

original: ‘Na tvaṃ ekaṃ nānaṃ jānāsīti. Nanu ñāte sādhu hotī’ti evaṃ punappunaṃ pucchito vañcetuṃ
analyzed: na tvam ekam nānam jānāsi iti nanu ñāte sādhu hoti iti evam punappunam pucchitaḥ vañcetum

original: asakkonto āha – ‘rāgādīnaṃ khīṇante uppannattā arahattaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo’ti
analyzed: a sakkontaḥ āha rāga ādīnam khīṇa nte uppanna ttā arahattam rāga kkhayaḥ dosa kkhayaḥ moha kkhayaḥ ti

original: vuccatīti. Tato naṃ āhaṃsu – ‘mahākammaṃ te kataṃ. Lañjaṃ datvāpi taṃ vadāpento etadeva
analyzed: vuccati iti tatas naṃ āhaṃsu mahā kammam te katam lañjam etat eva

original: vadāpeyya. Yatheva ca te etaṃ vibhajitvā kathitaṃ, evaṃ idampi sallakkhehi – nibbānañhi
analyzed: vadāpeyya yathā iva ca te etam vibhajitvā kathitam evam idam api sallakkhehi nibbānam hi

original: āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuttaṃ. Tīṇipi
analyzed: āgamma rāga ādayo khīṇā ti nibbānam rāga kkhayaḥ dosa kkhayaḥ moha kkhayo ti vuttam tīṇi pi

original: hi etāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānī’ti.
analyzed: hi etāni nibbānassa iva adhivacanāni iti

original: Sace evaṃ vutte saññattiṃ gacchati iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce, bahunibbānatāya kāretabbo.
analyzed: sace evam vutte saññattim gacchati icca etam kusalam no ce bahu nibbāna tāya kāretabbaḥ

original: Kathaṃ? Evaṃ tāva pucchitabbo – ‘rāgakkhayo nāma rāgasseva khayo udāhu dosamohānampi?
analyzed: katham evam tāva pucchitabbaḥ rāga kkhayaḥ nāma rāgassa iva khayaḥ udāhu dosa mohānam pi

original: Dosakkhayo nāma dosasseva khayo udāhu rāgamohānampi? Mohakkhayo nāma mohasseva khayo
analyzed: dosa khayaḥ nāma dosassa iva khayaḥ udāhu rāga mohānam pi moha khayaḥ nāma mohassa iva khayaḥ

original: udāhu rāgadosānampī’ti? Addhā vakkhati – ‘rāgakkhayo nāma rāgasseva khayo, dosakkhayo

original: nāma dosasseva khayo, mohakkhayo nāma mohasseva khayo’ti.
analyzed: nāma dosassa iva khayaḥ moha kkhayaḥ nāma mohassa iva khayaḥ ti

original: Tato vattabbo – ‘tava vāde rāgakkhayo ekaṃ nibbānaṃ hoti, dosakkhayo ekaṃ, mohakkhayo
analyzed: tatas vattabbaḥ tava vāde rāga kkhayaḥ ekam nibbānam hoti dosa kkhayaḥ ekam moha kkhayaḥ

original: ekaṃ; tiṇṇaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ khaye tīṇi nibbānāni honti, catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ khaye
analyzed: ekam tiṇṇam akusala mūlānam khaye tīṇi nibbānāni honti catunnam upādānānam khaye

original: anusayānaṃ khaye satta, aṭṭhannaṃ micchattānaṃ khaye aṭṭha, navannaṃ taṇhāmūlakadhammānaṃ
analyzed: anusayānam khaye satta aṭṭhannam micchattānam khaye aṭṭha navannam taṇhā mūlaka dhammānam

original: khaye nava, dasannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khaye dasa, diyaḍḍhakilesasahassassa khaye pāṭiyekkaṃ
analyzed: khaye nava dasannam saṃyojanānam khaye dasa diyaḍḍha kilesa sahassassa khaye pāṭiyekkam

original: pāṭiyekkaṃ nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti. Natthi pana te nibbānānaṃ pamāṇanti.
analyzed: pāṭiyekkam nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti natthi pana te nibbānānam pamāṇanti

original: Evaṃ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo
analyzed: evam pana aggahetvā nibbānam āgamma rāga ādayo khīṇā ti ekam eva nibbānam rāga kkhayo

original: dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati. Tīṇipi hetāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānīti gaṇha’.
analyzed: dosa khayaḥ moha kkhayaḥ ti vuccati tīṇi pi ha etāni nibbānassa iva adhivacanāni iti gaṇha

original: Sace pana evaṃ vuttepi na sallakkheti, oḷārikatāya kāretabbo. Kathaṃ? ‘Andhabālā

original: hi acchadīpimigamakkaṭādayopi kilesapariyuṭṭhitā vatthuṃ paṭisevanti. Atha nesaṃ

original: paṭisevanapariyante kileso vūpasammati. Tava vāde acchadīpimigamakkaṭādayo nibbānappattā
analyzed: paṭisevana pariyante kilesaḥ vūpasammati tava vāde acchadīpi miga makkaṭa ādayaḥ nibbāna ppattā

original: nāma honti. Oḷārikaṃ vata te nibbānaṃ thūlaṃ, kaṇṇehi piḷandhituṃ na sakkāti. Evaṃ
analyzed: nāma honti oḷārikam vata te nibbānam thūlam kaṇṇehi piḷandhitum na sakkā ati evam

original: pana aggahetvā nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṃ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo
analyzed: pana aggahetvā nibbānam āgamma rāga ādayo khīṇā ti ekam eva nibbānam rāga kkhayaḥ dosa kkhayaḥ

original: mohakkhayoti vuccati. Tīṇipi hetāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānīti gaṇha’.
analyzed: moha khayaḥ ti vuccati tīṇi pi ha etāni nibbānassa iva adhivacanāni iti gaṇha

original: Sace pana evaṃ vuttepi na sallakkheti, gotrabhunāpi kāretabbo. Kathaṃ? Evaṃ tāva
analyzed: sace pana evam vutte pi na sallakkheti gotrabhunā api kāretabbaḥ katham evam tāva

original: pucchitabbo – ‘tvaṃ gotrabhu nāma atthīti vadesī’ti? ‘Āma vadāmī’ti. ‘Gotrabhukkhaṇe
analyzed: pucchitabbaḥ tvam gotrabhu nāma atthi iti vadesi iti vadāmi iti gotrabhukkhaṇe

analyzed: kilesā khīṇā khīyanti khīyissanti iti na khīṇāḥ na khīyanti apica kho khīyissanti iti

original: ‘Gotrabhu pana kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotī’ti? ‘Nibbānaṃ’. ‘Tava gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesā na
analyzed: gotrabhu pana kim ārammaṇam karoti iti nibbānam tava gotrabhu khaṇe kilesāḥ na

original: khīṇā, na khīyanti; atha kho khīyissanti. Tvaṃ akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu kilesakkhayaṃ
analyzed: khīṇāḥ na khīyanti atha kho khīyissanti tvam akhīṇesu yeva kilesesu kilesa khayam

original: nibbānaṃ paññapesi, appahīnesu anusayesu anusayappahānaṃ nibbānaṃ paññapesi. Taṃ

original: te na sameti. Evaṃ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṃ
analyzed: te na sameti evam pana aggahetvā nibbānam āgamma rāga ādayaḥ khīṇāti ekam eva nibbānam

original: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati. Tīṇipi hetāni nibbānasseva adhivacanānīti gaṇha’.
analyzed: rāga kkhayaḥ dosa kkhayaḥ moha kkhayaḥ ti vuccati tīṇi pi ha etāni nibbānassa iva adhivacanāni iti gaṇha

original: Sace pana evaṃ vuttepi na sallakkheti, maggena kāretabbo. Kathaṃ? Evaṃ tāva pucchitabbo

172. Idāni tadanantare dhātuvibhaṅge sabbā dhātuyo chahi chahi dhātūhi saṅkhipitvā

original: Dhātuyoti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ. Pathavīdhātūtiādīsu dhātvaṭṭho nāma sabhāvaṭṭho,

original: pathavīyeva dhātu pathavīdhātu. Āpodhātuādīsupi eseva nayo. Evamettha padasamāsaṃ

analyzed: tejaḥ dhātu uti paripācana dhātu vāyo dhātu uti vitthambhana dhātu ākāsa dhātu uti a samphuṭṭha dhātu

analyzed: viññāṇa dhātu uti vijānana dhātu

analyzed: pathavī dhātu dve ayam ayam pathavī dhātu nāma na ekā eva

original: atthi bāhirā”ti. Tattha ajjhattikāti sattasantānapariyāpannā niyakajjhattā. Bāhirāti
analyzed: atthi bāhirā ti tattha ajjhattikā ati satta santāna pariyāpannā niyaka jjhattā bāhirā

analyzed: idāni tam sabhāva ākārataḥ dassetum kakkhaḷanti ādi vuttam tattha kakkhaḷanti thaddham

original: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti yakanaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
analyzed: aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti yakanam nāma imasmim sarīre

original: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddho pathavī dhātū ti

original: Kilomakesu paṭicchannakilomakaṃ hadayañca vakkañca parivāretvā ṭhitaṃ, apaṭicchannakilomakaṃ
analyzed: kilomakesu paṭicchanna kilomakam hadayam ca vakkam ca parivāretvā ṭhitam a paṭicchanna kilomakam

original: sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pilotikapaliveṭhite
analyzed: sakala sarīre cammassa heṭṭhatas maṃsam pariyonandhitvā ṭhitam tattha yathā pilotika paliveṭhite

original: maṃse na maṃsaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ pilotikāya paliveṭhita’nti, nāpi pilotikā jānāti ‘mayā
analyzed: maṃse na maṃsam jānāti aham pilotikāya na api pilotikā jānāti mayā

original: maṃsaṃ paliveṭhita’nti, evameva na vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre maṃsañca jānāti ‘ahaṃ
analyzed: maṃsam evam eva na sakala sarīre maṃsam ca jānāti aham

original: kilomakena paṭicchanna’nti, nāpi kilomakaṃ jānāti ‘mayā vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre
analyzed: kilomakena na api kilomakam jānāti mayā sakala sarīre

original: maṃsañca paṭicchanna’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti kilomakaṃ
analyzed: maṃsam ca paṭicchannanti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti kilomakam

original: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nāma imasmin sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: Pihakaṃ hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: pihakam hadayassa vāma passe udara paṭalassa matthaka passam nissāya ṭhitam tattha

original: yathā koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitāya gomayapiṇḍiyā na koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ
analyzed: yathā koṭṭhaka matthaka passam nissāya ṭhitāya gomaya piṇḍiyā na koṭṭhaka matthaka passam

original: jānāti ‘gomayapiṇḍi maṃ nissāya ṭhitā’ti, nāpi gomayapiṇḍi jānāti ‘ahaṃ koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ
analyzed: jānāti gomaya piṇḍi mam nissāya ṭhitā ati na api gomaya piṇḍi jānāti aham koṭṭhaka matthaka passam

original: nissāya ṭhitā’ti, evameva na udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ jānāti ‘pihakaṃ maṃ nissāya
analyzed: nissāya ṭhitā ati evam eva na udara paṭalassa matthaka passam jānāti pihakam mam nissāya

original: ṭhita’nti, nāpi pihakaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhita’nti.
analyzed: na api pihakam jānāti aham udara paṭalassa matthaka passam nissāya ṭhitanti

original: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti pihakaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
analyzed: aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti pihakam nāma imasmim sarīre

original: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddho pathavī dhātū ti

original: Papphāsaṃ sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare hadayañca yakanañca uparichādetvā
analyzed: papphāsam sarīra abbhantare dvinnam abbhantare hadayam ca yakanam ca upari chādetvā

original: olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare olambamāne sakuṇakulāvake na
analyzed: olambantam ṭhitam tattha yathā jiṇṇa koṭṭhabbha antare olambamāne sakuṇa kulāvake na

original: jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantaraṃ jānāti ‘mayi sakuṇakulāvako olambamāno ṭhito’ti, nāpi sakuṇakulāvako
analyzed: jiṇṇa koṭṭhabbhantaram jānāti mayi sakuṇa kulāvakaḥ olambamānaḥ ṭhitaḥ iti na api sakuṇa kulāvakaḥ

original: jānāti ‘ahaṃ jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare olambamāno ṭhito’ti, evameva na sarīrabbhantaraṃ
analyzed: jānāti aham jiṇṇa koṭṭhabbhantare olambamānaḥ ṭhitaḥ iti evam eva na sarīra bbhantaram

analyzed: jānāti mayi papphāsam olambamānam ṭhitanti na api papphāsam jānāti aham evarūpe

analyzed: sarīra abbhantare olambamānam ṭhitan ti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammā

original: Iti papphāsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
analyzed: iti papphāsam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto

original: thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: pathavī dhātu uti

original: Antaṃ galavāṭakato karīsamaggapariyante sarīrabbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā lohitadoṇikāya
analyzed: antam galavāṭakato karīsa magga pariyante sarīra abbhantare ṭhitam tattha yathā lohitadoṇikāya

original: obhujitvā ṭhapite chinnasīsadhamanikaḷevare na lohitadoṇi jānāti ‘mayi dhamanikaḷevaraṃ
analyzed: obhujitvā ṭhapite chinna sīsa dhamani kaḷevare na lohita doṇi jānāti mayi dhamani kaḷevaram

analyzed: na sarīra bbhantaram jānāti mayi antam na api antam jānāti aham sarīra bbhantare

analyzed: sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddho pathavī dhātū ti

original: Antaguṇaṃ antantare ekavīsati antabhoge bandhitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ

analyzed: aham antam bandhitvā ṭhitanti aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammā

original: thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: pathavī dhātu uti

original: Udariyaṃ udare ṭhitaṃ asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ. Tattha yathā suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhite suvānavamathumhi

original: Karīsaṃ pakkāsayasaṅkhāte aṭṭhaṅgulaveḷupabbasadise antapariyosāne ṭhitaṃ. Tattha

analyzed: yathā veḷu pabbe omadditvā pakkhittāya saṇha paṇḍu mattikāya na veḷu pabbam jānāti mayi

analyzed: sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddho pathavī dhātū ti

original: Matthaluṅgaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā purāṇalābukaṭāhe pakkhittāya

analyzed: piṭṭhapiṇḍiyā na lābu kaṭāham jānāti mayi piṭṭhapiṇḍī ṭhitā ati na api piṭṭhapiṇḍī

analyzed: koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātū ti

original: Yaṃ vā panaññampīti iminā āpokoṭṭhāsādīsu tīsu anugataṃ pathavīdhātuṃ lakkhaṇavasena yevāpanakaṃ pathaviṃ katvā dasseti.

original: Bāhirapathavīdhātuniddese ayoti kāḷalohaṃ. Lohanti jātilohaṃ, vijātilohaṃ, kittimalohaṃ,
analyzed: bāhira pathavī dhātu niddese kāḷa loham lohanti jāti loham vijāti loham kittima loham

original: pisācalohanti catubbidhaṃ. Tattha ayo, sajjhu, suvaṇṇaṃ, tipu, sīsaṃ, tambalohaṃ,
analyzed: pisāca lohanti catubbidham tattha ayaḥ sajjhu suvaṇṇam tipu sīsam tamba loham

original: vekantakanti imāni satta jātilohāni nāma. Nāganāsikalohaṃ vijātilohaṃ nāma. Kaṃsalohaṃ,

original: dvīhi jātilohehi saddhiṃ sesaṃ sabbampi idha lohanti veditabbaṃ.

original: Tipūti setatipu. Sīsanti kāḷatipu. Sajjhūti rajataṃ. Muttāti sāmuddikamuttā. Maṇīti
analyzed: rajatam muttā ati sāmuddikamuttā maṇī iti

original: ṭhapetvā pāḷiāgate veḷuriyādayo seso jotirasādibhedo sabbopi maṇi. Veḷuriyoti vaṃsavaṇṇamaṇi.
analyzed: ṭhapetvā pāḷi āgate veḷuriya ādayo sesaḥ joti rasa ādi bhedo sabbaḥ api maṇi veḷuriyaḥ ti vaṃsa vaṇṇa maṇi

original: Saṅkhoti sāmuddikasaṅkho. Silāti kāḷasilā, paṇḍusilā, setasilātiādibhedā sabbāpi
analyzed: saṅkho ti sāmuddika saṅkhaḥ silā ati kāḷasilā paṇḍusilā setasilā ati ādi bhedā sabbā api

original: silā. Pavāḷanti pavāḷameva. Rajatanti kahāpaṇo. Jātarūpanti suvaṇṇaṃ. Lohitaṅkoti
analyzed: silā pavāḷanti pavāḷam eva rajatanti kahāpaṇaḥ jātarūpanti suvaṇṇam

original: rattamaṇi. Masāragallanti kabaramaṇi. Tiṇādīsu bahisārā antamaso nāḷikerādayopi tiṇaṃ
analyzed: rattamaṇi masāragallanti kabaramaṇi tiṇa ādīsu bahisārāḥ antamasaḥ nāḷikera ādayaḥ api tiṇam

original: nāma. Antosāraṃ antamaso dārukhaṇḍampi kaṭṭhaṃ nāma. Sakkharāti muggamattato yāva
analyzed: nāma antosāram antamasaḥ dāru khaṇḍam pi kaṭṭham nāma sakkharāti mugga mattataḥ yāva

original: muṭṭhippamāṇā marumbā sakkharā nāma. Muggamattato pana heṭṭhā vālikāti vuccati. Kaṭhalanti
analyzed: muṭṭhippamāṇā marumbā sakkharā nāma mugga mattato pana heṭṭhā vālikā ati vuccati kaṭhalanti

original: yaṃ kiñci kapālaṃ. Bhūmīti pathavī. Pāsāṇoti antomuṭṭhiyaṃ asaṇṭhahanato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: yam kiñci kapālam bhūmī iti pathavī pāsāṇā iti antomuṭṭhiyam a saṇṭhahanataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: ca ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu yā ca bāhirāti iminā dvepi pathavīdhātuyo kakkhaḷaṭṭhena

original: lakkhaṇato ekā pathavīdhātu evāti dasseti.

original: āpo. Tadeva āposabhāvaṃ gatattā āpogataṃ nāma. Snehavasena sneho. Soyeva snehasabhāvaṃ

original: gatattā snehagataṃ nāma. Bandhanattaṃ rūpassāti avinibbhogarūpassa bandhanabhāvo.
analyzed: gata ttā sneha gatam nāma bandhana ttam rūpassa ati a vinibbhoga rūpassa bandhana bhāvo

original: Pittaṃ semhantiādīnipi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena pariggahetvā dhātuvaseneva manasikātabbāni.

analyzed: tatra ayam nayaḥ pittesu hi abaddhapittam jīvitindriya paṭibaddham sakala sarīram byāpetvā

original: ṭhitaṃ, baddhapittaṃ pittakosake ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pūvaṃ byāpetvā ṭhite tele na

analyzed: muttam vatthissa abbhantare ṭhitam tattha yathā candanikāya pakkhitte adhomukhe

original: ravaṇaghaṭe na ravaṇaghaṭo jānāti ‘mayi candanikāraso ṭhito’ti, nāpi candanikāraso
analyzed: ravaṇa ghaṭe na ravaṇa ghaṭaḥ jānāti mayi candanikā rasaḥ ṭhitaḥ iti na api candanikā rasaḥ

original: jānāti ‘ahaṃ ravaṇaghaṭe ṭhito’ti, evameva na vatthi jānāti ‘mayi muttaṃ ṭhita’nti,
analyzed: jānāti aham ravaṇa ghaṭe ṭhitaḥ iti evam eva na jānāti mayi muttam ṭhitanti

original: nāpi muttaṃ jānāti ‘ahaṃ vatthimhi ṭhita’nti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: na api muttam jānāti aham vatthimhi ṭhitan ti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti muttaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: ete dhammā iti muttam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti. Yaṃ vā panāti avasesesu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu
analyzed: nissattaḥ yūsa bhūtaḥ ābandhana ākāraḥ āpodhātu uti yam vā pana ati avasesesu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu

original: āpodhātuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: āpodhātum sandhāya vuttam

original: Bāhiraāpodhātuniddese mūlaṃ paṭicca nibbatto raso mūlaraso nāma. Khandharasādīsupi
analyzed: bāhira āpodhātu niddese mūlam paṭicca nibbattaḥ rasaḥ mūla rasaḥ nāma khandha rasa ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Khīrādīni pākaṭāneva. Yathā pana bhesajjasikkhāpade evamidha niyamo natthi.
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ khīra ādīni pākaṭāni eva yathā pana bhesajja sikkhāpade evam idha niyamaḥ natthi

original: Yaṃ kiñci khīraṃ khīrameva. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Bhummānīti āvāṭādīsu ṭhitaudakāni.
analyzed: yam kiñci khīram khīram eva sesesu pi esā iva nayaḥ bhummāni iti āvāṭa ādīsu ṭhita audakāni

original: Antalikkhānīti pathaviṃ appattāni vassodakāni. Yaṃ vā panāti himodakakappavināsakaudakapathavīsandhārakaudakādīni
analyzed: antalikkhāni iti pathavim appattāni vassa udakāni yam vā panāti hima udaka kappa vināsaka audaka pathavī sandhāraka audaka ādīni

original: idha yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhāni.
analyzed: idha yevāpanakaṭṭhānam paviṭṭhāni

original: 175. Tejodhātuniddese tejanavasena tejo. Tejova tejobhāvaṃ gatattā tejogataṃ. Usmāti
analyzed: tejaḥ dhātu niddese tejana vasena tejaḥ tejaḥ uva tejaḥ bhāvam tejaḥ gatam

original: uṇhākāro. Usmāva usmābhāvaṃ gatattā usmāgataṃ. Usumanti caṇḍausumaṃ. Tadeva usumabhāvaṃ
analyzed: uṇhā kāraḥ usmā avaḥ usmā bhāvam usumanti caṇḍausumam tat eva usuma bhāvam

original: gatattā usumagataṃ. Yena cāti yena tejogatena kuppitena. Santappatīti ayaṃ kāyo santappati,
analyzed: gata ttā usuma gatam yena ca ati yena tejaḥ gatena kuppitena santappati iti ayam kāyaḥ santappati

original: ekāhikajarādibhāvena usumajāto hoti. Yena ca jīrīyatīti yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrīyati,
analyzed: ekāhika jarā ādi bhāvena yena ca jīrīyati iti yena ayam kāyaḥ jīrīyati

original: indriyavekallataṃ balaparikkhayaṃ valipalitādibhāvañca pāpuṇāti. Yena ca pariḍayhatīti
analyzed: indriya vekalla tam bala parikkhayam vali palita ādi bhāvañca pāpuṇāti yena ca pariḍayhati iti

original: yena kuppitena ayaṃ kāyo ḍayhati, so ca puggalo ‘ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī’ti kandanto satadhotasappigosītacandanādilepanañceva
analyzed: yena kuppitena ayam kāyaḥ ḍayhati saḥ ca puggalaḥ ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmi iti kandanto satadhā uta sappi go sīta candana ādi lepanam ca iva

original: tālavaṇṭavātañca paccāsīsati. Yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti
analyzed: tālavaṇṭa vātam ca yena ca asita pīta khāyita sāyitam sammā pariṇāmam gacchati iti

original: yenetaṃ asitaṃ vā odanādi, pītaṃ vā pānakādi, khāyitaṃ vā piṭṭhakhajjakādi, sāyitaṃ
analyzed: yena itam asitam vā odana ādi pītam vā pānaka ādi khāyitam vā piṭṭhakhajjaka ādi sāyitam

original: vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati, rasādibhāvena vivekaṃ gacchatīti
analyzed: vā amba pakka madhu phāṇita ādi sammā paripākam gacchati rasa ādi bhāvena vivekam gacchati iti

original: attho. Ettha ca purimā tayo tejodhātū catusamuṭṭhānā, pacchimo kammasamuṭṭhānova.
analyzed: ettha ca purimā tayo tejodhātū catu samuṭṭhānā pacchimo kamma samuṭṭhānaḥ va

original: Ayaṃ tāvettha padasaṃvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: ayam tau ettha pada saṃvaṇṇanā

original: Idaṃ pana manasikāravidhānaṃ – idha bhikkhu ‘yena santappati, ayaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre
analyzed: idam pana manasikāra vidhānam idha bhikkhu yena santappati ayam imasmin sarīre

original: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto paripācanākāro tejodhātū’ti manasi
analyzed: pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto paripācana ākāro tejodhātu uti manasi

original: karoti; ‘yena jīrīyati, yena pariḍayhati, yena asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ
analyzed: karoti yena jīrīyati yena pariḍayhati yena asita pīta khāyita sāyitam pariṇāmam

original: gacchati, ayaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
analyzed: gacchati ayam imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto

original: paripācanākāro tejodhātū’ti manasi karoti. Yaṃ vā panāti imasmiṃ sarīre pākatiko
analyzed: paripācana ākāraḥ manasi karoti yam vā panāti imasmin sarīre pākatikaḥ

original: eko utu atthi, so yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭho.
analyzed: ekaḥ utu atthi saḥ yevāpanakaṭṭhānam paviṭṭhaḥ

original: Bāhiratejodhātuniddese kaṭṭhaṃ paṭicca pajjalito kaṭṭhupādāno aggi kaṭṭhaggi nāma.
analyzed: bāhira tejaḥ dhātu niddese kaṭṭham paṭicca pajjalitaḥ kaṭṭhupādānaḥ aggi kaṭṭhaggi nāma

original: Sakalikaggiādīsupi eseva nayo. Saṅkāraggīti kacavaraṃ saṃkaḍḍhitvā jālāpito kacavaraggi.
analyzed: sakalikaggi ādī supi eṣa iva nayaḥ saṅkāraggī iti kaca varam saṃkaḍḍhitvā kaca vara ggi

original: Indaggīti asaniaggi. Aggisantāpoti jālāya vā vītaccikaṅgārānaṃ vā santāpo. Sūriyasantāpoti
analyzed: indaggī iti aggi santāpā uti jālāya vā vā santāpaḥ sūriya santāpā uti

original: ātapo. Kaṭṭhasannicayasantāpoti kaṭṭharāsiṭṭhāne santāpo. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Yaṃ
analyzed: ātapo kaṭṭha sannicaya santāpo ti kaṭṭha rāsi ṭṭhāne santāpo sesesu pi esa iva nayaḥ yaṃ

original: vā panāti petaggi kappavināsaggi nirayaggiādayo idha yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā.
analyzed: vā pana ati petaggi kappa vināsaggi nirayaggi ādayaḥ idha paviṭṭhā

original: 176. Vāyodhātuniddese vāyanavasena vāyo. Vāyova vāyobhāvaṃ gatattā vāyogataṃ. Thambhitattaṃ
analyzed: vāyo dhātu niddese vāyana vasena vāyo vāyo iva vāyu bhāvam vāyu gatattā vāyu gatam

original: rūpassāti avinibbhogarūpassa thambhitabhāvo. Uddhaṅgamā vātāti uggārahikkādi pavattakā
analyzed: rūpassa ati avinibbhoga rūpassa thambhita bhāvaḥ uddhaṅgamāḥ vātā ati uggāra hikkā ādi pavattakā

original: uddhaṃ ārohanavātā. Adhogamā vātāti uccārapassāvādinīharaṇakā adho orohanavātā. Kucchisayā
analyzed: uddham ārohana vātāḥ adhogamāḥ vātāti uccāra passāvādinī haraṇakāḥ adhas orohana vātā kucchi sayā

original: vātāti antānaṃ bahivātā. Koṭṭhāsayā vātāti antānaṃ antovātā. Aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātāti
analyzed: vātāti antānam bahivātā koṭṭhāsayā vātāti antānam antovātāḥ aṅgam aṅga anusārinaḥ vātāti

original: dhamanijālānusārena sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaṭā samiñjanapasāraṇādinibbattakā
analyzed: dhamani jāla anusārena sakala sarīre aṅgam aṅgāni samiñjana pasāraṇa ādi nibbattakā

original: vātā. Satthakavātāti sandhibandhanāni kattariyā chindantā viya pavattavātā. Khurakavātāti
analyzed: vātā satthaka vātā ati sandhibandhanāni kattariyā chindantā viya pavatta vātā khuraka vātā ati

original: khurena viya hadayaṃ phālanavātā. Uppalakavātāti hadayamaṃsameva uppāṭanakavātā.
analyzed: khurena hadayam phālana vātāḥ uppalaka vātāḥ ati hadayam aṃsam eva uppāṭanaka vātāḥ

original: Assāsoti antopavisananāsikāvato. Passāsoti bahinikkhamananāsikāvato. Ettha ca purimā
analyzed: assāso ti anta upavisana nāsikāvato passāso ti bahi nikkhamana nāsikāvato ettha ca purimā

original: sabbe catusamuṭṭhānā, assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānāva. Ayamettha padavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: sabbe catu samuṭṭhānāḥ assāsa passāsā citta samuṭṭhānā ca ayam ettha pada vaṇṇanā

original: Idaṃ pana manasikāravidhānaṃ – idha bhikkhu uddhaṅgamādibhede vāte uddhaṅgamādivasena
analyzed: idam pana manasikāra vidhānam idha bhikkhu uddhaṅgama ādi bhede vāte uddhaṅgama ādi vasena

original: pariggahetvā ‘uddhaṅgamā vātā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato
analyzed: pariggahetvā uddhaṅgamāḥ vātāḥ nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ a byākato

original: suñño nissatto vitthambhanākāro vāyodhātū’ti manasi karoti. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: suññaḥ nissattaḥ vitthambhana ākāraḥ vāyodhātu uti manasi karoti sesesu pi esā iva nayo

original: Yaṃ vā panāti sese vāyokoṭṭhāse anugatā vātā idha yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā.
analyzed: yam vā panāti sese vāyokoṭṭhāse anugatāḥ vātāḥ idha yevāpanaka ṭṭhānam paviṭṭhā

original: Bāhiravāyodhātuniddese puratthimā vātāti puratthimadisato āgatā vātā. Pacchimuttaradakkhiṇesupi
analyzed: bāhira vāyo dhātu niddese puratthimā vātā ati puratthima disataḥ āgatā vātā pacchima uttara dakkhiṇesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Sarajā vātāti saha rajena sarajā. Arajā vātāti rajavirahitā suddhā arajā
analyzed: saha rajena sa rajā arajā vātāti raja virahitā suddhā arajā

original: nāma. Sītāti sītautusamuṭṭhānā sītavalāhakantare samuṭṭhitā. Uṇhāti uṇhautusamuṭṭhānā
analyzed: nāma sītā ati sīta otu samuṭṭhānā sīta valāhaka antare samuṭṭhitā uṇhā ati uṇha otu samuṭṭhānā

original: uṇhavalāhakantare samuṭṭhitā. Parittāti mandā tanukavātā. Adhimattāti balavavātā.
analyzed: uṇha valāhaka ntare samuṭṭhitā parittā ati mandā tanuka vātā adhimattā ati balava vātā

original: Kāḷāti kāḷavalāhakantare samuṭṭhitā, yehi abbhāhato chavivaṇṇo kāḷako hoti. Tesaṃ
analyzed: kāḷā ati kāḷa valāhaka antare samuṭṭhitā yehi abbha āhataḥ chavi vaṇṇo kāḷakaḥ hoti tesam

original: etaṃ adhivacanantipi eke. Verambhavātāti yojanato upari vāyanavātā. Pakkhavātāti
analyzed: etam eke verambha vātā ati yojanataḥ upari vāyana vātā pakkha vātā ati

original: antamaso makkhikāyapi pakkhāyūhanasamuṭṭhitā vātā. Supaṇṇavātāti garuḷavātā. Kāmañca
analyzed: antamasaḥ pakkhāyūhana samuṭṭhitāḥ vātā supaṇṇavātā ati garuḷavātā kāmañca

original: imepi pakkhavātāva ussadavasena pana visuṃ gahitā. Tālavaṇṭavātāti tālapaṇṇehi vā
analyzed: ime pi ussada vasena pana visum gahitā tālavaṇṭa vātā ti tālapaṇṇehi vā

original: aññena vā kenaci maṇḍalasaṇṭhānena samuṭṭhāpitā vātā. Vidhūpanavātāti bījanapattakena
analyzed: aññena vā kenacid maṇḍala saṇṭhānena samuṭṭhāpitāḥ vātāḥ vidhūpana vātā ati bījana pattakena

original: samuṭṭhāpitā vātā. Imāni ca tālavaṇṭavidhūpanāni anuppannampi vātaṃ uppādenti, uppannampi
analyzed: samuṭṭhāpitāḥ vātāḥ imāni ca tālavaṇṭa vidhūpanāni anuppannam pi vātam uppādenti uppannam pi

original: parivattenti. Yaṃ vā panāti idha pāḷiāgate ṭhapetvā sesavātā yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā.
analyzed: parivattenti yam vā pana ati idha pāḷi āgate ṭhapetvā sesa vātāḥ yevāpanaka ṭhānam paviṭṭhā

original: 177. Ākāsadhātuniddese appaṭighaṭṭanaṭṭhena na kassatīti ākāso. Ākāsova ākāsabhāvaṃ
analyzed: ākāsa dhātu niddese a paṭighaṭṭana ṭṭhena na kassati iti ākāsaḥ ākāsa uva ākāsa bhāvam

original: gatattā ākāsagataṃ. Aghaṭṭanīyatāya aghaṃ. Aghameva aghabhāvaṃ gatattā aghagataṃ.
analyzed: ākāsa gatam a ghaṭṭanīya tāya agham agham eva agha bhāvam gatattā agha gatam

original: Vivaroti antaraṃ. Tadeva vivarabhāvaṃ gatattā vivaragataṃ. Asamphuṭṭhaṃ maṃsalohitehīti
analyzed: antaram tat eva vivara bhāvam vivara gatam a samphuṭṭham

original: maṃsalohitehi nissaṭaṃ. Kaṇṇacchiddantiādi pana tasseva pabhedadassanaṃ. Tattha kaṇṇacchiddanti
analyzed: maṃsa lohitehi nissaṭam kaṇṇa chid danti ādi pana tassa iva pabheda dassanam tattha kaṇṇa chid danti

original: kaṇṇasmiṃ chiddaṃ vivaraṃ maṃsalohitehi asamphuṭṭhokāso. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Yenāti
analyzed: kaṇṇasmim chiddam vivaram maṃsa lohitehi a samphuṭṭha ukāsaḥ sesesu pi esa iva nayaḥ yena ati

original: yena vivarena etaṃ asitādibhedaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ ajjhoharati, anto paveseti. Yatthāti
analyzed: yena vivarena etam asita ādi bhedam ajjhoharaṇīyam ajjhoharati antar paveseti yattha ati

original: yasmiṃ antoudarapaṭalasaṅkhāte okāse etadeva catubbidhaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: yasmin antar udara paṭala saṅkhāte okāse etat eva catubbidham ajjhoharaṇīyam tiṭṭhati

original: Yenāti yena vivarena sabbampetaṃ vipakkaṃ kasaṭabhāvaṃ āpannaṃ nikkhamati, taṃ udarapaṭalato
analyzed: yena ati yena vivarena sabbampetam vipakkam kasaṭa bhāvam āpannam nikkhamati tam udara paṭalataḥ

original: yāva karīsamaggā vidatthicaturaṅgulamattaṃ chiddaṃ maṃsalohitehi asamphuṭṭhaṃ nissaṭaṃ
analyzed: yāva karīsa maggā vidatthi catur aṅgula mattam chiddam maṃsa lohitehi a samphuṭṭham nissaṭam

original: ākāsadhātūti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ vā panāti ettha cammantaraṃ maṃsantaraṃ nhāruntaraṃ
analyzed: ākāsa dhātu uti veditabbam yam vā panāti ettha camma antaram maṃsa antaram nhāru antaram

original: aṭṭhintaraṃ lomantaranti idaṃ sabbaṃ yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭhintaram lomantaram ti idam sabbam yevāpanakaṭṭhānam paviṭṭham

original: Bāhirakaākāsadhātuniddese asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti catūhi mahābhūtehi nissaṭaṃ
analyzed: bāhiraka ākāsa dhātu niddese asamphuṭṭham catūhi mahābhūtehi iti catūhi mahābhūtehi nissaṭam

original: bhittichiddakavāṭachiddādikaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iminā yasmiṃ ākāse parikammaṃ karontassa
analyzed: bhitti chidda kavāṭa chidda ādikam veditabbam iminā yasmin ākāse parikammam karontassa

original: catukkapañcakajjhānāni uppajjanti taṃ kathitaṃ.
analyzed: catukka pañcaka jjhānāni uppajjanti tat kathitam

original: 178. Viññāṇadhātuniddese cakkhuviññāṇasaṅkhātā dhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Sesāsupi
analyzed: viññāṇa dhātu niddese cakkhu viññāṇa saṅkhātā dhātu cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu sesāsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Iti imāsu chasu dhātūsu pariggahitāsu aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pariggahitāva
analyzed: nayo iti imāsu chasu dhātūsu pariggahitāsu aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pariggahitāva

original: honti. Kathaṃ? Pathavītejovāyodhātuggahaṇena tāva phoṭṭhabbadhātu gahitāva hoti,
analyzed: honti katham pathavī tejaḥ vāyo dhātu ggahaṇena tāva phoṭṭhabba dhātu gahitā ava hoti

original: āpodhātuākāsadhātuggahaṇena dhammadhātu, viññāṇadhātuggahaṇena tassā purecārikapacchācārikattā
analyzed: āpodhātu ākāsadhātu ggahaṇena dhammadhātu viññāṇadhātu ggahaṇena tassā purecārika pacchācārika ttā

original: manodhātu gahitāva hoti. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādayo sutte āgatā eva. Sesā nava āharitvā
analyzed: manaḥ dhātu gahitā ava hoti cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu ādayo sutte āgatāḥ eva sesāḥ nava āharitvā

original: dassetabbā. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuggahaṇena hi tassā nissayabhūtā cakkhudhātu, ārammaṇabhūtā
analyzed: dassetabbā cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu ggahaṇena hi tassāḥ nissaya bhūtā cakkhu dhātu ārammaṇa bhūtā

original: rūpadhātu ca gahitāva honti. Evaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuādiggahaṇena sotadhātuādayoti aṭṭhārasāpi

original: Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā.
2. Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
183. Abhidhammabhājanīye sarūpeneva sabbāpi dhātuyo dassento aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo – cakkhudhātu rūpadhātūtiādimāha. Tattha uddesavāre tāva –
analyzed: abhidhamma bhājanīye sarūpena iva sabbā api dhātuyaḥ dassento aṭṭhārasa dhātuyaḥ cakkhu dhātu rūpa dhātu iti ādim āha tattha uddesa vāre

original: Atthato lakkhaṇādito, kamatāvatvasaṅkhato;
analyzed: atthataḥ lakkhaṇa āditaḥ kama tāva tva saṅkhato

original: Paccayā atha daṭṭhabbā, veditabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: paccayāḥ atha daṭṭhabbāḥ veditabbaḥ vinicchayo

original: Tattha ‘atthato’ti cakkhatīti cakkhu. Rūpayatīti rūpaṃ. Cakkhussa viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇanti

original: evamādinā tāva nayena cakkhādīnaṃ visesatthato veditabbo vinicchayo. Avisesena pana

original: vidahati, dhīyate, vidhānaṃ, vidhīyate etāya, ettha vā dhīyatīti dhātu. Lokiyā hi

original: dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viya suvaṇṇarajatādiṃ

original: anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti; bhārahārehi ca bhāro viya sattehi dhīyante
analyzed: aneka ppakāram saṃsāra dukkham vidahanti bhāra hārehi ca bhāraḥ viya sattehi dhīyante

original: dhārīyanteti attho. Dukkhavidhānamattameva cetā avasavattanato. Etāhi ca karaṇabhūtāhi
analyzed: dhārīyanteti atthaḥ dukkha vidhāna mattam eva cetāḥ etāhi ca karaṇa bhūtāhi

original: Apica yathā titthiyānaṃ attā nāma sabhāvato natthi, na evametā. Etā pana attano sabhāvaṃ
analyzed: apica yathā titthiyānam attā nāma sabhāvataḥ natthi na evam etāḥ etāḥ pana attano sabhāvam

original: dhārentīti dhātuyo. Yathā ca loke vicittā haritālamanosilādayo silāvayavā dhātuyoti
analyzed: dhārenti iti dhātuyaḥ yathā ca loke vicittāḥ haritāla manaḥsila ādayaḥ sila avayavāḥ

original: vuccanti, evametāpi dhātuyo viya dhātuyo. Vicittā hetā ñāṇañeyyāvayavāti. Yathā vā
analyzed: vuccanti evam etā api dhātuyaḥ viya dhātuyaḥ vicittāḥ hetāḥ ñāṇa ñeyya avayavāti yathā vā

original: sarīrasaṅkhātassa samudāyassa avayavabhūtesu rasasoṇitādīsu aññamaññaṃ visabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnesu
analyzed: sarīra saṅkhātassa samudāyassa avayava bhūtesu rasa soṇita ādīsu aññamaññam visa bhāga lakkhaṇa paricchinnesu

original: dhātusamaññā, evametesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa avayavesu dhātusamaññā
analyzed: dhātu samaññā evam etesu pi pañca kkhandha saṅkhātassa atta bhāvassa avayavesu dhātu samaññā

original: veditabbā. Aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnā hete cakkhādayoti. Apica dhātūti
analyzed: veditabbāḥ añña mañña visabhāga lakkhaṇa paricchinnāḥ ha ite cakkha ādayaḥ ti api ca dhātu uti

original: nijjīvamattassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tathā hi bhagavā – “cha dhāturo ayaṃ, bhikkhu, puriso”tiādīsu
analyzed: adhivacanam tathā hi bhagavā cha ayam bhikkhu purisa iti ādīsu

original: jīvasaññāsamūhanatthaṃ dhātudesanaṃ akāsīti. Tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ
analyzed: jīva saññā samūhana attham dhātu desanam akāsi iti tasmai yathāvuttena atthena cakkhu ca taṃ

original: dhātu cāti cakkhudhātu …pe… manoviññāṇañca taṃ dhātu cāti manoviññāṇadhātūti evaṃ

original: tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: tau ettha atthataḥ viññātabbaḥ vinicchayo

original: ‘Lakkhaṇādito’ti cakkhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādito pettha veditabbo vinicchayo. Tāni ca pana tesaṃ lakkhaṇādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa āditaḥ ti cakkha ādīnam lakkhaṇa āditaḥ pettha veditabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ tāni ca pana tesam lakkhaṇa ādīni heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbāni

original: ‘Kamato’ti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati. So ca panāyaṃ
analyzed: kamataḥ ti idha api pubbe vuttesu uppatti kkama ādīsu desanā kkamaḥ uva yujjati saḥ ca pana ayam

analyzed: hetu phala anupubba vavatthāna vasena vuttaḥ cakkhu dhātu rūpa dhātu iti idam hi dvayam hetu

original: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātūti phalaṃ. Evaṃ sabbattha kamato veditabbo vinicchayo.

original: ‘Tāvatvato’ti tāvabhāvato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tesu tesu hi suttābhidhammapadesesu

original: Evaṃ sati sabbāsaṃ vasena paricchedaṃ akatvā kasmā aṭṭhārasāti ayameva paricchedo

original: ābhādhātu. Subhadhātu pana rūpādippaṭibaddhā. Kasmā? Subhanimittattā. Subhanimittañhi

original: subhadhātu. Tañca rūpādivinimuttaṃ na vijjati, kusalavipākārammaṇā vā rūpādayo eva
analyzed: subha dhātu tat ca rūpa ādi vinimuttam na vijjati kusala vipāka ārammaṇāḥ vā rūpa ādayaḥ eva

analyzed: subha dhātu uti rūpa ādimattam eva isā ākāsa anañcāyatana dhātu ādīsu cittam manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: Sesā dhammā dhammadhātu. Saññāvedayitanirodhadhātu pana sabhāvato natthi; dhātudvayanirodhamattameva
analyzed: sesāḥ dhammāḥ dhammadhātu saññā vedayita nirodha dhātu pana sabhāvataḥ natthi dhātu dvaya nirodha mattam eva

original: takko …pe… micchāsaṅkappo”ti; aṭṭhārasapi dhātuyo vā, yathāha “heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ

original: pariyantaṃ katvā uparito paranimmitavasavattideve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare
analyzed: pariyantam katvā uparitas paranimmitavasavattideve antokaritvā yam etasmin antare

original: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā, rūpā, vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā,

original: viññāṇaṃ – ayaṃ vuccati kāmadhātū”ti. Nekkhammadhātu dhammadhātu eva; “sabbepi kusalā
analyzed: viññāṇam ayam vuccati kāmadhātu uti nekkhammadhātu dhammadhātu eva sabbe pi kusalā

original: dhammā nekkhammadhātū”ti vā vacanato manoviññāṇadhātupi hotiyeva. Byāpādavihiṃsāabyāpādaavihiṃsāsukhadukkhasomanassadomanassupekkhāavijjāārambhanikkamaparakkamadhātuyo dhammadhātuyeva.
analyzed: dhammā nekkhamma dhātū ti vā vacanataḥ manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu pi hotiyā iva byāpāda vihiṃsā abyāpāda avihiṃsā sukha dukkha somanassa domanassa upekkhā avijjā ārambha nikkama parakkama dhātuyaḥ dhamma dhātuyā iva

original: Hīnamajjhimapaṇītadhātuyo aṭṭhārasadhātumattameva. Hīnā hi cakkhādayo hīnadhātu.
analyzed: hīna majjhima paṇīta dhātuyaḥ aṭṭhārasa dhātumattam eva hīnāḥ hi cakkha ādayaḥ hīna dhātu

original: Majjhimapaṇītā cakkhādayo majjhimā ceva paṇītā ca dhātū. Nippariyāyena pana akusalā
analyzed: majjhima paṇītā cakkha ādayaḥ majjhimā ca iva paṇītā ca dhātū nippariyāyena pana akusalā

original: dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuyo hīnadhātu. Lokiyā kusalābyākatā ubhopi cakkhudhātuādayo

original: ca majjhimadhātu. Lokuttarā pana dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuyo paṇītadhātu. Pathavītejovāyodhātuyo
analyzed: ca majjhima dhātu lokuttarā pana dhammadhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyo paṇīta dhātu pathavī tejaḥ vāyo dhātuyo

original: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyeva. Āpodhātu ākāsadhātu ca dhammadhātuyeva. Viññāṇadhātu cakkhuviññāṇādisattaviññāṇadhātusaṅkhepoyeva.
analyzed: phoṭṭhabba dhātu yā iva āpodhātu ākāsa dhātu ca dhamma dhātu yā iva viññāṇa dhātu cakkhu viññāṇa ādi satta viññāṇa dhātu saṅkhepo yā iva

original: Sattarasa dhātuyo dhammadhātuekadeso ca saṅkhatadhātu. Asaṅkhatadhātu pana dhammadhātuekadesova.
analyzed: sattarasa dhātuyaḥ dhammadhātu ekadeso ca saṅkhata dhātu asaṅkhata dhātu pana dhammadhātu ekadesaḥ uva

original: Anekadhātunānādhātuloko pana aṭṭhārasadhātuppabhedamattamevāti. Iti sabhāvato vijjamānānaṃ
analyzed: aneka dhātu nānā dhātu loko pana aṭṭhārasa dhātu pabheda mattam eva ati iti sabhāvataḥ

original: sabbadhātūnaṃ tadantogadhattā aṭṭhāraseva vuttāti.
analyzed: sabba dhātūnam tad anta gadha ttā aṭṭhārasā iva vuttā iti

original: Apica vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññīnaṃ jīvasaññāsamūhanatthampi aṭṭhāraseva vuttā.
analyzed: apica vijānana sabhāve viññāṇe jīva saññīnam jīva saññā samūhana ttham pi aṭṭhārasā iva vuttā

original: Santi hi sattā vijānanasabhāve viññāṇe jīvasaññino. Tesaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇamanoviññāṇadhātubhedena
analyzed: santi hi sattā vijānana sabhāve viññāṇe jīva saññinaḥ tesam cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇa manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu bhedena

original: tassā anekattaṃ, cakkhurūpādipaccayāyattavuttitāya aniccatañca pakāsetvā dīgharattānusayitaṃ
analyzed: tassāḥ aneka ttam cakkhu rūpa ādi paccaya āyatta vutti tāya anicca tat ca pakāsetvā dīgha ratta anusayitam

original: jīvasaññaṃ samūhanitukāmena bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pakāsitā. Kiñca bhiyyo? Tathā
analyzed: jīva saññam samūhanitu kāmena bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyaḥ pakāsitā kiñca bhiyyo tathā

original: veneyyajjhāsayavasena; ye ca imāya nātisaṅkhepavitthārāya desanāya veneyyā sattā,
analyzed: veneyya ajjhāsaya vasena ye ca imāya na ati saṅkhepa vitthārāya desanāya veneyyā sattā

original: tadajjhāsayavasena ca aṭṭhāraseva pakāsitā.
analyzed: tad ajjhāsaya vasena ca aṭṭhārasā iva pakāsitā

original: Saṅkhepavitthāranayena tathā tathā hi,
analyzed: saṅkhepa vitthāra nayena tathā tathā hi

original: Dhammaṃ pakāsayati esa yathā yathāssa;
analyzed: dhammam pakāsayati yathā yathā assa

original: Saddhammatejavihataṃ vilayaṃ khaṇena,
analyzed: saddhamma teja vihatam vilayam khaṇena

original: Veneyyasattahadayesu tamo payātīti.
analyzed: veneyya satta hadayesu tamaḥ payāti iti

original: Evamettha ‘tāvatvato’ veditabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: evam ettha tāva tvataḥ veditabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: ‘Saṅkhato’ti cakkhudhātu tāva jātito eko dhammotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati cakkhupasādavasena.
analyzed: saṅkhato ti cakkhu dhātu tāva jātitaḥ ekaḥ dhammo tvā iva saṅkham gacchati cakkhu pasāda vasena

original: Tathā sotaghānajivhākāyarūpasaddagandharasadhātuyo sotapasādādivasena. Phoṭṭhabbadhātu
analyzed: tathā sota ghāna jivhā kāya rūpa sadda gandha rasa dhātuyo sota pasāda ādi vasena phoṭṭhabba dhātu

original: pana pathavītejovāyovasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu kusalākusalavipākavasena
analyzed: pana pathavī tejaḥ vāyaḥ vasena tayo dhammā ati saṅkham gacchati cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu kusala akusala vipāka vasena

original: dve dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Tathā sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātuyo. Manodhātu
analyzed: dve dhammā ati saṅkham gacchati tathā sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇa dhātuyaḥ manaḥ dhātu

original: pana pañcadvārāvajjanakusalākusalavipākasampaṭicchanavasena tayo dhammāti saṅkhaṃ
analyzed: pana pañca dvāra āvajjana kusala akusala vipāka sampaṭicchana vasena tayaḥ dhammā ati saṅkham

original: gacchati. Dhammadhātu tiṇṇaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ, soḷasannaṃ sukhumarūpānaṃ, asaṅkhatāya
analyzed: gacchati dhammadhātu tiṇṇam arūpa khandhānam soḷasannam sukhuma rūpānam asaṅkhatāya

original: ca dhātuyā vasena vīsatidhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Manoviññāṇadhātu sesakusalākusalābyākataviññāṇavasena
analyzed: ca dhātuyāḥ vasena vīsati dhammā ati saṅkham gacchati manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu sesa kusala akusala abyākata viññāṇa vasena

original: chasattatidhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti evamettha ‘saṅkhato’ veditabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: cha sattati dhammā ati saṅkham gacchati iti evam ettha saṅkhataḥ veditabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: ‘Paccayā’ti cakkhudhātuādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīsu paccayato veditabbo vinicchayo. So panetesaṃ paccayabhāvo niddesavāre āvi bhavissati.
analyzed: paccayā ti cakkhu dhātu ādīnam cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu ādīsu paccayataḥ veditabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ saḥ pana etesam paccaya bhāvaḥ niddesa vāre bhavissati

original: ‘Daṭṭhabbā’ti daṭṭhabbatopettha vinicchayo veditabboti attho. Sabbā eva hi saṅkhatā
analyzed: daṭṭhabbā ti daṭṭhabba tā upa ittha vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ iti attho sabbā eva hi saṅkhatā

original: dhātuyo pubbantāparantavivittato, dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasuññato, paccayāyattavuttito
analyzed: dhātuyaḥ pubba anta apara anta vivittataḥ dhuva subha sukhatta bhāva suññataḥ paccaya āyatta vuttitaḥ

original: ca daṭṭhabbā. Visesato panettha bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu daṭṭhabbā, daṇḍo viya
analyzed: ca daṭṭhabbā visesataḥ pana ittha bheri talam viya cakkhu dhātu daṭṭhabbā daṇḍaḥ viya

original: rūpadhātu, saddo viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā ādāsatalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu, mukhaṃ
analyzed: rūpa dhātu saddaḥ viya cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu tathā ādāsa talam viya cakkhu dhātu mukham

original: viya rūpadhātu, mukhanimittaṃ viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Atha vā ucchutilāni viya cakkhudhātu,
analyzed: viya rūpa dhātu mukha nimittam viya cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu atha vā ucchutilāni viya cakkhu dhātu

original: yantacakkayaṭṭhi viya rūpadhātu, ucchurasatelāni viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā adharāraṇī
analyzed: viya rūpa dhātu ucchu rasa telāni viya cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu tathā adharāraṇī

original: viya cakkhudhātu, uttarāraṇī viya rūpadhātu, aggi viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Esa nayo sotadhātuādīsupi.
analyzed: viya cakkhu dhātu uttarāraṇī viya rūpa dhātu aggi viya cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu esa nayo sota dhātu ādīsu pi

original: Manodhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: manaḥ dhātu pana yathāsambhavato cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu ādīnam purecara anucarā viya daṭṭhabbā

original: Dhammadhātuyā vedanākkhandho sallamiva sūlamiva ca daṭṭhabbo; saññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā
analyzed: dhammadhātuyā vedanā kkhandho sallam iva sūlam iva ca daṭṭhabbo saññā saṅkhāra kkhandhā

original: vedanāsallasūlayogā āturā viya; puthujjanānaṃ vā saññā āsādukkhajananato rittamuṭṭhi
analyzed: vedanā salla sūla yogāḥ āturāḥ viya puthujjanānam vā saññā āsā dukkha jananato

original: viya, ayathābhuccanimittaggāhakato vanamigo viya; saṅkhārā paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanato
analyzed: viya ayathābhucca nimitta ggāhakataḥ vana migaḥ viya saṅkhārāḥ paṭisandhiyam pakkhipanato

original: aṅgārakāsuyaṃ khipanakapuriso viya, jātidukkhānubandhanato rājapurisānubandhacorā
analyzed: aṅgārakāsuyam khipanaka purisaḥ viya jāti dukkha anubandhanataḥ rāja purisa anubandha corā

original: viya, sabbānatthāvahassa khandhasantānassa hetuto visarukkhabījāni viya; rūpaṃ nānāvidhūpaddavanimittato
analyzed: viya sabbānattha āvahassa khandha santānassa hetutaḥ visa rukkha bījāni viya rūpam nānā vidhū paddava nimittato

original: khuracakkaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: khura cakkam viya daṭṭhabbam

original: Asaṅkhatā pana dhātu amatato santato khemato ca daṭṭhabbā. Kasmā? Sabbānatthapaṭipakkhabhūtattā.
analyzed: asaṅkhatā pana dhātu amatataḥ santataḥ khemataḥ ca daṭṭhabbā kasmā sabba anattha paṭipakkha bhūta ttā

original: Manoviññāṇadhātu gahitārammaṇaṃ muñcitvāpi aññaṃ gahetvāva pavatanato vanamakkaṭo
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu gahita ārammaṇam muñcitvā api aññam gahetvā ava pava tanataḥ vana makkaṭaḥ

original: viya, duddamanato assakhaḷuṅko viya, yatthakāmanipātito vehāsaṃ khittadaṇḍo viya,
analyzed: viya duddamanataḥ assa khaḷuṅkaḥ viya yattha kāma nipātitaḥ vehāsam khitta daṇḍaḥ viya

original: lobhadosādinānappakārakilesayogato raṅganaṭo viya daṭṭhabboti.
analyzed: lobha dosa ādi nānappakāra kilesa yogataḥ raṅga naṭaḥ viya daṭṭhabbo ti

original: 184. Niddesavāre cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cāti idañca dvayaṃ paṭicca aññañca kiriyāmanodhātuñceva
analyzed: niddesa vāre cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca ati idam ca dvayam paṭicca aññañca kiriyā manas dhātuñca iva

original: sampayuttakhandhattayañcāti attho. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā hi cakkhu nissayapaccayo

analyzed: saccam bhaṇe na kujjheyya ati ādīsu vācā asacce sacce ṭhitā samaṇa brāhmaṇā ca ati ādīsu

original: Loke lokappabhave, lokatthagame sive ca tadupāye;

original: Evamettha ‘upamāto’ vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam ettha upamātaḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

analyzed: saṅkhāra dukkha tāya dukkham na ariya saccam nirodhaḥ ariya saccam na dukkham itaram

analyzed: vussati tathatthena sabba ākārena pana upādāna khandha pañcakam dukkham ca iva ariya saccañca

original: aññatra taṇhāya. Maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pariññatthaṃ bhagavati

original: yathāyogaṃ yojetvā ‘catukkato’pettha vinicchayo veditabbo.

original: ‘Suññatekavidhādīhī’ti ettha suññato tāva paramatthena hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni. Tenetaṃ vuccati –

original: Dukkhameva hi na koci dukkhito, kārako na kiriyāva vijjati;

original: Atthi nibbuti na nibbuto pumā, maggamatthi gamako na vijjatīti.
analyzed: atthi nibbuti na nibbutaḥ pumā maggam atthi gamakaḥ na vijjati iti

original: Atha vā –
analyzed: atha vā

original: Dhuvasubhasukhattasuññaṃ, purimadvayamattasuññamamatapadaṃ;
analyzed: dhuva subha sukhatta suññam purima dvaya matta suññam amata padam

original: Dhuvasukhaattavirahito, maggo iti suññato tesu.
analyzed: dhuva sukha atta virahitaḥ maggaḥ iti tesu

original: Nirodhasuññāni vā tīṇi, nirodho ca sesattayasuñño. Phalasuñño vā ettha hetu samudaye
analyzed: nirodha suññāni vā tīṇi nirodho ca sesa ttaya suñño phala suñño vā ettha hetu samudaye

original: dukkhassābhāvato magge ca nirodhassa, na phalena sagabbho pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya.
analyzed: dukkhassa abhāvataḥ magge ca nirodhassa na phalena sa gabbhaḥ pakati vādīnam pakati viya

original: Hetusuññañca phalaṃ dukkhasamudayānaṃ nirodhamaggānañca asamavāyā, na hetusamavetaṃ
analyzed: hetu suññam ca phalam dukkha samudayānam nirodha maggānam ca asamavāyāḥ na hetu samavetam

original: hetuphalaṃ hetuphalasamavāyavādīnaṃ dviaṇukādīni viya. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
analyzed: hetu phalam dvi aṇuka ādīni tena itam vuccati

original: Tayamidha nirodhasuññaṃ, tayena tenāpi nibbuti suññā;
analyzed: tayam idha nirodha suññam tayena tena api nibbuti suññā

original: Suñño phalena hetu, phalampi taṃ hetunā suññanti.
analyzed: suññaḥ phalena hetu phalampi tam hetunā suññanti

original: Evaṃ tāva ‘suññato’ vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam tāva suññataḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: tividhaṃ kāmarūpārūpūpapatibhavabhedato, catubbidhaṃ catuāhārabhedato, pañcavidhaṃ

original: Sīladiṭṭhibyasanadvayaṃ akusalaṃ.
analyzed: sīla diṭṭhi byasana dvayam akusalam

analyzed: aññatara ññatarena ati gahitesu vā yena kenaci aggahitesu vā mitta amacca byasana ādīsu yena

original: Cetaso parijjhāyanāti cittassa jhāyanākāro. Soko hi uppajjamāno aggi viya cittaṃ

analyzed: parideva niddeso

original: So atthato eko dhammo nāma natthi. Kevalaṃ piyavippayuttānaṃ duvidhassāpi dukkhassa

analyzed: paṇṇattim paccavekkhaṇa kāle nava ttabba ārammaṇam magga saccam sahajāta hetu vasena sabbadā api

original: maggahetukaṃ vīriyaṃ vā vīmaṃsaṃ vā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipati,
analyzed: magga hetukam vīriyam vā vīmaṃsam vā jeṭṭhakam katvā magga bhāvanā kāle magga adhipati

original: chandacittesu aññatarādhipatikāle navattabbaṃ nāma hoti. Dukkhasaccaṃ ariyānaṃ maggapaccavekkhaṇakāle
analyzed: chanda cittesu aññatara adhipati kāle navattabbam nāma hoti dukkha saccam ariyānam magga paccavekkhaṇa kāle

original: maggārammaṇaṃ, tesaṃyeva maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle maggādhipati, sesadhammapaccavekkhaṇakāle navattabbaṃ hoti.
analyzed: magga ārammaṇam tesam yeva maggam garum katvā paccavekkhaṇa kāle magga adhipati sesa dhamma paccavekkhaṇa kāle na vattabbam hoti

original: Dve saccānīti dukkhasamudayasaccāni. Etāni hi atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha uppattikāle
analyzed: dve saccāni iti dukkha samudaya saccāni etāni hi atīta ādi bhede dhamme ārabbha uppatti kāle

original: atītādiārammaṇāni honti. Samudayasaccaṃ ajjhattādibhede dhamme assādentassa ajjhattādiārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: atīta ādi ārammaṇāni honti samudaya saccam ajjhatta ādi bhede dhamme assādentassa ajjhatta ādi ārammaṇam

original: hoti, dukkhasaccaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanakāle navattabbārammaṇampīti veditabbaṃ. Iti imasmiṃ
analyzed: hoti dukkha saccam ākiñcaññāyatana kāle navattabba ārammaṇam pi iti veditabbam iti imasmin

original: pañhāpucchake dve saccāni lokiyāni honti, dve lokuttarāni. Yathā ca imasmiṃ, evaṃ
analyzed: pañhāpucchake dve saccāni lokiyāni honti dve lokuttarāni yathā ca imasmin evam

original: purimesupi dvīsu. Sammāsambuddhena hi tīsupi suttantabhājanīyādīsu lokiyalokuttarāneva
analyzed: purimesu pi dvīsu sammāsambuddhena hi tīsu pi suttanta bhājanīya ādīsu lokiya lokuttarān eva

original: saccāni kathitāni. Evamayaṃ saccavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
analyzed: saccāni kathitāni evam ayam sacca vibhaṅgaḥ api te parivaṭṭam nīharitvā ava bhājetvā dassito ti

original: Sammohavinodanīyā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: sammoha vinodanīyāḥ vibhaṅga ṭṭhakathāya

original: Saccavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sacca vibhaṅga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 5. Indriyavibhaṅgo
analyzed: indriya vibhaṅgaḥ

original: 1. Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
219. Idāni tadanantare indriyavibhaṅge bāvīsatīti gaṇanaparicchedo. Indriyānīti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ.
analyzed: idāni tad anantare indriya vibhaṅge bāvīsati iti gaṇana paricchedaḥ indriyāni iti paricchinna dhamma nidassanam

original: Idāni tāni sarūpato dassento cakkhundriyantiādimāha. Tattha cakkhudvāre indaṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: idāni tāni sarūpataḥ dassento cakkhu indriya nti ādim āha tattha cakkhu dvāre

original: kāretīti cakkhundriyaṃ. Sotaghānajivhākāyadvāre indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti kāyindriyaṃ. Vijānanalakkhaṇe
analyzed: kāreti iti cakkhu indriyam sota ghāna jivhā kāya dvāre indaṭṭham kāreti iti kāyindriyam vijānana lakkhaṇe

original: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti manindriyaṃ. Itthibhāve indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti itthindriyaṃ. Purisabhāve
analyzed: indaṭṭham kāreti iti man indriyam itthi bhāve indaṭṭham kāreti iti itthi indriyam purisa bhāve

original: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti purisindriyaṃ. Anupālanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti jīvitindriyaṃ.
analyzed: indaṭṭham kāreti iti purisa indriyam anupālana lakkhaṇe indaṭṭham kāreti iti jīvitindriyam

original: Sukhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti sukhindriyaṃ. Dukkhasomanassa domanassa upekkhālakkhaṇe
analyzed: sukha lakkhaṇe indaṭṭham kāreti iti sukha indriyam dukkha somanassa domanassa upekkhā lakkhaṇe

original: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti upekkhindriyaṃ. Adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti saddhindriyaṃ.
analyzed: indaṭṭham kāreti iti upekkhā indriyam adhimokkha lakkhaṇe indaṭṭham kāreti iti saddhindriyam

original: Paggahalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti vīriyindriyaṃ. Upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
analyzed: paggaha lakkhaṇe indaṭṭham kāreti iti vīriya indriyam upaṭṭhāna lakkhaṇe indaṭṭham kāreti iti

original: satindriyaṃ. Avikkhepalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti samādhindriyaṃ. Dassanalakkhaṇe
analyzed: sati indriyam avikkhepa lakkhaṇe indaṭṭham kāreti iti samādhi indriyam dassana lakkhaṇe

original: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti paññindriyaṃ. Anaññātaññassāmīti pavatte jānanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: indaṭṭham kāreti iti paññindriyam pavatte jānana lakkhaṇe indaṭṭham

original: kāretīti anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Ñātānaṃyeva dhammānaṃ puna ājānane indaṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: kāreti iti dhammānam puna ājānane indaṭṭham

original: kāretīti aññindriyaṃ. Aññātāvībhāve indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti aññātāvindriyaṃ.
analyzed: kāreti iti aññindriyam aññātāvībhāve indaṭṭham kāreti iti aññātāvindriyam

original: Idha suttantabhājanīyaṃ nāma na gahitaṃ. Kasmā? Suttante imāya paṭipāṭiyā bāvīsatiyā
analyzed: idha suttantabhājanīyam nāma na gahitam kasmā suttante imāya paṭipāṭiyā bāvīsatiyā

original: indriyānaṃ anāgatattā. Suttantasmiñhi katthaci dve indriyāni kathitāni, katthaci
analyzed: indriyānaṃ anāgata ttā suttantasmin hi katthaci dve indriyāni kathitāni katthaci

original: tīṇi, katthaci pañca. Evaṃ pana nirantaraṃ dvāvīsati āgatāni nāma natthi. Ayaṃ tāvettha
analyzed: tīṇi katthaci pañca evam pana nirantaram dvāvīsati āgatāni nāma natthi ayam tau ettha

original: aṭṭhakathānayo. Ayaṃ pana aparo nayo – etesu hi
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā nayaḥ ayam pana aparaḥ nayaḥ etesu hi

original: Atthato lakkhaṇādīhi, kamato ca vijāniyā;
analyzed: atthataḥ lakkhaṇa ādīhi kamataḥ ca vijāniyā

original: Bhedābhedā tathā kiccā, bhūmito ca vinicchayaṃ.
analyzed: tathā ca vinicchayam

original: Tattha cakkhādīnaṃ tāva “cakkhatīti cakkhū”tiādinā nayena attho pakāsito. Pacchimesu
analyzed: tattha cakkha ādīnam tāva cakkhati iti cakkhu uti ādinā nayena attho pakāsito pacchimesu

original: pana tīsu paṭhamaṃ ‘pubbabhāge anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ vā jānissāmī’ti
analyzed: pana tīsu paṭhamam pubba bhāge anaññātam amatam padam catu sacca dhammam vā jānissāmi iti

original: evaṃ paṭipannassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti
analyzed: evam paṭipannassa uppajjanataḥ indriya ṭṭha sambhavataḥ ca anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam

original: vuttaṃ. Dutiyaṃ ājānanato ca indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññindriyaṃ. Tatiyaṃ aññātāvino

analyzed: catūsu saccesu niṭṭhita ñāṇa kiccassa khīṇa āsavassa iva uppajjanataḥ indriya aṭṭha sambhavataḥ ca aññātau indriyam

original: Ko panesa indriyaṭṭho nāmāti? Indaliṅgaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho, indadesitaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho,
analyzed: kaḥ pana esa indriya ṭṭhaḥ nāma ati inda liṅga ṭṭhaḥ indriya ṭṭhaḥ inda desita ṭṭhaḥ indriya ṭṭhaḥ

original: indadiṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho, indasiṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho, indajuṭṭhaṭṭho indriyaṭṭho.
analyzed: inda diṭṭha aṭṭhaḥ indriya ṭṭhaḥ inda siṭṭha aṭṭhaḥ indriya ṭṭhaḥ inda juṭṭha aṭṭhaḥ indriya ṭṭhaḥ

original: So sabbopi idha yathāyogaṃ yujjati. Bhagavā hi sammāsambuddho paramissariyabhāvato
analyzed: saḥ sabbaḥ api idha yathāyogam yujjati bhagavā hi sammāsambuddhaḥ para missariya bhāvataḥ

original: indo. Kusalākusalañca kammaṃ kammesu kassaci issariyābhāvato. Tenevettha kammasañjanitāni
analyzed: indo kusala akusalam ca kammam kammesu kassaci issariya abhāvataḥ tena iva ittha kamma sañjanitāni

original: indriyāni kusalākusalakammaṃ ulliṅgenti. Tena ca siṭṭhānīti indaliṅgaṭṭhena indasiṭṭhaṭṭhena

original: ca indriyāni. Sabbāneva panetāni bhagavatā yathābhūtato pakāsitāni ca abhisambuddhāni
analyzed: ca indriyāni sabbāneva pana itāni bhagavatā yathābhūtataḥ pakāsitāni ca abhisambuddhāni

original: gocarāsevanāya, kānici bhāvanāsevanāya sevitānīti indajuṭṭhaṭṭhenapi indriyāni. Apica
analyzed: gocara āsevanāya kānici bhāvanā sevanāya sevitāni iti indriyāni api ca

original: ādhipaccasaṅkhātena issariyaṭṭhenāpi etāni indriyāni. Cakkhuviññāṇādippavattiyañhi

original: cakkhādīnaṃ siddhamādhipaccaṃ; tasmiṃ tikkhe tikkhattā mande ca mandattāti. Ayaṃ
analyzed: cakkha ādīnam siddham ādhipaccam tasmin tikkhe tikkhattā mande ca mandattā ati ayam

original: tāvettha ‘atthato’ vinicchayo.
analyzed: tau ettha atthataḥ vinicchayo

original: ‘Lakkhaṇādīhī’ti lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānehipi cakkhādīnaṃ vinicchayaṃ
