analyzed: vijāniyā ti attho tāni nesam lakkhaṇa ādīni heṭṭhā vutta nayānā iva paññindriya ādīni hi

original: cattāri atthato amohoyeva. Sesāni tattha sarūpenevāgatāni.
analyzed: cattāri atthataḥ sesāni tattha sarūpena iva āgatāni

original: ‘Kamato’ti ayampi desanākkamova. Tattha ajjhattadhammaṃ pariññāya ariyabhūmipaṭilābho

original: hotīti attabhāvapariyāpannāni cakkhundriyādīni paṭhamaṃ desitāni. So panattabhāvo
analyzed: hoti iti atta bhāva pariyāpannāni cakkhu indriya ādīni paṭhamam desitāni saḥ pana atta bhāvo

original: yaṃ dhammaṃ upādāya itthīti vā purisoti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchati, ayaṃ soti nidassanatthaṃ

original: tato itthindriyaṃ purisindriyañca. So duvidhopi jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhavuttīti ñāpanatthaṃ

analyzed: tatas jīvitindriyam yāva tassa pavatti tāva etesam vedayitānam yam kiñci

original: vedayitaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ sukhadukkhanti ñāpanatthaṃ tato sukhindriyādīni. Taṃnirodhatthaṃ

original: pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbāti paṭipattidassanatthaṃ tato saddhādīni. Imāya paṭipattiyā
analyzed: pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbā ti paṭipatti dassana tham tatas saddhā ādīni imāya paṭipattiyā

original: esa dhammo paṭhamaṃ attani pātubhavatīti paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanatthaṃ tato
analyzed: esa dhammo paṭhamam attani pātubhavati iti paṭipattiyā amogha bhāva dassana attham tatas

original: anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Tasseva phalattā tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbattā ca tato
analyzed: anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam tassa iva phala ttā tatas anantaram bhāvetabba ttā ca tatas

original: aññindriyaṃ. Ito paraṃ bhāvanāya imassa adhigamo, adhigate ca panimasmiṃ natthi kiñci
analyzed: aññindriyam itas param bhāvanāya imassa adhigamaḥ adhigate ca panimasmin natthi kiñci

original: uttari karaṇīyanti ñāpanatthaṃ ante paramassāsabhūtaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ desitanti ayamettha kamo.
analyzed: uttari karaṇīyanti ñāpana attham ante parama ssāsa bhūtam aññātau indriyam desitam ti ayam ettha kamaḥ

original: ‘Bhedābhedā’ti jīvitindriyasseva cettha bhedo. Tañhi rūpajīvitindriyaṃ arūpajīvitindriyanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Sesānaṃ abhedoti evamettha bhedābhedato vinicchayaṃ vijāniyā.
analyzed: bheda abhedā ti jīvita indriyassa iva ca ittha tat hi rūpa jīvita indriyam a rūpa jīvita indriyanti duvidham hoti sesānam abhedo ti evam ettha bheda abhedataḥ vinicchayam

original: ‘Kiccā’ti kiṃ indriyānaṃ kiccanti ce? Cakkhundriyassa tāva “cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā
analyzed: kicca ati kim ce cakkhu indriyassa tāva cakkha āyatanam cakkhu viññāṇa dhātuyā

original: taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato yaṃ taṃ indriyapaccayabhāvena
analyzed: tad sampayuttakānam ca dhammānam indriya paccayena paccayo ti vacanataḥ yam tam indriya paccaya bhāvena

original: sādhetabbaṃ attano tikkhamandādibhāvena cakkhuviññāṇādidhammānaṃ tikkhamandādisaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: sādhetabbam attanaḥ tikkha manda ādi bhāvena cakkhu viññāṇa ādi dhammānam tikkha manda ādi saṅkhātam

original: attākārānuvattāpanaṃ idaṃ ‘kiccaṃ’. Evaṃ sotaghānajivhākāyānaṃ. Manindriyassa pana
analyzed: idam kiccam evam sota ghāna jivhā kāyānam man indriyassa pana

original: sahajātadhammānaṃ attano vasavattāpanaṃ, jīvitindriyassa sahajātadhammānupālanaṃ,
analyzed: sahajāta dhammānam attanaḥ jīvita indriyassa sahajāta dhamma anupālanam

original: itthindriyapurisindriyānaṃ itthipurisanimittakuttākappākārānuvidhānaṃ, sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassindriyānaṃ

original: sahajātadhamme abhibhavitvā yathāsakaṃ oḷārikākārānupāpanaṃ, upekkhindriyassa santapaṇītamajjhattākārānupāpanaṃ,

original: saddhādīnaṃ paṭipakkhābhibhavanaṃ sampayuttadhammānañca pasannākārādibhāvasampāpanaṃ,

original: anaññātaññassāmītindriyassa saṃyojanattayappahānañceva sampayuttakānañca tappahānābhimukhabhāvakaraṇaṃ,

original: aññindriyassa kāmarāgabyāpādāditanukaraṇapahānañceva sahajātānañca attano vasānuvattāpanaṃ,
analyzed: aññindriyassa kāma rāga byāpāda ādi tanu karaṇa apahānam ca iva sahajāta anañca attanaḥ

original: aññātāvindriyassa sabbakiccesu ussukkappahānañceva amatābhimukhabhāvapaccayatā ca
analyzed: aññātau indriyassa sabba kiccesu ussukka ppahānam ca iva amata abhimukha bhāva paccaya tā ca

original: sampayuttānanti evamettha kiccato vinicchayaṃ vijāniyā.
analyzed: evam ettha kiccataḥ vinicchayam

original: ‘Bhūmito’ti cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaitthipurisasukhadukkhadomanassindriyāni cettha
analyzed: bhūmito ti cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya etthi purisa sukha dukkha domanassa indriyāni ca ittha

original: kāmāvacarāneva. Manindriyajīvitindriyaupekkhindriyāni, saddhāvīriyasatisamādhipaññindriyāni
analyzed: kāmāvacarān eva manindriya jīvitindriya aupekkhindriyāni saddhā vīriya sati samādhi paññindriyāni

original: ca catubhūmipariyāpannāni. Somanassindriyaṃ kāmāvacara-rūpāvacara-lokuttaravasena
analyzed: ca catu bhūmi pariyāpannāni somanassindriyam kāmāvacara rūpāvacara lokuttara vasena

original: bhūmittayapariyāpannaṃ. Avasāne tīṇi lokuttarānevāti evaṃ bhūmito vinicchayaṃ vijāniyā. Evañhi vijānanto –
analyzed: bhūmi ttaya pariyāpannam avasāne tīṇi lokuttarān eva ati evam bhūmitaḥ vinicchayam evam hi vijānantaḥ

original: Saṃvegabahulo bhikkhu, ṭhito indriyasaṃvare;
analyzed: saṃvega bahulaḥ bhikkhu ṭhitaḥ indriya saṃvare

original: Indriyāni pariññāya, dukkhassantaṃ nigacchatīti.
analyzed: indriyāni pariññāya dukkhaḥ santam nigacchati iti

original: anulomadesanā vuttā, sā idha nikkhittāti veditabbā.
analyzed: anuloma desanā vuttā sā idha nikkhittā ati veditabbā

original: Kasmā panettha avijjā ādito vuttā? Kiṃ pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya avijjāpi akāraṇaṃ
analyzed: kasmā pana ittha avijjā āditas vuttā kim pakati vādīnam pakati viya avijjā api akāraṇam

original: mūlakāraṇaṃ lokassāti? Na akāraṇaṃ. “Āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti hi avijjāya
analyzed: mūla kāraṇam lokassa ati na akāraṇam āsava samudayā avijjā samudayaḥ iti hi avijjāya

original: kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Atthi pana pariyāyo yena mūlakāraṇaṃ siyā. Ko pana soti? Vaṭṭakathāya
analyzed: kāraṇam vuttam atthi pana pariyāyaḥ yena mūla kāraṇam siyā kaḥ pana saḥ ti vaṭṭa kathāya

original: sīsabhāvo. Bhagavā hi vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento dve dhamme sīsaṃ katvā kathesi – avijjaṃ
analyzed: sīsa bhāvaḥ bhagavā hi vaṭṭa katham kathentaḥ dve dhamme sīsam katvā kathesi avijjam

original: vā bhavataṇhaṃ vā. Yathāha – “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ‘ito
analyzed: vā bhavataṇham vā yathā āha purimā bhikkhave koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ito

original: pubbe avijjā nāhosi, atha pacchā samabhavī’ti. Evañcetaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati, atha
analyzed: pubbe avijjā na ahosi atha pacchā samabhavi iti evañca itam bhikkhave vuccati atha

original: ca pana paññāyati ‘idappaccayā avijjā”ti ; bhavataṇhaṃ vā, yathāha – “purimā, bhikkhave,
analyzed: ca pana paññāyati idappaccayā avijjāti  bhava taṇham vā yathā āha purimā bhikkhave

original: koṭi na paññāyati bhavataṇhāya ‘ito pubbe bhavataṇhā nāhosi, atha pacchā samabhavī’ti.
analyzed: na paññāyati bhava taṇhāya itas pubbe bhava taṇhā na ahosi atha pacchā samabhavīti

original: Evañcetaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati, atha ca pana paññāyati ‘idappaccayā bhavataṇhā”ti.
analyzed: evañca itam bhikkhave vuccati atha ca pana paññāyati idappaccayā bhava taṇhā ati

original: Kasmā pana bhagavā vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento ime dveva dhamme sīsaṃ katvā kathesīti? Sugatiduggatigāmino
analyzed: kasmā pana bhagavā vaṭṭa katham kathentaḥ ime dve iva dhamme sīsam katvā kathesi iti sugati duggati gāminaḥ

original: kammassa visesahetubhūtattā. Duggatigāmino hi kammassa visesahetu avijjā. Kasmā?
analyzed: kammassa visesa hetu bhūta ttā duggati gāminaḥ hi kammassa visesa hetu avijjā kasmā

original: Yasmā avijjābhibhūto puthujjano, aggisantāpalaguḷābhighātaparissamābhibhūtā vajjhagāvī
analyzed: yasmai avijjā abhibhūtaḥ puthujjanaḥ aggi santāpa laguḷa abhighāta parissama abhibhūtā vajjhagāvī

original: tāya parissamāturatāya nirassādampi attano anatthāvahampi ca uṇhodakapānaṃ viya,
analyzed: tāya parissama ātura tāya nirassādam pi attanaḥ anattha āvaham pi ca uṇha udaka pānam viya

original: kilesasantāpato nirassādampi duggativinipātato ca attano anatthāvahampi pāṇātipātādimanekappakāraṃ
analyzed: kilesa santāpataḥ nirassādam pi duggati vinipātato ca attanaḥ anattha āvaham pi pāṇātipāta ādim aneka ppakāram

analyzed: duggati gāmi kammam ārabhati sugati gāminaḥ pana kammassa visesa hetu bhava taṇhā kasmā

original: Yasmā bhavataṇhābhibhūto puthujjano, yathā vuttappakārā gāvī sītudakataṇhāya saassādaṃ
analyzed: yasmai bhava taṇhā abhibhūtaḥ puthujjanaḥ yathā vutta ppakārā gāvī sīta udaka taṇhāya

analyzed: attano parissama vinodanam ca sīta udaka pānam viya kilesa santāpa virahataḥ sa assādam sugati sampāpanena

analyzed: attanaḥ duggati dukkha parissama vinodanam ca pāṇātipāta averamaṇī ādim aneka ppakāram sugati gāmi kammaṃ ārabhati

original: Etesu pana vaṭṭakathāya sīsabhūtesu dhammesu katthaci bhagavā ekadhammamūlikaṃ desanaṃ
analyzed: etesu pana vaṭṭa kathāya sīsa bhūtesu dhammesu katthaci bhagavā eka dhamma mūlikam desanam

analyzed: deseti sā iyyathidam iti kho bhikkhave avijju upanisā saṅkhārā saṅkhāra upanisam

original: viññāṇa”ntiādi. Tathā “upādānīyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato
analyzed: viññāṇa ntiādi tathā upādānīyesu bhikkhave dhammesu assāda anupassinaḥ viharataḥ

original: taṇhā pavaḍḍhati, taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”ntiādi. Katthaci ubhayamūlikampi, seyyathidaṃ
analyzed: taṇhā pavaḍḍhati taṇhā paccayā upādāna nti ādi katthaci ubhaya mūlikam pi seyyathīdam

original: – “avijjānīvaraṇassa, bhikkhave, bālassa taṇhāya sampayuttassa evamayaṃ kāyo samudāgato.
analyzed: avijjā nīvaraṇassa bhikkhave bālassa taṇhāya sampayuttassa evam ayam kāyaḥ samudāgataḥ

original: Iti ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpaṃ itthetaṃ dvayaṃ, dvayaṃ paṭicca phasso, saḷevāyatanāni
analyzed: iti ayam ca iva kāyaḥ bahiddhā ca nāma rūpam itthā itam dvayam dvayam paṭicca phassaḥ

original: yehi phuṭṭho bālo sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”tiādi. Tāsu tāsu desanāsu “avijjāpaccayā
analyzed: yehi phuṭṭhaḥ bālaḥ sukha dukkham paṭisaṃvedeti itiādi tāsu tāsu desanāsu avijjā paccayā

original: saṅkhārā”ti ayamidha avijjāvasena ekadhammamūlikā desanāti veditabbā. Evaṃ tāvettha
analyzed: saṅkhārā ti ayam idha avijjā vasena eka dhamma mūlikā desanā ati veditabbā evam tāva ettha

original: desanābhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: desanā bhedataḥ viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

analyzed: atthato ti avijjā ādīnam padānam atthato seyyathidam pūretum ayutta ṭṭhena kāya duccarita ādi

original: avindiyaṃ nāma; aladdhabbanti attho. Taṃ avindiyaṃ vindatīti avijjā. Tabbiparītato
analyzed: avindiyam nāma a laddhabbanti attho tam avindiyam vindati iti avijjā tad biparītataḥ

original: kāyasucaritādi vindiyaṃ nāma. Taṃ vindiyaṃ na vindatīti avijjā. Khandhānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ,
analyzed: kāya su carita ādi vindiyam nāma tam vindiyam na vindati iti avijjā khandhānam rāsaṭṭham

original: āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ, saccānaṃ tathaṭṭhaṃ, indriyānaṃ ādhipateyyaṭṭhaṃ

original: aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā. Dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ catubbidhaṃ
analyzed: aviditam karoti iti avijjā dukkha ādīnam pīḷana ādi vasena vuttam catubbidham catubbidham

original: atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā. Antavirahite saṃsāre sabbayonigatibhavaviññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu

analyzed: khandha ādīsu na javati iti avijjā apica cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam vattha ārammaṇānam paṭiccasamuppāda paṭiccasamuppannānam ca

original: dhammānaṃ chādanatopi avijjā.
analyzed: dhammānam chādanataḥ pi avijjā

original: Yaṃ paṭicca phalameti so paccayo. Paṭiccāti na vinā tena; taṃ apaccakkhitvāti attho.
analyzed: yam paṭicca phalam eti saḥ paccayaḥ paṭicca ati na vinā tena tam a paccakkhitvā iti atthaḥ

original: Etīti uppajjati ceva pavattati cāti attho. Api ca upakārakaṭṭho paccayaṭṭho. Avijjā
analyzed: eti iti uppajjati ca iva pavattati ca ati atthaḥ api ca upakāraka ṭṭhaḥ paccaya ṭṭhaḥ avijjā

original: ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo. Tasmā avijjāpaccayā.
analyzed: ca sā paccayaḥ ca ati avijjā paccayo tasmai avijjā paccayā

original: Saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti saṅkhārā. Apica avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārasaddena
analyzed: saṅkhatam abhisaṅkharonti iti saṅkhārāḥ api ca avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā saṅkhāra saddena

analyzed: āgata saṅkhārā ca ati duvidhā saṅkhārā tattha puñña apuñña aneñja abhisaṅkhārā tayo kāya vacī citta saṅkhārā

original: tayoti ime cha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā. Te sabbepi lokiyakusalākusalacetanāmattameva honti.
analyzed: tayo ti ime cha avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā te sabbe pi lokiya kusala akusala cetanā mattam eva honti

original: Saṅkhatasaṅkhāro, abhisaṅkhatasaṅkhāro, abhisaṅkharaṇasaṅkhāro, payogābhisaṅkhāroti
analyzed: saṅkhata saṅkhāraḥ abhisaṅkhata saṅkhāraḥ abhisaṅkharaṇa saṅkhāraḥ payoga abhisaṅkhāraḥ iti

original: ime pana cattāro saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārā. Tattha “aniccā vata saṅkhārā”tiādīsu
analyzed: ime pana cattāro saṅkhāra saddena āgata saṅkhārā tattha aniccāḥ vata saṅkhārā ti ādīsu

analyzed: vuttā sabbe api sa paccayāḥ dhammāḥ saṅkhatasaṅkhārāḥ nāma kamma nibbattā tebhūmakā

analyzed: rūpa arūpa dhammāḥ abhisaṅkhata saṅkhārā ti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttā te pi aniccāḥ vata saṅkhārā ti

analyzed: pana abhisaṅkharaṇaka saṅkhāro ti vuccati tassa a vijjā gataḥ yam bhikkhave purisa puggalo

analyzed: puññañce abhisaṅkharoti itiādīsu āgata ṭṭhānam paññāyati kāyika cetasikam pana vīriyam

analyzed: payoga abhisaṅkhāraḥ ti vuccati saḥ yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati tāvatikam gantvā

original: akkhāhataṃ maññe aṭṭhāsī”tiādīsu āgato.
analyzed: akkhāhatam maññe aṭṭhāsi iti ādīsu āgataḥ

original: Na kevalañca eteyeva, aññepi “saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpajjantassa kho, āvuso visākha,
analyzed: na kevalam ca ete yeva aññe pi saññā vedayita nirodham samāpajjantassa kho āvuso visākha

analyzed: bhikkhuno paṭhamam nirujjhati vacī saṅkhāro tato kāya saṅkhāro tato citta saṅkhāro tiādinā

analyzed: nayena saṅkhāra saddena āgatāḥ aneka saṅkhārā tesu na atthi so saṅkhāro yaḥ saṅkhata saṅkhāre

original: saṅgahaṃ na gaccheyya. Ito paraṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇantiādīsu yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: saṅgaham na gaccheyya itas param saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇam ti ādīsu yat vuttam tat vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: Avutte pana vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ. Namatīti nāmaṃ. Ruppatīti rūpaṃ. Āye tanoti, āyatañca
analyzed: a vutte pana vijānāti iti viññāṇam namati iti nāmam ruppati iti rūpam āye tanoti āyatam ca

original: nayatīti āyatanaṃ. Phusatīti phasso. Vedayatīti vedanā. Paritassatīti taṇhā. Upādiyatīti
analyzed: nayati iti āyatanam phusati iti phassaḥ vedayati iti vedanā paritassati iti taṇhā upādiyati iti

original: upādānaṃ. Bhavati bhāvayati cāti bhavo. Jananaṃ jāti. Jīraṇaṃ jarā. Maranti etenāti
analyzed: upādānam bhavati bhāvayati ca ati bhavaḥ jananam jāti jīraṇam jarā maranti etena ati

original: maraṇaṃ. Socanaṃ soko. Paridevanaṃ paridevo. Dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ; uppādaṭṭhitivasena
analyzed: maraṇam socanam soko paridevanam paridevaḥ dukkhayati iti dukkham uppāda ṭṭhiti vasena

analyzed: vā dvedhā khaṇati iti dukkham dummanassa bhāvaḥ domanassam bhusaḥ āyāsaḥ upāyāsaḥ

original: Sambhavantīti nibbattanti. Na kevalañca sokādīheva, atha kho sabbapadehi ‘sambhavantī’ti
analyzed: sambhavanti iti nibbattanti na kevalañca soka ādīhi iva atha kho sabba padehi sambhavanti iti

original: saddassa yojanā kātabbā. Itarathā hi “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti vutte kiṃ karontīti
analyzed: saddassa yojanā kātabbā itarathā hi avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā ati vutte kim karonti iti

original: na paññāyeyyuṃ. “Sambhavantī”ti pana yojanāya sati “avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo;
analyzed: na paññāyeyyum sambhavanti iti pana yojanāya sati avijjā ca sā paccayaḥ ca ati avijjā paccayo

original: tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantī”ti paccayapaccayuppannavavatthānaṃ kataṃ
analyzed: tasmai avijjā paccayāḥ saṅkhārāḥ sambhavanti iti paccaya paccaya uppanna vavatthānam katam

original: hoti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
analyzed: hoti esa nayo sabbattha

original: Evanti niddiṭṭhanayanidassanaṃ. Tena avijjādīheva kāraṇehi, na issaranimmānādīhīti
analyzed: evam ti niddiṭṭha naya nidassanam tena avijjā ādīhi iva kāraṇehi na issara nimmāna ādīhi iti

original: dasseti. Etassāti yathāvuttassa. Kevalassāti asammissassa sakalassa vā. Dukkhakkhandhassāti
analyzed: dassa iti etassa ati yathā vuttassa kevalassa ati asammissassa sakalassa vā dukkha kkhandhassa ati

original: dukkhasamūhassa, na sattassa, na sukhasubhādīnaṃ. Samudayoti nibbatti. Hotīti sambhavati.
analyzed: dukkha samūhassa na sattassa na sukha subha ādīnam samudayo ti nibbatti hoti iti sambhavati

original: Evamettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: evam ettha atthataḥ viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: ‘Lakkhaṇādito’ti avijjādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādito, seyyathidaṃ – aññāṇalakkhaṇā avijjā, sammohanarasā,
analyzed: lakkhaṇa āditaḥ ti avijjā ādīnam lakkhaṇa āditaḥ sā iyyathidam aññāṇa lakkhaṇā avijjā sammohana rasā

original: chādanapaccupaṭṭhānā, āsavapadaṭṭhānā. Abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇā saṅkhārā, āyūhanarasā,
analyzed: chādana paccupaṭṭhānāḥ āsava padaṭṭhānāḥ abhisaṅkharaṇa lakkhaṇāḥ saṅkhārāḥ āyūhana rasāḥ

original: cetanāpaccupaṭṭhānā, avijjāpadaṭṭhānā. Vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ, pubbaṅgamarasaṃ,
analyzed: cetanā paccupaṭṭhānā avijjā padaṭṭhānā vijānana lakkhaṇam viññāṇam pubbaṅgama rasam

original: paṭisandhipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, saṅkhārapadaṭṭhānaṃ, vatthārammaṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Namanalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: paṭisandhi paccupaṭṭhānam saṅkhāra padaṭṭhānam vattha ārammaṇa padaṭṭhānam vā namana lakkhaṇam

original: nāmaṃ, sampayogarasaṃ, avinibbhogapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, viññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: nāmam sampayoga rasam avinibbhoga paccupaṭṭhānam viññāṇa padaṭṭhānam ruppana lakkhaṇam

original: rūpaṃ, vikiraṇarasaṃ, abyākatapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, viññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Āyatanalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: rūpam vikiraṇa rasam abyākata paccupaṭṭhānam viññāṇa padaṭṭhānam āyatana lakkhaṇam

original: saḷāyatanaṃ, dassanādirasaṃ, vatthudvārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, nāmarūpapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
Phusanalakkhaṇo phasso, saṅghaṭṭanaraso, saṅgatipaccupaṭṭhāno, saḷāyatanapadaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: phusana lakkhaṇo phassaḥ saṅghaṭṭana raso saṅgati paccupaṭṭhāno saḷāyatana padaṭṭhāno

original: Anubhavanalakkhaṇā vedanā, visayarasasambhogarasā, sukhadukkhapaccupaṭṭhānā, phassapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: anubhavana lakkhaṇā vedanā visaya rasa sambhoga rasā sukha dukkha paccupaṭṭhānā phassa padaṭṭhānā

original: Hetulakkhaṇā taṇhā, abhinandanarasā, atittibhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, vedanāpadaṭṭhānā.

original: Gahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ upādānaṃ, amuñcanarasaṃ, taṇhādaḷhattadiṭṭhipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, taṇhāpadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: gahaṇa lakkhaṇam upādānam amuñcana rasam taṇhā daḷha tta diṭṭhi paccupaṭṭhānam taṇhā padaṭṭhānam

original: Kammakammaphalalakkhaṇo bhavo, bhāvanabhavanaraso, kusalākusalābyākatapaccupaṭṭhāno,

analyzed: upādāna padaṭṭhānaḥ jāti ādīnam lakkhaṇa ādīni sacca vibhaṅge vutta nayena iva veditabbāni

original: ‘Ekavidhādito’ti ettha avijjā aññāṇādassanamohādibhāvato ekavidhā, appaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattito

analyzed: duvidhā tathā saṅkhāra asaṅkhārataḥ tividhā catur acca appaṭivedhato

analyzed: arūpa dhammesu chabbidha tā veditabbā

original: catubbidhā catuyonisaṃvattanato, pañcavidhā pañcagatigāmito.

original: Viññāṇaṃ lokiyavipākādibhāvato ekavidhaṃ, sahetukāhetukādito duvidhaṃ, bhavattayapariyāpannato
analyzed: viññāṇam lokiya vipāka ādi bhāvataḥ ekavidham sa hetuka ahetuka āditaḥ duvidham bhava taya pariyāpannato

original: Nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇasannissayato kammapaccayato ca ekavidhaṃ, sārammaṇānārammaṇato duvidhaṃ, atītādito tividhaṃ, yonigativasena catubbidhaṃ pañcavidhañca.

original: Saḷāyatanaṃ sañjātisamosaraṇaṭṭhānato ekavidhaṃ, bhūtappasādaviññāṇādito duvidhaṃ,

analyzed: viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

analyzed: uddesa vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: kathīyati evam hi sati mittassa putto dattassa putto ti putto su kathitaḥ hoti tasmā

analyzed: jānitum passitum paṭivijjhitum na deti chādetvā pariyonandhitvā ganthetvā tiṭṭhati

analyzed: padāni kathitāni tesam pi vasena veditabbā

analyzed: paññā sā tam ākāram gahetvā ghaṃsitvā gaṇhāti avijjā pana uppajjitvā

analyzed: ca pekkhati avijjā pana uppajjitvā tam samam sammā ca pekkhitum na deti iti asamapekkhanā

original: Paccavekkhaṇātipi paññā. Sā taṃ ākāraṃ paccavekkhati. Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ

original: Sampajaññantipi paññā. Sā atthatthaṃ kāraṇakāraṇaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ sammā pajānāti.
analyzed: paññā sā attha ttham kāraṇa kāraṇam catu sacca dhammam sammā pajānāti

original: moho. Pamohanavasena pamoho. Sammohanavasena sammoho. Avindiyaṃ vindatītiādivasena
analyzed: mohaḥ pamohana vasena pamohaḥ sammohana vasena sammohaḥ vindati iti ādi vasena

original: avijjā. Vaṭṭasmiṃ ohanati osīdāpetīti avijjogho. Vaṭṭasmiṃ yojetīti avijjāyogo. Appahīnavasena

analyzed: punappunam uppajjanataḥ ca avijjā anusayaḥ magge pariyuṭṭhita corāḥ addhike viya kusala cittam

analyzed: laṅgiyā patitāya antar nagare manussānam bahi nagara gamanam pi bahi nagare manussānam

analyzed: nibbāna sampāpakam ñāṇa gamanam pacchijjati iti avijjālaṅgī nāma hoti akusalam ca tam

original: mūlañca, akusalānaṃ vā mūlanti akusalamūlaṃ. Taṃ pana na aññaṃ, idhādhippeto mohoti
analyzed: mūlam ca akusalānam vā mūlanti akusala mūlam tam pana na aññam idha adhippeto moho ti

original: moho akusalamūlaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati avijjāti ayaṃ evaṃlakkhaṇā avijjā nāmāti vuccati.

original: Evaṃ pañcavīsatipadavasena avijjāya lakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.

analyzed: sahajātā hoti tam ārammaṇam karoti chādeti samudaya saccassa na eka desaḥ hoti sahajātā

original: na taṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, kevalaṃ chādeti; maggasaccassāpi na ekadeso, na sahajātā,

analyzed: na tam ārammaṇam karoti kevalam chādeti dukkha ārammaṇa tā avijjā uppajjati tat ca

analyzed: chādeti samudaya ārammaṇa tā avijjā uppajjati tat ca chādeti nirodha ārammaṇa tā avijjā

analyzed: nuppajjati tat ca chādeti magga ārammaṇa tā avijjā nūppajjati tat ca chādeti

original: Dve saccā duddasattā gambhīrā. Dve saccā gambhīrattā duddasā. Apica kho pana dukkhanirodhaṃ

original: Avijjāpadaniddeso.

original: Saṅkhārapadaniddeso
analyzed: saṅkhāra pada niddeso

analyzed: dassentaḥ tattha katame avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā puñña abhisaṅkhārā iti ādim āha

original: Tattha punāti attano kārakaṃ, pūreti cassa ajjhāsayaṃ, pujjañca bhavaṃ nibbattetīti
analyzed: tattha punāti attanaḥ kārakam pūreti cassa ajjhāsayam pujjam ca bhavam nibbatteti iti

analyzed: puññaḥ abhisaṅkharoti vipākam kaṭattā rūpam ca ati abhisaṅkhāro puññaḥ eva abhisaṅkhāro

analyzed: puñña abhisaṅkhāro puñña paṭipakkhataḥ apuññaḥ apuññaḥ uva abhisaṅkhāraḥ apuñña abhisaṅkhāro

original: Na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Āneñjameva abhisaṅkhāro, āneñjañca bhavaṃ abhisaṅkharotīti āneñjābhisaṅkhāro.

original: Kāyena pavattito, kāyato vā pavatto, kāyassa vā saṅkhāroti kāyasaṅkhāro. Vacīsaṅkhāracittasaṅkhāresupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: kāyena pavattitaḥ kāyataḥ vā pavatto kāyassa vā saṅkhāro ti kāya saṅkhāraḥ vacī saṅkhāra citta saṅkhāresu pi eṣa eva nayaḥ

original: abhisaṅkharoti, puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ. Apuññañce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, apuññupagaṃ

analyzed: hoti viññāṇam āneñjam ce saṅkhāram abhisaṅkharoti āneñja upagam hoti viññāṇan ti vuttam

analyzed: dutiya ttiko tad anantarassa vibhaṅga suttassa vasena gahito sammādiṭṭhi sutta pariyāyena

analyzed: gahitā iti pi vattum vaṭṭatiyā iva tattha hi tayo me bhikkhave saṅkhārāḥ katame tayo

original: Tattha kāyasañcetanāti kāyaviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā kāyadvārato pavattā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā
analyzed: tattha kāya sañcetanā ati kāya viññattim samuṭṭhāpetvā kāya dvārataḥ pavattā aṭṭha kāmāvacara kusala cetanā

original: dvādasa akusalacetanāti samavīsati cetanā; kāyadvāre ādānaggahaṇacopanaṃ pāpayamānā
analyzed: dvādasa akusala cetanā ati sama vīsati cetanā kāya dvāre ādāna ggahaṇa copanam pāpayamānā

original: uppannā vīsati kusalākusalacetanātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: uppannā vīsati kusala akusala cetanā atipi vattum vaṭṭati

original: Vacīsañcetanāti vacīviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā vacīdvārato pavattā tāyeva vīsati cetanā;
analyzed: vacī sañcetanā ati vacī viññattim samuṭṭhāpetvā vacī dvārataḥ pavattā tāyā iva vīsati cetanā

original: vacīdvāre hanusañcopanaṃ vākyabhedaṃ pāpayamānā uppannā vīsati cetanātipi vattuṃ
analyzed: vacī dvāre hanu sañcopanam vākya bhedam pāpayamānāḥ uppannāḥ vīsati vattum

original: vaṭṭati. Abhiññācetanā panettha parato viññāṇassa paccayo na hotīti na gahitā. Yathā
analyzed: vaṭṭati abhiññā cetanā pana ittha paratas viññāṇassa paccayaḥ na hoti iti na gahitā yathā

original: ca abhiññācetanā, evaṃ uddhaccacetanāpi na hoti. Tasmā sāpi viññāṇassa paccayabhāve
analyzed: ca abhiññā cetanā evam uddhacca cetanā api na hoti tasmā sā api viññāṇassa paccaya bhāve

original: apanetabbā. Avijjāpaccayā pana sabbāpetā honti.
analyzed: apanetabbāḥ avijjā paccayāḥ pana sabba apetāḥ honti

original: Manosañcetanāti ubhopi viññattiyo asamuṭṭhāpetvā manodvāre uppannā sabbāpi ekūnatiṃsa
analyzed: manaḥ sañcetanā ti ubho pi viññattiyaḥ a samuṭṭhāpetvā manaḥ dvāre uppannā sabbā api ekūnatiṃsa

original: cetanā. Iti bhagavā aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇā sattā kusalākusalakammaṃ āyūhamānā
analyzed: cetanā iti bhagavā aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇā sattā kusala akusala kammam āyūhamānā

original: imehi tīhi dvārehi āyūhantīti āyūhanakammadvāraṃ dassesi.
analyzed: imehi tīhi dvārehi āyūhanti iti āyūhana kamma dvāram dassesi

original: Imesaṃ pana dvinnampi tikānaṃ aññamaññaṃ sampayogo veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Puññābhisaṅkhāro
analyzed: imesam pana dvinnam pi tikānam aññamaññam sampayogaḥ veditabbo katham puñña abhisaṅkhāro

original: hi kāyaduccaritā viramantassa siyā kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīduccaritā viramantassa siyā
analyzed: hi kāya duccaritā viramantassa siyā kāya saṅkhāraḥ vacī duccaritā viramantassa siyā

original: vacīsaṅkhāro. Evaṃ aṭṭha kusalacetanā kāmāvacarā puññābhisaṅkhāro ca hoti kāyasaṅkhāro
analyzed: vacī saṅkhāro evam aṭṭha kusala cetanā kāma avacarā puñña abhisaṅkhāro ca hoti kāya saṅkhāro

original: ca vacīsaṅkhāro ca. Manodvāre uppannā pana terasa cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro ca hoti
analyzed: ca vacī saṅkhāro ca manaḥ dvāre uppannā pana terasa cetanā puñña abhisaṅkhāro ca hoti

original: cittasaṅkhāro ca. Apuññābhisaṅkhāropi kāyaduccaritavasena pavattiyaṃ siyā kāyasaṅkhāro,
analyzed: citta saṅkhāro ca apuñña abhisaṅkhāro pi kāya duccarita vasena siyā kāya saṅkhāro

original: vacīduccaritavasena pavattiyaṃ siyā vacīsaṅkhāro, dve dvārāni muñcitvā manodvāre
analyzed: vacī duccarita vasena siyā vacī saṅkhāraḥ dve dvārāni muñcitvā manaḥ dvāre

original: pavattiyaṃ siyā cittasaṅkhāroti. Evaṃ apuññābhisaṅkhāro kāyasaṅkhāropi hoti vacīsaṅkhāropi cittasaṅkhāropi.
analyzed: pavattiyam siyā citta saṅkhāro ti evam apuñña abhisaṅkhāro kāya saṅkhāraḥ api hoti vacī saṅkhāraḥ api citta saṅkhāraḥ api

original: Kāyasaṅkhāro pana siyā puññābhisaṅkhāro, siyā apuññābhisaṅkhāro, na āneñjābhisaṅkhāro.
analyzed: kāya saṅkhāro pana siyā puñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ siyā apuñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ na āneñja abhisaṅkhāro

original: Tathā vacīsaṅkhāro. Cittasaṅkhāro pana siyā puññābhisaṅkhāro, siyā apuññābhisaṅkhāro,
analyzed: tathā vacī saṅkhāro citta saṅkhāro pana siyā puñña abhisaṅkhāro siyā apuñña abhisaṅkhāro

original: siyā āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti. Ime avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā nāma.
analyzed: siyā āneñja abhisaṅkhāro ti ime avijjā paccayāḥ saṅkhārāḥ nāma

original: Kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ – ime saṅkhārā avijjāpaccayā hontīti? Avijjābhāve bhāvato.
analyzed: katham pana etat jānitabbam ime saṅkhārāḥ avijjā paccayāḥ honti iti avijjā bhāve bhāvato

original: Yassa hi dukkhādīsu avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ aññāṇaṃ appahīnaṃ hoti, so dukkhe tāva pubbantādīsu
analyzed: yassa hi dukkha ādīsu avijjā saṅkhātam aññāṇam a pahīnam hoti so dukkhe tāva pubbanta ādīsu

original: ca aññāṇena saṃsāradukkhaṃ sukhasaññāya gahetvā tassa hetubhūte tividhepi saṅkhāre
analyzed: ca aññāṇena saṃsāra dukkham sukha saññāya gahetvā tassa hetu bhūte tividhe pi saṅkhāre

original: ārabhati, samudaye aññāṇena dukkhahetubhūtepi taṇhāparikkhāre saṅkhāre sukhahetuto
analyzed: ārabhati samudaye aññāṇena dukkha hetu bhūte api taṇhā parikkhāre saṅkhāre sukha hetuto

original: maññamāno ārabhati, nirodhe pana magge ca aññāṇena dukkhassa anirodhabhūtepi gativisese
analyzed: maññamānaḥ ārabhati nirodhe pana magge ca aññāṇena dukkhassa anirodha bhūte pi gati visese

original: dukkhanirodhasaññī hutvā nirodhassa ca amaggabhūtesupi yaññāmaratapādīsu nirodhamaggasaññī
analyzed: dukkha nirodha saññī hutvā nirodhassa ca amagga bhūtesu pi yaññā amaratapādīsu nirodha magga saññī

original: hutvā dukkhanirodhaṃ patthayamāno yaññāmaratapādimukhena tividhepi saṅkhāre ārabhati.
analyzed: hutvā dukkha nirodham patthayamānaḥ tividhe api saṅkhāre ārabhati

original: Apica so tāya catūsu saccesu appahīnāvijjatāya visesato jātijarārogamaraṇādianekādīnavavokiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: apica saḥ tāya catūsu saccesu visesataḥ jāti jarā roga maraṇa ādi aneka ādīnava vokiṇṇam

original: puññaphalasaṅkhātaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhato ajānanto tassa adhigamāya kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārabhedaṃ
analyzed: puñña phala saṅkhātam dukkham dukkhataḥ a jānantaḥ tassa adhigamāya kāya vacī citta saṅkhāra bhedam

original: puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati devaccharakāmako viya marupapātaṃ; sukhasammatassāpi ca
analyzed: puñña abhisaṅkhāram ārabhati deva chara kāmakaḥ viya maru papātam sukha sammatassa api ca

original: tassa puññaphalassa ante mahāpariḷāhajanakaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhataṃ appassādatañca apassantopi
analyzed: tassa puñña phalassa ante mahā pariḷāha janakam vipariṇāma dukkha tam appassāda tañca a passantaḥ pi

original: tappaccayaṃ vuttappakārameva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati salabho viya dīpasikhābhinipātaṃ,
analyzed: tad paccayam vutta ppakāram eva puñña abhisaṅkhāram ārabhati salabhaḥ viya dīpa sikhā abhinipātam

original: madhubindugiddho viya ca madhulittasatthadhārālehanaṃ.
analyzed: ca

original: Kāmūpasevanādīsu ca savipākesu ādīnavaṃ apassanto sukhasaññāya ceva kilesābhibhūtatāya
analyzed: kāma upasevana ādīsu ca sa vipākesu ādīnavam a passanto sukha saññāya ca iva kilesa abhibhūta tāya

original: ca dvārattayappavattampi apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati bālo viya gūthakīḷanaṃ, maritukāmo
analyzed: ca dvāra ttaya pavattam pi apuñña abhisaṅkhāram ārabhati bālaḥ viya gūtha kīḷanam maritu kāmo

original: viya ca visakhādanaṃ. Āruppavipākesu cāpi saṅkhāravipariṇāmadukkhataṃ anavabujjhamāno
analyzed: viya ca visa khādanam āruppa vipākesu ca api saṅkhāra vipariṇāma dukkha tam an avabujjhamānaḥ

original: sassatādivipallāsena cittasaṅkhārabhūtaṃ āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati disāmūḷho viya
analyzed: sassatā ādi vipallāsena citta saṅkhāra bhūtam āneñja abhisaṅkhāram ārabhati disāmūḷhaḥ viya

original: pisācanagarābhimukhamaggagamanaṃ.
analyzed: pisāca nagara abhimukha magga gamanam

original: Evaṃ yasmā avijjābhāvatova saṅkhārabhāvo, na abhāvato; tasmā jānitabbametaṃ – ime
analyzed: evam yasmai avijjā bhāvataḥ va saṅkhāra bhāvaḥ na abhāvataḥ tasmai jānitabbam etam ime

original: saṅkhārā avijjāpaccayā hontīti. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “avidvā, bhikkhave, avijjāgato puññābhisaṅkhārampi
analyzed: saṅkhārāḥ avijjā paccayāḥ honti iti vuttam pi ca itam a vidvā bhikkhave avijjā gataḥ puñña abhisaṅkhāram pi

original: abhisaṅkharoti, apuññābhisaṅkhārampi abhisaṅkharoti, āneñjābhisaṅkhārampi abhisaṅkharoti.
analyzed: abhisaṅkharoti apuñña abhisaṅkhāram pi abhisaṅkharoti āneñja abhisaṅkhāram pi abhisaṅkharoti

original: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjā pahīnā, vijjā uppannā, so avijjāvirāgā vijjuppādā
analyzed: yatas kho bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ avijjā pahīnā vijjā uppannā saḥ avijjā virāgā vijjuppādā

original: neva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotī”ti.
analyzed: na iva puñña abhisaṅkhāram abhisaṅkharoti iti

original: Etthāha – gaṇhāma tāva etaṃ ‘avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo’ti. Idaṃ pana vattabbaṃ – ‘katamesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ kathaṃ paccayo hotī’ti? Tatridaṃ vuccati –
analyzed: ettha āha gaṇhāma tāva etam avijjā saṅkhārānam paccayaḥ ti idam pana vattabbam katamesam saṅkhārānam katham paccayaḥ hoti iti tatra idam vuccati

original: Paccayo hoti puññānaṃ, duvidhānekadhā pana;
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti puññānam duvidha anekadhā pana

original: Paresaṃ pacchimānaṃ sā, ekadhā paccayo matā.
analyzed: paresam pacchimānam sā ekadhā paccayaḥ matā

original: Tattha ‘puññānaṃ duvidhā’ti ārammaṇapaccayena ca upanissayapaccayena cāti dvedhā
analyzed: tattha puññānam duvidhā ati ārammaṇa paccayena ca upanissaya paccayena ca ati dvedhā

original: paccayo hoti. Sā hi avijjaṃ khayato vayato sammasanakāle kāmāvacarānaṃ puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti sā hi avijjam khayataḥ vayataḥ sammasana kāle kāma avacarānam puñña abhisaṅkhārānam

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo hoti, abhiññācittena samohacittajānanakāle rūpāvacarānaṃ,
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ hoti abhiññā cittena sa moha citta jānana kāle rūpāvacarānam

original: avijjāsamatikkamanatthāya pana dānādīni ceva kāmāvacarapuññakiriyavatthūni pūrentassa
analyzed: avijjā samatikkamana tthāya pana dāna ādīni ca iva kāmāvacara puñña kiriya vatthūni pūrentassa

original: rūpāvacarajjhānāni ca uppādentassa dvinnampi tesaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo hoti;
analyzed: rūpāvacara jhānāni ca uppādentassa dvinnam pi tesam upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ hoti

original: tathā avijjāsammūḷhattā kāmabhavarūpabhavasampattiyo patthetvā tāneva puññāni karontassa.
analyzed: tathā avijjā sammūḷha ttā kāma bhava rūpa bhava sampattiyaḥ patthetvā tān eva puññāni karontassa

original: ‘Anekadhā pana paresa’nti apuññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ anekadhā paccayo hoti. Kathaṃ? Esā
analyzed: anekadhā pana paresanti apuñña abhisaṅkhārānam anekadhā paccayaḥ hoti katham esā

original: hi avijjaṃ ārabbha rāgādīnaṃ uppajjanakāle ārammaṇapaccayena, garuṃ katvā assādanakāle
analyzed: hi avijjam ārabbha rāga ādīnam uppajjana kāle ārammaṇa paccayena garum katvā assādana kāle

original: ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayehi, avijjāsammūḷhassa anādīnavadassāvino pāṇātipātādīni
analyzed: ārammaṇa adhipati ārammaṇa upanissayehi avijjā sammūḷhassa anādīnava dassāvino pāṇātipāta ādīni

original: karontassa upanissayapaccayena, dutiyajavanādīnaṃ anantarasamanantarānantarūpanissayāsevananatthivigatapaccayehi,
analyzed: karontassa upanissaya paccayena dutiya javana ādīnam anantara samanantara anantara ūpa nissaya āsevana natthi vigata paccayehi

original: yaṃ kiñci akusalaṃ karontassa hetusahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatapaccayehīti
analyzed: yam kiñci akusalam karontassa hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigata paccayehi iti

original: anekadhā paccayo hoti.
analyzed: anekadhā paccayaḥ hoti

original: ‘Pacchimānaṃ sā ekadhā paccayo matā’ti āneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ upanissayapaccayeneva ekadhā paccayo matā. So panassā upanissayabhāvo puññābhisaṅkhāre vuttanayeneva veditabboti.
analyzed: pacchimānam sā ekadhā paccayaḥ matā ati āneñja abhisaṅkhārānam upanissaya paccayena iva ekadhā paccayaḥ matā saḥ panassā upanissaya bhāvaḥ puñña abhisaṅkhāre vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ ti

original: Etthāha – ‘kiṃ panāyamekāva avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo udāhu aññepi paccayā hontī’ti?
analyzed: ettha āha kim pana ayam ekā ava avijjā saṅkhārānam paccayaḥ udāhu aññe pi paccayāḥ honti iti

original: Kiñcettha yadi tāva ekāva ekakāraṇavādo āpajjati. Atha ‘aññepi santi avijjāpaccayā
analyzed: kiñca ittha yadi tāva eka āva eka kāraṇa vādaḥ āpajjati atha aññe pi santi avijjā paccayā

original: saṅkhārā’ti ekakāraṇaniddeso nupapajjatīti? Na nupapajjati. Kasmā? Yasmā –
analyzed: eka kāraṇa niddesaḥ nupapajjati iti na nupapajjati kasmai yasmai

original: Ekaṃ na ekato idha, nānekamanekatopi no ekaṃ;
analyzed: ekam naḥ ekatas idha na anekam anekatas api na u ekam

original: Phalamatthi atthi pana eka-hetuphaladīpane attho.
analyzed: phalam atthi atthi pana eka hetu phala dīpane

original: Ekato hi kāraṇato na idha kiñci ekaṃ phalamatthi, na anekaṃ. Nāpi anekehi kāraṇehi
analyzed: ekatas hi kāraṇataḥ na idha kiñci ekam phalam atthi na anekam na api anekehi kāraṇehi

original: ekaṃ. Anekehi pana kāraṇehi anekameva hoti. Tathā hi anekehi utupathavībījasalilasaṅkhātehi
analyzed: ekam anekehi pana kāraṇehi anekam eva hoti tathā hi anekehi utu pathavī bīja salila saṅkhātehi

original: kāraṇehi anekameva rūpagandharasādiaṅkurasaṅkhātaṃ phalamuppajjamānaṃ dissati. Yaṃ
analyzed: kāraṇehi anekam eva rūpa gandha rasa ādi aṅkura saṅkhātam phalam uppajjamānam dissati yam

original: panetaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti ekekahetuphaladīpanaṃ
analyzed: pana itam avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇan ti ekeka hetu phala dīpanam

original: kataṃ, tattha attho atthi, payojanaṃ vijjati.
analyzed: katam tattha atthaḥ atthi payojanam vijjati

original: Bhagavā hi katthaci padhānattā, katthaci pākaṭattā, katthaci asādhāraṇattā, desanāvilāsassa
analyzed: bhagavā hi katthaci padhāna ttā katthaci pākaṭa ttā katthaci asādhāraṇa ttā desanā vilāsassa

original: ca veneyyānañca anurūpato ekamevahetuṃ vā phalaṃ vā dīpeti; “phassapaccayā vedanā”ti
analyzed: ca veneyyānam ca anurūpatas ekam eva hetum vā phalam vā dīpeti phassa paccayā vedanā ti

original: hi ekameva hetuṃ phalañcāha. Phasso hi vedanāya padhānahetu yathāphassaṃ vedanāvavatthānato.
analyzed: hi ekam eva hetum phalam ca āha phassaḥ hi vedanāya padhāna hetu yathāphassam vedanā vavatthānato

original: Vedanā ca phassassa padhānaphalaṃ yathāvedanaṃ phassavavatthānato.
analyzed: vedanā ca phassassa padhāna phalam yathāvedanam phassa vavatthānato

original: “Semhasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā”ti pākaṭattā ekaṃ hetumāha. Pākaṭo hettha semho, na kammādayo.
analyzed: semha samuṭṭhānāḥ ābādhā ati pākaṭa ttā ekam hetum āha pākaṭaḥ ha ittha semhaḥ na kamma ādayaḥ

original: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, akusalā dhammā, sabbete ayonisomanasikāramūlakā”ti asādhāraṇattā
analyzed: ye keci bhikkhave akusalāḥ dhammāḥ sabbe ete a yoniso manasikāra mūlakā ati a sādhāraṇa ttā

original: ekaṃ hetumāha; asādhāraṇo hi ayonisomanasikāro akusalānaṃ, sādhāraṇāni vatthārammaṇādīnīti.
analyzed: ekam hetum āha asādhāraṇaḥ hi ayoniso manasikāraḥ akusalānam sādhāraṇāni vattha ārammaṇa ādīni iti

original: Tasmā ayamidha avijjā vijjamānesupi aññesu vatthārammaṇasahajātadhammādīsu saṅkhārakāraṇesu
analyzed: tasmai ayam idha avijjā vijjamānesu pi aññesu vattha ārammaṇa sahajāta dhamma ādīsu saṅkhāra kāraṇesu

original: “assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti ca “avijjāsamudayā āsavasamudayo”ti ca vacanato
analyzed: assāda anupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhati iti ca avijjā samudayā āsava samudayā iti ca vacanato

original: aññesampi taṇhādīnaṃ saṅkhārahetūnaṃ hetūti padhānattā, “avidvā, bhikkhave, avijjāgato
analyzed: aññesam pi taṇhā ādīnam saṅkhāra hetūnam hetu uti padhāna ttā avidvā bhikkhave avijjāgataḥ

original: puññābhisaṅkhārampi abhisaṅkharotī”ti pākaṭattā asādhāraṇattā ca saṅkhārānaṃ hetubhāvena
analyzed: puñña abhisaṅkhāram pi abhisaṅkharoti iti pākaṭa ttā asādhāraṇa ttā ca hetu bhāvena

original: dīpitāti veditabbā. Eteneva ca ekekahetuphaladīpanaparihāravacanena sabbattha ekekahetuphaladīpane
analyzed: dīpitā iti veditabbā etena iva ca ekeka hetu phala dīpana parihāra vacanena sabbattha ekeka hetu phala dīpane

original: payojanaṃ veditabbanti.

original: Etthāha – evaṃ santepi ekantāniṭṭhaphalāya sāvajjāya avijjāya kathaṃ puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārapaccayattaṃ

original: vā iṭṭhamajjhattaṃ vā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ārabbha cakkhādipasādaṃ nissāya dassanasavanaghāyanasāyanaphusanakiccaṃ
analyzed: vā iṭṭha majjhattam vā rūpa ādi ārammaṇam ārabbha cakkha ādi pasādam nissāya dassana savana ghāyana sāyana phusana kiccaṃ

original: sādhayamānāni pavattanti. Tathā akusalavipākāni pañca. Kevalañhi tesaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ aniṭṭhamajjhattaṃ
analyzed: sādhayamānāni pavattanti tathā akusala vipākāni pañca kevalam hi tesam aniṭṭham aniṭṭham ajjhattam

original: vā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ hoti, ayameva viseso. Dasāpi cetāni niyatadvārārammaṇavatthuṭṭhānāni
analyzed: vā rūpa ādi ārammaṇam hoti ayam eva visesaḥ dasā api cetāni niyata dvāra ārammaṇa vatthu ṭṭhānāni

original: niyatakiccāneva ca bhavanti.
analyzed: ca bhavanti

original: Tato kusalavipākānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantaraṃ kusalavipākamanodhātu tesaññeva
analyzed: tatas kusala vipākānam cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam anantaram kusala vipāka manaḥ dhātu tesaññeva

original: ārammaṇamārabbha hadayavatthuṃ nissāya sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā pavattati.
analyzed: ārammaṇam ārabbha hadaya vatthum nissāya sampaṭicchana kiccam sādhayamānā pavattati

original: Tathā akusalavipākānaṃ anantaraṃ akusalavipākā. Idañca pana dvayaṃ aniyatadvārārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tathā akusala vipākānam anantaram akusala vipākāḥ idam ca pana dvayam aniyata dvāra ārammaṇam

original: niyatavatthuṭṭhānaṃ niyatakiccañca hoti.
analyzed: niyata vatthu ṭṭhānam niyata kiccam ca hoti

original: Somanassasahagatā pana ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu kusalavipākamanodhātuyā anantaraṃ
analyzed: somanassa sahagatā pana ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu kusala vipāka manaḥ dhātuyāḥ anantaram

original: tassā eva ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha hadayavatthuṃ nissāya santīraṇakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ca
analyzed: tassāḥ eva ārammaṇam ārabbha hadaya vatthum nissāya santīraṇa kiccam sādhayamānā ca

original: chasu dvāresu balavārammaṇe kāmāvacarasattānaṃ yebhuyyena lobhasampayuttajavanāvasāne
analyzed: chasu dvāresu balava ārammaṇe kāmāvacara sattānam yebhuyyena lobha sampayutta javana avasāne

original: bhavaṅgavīthiṃ pacchinditvā javanena gahitārammaṇe tadārammaṇavasena ca sakiṃ vā
analyzed: bhavaṅga vīthim pacchinditvā javanena gahita ārammaṇe tad ārammaṇa vasena ca sakim vā

original: dvikkhattuṃ vā pavattati. Cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ pana sabbadvāresu tadārammaṇe dve
analyzed: dvi kkhattum vā pavattati citta ppavatti gaṇanāyam pana sabba dvāresu tad ārammaṇe dve

original: eva cittavārā āgatā. Idaṃ pana cittaṃ tadārammaṇanti ca piṭṭhibhavaṅganti cāti dve
analyzed: eva citta vārāḥ āgatāḥ idam pana cittam tad ārammaṇanti ca ca ati dve

original: nāmāni labhati, aniyatadvārārammaṇaṃ niyatavatthukaṃ aniyataṭṭhānakiccañca hotīti.
analyzed: nāmāni labhati aniyata dvāra ārammaṇam niyata vatthukam aniyata ṭṭhāna kiccam ca hoti iti

original: Evaṃ tāva terasa pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaṃyeva pavattantīti veditabbāni. Sesesu
analyzed: evam tāva terasa pañcavokāra bhave pavattiyam yeva pavattanti iti veditabbāni sesesu

original: ekūnavīsatiyā cittesu na kiñci attano anurūpāya paṭisandhiyā na pavattati.
analyzed: ekūnavīsatiyā cittesu na kiñci attanaḥ anurūpāya paṭisandhiyā na pavattati

original: Pavattiyaṃ pana kusalākusalavipākā tāva dve ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo pañcadvāre
analyzed: pavattiyam pana kusala akusala vipākā tāva dve ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyo pañca dvāre

original: kusalākusalavipākamanodhātūnaṃ anantaraṃ santīraṇakiccaṃ, chasu dvāresu pubbe vuttanayeneva
analyzed: kusala akusala vipāka manaḥ dhātūnam anantaram santīraṇa kiccam chasu dvāresu pubbe vutta nayena iva

original: tadārammaṇakiccaṃ, attanā dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati bhavaṅgupacchedake cittuppāde
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa kiccam attanā dinna paṭisandhitaḥ asati bhavaṅga upacchedake cittuppāde

original: bhavaṅgakiccaṃ, ante cutikiccañcāti cattāri kiccāni sādhayamānā niyatavatthukā aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattanti.
analyzed: bhavaṅga kiccam ante cuti kiccam ca ati cattāri kiccāni sādhayamānāḥ niyata vatthukāḥ aniyata dvāra ārammaṇa ṭṭhāna kiccāḥ hutvā pavattanti

original: Aṭṭha kāmāvacarasahetukacittāni pavattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇakiccaṃ,
analyzed: aṭṭha kāmāvacara sa hetuka cittāni pavattiyam vutta nayena iva chasu dvāresu tad ārammaṇa kiccam

original: attanā dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati bhavaṅgupacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅgakiccaṃ,
analyzed: attanā dinna paṭisandhitaḥ asati bhavaṅga upacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅga kiccam

original: ante cutikiccañcāti tīṇi kiccāni sādhayamānāni niyatavatthukāni aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccāni hutvā pavattanti.
analyzed: ante cuti kiccam ca ati tīṇi kiccāni sādhayamānāni niyata vatthukāni aniyata dvāra ārammaṇa ṭṭhāna kiccāni hutvā pavattanti

original: Pañca rūpāvacarāni cattāri ca arūpāvacarāni attanā dinnapaṭisandhito uddhaṃ asati
analyzed: pañca rūpāvacarāni cattāri ca arūpāvacarāni attanā dinna paṭisandhitaḥ

original: bhavaṅgupacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅgakiccaṃ, ante cutikiccañcāti kiccadvayaṃ sādhayamānāni
analyzed: bhavaṅga upacchedake cittuppāde bhavaṅga kiccam ante cuti kiccañca ati kicca dvayam sādhayamānāni

original: pavattanti. Tesu rūpāvacarāni niyatavatthārammaṇāni aniyataṭṭhānakiccāni, itarāni
analyzed: pavattanti tesu rūpāvacarāni niyata vattha ārammaṇāni aniyata ṭṭhāna kiccāni itarāni

original: avatthukāni niyatārammaṇāni aniyataṭṭhānakiccāni hutvā pavattantīti. Evaṃ tāva bāttiṃsavidhampi
analyzed: avatthukāni niyata ārammaṇāni aniyata ṭṭhāna kiccāni hutvā pavattanti iti evam tāva bāttiṃsavidham pi

original: viññāṇaṃ pavattiyaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā pavattati. Tatrassa te te saṅkhārā kammapaccayena
analyzed: viññāṇam pavattiyam saṅkhāra paccayā pavattati tatra assa te te saṅkhārā kamma paccayena

original: ca upanissayapaccayena ca paccayā honti.
analyzed: ca upanissaya paccayena ca paccayāḥ honti

original: Tattha yānetāni ekādasa tadārammaṇacittāni vuttāni, tesu ekampi rūpārūpabhave tadārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tattha yāni etāni ekādasa tad ārammaṇa cittāni vuttāni tesu ekam pi rūpa arūpa bhave tad ārammaṇam

original: hutvā na pavattati. Kasmā? Bījābhāvā. Tattha hi kāmāvacaravipākasaṅkhātaṃ paṭisandhibījaṃ
analyzed: hutvā na pavattati kasmā bīja abhāvā tattha hi kāmāvacara vipāka saṅkhātam paṭisandhi bījam

original: natthi, yaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu pavattiyaṃ tassa janakaṃ bhaveyya. Cakkhuviññāṇādīnampi
analyzed: natthi yam rūpa ādīsu ārammaṇesu pavattiyam tassa janakam bhaveyya cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam pi

original: rūpabhave abhāvo āpajjatīti ce? Na; indriyappavattiānubhāvato dvāravīthibhede cittaniyamato ca.
analyzed: rūpa bhave abhāvaḥ āpajjati iti ce na indriya ppavatti ānubhāvataḥ dvāra vīthi bhede citta niyamato ca

original: Yathā cetaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ ekantena rūpārūpabhave nappavattati tathā sabbepi akāmāvacare
analyzed: yathā cetam tad ārammaṇam ekantena rūpa arūpa bhave na ppavattati tathā sabbe pi akāmāvacare

original: dhamme nānubandhati. Kasmā? Ajanakattā ceva janakassa ca asadisattā. Tañhi yathā
analyzed: dhamme na anubandhati kasmai ajanaka ttā ca iva janakassa ca asadisa ttā tat hi yathā

original: nāma gehā nikkhamitvā bahi gantukāmo taruṇadārako attano janakaṃ pitaraṃ vā aññaṃ
analyzed: nāma gehā nikkhamitvā bahi gantu kāmo taruṇa dārakaḥ attanaḥ janakam pitaram vā aññam

original: vā pitusadisaṃ hitakāmaṃ ñātiṃ aṅguliyaṃ gahetvā anubandhati, na aññaṃ rājapurisādiṃ,
analyzed: vā pitu sadisam hita kāmam ñātim aṅguliyam gahetvā anubandhati na aññam rāja purisa ādiṃ

original: tathā etampi bhavaṅgārammaṇato bahi nikkhamitukāmaṃ sabhāgatāya attano janakaṃ pitaraṃ
analyzed: tathā etam pi bhavaṅga ārammaṇataḥ bahi nikkhamitu kāmam sabhā gatāya attanaḥ janakam pitaram

original: vā pitusadisaṃ vā kāmāvacarajavanameva anubandhati, na aññaṃ mahaggataṃ anuttaraṃ vā.
analyzed: vā pitu sadisam vā kāmāvacara javanam eva anubandhati na aññam mahaggatam anuttaram vā

original: Yathā cetaṃ mahaggatalokuttare dhamme nānubandhati, tathā yadā ete kāmāvacaradhammāpi
analyzed: yathā ca itam mahaggata lokuttare dhamme na anubandhati tathā yadā ete kāmāvacara dhammā api

original: mahaggatārammaṇā hutvā pavattanti tadā tepi nānubandhati. Kasmā? Aparicitadesattā
analyzed: mahaggata ārammaṇāḥ hutvā pavattanti tadā te pi na anubandhati kasmai a paricita desa ttā

original: accantaparittārammaṇattā ca. Tañhi yathā pitaraṃ vā pitusadisaṃ vā ñātiṃ anubandhantopi
analyzed: ca tat hi yathā pitaram vā pitu sadisam vā ñātim anubandhantaḥ api

original: taruṇadārako gharadvāraantaravīthicatukkādimhi pariciteyeva dese anubandhati, na
analyzed: taruṇa dārakaḥ dese anubandhati na

original: araññaṃ vā yuddhabhūmiṃ vā gacchantaṃ; evaṃ kāmāvacaradhamme anubandhantampi amahaggatādimhi
analyzed: araññam vā yuddha bhūmim vā gacchantam evam kāmāvacara dhamme anubandhantam pi a mahaggata ādimhi

original: pariciteyeva dese pavattamāne dhamme anubandhati, na mahaggatalokuttaradhamme ārabbha pavattamāneti.
analyzed: paricitā iya iva dese pavattamāne dhamme anubandhati na mahaggata lokuttara dhamme ārabbha pavattamānā iti

original: Yasmā cassa “sabbo kāmāvacaravipāko kiriyamanodhātu kiriyaahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: yasmā ca ssa sabbo kāmāvacara vipāko kiriya manaḥ dhātu kiriya ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: somanassasahagatā ime dhammā parittārammaṇā”ti evaṃ accantaparittameva ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: somanassa sahagatāḥ ime dhammā paritta ārammaṇā ti evam accanta parittam eva ārammaṇam

original: vuttaṃ, tasmāpetaṃ mahaggatalokuttarārammaṇe kāmāvacaradhammepi nānubandhatīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam mahaggata lokuttara ārammaṇe kāmāvacara dhamme pi na anubandhati iti veditabbam

original: Kiṃ vā imāya yuttikathāya? Aṭṭhakathāyañhi ekanteneva vuttaṃ – ekādasa tadārammaṇacittāni
analyzed: kim vā imāya yutti kathāya aṭṭhakathāyan hi ekantena iva vuttam ekādasa tad ārammaṇa cittāni

original: nāmagottaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhanti. Paṇṇattiṃ ārabbha javane
analyzed: nāma gottam ārabbha javane javite tad ārammaṇam na gaṇhanti paṇṇattim ārabbha javane

original: javite tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati. Tilakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati.
analyzed: javite tad ārammaṇam na labbhati ti lakkhaṇa ārammaṇika vipassanāya tad ārammaṇam na labbhati

original: Vuṭṭhānagāminiyā balavavipassanāya tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati. Rūpārūpadhamme ārabbha
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna gāminiyā balava vipassanāya tad ārammaṇam na labbhati rūpa arūpa dhamme ārabbha

original: javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati. Micchattaniyatadhammesu tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati.
analyzed: javane javite tad ārammaṇam na labbhati micchat ta niyata dhammesu tad ārammaṇam na labbhati

original: Sammattaniyatadhammesu tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati. Lokuttaradhamme ārabbha javane javite
analyzed: sammatta niyata dhammesu tad ārammaṇam na labbhati lokuttara dhamme ārabbha javane javite

original: tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati. Abhiññāñāṇaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati.
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam na labbhati abhiññā ñāṇam ārabbha javane javite tad ārammaṇam na labbhati

original: Paṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati. Kāmāvacare dubbalārammaṇe
analyzed: paṭisambhidā ñāṇam ārabbha javane javite tad ārammaṇam na labbhati kāmāvacare dubbala ārammaṇe

original: tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhati, chasu dvāresu balavārammaṇe āpāthagateyeva labbhati, labbhamānañca
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam na labbhati chasu dvāresu balava ārammaṇe labbhati labbhamānam ca

original: kāmāvacareyeva labbhati. Rūpārūpabhave tadārammaṇaṃ nāma natthīti.
analyzed: kāmāvacareya iva labbhati rūpa arūpa bhave tad ārammaṇam nāma natthi iti

original: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sesesu ekūnavīsatiyā cittesu na kiñci attano anurūpāya paṭisandhiyā
analyzed: yam pana vuttam sesesu ekūnavīsatiyā cittesu na kiñci attanaḥ anurūpāya paṭisandhiyā

original: na pavattatī”ti, taṃ atisaṃkhittattā dubbijānaṃ. Tenassa vitthāranayadassanatthaṃ
analyzed: na pavattati iti tam ati saṃkhitta ttā dubbijānam tena assa vitthāra naya dassana attham

original: vuccati – “kati paṭisandhiyo? Kati paṭisandhicittāni? Kena kattha paṭisandhi hoti?
analyzed: vuccati kati paṭisandhiyaḥ kati paṭisandhi cittāni kena kattha paṭisandhi hoti

original: Kiṃ paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇa”nti?
analyzed: kim paṭisandhiyā

original: Asaññapaṭisandhiyā saddhiṃ vīsati paṭisandhiyo. Vuttappakārāneva ekūnavīsati paṭisandhicittāni.
analyzed: asañña paṭisandhiyā saddhim vīsati paṭisandhiyaḥ vutta ppakārān eva ekūnavīsati paṭisandhi cittāni

original: Tattha akusalavipākāya ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyā apāyesu paṭisandhi hoti, kusalavipākāya
analyzed: tattha akusala vipākāya ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā apāyesu paṭisandhi hoti kusala vipākāya

original: manussaloke jaccandhajātibadhirajātiummattakaeḷamūganapuṃsakādīnaṃ. Aṭṭhahi sahetukamahāvipākehi
analyzed: manussa loke aṭṭhahi sa hetuka mahā vipākehi

original: kāmāvacaradevesu ceva manussesu ca puññavantānaṃ paṭisandhi hoti, pañcahi rūpāvacaravipākehi
analyzed: kāmāvacara devesu ca iva manussesu ca puññavantānam paṭisandhi hoti pañcahi rūpāvacara vipākehi

original: rūpībrahmaloke, catūhi arūpāvacaravipākehi arūpaloketi. Yena ca yattha paṭisandhi
analyzed: rūpī brahma loke catūhi arūpāvacara vipākehi arūpa loka iti yena ca paṭisandhi

original: hoti, sā eva tassā anurūpapaṭisandhi nāma.
analyzed: hoti sā eva tassā anurūpapaṭisandhi nāma

original: Saṅkhepato paṭisandhiyā tīṇi ārammaṇāni honti – kammaṃ, kammanimittaṃ, gatinimittanti.
analyzed: saṅkhepato paṭisandhiyā tīṇi ārammaṇāni honti kammam kamma nimittam gati nimittam ti

original: Tattha kammaṃ nāma āyūhitā kusalākusalacetanā. Kammanimittaṃ nāma yaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tattha kammam nāma āyūhitā kusala akusala cetanā kamma nimittam nāma yam vatthum ārammaṇam

original: katvā kammaṃ āyūhati. Tattha atīte kappakoṭisatasahassamatthakasmimpi kamme kate
analyzed: katvā kammaṃ āyūhati tattha atīte kappa koṭi sata sahassa matthakasmim pi kamme kate

original: tasmiṃ khaṇe kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā āgantvā upaṭṭhāti.
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe kammam vā kamma nimittam vā āgantvā upaṭṭhāti

original: Tatridaṃ kammanimittassa upaṭṭhāne vatthu – gopakasīvalī kira nāma tālapiṭṭhikavihāre
analyzed: tatra idam kamma nimittassa upaṭṭhāne vatthu gopakasīvalī kira nāma tālapiṭṭhika vihāre

original: cetiyaṃ kāresi. Tassa maraṇamañce nipannassa cetiyaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. So tadeva nimittaṃ
analyzed: cetiyam kāresi tassa maraṇa mañce nipannassa cetiyam upaṭṭhāsi so tat eva nimittam

original: gaṇhitvā kālaṃkatvā devaloke nibbatti. Aññā sammūḷhakālakiriyā nāma hoti. Parammukhaṃ
analyzed: gaṇhitvā kālaṃ katvā deva loke nibbatti aññā sammūḷhakālakiriyā nāma hoti parammukham

original: gacchantassa hi pacchato tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindanti. Nipajjitvā niddāyantassāpi
analyzed: gacchantassa hi pacchatas tikhiṇena asinā sīsam chindanti nipajjitvā niddāyantassa api

original: tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindanti. Udake osīdāpetvā mārenti. Evarūpepi kāle aññataraṃ
analyzed: tikhiṇena asinā sīsam chindanti udake osīdāpetvā mārenti evarūpe pi kāle aññataram

original: kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā upaṭṭhāti. Aññaṃ lahukamaraṇaṃ nāma atthi. Nikhādanadaṇḍakamatthakasmiñhi
analyzed: kammam vā kamma nimittam vā upaṭṭhāti aññam lahukamaraṇam nāma atthi nikhādana daṇḍaka matthakasmin hi

original: nilīnamakkhikaṃ muggarena paharitvā pisanti. Evarūpepi kāle kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ
analyzed: nilīna makkhikam muggarena paharitvā pisanti evarūpe pi kāle kammam vā kamma nimittam

original: vā upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ pisiyamānāya pana makkhikāya paṭhamaṃ kāyadvārāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ
analyzed: vā upaṭṭhāti evam pisiyamānāya pana makkhikāya paṭhamam kāya dvāra āvajjanam bhavaṅgam

original: nāvaṭṭeti, manodvārāvajjanameva āvaṭṭeti. Atha javanaṃ javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati.
analyzed: na avaṭṭeti manaḥ dvāra āvajjanam eva āvaṭṭeti atha javanam javitvā bhavaṅgam otarati

original: Dutiyavāre kāyadvārāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti. Tato kāyaviññāṇaṃ, sampaṭicchanaṃ,
analyzed: dutiya vāre kāya dvāra āvajjanam bhavaṅgam āvaṭṭeti tatas kāya viññāṇam sampaṭicchanam

original: santīraṇaṃ, voṭṭhapananti vīthicittāni pavattanti. Javanaṃ javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati.

analyzed: seyyathidam kāmāvacara sugatiyam tāva ṭhitassa pāpa kammino puggalassa tamhi

original: vattati. Yathāsakañhi etassa janakaṃ kammaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammappaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena
analyzed: vattati yathāsakam hi etassa janakam kammam nānākkhaṇika kamma ppaccayena ca iva upanissaya paccayena

original: ca paccayo hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ “kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākassa upanissayapaccayena
analyzed: ca paccayaḥ hoti vuttam ha etam kusala akusalam kammam vipākassa upanissaya paccayena

original: paccayo”ti. Evaṃ vattamānassa panassa missādīhi bhedehi duvidhādikopi bhedo veditabbo,
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti evam vattamānassa panassa missa ādīhi bhedehi duvidha ādikaḥ api bhedaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: seyyathidaṃ – idañhi paṭisandhivasena ekadhā vattamānampi rūpena saha missāmissabhedato
analyzed: seyyathīdam idam hi paṭisandhi vasena ekadhā vattamānam pi rūpena saha missā amissa bhedataḥ

original: duvidhaṃ, kāmarūpārūpabhavabhedato tividhaṃ, aṇḍajajalābujasaṃsedajaopapātikayonivasena
analyzed: duvidham tividham aṇḍa ja jalābu ja saṃseda ja opapātika yoni vasena

original: catubbidhaṃ, gativasena pañcavidhaṃ, viññāṇaṭṭhitivasena sattavidhaṃ, sattāvāsavasena
analyzed: catubbidham gati vasena pañcavidham viññāṇa ṭṭhiti vasena sattavidham sattāvāsa vasena

original: aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti. Tattha –
analyzed: aṭṭhavidham hoti tattha

original: Missaṃ dvidhā bhāvabhedā, sabhāvaṃ tattha ca dvidhā;
analyzed: missam dvidhā bhāva bhedā sabhāvam ca dvidhā

original: Dve vā tayo vā dasakā, omato ādinā saha.
analyzed: dve vā tayaḥ vā dasakāḥ omataḥ ādinā saha

original: ‘Missaṃ dvidhā bhāvabhedā’ti yañhetamettha aññatra arūpabhavā rūpamissaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ
analyzed: missam dvidhā bhāva bhedā ati yat ha etam ettha aññatra arūpa bhavāḥ rūpa missam paṭisandhi viññāṇam

original: uppajjati, taṃ rūpabhave itthindriyapurisindriyasaṅkhātena bhāvena vinā uppattito
analyzed: uppajjati tam rūpa bhave itthi indriya purisa indriya saṅkhātena bhāvena vinā uppattitaḥ

original: kāmabhave aññatra jātipaṇḍakapaṭisandhiyā bhāvena saha uppattito sabhāvaṃ abhāvanti duvidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: kāma bhave aññatra jāti paṇḍaka paṭisandhiyā bhāvena saha uppattitaḥ sa bhāvam a bhāvanti duvidham hoti

original: ‘Sabhāvaṃ tattha ca dvidhā’ti tatthāpi ca yaṃ sabhāvaṃ taṃ itthipurisabhāvānaṃ aññatarena saha uppattito duvidhameva hoti.
analyzed: sabhāvam tattha ca dvidhā ati tattha api ca yam sabhāvam tam itthi purisa bhāvānam aññatarena saha uppattitaḥ duvidham eva hoti

original: ‘Dve vā tayo vā dasakā, omato ādinā sahā’ti yañhetamettha missaṃ amissanti dvaye
analyzed: dve vā tayaḥ vā dasakāḥ ādinā saha ati yat ha etam ettha missam dvaye

original: ādibhūtaṃ rūpamissaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ, tena saha vatthukāyadasakavasena dve vā
analyzed: ādi bhūtam rūpa missam paṭisandhi viññāṇam tena saha vatthu kāya dasaka vasena dve vā

original: vatthukāyabhāvadasakavasena tayo vā dasakā omato uppajjanti, natthi ito paraṃ rūpaparihānīti.
analyzed: vatthu kāya bhāva dasaka vasena tayaḥ vā dasakāḥ omataḥ uppajjanti natthi itas param rūpa parihāni iti

original: Taṃ panetaṃ evaṃ omakaparimāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ aṇḍajajalābujanāmikāsu dvīsu yonīsu
analyzed: tam pana itam evam omaka parimāṇam uppajjamānam aṇḍa ja jalābu ja nāmikāsu dvīsu yonīsu

original: jātiuṇṇāya ekena aṃsunā uddhatatelasappimaṇḍappamāṇaṃ kalalanti laddhasaṅkhaṃ hutvā
analyzed: jāti uṇṇāya ekena aṃsunā uddhata tela sappi maṇḍa ppamāṇam kalalanti laddha saṅkham hutvā

original: uppajjati. Tattha yonīnaṃ gativasena sambhavabhedo veditabbo. Etāsu hi –
analyzed: uppajjati tattha yonīnam gati vasena sambhava bhedaḥ veditabbaḥ etāsu hi

original: Niraye bhummavajjesu, devesu ca na yoniyo;
analyzed: niraye devesu ca na

original: Tisso purimikā honti, catassopi gatittaye.
analyzed: tissaḥ purimikāḥ honti catassaḥ api gatittaye

original: Tattha devesu cāti casaddena yathā niraye ca bhummavajjesu ca devesu, evaṃ nijjhāmataṇhikapetesu
analyzed: tattha devesu ca ati ca saddena yathā niraye ca bhummavajjesu ca devesu evam nijjhāma taṇhika petesu

original: ca purimikā tisso yoniyo na santīti veditabbā. Opapātikā eva hi te honti. Sese pana
analyzed: ca purimikā tissaḥ yoniyaḥ na santi iti veditabbā opapātikāḥ eva hi te honti sese pana

original: tiracchānapettivisayamanussasaṅkhāte gatittaye pubbe vajjitabhummadevesu ca catasso
analyzed: tiracchāna petti visaya manussa saṅkhāte gatittaye pubbe vajjita bhumma devesu ca catasso

original: yoniyo honti. Tattha –
analyzed: yoniyaḥ honti tattha

original: Tiṃsa nava ceva rūpīsu, sattati ukkaṃsatova rūpāni;
analyzed: tiṃsa nava ca iva rūpīsu sattati ukkaṃsataḥ uva rūpāni

original: Saṃsedajopapātīsu, atha vā avakaṃsato tiṃsa.
analyzed: saṃseda ja upapātīsu atha vā tiṃsa

original: Rūpībrahmesu tāva opapātikayonikesu cakkhusotavatthudasakānaṃ jīvitanavakassa cāti
analyzed: rūpī brahmesu tāva opapātika yonikesu cakkhu sota vatthu dasakānam jīvita navakassa ca ati

original: catunnaṃ kalāpānaṃ vasena tiṃsa ca nava ca paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha rūpāni uppajjanti.
analyzed: catunnam kalāpānam vasena tiṃsa ca nava ca paṭisandhi viññāṇena saha rūpāni uppajjanti

original: Rūpībrahme pana ṭhapetvā aññesu saṃsedajaopapātikesu ukkaṃsato cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyabhāvavatthudasakānaṃ
analyzed: rūpī brahme pana ṭhapetvā aññesu saṃseda ja opapātikesu ukkaṃsato cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya bhāva vatthu dasakānam

original: vasena sattati. Tāni ca niccaṃ devesu. Tattha vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā catasso cāpi
analyzed: vasena tāni ca niccam devesu tattha vaṇṇaḥ gandhaḥ rasaḥ ojā catasso ca api

original: dhātuyo cakkhupasādo jīvitindriyanti ayaṃ dasarūpaparimāṇo rūpapuñjo cakkhudasako
analyzed: dhātuyaḥ cakkhu pasādaḥ jīvitindriyanti ayam dasa rūpa parimāṇaḥ rūpa puñjaḥ cakkhu dasako

original: nāma. Evaṃ sesā veditabbā. Avakaṃsato pana jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ
analyzed: nāma evam sesāḥ veditabbāḥ avakaṃsataḥ pana jaccandha badhira aghānaka napuṃsakassa jivhā kāya vatthu dasakānam

original: vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjanti. Ukkaṃsāvakaṃsānaṃ pana antare anurūpato vikappo veditabbo.
analyzed: vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjanti ukkaṃsa avakaṃsānam pana antare anurūpataḥ vikappaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Evaṃ viditvā puna –
analyzed: evam viditvā punar

original: Khandhārammaṇagatihetu-vedanāpītivitakkavicārehi;
analyzed: khandha ārammaṇa gati hetu vedanā pīti vitakka vicārehi

original: Bhedābhedaviseso, cutisandhīnaṃ pariññeyyo.
analyzed: bheda abheda visesaḥ cuti sandhīnam pariññeyyaḥ

original: Yāhesā missāmissato duvidhā paṭisandhi, yā cassā atītānantarā cuti, tāsaṃ imehi khandhādīhi bhedābhedaviseso ñātabboti attho.
analyzed: yā ha esā missā amissataḥ duvidhā paṭisandhi yā ca assāḥ atīta anantarā tāsam imehi khandha ādīhi bheda abheda visesaḥ ñātabbaḥ ti attho

original: Kathaṃ? Kadāci catukkhandhāya āruppacutiyā anantarā catukkhandhāva ārammaṇatopi abhinnā
analyzed: katham kadāci catu khandhāya āruppa cutiyāḥ anantarā ārammaṇataḥ pi abhinnā

original: paṭisandhi hoti, kadāci amahaggatabahiddhārammaṇāya mahaggataajjhattārammaṇā. Ayaṃ
analyzed: paṭisandhi hoti kadāci amahaggata bahiddhā ārammaṇāya mahaggata ajjhatta ārammaṇā ayaṃ

original: tāva arūpabhūmīsuyeva nayo. Kadāci pana catukkhandhāya āruppacutiyā anantarā pañcakkhandhā
analyzed: tāva kadāci pana catu khandhāya āruppa cutiyāḥ anantarā pañca kkhandhā

original: kāmāvacarā paṭisandhi. Kadāci pañcakkhandhāya kāmāvacaracutiyā rūpāvacaracutiyā vā
analyzed: kāmāvacarā kadāci pañcakkhandhāya kāmāvacara cutiyā rūpāvacara cutiyā vā

original: anantarā catukkhandhā āruppapaṭisandhi. Evaṃ atītārammaṇacutiyā atītanavattabbapaccuppannārammaṇā
analyzed: anantarā catu khandhāḥ āruppa paṭisandhi evam atīta ārammaṇa cutiyā atīta navattabba paccuppanna ārammaṇā

original: paṭisandhi, ekaccasugaticutiyā ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhi, ahetukacutiyā sahetukapaṭisandhi,
analyzed: paṭisandhi ekacca sugati cutiyā ekacca duggati paṭisandhi ahetuka cutiyā sa hetuka paṭisandhi

original: duhetukacutiyā tihetukapaṭisandhi, upekkhāsahagatacutiyā somanassasahagatapaṭisandhi,
analyzed: du hetuka cutiyā ti hetuka paṭisandhi upekkhā sahagata cutiyā somanassa sahagata paṭisandhi

original: appītikacutiyā sappītikapaṭisandhi, avitakkacutiyā savitakkapaṭisandhi, avicāracutiyā
analyzed: appītika cutiyā sappītika paṭisandhi avitakka cutiyā sa vitakka paṭisandhi avicāra cutiyā

original: savicārapaṭisandhi, avitakkaavicāracutiyā savitakkasavicārapaṭisandhīti tassa tassa
analyzed: sa vicāra paṭisandhi avitakka avicāra cutiyā sa vitakka sa vicāra paṭisandhi iti tassa tassa

original: viparītato ca yathāyogaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: viparītataḥ ca yathāyogam yojetabbam

original: Laddhappaccayamitidhamma-mattametaṃ bhavantaramupeti;
analyzed: laddhappaccayam iti dhammam attam etam bhavantaram upeti

original: Nāssa tato saṅkanti, na tato hetuṃ vinā hoti.
analyzed: na assa tatas na tatas hetum vinā hoti

original: Iti hetaṃ laddhapaccayaṃ rūpārūpadhammamattaṃ uppajjamānaṃ bhavantaraṃ upetīti vuccati,
analyzed: iti ha etam laddha paccayam rūpa arūpa dhamma mattam uppajjamānam bhavantaram upeti iti vuccati

original: na satto, na jīvo. Tassa nāpi atītabhavato idha saṅkanti atthi, nāpi tato hetuṃ vinā
analyzed: na satto na jīvaḥ tassa nā api atīta bhavataḥ idha atthi nā api tatas hetum vinā

original: idha pātubhāvo. Tayidaṃ pākaṭena manussacutipaṭisandhikkamena pakāsayissāma –
analyzed: idha pātubhāvaḥ tayidam pākaṭena manussa cuti paṭisandhi kkamena pakāsayissāma

original: Atītabhavasmiñhi sarasena upakkamena vā samāsannamaraṇassa asayhānaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgasandhibandhanacchedakānaṃ
analyzed: atīta bhavasmin hi sarasena upakkamena vā samāsanna maraṇassa a sayhānam sabbaṅga paccaṅga sandhibandhana chedakānam

original: māraṇantikavedanāsattānaṃ sannipātaṃ asahantassa ātape pakkhittaharitatālapaṇṇamiva
analyzed: māraṇa antika vedanā sattānam sannipātam a sahantassa ātape pakkhitta harita tāla paṇṇam iva

original: kamena upasussamāne sarīre niruddhesu cakkhādīsu indriyesu hadayavatthumatte patiṭṭhitesu
analyzed: kamena upasussamāne sarīre niruddhesu cakkha ādīsu indriyesu hadaya vatthumatte patiṭṭhitesu

original: kāyindriyamanindriyajīvitindriyesu taṅkhaṇāvasesaṃ hadayavatthusannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ
analyzed: kāyindriyam anindriya jīvitindriyesu tad khaṇa avasesam hadaya vatthu sannissitam viññāṇam

original: garusamāsevitāsannapubbakatānaṃ aññataraṃ laddhāvasesapaccayasaṅkhārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ
analyzed: garu samāsevita āsanna pubbaka tānam aññataram laddha avasesa paccaya saṅkhāra saṅkhātam kammaṃ

original: vā tadupaṭṭhāpitaṃ vā kammanimittagatinimittasaṅkhātaṃ visayamārabbha pavattati.
analyzed: vā tad upaṭṭhāpitam vā kamma nimitta gati nimitta saṅkhātam visayam ārabbha pavattati

original: Tadevaṃ pavattamānaṃ taṇhāavijjānaṃ appahīnattā avijjāpaṭicchāditādīnave tasmiṃ visaye
analyzed: tat evam pavattamānam taṇhā avijjānam appahīna ttā avijjā paṭicchādita ādīnave tasmin visaye

original: taṇhā nāmeti, sahajātasaṅkhārā khipanti. Taṃ santativasena taṇhāya nāmiyamānaṃ saṅkhārehi
analyzed: taṇhā nāma iti sahajāta saṅkhārā khipanti tam santati vasena taṇhāya nāmiyamānam saṅkhārehi

original: khippamānaṃ orimatīrarukkhavinibaddharajjumālambitvā mātikātikkamako viya purimañca
analyzed: khippamānam orima tīra rukkha vinibaddha rajjum ālambitvā mātikā atikkamakaḥ purimañca

original: nissayaṃ jahati, aparañca kammasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ nissayaṃ assādayamānaṃ vā anassādayamānaṃ
analyzed: nissayam jahati aparam ca kamma samuṭṭhāpitam nissayam assādayamānam vā an assādayamānam

original: vā ārammaṇādīhiyeva paccayehi pavattati.
analyzed: vā ārammaṇa ādīhi yeva paccayehi pavattati

original: Ettha ca purimaṃ cavanato cuti, pacchimaṃ bhavantarādipaṭisandhānato paṭisandhīti
analyzed: ettha ca purimam cavanato pacchimam bhavantara ādi paṭisandhānato paṭisandhi iti

original: vuccati. Tadetaṃ nāpi purimabhavā idha āgataṃ, nāpi tato kammasaṅkhāranativisayādihetuṃ
analyzed: vuccati tat etam na api purima bhavāḥ idha āgatam na api tatas kamma saṅkhāra nati visaya ādi hetum

original: vinā pātubhūtanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vinā pātubhūtan ti veditabbam

original: Siyuṃ nidassanānettha, paṭighosādikā atha;
analyzed: siyum paṭighosa ādikāḥ atha

original: Santānabandhato natthi, ekatā nāpi nānatā.
analyzed: santāna bandhataḥ natthi ekatā na api nānatā

original: Ettha cetassa viññāṇassa purimabhavato idha anāgamane atītabhavapariyāpannahetūhi
analyzed: ettha cetassa viññāṇassa purima bhavataḥ idha anāgamane atīta bhava pariyāpanna hetūhi

original: ca uppāde paṭighosapadīpamuddāpaṭibimbappakārā dhammā nidassanāni siyuṃ. Yathā hi
analyzed: ca uppāde paṭighosa padīpa muddā paṭibimba ppakārāḥ dhammāḥ nidassanāni siyum yathā hi

original: paṭighosapadīpamuddacchāyā saddādihetukā aññatra agantvā honti, evameva idaṃ cittaṃ.
analyzed: sadda ādi hetukāḥ aññatra a gantvā honti evam eva idam cittam

original: Ettha ca ‘santānabandhato natthi ekatā nāpi nānatā’. Yadi hi santānabandhe sati ekantamekatā
analyzed: ettha ca santāna bandhataḥ natthi ekatā nā api nānatā yadi hi santāna bandhe sati ekantam ekatā

original: bhaveyya, na khīrato dadhi sambhūtaṃ siyā. Athāpi ekantanānatā bhaveyya, na khīrassādhīno
analyzed: bhaveyya na khīrataḥ dadhi sambhūtam siyāḥ atha api ekanta nānatā bhaveyya na

original: dadhi siyā. Esa nayo sabbahetuhetusamuppannesu. Evañca sati sabbalokavohāralopo siyā.
analyzed: dadhi siyā esa nayo sabba hetu hetu samuppannesu evam ca sati sabba loka vohāra lopaḥ siyā

original: So ca aniṭṭho. Tasmā ettha na ekantamekatā vā nānatā vā upagantabbāti.
analyzed: so ca aniṭṭho tasmai ettha na ekantam ekatā vā nānatā vā upagantabbā ati

original: Etthāha – nanu evaṃ asaṅkantipātubhāve sati ye imasmiṃ manussattabhāve khandhā, tesaṃ
analyzed: ettha āha nanu evam asaṅkanti pātubhāve sati ye imasmin manussatta bhāve khandhāḥ tesam

original: niruddhattā phalapaccayassa ca kammassa tattha agamanato aññassa aññato ca taṃ phalaṃ
analyzed: niruddha ttā phala paccayassa ca kammassa tattha agamanataḥ aññassa aññatas ca tam phalam

original: siyā? Upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyā? Tasmā na sundaramidaṃ vidhānanti. Tatridaṃ vuccati –
analyzed: siyā upabhuñjake ca asati kassa tam phalam siyā tasmā na sundaram idam vidhānam ti tatra idam vuccati

original: Santāne yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ, nāññassa na ca aññato;
analyzed: santāne yam phalam etam na aññassa na ca aññatas

original: Bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro, etassatthassa sādhako.
analyzed: bījānam abhisaṅkhāraḥ etassa atthassa sādhakaḥ

original: Ekasantānasmiñhi phalamuppajjamānaṃ tattha ekantaṃ ekattanānattānaṃ paṭisiddhattā
analyzed: eka santānasmin hi phalam uppajjamānam tattha ekantam ekatta nānattānam paṭisiddha ttā

original: aññassāti vā aññatoti vā na hoti. Etassa ca panatthassa bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro sādhako.
analyzed: aññassa ati vā aññatas ti vā na hoti etassa ca pana atthassa bījānam abhisaṅkhāraḥ sādhako

original: Ambabījādīnañhi abhisaṅkhāresu katesu tassa bījassa santāne laddhapaccayo kālantare
analyzed: amba bīja ādīnam hi abhisaṅkhāresu katesu tassa bījassa santāne laddha paccayaḥ kāla antare

original: phalaviseso uppajjamāno na aññabījānaṃ nāpi aññābhisaṅkhārapaccayā uppajjati, na
analyzed: phala visesaḥ uppajjamānaḥ na añña bījānam na api añña abhisaṅkhāra paccayā uppajjati na

original: ca tāni bījāni te abhisaṅkhārā vā phalaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇanti. Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ca tāni bījāni te abhisaṅkhārāḥ vā phala ṭṭhānam pāpuṇanti evam sampadam idam veditabbam

original: Vijjāsipposadhādīhi cāpi bālasarīre upayuttehi kālantare vuḍḍhasarīrādīsu phaladehi
analyzed: vijjā sipposadha ādīhi ca api bāla sarīre upayuttehi kāla antare vuḍḍha sarīra ādīsu phala dehi

original: ayamattho veditabbo.
analyzed: ayam atthaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Yampi vuttaṃ ‘upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyā’ti? Tattha –
analyzed: yat api vuttam upabhuñjake ca asati kassa tam phalam siyāti tattha

original: Phalassuppattiyā eva, siddhā bhuñjakasammuti;
analyzed: phalassa uppattiyāḥ eva siddhā bhuñjaka sammuti

original: Phaluppādena rukkhassa, yathā phalati sammuti.
analyzed: phala uppādena rukkhassa yathā phalati sammuti

original: Yathā hi rukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekadesabhūtassa rukkhaphalassa uppattiyā eva
analyzed: yathā hi rukkha saṅkhātānam dhammānam eka desa bhūtassa rukkha phalassa uppattiyāḥ eva

original: rukkho phalatīti vā phalitoti vā vuccati, tathā devamanussasaṅkhātānaṃ khandhānaṃ
analyzed: rukkho phalati iti vā phalitaḥ ti vā vuccati tathā deva manussa saṅkhātānam khandhānam

original: ekadesabhūtassa upabhogasaṅkhātassa sukhadukkhaphalassa uppādeneva devo vā manusso
analyzed: eka desa bhūtassa upabhoga saṅkhātassa sukha dukkha phalassa uppādena iva devaḥ vā manusso

original: vā upabhuñjatīti vā sukhitoti vā dukkhitoti vā vuccati. Tasmā na ettha aññena upabhuñjakena
analyzed: vā upabhuñjati iti vā sukhito ti vā dukkhito ti vā vuccati tasmā na ettha aññena upabhuñjakena

original: nāma koci attho atthīti.
analyzed: nāma koci atthaḥ atthi iti

original: uppannaṃ hotī”tiādi. Yathārahassa attano phalassa ca paccayā hutvā na puna phalāvahā
