analyzed: na atthi dinnam na atthi sacchikatvā pavedenti iti yā evarūpā vipariyesaggāhaḥ

original: – idaṃ vuccati diṭṭhupādāna”nti sīlavatehi suddhiparāmasanaṃ pana sīlabbatupādānaṃ.
analyzed: idam vuccati diṭṭh upādānam ti sīlavatehi suddhi parāmasanam pana sīlabbata upādānam

original: Yathāha – “tattha katamaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ? Ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sīlena
analyzed: yathā āha tattha katamam sīla bbata upādānam itas bahiddhā samaṇa brāhmaṇānam sīlena

original: suddhi, vatena suddhi, sīlabbatena suddhīti yā evarūpā diṭṭhi…pe… vipariyesaggāho
analyzed: suddhi vatena suddhi sīlabbatena suddhi iti yā evarūpā

original: – idaṃ vuccati sīlabbatupādāna”nti. Vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi attavādupādānaṃ.
analyzed: idam vuccati sīla bbata upādānam ti vīsati vatthukā sakkāya diṭṭhi atta vāda upādānam

original: Yathāha – “tattha katamaṃ attavādupādānaṃ? Idha assutavā puthujjano…pe… sappurisadhamme
analyzed: yathā āha tattha katamam attavāt upādānam idha sappurisa dhamme

original: avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati…pe… vipariyesaggāho – idaṃ vuccati attavādupādāna”nti.
analyzed: avinītaḥ rūpam attataḥ samanupassati pe vipariyesa ggāhaḥ idam vuccati atta vāda upādānam ti

original: Ayamettha dhammasaṅkhepavitthāro.
analyzed: ayam ettha dhamma saṅkhepa vitthāraḥ

original: ‘Kamato’ti ettha pana tividho kamo – uppattikkamo, pahānakkamo, desanākkamo ca. Tattha
analyzed: kamataḥ ti ettha pana tividhaḥ kamaḥ uppatti kkamaḥ pahāna kkamaḥ desanā kkamaḥ ca tattha

original: anamatagge saṃsāre imassa paṭhamaṃ uppattīti abhāvato kilesānaṃ nippariyāyena uppattikkamo
analyzed: anamatagge saṃsāre imassa paṭhamam uppatti iti abhāvataḥ kilesānam nippariyāyena uppatti kkamaḥ

original: na vuccati. Pariyāyena pana yebhuyyena ekasmiṃ bhave attaggāhapubbaṅgamo sassatucchedābhiniveso.
analyzed: na vuccati pariyāyena pana yebhuyyena ekasmin bhave atta ggāha pubbaṅgamaḥ sassatu cheda abhiniveso

original: Tato “sassato ayaṃ attā”ti gaṇhato attavisuddhatthaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ, ucchijjatīti
analyzed: tatas sassataḥ ayam attā ati gaṇhataḥ atta visuddha attham sīlabbata upādānam ucchijjati iti

original: gaṇhato paralokanirapekkhassa kāmupādānanti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ attavādupādānaṃ, tato diṭṭhisīlabbatakāmupādānānīti
analyzed: gaṇhataḥ para loka nirapekkhassa kāma upādānam ti evam paṭhamam attavāda upādānam tatas diṭṭhi sīla bbata kāma upādānāni iti

original: ayametesaṃ ekasmiṃ bhave uppattikkamo.
analyzed: ayam etesam ekasmin bhave uppatti kkamaḥ

original: Diṭṭhupādānādīni cettha paṭhamaṃ pahīyanti sotāpattimaggavajjhattā. Kāmupādānaṃ pacchā arahattamaggavajjhattāti. Ayametesaṃ pahānakkamo.
analyzed: diṭṭhupādāna ādīni ca ittha paṭhamam pahīyanti sotāpatti magga vajjhattā kāma upādānam pacchā arahatta magga vajjhattā ati ayam etesam pahāna kkamaḥ

original: Mahāvisayattā pana pākaṭattā ca etesu kāmupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ. Mahāvisayañhi
analyzed: mahā visaya ttā pana pākaṭa ttā ca etesu kāma upādānam paṭhamam desitam mahā visayam hi

original: taṃ aṭṭhacittasampayogā. Appavisayāni itarāni catucittasampayogā. Yebhuyyena ca ālayarāmatāya
analyzed: tam aṭṭha citta sampayogāḥ appa visayāni itarāni catu citta sampayogāḥ yebhuyyena ca ālaya rāma tāya

original: pajāya pākaṭaṃ kāmupādānaṃ, na itarāni. Kāmupādānavā vatthukāmānaṃ samadhigamatthaṃ
analyzed: pajāya pākaṭam kāma upādānam na itarāni kāma upādānavā vatthu kāmānam samadhigama attham

original: kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulo hoti, na sassatadiṭṭhīti tadanantaraṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Taṃ
analyzed: kotūhala maṅgala ādi bahulaḥ hoti na sassata diṭṭhī iti tad anantaram diṭṭhupādānam tam

original: pabhijjamānaṃ sīlabbataattavādupādānavasena duvidhaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ dvaye gokiriyaṃ
analyzed: pabhijjamānam tasmin dvaye gokiriyam

original: vā kukkurakiriyaṃ vā disvāpi veditabbato oḷārikanti sīlabbatupādānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ,
analyzed: vā kukkura kiriyam vā disvā api veditabbataḥ oḷārikam ti sīlabbata upādānam paṭhamam desitam

original: sukhumattā ante attavādupādānanti ayametesaṃ desanākkamo.
analyzed: sukhuma tā ante ayam etesam desanā kkamo

original: Taṇhā ca purimassettha, ekadhā hoti paccayo;
analyzed: taṇhā ca purimassa ittha ekadhā hoti paccayo

original: Sattadhā aṭṭhadhā vāpi, hoti sesattayassa sā.
analyzed: sattadhā aṭṭhadhā vā api hoti sesa ttayassa sā

original: Ettha ca evaṃ desite upādānacatukke purimassa kāmupādānassa kāmataṇhā upanissayavasena
analyzed: ettha ca evam desite upādāna catukke purimassa kāma upādānassa kāma taṇhā upanissaya vasena

original: ekadhāva paccayo hoti taṇhābhinanditesu visayesu uppattito. Sesattayassa pana sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatahetuvasena
analyzed: ekadhā ava paccayaḥ hoti taṇhā abhinanditesu visayesu uppattito sesa ttayassa pana sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigata hetu vasena

original: sattadhā vā upanissayena saha aṭṭhadhā vāpi paccayo hoti. Yadā ca sā upanissayavasena
analyzed: sattadhā vā upanissayena saha aṭṭhadhā vā api paccayaḥ hoti yadā ca sā upanissaya vasena

original: paccayo hoti tadā asahajātāva hotīti.
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti tadā asahajātā ava hoti iti

original: Taṇhāpaccayā upādānapadaniddeso.
analyzed: taṇhā paccayā upādāna pada niddeso

original: Bhavapadaniddeso
analyzed: bhava pada niddeso

original: 234. Upādānapaccayā bhavaniddese –
analyzed: upādāna paccayāḥ bhava niddese

original: Atthato dhammato ceva, sātthato bhedasaṅgahā;
analyzed: atthataḥ dhammato ca iva sā atthataḥ bheda saṅgahā

original: Yaṃ yassa paccayo ceva, viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: yam yassa paccayaḥ ca iva viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Tattha bhavatīti bhavo. Duvidhenāti dvīhi ākārehi pavattitoti attho. Athavā duvidhenāti
analyzed: tattha bhavati iti bhavaḥ duvidhena ati dvīhi ākārehi pavattito ti attho athavā duvidhena ati

original: paccate karaṇavacanaṃ, duvidhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Atthīti saṃvijjati. Kammameva bhavo
analyzed: paccate karaṇa vacanam duvidhaḥ ti vuttam hoti atthi iti saṃvijjati kammam eva bhavaḥ

original: kammabhavo. Upapattiyeva bhavo upapattibhavo. Ettha ca upapatti bhavatīti bhavo.
analyzed: kamma bhavaḥ upapattiyā iva bhavaḥ upapatti bhavaḥ ettha ca upapatti bhavati iti bhavo

original: Kammaṃ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā “sukho buddhānamuppādo”ti vutto, evaṃ bhavakāraṇattā
analyzed: kammam pana yathā sukha kāraṇa ttā sukhaḥ buddhānam uppādaḥ ti vuttaḥ evam bhava kāraṇa ttā

original: phalavohārena bhavoti veditabbaṃ. Tattha katamo kammabhavoti tesu dvīsu bhavesu yo
analyzed: phala vohārena bhavo ti veditabbam tattha katamo kamma bhavaḥ ti tesu dvīsu bhavesu yaḥ

original: kammabhavoti vutto, so katamoti attho. Puññābhisaṅkhārādayo vuttatthā eva. Sabbanti
analyzed: kamma bhavaḥ ti vutto so katamaḥ ti attho puñña abhisaṅkhāra ādayaḥ vutta tthāḥ eva sabbanti

original: anavasesaṃ. Bhavaṃ gacchati gameti cāti bhavagāmi. Iminā lokuttaraṃ paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: anavasesam bhavam gacchati ca ati bhava gāmi iminā lokuttaram paṭikkhipati

original: Ayañhi vaṭṭakathā, tañca vivaṭṭanissitanti. Karīyatīti kammaṃ.
analyzed: ayam hi vaṭṭa kathā tat ca vivaṭṭa nissitanti karīyati iti kammaṃ

original: Kāmabhavādīsu kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo kāmabhavo. Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu. Saññāvataṃ
analyzed: kāma bhava ādīsu kāma saṅkhātaḥ bhavo kāma bhavaḥ esa nayaḥ rūpa arūpa bhavesu

original: bhavo, saññā vā ettha bhave atthīti saññābhavo. Vipariyāyena asaññābhavo. Oḷārikasaññāya
analyzed: bhavo saññā va ettha bhave atthi iti saññā bhavaḥ vipariyāyena a saññā bhavaḥ oḷārika saññāya

original: abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā neva saññā nāsaññā asmiṃ bhaveti nevasaññānāsaññābhavo.
analyzed: abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā na iva saññā na asaññā asmin bhaveti nevasaññā nāsaññā bhavaḥ

original: Ekena rūpakkhandhena vokiṇṇo bhavo ekavokārabhavo. Eko vā vokāro assa bhavassāti
analyzed: ekena rūpakkhandhena vokiṇṇaḥ bhavaḥ eka vokāra bhavaḥ ekaḥ vā vokāraḥ assa bhavassa ati

original: ekavokārabhavo. Eseva nayo catuvokārapañcavokārabhavesu. Ayaṃ vuccati upapattibhavoti
analyzed: ekavokāra bhavo esa iva nayo catuvokāra pañcavokāra bhavesu ayam vuccati upapatti bhavo ti

original: esa navavidhopi upapattibhavo nāma vuccatīti. Evaṃ tāvettha ‘atthato’ viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: esa navavidhaḥ api upapatti bhavaḥ nāma vuccati iti evam tāva ettha atthataḥ viññātabbaḥ vinicchayo

original: ‘Dhammato’ pana ettha hi puññābhisaṅkhāro dhammato terasa cetanā, apuññābhisaṅkhāro
analyzed: dhammataḥ pana ettha hi puñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ dhammataḥ terasa cetanāḥ apuñña abhisaṅkhāro

original: dvādasa, āneñjābhisaṅkhāro catasso. “Sabbampi bhavagāmikamma”nti etena sabbepete
analyzed: dvādasaḥ āneñja abhisaṅkhāro catasso sabbam pi bhava gāmi kammanti etena sabbe pete

original: dhammā cetanā sampayuttā vā kammasaṅkhātā ācayagāmino dhammā saṅgahitā. Kāmabhavo
analyzed: dhammā cetanā sampayuttāḥ vā kamma saṅkhātāḥ ācaya gāminaḥ dhammā saṅgahitā kāma bhavaḥ

original: pañca upādinnakkhandhā, tathā rūpabhavo, arūpabhavo cattāro, saññābhavo catupañca,
analyzed: pañca upādinna kkhandhā tathā rūpa bhavaḥ arūpa bhavo cattāro saññā bhavo catu pañca

original: asaññābhavo eko upādinnakkhandho, nevasaññānāsaññābhavo cattāro. Ekavokārabhavādayo
analyzed: asaññā bhavaḥ ekaḥ upādinna kkhandho nevasaññānāsaññābhavo cattāro eka vokāra bhava ādayo

original: ekacatupañcakkhandhā upādinnakkhandhehīti evamettha ‘dhammato’pi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: eka catu pañca khandhāḥ upādinna kkhandhehi iti evam ettha dhammataḥ pi viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: ‘Sātthato’ti yathā ca bhavaniddese tatheva kāmañca saṅkhāraniddesepi puññābhisaṅkhārādayova
analyzed: yathā ca bhava niddese tathā iva kāmañca saṅkhāra niddese pi

original: vuttā, evaṃ santepi purimā atītakammavasena idha paṭisandhiyā paccayattā vuttā. Ime
analyzed: vuttāḥ evam sante pi purimāḥ atīta kamma vasena idha paṭisandhiyā paccaya ttāḥ vuttāḥ ime

original: paccuppannakammavasena āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayattāti punavacanaṃ sātthakameva.
analyzed: paccuppanna kamma vasena āyatim paṭisandhiyā paccaya ttā ti punavacanam sātthakam eva

original: Pubbe vā “tattha katamo puññābhisaṅkhāro? Kusalacetanā kāmāvacarā”ti evamādinā nayena
analyzed: pubbe vā tattha katamo puñña abhisaṅkhāro kusala cetanā kāmāvacarā ti evamādinā nayena

original: cetanāva saṅkhārāti vuttā. Idha pana “sabbampi bhavagāmikamma”nti vacanato cetanāsampayuttāpi.
analyzed: cetanā ava saṅkhārā ti vuttāḥ idha pana sabbam pi bhava gāmi kammanti vacanato cetanā sampayuttā api

original: Pubbe ca viññāṇapaccayameva kammaṃ saṅkhārāti vuttaṃ, idāni asaññābhavanibbattakampi.
analyzed: pubbe ca viññāṇa paccayam eva kammam saṅkhārā ti vuttam idāni asaññā bhava nibbattakam pi

original: Kiṃ vā bahunā? “Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettha puññābhisaṅkhārādayova kusalākusaladhammā
analyzed: kim vā bahunā avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā ti ettha puñña abhisaṅkhāra ādayaḥ eva kusala akusala dhammā

original: vuttā. “Upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti idha pana upapattibhavassāpi saṅgahitattā kusalākusalābyākatā
analyzed: vuttāḥ upādāna paccayāḥ bhavaḥ ti idha pana upapatti bhavassa api saṅgahita ttā kusala akusala abyākatā

original: dhammā vuttā. Tasmā sabbathāpi sātthakamevidaṃ punavacananti. Evamettha ‘sātthato’pi
analyzed: dhammā vuttā tasmā sabbathā api sātthakam eva idam punavacanan ti evam ettha sātthataḥ pi

original: viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: ‘Bhedasaṅgahā’ti upādānapaccayā bhavassa bhedato ceva saṅgahato ca. Yañhi kāmupādānapaccayā
analyzed: bheda saṅgahā ati upādāna paccayā bhavassa bhedato ca iva saṅgahato ca yat hi kāma upādāna paccayā

original: kāmabhavanibbattakaṃ kammaṃ kariyati, so kammabhavo. Tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo.
analyzed: kāma bhava nibbattakam kammam kariyati saḥ kamma bhavaḥ tad abhinibbattā khandhāḥ upapatti bhavaḥ

original: Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu. Evaṃ kāmupādānapaccayā dve kāmabhavā, tadantogadhāva saññābhavapañcavokārabhavā;
analyzed: rūpa arūpa bhavesu evam kāma upādāna paccayā dve kāma bhavā saññā bhava pañcavokāra bhavā

original: dve rūpabhavā, tadantogadhāva saññābhavaasaññābhavaekavokārabhavapañcavokārabhavā;
analyzed: dve rūpa bhavā saññā bhava asaññā bhava ekavokāra bhava pañcavokāra bhavā

original: dve arūpabhavā, tadantogadhāva saññābhavanevasaññānāsaññābhavacatuvokārabhavāti saddhiṃ
analyzed: dve arūpa bhavā saññā bhava nevasaññā na asaññā bhava catuvokāra bhavā ati saddhiṃ

original: antogadhehi cha bhavā. Yathā ca kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi cha bhavā tathā
analyzed: antogadhehi cha bhavā yathā ca kāma upādāna paccayā saddhim antogadhehi cha bhavā tathā

original: sesupādānapaccayāpīti evaṃ upādānapaccayā bhedato saddhiṃ antogadhehi catuvīsati bhavā.
analyzed: sesa upādāna paccayā api iti evam upādāna paccayāḥ bhedato saddhim antogadhehi catuvīsati bhavā

original: Saṅgahato pana kammabhavaṃ upapattibhavañca ekato katvā kāmupādānapaccayā saddhiṃ
analyzed: saṅgahato pana kamma bhavam upapatti bhavam ca ekatas katvā kāma upādāna paccayā saddhiṃ

original: antogadhehi eko kāmabhavo, tathā rūpārūpabhavāti tayo bhavā. Tathā sesupādānapaccayāpīti
analyzed: eko kāma bhavo tathā rūpa arūpa bhavā ti tayaḥ bhavā tathā sesa upādāna paccayā api iti

original: evaṃ upādānapaccayā saṅgahato saddhiṃ antogadhehi dvādasa bhavā. Apica avisesena
analyzed: evam upādāna paccayā saṅgahato saddhim antogadhehi dvādasa bhavāḥ api ca avisesena

original: upādānapaccayā kāmabhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo. Tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo.
analyzed: upādāna paccayā kāma bhava upagam kammam kamma bhavaḥ tad abhinibbattā khandhāḥ upapatti bhavaḥ

original: Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu. Evaṃ upādānapaccayā saddhiṃ antogadhehi dve kāmabhavā,
analyzed: esa nayo rūpa arūpa bhavesu evam upādāna paccayā saddhim antogadhehi dve kāma bhavā

original: dve rūpabhavā, dve arūpabhavāti aparenapi pariyāyena saṅgahato cha bhavā. Kammabhavaupapattibhavabhedaṃ
analyzed: dve rūpa bhavā dve arūpa bhavā ati aparena api pariyāyena cha bhavā kamma bhava aupapatti bhava bhedam

original: vā anupagamma saddhiṃ antogadhehi kāmabhavādivasena tayo bhavā honti. Kāmabhavādibhedañcāpi
analyzed: vā an upagamma saddhim antogadhehi kāma bhava ādi vasena tayaḥ bhavāḥ honti kāma bhava ādi bhedam ca api

original: anupagamma kammabhavaupapattibhavavasena dve bhavā honti. Kammupapattibhedañca anupagamma
analyzed: an upagamma kamma bhava aupapatti bhava vasena dve bhavāḥ honti kamma upapatti bhedam ca an upagamma

original: upādānapaccayā bhavoti bhavavasena eko bhavo hotīti. Evamettha upādānapaccayassa
analyzed: upādāna paccayāḥ bhavaḥ ti bhava vasena ekaḥ bhavaḥ hoti iti evam ettha upādāna paccayassa

original: bhavassa bhedasaṅgahāpi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: bhavassa bheda saṅgahā api viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: ‘Yaṃ yassa paccayo cevā’ti yañcettha upādānaṃ yassa paccayo hoti, tatopi viññātabbo
analyzed: yam yassa paccayaḥ ca iva ati yat ca ittha upādānam yassa paccayaḥ hoti tatas api viññātabbo

original: vinicchayoti attho. Kiṃ panettha kassa paccayo hoti? Yaṃ kiñci yassa kassaci paccayo
analyzed: vinicchayaḥ ti attho kim pana ittha kassa paccayaḥ hoti yam kiñci yassa kassaci paccayaḥ

original: hotiyeva. Ummattako viya hi puthujjano. So ‘idaṃ yuttaṃ, idaṃ ayutta’nti avicāretvā
analyzed: ummattakaḥ viya hi puthujjanaḥ saḥ idam yuttam idam ayuttam ti a vicāretvā

original: yassa kassaci upādānassa vasena yaṃ kiñci bhavaṃ patthetvā yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ karotiyeva.
analyzed: yassa kassaci upādānassa vasena yam kiñci bhavam patthetvā yam kiñci kammam

original: Tasmā yadekacce “sīlabbatupādānena rūpārūpabhavā na hontī”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: tasmā yat ekacce sīlabbata upādānena rūpa arūpa bhavāḥ na honti iti vadanti tam na gahetabbam

original: Sabbena pana sabbo hotīti gahetabbaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco anussavavasena vā diṭṭhānusārena
analyzed: sabbena pana sabbaḥ hoti iti gahetabbam seyyathidam idha ekaccaḥ anussava vasena vā diṭṭha anusārena

original: vā “kāmā nāmete manussaloke ceva khattiyamahāsālakulādīsu chakāmāvacaradevaloke ca
analyzed: vā kāmāḥ nāma ete manussa loke ca iva khattiya mahāsāla kula ādīsu cha kāmāvacara deva loke ca

original: samiddhā”ti cintetvā tesaṃ adhigamatthaṃ asaddhammasavanādīhi vañcito ‘iminā kammena
analyzed: samiddhā iti cintetvā tesam adhigama attham asat dhamma savana ādīhi vañcitaḥ iminā kammena

original: kāmā sampajjantī’ti maññamāno kāmupādānavasena kāyaduccaritādīnipi karoti. So duccaritapāripūriyā

2. Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
243. Evaṃ mahāpathaviṃ pattharanto viya ākāsaṃ vitthārayanto viya ca sabbadhammesu

original: Imaṃ pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇitukāmena kulaputtena āditova catubbidhaṃ
analyzed: imam pana kammaṭṭhānam bhāvetvā arahattam pāpuṇitu kāmena kula puttena āditas va catubbidham

original: sīlaṃ sodhetvā suparisuddhasīle patiṭṭhitena, yvāyaṃ dasasu palibodhesu palibodho
analyzed: sīlam sodhetvā su parisuddha sīle patiṭṭhitena yvā ayam dasasu palibodhesu palibodhaḥ

original: atthi taṃ upacchinditvā, paṭikkūlamanasikārakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā,
analyzed: atthi tam upacchinditvā paṭikkūla manasikāra kammaṭṭhāna bhāvanāya paṭhama jhānam nibbattetvā

original: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā, arahattaṃ anāgāmiphalādīsu vā aññataraṃ
analyzed: jhānam pādakam katvā vipassanam paṭṭhapetvā arahattam anāgāmi phala ādīsu vā aññataram

original: pattassa sabbantimena paricchedena sāṭṭhakathāya pāḷiyā kataparicayassa tantiācariyassāpi
analyzed: pattassa sabba antimena paricchedena sa aṭṭhakathāya pāḷiyā kata paricayassa tanti ācariyassa api

original: kalyāṇamittassa santike uggahetabbaṃ. Visuddhaṃ tathārūpaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ ekavihāre
analyzed: kalyāṇa mittassa santike uggahetabbam visuddham tathārūpam kalyāṇa mittam eka vihāre

original: alabhantena tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā uggahetabbaṃ. Tattha catubbidhasīlavisodhanañceva
analyzed: a labhantena tassa vasana ṭṭhānam gantvā uggahetabbam tattha catubbidha sīla visodhanam ca eva

original: palibodho ca palibodhupacchedo ca ācariyassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamanavidhānañca sabbampi
analyzed: palibodho ca palibodha upacchedo ca ācariyassa santikam upasaṅkamana vidhānañca sabbam pi

original: visuddhimagge vitthārato kathitaṃ. Tasmā taṃ tattha kathitanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: visuddhi magge vitthārato kathitam tasmā tam tattha kathita nayena iva veditabbam

original: Ācariyena pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena tividhena kathetabbaṃ. Eko bhikkhu pakatiyā
analyzed: ācariyena pana kammaṭṭhānam kathentena tividhena kathetabbam ekaḥ bhikkhu pakatiyā

original: uggahitakammaṭṭhāno hoti. Tassa ekaṃ dve nisajjavāre sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā kathetabbaṃ.
analyzed: uggahita kammaṭṭhānaḥ hoti tassa ekam dve nisajjavāre sajjhāyam kāretvā kathetabbam

original: Eko santike vasitvā uggaṇhitukāmo hoti. Tassa āgatāgatavelāya kathetabbaṃ. Eko uggaṇhitvā
analyzed: ekaḥ santike vasitvā uggaṇhitu kāmo hoti tassa āgata āgata velāya kathetabbam ekaḥ uggaṇhitvā

original: aññattha gantukāmo hoti. Tassa nātipapañcaṃ nātisaṅkhepaṃ katvā nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhikaṃ
analyzed: aññattha gantu kāmo hoti tassa na ati papañcam na ati saṅkhepam katvā nijjaṭam niggaṇṭhikam

original: kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbaṃ. Kathentena kiṃ ācikkhitabbanti? Sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam kathetabbam kathentena kim ācikkhitabban ti sattadhā uggaha kosallam

original: dasadhā ca manasikārakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: dasadhā ca manasikāra kosallam ācikkhitabbam

original: Tattha vacasā manasā vaṇṇato saṇṭhānato disato okāsato paricchedatoti evaṃ sattadhā
analyzed: tattha vacasā manasā vaṇṇataḥ saṇṭhānataḥ disataḥ okāsataḥ paricchedato ti evam sattadhā

original: uggahakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Imasmiñhi paṭikkūlamanasikārakammaṭṭhāne yopi tipiṭako
analyzed: uggaha kosallam ācikkhitabbam imasmin hi paṭikkūla manasikāra kammaṭṭhāne yaḥ api tipiṭako

original: hoti, tenapi manasikārakāle paṭhamaṃ vācāya sajjhāyo kātabbo. Ekaccassa hi sajjhāyaṃ
analyzed: hoti tena api manasikāra kāle paṭhamam vācāya sajjhāyaḥ kātabbaḥ ekaccassa hi sajjhāyam

original: karontasseva kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, malayavāsīmahādevattherassa santike uggahitakammaṭṭhānānaṃ
analyzed: karontassa iva kammaṭṭhānam pākaṭam hoti malaya vāsī mahādeva therassa santike uggahita kammaṭṭhānānam

original: dvinnaṃ therānaṃ viya. Thero kira tehi kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācito ‘cattāro māse imaṃ evaṃ
analyzed: dvinnam therānam viya thero kira tehi kammaṭṭhānam yācito cattāraḥ māse imam evam

original: sajjhāyaṃ karothā’ti dvattisākārapāḷiṃ adāsi. Te, kiñcāpi tesaṃ dve tayo nikāyā paguṇā,
analyzed: sajjhāyam karotha ati dvattisa ākāra pāḷim te kiñca api tesam dve tayaḥ nikāyā paguṇā

original: padakkhiṇaggāhitāya pana cattāro māse dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyantāva sotāpannā ahesuṃ.

original: Tasmā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena ācariyena antevāsiko vattabbo – ‘paṭhamaṃ tāva vācāya

original: sajjhāyaṃ karohī’ti. Karontena ca tacapañcakādīni paricchinditvā anulomapaṭilomavasena
analyzed: sajjhāyam karohi iti karontena ca taca pañcaka ādīni paricchinditvā anuloma paṭiloma vasena

original: sajjhāyo kātabbo. “Kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco”ti hi vatvā puna paṭilomato “taco dantā
analyzed: sajjhāyaḥ kātabbo kesāḥ lomā nakhāḥ dantāḥ tacaḥ iti hi vatvā puna paṭilomato tacaḥ dantāḥ

original: nakhā lomā kesā”ti vattabbaṃ. Tadanantaraṃ vakkapañcake “maṃsaṃ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ
analyzed: nakhāḥ lomā kesā ti vattabbam tad anantaram vakka pañcake maṃsam nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjam

analyzed: nakhā lomā kesā ti vattabbam tatas papphāsa pañcake hadayam yakanam kilomakam pihakam

analyzed: papphāsanti vatvā puna paṭilomataḥ papphāsam pihakam kilomakam yakanam hadayam vakkam

original: aṭṭhimiñjaṃ aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsaṃ taco dantā nakhā lomā kesā”ti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭhimiñjam aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsam tacaḥ dantāḥ nakhāḥ lomā kesā ti vattabbam

original: lomā kesā”ti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: lomā kesā ti vattabbam

original: Tato medachakke “pittaṃ semhaṃ pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medo”ti vatvā puna paṭilomato “medo
analyzed: tatas meda chakke pittam semham pubbaḥ lohitam sedaḥ medaḥ iti vatvā puna paṭilomataḥ medaḥ

analyzed: sedaḥ lohitam pubbaḥ semham pittam matthaluṅgam karīsam udariyam antaguṇam antam papphāsam

analyzed: pihakam kilomakam yakanam hadayam vakkam aṭṭhimiñjam aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsam tacaḥ dantā

original: nakhā lomā kesā”ti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: nakhāḥ lomā kesā ti vattabbam

analyzed: tatas mutta chakke assu vasā kheḷaḥ siṅghāṇikā lasikā mutta nti vatvā puna paṭilomataḥ

original: “muttaṃ lasikā siṅghāṇikā kheḷo vasā assu medo sedo lohitaṃ pubbo semhaṃ pittaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ
analyzed: muttam lasikā siṅghāṇikā kheḷaḥ vasāḥ assu medaḥ sedaḥ lohitam pubbo semham pittam matthaluṅgam

analyzed: karīsam udariyam antaguṇam antam papphāsam pihakam kilomakam yakanam hadayam vakkam

analyzed: aṭṭhimiñjam aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsam tacaḥ dantāḥ nakhāḥ lomā kesā ati evam kāla satam pi kāla sahassam pi

analyzed: kāla sata sahassam pi vācāya sajjhāyaḥ kātabbaḥ vacasā sajjhāyena hi

original: viya khāyanti, vatipādapanti viya ca khāyanti. Yathā ca pana vacasā, tatheva manasāpi
analyzed: viya khāyanti ca khāyanti yathā ca vacasā tathā iva manasā api

original: sajjhāyo kātabbo. Vacasā sajjhāyo hi manasā sajjhāyassa paccayo hoti. Manasā sajjhāyo
analyzed: sajjhāyaḥ kātabbaḥ vacasā sajjhāyaḥ hi manasā sajjhāyassa paccayaḥ hoti manasā sajjhāyaḥ

analyzed: lakkhaṇa paṭivedhassa paccayaḥ hoti lakkhaṇa paṭivedhaḥ magga phala paṭivedhassa paccayaḥ hoti

analyzed: vaṇṇataḥ ti kesa ādīnam vaṇṇaḥ vavatthapetabbo saṇṭhānataḥ ti tesam yeva saṇṭhānam vavatthapetabbam

analyzed: disatas ti imasmin sarīre nābhitas uddham uparimāḥ disāḥ adhas heṭṭhimāḥ disā tasmā

analyzed: imasmin nāma okāse patiṭṭhito ti evam tassa tassa okāsaḥ vavatthapetabbo paricchedato ti

original: sabhāgaparicchedo visabhāgaparicchedoti dve paricchedā. Tattha “ayaṃ koṭṭhāso heṭṭhā
analyzed: sabhāga paricchedo visabhāga paricchedo ti dve paricchedā tattha ayam koṭṭhāsaḥ heṭṭhā

original: ca upari ca tiriyañca iminā nāma paricchinno”ti evaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo veditabbo.
analyzed: ca upari ca tiriyan ca iminā nāma paricchinno ti evam sa bhāga paricchedaḥ veditabbo

original: “Kesā na lomā, lomāpi na kesā”ti evaṃ amissīkatavasena visabhāgaparicchedo veditabbo.
analyzed: kesāḥ na lomā loma api na kesā ti evam amissīkata vasena visa bhāga paricchedaḥ veditabbo

original: Evaṃ sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ ācikkhantena pana “idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ asukasmiṃ sutte
analyzed: evam sattadhā uggaha kosallam ācikkhantena pana idam kammaṭṭhānam asukasmim sutte

original: paṭikkūlavasena kathitaṃ, asukasmiṃ dhātuvasenā”ti ñatvā ācikkhitabbaṃ. Idañhi mahāsatipaṭṭhāne
analyzed: paṭikkūla vasena kathitam asukasmin dhātu vasena ati ñatvā ācikkhitabbam idam hi mahāsati paṭṭhāne

original: paṭikkūlavaseneva kathitaṃ, mahāhatthipadopama -mahārāhulovāda -dhātuvibhaṅgesu dhātuvasena
analyzed: paṭikkūla vasena iva kathitam mahā hatthi pada upama mahā rāhulovāda dhātu vibhaṅgesu dhātu vasena

original: kathitaṃ. Kāyagatāsatisutte pana yassa vaṇṇato upaṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāya cattāri jhānāni
analyzed: kathitam kāyagata asati sutte pana yassa vaṇṇataḥ upaṭṭhāti tam sandhāya cattāri jhānāni

original: vibhattāni. Tattha dhātuvasena kathitaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, paṭikkūlavasena
analyzed: vibhattāni tattha dhātu vasena kathitam vipassanā kammaṭṭhānam hoti paṭikkūla vasena

original: kathitaṃ samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Tadetaṃ idha samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ avisesato sabbasādhāraṇavasena
analyzed: kathitam samatha kammaṭṭhānam tat etam idha samatha kammaṭṭhānam avisesataḥ sabba sādhāraṇa vasena

original: kathitanti vadantiyevāti.
analyzed: kathitam iti

original: Evaṃ sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ ācikkhitvā “anupubbato, nātisīghato, nātisaṇikato, vikkhepapaṭibāhanato,
analyzed: evam sattadhā uggaha kosallam ācikkhitvā anupubbataḥ na ati sīghataḥ na ati saṇikataḥ vikkhepa paṭibāhanato

original: paṇṇattisamatikkamanato, anupubbamuñcanato, appanāto, tayo ca suttantā”ti evaṃ dasadhā
analyzed: paṇṇatti samatikkamanataḥ anupubba muñcanataḥ appanātaḥ tayo ca suttantā ti evam dasadhā

original: manasikārakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Tattha ‘anupubbato’ti idañhi sajjhāyakaraṇato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: manasikāra kosallam ācikkhitabbam tattha anupubbato ti idam hi sajjhāya karaṇato paṭṭhāya

original: anupaṭipāṭiyā manasikātabbaṃ, na ekantarikāya. Ekantarikāya hi manasikaronto yathā
analyzed: anupaṭipāṭiyā manasikātabbam na ekantarikāya ekantarikāya hi manasikarontaḥ yathā

original: nāma akusalo puriso dvattiṃsapadaṃ nisseṇiṃ ekantarikāya ārohanto kilantakāyo patati,
analyzed: nāma akusalaḥ puriso dvattiṃsa padam nisseṇim ekantarikāye ārohantaḥ kilanta kāyo patati

original: na ārohanaṃ sampādeti; evameva bhāvanāsampattivasena adhigantabbassa assādassa anadhigamā
analyzed: na ārohanam sampādeti evam eva bhāvanā sampatti vasena adhigantabbassa assādassa an adhigamā

original: kilantacitto patati, na bhāvanaṃ sampādeti.
analyzed: patati na bhāvanam sampādeti

original: Anupubbato manasikarontenāpi ca ‘nātisīghato’ manasikātabbaṃ. Atisīghato manasikaroto
analyzed: anupubbataḥ manasikarontena api ca na ati sīghataḥ manasikātabbam ati sīghataḥ manasikaroto

original: hi yathā nāma tiyojanaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā okkamanavissajjanaṃ asallakkhetvā sīghena
analyzed: hi yathā nāma ti yojanam maggam paṭipajjitvā okkamana vissajjanam a sallakkhetvā sīghena

original: javena sattakkhattumpi gamanāgamanaṃ karoto purisassa kiñcāpi addhānaṃ parikkhayaṃ
analyzed: javena satta kkhattum pi gamana āgamanam karoto purisassa kiñcā api addhānam parikkhayam

original: gacchati, atha kho pucchitvāva gantabbaṃ hoti; evameva kevalaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ
analyzed: gacchati atha kho pucchitvā ava gantabbam hoti evam eva kevalam kammaṭṭhānam pariyosānam

original: pāpuṇāti, avibhūtaṃ pana hoti, na visesaṃ āvahati. Tasmā nātisīghato manasikātabbaṃ.
analyzed: pāpuṇāti avibhūtam pana hoti na visesam āvahati tasmā na ati sīghataḥ manasikātabbam

original: Yathā ca nātisīghato evaṃ ‘nātisaṇikato’pi. Atisaṇikato manasikaroto hi yathā nāma
analyzed: yathā ca na ati sīghataḥ evam na ati saṇikataḥ api ati saṇikataḥ manasikarotaḥ hi yathā nāma

original: tadaheva tiyojanaṃ maggaṃ gantukāmassa purisassa antarāmagge rukkhapabbatagahanādīsu
analyzed: tadahā iva ti yojanam maggam gantu kāmassa purisassa antarāmagge rukkha pabbata gahana ādīsu

original: vilambamānassa maggo parikkhayaṃ na gacchati, dvīhatīhena pariyosāpetabbo hoti; evameva
analyzed: vilambamānassa maggaḥ parikkhayam na gacchati dvīhatīhena pariyosāpetabbaḥ hoti evam eva

original: kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchati, visesādhigamassa paccayo na hoti.
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam pariyosānam na gacchati visesa adhigamassa paccayaḥ na hoti

original: ‘Vikkhepapaṭibāhanato’ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cetaso

analyzed: purisassa akkamana padam a sallakkhetvā itas citas ca vilokayataḥ pada vāraḥ virajjhati

original: tato sataporise papāte patitabbaṃ hoti; evameva bahiddhā vikkhepe sati kammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tatas sataporise papāte patitabbam hoti evam eva bahiddhā vikkhepe sati kammaṭṭhānam

original: parihāyati, paridhaṃsati. Tasmā vikkhepapaṭibāhanato manasikātabbaṃ.

analyzed: akālaḥ tasmin samaye passaddhi sambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya ati saṃyutta mahā vagge bojjhaṅga saṃyutte āgatam eva

original: Iti idaṃ sattavidhaṃ uggahakosallaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā imañca dasavidhaṃ manasikārakosallaṃ
analyzed: iti idam sattavidham uggaha kosallam suggahitam katvā imam ca dasavidham manasikāra kosallam

original: suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā tena yoginā ubhayakosallavasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā tena yoginā ubhaya kosalla vasena kammaṭṭhānam sādhukam uggahetabbam

original: Sace panassa ācariyena saddhiṃ ekavihāreyeva phāsu hoti, evaṃ vitthārena akathāpetvā
analyzed: sace panassa ācariyena saddhim phāsu hoti evam vitthārena a kathāpetvā

original: kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjantena visesaṃ labhitvā uparūpari kathāpetabbaṃ. Aññattha vasitukāmena
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam anuyuñjantena visesam labhitvā upari upari kathāpetabbam aññattha vasitu kāmena

original: yathāvuttena vidhinā vitthārato kathāpetvā punappunaṃ parivattetvā sabbaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: yathā vuttena vidhinā vitthārato kathāpetvā punappunam parivattetvā sabbam gaṇṭhi ṭṭhānam

original: chinditvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ pahāya mahāvāsatādiaṭṭhārasadosavajjite
analyzed: chinditvā kammaṭṭhāna bhāvanāya ananurūpam senāsanam pahāya

original: anurūpe vihāre viharantena khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ katvā yo tāva rāgacarito hoti,
analyzed: anurūpe vihāre viharantena khuddaka pali bodha upacchedam katvā yaḥ tāva rāga caritaḥ

original: tena yasmā rāgo pahātabbo, tasmā paṭikkūlamanasikāre parikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: tena yasmā rāgaḥ pahātabbaḥ tasmā paṭikkūla manasikāre parikammam kātabbam

original: Karontena pana kesesu tāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ vā dve vā kese luñcitvā
analyzed: karontena pana kesesu tāva nimittam gahetabbam katham ekam vā dve vā kese luñcitvā

original: hatthatale ṭhapetvā vaṇṇo tāva vavatthapetabbo. Chinnaṭṭhānepi kese oloketuṃ vaṭṭati;
analyzed: hattha tale ṭhapetvā vaṇṇo tāva vavatthapetabbo chinna ṭṭhāne pi kese oloketum vaṭṭati

original: udakapatte vā yāgupatte vā oloketumpi vaṭṭatiyeva. Kāḷakakāle disvā kāḷakāti manasikātabbā;
analyzed: udaka patte vā yāgu patte vā oloketum pi vaṭṭatiyā iva kāḷaka kāle disvā kāḷakā ati manasikātabbā

original: setakāle setāti. Missakakāle pana ussadavasena manasikātabbā honti. Yathā ca kesesu,
analyzed: seta kāle setāti missaka kāle pana ussada vasena manasikātabbāḥ honti yathā ca kesesu

original: evaṃ sakalepi tacapañcake disvāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā sabbakoṭṭhāsesu
analyzed: evam sakale api taca pañcake disvā va nimittam gahetabbam evam nimittam gahetvā sabba koṭṭhāsesu

original: vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena vavatthapetvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhaāsayokāsavasena
analyzed: vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna disā ukāsa pariccheda vasena vavatthapetvā vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna gandha āsayokāsa vasena

original: pañcadhā paṭikkūlato vavatthapetabbā.
analyzed: pañcadhā paṭikkūlataḥ vavatthapetabbā

original: Tatrāyaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu anupubbakathā – kesā tāva pakativaṇṇena kāḷakā addāriṭṭhakavaṇṇā,
analyzed: tatra ayam sabba koṭṭhāsesu anupubba kathā kesā tāva pakati vaṇṇena kāḷakā addāriṭṭhaka vaṇṇā

original: saṇṭhānato dīghavaṭṭalikā tulādaṇḍasaṇṭhānā, disato uparimadisāya jātā, okāsato ubhosu
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ dīgha vaṭṭalikā tulā daṇḍa saṇṭhānā disataḥ uparima disāya jātā okāsataḥ ubhosu

original: passesu kaṇṇacūḷikāhi, purato nalāṭantena, pacchato galavāṭakena paricchinnā. Sīsakaṭāhaveṭhanaṃ
analyzed: passesu kaṇṇa cūḷikāhi puratas nala aṭantena pacchatas galavāṭakena paricchinnā sīsa kaṭāha veṭhanam

original: allacammaṃ kesānaṃ okāso. Paricchedato kesā sīsaveṭhanacamme vīhaggamattaṃ pavisitvā
analyzed: alla cammam kesānam okāsaḥ paricchedataḥ kesā sīsa veṭhana camme vīhagga mattam pavisitvā

original: patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano mūlatalena, upari ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā.
analyzed: patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attanaḥ mūla talena upari ākāsena tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnā

original: Dve kesā ekato natthīti ayaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo.
analyzed: dve kesā ekatas natthi iti ayam sa bhāga paricchedaḥ

original: ‘Kesā na lomā, lomā na kesā’ti evaṃ avasesehi ekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsehi amissīkatā kesā nāma pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāsoti ayaṃ visabhāgaparicchedo. Idaṃ kesānaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthāpanaṃ.
analyzed: kesāḥ na lomā lomāḥ na kesā ti evam avasesehi ekatiṃsa koṭṭhāsehi amissīkatā kesā nāma pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāso ti ayam visa bhāga paricchedaḥ idam kesānam vaṇṇa āditaḥ vavatthāpanam

original: Idaṃ pana tesaṃ vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlato vavatthāpanaṃ – kesā ca nāmete
analyzed: idam pana tesam vaṇṇa ādi vasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlataḥ vavatthāpanam kesā ca nāma ete

original: vaṇṇatopi paṭikkūlā, saṇṭhānatopi gandhatopi āsayatopi okāsatopi paṭikkūlā. Manuññepi
analyzed: vaṇṇataḥ api paṭikkūlā saṇṭhānataḥ api gandhataḥ api āsayataḥ api okāsataḥ api paṭikkūlā manuññe pi

original: hi yāgupatte vā bhattapatte vā kesavaṇṇaṃ kiñci disvā ‘kesamissakamidaṃ, haratha
analyzed: hi yāgu patte vā bhatta patte vā kesa vaṇṇam kiñci disvā kesa missakam idam haratha

original: na’nti jigucchanti. Evaṃ kesā vaṇṇato paṭikkūlā. Rattiṃ bhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ
analyzed: nanti jigucchanti evam kesāḥ vaṇṇataḥ paṭikkūlāḥ rattim bhuñjantā api kesa saṇṭhānam

original: akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ vā chupitvāpi tatheva jigucchanti. Evaṃ saṇṭhānato paṭikkūlā.
analyzed: akkavākam vā makacivākam vā chupitvā api tathā iva jigucchanti evam saṇṭhānataḥ paṭikkūlā

original: Telamakkhanapupphadhūmādisaṅkhāravirahitānañca kesānaṃ gandho paramajeguccho hoti,
analyzed: tela makkhana puppha dhūma ādi saṅkhāra virahitānam ca kesānam gandho parama jegucchaḥ hoti

original: tato jegucchataro aggimhi pakkhittānaṃ. Kesā hi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikkūlāpi siyuṃ,
analyzed: tatas jegucchataraḥ aggimhi pakkhittānam kesāḥ hi vaṇṇa saṇṭhānataḥ a paṭikkūlāḥ api siyum

original: gandhena pana paṭikkūlāyeva. Yathā hi daharassa kumārassa vaccaṃ vaṇṇato haḷiddivaṇṇaṃ,
analyzed: gandhena pana paṭikkūlāya iva yathā hi daharassa kumārassa vaccam vaṇṇataḥ haḷiddi vaṇṇam

original: saṇṭhānatopi haliddipiṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ; saṅkhāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍitañca uddhumātakakāḷasunakhasarīraṃ
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ pi haliddi piṇḍa saṇṭhānam saṅkhāra ṭṭhāne chaḍḍitam ca uddhumātaka kāḷa su nakha sarīram

original: vaṇṇato tālapakkavaṇṇaṃ, saṇṭhānato vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamudiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ, dāṭhāpissa
analyzed: vaṇṇataḥ tāla pakka vaṇṇam saṇṭhānataḥ vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭham udiṅga saṇṭhānam dāṭhāpissa

original: sumanamakuḷasadisāti ubhayampi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikkūlaṃ, gandhena pana paṭikkūlameva;
analyzed: sumana makuḷa sadisā ti ubhayam pi vaṇṇa saṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikkūlam gandhena pana paṭikkūlam eva

original: evaṃ kesāpi siyuṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikkūlā, gandhena pana paṭikkūlā evāti.
analyzed: evam kesā api siyum vaṇṇa saṇṭhānato appaṭikkūlāḥ gandhena pana paṭikkūlāḥ eva ati

original: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni
analyzed: yathā pana asuci ṭṭhāne gāma nissandena jātāni sūpeyya paṇṇāni nāgarika manussānam jegucchāni

original: honti aparibhogāni, evaṃ kesāpi pubbalohitamuttakarīsapittasemhādinissandena jātattā
analyzed: honti a paribhogāni evam kesā api pubba lohita mutta karīsa pitta semha ādi nissandena jāta ttā

original: atijegucchāti idaṃ nesaṃ ‘āsayato’ pāṭikulyaṃ. Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇikaṃ
analyzed: idam nesam āsayato pāṭikulyam ime ca kesāḥ nāma gūtha rāsimhi uṭṭhita kaṇṇikam

original: viya ekattiṃsakoṭṭhāsarāsimhi jātā. Te susānasaṅkāraṭṭhānādīsu jātasākaṃ viya, parikhādīsu
analyzed: viya ekattiṃsa koṭṭhāsa rāsimhi jātā te susāna saṅkāra ṭṭhāna ādīsu viya parikha ādīsu

original: jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ viya ca asuciṭṭhāne jātattā paramajegucchāti idaṃ tesaṃ
analyzed: jāta kamala kuvalaya ādi puppham viya ca asuci ṭṭhāne jāta ttā parama jegucchā ati idam tesam

original: ‘okāsato’ pāṭikkūlyaṃ.
analyzed: okāsataḥ pāṭikkūlyam

original: Yathā ca kesānaṃ, evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsānaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā
analyzed: yathā ca kesānam evam sabba koṭṭhāsānam vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna gandha asayokāsa vasena pañcadhā

original: paṭikkūlatā vavatthapetabbā. Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena pana sabbepi visuṃ
analyzed: paṭikkūla tā vavatthapetabbā vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna disā ukāsa pariccheda vasena pana sabbe pi visum

original: visuṃ vavatthapetabbā.
analyzed: visum vavatthapetabbā

original: Tattha lomā tāva pakativaṇṇato na kesā viya asambhinnakāḷakā, kāḷapiṅgalā pana honti;
analyzed: tattha lomā tāva pakati vaṇṇataḥ na kesāḥ viya asambhinna kāḷakā kāḷa piṅgalā pana honti

original: saṇṭhānato onataggatālamūlasaṇṭhānā; disato dvīsu disāsu jātā; okāsato ṭhapetvā kesānaṃ
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ ona tagga tāla mūla saṇṭhānāḥ disataḥ dvīsu disāsu jātāḥ okāsataḥ ṭhapetvā kesānam

original: patiṭṭhitokāsañca hatthapādatalāni ca yebhuyyena avasesasarīraveṭhanacamme jātā;
analyzed: patiṭṭhita ukāsam ca hattha pāda talāni ca yebhuyyena avasesa sarīra veṭhana camme jātā

original: paricchedato sarīraveṭhanacamme likkhāmattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano
analyzed: paricchedataḥ sarīra veṭhana camme likkhāmattam pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attanaḥ

original: mūlatalena, upari ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā. Dve lomā ekato natthi.
analyzed: mūla talena upari ākāsena tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnā dve lomā ekatas natthi

original: Ayaṃ tesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: ayam tesam sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana

original: Nakhāti vīsatiyā nakhapaṭṭānaṃ nāmaṃ. Te sabbepi vaṇṇato setā; saṇṭhānato macchasakalikasaṇṭhānā;
analyzed: nakhā ti vīsatiyā nakhapaṭṭānam nāmam te sabbe pi vaṇṇato setā saṇṭhānataḥ macchasakalika saṇṭhānā

original: disato pādanakhā heṭṭhimadisāya jātā, hatthanakhā uparimadisāyāti dvīsu disāsu jātā;
analyzed: disatas pāda nakhāḥ heṭṭhima disāya jātāḥ hattha nakhā uparima disāya ati dvīsu disāsu jātā

original: okāsato aṅgulīnaṃ aggapiṭṭhesu patiṭṭhitā; paricchedato dvīsu disāsu aṅgulikoṭimaṃsehi,
analyzed: okāsataḥ aṅgulīnam agga piṭṭhesu patiṭṭhitā paricchedataḥ dvīsu disāsu aṅguli koṭim aṃsehi

original: anto aṅgulipiṭṭhimaṃsena, bahi ceva agge ca ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā.
analyzed: antar aṅguli piṭṭhim aṃsena bahi ca iva agge ca ākāsena tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnā

original: Dve nakhā ekato natthi. Ayaṃ nesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: dve nakhā ekatas natthi ayam nesam sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedo pana

original: Dantāti paripuṇṇadantassa dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhikāni. Tepi vaṇṇato setā; saṇṭhānato
analyzed: danta ati paripuṇṇa dantassa dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhikāni te pi vaṇṇato setā saṇṭhānato

original: anekasaṇṭhānā. Tesañhi heṭṭhimāya tāva dantapāḷiyā majjhe cattāro dantā mattikāpiṇḍe
analyzed: aneka saṇṭhānā tesam hi heṭṭhimāya tāva dantapāḷiyāḥ majjhe cattāro dantāḥ mattikā piṇḍe

original: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaalābubījasaṇṭhānā. Tesaṃ ubhosu passesu ekeko ekamūlako ekakoṭiko
analyzed: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapita alābu bīja saṇṭhānā tesam ubhosu passesu ekekaḥ eka mūlakaḥ eka koṭiko

original: mallikamakuḷasaṇṭhāno. Tato ekeko dvimūlako dvikoṭiko yānakaupatthambhanikasaṇṭhāno.
analyzed: mallika makuḷa saṇṭhānaḥ tatas ekekaḥ dvi mūlakaḥ dvi koṭikaḥ yānaka upatthambhanika saṇṭhānaḥ

original: Tato dve dve timūlā tikoṭikā. Tato dve dve catumūlā catukoṭikāti. Uparimapāḷiyāpi
analyzed: tatas dve dve ti mūlā ti koṭikā tatas dve dve catu mūlā catu koṭikā ati uparima pāḷiyā api

original: eseva nayo. Disato uparimadisāya jātā. Okāsato dvīsu hanukaṭṭhikesu patiṭṭhitā. Paricchedato
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ disataḥ uparima disāya jātā okāsataḥ dvīsu hanu kaṭṭhikesu patiṭṭhitā paricchedato

original: heṭṭhā hanukaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitena attano mūlatalena, upari ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena
analyzed: heṭṭhā hanu kaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitena attanaḥ mūla talena upari ākāsena tiriyam aññamaññena

original: paricchinnā. Dve dantā ekato natthi. Ayaṃ nesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo
analyzed: paricchinnāḥ dve dantāḥ ekatas natthi ayam nesam sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedo

original: pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: pana kesa sadisā uyā iva

original: Tacoti sakalasarīraṃ veṭhetvā ṭhitacammaṃ. Tassa upari kāḷasāmapītādivaṇṇā chavi
analyzed: tacā uti sakala sarīram veṭhetvā ṭhita cammam tassa upari kāḷa sāma pīta ādi vaṇṇā chavi

original: nāma, yā sakalasarīratopi saṅkaḍḍhiyamānā badaraṭṭhimattā hoti. Taco pana vaṇṇato
analyzed: nāma yā sakala sarīrataḥ pi saṅkaḍḍhiyamānā badaraṭṭhimattā hoti taco pana vaṇṇato

original: setoyeva. So cassa setabhāvo aggijālābhighātapaharaṇapahārādīhi viddhaṃsitāya chaviyā
analyzed: so cassa seta bhāvaḥ aggi jāla abhighāta paharaṇa pahāra ādīhi viddhaṃsitāya chaviyā

original: pākaṭo hoti. Saṇṭhānato sarīrasaṇṭhānova hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo.
analyzed: pākaṭaḥ hoti saṇṭhānataḥ sarīra saṇṭhānaḥ upa hoti ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ

original: Vitthārato pana pādaṅgulittaco kosakārakakosasaṇṭhāno. Piṭṭhipādattaco puṭabandhaupāhanasaṇṭhāno.
analyzed: vitthārato pana kosakārakakosa saṇṭhāno piṭṭhi pāda ttaco puṭabandha upāhana saṇṭhāno

original: Jaṅghattaco bhattapuṭakatālapaṇṇasaṇṭhāno. Ūruttaco taṇḍulabharitadīghatthavikasaṇṭhāno.
analyzed: jaṅghattacaḥ bhatta puṭaka tāla paṇṇa saṇṭhānaḥ ūruttacaḥ taṇḍula bharita dīghatthavika saṇṭhānaḥ

original: Ānisadattaco udakapūritapaṭaparissāvanasaṇṭhāno. Piṭṭhittaco phalakonaddhacammasaṇṭhāno.
analyzed: udaka pūrita paṭa parissāvana saṇṭhāno piṭṭhittaco phalakonaddha camma saṇṭhāno

original: Kucchittaco vīṇādoṇikonaddhacammasaṇṭhāno. Urattaco yebhuyyena caturassasaṇṭhāno.
analyzed: kucchittacaḥ vīṇā doṇikā naddha camma saṇṭhānaḥ urattacaḥ yebhuyyena catur assa saṇṭhānaḥ

original: Ubhayabāhuttaco tūṇīronaddhacammasaṇṭhāno. Piṭṭhihatthattaco khurakosakasaṇṭhāno,
analyzed: ubhaya bāhu ttacaḥ tūṇīra unaddha camma saṇṭhāno piṭṭhi hattha ttacaḥ khura kosaka saṇṭhāno

original: phaṇakatthavikasaṇṭhāno vā. Hatthaṅgulittaco kuñcikākosakasaṇṭhāno. Gīvattaco galakañcukasaṇṭhāno.
analyzed: phaṇakatthavika saṇṭhānaḥ vā kuñcikā kosaka saṇṭhānaḥ gīva ttacaḥ gala kañcuka saṇṭhānaḥ

original: Mukhattaco chiddāvacchiddo kīṭakulāvakasaṇṭhāno. Sīsattaco pattatthavikasaṇṭhānoti.
analyzed: mukha ttacaḥ chidda avacchiddaḥ kīṭa kulāvaka saṇṭhāno sīsa ttacaḥ patta thavika saṇṭhānaḥ ti

original: Tacapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena uttaroṭṭhato paṭṭhāya upari mukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā
analyzed: taca pariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena uttara uṭṭhataḥ paṭṭhāya upari mukham ñāṇam pesetvā

original: paṭhamaṃ tāva mukhaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tato nalāṭaṭṭhicammaṃ.
analyzed: paṭhamam tāva mukham pariyonandhitvā ṭhita cammam vavatthapetabbam tatas nalāṭa ṭṭhi cammam

original: Tato thavikāya pakkhittapattassa ca thavikāya ca antarena hatthamiva sīsaṭṭhikassa
analyzed: tatas thavikāya pakkhitta pattassa ca thavikāya ca antarena hattham iva sīsaṭṭhikassa

original: ca sīsacammassa ca antarena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā aṭṭhikena saddhiṃ cammassa ekābaddhabhāvaṃ
analyzed: ca sīsa cammassa ca antarena ñāṇam pesetvā aṭṭhikena saddhim cammassa ekābaddha bhāvam

original: viyojentena sīsacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tato khandhacammaṃ. Tato anulomena paṭilomena
analyzed: viyojentena sīsa cammam vavatthapetabbam tatas khandha cammam tatas anulomena paṭilomena

original: ca dakkhiṇahatthacammaṃ. Atha teneva nayena vāmahatthacammaṃ. Tato piṭṭhicammaṃ.
analyzed: ca dakkhiṇa hattha cammam atha tena iva nayena vāma hattha cammam tatas piṭṭhi cammam

original: Taṃ taṃ vavatthapetvā anulomena ca paṭilomena ca dakkhiṇapādacammaṃ. Atha teneva
analyzed: tam tam vavatthapetvā anulomena ca paṭilomena ca dakkhiṇa pāda cammam atha tena iva

original: nayena vāmapādacammaṃ. Tato anukkameneva vatthiudarahadayagīvacammāni vavatthapetabbāni.
analyzed: nayena vāma pāda cammam tatas anukkamena iva vatthi udara hadaya gīva cammāni vavatthapetabbāni

original: Atha gīvācammānantaraṃ heṭṭhimahanucammaṃ vavatthapetvā adharoṭṭhapariyosānaṃ pāpetvā
analyzed: atha gīvā camma anantaram heṭṭhima hanu cammam vavatthapetvā adhara uṭṭha pariyosānam pāpetvā

original: niṭṭhapetabbaṃ. Evaṃ oḷārikoḷārikaṃ pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti.
analyzed: niṭṭhapetabbam evam oḷārika uḷārikam pariggaṇhantassa sukhumam pi pākaṭam hoti

original: Disato dvīsu disāsu jāto. Okāsato sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhito. Paricchedato
analyzed: disatas dvīsu disāsu jātaḥ okāsataḥ sakala sarīram ṭhitaḥ paricchedato

original: heṭṭhā patiṭṭhitatalena, upari ākāsena paricchinno. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo
analyzed: heṭṭhā patiṭṭhita talena upari ākāsena paricchinnaḥ ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ

original: pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: pana kesa sadisā uyā iva

original: Maṃsanti nava maṃsapesisatāni. Taṃ sabbampi vaṇṇato rattaṃ kiṃsukapupphasadisaṃ;
analyzed: maṃsanti nava maṃsapesi satāni tam sabbam pi vaṇṇataḥ rattam kiṃsuka puppha sadisam

original: saṇṭhānato jaṅghapiṇḍikamaṃsaṃ tālapaṇṇapuṭabhattasaṇṭhānaṃ, ūrumaṃsaṃ nisadapotakasaṇṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ jaṅgha piṇḍika maṃsam tāla paṇṇa puṭa bhatta saṇṭhānam ūru maṃsam nisada potaka saṇṭhānam

original: ānisadamaṃsaṃ uddhanakoṭisaṇṭhānaṃ, piṭṭhimaṃsaṃ tālaguḷapaṭalasaṇṭhānaṃ, phāsukadvayamaṃsaṃ
analyzed: ānisada maṃsam uddhana koṭi saṇṭhānam piṭṭhi maṃsam tāla guḷa paṭala saṇṭhānam phāsuka dvaya maṃsam

original: potthalikāya kucchiyaṃ tanumattikālepanasaṇṭhānaṃ, thanamaṃsaṃ vaṭṭetvā avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: potthalikāya kucchiyam tanu mattikā lepana saṇṭhānam thana maṃsam vaṭṭetvā avakkhitta mattikā piṇḍa saṇṭhānam

original: bāhudvayamaṃsaṃ diguṇaṃ katvā ṭhapitaniccammamahāmūsikasaṇṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ oḷārikoḷārikaṃ
analyzed: bāhu dvayam aṃsam diguṇam katvā ṭhapita niccamma mahāmūsika saṇṭhānam evam oḷārika uḷārikam

original: maṃsaṃ pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato
analyzed: maṃsam pariggaṇhantassa sukhumam pi pākaṭam hoti disataḥ dvīsu disāsu jātam okāsataḥ

original: sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni anulimpetvā ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato heṭṭhā aṭṭhisaṅghāte
analyzed: sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhi satāni anulimpetvā ṭhitam paricchedataḥ heṭṭhā aṭṭhi saṅghāte

original: patiṭṭhitatalena, upari tacena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.
analyzed: patiṭṭhita talena upari tacena tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnam ayam assa sa bhāga paricchedaḥ

original: Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
analyzed: visa bhāga paricchedo pana kesa sadisā uva

original: ‘Nhārū’ti nava nhārusatāni. Vaṇṇato sabbepi nhārū setā; saṇṭhānato nānāsaṇṭhānā.
analyzed: nhārū ti nava nhāru satāni vaṇṇato sabbe pi nhārū setā saṇṭhānataḥ nānā saṇṭhānā

original: Etesu hi gīvāya uparibhāgato paṭṭhāya pañca mahānhārū sarīraṃ vinaddhamānā hadayassa
analyzed: etesu hi upari bhāgataḥ paṭṭhāya pañca sarīram hadayassa

original: purimapassena otiṇṇā, pañca pacchimapassena, pañca dakkhiṇapassena, pañca vāmapassena,
analyzed: purima passena otiṇṇā pañca pacchima passena pañca dakkhiṇa passena pañca vāma passena

original: dakkhiṇahatthaṃ vinaddhamānāpi hatthassa purimapassena pañca, pacchimapassena pañca,
analyzed: dakkhiṇa hattham vinaddhamānā api hatthassa purima passena pañca pacchima passena pañca

original: tathā vāmahatthaṃ vinaddhamānāpi. Dakkhiṇapādaṃ vinaddhamānāpi pādassa purimapassena
analyzed: tathā vāma hattham vinaddha mānā api dakkhiṇa pādam vinaddha mānā api pādassa purima passena

original: pañca, pacchimapassena pañca, tathā vāmapādaṃ vinaddhamānāpīti. Evaṃ sarīradhārakā
analyzed: pañca pacchima passena pañca tathā vāma pādam vinaddha mānā api iti evam sarīra dhārakā

original: nāma saṭṭhi mahānhārū kāyaṃ vinaddhamānā otiṇṇā, ye kaṇḍarātipi vuccanti. Te sabbepi
analyzed: nāma saṭṭhi mahānhārū kāyam vinaddhamānāḥ otiṇṇāḥ ye kaṇḍarā atipi vuccanti te sabbe pi

original: kandalamakuḷasaṇṭhānā.
analyzed: kandala makuḷa saṇṭhānā

original: Aññe pana taṃ taṃ padesaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā tato sukhumatarā suttarajjukasaṇṭhānā.
analyzed: aññe pana tam tam padesam ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā tatas sukhumatarā sutta rajjuka saṇṭhānā

original: Aññe tato sukhumatarā pūtilatāsaṇṭhānā. Aññe tato sukhumatarā mahāvīṇātantisaṇṭhānā.
analyzed: aññe tatas sukhumatarā pūti latā saṇṭhānā aññe tatas sukhumatarā mahā vīṇā tanti saṇṭhānā

original: Aññe thūlasuttakasaṇṭhānā. Hatthapādapiṭṭhiyaṃ nhārū sakuṇapādasaṇṭhānā. Sīsanhārū
analyzed: aññe thūla suttaka saṇṭhānā hattha pāda piṭṭhiyam nhārū sakuṇa pāda saṇṭhānā sīsa nhārū

original: dārakānaṃ sīsajālakasaṇṭhānā. Piṭṭhinhārū ātape pasāritaallajālasaṇṭhānā. Avasesā
analyzed: dārakānam sīsa jālaka saṇṭhānā piṭṭhinhārū ātape pasārita alla jāla saṇṭhānā avasesā

original: taṃtaṃaṅgapaccaṅgānugatā nhārū sarīre paṭimukkajālakañcukasaṇṭhānā. Disato dvīsu
analyzed: taṃ taṃaṅga paccaṅga anugatāḥ sarīre paṭimukka jāla kañcuka saṇṭhānāḥ disatas dvīsu

original: disāsu jātā. Okāsato sakalasarīre aṭṭhīni ābandhitvā ṭhitā. Paricchedato heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: disāsu jātā okāsato sakala sarīre aṭṭhīni ābandhitvā ṭhitā paricchedato heṭṭhā tiṇṇam

original: aṭṭhisatānaṃ upari patiṭṭhitatalehi, upari maṃsacammāni āhacca ṭhitapadesehi, tiriyaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhi satānam upari patiṭṭhita talehi upari maṃsa cammāni āhacca ṭhita padesehi tiriyam

original: aññamaññena paricchinnā. Ayaṃ nesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: aññam aññena paricchinnāḥ ayam sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana

original: Aṭṭhīti ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhīni avasesāni catusaṭṭhi hatthaṭṭhīni, catusaṭṭhi
analyzed: aṭṭhi iti ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa danta ṭṭhīni avasesāni catusaṭṭhi hattha ṭṭhīni catusaṭṭhi

original: pādaṭṭhīni, catusaṭṭhi maṃsanissitāni muduaṭṭhīni, dve paṇhikaṭṭhīni, ekekasmiṃ pāde
analyzed: pāda aṭṭhīni catusaṭṭhi maṃsa nissitāni mudu aṭṭhīni dve paṇhika aṭṭhīni ekekasmin pāde

original: dve gopphakaṭṭhīni, dve jaṅghaṭṭhīni, dve jaṇṇukaṭṭhīni, dve ūruṭṭhīni, dve kaṭiṭṭhīni,
analyzed: dve gopphaka aṭṭhīni dve jaṅgha aṭṭhīni dve jaṇṇuka aṭṭhīni dve ūru ṭṭhīni dve kaṭi ṭṭhīni

original: aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni, catuvīsati phāsukaṭṭhīni, cuddasa uraṭṭhīni, ekaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni catuvīsati phāsukaṭṭhīni cuddasa uraṭṭhīni ekam

original: hadayaṭṭhi, dve akkhakaṭṭhīni, dve koṭṭhaṭṭhīni, dve bāhaṭṭhīni, dve dve aggabāhaṭṭhīni,
analyzed: dve akkhakaṭṭhīni dve koṭṭhaṭṭhīni dve bāhaṭṭhīni dve dve aggabāhaṭṭhīni

original: satta gīvaṭṭhīni, dve hanukaṭṭhīni, ekaṃ nāsikaṭṭhi, dve akkhiṭṭhīni, dve kaṇṇaṭṭhīni,
analyzed: satta gīva ṭṭhīni dve hanuka ṭṭhīni ekam nāsika ṭṭhi dve akkhiṭṭhīni dve kaṇṇa ṭṭhīni

original: ekaṃ nalāṭaṭṭhi, ekaṃ muddhaṭṭhi, nava sīsakapālaṭṭhīnīti evaṃ timattāni aṭṭhisatāni.
analyzed: ekam nalāṭa ṭṭhi ekam muddha ṭṭhi nava sīsa kapāla ṭṭhīni iti evam timattāni aṭṭhi satāni

original: Tāni sabbānipi vaṇṇato setāni, saṇṭhānato nānāsaṇṭhānāni. Tattha hi aggapādaṅguliṭṭhīni
analyzed: tāni sabbāni api vaṇṇato setāni saṇṭhānato nānā saṇṭhānāni tattha hi agga pāda aṅguli ṭṭhīni

original: katakabījasaṇṭhānāni. Tadanantarāni majjhapabbaṭṭhīni panasaṭṭhisaṇṭhānāni. Mūlapabbaṭṭhīni
analyzed: kataka bīja saṇṭhānāni tad anantarāni majjha pabbaṭṭhīni panasaṭṭhi saṇṭhānāni mūla pabbaṭṭhīni

original: paṇavasaṇṭhānāni. Piṭṭhipādaṭṭhīni koṭṭhitakandalakandarāsisaṇṭhānāni. Paṇhikaṭṭhi
analyzed: paṇava saṇṭhānāni piṭṭhi pāda ṭṭhīni koṭṭhita kandala kandara asi saṇṭhānāni paṇhika ṭṭhi

original: ekaṭṭhitālaphalabījasaṇṭhānaṃ. Gopphakaṭṭhīni bandhakīḷāgoḷakasaṇṭhānāni. Jaṅghaṭṭhīnaṃ
analyzed: ekaṭṭhi tāla phala bīja saṇṭhānam gopphakaṭṭhīni bandha kīḷā goḷaka saṇṭhānāni jaṅgha ṭṭhīnam

original: gopphakaṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ anapanītatacasindikaḷīrasaṇṭhānaṃ. Khuddakajaṅghaṭṭhikaṃ
analyzed: goppha kaṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhita ṭhānam an apanīta taca sindi kaḷīra saṇṭhānam khuddaka jaṅghaṭṭhikam

original: dhanukadaṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ, mahantaṃ milātasappapiṭṭhisaṇṭhānaṃ. Jaṇṇukaṭṭhi ekato parikkhīṇapheṇakasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: dhanuka daṇḍa saṇṭhānam mahantam milāta sappa piṭṭhi saṇṭhānam ekatas parikkhīṇa pheṇaka saṇṭhānam

original: Tattha jaṅghaṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikhiṇaggagosiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ. Ūruṭṭhi duttacchitavāsipharasudaṇḍakasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: tattha jaṅgha ṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhita ṭṭhānam ati khiṇagga go siṅga saṇṭhānam ūruṭṭhi

original: Tassa kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ kīḷāgoḷakasaṇṭhānaṃ. Tena kaṭiṭṭhino patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tassa kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhita ṭhānam kīḷā goḷaka saṇṭhānam tena kaṭiṭṭhino patiṭṭhita ṭhānam

original: aggacchinnamahāpunnāgaphalasaṇṭhānaṃ. Kaṭiṭṭhīni dvepi ekābaddhāni hutvā kumbhakārakauddhanasaṇṭhānāni,
analyzed: aggacchinna mahāpunnāga phala saṇṭhānam kaṭiṭṭhīni dve api eka ābaddhāni hutvā kumbhakāraka auddhana saṇṭhānāni

original: pāṭiyekkaṃ kammārakūṭayottakasaṇṭhānāni. Koṭiyaṃ ṭhitaānisadaṭṭhi adhomukhaṃ katvā
analyzed: pāṭiyekkam kammārakūṭa yottaka saṇṭhānāni koṭiyam adhomukham katvā

original: gahitasappaphaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ sattasu ṭhānesu chiddāvachiddaṃ. Piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni abbhantarato
analyzed: gahita sappa phaṇa saṇṭhānam sattasu ṭhānesu chidda avachiddam piṭṭhi kaṇṭa kaṭṭhīni abbhantarataḥ

original: uparūpari ṭhapitasīsakapaṭṭaveṭhakasaṇṭhānāni, bāhirato vaṭṭanāvaḷisaṇṭhānāni. Tesaṃ
analyzed: upari upari ṭhapita sīsaka paṭṭa veṭhaka saṇṭhānāni bāhiratas vaṭṭana āvaḷi saṇṭhānāni

original: antarantarā kakacadantasadisā dve tayo kaṇṭakā honti. Catuvīsatiyā phāsukaṭṭhīsu
analyzed: antar antarā ka kaca danta sadisāḥ dve tayaḥ kaṇṭakāḥ honti catuvīsatiyā phāsu kaṭṭhīsu

original: aparipuṇṇāni aparipuṇṇāsitasaṇṭhānāni, paripuṇṇāni paripuṇṇāsitasaṇṭhānāni. Sabbānipi
analyzed: a paripuṇṇāni a paripuṇṇa asita saṇṭhānāni paripuṇṇāni paripuṇṇa asita saṇṭhānāni sabbāni pi

original: odātakukkuṭassa pasāritapakkhasaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: odāta kukkuṭassa pasārita pakkha saṇṭhānāni

original: Cuddasa uraṭṭhīni jiṇṇasandamānikapañjarasaṇṭhānāni. Hadayaṭṭhi dabbiphaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: cuddasa uraṭṭhīni jiṇṇa sanda mānika pañjara saṇṭhānāni hadayaṭṭhi dabbi phaṇa saṇṭhānam

original: Akkhakaṭṭhīni khuddakalohavāsidaṇḍasaṇṭhānāni. Koṭṭhaṭṭhīni ekato parikkhīṇasīhaḷakudālasaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: akkhakaṭṭhīni khuddaka loha vāsi daṇḍa saṇṭhānāni koṭṭhaṭṭhīni ekatas parikkhīṇa sīhaḷa kudāla saṇṭhānāni

original: Bāhuṭṭhīni ādāsadaṇḍakasaṇṭhānāni. Aggabāhuṭṭhīni yamakatālakandasaṇṭhānāni. Maṇibandhaṭṭhīni
analyzed: bāhu ṭṭhīni ādāsa daṇḍaka saṇṭhānāni aggabāhu ṭṭhīni yamaka tāla kanda saṇṭhānāni maṇibandha ṭṭhīni

original: ekato allīyāpetvā ṭhapitasīsakapaṭṭaveṭhakasaṇṭhānāni. Piṭṭhihatthaṭṭhīni koṭṭitakandalakandarāsisaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: ekatas allīyāpetvā ṭhapita sīsaka paṭṭa veṭhaka saṇṭhānāni piṭṭhi hattha ṭṭhīni koṭṭita kandala kandara asi saṇṭhānāni

original: Hatthaṅgulīsu mūlapabbaṭṭhīni paṇavasaṇṭhānāni; majjhapabbaṭṭhīni aparipuṇṇapanasaṭṭhisaṇṭhānāni;
analyzed: hattha aṅgulīsu mūla pabbaṭṭhīni paṇava saṇṭhānāni majjha pabbaṭṭhīni a paripuṇṇa panasaṭṭhi saṇṭhānāni

original: aggapabbaṭṭhīni katakabījasaṇṭhānāni. Satta gīvaṭṭhīni daṇḍena vijjhitvā paṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: agga pabbaṭṭhīni kataka bīja saṇṭhānāni satta gīvaṭṭhīni daṇḍena vijjhitvā paṭipāṭiyā

original: ṭhapitavaṃsakaḷīracakkalikasaṇṭhānāni. Heṭṭhimahanukaṭṭhi kammārānaṃ ayokūṭayottakasaṇṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: ṭhapita vaṃsa kaḷīra cakkalika saṇṭhānāni ayokūṭa yottaka saṇṭhānam

original: uparimaṃ avalekhanasatthakasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: uparimam avalekhana satthaka saṇṭhānam

original: Akkhikūpanāsākūpaṭṭhīni apanītamiñjataruṇatālaṭṭhisaṇṭhānāni. Nalāṭaṭṭhi adhomukhaṭhapitasaṅkhathālakakapālasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: akkhi kūpa nāsā kūpa aṭṭhīni apanīta miñja taruṇa tāla ṭṭhi saṇṭhānāni nalāṭa ṭṭhi adhomukha ṭhapita saṅkhathālaka kapāla saṇṭhānam

original: Kaṇṇacūḷikaṭṭhīni nhāpitakhurakosakasaṇṭhānāni. Nalāṭakaṇṇacūḷikānaṃ upari paṭṭabandhanokāse
analyzed: kaṇṇa cūḷi kaṭṭhīni nhāpita khura kosaka saṇṭhānāni nalāṭa kaṇṇacūḷikānam upari paṭṭabandhana ukāse

original: aṭṭhi saṅkuṭitaghaṭapuṇṇapaṭalakhaṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ. Muddhaṭṭhi mukhacchinnavaṅkanāḷikerasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: saṅkuṭita ghaṭa puṇṇa paṭala khaṇḍa saṇṭhānam muddhaṭṭhi mukha chinna vaṅka nāḷikera saṇṭhānam

original: Sīsaṭṭhīni sibbetvā ṭhapitajajjaralābukaṭāhasaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: sīsa ṭṭhīni sibbetvā ṭhapita jajjara lābu kaṭāha saṇṭhānāni

original: Disato dvīsu disāsu jātāni. Okāsato avisesena sakalasarīre ṭhitāni. Visesena panettha

analyzed: pheṇa pubbulakāni muñcantam paramaka sambu duggandha jeguccha bhāvam āpajjitvā tiṭṭhati

original: yaṃ sutvāpi pānabhojanādīsu amanuññatā saṇṭhāti, pageva paññācakkhunā avaloketvā,

original: Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.

analyzed: dadhi bhāvam vattum vaṭṭati saṇṭhānataḥ okāsa saṇṭhānam

analyzed: disatas uparimāya disāya jātam okāsataḥ sīsa kaṭāha abbhantare cattāraḥ sibbi nimagge nissāya

original: abbhantaratalehi ceva matthaluṅgabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.

original: Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
analyzed: visa bhāga paricchedo pana kesa sadisā uva

analyzed: pittanti dve pittāni baddha pittam ca abaddha pittam ca tattha baddha pittam vaṇṇato

original: Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
analyzed: ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana kesa sadisaḥ uva

analyzed: semhanti sarīra abbhantare eka patta pūra ppamāṇam semham tam vaṇṇataḥ setam nāgabala paṇṇa rasa vaṇṇam

analyzed: upari thokam thokam paggharantam vakkahadaya yakana papphāse temayamānam ṭhitam tasmin hi

original: Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
analyzed: visa bhāga paricchedo pana kesa sadisā uva

original: paricchinno. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
analyzed: paricchinnaḥ ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedo pana kesa sadisaḥ uva

original: mahāhasitaṃ hasanti, domanassajātā rodanti paridevanti tathārūpaṃ visabhāgāhāraṃ

original: yoginā akkhikūpake pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva pariggaṇhitabbaṃ. Paricchedato assubhāgena
analyzed: yoginā akkhikūpake pūretvā ṭhita vasena iva pariggaṇhitabbam paricchedataḥ a subhāgena

original: paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
analyzed: paricchinnam ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana kesa sadisaḥ uva

original: Vasāti vilīnasneho. Sā vaṇṇato nāḷikeratelavaṇṇā, ācāme āsittatelavaṇṇātipi vattuṃ
analyzed: vasāti vilīna snehaḥ sā vaṇṇataḥ nāḷikera tela vaṇṇā ācāme āsitta tela vaṇṇā atipi vattum

original: vaṭṭati. Saṇṭhānato nhānakāle pasannaudakassa upari paribbhamantasinehabinduvisaṭasaṇṭhānā.
analyzed: vaṭṭati saṇṭhānataḥ nhāna kāle pasanna udakassa upari paribbhamanta sineha bindu visaṭa saṇṭhānā

original: Disato dvīsu disāsu jātā. Okāsato yebhuyyena hatthatalahatthapiṭṭhipādatalapādapiṭṭhināsāpuṭanalāṭaaṃsakūṭesu
analyzed: disatas dvīsu disāsu jātāḥ okāsataḥ yebhuyyena hattha talahattha piṭṭhi pāda tala pāda piṭṭhi nāsā puṭana lāṭa aṃsa kūṭesu

original: ṭhitā. Na cesā etesu okāsesu sadā vilīnāva hutvā tiṭṭhati; yadā pana aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvisabhāgadhātuvisabhāgehi
analyzed: ṭhitā na ca isā etesu okāsesu sadā vilīnā ava hutvā tiṭṭhati yadā pana aggi santāpa sūriya santāpa otu visabhāga dhātu visabhāgehi

original: te padesā usmā jātā honti, tadā tattha nhānakāle pasannaudakūpari sinehabinduvisaṭo
analyzed: te padesāḥ jātāḥ honti tadā tattha nhāna kāle sineha bindu visaṭaḥ

original: viya ito cito ca saṃsarati. Paricchedato vasābhāgena paricchinnā. Ayamassā sabhāgaparicchedo.
analyzed: viyaḥ itas citas ca saṃsarati paricchedataḥ vasā bhāgena paricchinnā ayam assā sa bhāga paricchedaḥ

original: Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
analyzed: visa bhāga paricchedo pana kesa sadisā uva

original: Kheḷoti antomukhe pheṇamissā āpodhātu. So vaṇṇato seto pheṇavaṇṇo. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhāno,
analyzed: antomukhe pheṇa missā āpodhātu saḥ vaṇṇataḥ seto pheṇa vaṇṇo saṇṭhānataḥ okāsa saṇṭhānaḥ

original: pheṇasaṇṭhānatotipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Disato uparimāya disāya jāto. Okāsato ubhohi
analyzed: vattum vaṭṭati disataḥ uparimāya disāya jātaḥ okāsataḥ

original: kapolapassehi oruyha jivhāya ṭhito. Na cesa ettha sadā sannicito hutvā tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: kapola passehi oruyha jivhāya ṭhitaḥ na ca isaḥ ettha sadā sannicitaḥ hutvā tiṭṭhati

original: Yadā pana sattā tathārūpaṃ āhāraṃ passanti vā saranti vā uṇhatittakaṭukaloṇambilānaṃ
analyzed: yadā pana sattā tathārūpam āhāram passanti vā saranti vā uṇha titta kaṭuka loṇambilānam

original: vā kiñci mukhe ṭhapenti, yadā vā nesaṃ hadayaṃ ākilāyati, kismiñcideva vā jigucchā
analyzed: vā kiñci mukhe yadā vā hadayam ākilāyati kismiṃcid eva vā

original: uppajjati, tadā kheḷo uppajjitvā ubhohi kapolapassehi oruyha jivhāya saṇṭhāti. Aggajivhāya
analyzed: uppajjati tadā kheḷaḥ uppajjitvā ubhohi kapola passehi oruyha jivhāya saṇṭhāti agga jivhāya

original: cesa tanuko hoti, mūlajivhāya bahalo; mukhe pakkhittañca puthukaṃ vā taṇḍulaṃ vā
analyzed: ce isa tanukaḥ hoti mūla jivhāya bahalaḥ mukhe pakkhittam ca puthukam vā taṇḍulam vā

original: aññaṃ vā kiñci khādanīyaṃ, nadīpuḷine khatakūpakasalilaṃ viya, parikkhayaṃ agacchantova
analyzed: aññam vā kiñci khādanīyam nadī puḷine khata kūpaka salilam viya parikkhayam a gacchanto uva

original: temetuṃ samattho hoti. Paricchedato kheḷabhāgena paricchinno. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.
analyzed: temetum samatthaḥ hoti paricchedataḥ kheḷa bhāgena paricchinnaḥ ayam assa sa bhāga paricchedo

original: Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
analyzed: visa bhāga paricchedo pana kesa sadisā uva

original: Siṅghāṇikāti matthaluṅgato paggharaṇakaasuci. Sā vaṇṇato taruṇatālaṭṭhimiñjavaṇṇā.
analyzed: siṅghāṇikā ati mattha luṅgataḥ paggharaṇaka asuci sā vaṇṇato taruṇa tāla ṭṭhi miñja vaṇṇā

original: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānā. Disato uparimāya disāya jātā. Okāsato nāsāpuṭe pūretvā
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ okāsa saṇṭhānāḥ disatas uparimāya disāya jātāḥ okāsataḥ nāsāpuṭe pūretvā

original: ṭhitā. Na cesā ettha sadā sannicitā hutvā tiṭṭhati; atha kho yathā nāma puriso paduminīpattena
analyzed: ṭhitā na ca isā ettha sadā sannicitā hutvā tiṭṭhati atha kho yathā nāma puriso paduminī pattena

original: dadhiṃ bandhitvā heṭṭhā kaṇṭakena vijjheyya, atha tena chiddena dadhimatthu gaḷitvā
analyzed: dadhim bandhitvā heṭṭhā kaṇṭakena vijjheyya atha tena chiddena dadhi matthu gaḷitvā

original: bahi pateyya, evameva yadā sattā rodanti vā visabhāgāhārautuvasena vā sañjātadhātukkhobhā
analyzed: bahi pateyya evam eva yadā sattāḥ rodanti vā visa bhāga āhāra otu vasena vā sañjāta dhātu kkhobhā

original: honti, tadā antosīsato pūtisemhabhāvaṃ āpannaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ gaḷitvā tālumatthakavivarena
analyzed: honti tadā pūti semha bhāvam āpannam mattha luṅgam gaḷitvā tālu matthaka vivarena

original: otaritvā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā. Siṅghāṇikā pariggaṇhakena pana
analyzed: otaritvā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā siṅghāṇikā pariggaṇhakena pana

original: yoginā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva pariggaṇhitabbā. Paricchedato siṅghāṇikābhāgena
analyzed: yoginā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā ṭhita vasena iva pariggaṇhitabbā paricchedato siṅghāṇikā bhāgena

original: paricchinnā. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
analyzed: paricchinnā ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedo pana kesa sadisaḥ uva

original: Lasikāti sarīrasandhīnaṃ abbhantare picchilakuṇapaṃ. Sā vaṇṇato kaṇikāraniyyāsavaṇṇā.
analyzed: lasikā ati sarīra sandhīnam abbhantare picchila kuṇapam sā vaṇṇataḥ kaṇikāra niyyāsa vaṇṇā

original: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānā. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātā. Okāsato aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ okāsa saṇṭhānāḥ disataḥ dvīsu disāsu jātāḥ okāsataḥ aṭṭhi sandhīnam abbhañjana kiccam

original: sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitā. Yassa cesā mandā hoti, tassa uṭṭhahantassa
analyzed: sādhayamānā asīti sata sandhīnam abbhantare ṭhitā yassa ca isā mandā hoti tassa uṭṭhahantassa

original: nisīdantassa abhikkamantassa paṭikkamantassa sammiñjantassa pasārentassa aṭṭhikāni
analyzed: nisīdantassa abhikkamantassa paṭikkamantassa sammiñjantassa pasārentassa aṭṭhikāni

original: kaṭakaṭāyanti, accharāsaddaṃ karonto viya vicarati, ekayojanadviyojanamattampi addhānaṃ
analyzed: kaṭakaṭāyanti accha rāsaddam karontaḥ viya vicarati eka yojana dvi yojana mattam pi

original: gatassa vāyodhātu kuppati, gattāni dukkhanti. Yassa pana bahukā hoti tassa uṭṭhānanisajjādīsu
analyzed: gatassa vāyodhātu kuppati gattāni dukkhanti yassa pana bahukā hoti tassa uṭṭhāna nisajja ādīsu

original: na aṭṭhīni kaṭakaṭāyanti, dīghampi addhānaṃ gatassa na vāyodhātu kuppati, na gattāni
analyzed: na aṭṭhīni kaṭakaṭāyanti dīgham pi addhānam gatassa na vāyodhātu kuppati na gattāni

original: dukkhanti. Paricchedato lasikābhāgena paricchinnā. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
analyzed: paricchedataḥ lasikā bhāgena paricchinnā ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana kesa sadisaḥ uva

original: Muttanti vaṇṇato māsakhārodakavaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato adhomukhaṭhapitaudakakumbhantaragataudakasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: muttanti vaṇṇataḥ māsa khāra udaka vaṇṇam saṇṭhānataḥ adhomukha ṭhapita audaka kumbha antara gata odaka saṇṭhānam

original: Disato heṭṭhimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato vatthissa abbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Vatthi nāma
analyzed: disataḥ heṭṭhimāya disāya jātam okāsataḥ vatthissa abbhantare ṭhitam vatthi nāma

original: vatthipuṭo vuccati, yattha seyyathāpi nāma candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe ravaṇaghaṭe
analyzed: vatthipuṭaḥ vuccati yattha seyyathā api nāma candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe ravaṇa ghaṭe

original: candanikaraso pavisati, na cassa pavisanamaggo paññāyati; evameva sarīrato muttaṃ
analyzed: candanika rasaḥ pavisati na cassa pavisana maggo paññāyati evam eva sarīrataḥ muttam

original: pavisati, na cassa pavisanamaggo paññāyati, nikkhamanamaggo pana pākaṭo hoti; yamhi
analyzed: pavisati na cassa pavisana maggo paññāyati nikkhamana maggo pana pākaṭaḥ hoti yamhi

original: ca muttassa bharite ‘passāvaṃ karomā’ti sattānaṃ āyūhanaṃ hoti. Paricchedato vatthiabbhantarena
analyzed: ca muttassa bharite passāvam karoma ati sattānam āyūhanam hoti paricchedataḥ vatthi abbhantarena

original: ceva muttabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ. Ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisova.
analyzed: ca iva mutta bhāgena ca paricchinnam ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedo pana kesa sadisā uva

original: Evañhi kesādike koṭṭhāse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena vavatthapetvā anupubbato
analyzed: evam hi kesa ādike koṭṭhāse vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna disā ukāsa pariccheda vasena vavatthapetvā anupubbato

original: nātisīghato nātisaṇikatotiādinā nayena vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā
analyzed: na ati sīghataḥ na ati saṇikataḥ iti ādinā nayena vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna gandha asayokāsa vasena pañcadhā

original: ‘paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlā’ti manasikaroto paṇṇattisamatikkamavasena, seyyathāpi cakkhumato
analyzed: paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlā ati manasikaroto paṇṇatti samatikkama vasena seyyathā api cakkhumataḥ

original: purisassa dvattiṃsavaṇṇānaṃ kusumānaṃ ekasuttagaṇṭhitaṃ mālaṃ olokentassa sabbapupphāni
analyzed: purisassa dvattiṃsa vaṇṇānam kusumānam eka sutta gaṇṭhitam mālam olokentassa sabba pupphāni

original: apubbāpariyamiva pākaṭāni honti, evameva “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”ti imaṃ kāyaṃ olokentassa
analyzed: apubba apariyam iva pākaṭāni honti evam eva atthi imasmin kāye kesā ati imam kāyam olokentassa

original: sabbe te dhammā apubbāpariyamiva pākaṭā honti. Tena vuttaṃ manasikārakosallakathāyaṃ
analyzed: sabbe te dhammā apubba apariyam iva pākaṭāḥ honti tena vuttam manasikāra kosallakathāyam

original: “ādikammikassa hi ‘kesā’ti manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā ‘mutta’nti imaṃ pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhatī”ti.
analyzed: ādikammikassa hi kesāti manasikarotaḥ manasikāraḥ gantvā muttanti imam pariyosāna koṭṭhāsam eva āhacca tiṭṭhati iti

original: Sace pana bahiddhāpi manasikāraṃ upasaṃharati, athassa evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu pākaṭībhūtesu
analyzed: sace pana bahiddhā api manasikāram upasaṃharati athassa evam sabba koṭṭhāsesu pākaṭībhūtesu

original: āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo sattākāraṃ vijahitvā koṭṭhāsarāsivaseneva upaṭṭhahanti;
analyzed: āhiṇḍantāḥ manussa tiracchāna ādayaḥ satta ākāram vijahitvā koṭṭhāsa rāsi vasena iva upaṭṭhahanti

original: tehi ca ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi koṭṭhāsarāsimhi pakkhipiyamānamiva upaṭṭhāti.
analyzed: tehi ca ajjhohariyamānam pāna bhojana ādi koṭṭhāsa rāsimhi pakkhipiyamānam iva upaṭṭhāti

original: Athassa anupubbamuñcanādivasena ‘paṭikūlā paṭikūlā’ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto anukkamena appanā uppajjati.
analyzed: athassa anupubba muñcana ādi vasena paṭikūlā paṭikūlā ati punappunam manasikarotaḥ anukkamena appanā uppajjati

original: Tattha kesādīnaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena upaṭṭhānaṃ uggahanimittaṃ,
analyzed: tattha kesa ādīnam vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna disa ukāsa pariccheda vasena upaṭṭhānam uggaha nimittam

original: sabbākārato paṭikūlavasena upaṭṭhānaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Taṃ punappunaṃ āvajjentassa
analyzed: sabba ākārataḥ paṭikūla vasena upaṭṭhānam paṭibhāga nimittam tam punappunam āvajjentassa

original: manasikarontassa takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karontassa cattāro khandhā paṭikūlārammaṇā
analyzed: manasikarontassa takka āhatam vitakka āhatam karontassa cattāro khandhāḥ paṭikūla ārammaṇā

original: honti, paṭhamajjhānavasena appanā pavattati. Pubbabhāge parikammaupacāracittāni savitakkasavicārāni
analyzed: honti paṭhama jhāna vasena appanā pavattati pubbabhāge parikamma aupacāra cittāni sa vitakka sa vicārāni

original: sappītikāni somanassasahagatāni paṭikūlanimittārammaṇāni; appanāpi savitakkasavicārā
analyzed: sappītikāni somanassa sahagatāni paṭikūla nimitta ārammaṇāni appanā api sa vitakka sa vicārā

original: sappītikā somanassasahagatāva. Bhūmantarena pana mahaggatā rūpāvacarā honti. Paṭikkūlepi
analyzed: sappītikā somanassa sahagatā ava bhūma antarena pana mahaggatāḥ rūpāvacarāḥ honti paṭikkūle pi

original: ca etasmiṃ ārammaṇe ānisaṃsadassāvitāya somanassaṃ uppajjati, ekattārammaṇabaleneva
analyzed: ca etasmin ārammaṇe ānisaṃsa dassāvitāya somanassam uppajjati ekatta ārammaṇa balena iva

original: vā taṃ uppajjati. Dutiyajjhānādīni panettha na nibbattanti. Kasmā? Oḷārikattā. Idañhi
analyzed: vā tam uppajjati dutiya jhāna ādīni pana ittha na nibbattanti kasmai oḷārika ttā idam hi

original: ārammaṇaṃ oḷārikaṃ. Vitakkabalenevettha cittekaggatā jāyati, na vitakkasamatikkamenāti.
analyzed: ārammaṇam oḷārikam vitakka balena iva ittha citta ekagga tā jāyati na vitakka samatikkamena ati

original: Ayaṃ tāva samathavasena kammaṭṭhānakathā.
analyzed: ayam tāva samatha vasena kammaṭṭhāna kathā

original: Avisesato pana sādhāraṇavasena evaṃ veditabbaṃ – idañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetukāmena
analyzed: avisesataḥ pana sādhāraṇa vasena evam veditabbam idam hi kammaṭṭhānam bhāvetu kāmena

original: kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā sajjhāyakāle eva kesādīnaṃ vaṇṇanimittasaṇṭhānanimittadisānimittaokāsanimittaparicchedanimittāni
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam uggahetvā sajjhāya kāle eva kesa ādīnam vaṇṇa nimitta saṇṭhāna nimitta disā nimitta okāsa nimitta pariccheda nimittāni

original: vācāya pothetvā pothetvā ekekakoṭṭhāse ‘ayaṃ etaṃsarikkhako’ti tividhena sajjhāyo
analyzed: vācāya pothetvā pothetvā ekeka koṭṭhāse ayam tividhena sajjhāyaḥ

original: kātabbo. Kathaṃ? Tacapañcake tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva anulomato pañcāhaṃ, paṭilomato
analyzed: kātabbaḥ katham taca pañcake tāva heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva anulomataḥ pañca aham paṭilomataḥ

original: pañcāhaṃ, anulomapaṭilomato pañcāhanti addhamāsaṃ sajjhāyo kātabbo. Tato ācariyassa
analyzed: pañca aham anuloma paṭilomataḥ pañca ahanti addha māsam sajjhāyaḥ kātabbo tatas ācariyassa

original: santikaṃ gantvā vakkapañcakaṃ uggaṇhitvā tatheva addhamāsaṃ sajjhāyo kātabbo. Tato
analyzed: santikam gantvā vakka pañcakam uggaṇhitvā tathā iva addha māsam sajjhāyaḥ kātabbo tatas

original: te dasapi koṭṭhāse ekato katvā addhamāsaṃ. Puna papphāsapañcakādīsupi ekekaṃ uggaṇhitvā
analyzed: te koṭṭhāse ekatas katvā addha māsam puna ekekam uggaṇhitvā

original: addhamāsaṃ. Tato te pañcadasapi koṭṭhāse addhamāsaṃ. Matthaluṅgapañcakaṃ addhamāsaṃ.
analyzed: addha māsam koṭṭhāse addha māsam matthaluṅga pañcakam addha māsam

original: Tato tevīsati koṭṭhāse addhamāsaṃ. Medachakkaṃ addhamāsaṃ. Tato te chabbīsatipi koṭṭhāse
analyzed: tato tevīsati koṭṭhāse addha māsam meda chakkam addha māsam tato te chabbīsati pi koṭṭhāse

original: ekato katvā addhamāsaṃ. Muttachakkaṃ addhamāsaṃ. Tato sabbepi dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāse
analyzed: ekatas katvā addha māsam mutta chakkam addha māsam tatas sabbe pi dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāse

original: ekato katvā addhamāsanti evaṃ cha māse sajjhāyo kātabbo.
analyzed: ekatas katvā evam cha māse sajjhāyaḥ kātabbo

original: Tattha – upanissayasampannassa sappaññassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhantasseva
analyzed: tattha upanissaya sampannassa sappaññassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānam uggaṇhantassa eva

original: koṭṭhāsā upaṭṭhahanti, ekaccassa na upaṭṭhahanti. Tena ‘na upaṭṭhahantī’ti vīriyaṃ
analyzed: koṭṭhāsāḥ upaṭṭhahanti ekaccassa na upaṭṭhahanti tena na upaṭṭhahanti iti vīriyam

original: na vissajjetabbaṃ. Yattakā koṭṭhāsā upaṭṭhahanti tattake gahetvā sajjhāyo kātabbo.
analyzed: na vissajjetabbam yattakā koṭṭhāsāḥ upaṭṭhahanti tattake gahetvā sajjhāyaḥ kātabbaḥ

original: Evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena pana neva paññavato na mandapaññassa vasena kathetabbaṃ,
analyzed: evam kammaṭṭhānam kathentena pana na iva paññavataḥ na manda paññassa vasena kathetabbam

original: majjhimapaññassa vasena kathetabbaṃ. Majjhimapaññassa hi vasena ācariyā chahi māsehi
analyzed: majjhima paññassa vasena kathetabbam majjhima paññassa hi vasena ācariyā chahi māsehi

original: paricchinditvā tantiṃ ṭhapayiṃsu. Yassa pana ettāvatāpi koṭṭhāsā pākaṭā na honti,

analyzed: niyametvā kathite kaḥ dosaḥ ti sampattiyam pi vipatti saññā āpajjanam sace hi ācariyena

original: Etepi acetanā. Dantā hanukaṭṭhike jātā. Te na jānanti ‘mayaṃ hanukaṭṭhike jātā’ti.

analyzed: sīsa ṭṭhikam patiṭṭhitanti na jānāti aham piṭṭhi kaṇṭake ṭhitanti piṭṭhi kaṇṭa ṭṭhikaḥ api

original: Anekasandhiyamito na kehici;

original: Baddho nahārūhi jarāya codito,

original: Acetano kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamo.
analyzed: acetanaḥ kaṭṭha kaliṅga rūpamaḥ

original: ‘Idampi acetanaṃ. Aṭṭhimiñjaṃ; vakkaṃ…pe… matthaluṅgaṃ acetanaṃ abyākataṃ suññaṃ
analyzed: idam api acetanam aṭṭhimiñjam vakkaṃpe matthaluṅgam acetanam abyākatam suññam

original: thaddhaṃ patthinnaṃ pathavīdhātū’ti manasikaroti. ‘Pittaṃ semhaṃ…pe… muttaṃ acetanaṃ
analyzed: thaddham patthinnam pathavī dhātu uti manasikaroti pittam acetanam

original: abyākataṃ suññaṃ yūsagataṃ āpodhātū’ti manasikaroti.
analyzed: a byākatam suññam yūsa gatam āpodhātu iti manasikaroti

original: Ime dve mahābhūte pariggaṇhantassa udare ussadā tejodhātu pākaṭā hoti, nāsāya ussadā
analyzed: ime dve mahābhūte pariggaṇhantassa udare ussadā tejodhātu pākaṭā hoti nāsāya ussadā

original: vāyodhātu pākaṭā hoti. Ime cattāro mahābhūte pariggaṇhantassa upādārūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ
analyzed: vāyodhātu pākaṭā hoti ime cattāraḥ mahābhūte pariggaṇhantassa upādā rūpam pākaṭam

original: hoti. Mahābhūtaṃ nāma upādārūpena paricchinnaṃ, upādārūpaṃ mahābhūtena. Yathā ātapo
analyzed: mahābhūtam nāma upādā rūpena paricchinnam upādā rūpam mahābhūtena yathā

original: nāma chāyāya paricchinno, chāyā ātapena; evameva mahābhūtaṃ upādārūpena paricchinnaṃ,
analyzed: nāma chāyāya ātapena evam eva mahābhūtam upādā rūpena paricchinnam

original: upādārūpaṃ mahābhūtena. Athassa evaṃ “cattāri mahābhūtāni tevīsati upādārūpāni rūpakkhandho”ti
analyzed: upādā rūpam mahābhūtena athassa evam cattāri mahābhūtāni tevīsati upādā rūpāni rūpa kkhandhaḥ ti

original: rūpakkhandhaṃ pariggaṇhantassa āyatanadvāravasena arūpino khandhā pākaṭā honti. Iti
analyzed: rūpa kkhandham pariggaṇhantassa āyatana dvāra vasena arūpino khandhāḥ pākaṭāḥ honti iti

original: rūpārūpapariggaho pañcakkhandhā honti, pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni honti, dvādasāyatanāni
analyzed: rūpa arūpa pariggahaḥ pañca khandhāḥ honti pañca khandhāḥ dvādasa āyatanāni honti dvādasa āyatanāni

original: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo hontīti khandhāyatanadhātuvasena yamakatālakandhaṃ phālento viya
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyaḥ honti iti khandha āyatana dhātu vasena yamaka tāla kandham

original: dve koṭṭhāse katvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti.
analyzed: dve koṭṭhāse katvā nāma rūpam vavatthapeti

original: So “idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na ahetu na appaccayā nibbattaṃ, sahetu sappaccayā nibbattaṃ.
analyzed: so idam nāma rūpam na ahetu na appaccayā nibbattam sa hetu sa paccayā nibbattam

original: Ko panassa hetu? Ko pana paccayo”ti upaparikkhanto “avijjāpaccayā taṇhāpaccayā kammapaccayā
analyzed: kaḥ pana assa hetu kaḥ pana paccayaḥ ti upaparikkhantaḥ avijjā paccayā taṇhā paccayā kamma paccayā

original: āhārapaccayā cā”ti tassa paccayaṃ vavatthapetvā “atītepi paccayā ceva paccayasamuppannadhammā
analyzed: āhāra paccayā ca ati tassa paccayam vavatthapetvā atīte pi paccayā ca iva paccaya samuppanna dhammā

original: ca anāgatepi etarahipi paccayā ceva paccayasamuppannadhammā ca, tato uddhaṃ satto
analyzed: ca anāgate pi etarahi pi paccayā ca iva paccaya samuppanna dhammā ca tatas uddham satto

original: vā puggalo vā natthi, suddhasaṅkhārapuñjo evā”ti – evaṃ tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhaṃ vitarati.
analyzed: vā puggalaḥ vā na atthi suddha saṅkhāra puñjaḥ eva ati evam tīsu addhāsu kaṅkham vitarati

original: Ayaṃ pana vipassanāsaṅkhārasallakkhaṇā ñātapariññā nāma.
analyzed: ayam pana vipassanā saṅkhāra sallakkhaṇā ñātapariññā nāma

original: Evaṃ saṅkhāre sallakkhetvā ṭhitassa pana bhikkhussa dasabalassa sāsane mūlaṃ otiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: evam saṅkhāre sallakkhetvā ṭhitassa pana bhikkhussa dasabalassa sāsane mūlam otiṇṇam

original: nāma hoti, patiṭṭhā laddhā nāma, cūḷasotāpanno nāma hoti niyatagatiko. Tathārūpaṃ
analyzed: nāma hoti patiṭṭhā laddhā nāma cūḷasotāpanno nāma hoti niyata gatikaḥ tathārūpam

original: pana utusappāyaṃ, puggalasappāyaṃ, bhojanasappāyaṃ, dhammasavaṇasappāyaṃ labhitvā
analyzed: pana utu sappāyam puggala sappāyam bhojana sappāyam dhamma savaṇa sappāyam labhitvā

original: ekāsane ekapallaṅkavaragato tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā saṅkhāre
