original: sammasanto arahattaṃ gaṇhātīti idaṃ dhātuvasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā nigamanaṃ.
analyzed: sammasantaḥ arahattam gaṇhāti iti idam dhātu vasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā nigamanam

original: Yassa pana neva vaṇṇato upaṭṭhāti na paṭikūlato na suññato tena ‘na me upaṭṭhātī’ti
analyzed: yassa pana na iva vaṇṇataḥ upaṭṭhāti na paṭikūlataḥ na suññataḥ tena na me upaṭṭhāti iti

original: na kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā nisīditabbaṃ, koṭṭhāsamanasikāreyeva pana yogo kātabbo.
analyzed: na kammaṭṭhānam vissajjetvā nisīditabbam koṭṭhāsa manasikāreya iva pana yogaḥ kātabbaḥ

original: Porāṇakattherā kira ‘koṭṭhāsamanasikārova pamāṇa’nti āhaṃsu. Iccassa punappunaṃ koṭṭhāsavasena
analyzed: porāṇaka ttherā kira koṭṭhāsa manasikāraḥ uva pamāṇam ti āhaṃsu iccassa punappunam koṭṭhāsa vasena

original: sajjhāyaṃ karontassa koṭṭhāsā paguṇā honti. Kadā pana paguṇā nāma hontīti? Yadā ‘kesā’ti
analyzed: sajjhāyam karontassa koṭṭhāsā paguṇāḥ honti kadā pana paguṇāḥ nāma honti iti yadā

original: āvajjitamatte manasikāro gantvā ‘matthaluṅga’nti antimakoṭṭhāse patiṭṭhāti, ‘matthaluṅga’nti
analyzed: āvajjita matte manasikāraḥ gantvā mattha luṅganti antima koṭṭhāse patiṭṭhāti mattha luṅganti

original: āvajjitamatte manasikāro āgantvā ‘kesā’ti ādikoṭṭhāse patiṭṭhāti.
analyzed: āvajjita matte manasikāraḥ āgantvā kesāti ādi koṭṭhāse patiṭṭhāti

original: Athassa yathā nāma cakkhumato purisassa dvattiṃsavaṇṇānaṃ pupphānaṃ ekasuttaganthitaṃ
analyzed: athassa yathā nāma cakkhumataḥ purisassa dvattiṃsa vaṇṇānaṃ pupphānaṃ eka sutta ganthitaṃ

original: mālaṃ olokentassa paṭipāṭiyā vā pana nikhāte dvattiṃsavatipāde paṭikkamitvā olokentassa
analyzed: mālam olokentassa paṭipāṭiyā vā pana nikhāte dvattiṃsavati pāde paṭikkamitvā olokentassa

original: paṭipāṭiyāva dvattiṃsavaṇṇāni pupphāni vatipādā vā pākaṭā honti, evameva dvattiṃsa
analyzed: paṭipāṭiyā ava dvattiṃsa vaṇṇāni pupphāni vati pādāḥ vā pākaṭāḥ honti evam eva dvattiṃsa

analyzed: koṭṭhāsāḥ upaṭṭhahanti vicarantā tiracchāna gatā api manussā api sattā ati na upaṭṭhahanti

original: koṭṭhāsāti upaṭṭhahanti, khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ koṭṭhāsantare pakkhippamānaṃ viya hoti.
analyzed: koṭṭhāsā ti upaṭṭhahanti khādanīya bhojanīyam koṭṭhāsa antare pakkhippamānam viya hoti

original: Koṭṭhāsānaṃ paguṇakālato paṭṭhāya tīsu mukhesu ekena mukhena vimuccissati. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ

original: vaṇṇato vā paṭikūlato vā suññato vā upaṭṭhāti. Yathā nāma pūve pacitukāmā itthī madditvā
analyzed: vaṇṇataḥ vā paṭikūlataḥ vā suññataḥ vā upaṭṭhāti yathā nāma pūve pacitu kāmā itthī madditvā

original: ṭhapitapiṭṭhato yaṃ yaṃ icchati taṃ taṃ pacati, yathā vā pana same bhūmippadese ṭhapitaṃ
analyzed: ṭhapita piṭṭhataḥ yam yam icchati tam tam pacati yathā vā pana same bhūmi ppadese ṭhapitam

original: udakapūraṃ kumbhaṃ yato yato āvijjhanti tato tatova udakaṃ nikkhamati; evameva koṭṭhāsānaṃ
analyzed: udaka pūram kumbham yatas yatas āvijjhanti tatas tatas va udakam nikkhamati evam eva koṭṭhāsānam

original: paguṇakālato paṭṭhāya tīsu mukhesu ekena mukhena vimuccissati. Ākaṅkhamānassa vaṇṇato,
analyzed: paguṇa kālataḥ paṭṭhāya tīsu mukhesu ekena mukhena vimuccissati ākaṅkhamānassa vaṇṇataḥ

original: ākaṅkhamānassa paṭikūlato, ākaṅkhamānassa suññato kammaṭṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhahissatiyeva.
analyzed: ākaṅkhamānassa paṭikūlataḥ ākaṅkhamānassa suññataḥ kammaṭṭhānam upaṭṭhahissati yeva

original: Ayaṃ ettako uggahasandhi nāma. Imasmiṃ uggahasandhismiṃ ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pattā bhikkhu
analyzed: ayam ettakaḥ uggaha sandhi nāma imasmin uggaha sandhismin ṭhatvā arahattam pattā bhikkhu

original: gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
analyzed: gaṇana patham vītivattā

original: Yassa pana uggahasandhismiṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, tena kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā,
analyzed: yassa pana uggaha sandhismim kammaṭṭhānam na upaṭṭhāti tena kammaṭṭhānam uggahetvā

original: sace yattha ācariyo vasati, so āvāso sappāyo hoti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce, sappāyaṭṭhāne
analyzed: sace yattha ācariyaḥ vasati saḥ āvāsaḥ sappāyaḥ hoti icca etam kusalam no ce sappāya ṭṭhāne

original: vasitabbaṃ. Vasantena aṭṭhārasa vihāradose vajjetvā pañcaṅgasamannāgate senāsane
analyzed: vasitabbam vasantena aṭṭhārasa vihāra dose vajjetvā pañcaṅga samannāgate senāsane

analyzed: ratti ṭṭhānam vā divāṭṭhānam vā pavisitvā kammaṭṭhānam manasikātabbam

original: Kathaṃ? Ādito tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva anupubbato manasikātabbaṃ, na ekantarikā.
analyzed: katham āditas tāva heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva anupubbataḥ manasikātabbam na ekantarikā

original: Anupubbato manasikaronto hi dvattiṃsapadaṃ nisseṇiṃ padapaṭipāṭiyā akkamanto pāsādaṃ
analyzed: anupubbataḥ manasikarontaḥ hi dvattiṃsa padam nisseṇim pada paṭipāṭiyā akkamantaḥ pāsādam

original: āruyha pāsādānisaṃsaṃ anubhavanakapuriso viya ‘kesā lomā’ti paṭipāṭiyā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: āruyha pāsāda ānisaṃsam anubhavanaka purisaḥ viya kesā loma ati paṭipāṭiyā kammaṭṭhānam

analyzed: manasikaronto kammaṭṭhānato ca na parihāyati pāsāda ānisaṃsa sadise ca nava lokuttara dhamme

original: anubhavati. Anupubbato manasikarontenāpi ca nātisīghato nātisaṇikato manasikātabbaṃ.
analyzed: anubhavati anupubbataḥ manasikarontena api ca na ati sīghataḥ na ati saṇikataḥ manasikātabbam

original: Atisīghato manasikarontassa hi kiñcāpi kammaṭṭhānaṃ paguṇaṃ hoti, avibhūtaṃ pana
analyzed: ati sīghataḥ manasikarontassa hi kiñcā api kammaṭṭhānam paguṇam hoti avibhūtam pana

original: hoti. Tattha opammaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
analyzed: hoti tattha opammam heṭṭhā vuttam eva

original: Atisaṇikato manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchati, antarāva osakkitabbaṃ
analyzed: ati saṇikataḥ manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānam pariyosānam na gacchati antarāva osakkitabbam

original: hoti. Yathā hi puriso tiyojanaṃ maggaṃ sāyaṃ kacchaṃ bandhitvā paṭipanno nikkhantaṭṭhānato
analyzed: hoti yathā hi purisaḥ ti yojanam maggam sāyam kaccham bandhitvā paṭipannaḥ nikkhanta ṭṭhānataḥ

analyzed: paṭṭhāya sītala chāyam disvā vissamati ramaṇīyam vālika talam disvā piṭṭhim pasāreti

analyzed: vana pokkharaṇim disvā pānīyam pivati nhāyati pabbatam disvā āruyha pabbata rāmaṇeyyakam

original: passati, taṃ antarāyeva sīho vā byaggho vā dīpi vā hanati, corā vā pana viluppanti
analyzed: passati tam antarāya iva sīhaḥ vā byagghaḥ vā dīpi vā hanati corāḥ vā pana viluppanti

original: ceva hananti ca; evameva atisaṇikaṃ manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na
analyzed: ca iva hananti ca evam eva ati saṇikam manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānam pariyosānam na

original: gacchati, antarāva osakkitabbaṃ hoti.
analyzed: gacchati antarāva osakkitabbam hoti

original: Tasmā nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇikaṃ ekadivasaṃ tiṃsavāre manasikātabbaṃ; pātova dasa vāre,
analyzed: tasmā na ati sīgham na ati saṇikam eka divasam tiṃsa vāre manasikātabbam pātova dasa vāre

original: majjhanhike dasavāre, sāyanhe dasa vāre sajjhāyo kātabbo, no kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yathā
analyzed: majjhanhike dasa vāre sāyanhe dasa vāre sajjhāyaḥ kātabbaḥ no kātum na vaṭṭati yathā

original: hi pātova uṭṭhāya mukhaṃ no dhovituṃ na vaṭṭati, khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ no khādituṃ
analyzed: hi uṭṭhāya mukham no dhovitum na vaṭṭati khādanīyam bhojanīyam no khāditum

original: no bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati; etaṃ pana vaṭṭeyya; idameva ekantena no kātuṃ na vaṭṭati;
analyzed: no bhuñjitum na vaṭṭati etam pana vaṭṭeyya idam eva ekantena no kātum na vaṭṭati

original: karonto mahantaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati. Yathā hi ekassa purisassa tīṇi khettāni;
analyzed: karontaḥ mahantam attham gahetvā tiṭṭhati yathā hi ekassa purisassa tīṇi khettāni

original: ekaṃ khettaṃ aṭṭhakumbhaṃ deti, ekaṃ soḷasa, ekaṃ dvattiṃsa; tena tīṇipi khettāni
analyzed: ekam khettam aṭṭha kumbham deti ekam soḷasa ekam dvattiṃsa tena tīṇi pi khettāni

original: paṭijaggituṃ asakkontena dve chaḍḍetvā ekaṃ dvattiṃsakumbhadāyakameva paṭijaggitabbaṃ;
analyzed: paṭijaggitum a sakkontena dve chaḍḍetvā ekam dvattiṃsa kumbha dāyakam eva paṭijaggitabbam

original: tattheva kasanavapananiddānādīni kātabbāni; tadevassa itaresu dvīsu uṭṭhānakadāyaṃ
analyzed: tattha iva kasana vapana niddāna ādīni kātabbāni tat evassa itaresu dvīsu uṭṭhānaka dāyam

original: dassati; evameva sesaṃ mukhadhovanādikammaṃ chaḍḍetvāpi ettheva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ,

original: no kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Karonto mahantaṃ atthaṃ gaṇhitvā tiṭṭhatīti ettāvatā majjhimā

original: paṭipadā nāma kathitā.
analyzed: paṭipadā nāma kathitā

original: Evaṃ paṭipannenāpi vikkhepo paṭibāhitabbo. Kammaṭṭhānañhi vissajjetvā citte bahiddhā

original: vikkhepaṃ gacchante kammaṭṭhānato parihāyati, vaṭṭabhayaṃ samatikkamituṃ na sakkoti.
analyzed: vikkhepam gacchante kammaṭṭhānataḥ parihāyati vaṭṭa bhayam samatikkamitum na sakkoti

original: Yathā hi eko puriso sahassuddhāraṃ sādhetvā vaḍḍhiṃ labhitvā addhānaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge
analyzed: yathā hi ekaḥ purisaḥ sahassuddhāram sādhetvā vaḍḍhim labhitvā addhānam paṭipannaḥ antarāmagge

original: kumbhīlamakaragāharakkhasasamuṭṭhitāya gambhīragirikandarāya upari atthataṃ ekapadikaṃ
analyzed: kumbhīla makara gāha rakkhasa samuṭṭhitāya gambhīra giri kandarāya upari eka padikam

original: daṇḍakasetuṃ āruyha gacchanto akkamanapadaṃ vissajjetvā ito cito ca olokento paripatitvā
analyzed: daṇḍaka setum āruyha gacchantaḥ akkamana padam vissajjetvā itas ca itas ca olokentaḥ paripatitvā

original: kumbhīlādibhattaṃ hoti, evameva ayampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā sacitte bahiddhā
analyzed: kumbhīla ādi bhattam hoti evam eva ayam pi kammaṭṭhānam vissajjetvā sa citte bahiddhā

original: vikkhepaṃ gacchante kammaṭṭhānato parihāyati, vaṭṭabhayaṃ samatikkamituṃ na sakkoti.
analyzed: vikkhepam gacchante kammaṭṭhānataḥ parihāyati vaṭṭa bhayam samatikkamitum na sakkoti

original: Tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – purisassa sahassuddhāraṃ sādhetvā vaḍḍhiṃ laddhakālo
analyzed: tatra idam opamma saṃsandanam purisassa sahassuddhāram sādhetvā vaḍḍhim laddha kālaḥ

original: viya hi imassa bhikkhuno ācariyasantike kammaṭṭhānassa uggahitakālo; antarā gambhīragirikandarā
analyzed: viya hi imassa bhikkhuno ācariya santike kammaṭṭhānassa uggahita kālaḥ antarā gambhīra giri kandarā

original: viya saṃsāro; tassa kumbhīlādīhi daṭṭhakālo viya vaṭṭamūlakāni mahādukkhāni; ekapadikadaṇḍakasetu

analyzed: viya imassa bhikkhuno tassa purisassa eka padikam daṇḍaka setuṃ āruyha

analyzed: yam labbhati tassa tassa vasena manasikāraḥ pavattetabbaḥ

original: ‘paṭikūla’nti parikammaṃ karontassa appanāpi upacārampi jāyati. Parassa jīvamānakasarīre
analyzed: paṭikūlanti parikammam karontassa upacāram pi jāyati parassa jīvamānaka sarīre

original: ‘paṭikūla’nti manasikarontassa neva appanā jāyati, na upacāraṃ. Nanu ca dasasu asubhesu
analyzed: paṭikūlanti manasikarontassa nā iva appanā jāyati na upacāram nanu ca dasasu asubhesu

original: ubhayampetaṃ jāyatīti? Āma, jāyati. Tāni hi anupādinnakapakkhe ṭhitāni. Tasmā tattha
analyzed: ubhayam petam jāyati iti āma jāyati tāni hi an upādinnaka pakkhe ṭhitāni tasmā tattha

original: appanāpi upacārampi jāyati. Idaṃ pana upādinnakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ. Tenevettha ubhayampetaṃ
analyzed: upacāram pi jāyati idam pana upādinnaka pakkhe ṭhitam tena iva itthā ubhayam petam

original: na jāyati. Asubhānupassanāsaṅkhātā pana vipassanābhāvanā hotīti veditabbā. Imasmiṃ
analyzed: na jāyati asubha anupassanā saṅkhātā pana vipassanā bhāvanā hoti iti veditabbā imasmin

original: pabbe kiṃ kathitanti? Samathavipassanā kathitā.
analyzed: pabbe kim kathitanti samatha vipassanā kathitā

original: Idānettha evaṃ sabbaṃ manasikārasādhāraṇaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ. Etesañhi –
analyzed: idānī ittha evam sabbam manasikāra sādhāraṇam pakiṇṇakam veditabbam etesam hi

original: Nimittato lakkhaṇato, dhātuto atha suññato;
analyzed: nimittataḥ lakkhaṇataḥ dhātutaḥ atha suññataḥ

original: Khandhādito ca viññeyyo, kesādīnaṃ vinicchayo.
analyzed: ca viññeyyaḥ kesa ādīnam vinicchayo

original: Tattha ‘nimittato’ti dvattiṃsākāre saṭṭhisataṃ nimittāni, yesaṃ vasena yogāvacaro
analyzed: tattha nimittato ti dvattiṃsa ākāre nimittāni yesam vasena yogāvacaro

original: dvattiṃsākāraṃ koṭṭhāsato pariggaṇhāti, seyyathidaṃ – kesassa vaṇṇanimittaṃ, saṇṭhānanimittaṃ,
analyzed: dvattiṃsa ākāram koṭṭhāsataḥ pariggaṇhāti seyyathidam kesassa vaṇṇa nimittam saṇṭhāna nimittam

original: disānimittaṃ, okāsanimittaṃ, paricchedanimittanti pañca nimittāni honti. Lomādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: disā nimittam okāsa nimittam pariccheda nimittam pañca nimittāni honti

original: ‘Lakkhaṇato’ti dvattiṃsākāre aṭṭhavīsatisataṃ lakkhaṇāni honti, yesaṃ vasena yogāvacaro
analyzed: lakkhaṇato ti dvattiṃsa ākāre aṭṭhavīsati satam lakkhaṇāni honti yesam vasena yogāvacaro

original: dvattiṃsākāraṃ lakkhaṇato manasikaroti, seyyathidaṃ – kese thaddhattalakkhaṇaṃ, ābandhattalakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: dvattiṃsa ākāram lakkhaṇataḥ manasikaroti sā iyyathidam kese thaddhatta lakkhaṇam ābandhatta lakkhaṇam

original: uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ, vitthambhanalakkhaṇanti cattāri lakkhaṇāni honti. Lomādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: uṇhatta lakkhaṇam vitthambhana lakkhaṇan ti cattāri lakkhaṇāni honti loma ādīsu pi esa eva nayo

original: ‘Dhātuto’ti dvattiṃsākāre “catudhāturo ayaṃ, bhikkhu, puriso”ti vuttāsu dhātūsu aṭṭhavīsatisataṃ
analyzed: dhātutaḥ ti dvattiṃsa ākāre ayam bhikkhu puriso ti vuttāsu dhātūsu aṭṭhavīsati satam

original: dhātuyo honti, yāsaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ dhātuto pariggaṇhāti, seyyathidaṃ
analyzed: dhātuyaḥ honti vasena yoga avacaraḥ dvattiṃsa ākāram dhātutaḥ pariggaṇhāti sā iyyathidam

original: – kese kakkhaḷatā pathavīdhātu, ābandhanatā āpodhātu, uṇhatā tejodhātu, vitthambhanatā
analyzed: kese kakkhaḷa tā pathavī dhātu ābandhana tā āpaḥ dhātu uṇha tā tejaḥ dhātu vitthambhana tā

original: vāyodhātūti catasso dhātuyo honti. Lomādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: catassaḥ dhātuyaḥ honti esa iva nayo

original: ‘Suññato’ti dvattiṃsākāre channavuti suññatā honti, yāsaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ
analyzed: dvattiṃsa ākāre channavuti suññatāḥ honti yāsam vasena yogāvacaraḥ dvattiṃsa ākāram

original: suññato vipassati, seyyathidaṃ – kesā suññā attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena
analyzed: suññataḥ vipassati sā iyyathidam kesā suññā attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena

original: vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vāti. Kese tāva attasuññatā, attaniyasuññatā,
analyzed: vā vā a vipariṇāma dhammena vā ati kese tāva atta suñña tā atta niya suñña tā

original: niccabhāvasuññatāti tisso suññatā honti. Lomādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: nicca bhāva suññatā ti tissaḥ suññatāḥ honti loma ādīsu pi esa iva nayo

original: ‘Khandhādito’ti dvattiṃsākāre kesādīsu khandhādivasena pariggayhamānesu kesā kati
analyzed: khandha āditas ti dvattiṃsa ākāre kesa ādīsu khandha ādi vasena pariggayhamānesu kesā kati

original: khandhā honti, kati āyatanāni, kati dhātuyo, kati saccāni, kati satipaṭṭhānānītiādinā
analyzed: khandhāḥ honti kati āyatanāni kati dhātuyo kati saccāni kati sati paṭṭhānāni itiādinā

original: nayena pettha vinicchayo viññātabbo.
analyzed: nayena pa ittha vinicchayaḥ viññātabbaḥ

original: 357. Evaṃ ajjhattādibhedato tividhena kāyānupassanaṃ vitthārato dassetvā idāni “kāyānupassī
analyzed: evam ajjhatta ādi bhedataḥ tividhena kāya anupassanam vitthārataḥ dassetvā idāni kāya anupassī

original: viharati ātāpī sampajāno”tiādīni padāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ anupassītiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: viharati ātāpī sampajānoti ādīni padāni bhājetvā dassetum anupassī itiādi āraddham

original: Tattha yāya anupassanāya kāyānupassī nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ tattha katamā anupassanā?
analyzed: tattha yāya anupassanāya kāya anupassī nāma hoti tam dassetum tattha katamā anupassanā

original: Yā paññā pajānanātiādi vuttaṃ. Ātāpītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: yā paññā pajānanā itiādi vuttam ātāpī iti ādīsu pi esā iva nayo

original: Tattha paññā pajānanātiādīni heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
analyzed: tattha paññā pajānanā ti ādīni heṭṭhā cittuppāda kaṇḍa vaṇṇanāyam vutta nayena iva veditabbāni

original: Upetotiādīni sabbāni aññamaññavevacanāni. Apica āsevanavasena upeto, bhāvanāvasena
analyzed: upetaḥ iti ādīni sabbāni aññamañña vevacanāni apica āsevana vasena upetaḥ bhāvanā vasena

original: suṭṭhu upetoti samupeto. Upāgato samupāgato, upapanno sampannoti imesupi dvīsu dukesu
analyzed: suṭṭhu upeto ti samupetaḥ upāgataḥ samupāgataḥ upapanno sampanno ti imesu pi dvīsu dukesu

original: ayameva nayo. Bahulīkāravasena pana samannāgatoti evamettha yojanā veditabbā. Iminā
analyzed: ayam eva nayaḥ bahulīkāra vasena pana samannāgataḥ ti evam ettha yojanā veditabbā iminā

original: ātāpena upetoti ādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: ātāpena upeta iti ādīsupi esā iva nayo

original: Viharatīti pade ‘tattha katamo vihāro’ti pucchaṃ akatvā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya
analyzed: viharati iti pade tattha katamaḥ vihāro ti puccham a katvā puggala adhiṭṭhānāya desanāya

original: desento iriyatītiādimāha. Tassattho – catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ aññatarasamaṅgībhāvato
analyzed: desentaḥ iriyati iti ādim āha tassa attho catunnam iriyāpathānam aññatara samaṅgībhāvato

original: iriyati. Tehi iriyāpathacatukkehi kāyasakaṭavattanena vattati. Ekaṃ iriyāpathadukkhaṃ
analyzed: iriyati tehi iriyāpatha catukkehi kāya sakaṭa vattanena vattati ekam iriyāpatha dukkham

original: aparena iriyāpathena bādhitvā ciraṭṭhitikabhāvena sarīrakkhanato pāleti. Ekasmiṃ
analyzed: aparena iriyāpathena bādhitvā ciraṭṭhitika bhāvena sarīra khanataḥ pāleti ekasmiṃ

original: iriyāpathe asaṇṭhahitvā sabbiriyāpathavatanato yapeti. Tena tena iriyāpathena tathā
analyzed: iriyāpathe a saṇṭhahitvā yapeti tena tena iriyāpathena tathā

original: tathā kāyassa yāpanato yāpeti. Cirakālavattāpanato carati. Iriyāpathena iriyāpathaṃ
analyzed: tathā kāyassa yāpanataḥ yāpeti cira kālavat tāpanataḥ carati iriyāpathena iriyāpatham

original: vicchinditvā jīvitaharaṇato viharati.
analyzed: vicchinditvā jīvita haraṇataḥ viharati

original: 362. Sveva kāyo lokoti yasmiṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharati, sveva kāyo lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena
analyzed: su eva kāyaḥ yasmin kāye kāya anupassī viharati su eva kāyaḥ lujjana palujjana ṭṭhena

original: loko. Yasmā panassa kāye pahīyamānaṃ abhijjhādomanassaṃ vedanādīsupi pahīyati eva,
analyzed: lokaḥ yasmā pana assa kāye pahīyamānam abhijjhā domanassam vedanā ādīsu pi pahīyati eva

original: tasmā pañcapi upādānakkhandhā lokoti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tasmā pañca api upādānakkhandhāḥ loko ti vuttam

original: Santātiādīsupi nirodhavasena santatāya santā. Bhāvanāya samitattā samitā. Vatthupariññāya
analyzed: nirodha vasena santatāya santā bhāvanāya samita ttā samitā vatthu pariññāya

original: appavattivūpasamavasena vūpasantā. Nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ gatāti atthaṅgatā. Punappunaṃ
analyzed: appavatti vūpasama vasena vūpasantā nirodha saṅkhātam attham gatā ati atthaṅgatā punappunam

original: nibbattiyā paṭibāhitattā ativiya atthaṃ gatāti abbhatthaṅgatā. Appitāti vināsitā,
analyzed: nibbattiyā paṭibāhita ttā ativiya attham gatā ati abbhatthaṅgatā appitā ati vināsitā

original: appavattiyaṃ ṭhapitātipi attho. Byappitāti suvināsitā, ativiya appavattiyaṃ ṭhapitātipi
analyzed: appavattiyam ṭhapitā atipi atthaḥ byappitā ati su vināsitā ativiya appavattiyam ṭhapitā atipi

original: attho. Yathā puna na anvassavanti evaṃ sositattā sositā. Suṭṭhu sositāti visositā,
analyzed: atthaḥ yathā puna na anvassavanti evam sosita ttā sositā suṭṭhu sositā ati visositā

original: sukkhāpitāti attho. Vigatantā katāti byantī katā. Ettha ca anupassanāya kammaṭṭhānavihārena
analyzed: sukkhāpitā ti atthaḥ vigata antā katā ati byantī katā ettha ca anupassanāya kammaṭṭhāna vihārena

original: kammaṭṭhānikassa kāyapariharaṇaṃ, ātāpena sammappadhānaṃ, satisampajaññena kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇūpāyo;
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānikassa kāya pariharaṇam ātāpena sammappadhānam sati sampajaññena kammaṭṭhāna pariharaṇa upāyaḥ

original: satiyā vā kāyānupassanāvasena paṭiladdho samatho, sampajaññena vipassanā, abhijjhādomanassavinayena
analyzed: satiyā vā kāya anupassanā vasena paṭiladdhaḥ samathaḥ sampajaññena vipassanā abhijjhā domanassa vinayena

original: bhāvanāphalaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: bhāvanā phalam vuttan ti veditabbam

original: Kāyānupassanāniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kāya anupassanā niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Vedanānupassanāniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: vedanā anupassanā niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 363. Vedanānupassanāniddesepi heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Sukhaṃ
analyzed: vedanā anupassanā niddese pi heṭṭhā vutta sadisam vutta nayena iva veditabbam sukham

original: vedanaṃ vedayamānotiādīsu pana sukhaṃ vedananti kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ
analyzed: vedanam vedayamānaḥ ti ādīsu pana sukham vedananti kāyikam vā cetasikam vā sukham vedananti

original: vedayamāno ‘ahaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānātīti attho. Tattha kāmaṃ uttānaseyyakāpi
analyzed: vedayamānaḥ aham sukham vedanam vedayāmi iti pajānāti iti attho tattha kāmam uttānaseyyakā api

original: dārakā thaññapivanādikāle sukhaṃ vedayamānā ‘sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmā’ti pajānanti,
analyzed: dārakā thañña pivana ādi kāle sukham vedayamānā sukham vedanam vedayāma ati pajānanti

original: na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evarūpañhi jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ nappajahati,
analyzed: na pana etat evarūpam jānanam sandhāya vuttam evarūpam hi jānanam sattu upaladdhim na ppajahati

original: sattasaññaṃ na ugghāṭeti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti. Imassa
analyzed: satta saññam na ugghāṭeti kammaṭṭhānam vā sati paṭṭhāna bhāvanā vā na hoti imassa

original: pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ pajahati, sattasaññaṃ ugghāṭeti, kammaṭṭhānañceva
analyzed: pana bhikkhuno jānanam sattu upaladdhim pajahati satta saññam ugghāṭeti kammaṭṭhānam ca iva

original: satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā ca hoti. ‘Idañhi ko vedayati, kassa vedanā, kiṃ kāraṇā vedanā’ti
analyzed: sati paṭṭhāna bhāvanā ca hoti idam hi kaḥ vedayati kassa vedanā kim kāraṇā vedanā ati

original: evaṃ sampajānavediyanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: evam sampajāna vediyanam sandhāya vuttam

original: Tattha ko vedayatīti? Na koci satto vā puggalo vā vedayati. Kassa vedanāti? Na kassaci
analyzed: tattha kaḥ vedayati iti na koci sattaḥ vā puggalaḥ vā vedayati kassa vedanā ati na kassaci

original: sattassa vā puggalassa vā vedanā. Kiṃ kāraṇā vedanāti? Vatthuārammaṇā ca panesā vedanā.
analyzed: sattassa vā puggalassa vā vedanā kim kāraṇā vedanā ati vatthu ārammaṇā ca pana isā vedanā

original: Tasmā esa evaṃ pajānāti – ‘taṃ taṃ sukhādīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayati;
analyzed: tasmai esaḥ evam pajānāti tam tam sukha ādīnam vatthum ārammaṇam katvā vedanā ava vedayati

original: taṃ pana vedanāpavattiṃ upādāya ‘ahaṃ vedayāmī’ti vohāramattaṃ hotī’ti. Evaṃ vatthuṃ
analyzed: tam pana vedanā pavattim upādāya aham vedayāmi iti vohāra mattam hoti iti evam vatthum

original: ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatīti sallakkhento ‘esa sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti
analyzed: ārammaṇam katvā vedanā ava vedayati iti sallakkhentaḥ esa sukham vedanam vedayāmi iti

original: pajānātīti veditabbo, cittalapabbate aññataro thero viya.
analyzed: pajānāti iti veditabbaḥ cittalapabbate aññataro theraḥ viya

original: Thero kira aphāsukakāle balavavedanāya nitthunanto aparāparaṃ parivattati. Tameko
analyzed: theraḥ kira a phāsuka kāle balava vedanāya nitthunantaḥ apara aparam parivattati tam ekaḥ

original: daharo āha – “kataraṃ vo, bhante, ṭhānaṃ rujatī”ti? “Āvuso, pāṭiyekkaṃ rujanaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: daharaḥ āha kataram vaḥ bhante ṭhānam rujati iti āvuso pāṭiyekkam rujana ṭṭhānaṃ

original: nāma natthi; vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatī”ti. “Evaṃ jānanakālato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: nāma natthi vatthum ārammaṇam katvā vedanā ava vedayati iti evam jānana kālataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: adhivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati no, bhante”ti. “Adhivāsemi, āvuso”ti. “Adhivāsanā, bhante, seyyo”ti.
analyzed: adhivāsetum vaṭṭati no bhante iti adhivāsemi āvuso iti adhivāsanā bhante seyyā iti

original: Thero adhivāsesi. Vāto yāva hadayā phālesi. Mañcake antāni rāsīkatāni ahesuṃ. Thero
analyzed: theraḥ adhivāsesi vātaḥ mañcake antāni rāsīkatāni ahesum theraḥ

original: daharassa dassesi – “vaṭṭatāvuso, ettakā adhivāsanā”ti? Daharo tuṇhī ahosi. Thero
analyzed: daharassa dassesi vaṭṭati avuso ettakā adhivāsanā ti daharaḥ tuṇhī ahosi theraḥ

original: vīriyasamādhiṃ yojetvā sahapaṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi.
analyzed: vīriya samādhim yojetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattam pāpuṇitvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi

original: Yathā ca sukhaṃ, evaṃ dukkhaṃ…pe… nirāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘nirāmisaṃ
analyzed: yathā ca sukham evam nirāmisam adukkham asukham vedanam vedayamānaḥ nirāmisam

original: adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti. Iti bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā

original: arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento vedanāvasena kathesi. Duvidhañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ – rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: arūpa kammaṭṭhānam kathentaḥ vedanā vasena kathesi duvidham hi kammaṭṭhānam rūpa kammaṭṭhānam

original: arūpakammaṭṭhānañca; rūpapariggaho arūpapariggahotipi etadeva vuccati. Tattha bhagavā
analyzed: arūpa kammaṭṭhānam ca rūpa pariggaho arūpa pariggaho ti pi etat eva vuccati tattha bhagavā

original: rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento saṅkhepamanasikāravasena vā vitthāramanasikāravasena vā
analyzed: rūpa kammaṭṭhānam kathento saṅkhepa manasikāra vasena vā vitthāra manasikāra vasena vā

original: catudhātuvavatthānaṃ kathesi. Tadubhayampi visuddhimagge sabbākārato dassitameva.
analyzed: catu dhātu vavatthānam kathesi tat ubhayam pi visuddhi magge sabba ākārataḥ dassitam eva

original: Arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ pana kathento yebhuyyena vedanāvasena kathesi. Tividho hi arūpakammaṭṭhāne
analyzed: arūpa kammaṭṭhānam pana kathentaḥ yebhuyyena vedanā vasena kathesi tividhaḥ hi arūpa kammaṭṭhāne

original: abhiniveso – phassavasena, vedanāvasena, cittavasenāti. Kathaṃ? Ekaccassa hi saṃkhittena
analyzed: abhinivesaḥ phassa vasena vedanā vasena citta vasena ati katham ekaccassa hi saṃkhittena

original: vā vitthārena vā pariggahite rūpakammaṭṭhāne tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittacetasikānaṃ paṭhamābhinipāto
analyzed: vā vitthārena vā pariggahite rūpa kammaṭṭhāne tasmim ārammaṇe citta cetasikānam paṭhama abhinipātaḥ

original: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusanto uppajjamāno phasso pākaṭo hoti. Ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantī

original: paccavekkhatopi uppajjati. ‘Sāriputtamoggallānā ceva asītimahāsāvakā ca vīriyeneva
analyzed: paccavekkhato pi uppajjati sāriputta moggallānā ca iva asīti mahā sāvakā ca vīriyena iva

original: lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu. Tvaṃ etesaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjasi, nappaṭipajjasī’ti

original: evaṃ sabrahmacārimahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
analyzed: evam sabrahmacāri mahattam paccavekkhataḥ api uppajjati

analyzed: kucchim pūretvā ṭhita ajagara sadise vissaṭṭha kāyika cetasika vīriye kusīta puggale parivajjentassa api

analyzed: āraddha vīriye pahita tte puggale sevantassa api ṭhāna nisajja ādīsu viriya uppādana attham

analyzed: ninna poṇa pabbhāra cittassa api uppajjati evam uppannassa pana assa arahatta maggena bhāvanā pāripūri hoti iti pajānāti

original: Pītisambojjhaṅgassa –
analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅgassa

analyzed: atthi bhikkhave pīti sambojjhaṅga ṭṭhānīyā dhammā tattha yoniso manasikāra bahulīkāro

original: bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti –

original: Evaṃ uppādo hoti. Tattha pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā nāma. Tassā uppādakamanasikāro yonisomanasikāro nāma.

analyzed: apica ekādasa dhammā pīti sambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti buddha anussati dhamma saṅgha sīla cāga devatā anussati

original: upasamānussati, lūkhapuggalaparivajjanatā, siniddhapuggalasevanatā, pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇatā, tadadhimuttatāti.
analyzed: upasama anussati lūkha puggala parivajjana tā siniddha puggala sevana tā pasādanīya suttanta paccavekkhaṇa tā tad adhimutta tā ti

analyzed: catu pārisuddhi sīlam paccavekkhantassa api gihinaḥ dasa sīlam pañca sīlam paccavekkhantassa api

analyzed: paccavekkhantassa api gihino pi evarūpe kāle sīlavantānam dinna dānam paccavekkhantassa api

analyzed: paccavekkhantassa api samāpattiyāḥ vikkhambhite kilese saṭṭhipi sattatipi vassāni na

original: uppajjati. Majjhattapayogo vuccati attano ca parassa ca kammassakatapaccavekkhaṇā;
analyzed: uppajjati majjhatta payogaḥ vuccati attanaḥ ca parassa ca

original: iminā majjhattapayogena uppajjati. Yo leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paraṃ viheṭhayamānova vicarati,

original: Samādhisambojjhaṅgassa –

original: bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti –

original: Evaṃ uppādo hoti. Tattha samathova samathanimittaṃ, avikkhepaṭṭhena ca abyagganimittanti.
analyzed: evam uppādaḥ hoti tattha samathaḥ uva samatha nimittam avikkhepa ṭṭhena ca abyagga nimittam

original: indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā, nimittakusalatā, samaye cittassa paggaṇhanatā, samaye

analyzed: tassa niggaṇhanam samaye sampahaṃsana tā ati yasmin samaye cittam paññā apayoga manda tāya

analyzed: vā upasama sukha anadhigamena vā nirassādam hoti tasmin samaye aṭṭha saṃvega vatthu paccavekkhaṇena

analyzed: pañcamam atīte vaṭṭa mūlakam dukkham anāgate vaṭṭa mūlakam dukkham paccuppanne āhāra pariyeṭṭhi mūlakam

original: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.

original: Tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī’ti evaṃ kammassakatapaccavekkhaṇena ca ‘paramatthato sattoyeva

original: samuṭṭhāpeti – ‘idaṃ cīvaraṃ anupubbena vaṇṇavikārañceva jiṇṇabhāvañca upagantvā
analyzed: samuṭṭhāpeti idam cīvaram anupubbena vaṇṇa vikāram ca iva jiṇṇa bhāvam ca upagantvā

analyzed: pāda puñchana coḷakam hutvā yaṭṭhi koṭiyā chaḍḍanīyam bhavissati sace panassa sāmiko

original: ‘Anaddhaniyaṃ idaṃ tāvakālika’nti evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena ca. Yathā ca
analyzed: idam tāvakālikan ti evam tāvakālika bhāva paccavekkhaṇena ca yathā ca

original: cīvare, evaṃ pattādīsupi yojanā kātabbā.
analyzed: cīvare evam patta ādīsu pi yojanā kātabbā

original: Sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatāti ettha yo puggalo gihī vā attano puttadhītādike,
analyzed: satta saṅkhāra kelāyana puggala parivajjana tā ti ettha yaḥ puggalaḥ gihī vā putta dhīta ādike

original: pabbajito vā attano antevāsikasamānupajjhāyakādike mamāyati, sahattheneva nesaṃ kesacchedanasūcikammacīvaradhovanarajanapattapacanādīni
analyzed: pabbajitaḥ vā attanaḥ antevāsika samāna upajjhāyaka ādike mamāyati sa hatthena iva nesam kesa chedana sūcikamma cīvara dhovana rajana patta pacana ādīni

original: karoti, muhuttampi apassanto ‘asuko sāmaṇero kuhiṃ? Asuko daharo kuhi’nti? Bhantamigo
analyzed: karoti muhuttam pi a passantaḥ asukaḥ sāmaṇeraḥ kuhim asukaḥ daharaḥ kuhinti bhantamigo

original: viya ito cito ca āloketi; aññena kesacchedanādīnaṃ atthāya ‘muhuttaṃ tāva asukaṃ
analyzed: viya itas citas ca āloketi aññena kesa chedana ādīnam atthāya muhuttam tāva asukam

original: pesethā’ti yāciyamānopi ‘amhepi taṃ attano kammaṃ na kārema, tumhe naṃ gahetvā kilamessathā’ti
analyzed: pesetha ati yāciyamānaḥ api amhe pi tam attano kammam na kārema tumhe nam gahetvā kilamessatha ati

original: na deti – ayaṃ sattakelāyano nāma.
analyzed: na deti ayam sattakelāyanaḥ nāma

original: Yo pana cīvarapattathālakakattarayaṭṭhiādīni mamāyati, aññassa hatthena parāmasitumpi
analyzed: yaḥ pana cīvara patta thālaka kattara yaṭṭhi ādīni mamāyati aññassa hatthena parāmasitum pi

original: na deti, tāvakālikaṃ yācitopi ‘mayampi imaṃ mamāyantā na paribhuñjāma, tumhākaṃ kiṃ
analyzed: na deti tāvakālikam yācitaḥ upi mayam pi imam mamāyantāḥ na paribhuñjāma tumhākam kim

original: dassāmā’ti vadati – ayaṃ saṅkhārakelāyano nāma. Yo pana tesu dvīsupi vatthūsu majjhatto
analyzed: dassāma iti vadati ayam saṅkhārakelāyanaḥ nāma yaḥ pana tesu dvīsu pi vatthūsu majjhattaḥ

original: udāsīno – ayaṃ sattasaṅkhāramajjhatto nāma. Iti ayaṃ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo evarūpe

original: sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggale ārakā parivajjentassāpi, sattasaṅkhāramajjhattapuggale
analyzed: satta saṅkhāraka ilāyana puggale ārakā parivajjentassa api satta saṅkhāra majjhatta puggale

original: sevantassāpi, ṭhānanisajjādīsu taduppādanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi uppajjati.
analyzed: sevantassa api ṭhāna nisajja ādīsu tad uppādana ttham ninna poṇa pabbhāra cittassa api uppajjati

original: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
analyzed: evam uppannassa pana assa arahatta maggena bhāvanā pāripūri hoti iti pajānāti sesam sabbattha uttānattham eva ati

original: Bojjhaṅgapabbavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: bojjhaṅga pabba vaṇṇanā

original: Imesupi dvīsu pabbesu suddhavipassanāva kathitā. Iti ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāge
analyzed: imesu pi dvīsu pabbesu suddha vipassanā ava kathitā iti ime cattāro sati paṭṭhānā pubbabhāge

original: nānācittesu labbhanti. Aññeneva hi cittena kāyaṃ pariggaṇhāti, aññena vedanaṃ, aññena

original: cittaṃ, aññena dhamme pariggaṇhāti; lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe pana ekacitteyeva labbhanti.
analyzed: cittam aññena dhamme pariggaṇhāti lokuttara magga kkhaṇe pana labbhanti

original: Ādito hi kāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā āgatassa vipassanāsampayuttā sati kāyānupassanā nāma.
analyzed: āditas hi kāyam pariggaṇhitvā āgatassa vipassanā sampayuttā sati kāya anupassanā nāma

original: Tāya satiyā samannāgato puggalo kāyānupassī nāma. Vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggaṃ
analyzed: tāya satiyā samannāgataḥ puggalo kāya anupassī nāma vipassanam ussukkāpetvā ariya maggaṃ

original: pattassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayuttā sati kāyanupassanā nāma. Tāya satiyā samannāgato
analyzed: pattassa magga kkhaṇe magga sampayuttā sati kāyanupassanā nāma tāya satiyā samannāgataḥ

original: puggalo kāyānupassī nāma. Vedanaṃ pariggaṇhitvā…. Cittaṃ pariggaṇhitvā…. Dhamme pariggaṇhitvā
analyzed: puggalaḥ kāya anupassī nāma vedanam pariggaṇhitvā cittam pariggaṇhitvā dhamme pariggaṇhitvā

original: āgatassa vipassanāsampayuttā sati dhammānupassanā nāma. Tāya satiyā samannāgato puggalo
analyzed: āgatassa vipassanā sampayuttā sati dhamma anupassanā nāma tāya satiyā samannāgataḥ puggalo

original: dhammānupassī nāma. Vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggaṃ pattassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayuttā
analyzed: dhamma anupassī nāma vipassanam ussukkāpetvā ariya maggam pattassa magga kkhaṇe magga sampayuttā

original: sati dhammānupassanā nāma. Tāya satiyā samannāgato puggalo dhammānupassī nāma. Evaṃ
analyzed: sati dhamma anupassanā nāma tāya satiyā samannāgataḥ puggalaḥ dhamma anupassī nāma evam

original: tāva desanā puggale tiṭṭhati. Kāye pana ‘subha’nti vipallāsappahānā kāyapariggāhikā
analyzed: tāva desanā puggale tiṭṭhati kāye pana vipallāsa pahānā kāya pariggāhikā

original: sati maggena samijjhatīti kāyānupassanā nāma. Vedanāya ‘sukha’nti vipallāsappahānā
analyzed: sati maggena samijjhati iti kāya anupassanā nāma vedanāya sukhanti vipallāsa pahānā

original: vedanāpariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhatīti vedanānupassanā nāma. Citte ‘nicca’nti
analyzed: vedanā pariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhati iti vedanā anupassanā nāma citte

original: vipallāsappahānā cittapariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhatīti cittānupassanā nāma.
analyzed: vipallāsa pahānā citta pariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhati iti citta anupassanā nāma

original: Dhammesu ‘attā’ti vipallāsappahānā dhammapariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhatīti dhammānupassanā
analyzed: dhammesu attā ati vipallāsa pahānā dhamma pariggāhikā sati maggena samijjhati iti dhamma anupassanā

original: nāma. Iti ekāva maggasampayuttā sati catukiccasādhanaṭṭhena cattāri nāmāni labhati.
analyzed: nāma iti magga sampayuttā sati catu kicca sādhana ṭṭhena cattāri nāmāni labhati

original: Tena vuttaṃ – ‘lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe pana ekacitteyeva labbhantī’ti.
analyzed: tena vuttam lokuttara magga kkhaṇe pana eka citte iva labbhanti iti

original: Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā.
2. Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
374. Abhidhammabhājanīye lokuttarasatipaṭṭhānavasena desanāya āraddhattā yathā kāyādiārammaṇesu
analyzed: abhidhammabhājanīye lokuttara sati paṭṭhāna vasena desanāya āraddha ttā yathā kāya ādi ārammaṇesu

original: lokiyasatipaṭṭhānesu tanti ṭhapitā, evaṃ aṭṭhapetvā sabbānipi kāyānupassādīni satipaṭṭhānāni
analyzed: lokiya sati paṭṭhānesu tanti ṭhapitā evam a ṭhapetvā sabbāni api kāya anupassa ādīni sati paṭṭhānāni

original: dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ vibhattassa desanānayassa mukhamattameva dassentena niddiṭṭhāni.
analyzed: dhammasaṅgaṇiyam vibhattassa desanā nayassa mukha mattam eva dassentena niddiṭṭhāni

original: Tattha nayabhedo veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Kāyānupassanāya tāva sotāpattimagge jhānābhinivese
analyzed: tattha naya bhedaḥ veditabbaḥ katham kāya anupassanāya tāva sotāpatti magge jhāna abhinivese

original: suddhikapaṭipadā, suddhikasuññatā, suññatapaṭipadā, suddhikaappaṇihitaṃ, appaṇihitapaṭipadāti
analyzed: suddhika paṭipadā suddhika suññatā suññata paṭipadā suddhika appaṇihitam appaṇihita paṭipadā ati

original: imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ catukkapañcakanayānaṃ vasena dasa nayā honti.
analyzed: imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu dvinnam dvinnam vasena dasa nayāḥ honti

original: Evaṃ sesesupīti vīsatiyā abhinivesesu dve nayasatāni. Tāni catūhi adhipatīhi catuguṇitāni
analyzed: evam sesesu pi iti vīsatiyā abhinivesesu dve naya satāni tāni catūhi adhipatīhi catu guṇitāni

original: aṭṭha. Iti suddhikāni dve sādhipatīni aṭṭhāti sabbampi nayasahassaṃ hoti. Tathā vedanānupassanādīsu
analyzed: aṭṭha iti suddhikāni dve sa adhipatīni aṭṭhā ti sabbam pi naya sahassam hoti tathā vedanā anupassanā ādīsu

original: suddhikasatipaṭṭhāne cāti sotāpattimagge pañca nayasahassāni. Yathā ca sotāpattimagge,
analyzed: suddhika sati paṭṭhāne ca ati sotāpatti magge pañca naya sahassāni yathā ca sotāpatti magge

original: evaṃ sesamaggesupīti kusale vīsati nayasahassāni; suññatāpaṇihitānimittādibhedesu
analyzed: evam sesa maggesu pi iti kusale vīsati naya sahassāni suññatā apaṇihita animitta ādi bhedesu

original: pana tato tiguṇe vipāke saṭṭhi nayasahassānīti. Evameva sakiccasādhakānañceva saṃsiddhikakiccānañca
analyzed: pana tatas tiguṇe vipāke saṭṭhi naya sahassāni iti evam eva sa kicca sādhakānam ca iva saṃsiddhika kiccānam ca

original: kusalavipākasatipaṭṭhānānaṃ niddesavasena duvidho kāyānupassanādivasena ca suddhikavasena
analyzed: kusala vipāka sati paṭṭhānānam niddesa vasena duvidhaḥ kāya anupassanā ādi vasena ca suddhika vasena

original: ca kusale pañcannaṃ vipāke pañcannanti dasannaṃ niddesavārānaṃ vasena dasappabhedo
analyzed: ca kusale pañcannam vipāke dasannam niddesa vārānam vasena dasa ppabhedaḥ

original: asītinayasahassapatimaṇḍito abhidhammabhājanīyaniddeso.
analyzed: asīti naya sahassa pati maṇḍitaḥ abhidhammabhājanīya niddeso

original: 3. Pañhāpucchakavaṇṇanā
analyzed: pañhāpucchaka vaṇṇanā

original: 386. Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva satipaṭṭhānānaṃ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu

original: pana sabbānipi etāni appamāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattanato appamāṇārammaṇāneva,
analyzed: pana sabbāni api etāni appamāṇam nibbānam ārabbha pavattanataḥ appamāṇa ārammaṇāna eva

original: na maggārammaṇāni; sahajātahetuvasena pana maggahetukāni; vīriyaṃ vā vīmaṃsaṃ vā
analyzed: na magga ārammaṇāni sahajāta hetu vasena pana magga hetukāni vīriyam vā vīmaṃsam vā

original: jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipatīni; chandacittajeṭṭhakāya maggabhāvanāya
analyzed: jeṭṭhakam katvā magga bhāvanā kāle magga adhipatīni chanda citta jeṭṭhakāya magga bhāvanāya

original: navattabbāni maggādhipatīnīti phalakālepi navattabbāneva; atītādīsu ekārammaṇabhāvenapi
analyzed: magga adhipatīni iti phala kāle api atīta ādīsu eka ārammaṇa bhāvena api

original: navattabbāni; nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇāni nāma hontīti. Evametasmiṃ
analyzed: na vattabbāni nibbānassa pana bahiddhā dhamma ttā bahiddhā ārammaṇāni nāma honti iti evam etasmin

original: pañhāpucchake nibbattitalokuttarāneva satipaṭṭhānāni kathitāni. Sammāsambuddhena
analyzed: pañhāpucchake sati paṭṭhānāni kathitāni sammāsambuddhena

original: hi suttantabhājanīyasmiṃyeva lokiyalokuttaramissakā satipaṭṭhānā kathitā; abhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakesu
analyzed: hi suttanta bhājanīyasmiṃ yeva lokiya lokuttara missakā sati paṭṭhānā kathitā abhidhamma bhājanīya pañhāpucchakesu

original: pana lokuttarāyevāti. Evamayaṃ satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvā bhājetvā dassitoti.
analyzed: pana lokuttarāya iva ati evam ayam sati paṭṭhāna vibhaṅgaḥ api nīharitvā bhājetvā dassitoti

original: Sammohavinodaniyā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: sammoha vinodaniyā vibhaṅga ṭṭhakathāya

original: Satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sati paṭṭhāna vibhaṅga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 8. Sammappadhānavibhaṅgo
analyzed: sammappadhāna vibhaṅgaḥ

original: 1. Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
390. Idāni tadanantare sammappadhānavibhaṅge cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Tena na
analyzed: idāni tad anantare sammappadhāna vibhaṅge cattāro ti gaṇana paricchedo tena na

original: tato heṭṭhā na uddhanti sammappadhānaparicchedaṃ dīpeti. Sammappadhānāti kāraṇappadhānā
analyzed: tatas heṭṭhā na uddhanti sammappadhāna paricchedam dīpeti sammappadhānā ati kāraṇa ppadhānā

original: upāyappadhānā yonisopadhānā. Idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane paṭipannako bhikkhu. Anuppannānanti
analyzed: upāya ppadhānā yoniso upadhānā idha bhikkhu iti imasmin sāsane paṭipannakaḥ bhikkhu anuppannānam ti

original: anibbattānaṃ. Pāpakānanti lāmakānaṃ. Akusalānaṃ dhammānanti akosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ.
analyzed: anibbattānam pāpakānam ti lāmakānam akusalānam dhammānam ati akosalla sambhūtānam dhammānam

original: Anuppādāyāti na uppādanatthāya. Chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatāsaṅkhātaṃ kusalacchandaṃ
analyzed: an uppādāya ati na uppādana tthāya chandam janeti iti kattu kamya tā saṅkhātam kusala chandam

original: janeti uppādeti. Vāyamatīti payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti. Vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti kāyikacetasikaṃ
analyzed: janeti uppādeti vāyamati iti payogam parakkamam karoti vīriyam ārabhati iti kāyika cetasikam

original: vīriyaṃ karoti. Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti teneva sahajātavīriyena cittaṃ ukkhipati. Padahatīti
analyzed: vīriyam karoti cittam paggaṇhāti iti tena iva sahajāta vīriyena cittam ukkhipati padahati iti

original: padhānavīriyaṃ karoti. Paṭipāṭiyā panetāni cattāripi padāni āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi yojetabbāni.
analyzed: padhāna vīriyam karoti paṭipāṭiyā pana itāni cattāri pi padāni āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkamma sātacca kiriyāhi yojetabbāni

original: Uppannānaṃ pāpakānanti anuppannanti avattabbataṃ āpannānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ. Pahānāyāti
analyzed: uppannānam pāpakānam ti anuppannanti avattabba tam āpannānam pāpa dhammānam pahānāya ati

original: pajahanatthāya. Anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānanti anibbattānaṃ kosallasambhūtānaṃ
analyzed: pajahana atthāya anuppannānam kusalānam dhammānam ti anibbattānam kosalla sambhūtānam

original: dhammānaṃ. Uppādāyāti uppādanatthāya. Uppannānanti nibbattānaṃ. Ṭhitiyāti ṭhitatthāya.
analyzed: dhammānam uppādāya ati uppādana tthāya uppannānam ti nibbattānam ṭhitiyā ati ṭhita tthāya

original: Asammosāyāti anassanatthaṃ. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti punappunaṃ bhāvāya. Vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāya.
analyzed: asammosāya ati an assana attham bhiyyobhāvāya ati punappunam bhāvāya vepullāya ati vipula bhāvāya

original: Bhāvanāyāti vaḍḍhiyā. Pāripūriyāti paripūraṇatthāya. Ayaṃ tāva catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ
analyzed: bhāvanāya ati vaḍḍhiyā pāripūriyā ati paripūraṇa atthāya ayam tāva catunnam sammappadhānānam

original: uddesavāravasena ekapadiko atthuddhāro.
analyzed: uddesa vāra vasena eka padikaḥ atthuddhāro

original: 391. Idāni paṭipāṭiyā tāni padāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ kathañca bhikkhu anuppannānantiādinā
analyzed: idāni paṭipāṭiyā tāni padāni bhājetvā dassetum katham ca bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ ti ādinā

original: nayena niddesavāro āraddho. Tattha yaṃ heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahe āgatasadisaṃ, taṃ tassa
analyzed: nayena niddesa vāraḥ āraddho tattha yam heṭṭhā dhamma saṅgahe āgata sadisam tam tassa

original: vaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana tasmiṃ anāgataṃ, tattha chandaniddese
analyzed: vaṇṇanā ayam vutta nayena iva veditabbam yam pana tasmin anāgatam tattha chanda niddese

original: tāva yo chandoti yo chandaniyavasena chando. Chandikatāti chandikabhāvo, chandakaraṇākāro
analyzed: tāva yaḥ chandaḥ iti yaḥ chanda niya vasena chandaḥ chandika tā ati chandika bhāvaḥ chanda karaṇa ākāraḥ

original: vā. Kattukamyatāti kattukāmatā. Kusaloti cheko. Dhammacchandoti sabhāvacchando. Ayañhi
analyzed: vā kattu kamya tā ati kattu kāma tā kusalaḥ ti chekaḥ dhamma chando ti sabhāva chandaḥ ayan hi

original: chando nāma taṇhāchando, diṭṭhichando, vīriyachando, dhammacchandoti bahuvidho nānappakārako.
analyzed: chandaḥ nāma taṇhā chandaḥ diṭṭhi chandaḥ vīriya chandaḥ dhamma chandaḥ iti bahuvidhaḥ nānā pakārako

original: Tesu dhammacchandoti imasmiṃ ṭhāne kattukamyatākusaladhammacchando adhippeto.
analyzed: tesu dhamma chando ti imasmim ṭhāne kattu kamya tā kusala dhamma chando adhippeto

original: Imaṃ chandaṃ janetīti chandaṃ kurumānova chandaṃ janeti nāma. Sañjanetīti upasaggena
analyzed: imam chandam janeti iti chandam kurumānā uva chandam janeti nāma sañjaneti iti upasaggena

original: padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Uṭṭhapetīti chandaṃ kurumānova taṃ uṭṭhapeti nāma. Samuṭṭhapetīti
analyzed: padam vaḍḍhitam uṭṭhapeti iti chandam kurumānaḥ uva tam uṭṭhapeti nāma samuṭṭhapeti iti

original: upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Nibbattetīti chandaṃ kurumānova taṃ nibbatteti nāma.
analyzed: upasaggena padam vaḍḍhitam nibbatteti iti chandam kurumānaḥ uva tam nibbattā iti nāma

original: Abhinibbattetīti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Apica chandaṃ karontova chandaṃ janeti
analyzed: abhinibbattā iti iti upasaggena padam vaḍḍhitam apica chandam karontaḥ uva chandam janeti

original: nāma. Tameva satataṃ karonto sañjaneti nāma. Kenacideva antarāyena patitaṃ puna ukkhipanto
analyzed: nāma tam eva satatam karontaḥ sañjana iti nāma kenacid eva antarāyena patitam punar ukkhipantaḥ

original: uṭṭhapeti nāma. Pabandhaṭṭhitiṃ pāpento samuṭṭhapeti nāma. Taṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto nibbatteti
analyzed: uṭṭhapeti nāma pabandha ṭṭhitim pāpentaḥ samuṭṭhapeti nāma tam pākaṭam karontaḥ nibbatteti

original: nāma. Anosakkanatāya alīnavuttitāya anolīnavuttitāya abhimukhabhāvena nibbattento
analyzed: nāma anosakkana tāya alīna vutti tāya anolīna vutti tāya abhimukha bhāvena nibbattento

original: abhinibbatteti nāma.
analyzed: abhinibbattā iti nāma

original: 394. Vīriyaniddese vīriyaṃ karontova vīriyaṃ ārabhati nāma. Dutiyapadaṃ upasaggena
analyzed: vīriya niddese vīriyam karontaḥ iva vīriyam ārabhati nāma dutiya padam upasaggena

original: vaḍḍhitaṃ. Vīriyaṃ karontoyeva ca āsevati bhāveti nāma. Punappunaṃ karonto vahulīkaroti.
analyzed: vaḍḍhitam vīriyam ca āsevati bhāveti nāma punappunam karontaḥ vahulīkaroti

original: Āditova karonto ārabhati. Punappunaṃ karonto samārabhati. Bhāvanāvasena bhajanto
analyzed: āditas uva karontaḥ ārabhati punappunam karontaḥ samārabhati bhāvanā vasena bhajantaḥ

original: āsevati. Vaḍḍhento bhāveti. Sabbakiccesu tadeva bahulīkaronto bahulīkarotīti veditabbo.
analyzed: āsevati vaḍḍhentaḥ bhāveti sabba kiccesu tat eva bahulīkarontaḥ bahulīkaroti iti veditabbaḥ

original: 395. Cittapaggahaniddese vīriyapaggahena yojento cittaṃ paggaṇhāti, ukkhipatīti attho.
Punappunaṃ paggaṇhanto sampaggaṇhāti. Evaṃ sampaggahitaṃ yathā na patati tathā naṃ
analyzed: punar punar paggaṇhantaḥ sampaggaṇhāti evam sampaggahitam yathā na patati tathā naṃ

original: vīriyupatthambhena upatthambhento upatthambheti. Upatthambhitampi thirabhāvatthāya
analyzed: vīriya upatthambhena upatthambhentaḥ upatthambheti upatthambhitam pi thira bhāva tthāya

original: punappunaṃ upatthambhento paccupatthambheti nāma.
analyzed: punappunam upatthambhentaḥ paccupatthambheti nāma

original: 406. Ṭhitiyātipadassa niddese sabbesampi asammosādīnaṃ ṭhitivevacanabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: ṭhitiyā ati padassa niddese sabbesam pi asammosa ādīnam ṭhiti vevacana bhāvam dassetuṃ

original: yā ṭhiti so asammosotiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha hi heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ padaṃ uparimassa uparimassa
analyzed: yā so asammosa iti ādi vuttaṃ ettha hi heṭṭhimam heṭṭhimam padam uparimassa uparimassa

original: padassa attho, uparimaṃ uparimaṃ padaṃ heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa atthotipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: padassa atthaḥ uparimam uparimam padam heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa atthaḥ tipi vattum vaṭṭati

original: Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti. Ayaṃ tāva pāḷivaṇṇanā.
analyzed: sesam sabbattha uttāna attham eva ati ayam tāva pāḷi vaṇṇanā

original: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayakathā. Ayañhi sammappadhānakathā nāma duvidhā – lokiyā lokuttarā
analyzed: ayam pana ittha vinicchaya kathā ayam hi sammappadhāna kathā nāma duvidhā lokiyā lokuttarā

analyzed: ca tattha lokiyā sabba pubbabhāge hoti sā kassapa saṃyutta pariyāyena lokiya magga kkhaṇe

original: veditabbā. Vuttañhi tattha –
analyzed: veditabbā vuttam hi tattha

original: “Cattāro me, āvuso, sammappadhānā. Katame cattāro?
analyzed: cattāraḥ me āvuso sammappadhānā katame cattāro

original: ātappaṃ karoti; ‘anuppannā me kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’nti
analyzed: ātappam karoti anuppannāḥ me kusalāḥ dhammāḥ anuppajjamānāḥ anatthāya saṃvatteyyun ti

original: ātappaṃ karoti. ‘Uppannā me kusalā dhammā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’nti ātappaṃ karotī”ti.
analyzed: ātappam karoti uppannāḥ me kusalāḥ dhammāḥ nirujjhamānāḥ anatthāya saṃvatteyyun ti ātappam karoti iti

original: Ettha ca ‘anuppannā me kusalā dhammā’ti samathavipassanā ceva maggo ca. Uppannā kusalā
analyzed: ettha ca anuppannāḥ me kusalāḥ dhammā ti samatha vipassanā ca iva maggo ca uppannā kusalā

original: nāma samathavipassanāva. Maggo pana sakiṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhamāno anatthāya saṃvattanako
analyzed: nāma samatha vipassanā ava maggaḥ pana sakim uppajjitvā nirujjhamānaḥ anatthāya saṃvattanakaḥ

original: nāma natthi. So hi phalassa paccayaṃ datvāva nirujjhati. Purimasmiṃ vā samathavipassanāva

original: gahetabbāti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana na yuttaṃ.
analyzed: gahetabbā iti vuttam tam pana na yuttam

original: Tattha “uppannā samathavipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattantī”ti atthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ
analyzed: tattha uppannā samatha vipassanā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvattanti iti atthassa āvibhāva attham

original: idaṃ vatthu – eko kira khīṇāsavatthero ‘mahācetiyañca mahābodhiñca vandissāmī’ti

original: pāvisi; sāyanhasamaye mahābhikkhusaṅghe cetiyaṃ vandamāne cetiyaṃ vandanatthāya na

original: nikkhami. Kasmā? Khīṇāsavānañhi tīsu ratanesu mahantaṃ gāravaṃ hoti. Tasmā bhikkhusaṅghe

original: vanditvā paṭikkante manussānaṃ sāyamāsabhuttavelāya sāmaṇerampi ajānāpetvā ‘cetiyaṃ
analyzed: vanditvā paṭikkante manussānam sāya māsa bhutta velāya sāmaṇeram pi a jānāpetvā cetiyam

original: vandissāmī’ti ekakova nikkhami. Sāmaṇero ‘kiṃ nu kho thero avelāya ekakova gacchati,
analyzed: vandissāmi iti ekakaḥ iva nikkhami sāmaṇeraḥ kim nu kho theraḥ avelāya ekakaḥ iva gacchati

original: jānissāmī’ti upajjhāyassa padānupadikova nikkhami. Thero anāvajjanena tassa āgamanaṃ

original: Mahāthero mahācetiyaṃ ulloketvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā

analyzed: imam iddha anubhāvam rakkhitunti tatas na sakkhissati iti disvā sāmaṇeram āha sāmaṇera

analyzed: pivissasi iti daharaka bhāvassa nāma esa doso yam so upajjhāyassa kathāya

original: vadatī’ti taṃ pana asuṇanto viya agamāsi.
analyzed: vadati iti tam pana a suṇantaḥ viya agamāsi

original: labhitvā appamattakeneva bhijjati; santāya samāpattiyā parihīnā brahmacariyavāse

original: nāma gato. Tattha vasantepi there sāmaṇero tatheva karoti.

original: Athekadivasaṃ ekā pesakāradhītā abhirūpā paṭhamavaye ṭhitā kammupendagāmato nikkhamitvā

original: tāvadeva iddhi antarahitā, chinnapakkho kāko viya ahosi. Santasamāpattibalena pana

original: Sāmaṇero gantvā padumassaratīre aṭṭhāsi tassā paccuttaraṇaṃ āgamayamāno. Sāpi sāmaṇeraṃ

original: vuccati. Idaṃ okāsakatuppannaṃ nāma.
analyzed: vuccati idam okāsakatuppannam nāma

analyzed: a pātubhūtān eva na pātubhavanti iti

original: Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā.
2. Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
408. Abhidhammabhājanīye sabbānipi sammappadhānāni dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ vibhattassa desanānayassa

original: Sammohavinodaniyā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: sammoha vinodaniyā vibhaṅga ṭṭhakathāya

original: Sammappadhānavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sammappadhāna vibhaṅga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 9. Iddhipādavibhaṅgo
analyzed: iddhi pāda vibhaṅgaḥ

original: 1. Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
431. Idāni tadanantare iddhipādavibhaṅge cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Iddhipādāti
analyzed: idāni tad anantare iddhipāda vibhaṅge cattāraḥ ti gaṇana paricchedaḥ

original: ettha ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā
analyzed: ettha ijjhati iti id hi samijjhati nipphajjati iti attho ijjhanti vai etāya sattāḥ iddhā

original: vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontītipi iddhi. Paṭhamenatthena iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti
analyzed: vuddhāḥ ukkaṃsa gatāḥ honti iti pi iddhi paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādaḥ iddhi pādaḥ iddhi koṭṭhāso ti

original: attho. Dutiyenatthena iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo; pādoti patiṭṭhā, adhigamupāyoti attho.
analyzed: attho dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo oti iddhi pādo pādo ti patiṭṭhā adhigama upāyo ti attho

original: Tena hi yasmā uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti, tasmā pādoti vuccati.
analyzed: tena hi yasmai upari upari visesa saṅkhātam iddhim pajjanti pāpuṇanti tasmai pādo ti vuccati

original: Evaṃ tāva “cattāro iddhipādā”ti ettha attho veditabbo.
analyzed: evam tāva cattāraḥ iddhipādā ti ettha atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Idāni te bhājetvā dassetuṃ idha bhikkhūtiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ
analyzed: idāni te bhājetvā dassetum idha bhikkhu iti ādi āraddham tattha idha bhikkhu iti imasmin

original: sāsane bhikkhu. Chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatanti ettha chandahetuko chandādhiko
analyzed: sāsane bhikkhu ettha chanda hetuko chanda adhiko

original: vā samādhi chandasamādhi. Kattukamyatāchandaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhissetaṃ
analyzed: vā samādhi chanda samādhi adhipatim karitvā paṭiladdha samādhiḥ sa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Padhānabhūtā saṅkhārā padhānasaṅkhārā. Catukiccasādhakassa sammappadhānavīriyassetaṃ
analyzed: adhivacanam padhāna bhūtā saṅkhārā padhāna saṅkhārā catu kicca sādhakassa sammappadhāna vīriyassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Samannāgatanti chandasamādhinā ca padhānasaṅkhārehi ca upetaṃ. Iddhipādanti
analyzed: adhivacanam chanda samādhinā ca padhāna saṅkhārehi ca upetam

original: nipphattipariyāyena vā ijjhanakaṭṭhena ijjhanti etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā
analyzed: nipphatti pariyāyena vā ijjhana kaṭṭhena ijjhanti etāya sattāḥ iddhāḥ vuddhāḥ ukkaṃsa gatāḥ

original: hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena iddhīti saṅkhaṃ gatānaṃ upacārajjhānādikusalacittasampayuttānaṃ
analyzed: honti iti iminā vā pariyāyena iddhi iti saṅkham gatānam upacāra jhāna ādi kusala citta sampayuttānam

original: chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena pādabhūtaṃ sesacittacetasikarāsinti
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena pāda bhūtam

original: attho. Yañhi parato “iddhipādoti tathābhūtassa vedanākkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho”ti
analyzed: atthaḥ yat hi paratas iddhipādo ti tathābhūtassa vedanā kkhandha upe viññāṇa kkhandho ti

original: vuttaṃ, taṃ iminā atthena yujjati. Iminā nayena sesesupi attho veditabbo. Yatheva
analyzed: vuttam tam iminā atthena yujjati iminā nayena sesesu pi atthaḥ veditabbaḥ yathā iva

original: hi chandaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhi chandasamādhīti vutto, evaṃ vīriyaṃ…pe…
analyzed: hi chandam adhipatim karitvā paṭiladdha samādhi chanda samādhi iti vuttaḥ evam

original: cittaṃ. Vīmaṃsaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhi vīmaṃsasamādhīti vuccati.
analyzed: cittam vīmaṃsam adhipatim karitvā paṭiladdha samādhi vīmaṃsa samādhi iti vuccati

original: Idāni chandasamādhiādīni padāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ kathañca bhikkhūtiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: idāni chanda samādhi ādīni padāni bhājetvā dassetum katham ca bhikkhu uti ādi āraddham

original: Tattha chandañce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvāti yadi bhikkhu chandaṃ adhipatiṃ chandaṃ
analyzed: tattha chandam ce bhikkhu adhipatim karitvā ati yadi bhikkhu chandam adhipatim chandam

original: jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā samādhiṃ paṭilabhati nibbatteti,
analyzed: jeṭṭhakam chandam dhuram chandam pubbaṅgamam katvā samādhim paṭilabhati nibbattā iti

original: evaṃ nibbattito ayaṃ samādhi chandasamādhi nāma vuccatīti attho. Vīriyañcetiādīsupi
analyzed: evam nibbattitaḥ ayam samādhi chandasamādhi nāma vuccati iti atthaḥ vīriyam ca iti ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Ime vuccanti padhānasaṅkhārāti ettāvatā chandiddhipādaṃ bhāvayamānassa
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ ime vuccanti padhāna saṅkhārā ti ettāvatā chanda iddhipādam bhāvayamānassa

original: bhikkhuno padhānābhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātacatukiccasādhakaṃ vīriyaṃ kathitaṃ. Tadekajjhaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhuno padhāna abhisaṅkhāra saṅkhāta catu kicca sādhakam vīriyam kathitam tat ekajjham

original: abhisaññūhitvāti taṃ sabbaṃ ekato rāsiṃ katvāti attho. Saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti etaṃ vohāraṃ
analyzed: abhisaññūhitvā iti tam sabbam ekatas rāsim katvā ati attho saṅkhyam gacchati iti etam vohāram

original: gacchatīti veditabbanti attho.
analyzed: gacchati iti veditabbam ti atthaḥ

original: 433. Idāni “chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhāro”ti etasmiṃ padasamūhe chandādidhamme bhājetvā dassetuṃ tattha katamo chandotiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ uttānatthameva.
analyzed: idāni etasmin pada samūhe chanda ādi dhamme bhājetvā dassetum tattha katamaḥ chanda iti ādi āraddham tam uttāna attham eva

original: Upeto hotīti iddhipādasaṅkhāto dhammarāsi upeto hoti. Tesaṃ dhammānanti tesaṃ sampayuttānaṃ
analyzed: upetaḥ hoti iti iddhipāda saṅkhātaḥ dhamma rāsi upetaḥ hoti tesam dhammānam ti tesam sampayuttānam

original: chandādidhammānaṃ. Iddhi samiddhītiādīni sabbāni nipphattivevacanāneva. Evaṃ santepi
analyzed: chanda ādi dhammānam iddhi samiddhi iti ādīni sabbāni evam sante pi

original: ijjhanakaṭṭhena iddhi. Sampuṇṇā iddhi samiddhi; upasaggena vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Ijjhanākāro
analyzed: ijjhana kaṭṭhena iddhi sampuṇṇā iddhi samiddhi upasaggena vā padam vaḍḍhitam ijjhana ākāraḥ

original: ijjhanā. Samijjhanāti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Attano santāne pātubhāvavasena
analyzed: ijjhanā samijjhanā ti upasaggena padam vaḍḍhitam attano santāne pātubhāva vasena

original: labhanaṃ lābho. Parihīnānampi vīriyārambhavasena puna lābho paṭilābho; upasaggena
analyzed: labhanam vīriya ārambha vasena puna lābho paṭilābho upasaggena

original: vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Pattīti adhigamo. Aparihānavasena sammā pattīti sampatti. Phusanāti
analyzed: vā padam vaḍḍhitam patti iti adhigamaḥ a parihāna vasena sammā patti iti sampatti

original: paṭilābhaphusanā. Sacchikiriyāti paṭilābhasacchikiriyāva. Upasampadāti paṭilābhaupasampadā evāti veditabbā.
analyzed: paṭilābha phusanā sacchikiriyā ati upasampadā ati paṭilābha aupasampadā eva ati veditabbā

original: Tayābhūtassāti tena ākārena bhūtassa; te chandādidhamme paṭilabhitvā ṭhitassāti attho.
analyzed: tayā bhūtassa ati tena ākārena bhūtassa te chanda ādi dhamme paṭilabhitvā ṭhitassa ati attho

original: Vedanākkhandhotiādīhi chandādayo anto katvā cattāropi khandhā kathitā. Te dhammeti
analyzed: vedanā khandha uti ādīhi chanda ādayaḥ antar katvā cattāraḥ api khandhā kathitā te dhammā iti

original: te cattāro arūpakkhandhe; chandādayo vā tayo dhammetipi vuttaṃ. Āsevatītiādīni vuttatthāneva.
analyzed: te cattāro arūpa kkhandhe chanda ādayaḥ vā tayo dhamme ti pi vuttam āsevati itiādīni vutta tthānā eva

original: Sesaiddhipādaniddesesupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
analyzed: sesa aiddhipāda niddesesu pi iminā ava nayena atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Ettāvatā kiṃ kathitanti? Catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ matthakappattaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathitaṃ.
analyzed: ettāvatā kim kathitanti catunnam bhikkhūnam matthaka ppattam kammaṭṭhānam kathitam

original: Eko hi bhikkhu chandaṃ avassayati; kattukamyatākusaladhammacchandena atthanipphattiyaṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ hi bhikkhu chandam avassayati kattu kamya tā kusala dhamma chandena attha nipphattiyam

original: sati ‘ahaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattessāmi, natthi mayhaṃ etassa nibbattane bhāro’ti
analyzed: sati aham lokuttara dhammam nibbattessāmi natthi mayham etassa nibbattane bhāro ti

original: chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbatteti.
analyzed: chandam jeṭṭhakam chandam dhuram chandam pubbaṅgamam katvā lokuttara dhammam nibbatteti

original: Eko vīriyaṃ avassayati. Eko cittaṃ, eko paññaṃ avassayati. Paññāya atthanipphattiyaṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ vīriyam avassayati ekaḥ cittam ekaḥ paññam avassayati paññāya attha nipphattiyam

original: sati ‘ahaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattessāmi, natthi mayhaṃ etassa nibbattane bhāro’ti
analyzed: sati aham lokuttara dhammam nibbattessāmi natthi mayham etassa nibbattane bhāro ti

original: paññaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ paññaṃ dhuraṃ paññaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbatteti.
analyzed: paññam jeṭṭhakam paññam dhuram paññam pubbaṅgamam katvā lokuttara dhammam nibbatteti

original: Kathaṃ? Yathā hi catūsu amaccaputtesu ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā vicarantesu eko upaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: katham yathā hi catūsu amacca puttesu ṭhāna antaram patthetvā vicarantesu ekaḥ upaṭṭhānam

original: avassayi, eko sūrabhāvaṃ, eko jātiṃ, eko mantaṃ. Kathaṃ? Tesu hi paṭhamo ‘upaṭṭhāne
analyzed: ekaḥ sūra bhāvam ekaḥ jātim ekaḥ mantam katham tesu hi paṭhamaḥ upaṭṭhāne

original: appamādakāritāya atthanipphattiyā sati labbhamānaṃ lacchāmetaṃ ṭhānantara’nti upaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: appamāda kāritāya attha nipphattiyā sati labbhamānam lacchāma etam ṭhāna antaran ti upaṭṭhānam

original: avassayi. Dutiyo ‘upaṭṭhāne appamattopi ekacco saṅgāme paccupaṭṭhite saṇṭhātuṃ na
analyzed: dutiyaḥ upaṭṭhāne appamattaḥ pi ekaccaḥ saṅgāme paccupaṭṭhite saṇṭhātum na

original: sakkoti; avassaṃ kho pana rañño paccanto kuppissati; tasmiṃ kuppite rathadhure kammaṃ
analyzed: sakkoti avassam kho pana rañño paccantaḥ kuppissati tasmin kuppite ratha dhure kammaṃ

original: katvā rājānaṃ ārādhetvā āharāpessāmetaṃ ṭhānantara’nti sūrabhāvaṃ avassayi. Tatiyo
analyzed: katvā rājānam ārādhetvā sūra bhāvam tatiyaḥ

original: ‘sūrabhāvepi sati ekacco hīnajātiko hoti; jātiṃ sodhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ dadantā mayhaṃ
analyzed: sūra bhāve pi sati ekaccaḥ hīna jātikaḥ hoti jātim sodhetvā dadantā mayham

original: dassantī’ti jātiṃ avassayi. Catuttho ‘jātimāpi eko amantanīyo hoti; mantena kattabbakicce
analyzed: dassanti iti jātim avassayi catutthaḥ jātim āpi ekaḥ amantanīyaḥ hoti mantena kattabba kicce

original: uppanne āharāpessāmetaṃ ṭhānantara’nti mantaṃ avassayi. Te sabbepi attano attano
analyzed: uppanne āharāpessāma etam ṭhāna antaranti mantam te sabbe pi attanaḥ attanaḥ

original: avassayabalena ṭhānantarāni pāpuṇiṃsu.
analyzed: avassaya balena ṭhāna antarāni pāpuṇiṃsu

original: Tattha upaṭṭhāne appamatto hutvā ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya chandaṃ avassāya kattukamyatākusaladhammacchandena
analyzed: tattha upaṭṭhāne appamattaḥ hutvā ṭhāna antaram pattaḥ viya chandam avassāya kattu kamya tā kusala dhamma chandena

original: atthanibbattiyaṃ sati ‘ahaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattessāmi, natthi mayhaṃ etassa
analyzed: attha nibbattiyam sati aham lokuttara dhammam nibbattessāmi natthi mayham etassa

original: nibbattane bhāro’ti chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako
analyzed: nibbattane bhāroti chandam jeṭṭhakam chandam dhuram chandam pubbaṅgamam katvā lokuttara dhamma nibbattakaḥ

original: daṭṭhabbo, raṭṭhapālatthero viya. So hi āyasmā chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ raṭṭhapāla theraḥ viya saḥ hi āyasmā chandam dhuram katvā lokuttara dhammaṃ

original: nibbattesi. Sūrabhāvena rājānaṃ ārādhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya vīriyaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ
analyzed: nibbattesi sūra bhāvena rājānam ārādhetvā ṭhāna antaram patto viya vīriyam jeṭṭhakam

original: vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ vīriyaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako daṭṭhabbo, soṇatthero
analyzed: vīriyam dhuram vīriyam pubbaṅgamam katvā lokuttara dhamma nibbattakaḥ daṭṭhabbo soṇa tthero

original: viya. So hi āyasmā vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi.
analyzed: saḥ hi āyasmai vīriyam dhuram katvā lokuttara dhammam nibbattesi

original: Jātisampattiyā ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ cittaṃ dhuraṃ cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ
analyzed: jāti sampattiyāḥ ṭhāna antaram pattaḥ viya cittam jeṭṭhakam cittam dhuram cittam pubbaṅgamam

original: katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako daṭṭhabbo, sambhūtatthero viya. So hi āyasmā cittaṃ
analyzed: katvā lokuttara dhamma nibbattako daṭṭhabbo sambhūta theraḥ viya saḥ hi āyasmā cittam

original: dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi. Mantaṃ avassāya ṭhānantarappatto viya vīmaṃsaṃ
analyzed: dhuram katvā lokuttara dhammam nibbattesi mantam avassāya ṭhāna antara ppattaḥ viya vīmaṃsam

original: jeṭṭhakaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ dhuraṃ vīmaṃsaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako daṭṭhabbo,
analyzed: jeṭṭhakam vīmaṃsam dhuram vīmaṃsam pubbaṅgamam katvā lokuttara dhamma nibbattakaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: thero mogharājā viya. So hi āyasmā vīmaṃsaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi.
analyzed: theraḥ mogharājā so hi āyasmai vīmaṃsam dhuram katvā lokuttara dhammam nibbattesi

original: Ettha ca tayo chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasaṅkhātā dhammā iddhīpi honti iddhipādāpi.
analyzed: ettha ca tayo chanda samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra saṅkhātāḥ dhammā honti iddhipādā api

original: Sesā pana sampayuttakā cattāro khandhā iddhipādāyeva. Vīriyacittavīmaṃsasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasaṅkhātāpi
analyzed: sesā pana sampayuttakā cattāraḥ khandhāḥ iddhipādāya iva vīriya citta vīmaṃsa samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra saṅkhātā api

original: tayo dhammā iddhīpi honti iddhipādāpi. Sesā pana sampayuttakā cattāro khandhā iddhipādāyeva.
analyzed: tayaḥ dhammā iddhī pi honti iddhipādā api sesā pana sampayuttakā cattāro khandhāḥ iddhipādāya eva

original: Ayaṃ tāva abhedato kathā.
analyzed: ayam tāva abhedataḥ kathā

original: Bhedato pana ‘chando’ iddhi nāma. Chandadhurena bhāvitā cattāro khandhā chandiddhipādo
analyzed: bhedato pana chando iddhi nāma chanda dhurena bhāvitā cattāro khandhā chandiddhipādo

original: nāma. Samādhi padhānasaṅkhāroti dve dhammā saṅkhārakkhandhavasena chandiddhipāde
analyzed: nāma samādhi padhāna saṅkhāro ti dve dhammā saṅkhāra kkhandha vasena chanda iddhipāde

original: pavisanti; pāde paviṭṭhātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Tattheva ‘samādhi’ iddhi nāma. Samādhidhurena
analyzed: pavisanti pāde vattum tattha iva samādhi id hi nāma samādhi dhurena

original: bhāvitā cattāro khandhā samādhiddhipādo nāma. Chando padhānasaṅkhāroti dve dhammā
analyzed: bhāvitā cattāro khandhā samādhi iddhipādaḥ nāma chandaḥ padhāna saṅkhāraḥ ti dve dhammā

original: saṅkhārakkhandhavasena samādhiddhipāde pavisanti; pāde paviṭṭhātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati
analyzed: saṅkhāra kkhandha vasena samādhi iddhipāde pavisanti pāde vattum vaṭṭati

original: eva. Tattheva ‘padhānasaṅkhāro’ iddhi nāma. Padhānasaṅkhārabhāvitā cattāro khandhā
analyzed: eva tattha iva padhāna saṅkhāro id hi nāma padhāna saṅkhāra bhāvitā cattāro khandhā

original: padhānasaṅkhāriddhipādo nāma. Chando samādhīti dve dhammā saṅkhārakkhandhavasena
analyzed: padhāna saṅkhāra iddhipādaḥ nāma chandaḥ samādhi iti dve dhammā saṅkhāra kkhandha vasena

original: padhānasaṅkhāriddhipāde pavisanti; pāde paviṭṭhātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Tattheva
analyzed: padhāna saṅkhāra iddhipāde pavisanti pāde vattum vaṭṭati eva tattha eva

original: ‘vīriyaṃ’ iddhi nāma, ‘cittaṃ’ iddhi nāma, ‘vīmaṃsā’ iddhi nāma…pe… pāde paviṭṭhātipi
analyzed: vīriyam iddhi nāma cittam iddhi nāma vīmaṃsā iddhi nāmape pāde

original: vattuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Ayaṃ bhedato kathā nāma.
analyzed: vattum vaṭṭati eva ayam bhedataḥ kathā nāma

original: Ettha pana abhinavaṃ natthi; gahitameva vibhūtadhātukaṃ kataṃ. Kathaṃ? Chando, samādhi,
analyzed: ettha pana abhinavam natthi gahitam eva vibhūta dhātukam katam katham chando samādhi

original: padhānasaṅkhāroti ime tayo dhammā iddhīpi honti iddhipādāpi. Sesā sampayuttakā cattāro
