original: nibbānanagaraṃyeva samosarati. Tena vuttaṃ – “puriso maggakusaloti kho, tissa, tathāgatassetaṃ
analyzed: nibbāna nagaram yeva samosarati tena vuttam puriso magga kusalaḥ ti kho tissa tathāgatassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti.
analyzed: adhivacanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa ati

original: Yasmā vā sasīsaṃ nahānena pahīnasedamalajallikassa purisassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanavidhānaṃ
analyzed: yasmai vā sa sīsam nahānena pahīna seda mala jallikassa purisassa mālā gandha vilepana ādi vibhūsana vidhānam

original: viya pahīnapāpadhammassa kalyāṇadhammasamāyogo sampannarūpo hoti, tasmā sedamalajallikkaṃ
analyzed: viya pahīna pāpa dhammassa kalyāṇa dhamma samāyogaḥ sampanna rūpaḥ hoti tasmai sā idam alajallikkam

original: viya pahātabbaṃ paṭhamaṃ anācāraṃ ācikkhitvā, pahīnasedamalajallikassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanavidhānaṃ
analyzed: viya pahātabbam paṭhamam anācāram ācikkhitvā pahīna seda mala jallikassa mālā gandha vilepana ādi vibhūsana vidhānam

original: viya pacchā ācāraṃ ācikkhitukāmopi tattha katamo anācārotiādimāha. Tattha kāyiko
analyzed: viya pacchā ācāram ācikkhitu kāmaḥ api tattha katamaḥ anācāraḥ ti ādim āha tattha kāyiko

original: vītikkamoti tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ; vācasiko vītikkamoti catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ;
analyzed: vītikkamoti tividham kāya duccaritam vācasikaḥ vītikkamo ti catubbidham vacī duccaritam

original: kāyikavācasiko vītikkamoti tadubhayaṃ. Evaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlasseva vītikkamaṃ dassesi.
analyzed: kāyika vācasikaḥ vītikkamaḥ ti tat ubhayam evam ājīva ṭṭhamaka sīlassa iva vītikkamam dassesi

original: Yasmā pana na kevalaṃ kāyavācāhi eva anācāraṃ ācarati, manasāpi ācarati eva, tasmā
analyzed: na kevalam eva anācāram ācarati manasā api ācarati eva tasmai

original: taṃ dassetuṃ “sabbampi dussīlyaṃ anācāro”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ekacciyaṃ anācāraṃ vibhajitvā
analyzed: tam dassetum sabbam pi dussīlyam anācāraḥ ti vuttam tattha ekacciyam anācāram vibhajitvā

original: dassento idhekacco veḷudānenātiādimāha. Tattha veḷudānenāti paccayahetukena veḷudānena.
analyzed: dassentaḥ idha ekaccaḥ veḷu dānena ati ādim āha tattha veḷu dānena ati paccaya hetukena veḷu dānena

original: Vihāre uṭṭhitañhi araññato vā āharitvā rakkhitagopitaṃ veḷuṃ ‘evaṃ me paccayaṃ dassantī’ti
analyzed: vihāre uṭṭhitam hi araññataḥ vā āharitvā rakkhita gopitam veḷum evam me paccayam dassanti iti

original: upaṭṭhākānaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Evañhi jīvitaṃ kappento anesanāya micchājīvena jīvati.
analyzed: upaṭṭhākānam dātum na vaṭṭati evam hi jīvitam kappentaḥ an esanāya micchājīvena jīvati

original: So diṭṭheva dhamme garahaṃ pāpuṇāti, samparāye ca apāyaparipūrako hoti. Attano puggalikaveḷuṃ
analyzed: so diṭṭhā iva dhamme garaham pāpuṇāti samparāye ca apāya paripūrakaḥ hoti attanaḥ puggalika veḷum

original: kulasaṅgahatthāya dadanto kuladūsakadukkaṭamāpajjati; parapuggalikaṃ theyyacittena
analyzed: kula saṅga hatthāya dadantaḥ kula dūsaka dukkaṭam āpajjati parapuggalikam theyya cittena

original: dadamāno bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Saṅghikepi eseva nayo. Sace pana taṃ issaravatāya
analyzed: dadamānaḥ bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo saṅghike pi esā iva nayaḥ sace pana tam issaravatāya

original: deti garubhaṇḍavissajjanamāpajjati.
analyzed: deti garu bhaṇḍa vissajjanam āpajjati

original: Kataro pana veḷu garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, kataro na hotīti? Yo tāva aropimo sayaṃjātako,
analyzed: kataraḥ pana hoti kataraḥ na hoti iti sayaṃjātako

original: so saṅghena paricchinnaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṃ, tato paraṃ na garubhaṇḍaṃ; ropitaṭṭhāne
analyzed: so saṅghena garu bhaṇḍam tatas param na garu bhaṇḍam ropita ṭṭhāne

original: sabbena sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ. So pana pamāṇena paricchinno telanāḷippamāṇopi garubhaṇḍaṃ,
analyzed: sabbena sabbam garubhaṇḍam saḥ pana pamāṇena paricchinnaḥ garubhaṇḍam

original: na tato heṭṭhā. Yassa pana bhikkhuno telanāḷiyā vā kattaradaṇḍena vā attho, tena
analyzed: na tatas heṭṭhā yassa pana bhikkhuno tela nāḷiyā vā kattaradaṇḍena vā attho tena

original: phātikammaṃ katvā gahetabbo. Phātikammaṃ tadagghanakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā vaṭṭati, ūnakaṃ
analyzed: phāti kammam katvā gahetabbaḥ phāti kammam tad agghanakam vā atirekam vā vaṭṭati ūnakam

original: na vaṭṭati. Hatthakammampi udakāharaṇamattaṃ vā appaharitakaraṇamattaṃ vā na vaṭṭati,
analyzed: na vaṭṭati hattha kammam pi udaka āharaṇa mattam vā appaharita karaṇa mattam vā na vaṭṭati

original: taṃ thāvaraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmā pokkharaṇito vā paṃsuṃ uddharitvā sopānaṃ vā attharāpetvā
analyzed: tam thāvaram kātum vaṭṭati tasmai pokkharaṇitaḥ vā paṃsum uddharitvā sopānam vā

original: visamaṭṭhānaṃ vā samaṃ katvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Phātikammaṃ akatvā gahito tattha vasanteneva
analyzed: visama ṭṭhānam vā samam katvā gahetum vaṭṭati phāti kammam a katvā gahitaḥ tattha vasantena iva

original: paribhuñjitabbo; pakkamantena saṅghikaṃ katvā ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ. Asatiyā gahetvā
analyzed: paribhuñjitabbaḥ pakkamantena saṅghikam katvā ṭhapetvā gantabbam asatiyā gahetvā

original: gatena yattha gato sarati, tato paccāharitabbo. Sace antarā bhayaṃ hoti, sampattavihare ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ.
analyzed: gatena yattha gataḥ sarati tatas paccāharitabbo sace antarā bhayam hoti sampatta vihare ṭhapetvā gantabbam

original: Manussā vihāraṃ gantvā veḷuṃ yācanti. Bhikkhū ‘saṅghiko’ti dātuṃ na visahanti. Manussā
analyzed: manussāḥ vihāram gantvā veḷum yācanti bhikkhū saṅghikā uti dātum na visahanti manussā

original: punappunaṃ yācanti vā tajjenti vā. Tadā bhikkhūhi ‘daṇḍakammaṃ katvā gaṇhathā’ti
analyzed: punappunam yācanti vā tajjenti vā tadā bhikkhūhi daṇḍa kammam katvā gaṇhatha ati

original: vattuṃ vaṭṭati; veḷudānaṃ nāma na hoti. Sace te daṇḍakammatthāya vāsipharasuādīni
analyzed: vattum vaṭṭati veḷudānam nāma na hoti sace te daṇḍa kammatthāya

original: vā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ vā denti, gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “daḍḍhagehā
analyzed: vā khādanīya bhojanīyam vā denti gahetum na vaṭṭati vinaya ṭṭha kathā ayam pana daḍḍha gehā

original: manussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na vāretabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: manussāḥ gaṇhitvā gacchantā na vāretabbā iti vuttam

original: Sace saṅghassa veḷugumbe veḷudūsikā uppajjanti, taṃ akoṭṭāpentānaṃ veḷu nassati,
analyzed: sace saṅghassa veḷu gumbe veḷu dūsikā uppajjanti tam a koṭṭāpentānam veḷu nassati

original: kiṃ kātabbanti? Bhikkhācāre manussānaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace koṭṭetuṃ na icchanti ‘samabhāgaṃ
analyzed: kim kātabbanti bhikkhācāre manussānam ācikkhitabbam sace koṭṭetum na icchanti sama bhāgam

original: labhissathā’ti vattabbā; na icchantiyeva ‘dve koṭṭhāse labhissathā’ti vattabbā. Evampi
analyzed: labhissatha ati vattabbā na icchantiyā iva dve koṭṭhāse labhissatha ati vattabbā evam pi

original: anicchantesu ‘naṭṭhena attho natthi, tumhākaṃ khaṇe sati daṇḍakammaṃ karissatha,
analyzed: an icchantesu naṭṭhena atthaḥ natthi tumhākam khaṇe sati daṇḍa kammam karissatha

original: koṭṭetvā gaṇhathā’ti vattabbā; veḷudānaṃ nāma na hoti. Veḷugumbe aggimhi uṭṭhitepi,
analyzed: koṭṭetvā gaṇhatha ati vattabbā veḷu dānam nāma na hoti veḷu gumbe aggimhi uṭṭhite pi

original: udakena vuyhamānaveḷūsupi eseva nayo. Rukkhesupi ayameva kathāmaggo. Rukkho pana
analyzed: udakena vuyhamāna veḷūsu pi esa eva nayaḥ rukkhesu pi ayam eva kathā maggo rukkho pana

original: sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇo garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Saṅghike rukkhe koṭṭāpetvā saṅghaṃ anāpucchitvāpi
analyzed: sūci daṇḍa kappamāṇaḥ garubhaṇḍam hoti saṅghike rukkhe koṭṭāpetvā saṅgham an āpucchitvā api

original: saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ kātuṃ labbhati. Vacanapathacchedanatthaṃ pana āpucchitvāva kātabbo.
analyzed: saṅghikam āvāsam kātum labbhati vacana patha chedana attham pana āpucchitvā ava kātabbaḥ

original: Puggalikaṃ kātuṃ labbhati, na labbhatīti? Na labbhati. Hatthakammasīsena pana ekasmiṃ
analyzed: puggalikam kātum labbhati na labbhati iti na labbhati hattha kamma sīsena pana ekasmin

original: gehe mañcaṭṭhānamattaṃ labbhati, tīsu gehesu ekaṃ gehaṃ labhati. Sace dabbhasambhārā
analyzed: gehe mañcaṭṭhāna mattam labbhati tīsu gehesu ekam geham labhati sace dabbha sambhārā

original: puggalikā honti, bhūmi saṅghikā, ekaṃ gehaṃ katvā samabhāgaṃ labhati, dvīsu gehesu
analyzed: puggalikāḥ honti bhūmi saṅghikāḥ ekam geham katvā sama bhāgam labhati dvīsu gehesu

original: ekaṃ gehaṃ labhati. Saṅghikarukkhe saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ bādhente saṅghaṃ anāpucchā hāretuṃ
analyzed: ekam geham labhati saṅghika rukkhe saṅghikam āvāsam bādhente saṅgham an āpucchā hāretum

original: vaṭṭati, na vaṭṭatīti? Vaṭṭati. Vacanapathacchedanatthaṃ pana āpucchitvāva hāretabbo.
analyzed: vaṭṭati na vaṭṭati iti vaṭṭati vacana patha chedana attham pana āpucchitvā ava hāretabbaḥ

original: Sace rukkhaṃ nissāya saṅghassa mahanto lābho hoti, na hāretabbo. Puggalikarukkhe
analyzed: sace rukkham nissāya saṅghassa mahantaḥ lābhaḥ hoti na hāretabbo puggalika rukkhe

original: saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ bādhente rukkhasāmikassa ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace harituṃ na icchati,
analyzed: saṅghikam āvāsam bādhente rukkha sāmikassa ācikkhitabbam sace haritum naḥ icchati

original: chedāpetvā hāretabbo. ‘Rukkhaṃ me dethā’ti codentassa rukkhaṃ agghāpetvā mūlaṃ dātabbaṃ.
analyzed: chedāpetvā hāretabbaḥ rukkham me detha ati codentassa rukkham agghāpetvā mūlam dātabbam

original: Saṅghike rukkhe puggalikāvāsaṃ, puggalike ca puggalikāvāsaṃ bādhentepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: saṅghike rukkhe puggalikā vāsam puggalike ca puggalikā vāsam bādhente pi esā iva nayaḥ

original: Valliyampi ayameva kathāmaggo. Valli pana yattha vikkāyati, dullabhā hoti, tattha
analyzed: valliyam pi ayam eva kathā maggaḥ vallī pana yattha vikkāyati dullabhā hoti tattha

original: garubhaṇḍaṃ. Sā ca kho upaḍḍhabāhuppamāṇato paṭṭhāya; tato heṭṭhā vallikhaṇḍaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ na hoti.
analyzed: garubhaṇḍam sā ca kho upaḍḍha bāhu ppamāṇataḥ paṭṭhāya tatas heṭṭhā valli khaṇḍam garubhaṇḍam na hoti

original: Pattadānādīsupi pattadānenāti paccayahetukena pattadānenātiādi sabbaṃ veḷudāne vuttanayeneva
analyzed: patta dāna ādīsu pi patta dānena ati paccaya hetukena patta dānena ati ādi sabbam veḷu dāne vutta nayena iva

original: veditabbaṃ. Garubhaṇḍatāya panettha ayaṃ vinicchayo. Pattampi hi yattha vikkāyati,
analyzed: veditabbam garu bhaṇḍa tāya pana ittha ayam vinicchayo pattam pi hi yattha vikkāyati

original: gandhikādayo gandhapaliveṭhanādīnaṃ atthāya gaṇhanti, tādise dullabhaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: gandhika ādayaḥ gandha paliveṭhana ādīnam atthāya gaṇhanti tādise dullabha ṭṭhāneyā iva garu bhaṇḍam

original: hoti. Esa tāva kiṃsukapattakaṇṇapiḷandhanatālapattādīsu vinicchayo.
analyzed: hoti esa tāva kiṃsuka patta kaṇṇa piḷandhana tāla patta ādīsu vinicchayaḥ

original: Tālapaṇṇampi imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne kathetabbaṃ. Tālapaṇṇampi hi sayaṃjāte tālavane saṅghena
analyzed: tāla paṇṇam pi imasmiṃ yeva ṭhāne kathetabbam tāla paṇṇam pi hi sayaṃjāte tāla vane saṅghena

original: paricchinnaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṃ, na tato paraṃ. Ropimatālesu sabbampi garubhaṇḍaṃ.
analyzed: paricchinna ṭṭhāneyā iva garu bhaṇḍam na tato param ropima tālesu sabbam pi garu bhaṇḍam

original: Tassa pamāṇaṃ heṭṭhimakoṭiyā aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇopi rittapotthako. Tiṇampi ettheva pakkhipitvā
analyzed: tassa pamāṇam heṭṭhima koṭiyā aṭṭha aṅgula ppamāṇaḥ api ritta potthako tiṇam pi ettha iva pakkhipitvā

original: kathetabbaṃ. Yattha pana tiṇaṃ natthi tattha muñjapalālanāḷikerapaṇṇādīhipi chādenti.
analyzed: kathetabbam yattha pana tiṇam natthi tattha chādenti

original: Tasmā tānipi tiṇeneva saṅgahitāni. Iti muñjapalālādīsu yaṃkiñci muṭṭhippamāṇaṃ tiṇaṃ,
analyzed: tasmā tāni api tiṇena iva saṅgahitāni iti muñja palāla ādīsu yaṃkiñci muṭṭhippamāṇam tiṇam

original: nāḷikerapaṇṇādīsu ca ekapaṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ vā bahiārāme saṅghassa
analyzed: nāḷikera paṇṇa ādīsu ca eka paṇṇam pi saṅghassa dinnam vā tattha jātakam vā bahi ārāme saṅghassa

original: tiṇavatthumhi jātatiṇaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Taṃ pana saṅghakamme
analyzed: tiṇa vatthumhi jāta tiṇam vā rakkhita gopitam garu bhaṇḍam hoti tam pana saṅgha kamme

original: ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhā vuttaveḷumhipi eseva nayo.
analyzed: ca cetiya kamme ca kate atirekam puggalika kamme dātum vaṭṭati heṭṭhā vutta veḷumhi pi esa eva nayo

original: Pupphadāne “ettakesu rukkhesu pupphāni vissajjetvā yāgubhattavatthe upanentu, ettakesu
analyzed: puppha dāne ettakesu rukkhesu pupphāni vissajjetvā yāgu bhatta vatthe upanentu ettakesu

original: senāsanapaṭisaṅkharaṇe upanentū”ti evaṃ niyamitaṭṭhāne eva pupphāni garubhaṇḍāni
analyzed: senāsana paṭisaṅkharaṇe upanentu uti evam niyamita ṭṭhāne eva pupphāni garubhaṇḍāni

original: honti. Paratīre sāmaṇerā pupphāni ocinitvā rāsiṃ karonti, pañcaṅgasamannāgato pupphabhājako
analyzed: honti para tīre sāmaṇerā pupphāni ocinitvā rāsim karonti pañcaṅga samannāgato puppha bhājako

original: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gaṇetvā koṭṭhāse karoti, so sampattaparisāya saṅghaṃ anāpucchitvāva
analyzed: bhikkhu saṅgham gaṇetvā koṭṭhāse karoti saḥ sampatta parisāya saṅgham an āpucchitvā ava

original: dātuṃ labhati; asammatena pana āpucchitvāva dātabbaṃ. Bhikkhu pana kassa pupphāni
analyzed: dātum labhati asammatena pana āpucchitvā ava dātabbam bhikkhu pana kassa pupphāni

original: dātuṃ labhati, kassa na labhatīti? Mātāpitūnaṃ gehaṃ haritvāpi gehato pakkosāpetvāpi
analyzed: dātum labhati kassa na labhati iti mātā pitūnam geham haritvā api gehataḥ pakkosāpetvā api

original: ‘vatthupūjaṃ karothā’ti dātuṃ labhati, piḷandhanatthāya dātuṃ na labhati; sesañātīnaṃ
analyzed: vatthu pūjam karotha ati dātum labhati piḷandhana tthāya dātum na labhati sesa ñātīnam

original: pana haritvā na dātabbaṃ, pakkosāpetvā ‘pūjaṃ karothā’ti dātabbaṃ; sesajanassa pūjanaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: pana haritvā na dātabbam pakkosāpetvā pūjam karotha ati dātabbam sesa janassa pūjana ṭhānam

original: sampattassa apaccāsīsantena dātabbaṃ; pupphadānaṃ nāma na hoti. Vihāre bahūni pupphāni
analyzed: sampattassa a paccāsīsantena dātabbam puppha dānam nāma na hoti vihāre bahūni pupphāni

original: pupphanti. Bhikkhunā piṇḍāya carantena manusse disvā ‘vihāre bahūni pupphāni, pūjethā’ti
analyzed: pupphanti bhikkhunā piṇḍāya carantena manusse disvā vihāre bahūni pupphāni pūjetha ati

original: vattabbaṃ. Vacanamatte doso natthi. ‘Manussā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ ādāya āgamissantī’ti
analyzed: vattabbam vacana matte dosaḥ natthi manussā khādanīya bhojanīyam ādāya āgamissanti iti

original: cittena pana na vattabbaṃ. Sace vadati, khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ na paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
analyzed: cittena pana na vattabbam sace vadati khādanīya bhojanīyam na paribhuñjitabbam

original: Manussā attano dhammatāya ‘vihāre pupphāni atthī’ti pucchitvā ‘asukadivase vihāraṃ
analyzed: manussāḥ attanaḥ dhamma tāya vihāre pupphāni atthi iti pucchitvā asuka divase vihāram

original: āgamissāma, sāmaṇerānaṃ pupphāni ocinituṃ mā dethā’ti vadanti. Bhikkhū sāmaṇerānaṃ
analyzed: āgamissāma sāmaṇerānam pupphāni ocinitum mā detha iti vadanti bhikkhū sāmaṇerānam

original: kathetuṃ pamuṭṭhā. Sāmaṇerehi pupphāni ocinitvā ṭhapitāni. Manussā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: kathetum pamuṭṭhā sāmaṇerehi pupphāni ocinitvā ṭhapitāni manussāḥ bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā

original: “bhante, mayaṃ tumhākaṃ asukadivaseyeva ārocayimha – ‘sāmaṇerānaṃ pupphāni ocinituṃ

original: cāti attho. Anatthakāmānīti atthaṃ na icchanti, anatthameva icchanti. Ahitakāmānīti

original: ahitameva icchanti, hitaṃ na icchanti. Aphāsukakāmānīti phāsukaṃ na icchanti, aphāsukameva
analyzed: ahitam eva icchanti hitam naḥ icchanti a phāsuka kāmāni iti phāsukam naḥ icchanti a phāsukam eva

original: icchanti. Ayogakkhemakāmānīti catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbhayaṃ na icchanti, sabhayameva
analyzed: icchanti a yoga kkhema kāmāni iti catūhi yogehi khemam nibbhayam na icchanti sa bhayam eva

original: icchanti. Bhikkhūnanti ettha sāmaṇerāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Bhikkhunīnanti ettha
analyzed: icchanti sāmaṇerāḥ api saṅgaham gacchanti bhikkhunīnam ti ettha

original: sikkhamānasāmaṇeriyopi. Sabbesampi hi bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitānañceva saraṇagatānañca
analyzed: sikkhamāna sāmaṇeriyaḥ api sabbesam pi hi bhagavantam uddissa pabbajitānam ca iva saraṇa gatānam ca

original: catunnampi parisānaṃ tāni anatthakāmāniyeva. Tathārūpāni kulānīti evarūpāni khattiyakulādīni
analyzed: catunnam pi parisānam tāni tathārūpāni kulāni iti evarūpāni khattiya kula ādīni

original: kulāni. Sevatīti nissāya jīvati. Bhajatīti upasaṅkamati. Payirupāsatīti punappunaṃ
analyzed: kulāni sevati iti nissāya jīvati bhajati iti upasaṅkamati payirupāsati iti punappunam

original: upasaṅkamati. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ vesiyādigocarassa vesiyādiko, rājādisaṃsaṭṭhassa
analyzed: upasaṅkamati ayam vuccati iti ayam vesiya ādi gocarassa vesiya ādikaḥ rāja ādi saṃsaṭṭhassa

original: rājādiko, assaddhakulādisevakassa assaddhakulādiko cāti tippakāropi ayuttagocaro
analyzed: rāja ādikaḥ assaddha kula ādi sevakassa assaddha kula ādiko ca ati tippakāraḥ pi ayutta gocaro

original: agocaroti veditabbo.
analyzed: agocaraḥ iti veditabbaḥ

original: Tassa iminā pariyāyena agocaratā veditabbā. Vesiyādiko tāva pañcakāmaguṇanissayato
analyzed: tassa iminā pariyāyena agocara tā veditabbā tāva pañca kāmaguṇa nissayato

original: agocaroti veditabbo, yathāha – “ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo? Yadidaṃ
analyzed: agocaraḥ iti veditabbaḥ yathā āha kaḥ ca bhikkhave bhikkhuno agocaraḥ para visayaḥ yat idam

original: pañca kāmaguṇā”ti rājādiko jhānānuyogassa anupanissayato lābhasakkārāsanicakkanipphādanato
analyzed: pañca kāmaguṇā ti rāja ādikaḥ jhāna anuyogassa an upanissayataḥ lābha sakkāra āsani cakka nipphādanato

original: diṭṭhivipattihetuto ca, assaddhakulādiko saddhāhānicittasantāsāvahanato agocaroti.
analyzed: diṭṭhi vipatti hetutaḥ ca assaddha kula ādiko saddhā hāni citta santāsa avahanataḥ agocaro ti

original: Gocaraniddese na vesiyagocarotiādīni vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbāni. Opānabhūtānītiādīsu
analyzed: gocara niddese na vesiya gocaraḥ ti ādīni vutta paṭipakkha vasena veditabbāni opāna bhūtāni iti ādīsu

original: pana opānabhūtānīti udapānabhūtāni; bhikkhusaṅghassa, cātumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī
analyzed: pana opāna bhūtāni iti udapāna bhūtāni bhikkhu saṅghassa cātumahāpathe khata pokkharaṇī

original: viya, yathāsukhaṃ ogāhanakkhamāni cittamahāmattassa gehasadisāni. Tassa kira gehe
analyzed: viya yathāsukham ogāhana khamāni citta mahā mattassa geha sadisāni tassa kira gehe

original: kālatthambho yuttoyeva. Gharadvāraṃ sampattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paccayavekallaṃ nāma natthi.
analyzed: kāla tthambhaḥ ghara dvāram sampattānam bhikkhūnam paccaya vekallam nāma natthi

original: Ekadivasaṃ bhesajjavattameva saṭṭhi kahāpaṇāni nikkhamanti. Kāsāvapajjotānīti bhikkhubhikkhunīhi
analyzed: eka divasam bhesajja vattam eva saṭṭhi kahāpaṇāni nikkhamanti kāsāva pajjotāni iti bhikkhu bhikkhunīhi

original: nivatthapārutānaṃ kāsāvānaṃyeva pabhāya ekobhāsāni bhūtapālaseṭṭhikulasadisāni. Isivātapaṭivātānīti
analyzed: nivattha pārutānam pabhāyaḥ ekobhāsāni bhūtapāla seṭṭhi kula sadisāni isivāta paṭivātāni iti

original: gehaṃ pavisantānaṃ nikkhamantānañca bhikkhubhikkhunīsaṅkhātānaṃ isīnaṃ cīvaravātena
analyzed: geham pavisantānam nikkhamantānam ca bhikkhu bhikkhunī saṅkhātānam isīnam cīvara vātena

original: ceva samiñjanapasāraṇādijanitasarīravātena ca paṭivātāni pavāyitāni viniddhutakibbisāni vā.
analyzed: ca iva samiñjana pasāraṇa ādi janita sarīra vātena ca paṭivātāni pavāyitāni viniddhuta kibbisāni vā

original: 515. Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvitāniddese aṇumattānīti aṇuppamāṇā. Vajjāti dosā.
analyzed: aṇumattesu vajjesu aṇumattāni iti aṇu ppamāṇā vajjā ti dosā

original: Yāni tāni vajjānīti yāni tāni garahitabbaṭṭhena vajjāni. Appamattakānīti parittamattakāni
analyzed: yāni tāni vajjāni iti yāni tāni garahitabbaṭṭhena vajjāni appamattakāni iti paritta mattakāni

original: khuddakappamāṇāni. Oramattakānīti parittatopi orimappamāṇattā oramattakāni. Lahusānīti
analyzed: khuddaka ppamāṇāni oramattakāni iti parittataḥ pi orima ppamāṇa ttā oramattakāni lahusāni iti

original: lahukāni. Lahusammatānīti lahūti sammatāni. Saṃyamakaraṇīyānīti saṃyamena kattabbapaṭikammāni.
analyzed: lahukāni lahu sammatāni iti lahu uti sammatāni saṃyama karaṇīyāni iti saṃyamena kattabba paṭikammāni

original: Saṃvarakaraṇīyānīti saṃvarena kātabbāni saṃvarena kattabbapaṭikammāni. Cittuppādakaraṇīyānīti
analyzed: saṃvara karaṇīyāni iti saṃvarena kātabbāni saṃvarena kattabba paṭikammāni cittuppāda karaṇīyāni iti

original: cittuppādamattena kattabbapaṭikammāni. Manasikārapaṭibaddhānīti manasā āvajjitamatteneva
analyzed: cittuppāda mattena kattabba paṭikammāni manasikāra paṭibaddhāni iti manasā āvajjita mattena iva

original: kattabbapaṭikammāni. Kāni pana tānīti? Divāvihāravāsī sumatthero tāva āha – “anāpattigamanīyāni
analyzed: kattabba paṭikammāni kāni pana tāni iti divāvihāra vāsī suma theraḥ tāva āha anāpatti gamanīyāni

original: cittuppādamattakāni yāni ‘na puna evarūpaṃ karissāmī’ti manasā āvajjitamatteneva
analyzed: cittuppāda mattakāni yāni na punar evarūpam karissāmi iti manasā āvajjita mattena iva

original: sujjhanti. Adhiṭṭhānāvikammaṃ nāmetaṃ kathita”nti. Antevāsiko panassa tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero
analyzed: sujjhanti adhiṭṭhānāvikammam nāma etam kathitanti antevāsikaḥ panassa tipiṭakacūḷanāga thero

original: panāha – “idaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlasseva bhājanīyaṃ. Tasmā sabbalahukaṃ dukkaṭadubbhāsitaṃ
analyzed: pana āha idam pātimokkha saṃvara sīlassa iva bhājanīyam tasmā sabba lahukam dukkaṭa dubbhāsitam

original: idha vajjanti veditabbaṃ. Vuṭṭhānāvikammaṃ nāmetaṃ kathita”nti. Itiimesūti evaṃpakāresu
analyzed: idha vajjanti veditabbam vuṭṭhānāvikammam nāma etam kathitam ti iti imesu iti evaṃpakāresu

original: imesu. Vajjadassāvīti vajjato dosato dassanasīlo. Bhayadassāvīti catubbidhassa bhayassa
analyzed: imesu vajja dassāvī iti vajjataḥ dosataḥ dassana sīlaḥ bhaya dassāvī iti catubbidhassa bhayassa

original: kāraṇattā bhayato dassanasīlo. Ādīnavadassāvīti idha nindāvahanato, āyatiṃ dukkhavipākato,
analyzed: kāraṇa ttā bhayataḥ dassana sīlaḥ ādīnava dassāvī iti idha nindā vahanataḥ āyatim dukkha vipākato

original: upariguṇānaṃ antarāyakaraṇato, vippaṭisārajananato ca etena nānappakārena ādīnavato dassanasīlo.
analyzed: upari guṇānaṃ antarāya karaṇataḥ vippaṭisāra jananataḥ ca etena nānā pakārena ādīnavataḥ dassana sīlaḥ

original: Nissaraṇadassāvīti yaṃ tattha nissaraṇaṃ tassa dassanasīlo. Kiṃ panettha nissaraṇanti?
analyzed: nissaraṇa dassāvī iti yam tattha nissaraṇam tassa dassana sīlo kim pana ittha nissaraṇanti

original: Ācariyattheravāde tāva “anāpattigamanīyatāya sati adhiṭṭhānāvikammaṃ nissaraṇa”nti
analyzed: ācariya tthera vāde tāva anāpatti gamanīya tāya sati adhiṭṭhāna avikammam nissaraṇam ti

original: kathitaṃ. Antevāsikattheravāde tāva “āpattigamanīyatāya sati vuṭṭhānāvikammaṃ nissaraṇa”nti kathitaṃ.
analyzed: kathitam antevāsika tthera vāde tāva āpatti gamanīya tāya sati vuṭṭhāna avikammam nissaraṇan ti kathitam

original: Tattha tathārūpo bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjato bhayato passati nāma. Taṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: tattha tathārūpaḥ bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjataḥ bhayataḥ passati nāma tam dassetuṃ

original: ayaṃ nayo kathito – paramāṇu nāma, aṇu nāma, tajjārī nāma, rathareṇu nāma, likkhā
analyzed: ayam nayo kathito paramāṇu nāma aṇu nāma tajjārī nāma rathareṇu nāma likkhā

original: nāma, ūkā nāma, dhaññamāso nāma, aṅgulaṃ nāma, vidatthi nāma, ratanaṃ nāma, yaṭṭhi
analyzed: nāma ūkā nāma dhaññamāsaḥ nāma aṅgulam nāma vidatthi nāma ratanam nāma yaṭṭhi

original: nāma, usabhaṃ nāma, gāvutaṃ nāma, yojanaṃ nāma. Tattha ‘paramāṇu’ nāma ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko
analyzed: nāma usabham nāma gāvutam nāma yojanam nāma tattha paramāṇu nāma ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko

original: maṃsacakkhussa āpāthaṃ nāgacchati, dibbacakkhusseva āgacchati. ‘Aṇu’ nāma bhitticchiddatālacchiddehi
analyzed: maṃsa cakkhussa āpātham na āgacchati dibba cakkhussa iva āgacchati aṇu nāma bhitti chidda tāla chiddehi

original: paviṭṭhasūriyarasmīsu vaṭṭi vaṭṭi hutvā paribbhamanto paññāyati. ‘Tajjārī’ nāma gopathamanussapathacakkapathesu
analyzed: paviṭṭha sūriya rasmīsu vaṭṭi vaṭṭi hutvā paribbhamanto paññāyati tajjārī nāma gopatha manussapatha cakka pathesu

original: chijjitvā ubhosu passesu uggantvā tiṭṭhati. ‘Rathareṇu’ nāma tattha tattheva allīyati.
analyzed: chijjitvā ubhosu passesu uggantvā tiṭṭhati rathareṇu nāma tattha tattha iva allīyati

original: Likkhādayo pākaṭā eva. Etesu pana chattiṃsa paramāṇavo ekassa aṇuno pamāṇaṃ. Chattiṃsa
analyzed: likkha ādayaḥ pākaṭāḥ eva etesu pana chattiṃsa paramāṇavaḥ ekassa aṇuno pamāṇam chattiṃsa

original: aṇū ekāya tajjāriyā pamāṇaṃ. Chattiṃsa tajjāriyo eko rathareṇu. Chattiṃsa rathareṇū
analyzed: aṇū ekāya tajjāriyā pamāṇam chattiṃsa tajjāriyaḥ ekaḥ ratha reṇu chattiṃsa ratha reṇū

original: ekā likkhā. Satta likkhā ekā ūkā. Satta ūkā eko dhaññamāso. Sattadhaññamāsappamāṇaṃ
analyzed: ekā likkhā satta likkhāḥ ekā ūkā satta ūkāḥ ekaḥ dhañña māsaḥ satta dhañña māsa ppamāṇam

original: ekaṃ aṅgulaṃ. Tenaṅgulena dvādasaṅgulāni vidatthi. Dve vidatthiyo ratanaṃ. Satta
analyzed: ekam aṅgulam tena aṅgulena dvādasa ṅgulāni vidatthi dve vidatthiyaḥ ratanam satta

original: ratanāni yaṭṭhi. Tāya yaṭṭhiyā vīsati yaṭṭhiyo usabhaṃ. Asīti usabhāni gāvutaṃ. Cattāri
analyzed: ratanāni usabham asīti usabhāni gāvutam cattāri

original: gāvutāni yojanaṃ. Tena yojanena aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedho sinerupabbatarājā.
analyzed: gāvutāni yojanam tena yojanena aṭṭha saṭṭhi yojana sata sahassa ubbedhaḥ sineru pabbata rājā

original: Yo bhikkhu aṇumattaṃ vajjaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatasadisaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu aṇumattam vajjam aṭṭha saṭṭhi yojana sata sahassa ubbedha sineru pabbata sadisam

original: katvā daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti – ayaṃ bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni bhayato passati nāma. Yopi
analyzed: katvā daṭṭhum sakkoti ayam bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni bhayataḥ passati nāma yo pi

original: bhikkhu sabbalahukaṃ dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattaṃ paṭhamapārājikasadisaṃ katvā daṭṭhuṃ
analyzed: bhikkhu sabba lahukam dukkaṭa dubbhāsita mattam paṭhama pārājika sadisam katvā daṭṭhum

original: sakkoti – ayaṃ aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjato bhayato passati nāmāti veditabbo.
analyzed: sakkoti ayam aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjataḥ bhayataḥ passati nāma ati veditabbo

original: 516. Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūtipadaniddese bhikkhusikkhāti bhikkhūhi sikkhitabbasikkhā.
analyzed: samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu uti pada niddese bhikkhu sikkhā ati bhikkhūhi sikkhitabba sikkhā

original: Sā bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇāpi asādhāraṇāpi bhikkhusikkhā eva nāma. Bhikkhunīsikkhāti
analyzed: sā bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇā api asādhāraṇā api bhikkhusikkhā eva nāma bhikkhunī sikkhā ati

original: bhikkhunīhi sikkhitabbasikkhā. Sāpi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇāpi asādhāraṇāpi bhikkhunīsikkhā
analyzed: bhikkhunīhi sikkhitabba sikkhā sā api bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇā api asādhāraṇā api bhikkhunī sikkhā

original: eva nāma. Sāmaṇerasikkhamānasāmaṇerīnaṃ sikkhāpi ettheva paviṭṭhā. Upāsakasikkhāti
analyzed: eva nāma sāmaṇera sikkhamāna sāmaṇerīnam sikkhā api ettha iva paviṭṭhā upāsaka sikkhā ati

original: upāsakehi sikkhitabbasikkhā. Sā pañcasīladasasīlavasena vaṭṭati. Upāsikāsikkhāti
analyzed: upāsakehi sikkhitabba sikkhā sā pañca sīla dasa sīla vasena vaṭṭati upāsikā sikkhā ati

original: upāsikāhi sikkhitabbasikkhā. Sāpi pañcasīladasasīlavasena vaṭṭati. Tattha bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ
analyzed: upāsikāhi sikkhitabba sikkhā sā api pañca sīla dasa sīla vasena vaṭṭati tattha bhikkhu bhikkhunīnam

original: sikkhā yāva arahattamaggā vaṭṭati. Upāsakaupāsikānaṃ sikkhā yāva anāgāmimaggā. Tatrāyaṃ
analyzed: sikkhā yāva arahatta maggā vaṭṭati upāsaka aupāsikānam sikkhā yāva anāgāmi maggā tatra ayam

original: bhikkhu attanā sikkhitabbasikkhāpadesu eva sikkhati. Sesasikkhā pana atthuddhāravasena
analyzed: bhikkhu attanā sikkhitabba sikkhāpadesu eva sikkhati sesa sikkhā pana attha uddhāra vasena

original: sikkhāpadassa atthadassa dassanatthaṃ vuttā. Iti imāsu sikkhāsūti evaṃpakārāsu etāsu
analyzed: sikkhāpadassa attha dassa dassana attham vuttāḥ iti imāsu sikkhāsu iti evaṃpakārāsu etāsu

original: sikkhāsu. Sabbena sabbanti sabbena sikkhāsamādānena sabbaṃ sikkhaṃ. Sabbathā sabbanti
analyzed: sikkhāsu sabbena sabbanti sabbena sikkhā samādānena sabbam sikkham sabbathā sabbanti

original: sabbena sikkhitabbākārena sabbaṃ sikkhaṃ. Asesaṃ nissesanti sesābhāvato asesaṃ; satisammosena
analyzed: sabbena sikkhitabba ākārena sabbam sikkham asesam nissesanti sesa abhāvataḥ asesam sati sammosena

original: bhinnassāpi sikkhāpadassa puna pākatikakaraṇato nissesaṃ. Samādāya vattatīti samādiyitvā
analyzed: bhinnassa api sikkhāpadassa puna pākatika karaṇataḥ nissesam samādāya vattati iti samādiyitvā

original: gahetvā vattati. Tena vuccatīti yena kāraṇena etaṃ sabbaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ sabbena sikkhitabbākārena
analyzed: gahetvā vattati tena vuccati iti yena kāraṇena etam sabbam sikkhāpadam sabbena sikkhitabba ākārena

original: samādiyitvā sikkhati pūreti, tena vuccati “samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū”ti.
analyzed: samādiyitvā sikkhati pūra iti tena vuccati samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu iti

original: 517-8. Indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññūtipadadvayassa niddese kaṇhapakkhassa
analyzed: indriyesu gutta dvāraḥ bhojane mattaññūti pada dvayassa niddese kaṇha pakkhassa

original: paṭhamavacane payojanaṃ ācāraniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tattha katamā indriyesu
analyzed: paṭhama vacane payojanam ācāra niddese vutta nayena iva veditabbam tattha katamāḥ indriyesu

original: aguttadvāratātiādīsu pana yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ nikkhepakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
analyzed: agutta dvāra tā ti ādīsu pana yam vattabbam tat sabbam nikkhepa kaṇḍa vaṇṇanāyam vuttam eva

original: 519. Jāgariyānuyoganiddese pubbarattāpararattanti ettha aḍḍharattasaṅkhātāya rattiyā
analyzed: jāgariya anuyoga niddese pubba ratta apara rattan ti ettha aḍḍha ratta saṅkhātāya rattiyā

original: pubbe pubbarattaṃ; iminā paṭhamayāmañceva pacchābhattañca gaṇhāti. Rattiyā pacchā
analyzed: pubbe pubbarattam iminā paṭhama yāmañca iva pacchābhattañca gaṇhāti rattiyā pacchā

original: apararattaṃ; iminā pacchimayāmañceva purebhattañca gaṇhāti. Majjhimayāmo panassa
analyzed: apararattam iminā pacchima yāmañca iva purebhattam ca gaṇhāti majjhima yāmaḥ panassa

original: bhikkhuno niddākilamathavinodanokāsoti na gahito. Jāgariyānuyoganti jāgariyassa asupanabhāvassa
analyzed: bhikkhuno niddā kilamatha vinodana ukāsaḥ ti na gahitaḥ jāgariya anuyoganti jāgariyassa a supana bhāvassa

original: anuyogaṃ. Anuyutto hotīti taṃ anuyogasaṅkhātaṃ āsevanaṃ bhāvanaṃ anuyutto hoti sampayutto.
analyzed: anuyogam anuyuttaḥ hoti iti tam anuyoga saṅkhātam āsevanam bhāvanam anuyuttaḥ hoti sampayuttaḥ

original: Niddese panassa idha bhikkhu divasanti pubbaṇho, majjhanho, sāyanhoti tayopi divasakoṭṭhāsā
analyzed: niddese panassa idha bhikkhu divasanti pubbaṇhaḥ majjhanhaḥ sāyanhaḥ ti tayaḥ api divasakoṭṭhāsā

original: gahitā. Caṅkamena nisajjāyāti sakalampi divasaṃ iminā iriyāpathadvayeneva viharanto.
analyzed: gahitā caṅkamena divasam iminā iriyāpatha dvayena iva viharantaḥ

original: Cittassa āvaraṇato āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi pañcahipi nīvaraṇehi sabbākusaladhammehi
analyzed: cittassa āvaraṇataḥ āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi pañcahi pi nīvaraṇehi sabba akusala dhammehi

original: Evaṃ tāvettha ‘mūlapariññāvasena’ asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.

original: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthagate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṃ sakasakakiccanipphādanavasena
analyzed: cakkhu dvāre pana rūpe āpātha gate bhavaṅga calanataḥ uddham sakasaka kicca nipphādana vasena

original: āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṃ uppajjati. Taṃ pubbe uppannānaṃ
analyzed: āvajjana ādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanam uppajjati tam pubbe uppannānam

original: āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti. Tassa yathā paragehe

original: kiñci yācituṃ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesupi tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṃ

original: na yuttaṃ, evaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu
analyzed: na yuttam evam āvajjana ādīnam geha bhūte cakkhu dvāre āvajjana ādīsu pi a rajjantesu a dussantesu

original: amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ ayuttanti. Evaṃ ‘āgantukabhāvavasena’ asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: a muyhantesu ca rajjana dussana muyhanam ayuttan ti evam āgantuka bhāva vasena asammoha sampajaññam veditabbam

original: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti, tāni saddhiṃ
analyzed: yāni pana etāni cakkhu dvāre voṭṭhabbana pariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti tāni saddhim

original: sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti, aññamaññaṃ na passantīti ittarāni tāvakālikāni
analyzed: sampayutta dhammehi tattha tattha iva bhijjanti aññam aññam na passanti iti ittarāni tāvakālikāni

original: honti. Tattha yathā ekasmiṃ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekakassa taṅkhaṇaṃyeva
analyzed: honti tattha yathā ekasmin ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekakassa

original: maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma, evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu
analyzed: maraṇa dhammassa na yuttā nacca gīta ādīsu abhirati nāma evam eva eka dvāre sa sampayuttesu

original: āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇaṃññeva maraṇadhammassa javanassāpi
analyzed: āvajjana ādīsu tattha tattha iva matesu avasesassa maraṇa dhammassa javanassa api

original: rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti. Evaṃ ‘tāvakālikabhāvavasena’
analyzed: rajjana dussana muyhana vasena abhirati nāma na evam tāvakālika bhāva vasena

original: asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: a sammoha sampajaññam veditabbam

original: Apica khandhāyatanadhātupaccayapaccavekkhaṇavasenapetaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ettha hi cakkhu
analyzed: apica khandha āyatana dhātu paccaya paccavekkhaṇa vasena apetam veditabbam ettha hi cakkhu

original: samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketi?
analyzed: samavāye ālokana vilokanam paññāyati tattha kaḥ ekaḥ āloketi kaḥ viloketi

original: Tathā cakkhu cakkhāyatanaṃ, rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ, dassanaṃ manāyatanaṃ, vedanādayo taṃsampayuttā
analyzed: tathā cakkhu cakkha āyatanam rūpam rūpa āyatanam dassanam manā āyatanam vedanā ādayaḥ tad sampayuttā

original: dhammā dhammāyatanaṃ. Evametesaṃ catunnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
analyzed: dhammā dhamma āyatanam evam etesam catunnam āyatanānam samavāye ālokana vilokanam paññāyati

original: Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketi?
analyzed: tattha kaḥ ekaḥ āloka iti kaḥ viloka iti

original: Tathā cakkhu cakkhudhātu, rūpaṃ rūpadhātu, dassanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, taṃsampayuttā

original: paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketi?
analyzed: paññāyati tattha kaḥ ekaḥ āloketi kaḥ viloketi

original: Tathā cakkhu nissayapaccayo, rūpaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo, āvajjanaṃ anantarasamanantaraanantarūpanissayanatthivigatapaccayo,
analyzed: tathā cakkhu nissaya paccayaḥ rūpam ārammaṇa paccayaḥ āvajjanam anantara samanantara ananta rūpa nissaya natthi vigata paccayaḥ

original: āloko upanissayapaccayo, vedanādayo sahajātādipaccayā. Evametesaṃ paccayānaṃ samavāye
analyzed: ālokaḥ upanissaya paccayaḥ vedanā ādayo sahajāta ādi paccayāḥ evam etesam paccayānam samavāye

original: ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketīti? Evamettha khandhāyatanadhātupaccayapaccavekkhaṇavasenāpi
analyzed: ālokana vilokanam paññāyati tattha kaḥ ekaḥ āloketi kaḥ viloketi iti evam ettha khandha āyatana dhātu paccaya paccavekkhaṇa vasena api

original: asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: a sammoha sampajaññam veditabbam

original: Samiñjite pasāriteti pabbānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇe. Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ
analyzed: samiñjite pasāritā iti pabbānam samiñjana pasāraṇe tattha citta vasena iva samiñjana pasāraṇam

analyzed: nuppajjanti cittam ekaggam hoti kammaṭṭhānam phātim gacchati visesam adhigacchati iti

original: Evaṃ ‘atthānatthapariggaṇhanaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam attha anattha pariggaṇhanam veditabbam

analyzed: aṭṭhim āhacca pādaḥ jhāyi aparaḥ bhikkhu vammike pasāresi saḥ āsīvisena daṭṭhaḥ aparo

analyzed: sa pāye pasāretabbam idam ettha sa pāya sampajaññam

analyzed: idāni pana me tumhehi saddhim kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānam muñcitvā tasmā

original: puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesi”nti. “Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhunā nāma evarūpena
analyzed: puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti sādhu bhante bhikkhunā nāma evarūpena

analyzed: bhavitabban ti evam ettha api kammaṭṭhāna avijahanam eva gocara sampajaññam ti veditabbam

original: abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, taṃ asappāyaṃ; viparītaṃ sappāyaṃ. Tassa
analyzed: abhivaḍḍhanti kusalāḥ dhammāḥ parihāyanti tam a sappāyam viparītam sa ppāyam tassa

original: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṃ pārupanto natthi. Vuttappakāracittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva

original: jānāti – ‘mayā kāyo pārupito’ti, kāyopi na jānāti – ‘ahaṃ cīvarena pārupito’ti. Dhātuyova

original: ‘asammohasampajaññaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.

analyzed: dubbisodhanīyaḥ asappāyaḥ iva duddhota pattaḥ hi na vaṭṭati tam dhovantassa iva ca assa palibodhaḥ

original: hoti. Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyova cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo. Nimittakammādivasena
analyzed: hoti maṇi vaṇṇa patto pana lobhanīyaḥ uva cīvare vutta nayena iva asappāyaḥ nimitta kamma ādi vasena

original: ‘gocarasampajaññaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: gocara sampajaññam veditabbam

original: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṃ gaṇhanto natthi. Vuttappakāracittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravaseneva
analyzed: abbhantare attā nāma koci pattam gaṇhantaḥ natthi vutta ppakāra citta kiriyā vāyodhātu vipphāra vasena iva

original: pana pattaggahaṇaṃ nāma hoti. Tattha pattopi acetano, hatthāpi acetanā. Patto na
analyzed: pana patta gahaṇam nāma hoti tattha pattaḥ api acetanaḥ hatthā api acetanā pattaḥ na

original: jānāti – ‘ahaṃ hatthehi gahito’ti. Hatthāpi na jānanti – ‘patto amhehi gahito’ti.
analyzed: jānāti aham hatthehi gahito ti hatthā api na jānanti pattaḥ amhehi gahito ti

original: Dhātuyova dhātusamūhaṃ gaṇhanti, saṇḍāsena aggivaṇṇapattagahaṇe viyāti. Evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
analyzed: dhātuyāḥ iva dhātu samūham gaṇhanti saṇḍāsena aggi vaṇṇa patta gahaṇe viyā ti evam pavatta paṭisaṅkhāna vasena ittha

original: ‘asammohasampajaññaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: a sammoha sampajaññam veditabbam

analyzed: viya ca pattam kapāle bhesajjam iva ca patte laddha bhikkham sallakkheti ayam saṅghāṭi patta cīvara dhāraṇe

analyzed: asammoha sampajaññena uttama sampajāna kārī iti veditabbo

original: Asitādīsu asiteti piṇḍapātādibhojane. Pīteti yāguādipāne. Khāyiteti piṭṭhakhajjakādikhādane.

original: Sāyiteti madhuphāṇitādisāyane. Tattha “neva davāyā”tiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi

original: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa aphāsu hoti, taṃ tassa asappāyaṃ.

original: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi. Vuttappakāracittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva

original: mukhavivaraṇañca hoti. Na koci kuñcikāya, na yantakena hanukaṭṭhiṃ vivarati. Cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva

original: vāyodhātuyāva pavisati. Paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ koci palālasanthāraṃ katvā dhārento nāma

analyzed: a sammoha sampajaññam veditabbam

analyzed: aññe ca rogā uppajjanti karontassa pana sabbam tam na hoti iti ayam ettha attho tassa

analyzed: vasena sātthaka sampajaññam veditabbam

analyzed: hoti patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbam tam na hoti iti idam ettha sappāyam tassa vasena

original: ‘sappāyasampajaññaṃ’ kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavaseneva ca ‘gocarasampajaññaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sa ppāya sampajaññam kammaṭṭhāna avijahana vasena iva ca gocara sampajaññam veditabbam

analyzed: tam attanaḥ hoti na paresam kevalam paṭijagganam attam eva hoti evam ti evam pavatta paṭisaṅkhāna vasena ittha

original: ‘asammohasampajaññaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: a sammoha sampajaññam veditabbam

original: Gatādīsu gateti gamane. Ṭhiteti ṭhāne. Nisinneti nisajjāya. Sutteti sayane. Tattha abhikkantādīsu vuttanayeneva sampajānakāritā veditabbā.

original: Evaṃ pana sutte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ na kātabbaṃ.

original: sayati – ‘kāyo acetano, mañco acetano. Kāyo na jānāti – ahaṃ mañce sayitoti. Mañcopi
analyzed: sayati kāyaḥ acetanaḥ mañcaḥ acetanaḥ kāyaḥ na jānāti aham mañce sayitā iti mañcaḥ upi

original: na jānāti – mayi kāyo sayitoti. Acetano kāyo acetane mañce sayito’ti. Evaṃ pariggaṇhanto

original: Ayaṃ sutte sampajānakārī nāma hotīti.

analyzed: bhāsitā iti kathane tattha upādā rūpassa sadda āyatanassa appavatte sati bhāsitam nāma

analyzed: nāma natthi a pavattiyam hoti iti pariggāhakaḥ bhikkhu tuṇhībhāve sampajāna kārī nāma

analyzed: samāpannaḥ api tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārīyā iva nāma hoti

original: Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato. So heṭṭhā abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha
analyzed: ettha ca ekaḥ iriyāpathaḥ dvīsu ṭhānesu āgataḥ saḥ heṭṭhā abhikkante paṭikkante iti ettha

original: bhikkhācāragāmaṃ gacchato ca āgacchato ca addhānagamanavasena kathito. Gate ṭhite
analyzed: bhikkhācāra gāmam gacchato ca āgacchato ca addhāna gamana vasena kathitaḥ gate ṭhite

original: nisinneti ettha vihāre cuṇṇikapāduddhārairiyāpathavasena kathitoti veditabbo.
analyzed: nisinnā iti ettha vihāre cuṇṇika pāduddhāra airiyāpatha vasena kathito ti veditabbo

original: 524. Tattha katamā satītiādi sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.
analyzed: tattha katamā satī itiādi sabbam uttāna attham eva

original: 526. So vivittanti iminā kiṃ dasseti? Etassa bhikkhuno upāsanaṭṭhānaṃ yogapathaṃ
analyzed: saḥ vivitta nti iminā kim dasseti etassa bhikkhuno upāsana ṭhānam yogapatham

original: sappāyasenāsanaṃ dasseti. Yassa hi abbhantare ettakā guṇā atthi, tassa anucchaviko
analyzed: sa pāyasena āsanam dasseti yassa hi abbhantare ettakāḥ guṇāḥ atthi tassa anucchaviko

original: araññavāso. Yassa panete natthi, tassa ananucchaviko. Evarūpassa hi araññavāso kāḷamakkaṭaacchataracchadīpimigādīnaṃ
analyzed: arañña vāsaḥ yassa pana ete natthi tassa an anucchavikaḥ evarūpassa hi arañña vāsaḥ kāḷa makkaṭa acchata raccha dīpi miga ādīnam

original: aṭavīvāsasadiso hoti. Kasmā? Icchāya ṭhatvā paviṭṭhattā. Tassa hi araññavāsamūlako
analyzed: aṭavī vāsa sadisaḥ hoti kasmai icchāya ṭhatvā paviṭṭha ttā tassa hi arañña vāsa mūlako

original: koci attho natthi; araññavāsañceva āraññake ca dūseti; sāsane appasādaṃ uppādeti.
analyzed: koci atthaḥ natthi arañña vāsam ca iva āraññake ca dūseti sāsane appasādam uppādeti

original: Yassa pana abbhantare ettakā guṇā atthi, tasseva so anucchaviko. So hi araññavāsaṃ
analyzed: yassa pana abbhantare ettakāḥ guṇāḥ atthi tassa iva so anucchaviko so hi arañña vāsam

original: nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhitvā parinibbāti, sakalaaraññavāsaṃ
analyzed: nissāya vipassanam paṭṭhapetvā arahattam gaṇhitvā parinibbāti sakala arañña vāsam

original: upasobheti, āraññikānaṃ sīsaṃ dhovati, sakalasāsanaṃ pasāreti. Tasmā satthā evarūpassa
analyzed: upasobheti āraññikānam sīsam dhovati sakala sāsanam pasāreti tasmā satthā evarūpassa

original: bhikkhuno upāsanaṭṭhānaṃ yogapathaṃ sappāyasenāsanaṃ dassento so vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhuno upāsana ṭṭhānam yogapatham sa pāyasena āsanam dassento so vivittam senāsanam

original: bhajatītiādimāha. Tattha vivittanti suññaṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ. Etameva hi atthaṃ
analyzed: bhajati itiādim āha tattha vivittam ti suññam appa saddam appa nigghosam etam eva hi attham

original: dassetuṃ tañca anākiṇṇantiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha anākiṇṇanti asaṅkiṇṇaṃ asambādhaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: dassetum tat ca an ākiṇṇa nti ādi vuttam tattha an ākiṇṇa nti a saṅkiṇṇam a sambādham tattha

original: yassa senāsanassa sāmantā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi pabbatagahanaṃ vanagahanaṃ nadīgahanaṃ
analyzed: yassa senāsanassa sāmantā gāvutam pi aḍḍha yojanam pi pabbata gahanam vana gahanam nadī gahanam

original: hoti, na koci avelāya upasaṅkamituṃ sakkoti – idaṃ santikepi anākiṇṇaṃ nāma. Yaṃ
analyzed: hoti na koci avelāya upasaṅkamitum sakkoti idam santike pi an ākiṇṇam nāma yam

original: pana aḍḍhayojanikaṃ vā yojanikaṃ vā hoti – idaṃ dūratāya eva anākiṇṇaṃ nāma hoti.
analyzed: pana aḍḍhayojanikam vā yojanikam vā hoti idam dūratāya eva an ākiṇṇam nāma hoti

original: 527. Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ. Tassa pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ mañco pīṭhantiādi
analyzed: seti ca iva āsati ca ettha ati senāsanam tassa pabhedam dassetum mañcaḥ pīṭha nti ādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha mañcoti cattāro mañcā – masārako, bundikābaddho, kuḷīrapādako, āhaccapādakoti.
analyzed: vuttam tattha mañco ti cattāraḥ mañcāḥ masārakaḥ bundikābaddhaḥ kuḷīrapādakaḥ āhaccapādakaḥ ti

original: Tathā pīṭhaṃ. Bhisīti pañca bhisiyo – uṇṇābhisi, coḷabhisi, vākabhisi, tiṇabhisi,
analyzed: tathā pīṭham bhisī iti pañca bhisiyaḥ uṇṇā bhisi coḷa bhisi vāka bhisi tiṇa bhisi

original: paṇṇabhisīti. Bimbohananti sīsupadhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ vitthārato vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ
analyzed: paṇṇabhisī iti bimbohanam ti sīsa upadhānam vuttam tam vitthārataḥ vidatthi catur aṅgulam

original: vaṭṭati, dīghato mañcavitthārappamāṇaṃ. Vihāroti samantā parihārapathaṃ antoyeva
analyzed: vaṭṭati dīghataḥ mañca vitthāra ppamāṇam vihāroti samantā parihāra patham

original: rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni dassetvā katasenāsanaṃ. Aḍḍhayogoti supaṇṇavaṅkagehaṃ. Pāsādoti
analyzed: ratti ṭṭhāna divāṭṭhānāni dassetvā kata senāsanam aḍḍha yogo ti su paṇṇa vaṅka geham pāsādaḥ ti

original: dve kaṇṇikāni gahetvā kato dīghapāsādo. Aṭṭoti paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ iṭṭhakāhi
analyzed: dve kaṇṇikāni gahetvā kataḥ dīgha pāsādaḥ aṭṭo ti paṭirāja ādi paṭibāhana attham

original: kato bahalabhittiko catupañcabhūmiko patissayaviseso. Māḷoti bhojanasālasadiso maṇḍalamāḷo;
analyzed: kataḥ bahala bhittiko catu pañca bhūmiko patissaya visesaḥ māḷaḥ ti bhojana sāla sadisaḥ maṇḍalamāḷaḥ

original: vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ekakūṭasaṅgahito caturassapāsādoti vuttaṃ. Leṇanti pabbataṃ
analyzed: vinaya ṭṭhakathā ayam pana eka kūṭa saṅgahito catur assa pāsādaḥ ti vuttam leṇam ti pabbatam

original: khaṇitvā vā pabbhārassa appahonakaṭṭhāne kuṭṭaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā vā katasenāsanaṃ. Guhāti
analyzed: khaṇitvā vā pabbhārassa appahonaka ṭṭhāne kuṭṭam uṭṭhāpetvā vā kata senāsanam guhāti

original: bhūmidari vā yattha rattindivaṃ dīpaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, pabbataguhā vā bhūmiguhā vā.
analyzed: vā yattha rattindivam dīpam laddhum vaṭṭati pabbata guhā vā bhūmi guhā vā

original: Rukkhamūlanti rukkhassa heṭṭhā parikkhittaṃ vā aparikkhittaṃ vā. Veḷugumboti veḷugaccho.
analyzed: rukkha mūlanti rukkhassa heṭṭhā parikkhittam vā a parikkhittam vā veḷugumbaḥ ti veḷugacchaḥ

original: Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti ṭhapetvā vā etāni mañcādīni yattha bhikkhū
analyzed: yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti iti ṭhapetvā vā etāni mañca ādīni yattha bhikkhū

original: sannipatanti, yaṃ tesaṃ sannipātārahaṭṭhānaṃ, sabbametaṃ senāsanaṃ.
analyzed: sannipatanti yam tesam sannipāta araha ṭṭhānam sabbam etam senāsanam

original: 528. Bhajatīti upeti. Sambhajatīti tattha abhirativasena anukkaṇṭhito suṭṭhu upeti.
analyzed: bhajati iti upeti sambhajati iti tattha abhirati vasena anukkaṇṭhito suṭṭhu upeti

original: Sevatīti nivāsanavasena sevati nisevatīti anukkaṇṭhamāno sannisito hutvā sevati.
analyzed: sevati iti nivāsana vasena sevati nisevati iti an ukkaṇṭhamānaḥ sannisitaḥ hutvā sevati

original: Saṃsevatīti senāsanavattaṃ sampādento sammā sevati.
analyzed: saṃsevati iti senāsana vattam sampādento sammā sevati

original: 529. Idāni yaṃ taṃ vivittanti vuttaṃ, tassa pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ araññaṃ rukkhamūlantiādi
analyzed: idāni yam tam vivittan ti vuttam tassa pabhedam dassetum araññam rukkha mūlam tiādi

original: āraddhaṃ. Tattha araññanti vinayapariyāyena tāva “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca
analyzed: āraddham tattha vinaya pariyāyena tāva ṭhapetvā gāmam ca gāmūpacāram ca

original: avasesaṃ arañña”nti āgataṃ. Suttantapariyāyena āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya “āraññakaṃ
analyzed: avasesam araññanti āgatam suttanta pariyāyena āraññikam bhikkhum sandhāya āraññakam

original: nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikapacchima”nti āgataṃ. Vinayasuttantā pana ubhopi pariyāyadesanā
analyzed: nāma senāsanam āgatam vinaya suttantā pana ubho pi pariyāya desanā

original: nāma. Abhidhammo nippariyāyadesanāti abhidhammapariyāyena araññaṃ dassetuṃ nikkhamitvā
analyzed: nāma abhidhammaḥ nippariyāya desanā ati abhidhamma pariyāyena araññam dassetum nikkhamitvā

original: bahi indakhīlāti vuttaṃ; indakhīlato bahi nikkhamitvāti attho.
analyzed: bahi inda khīlā ati vuttam inda khīlataḥ bahi nikkhamitvā iti attho

original: 530. Rukkhamūlādīnaṃ pakatiyā ca suviññeyyabhāvato rukkhamūlaṃyeva rukkhamūlantiādi
analyzed: rukkha mūla ādīnam pakatiyā ca su viññeyya bhāvataḥ rukkha mūlam yeva rukkha mūlam tiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Apicettha rukkhamūlanti yaṃkiñci sītacchāyaṃ vivittaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ. Pabbatanti
analyzed: vuttam apica ittha rukkha mūlam ti yaṃkiñci sīta chāyam vivittam rukkha mūlam pabbatanti

original: selaṃ. Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa
analyzed: selam tattha hi udaka soṇḍīsu udaka kiccam katvā sītāya rukkha chāyāya nisinnassa

original: nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Kandaranti
analyzed: nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittam ekaggam hoti kandaranti

original: kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena daritaṃ udakena bhinnaṃ pabbatappadesaṃ; yaṃ nitumbantipi
analyzed: kam vuccati udakam tena daritam udakena bhinnam pabbata ppadesam yam

original: nadīkuñjantipi vadanti. Tattha hi rajatapaṭṭasadisā vālikā honti, matthake maṇivitānaṃ
analyzed: vadanti tattha hi rajata paṭṭa sadisāḥ vālikāḥ honti matthake maṇi vitānam

original: viya vanagahanaṃ, maṇikkhandhasadisaṃ udakaṃ sandati. Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ
analyzed: viya vana gahanam maṇi kkhandha sadisam udakam sandati evarūpam kandaram oruyha pānīyam

original: pivitvā gattāni sītaṃ katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññapetvā nisinnassa
analyzed: pivitvā gattāni sītam katvā vālikam ussāpetvā paṃsukūla cīvaram paññapetvā nisinnassa

original: samaṇadhammaṃ karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Giriguhanti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ antaraṃ,
analyzed: samaṇa dhammam karotaḥ cittam ekaggam hoti giri guhanti dvinnam pabbatānam antaram

original: ekasmiṃyeva vā umaṅgasadisaṃ mahāvivaraṃ. Susānalakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ekasmin yeva vā umaṅga sadisam mahā vivaram su sāna lakkhaṇam visuddhi magge vuttam

original: 531. Vanapatthanti gāmantaṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ, yattha na kasanti
analyzed: vana pattham ti gāmantam atikkamitvā manussānam an upacāra ṭhānam yattha na kasanti

original: na vapanti. Tenevassa niddese “vanapatthanti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”ntiādi
analyzed: na vapanti tena iva assa niddese dūrānam etam senāsanānam

original: vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā rukkhamūlādīsu idamevekaṃ bhājetvā dassitaṃ, tasmāssa nikkhepapaṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: vuttam yasmā vā rukkha mūla ādīsu idam eva ekam bhājetvā dassitam tasmā assa nikkhepa paṭipāṭiyā

original: niddesaṃ akatvā sabbapariyante niddeso katoti veditabbo. Abbhokāsanti acchannaṃ.
analyzed: niddesam a katvā sabba pariyante niddeso kato ti veditabbaḥ abbhokāsanti acchannam

original: Ākaṅkhamāno panettha cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasati. Palālapuñjanti palālarāsi. Mahāpalālapuñjato
analyzed: ākaṅkhamānaḥ pana ittha cīvara kuṭim katvā vasati palāla puñjanti palāla rāsi mahā palāla puñjataḥ

original: hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti, gacchagumbādīnampi upari
analyzed: hi palālam nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇa sadise ālaye karonti gaccha gumba ādīnam pi upari

original: palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti; taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: palālam pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇa dhammam karonti tam sandhāya itam vuttam

original: Vanapatthaniddese salomahaṃsānanti yattha paviṭṭhassa lomahaṃso uppajjati; evarūpānaṃ
analyzed: vanapattha niddese sa lomahaṃsānam ti yattha paviṭṭhassa lomahaṃso uppajjati evarūpānam

original: bhīsanakasenāsanānaṃ. Pariyantānanti dūrabhāvena pariyante ṭhitānaṃ. Na manussūpacārānanti
analyzed: bhīsanaka senāsanānam dūra bhāvena pariyante ṭhitānam na manussu upacārānanti

original: kasanavapanavasena manussehi upacaritabbaṃ vanantaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitānaṃ. Durabhisambhavānanti
analyzed: kasana vapana vasena manussehi upacaritabbam vanantam atikkamitvā ṭhitānam durabhisambhavānam ti

original: aladdhavivekassādehi abhibhuyya vasituṃ nasakkuṇeyyānaṃ.
analyzed: a laddha vivekaḥ sādehi abhibhuyya vasitum

original: 532. Appasaddādiniddese appasaddanti vacanasaddena appasaddaṃ.
analyzed: appasadda ādi niddese appasaddanti vacana saddena appasaddam

original: 533. Appanigghosanti nagaranigghosasaddena appanigghosaṃ. Yasmā pana ubhayampetaṃ
analyzed: appa nigghosanti nagara nigghosa saddena appa nigghosam yasmā pana ubhayampetam

original: saddaṭṭhena ekaṃ, tasmāssa niddese “yadeva taṃ appasaddaṃ tadeva taṃ appanigghosa”nti
analyzed: sadda ṭṭhena ekam tasmā assa niddese yat eva tam appa saddam tat eva tam

original: vuttaṃ. Vijanavātanti anusañcaraṇajanassa sarīravātena virahitaṃ. Vijanavādantipi
analyzed: vuttam vijana vātanti anusañcaraṇa janassa sarīra vātena virahitam

original: pāṭho; antojanavādena virahitanti attho. Yasmā pana yaṃ appanigghosaṃ, tadeva janasañcaraṇena
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ antar janavādena virahitanti atthaḥ yasmā pana yam appa nigghosam tat eva jana sañcaraṇena

original: ca janavādena ca virahitaṃ hoti, tasmāssa niddese “yadeva taṃ appanigghosaṃ tadeva
analyzed: ca janavādena ca virahitam hoti tasmā assa niddese yat eva tam appa nigghosam tat eva

original: taṃ vijanavāta”nti vuttaṃ. Manussarāhaseyyakanti manussānaṃ rahassakiriyaṭṭhāniyaṃ.
analyzed: tam vijana vātam ti vuttam manussa rāhaseyyakanti manussānam rahassa kiriya ṭṭhāniyam

original: Yasmā pana taṃ janasañcaraṇarahitaṃ hoti, tenassa niddese “yadeva taṃ vijanavātaṃ
analyzed: yasmā pana tam jana sañcaraṇa rahitam hoti tena assa niddese yat eva tam vijana vātam

original: tadeva taṃ manussarāhaseyyaka”nti vuttaṃ. Paṭisallānasāruppanti vivekānurūpaṃ. Yasmā
analyzed: tat eva tam manussa rāhaseyyakanti vuttam paṭisallāna sāruppam ti viveka anurūpam yasmā

original: pana taṃ niyameneva manussarāhaseyyakaṃ hoti, tasmāssa niddese “yadeva taṃ manussarāhaseyyakaṃ
analyzed: pana tam niyamena iva manussa rāhaseyyakam hoti tasmā assa niddese yat eva tam manussa rāhaseyyakam

original: tadeva taṃ paṭisallānasāruppa”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tat eva tam paṭisallāna sāruppan ti vuttam

original: 534. Araññagatādiniddese araññaṃ vuttameva. Tathā rukkhamūlaṃ. Avasesaṃ pana sabbampi senāsanaṃ suññāgārena saṅgahitaṃ.
analyzed: arañña gata ādi niddese araññam vuttam eva tathā rukkha mūlam avasesam pana sabbam pi senāsanam suññāgārena saṅgahitam

original: 535. Pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvāti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ bandhitvā. Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti
analyzed: pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ati samantataḥ ūru baddha āsanam bandhitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya ati

original: uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujuṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
analyzed: uparimam sarīram ujum ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭim paṭipādetvā

original: Evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṃsanhārūni na paṇamanti. Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā
analyzed: evam hi nisinnassa camma maṃsa nhārūni na paṇamanti athassa yā tesam paṇamana paccayā

original: khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā nuppajjanti. Tāsu na uppajjamānāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ
analyzed: khaṇe khaṇe vedanāḥ uppajjeyyum tāḥ na uppajjanti tāsu na uppajjamānāsu cittam ekaggam

original: hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paripatati, vuḍḍhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati.
analyzed: hoti kammaṭṭhānam na paripatati vuḍḍhim phātim upagacchati

original: 536. Ujuko hoti kāyo ṭhito paṇihitoti idampi hi imamevatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ujukaḥ hoti kāyaḥ ṭhito paṇihito ti idam api hi imam eva attham sandhāya vuttam

original: 537. Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā, mukhasamīpe
analyzed: parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā ati kammaṭṭhāna abhimukham satim ṭhapayitvā mukha samīpe

original: vā katvāti attho. Teneva vuttaṃ “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā
analyzed: vā katvā iti atthaḥ tena iva vuttam ayam sati upaṭṭhitā hoti su upaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā

original: mukhanimitte vā”ti. Mukhanimittanti cettha uttaroṭṭhassa vemajjhappadeso daṭṭhabbo,
analyzed: mukha nimitte vā ati mukha nimittam ti ca ittha uttara uṭṭhassa vemajjha ppadeso daṭṭhabbo

original: yattha nāsikavāto paṭihaññati; atha vā parīti pariggahaṭṭho, mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho,
analyzed: yattha nāsika vāto paṭihaññati atha vā pari iti pariggaha aṭṭhaḥ mukhanti niyyāna ṭṭhaḥ

original: satīti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho; tena vuccati “parimukhaṃ sati”nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha

analyzed: paṭimuñcataḥ vā nissaṭṭha ttā bhāvanā balena abhibhuyya nissaṭṭha ttā ati attho pahīna paṭinissaṭṭha ttā ati

analyzed: paṭinissaṭṭha ttā ati ālokā hoti iti sa ppabhā hoti nirāvaraṇa ṭṭhena vivaṭā nirupakkilesa ṭṭhena

original: 558. Tiṇṇavicikicchoti vicikicchaṃ taritvā atikkamitvā ṭhito. Niddesepissa tiṇṇoti

original: Pubbenivāsañāṇacatutthaṃ kāmāvacarakkhandhānussaraṇakāle parittārammaṇaṃ, rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakkhandhānussaraṇakāle

original: mahaggatārammaṇaṃ, “atīte buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā maggaṃ bhāvayiṃsu, phalaṃ
analyzed: mahaggata ārammaṇam atīte buddha paccekabuddha khīṇa āsavāḥ maggam bhāvayiṃsu phalam

original: sacchikariṃsū”ti anussaraṇakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, nāmagottānussaraṇakāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: sacchikariṃsu iti anussaraṇa kāle appamāṇa ārammaṇam nāma gotta anussaraṇa kāle navattabba ārammaṇam

original: Dibbacakkhuñāṇacatutthaṃ vaṇṇārammaṇattā parittārammaṇaṃ.

original: Yathākammūpagañāṇacatutthaṃ kāmāvacarakammānussaraṇakāle parittārammaṇaṃ, rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakammānussaraṇakāle mahaggatārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: yathā kammūpaga ñāṇa catuttham kāmāvacara kamma anussaraṇa kāle paritta ārammaṇam rūpāvacara arūpāvacara kamma anussaraṇa kāle mahaggata ārammaṇam

original: Anāgataṃsañāṇacatutthaṃ anāgate kāmadhātuyā nibbattijānanakāle parittārammaṇaṃ, rūpārūpabhavesu

analyzed: nibbatti jānana kāle mahaggata ārammaṇam anāgate buddha paccekabuddha khīṇa āsavāḥ maggam

original: bhāvessanti, phalaṃ sacchikarissantī”ti jānanakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, “anāgate saṅkho
analyzed: bhāvessanti phalam sacchikarissanti iti jānana kāle appamāṇa ārammaṇam anāgate saṅkho

original: nāma rājā bhavissatī”tiādinā nayena nāmagottānussaraṇakāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: nāma rājā bhavissati itiādinā nayena nāma gotta anussaraṇa kāle nava ttabba ārammaṇam

original: Ākāsānañcāyatanaākiñcaññāyatanacatutthaṃ navattabbārammaṇaṃ. Viññāṇañcāyatananevasaññānāsaññāyatanacatutthaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatana ākiñcaññāyatana catuttham navattabba ārammaṇam viññāṇañcāyatana nevasaññānāsaññāyatana catuttham mahaggata ārammaṇam

original: Lokuttaracatutthaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ.
Kiriyatopi tesaṃ dvādasannaṃ jhānānaṃ idameva ārammaṇavidhānaṃ. Tīṇi jhānāni namaggārammaṇāti
analyzed: kiriyataḥ api tesam dvādasannam jhānānam idam eva ārammaṇa vidhānam tīṇi jhānāni na magga ārammaṇā ti

original: paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vā cetopariyādiñāṇaṃ vā maggaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kareyya, tīṇi jhānāni
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇam vā cetas pariyādi ñāṇam vā maggam ārammaṇam kareyya tīṇi jhānāni

original: tathā appavattito namaggārammaṇā, sahajātahetuvasena pana siyā maggahetukā; vīriyajeṭṭhikāya
analyzed: tathā appavattitaḥ na magga ārammaṇā sahajāta hetu vasena pana siyā magga hetukā vīriya jeṭṭhikāya

original: vā vīmaṃsājeṭṭhikāya vā maggabhāvanāya maggādhipatino; chandacittajeṭṭhakakāle phalakāle ca navattabbā.
analyzed: vā vīmaṃsā jeṭṭhikāya vā magga bhāvanāya magga adhipatino chanda citta jeṭṭhaka kāle phala kāle ca

original: Catutthaṃ jhānanti idhāpi kusalato terasasu catutthajjhānesu sabbatthapādakaiddhividhadibbasotadibbacakkhuyathākammūpagañāṇacatutthañceva
analyzed: catuttham jhānanti idha api kusalato terasasu catuttha jjhānesu sabbattha pādaka eddhividha dibba sota dibba cakkhu yathā kammu upaga ñāṇa catuttham ca eva

original: catubbidhañca āruppacatutthaṃ maggārammaṇādibhāvena na vattabbaṃ. Cetopariyapubbenivāsaanāgataṃsañāṇacatutthaṃ
analyzed: catubbidham ca āruppa catuttham magga ārammaṇa ādi bhāvena na vattabbam cetaḥ pariya pubbenivāsa anāgataṃsañāṇa catuttham

original: maggabhāvanāya maggādhipati; chandacittajeṭṭhikāya ceva maggabhāvanāya phalakāle
analyzed: magga bhāvanāya magga adhipati chanda citta jeṭṭhikāya ca iva magga bhāvanāya phala kāle

analyzed: ca na vattabbam kiriyataḥ pi dvādasasu jhānesu ayam eva nayaḥ

original: Tīṇi jhānāni na vattabbāti atītādīsu ekadhammampi ārabbha appavattito navattabbāti veditabbā.

analyzed: kāya ārammaṇa ttā paccuppanna ārammaṇam dibba sota ñāṇa catuttham sadda ārammaṇa ttā paccuppanna ārammaṇam

analyzed: cetas upariya ñāṇa catuttham atīte satta divasa bbhantare uppajjitvā niruddha citta jānana kāle

original: vitakkessatīti. So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṃ hoti no aññathā”ti iminā hi suttena

analyzed: paccuppannam ārabbha pavatti kāle paccuppanna ārammaṇam vitthāra kathā pana ittha heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathā kaṇḍa vaṇṇanā ayam

original: vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbā

original: Pubbenivāsañāṇacatutthaṃ atītakkhandhānussaraṇakāle atītārammaṇaṃ, nāmagottānussaraṇakāle

original: Ākāsānañcāyatanaākiñcaññāyatanacatutthaṃ navattabbārammaṇameva. Viññāṇañcāyatananevasaññānāsaññāyatanacatutthaṃ
analyzed: ākāsa anañcāyatana ākiñcaññāyatana catuttham navattabba ārammaṇam eva viññāṇañcāyatana nevasaññānāsaññāyatana catuttham

analyzed: tīṇi jhānāni bahiddhā ārammaṇā ati ajjhattataḥ bahiddhā bhūtam nimittam ārabbha pavattitaḥ bahiddhā ārammaṇā

original: Catutthaṃ jhānanti idhāpi kusalato terasasu catutthajjhānesu sabbatthapādakacatutthaṃ bahiddhārammaṇameva.

original: 13. Appamaññāvibhaṅgo
analyzed: appamaññā vibhaṅgaḥ

original: 1. Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
642. Idāni tadanantare appamaññāvibhaṅge catassoti gaṇanaparicchedo. Appamaññāyoti
analyzed: idāni tad anantare appamaññā vibhaṅge catasso ti gaṇana paricchedaḥ

original: pharaṇaappamāṇavasena appamaññāyo. Etā hi ārammaṇavasena appamāṇe vā satte pharanti,
analyzed: pharaṇa appamāṇa vasena appamaññāyaḥ etāḥ hi ārammaṇa vasena appamāṇe vā satte pharanti

original: ekasattampi vā anavasesapharaṇavasena pharantīti pharaṇaappamāṇavasena appamaññāyoti

original: vuccanti. Idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu. Mettāsahagatenāti mettāya samannāgatena.

original: Cetasāti cittena. Ekaṃ disanti ekissā disāya. Paṭhamapariggahitaṃ sattaṃ upādāya

original: dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthañcāti attho.

original: Iti uddhanti teneva ca nayena uparimaṃ disanti vuttaṃ hoti. Adho tiriyanti adhodisampi

original: assamaṇḍale assamiva mettāsahagataṃ cittaṃ sāretipi paccāsāretipīti ettāvatā ekamekaṃ

analyzed: disam pariggahetvā odhisaḥ mettā pharaṇam dassitam sabbadhi iti ādi pana anodhisaḥ dassana attham

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha sabbadhīti sabbattha. Sabbattatāyāti sabbesu hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhamittasapattamajjhattādippabhedesu

original: attatāya ‘ayaṃ parasatto’ti vibhāgaṃ akatvā attasamatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti; atha vā sabbattatāyāti

original: sabbena cittabhāvena īsakampi bahi avikkhipamānoti vuttaṃ hoti. Sabbāvantanti sabbasattavantaṃ,
analyzed: sabbena citta bhāvena īsakam pi bahi a vikkhipamānaḥ ti vuttam hoti sabbāvantam ti sabba sattavantam

original: sabbasattayuttanti attho. Lokanti sattalokaṃ.
analyzed: sabba satta yuttam ti attho lokam ti satta lokam

original: Vipulenātievamādipariyāyadassanato panettha puna “mettāsahagatenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā

original: Metti mettāyanātiādīni vuttatthāneva.
644. Vidisaṃ vāti padaṃ tiriyaṃ vāti etassa atthavibhāvanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.

original: 648. Sabbadhiādiniddese yasmā tīṇipi etāni padāni sabbasaṅgāhikāni, tasmā nesaṃ ekatova atthaṃ dassetuṃ sabbena sabbantiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

original: Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā.
2. Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
Abhidhammabhājanīyaṃ kusalatopi vipākatopi kiriyatopi heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe bhājitanayeneva bhājitaṃ. Atthopissa tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: abhidhamma bhājanīyam kusalataḥ api vipākataḥ api kiriyataḥ api heṭṭhā cittuppāda kaṇḍe bhājita nayena iva bhājitam atthaḥ pi ssa tattha vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: 3. Pañhāpucchakavaṇṇanā
analyzed: pañhāpucchaka vaṇṇanā

original: ‘Sāvajjato’ pāṇātipāto atthi appasāvajjo, atthi mahāsāvajjo. Tathā adinnādānādīni. Tesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ heṭṭhā dassitameva.

analyzed: pabheda gatam ñāṇam nirutti paṭisambhidā evam ayam nirutti paṭisambhidā sadda ārammaṇā

original: na sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānanti. Paṭisambhidāppatto hi “phasso”ti vutte “ayaṃ sabhāvaniruttī”ti
analyzed: na sabhāva nirutti iti jānanti paṭisambhidā appatto hi phassaḥ ti vutte ayam sabhāva nirutti iti

original: jānāti, “phassā”ti vā “phassa”nti vā vutte pana “ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti.
analyzed: jānāti vā phassanti vā vutte pana ayam na sabhāva niruttī iti jānāti

original: Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Aññaṃ panesa nāmaākhyātaupasaggabyañjanasaddaṃ jānāti na

analyzed: jānāti iti yat aggena saddam sutvā ayam sabhāva nirutti ayam na sabhāva nirutti iti

original: jānāti, tadaggena tampi jānissatīti. Taṃ pana nayidaṃ paṭisambhidākiccanti paṭikkhipitvā

original: idaṃ vatthu kathitaṃ –
analyzed: idam vatthu kathitam

analyzed: ṭhatvā evam pavāresi

original: aṭṭhārasa bhāsā parivattanti. Ayamevekā yathābhuccabrahmavohāraariyavohārasaṅkhātā

original: Saṅgahavāravaṇṇanā.
analyzed: saṅgaha vāra vaṇṇanā

original: 2. Saccavārādivaṇṇanā
719. Idāni ye saṅgahavāre pañca atthā ca dhammā ca saṅgahitā, tesaṃ pabhedadassananayena
analyzed: idāni ye saṅgaha vāre pañca atthā ca dhammā ca saṅgahitā tesam pabheda dassana nayena

original: paṭisambhidā vibhajituṃ puna catassotiādinā nayena pabhedavāro āraddho. So saccavārahetuvāradhammavārapaccayākāravārapariyattivāravasena
analyzed: paṭisambhidā vibhajitum puna catasso ti ādinā nayena pabheda vāraḥ āraddho saḥ sacca vāra hetu vāra dhamma vāra paccaya ākāra vāra pariyatti vāra vasena

original: pañcavidho. Tattha paccayasamuppannassa dukkhasaccassa paccayena pattabbassa nibbānassa
analyzed: pañcavidhaḥ tattha paccaya samuppannassa dukkha saccassa paccayena pattabbassa nibbānassa

original: ca atthabhāvaṃ, phalanibbattakassa samudayassa nibbānasampāpakassa ariyamaggassa
analyzed: ca attha bhāvam phala nibbattakassa samudayassa nibbāna sampāpakassa ariya maggassa

original: ca dhammabhāvañca dassetuṃ ‘saccavāro’ vutto. Yassa kassaci pana hetuphalanibbattakassa
analyzed: ca dhamma bhāvañca dassetum sacca vāraḥ vuttaḥ yassa kassaci pana hetu phala nibbattakassa

original: hetuno dhammabhāvaṃ, hetuphalassa ca atthabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘hetuvāro’ vutto. Tattha
analyzed: hetuno dhamma bhāvam hetu phalassa ca attha bhāvam dassetum hetuvāraḥ vuttaḥ tattha

original: ca hetuphalakkamavasena uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā niddiṭṭhā. Ye pana

original: dhammā tamhā tamhā rūpārūpappabhedā hetuto jātā, tesaṃ atthabhāvaṃ, tassa tassa ca
analyzed: dhammā tamhā tamhā rūpa arūpa ppabhedāḥ hetutaḥ jātā tesam attha bhāvam tassa tassa ca

original: rūpārūpadhammappabhedassa hetuno dhammabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘dhammavāro’ vutto. Jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ
analyzed: rūpa arūpa dhamma ppabhedassa hetuno dhamma bhāvam dassetum dhammavāraḥ vuttaḥ jarā maraṇa ādīnam
