original: ‘paccayākāravāro’ vutto. Tato pariyattisaṅkhātassa tassa tassa bhāsitassa dhammabhāvaṃ,
analyzed: paccaya ākāra vāraḥ vuttaḥ tatas pariyatti saṅkhātassa tassa tassa bhāsitassa dhamma bhāvam

original: bhāsitasaṅkhātena paccayena pattabbassa bhāsitatthassa ca atthabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘pariyattivāro’ vutto.
analyzed: bhāsita saṅkhātena paccayena pattabbassa bhāsita atthassa ca attha bhāvam dassetum pariyatti vāraḥ vuttaḥ

original: Tattha ca yasmā bhāsitaṃ ñatvā tassattho ñāyati, tasmā bhāsitabhāsitatthakkamena
analyzed: tattha ca yasmā bhāsitam ñatvā tassa atthaḥ ñāyati tasmā bhāsita bhāsita ttha kkamena

original: uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā niddiṭṭhā. Pariyattidhammassa ca pabhedadassanatthaṃ
analyzed: uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamam dhamma paṭisambhidā niddiṭṭhā pariyatti dhammassa ca pabheda dassana ttham

original: “tattha katamā dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti pucchāpubbaṅgamo paṭiniddesavāro vutto. Tattha
analyzed: tattha katamā dhamma paṭisambhidā ti pucchā pubbaṅgamaḥ paṭiniddesa vāro vutto tattha

original: suttantiādīhi navahi aṅgehi nippadesato tanti gahitā. Ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho,
analyzed: suttanti ādīhi navahi aṅgehi nippadesataḥ tanti gahitā ayam imassa bhāsitassa attho

original: ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa atthoti imasmimpi ṭhāne bhāsitavasena nippadesato tanti eva gahitāti.
analyzed: ayam imassa bhāsitassa attho ti imasmim pi ṭhāne bhāsita vasena nippadesataḥ tanti eva gahitā ati

original: Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā.
2. Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā
725. Tattha tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā. Atthapaṭisambhidā lokiyalokuttaramissakā.
analyzed: tattha tissaḥ paṭisambhidāḥ lokiyāḥ attha paṭisambhidā lokiya lokuttara missakā

original: Sā hi nibbānārammaṇānaṃ maggaphalañāṇānaṃ vasena lokuttarāpi hoti. Abhidhammabhājanīye
analyzed: sā hi nibbāna ārammaṇānam magga phala ñāṇānam vasena lokuttarā api hoti abhidhammabhājanīye

original: kusalākusalavipākakiriyānaṃ vasena catūhi vārehi vibhattaṃ. Tattha yattakāni heṭṭhā
analyzed: kusala akusala vipāka kiriyānam vasena catūhi vārehi vibhattam tattha yattakāni heṭṭhā

original: cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalacittāni vibhattāni, tesaṃ sabbesampi vasena ekekasmiṃ cittaniddese
analyzed: cittuppāda kaṇḍe kusala cittāni vibhattāni tesam sabbesam pi vasena ekekasmin citta niddese

original: catasso catasso paṭisambhidā vibhattāti veditabbā. Akusalacittesupi eseva nayo. Vipākakiriyavāresu
analyzed: catasso catasso paṭisambhidā vibhattā ati veditabbā akusala cittesu pi esa iva nayaḥ vipāka kiriya vāresu

original: vipākakiriyānaṃ atthena saṅgahitattā, dhammapaṭisambhidaṃ chaḍḍetvā, ekekasmiṃ vipākacitte
analyzed: vipāka kiriyānaṃ atthena saṅgahita ttā dhamma paṭisambhidam chaḍḍetvā ekekasmim vipāka citte

original: ca kiriyacitte ca tisso tissova paṭisambhidā vibhattā. Pāḷi pana mukhamattameva dassetvā
analyzed: ca kiriya citte ca tissaḥ tissā uva paṭisambhidā vibhattā pana mukha mattam eva dassetvā

original: saṃkhittā. Sā heṭṭhā āgatavitthāravaseneva veditabbā.
analyzed: saṃkhittā sā heṭṭhā āgata vitthāra vasena iva veditabbā

original: Kasmā pana yathā kusalākusalavāresu “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti vuttaṃ,
analyzed: kasmā pana yathā kusala akusala vāresu tesam vipāke ñāṇam attha paṭisambhidā ti vuttam

original: evamidha “yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ime vipākā, tesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti evaṃ na vuttanti?
analyzed: evam idha yesam dhammānam ime vipākā tesu ñāṇam dhamma paṭisambhidā ti evam na vuttam ti

original: Heṭṭhā vuttattā. Yadi evaṃ, “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti heṭṭhā vuttattā
analyzed: heṭṭhā vutta ttā yadi evam tesam vipāke ñāṇam attha paṭisambhidā ti heṭṭhā vutta ttā

original: ayaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāpi idha na vattabbā siyāti? No na vattabbā. Kasmā? Heṭṭhā vipākakiriyacittuppādavasena
analyzed: ayam attha paṭisambhidā api idha na vattabbā siyā ati no na vattabbā kasmā heṭṭhā vipāka kiriya cittuppāda vasena

original: avuttattā. Kiriyavāre ca “yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ime kiriyā”ti vacanameva na yujjatīti dvīsupi
analyzed: a vutta ttā kiriya vāre ca yesam dhammānam ime kiriyā ati vacanam eva na yujjati iti dvīsupi

original: imesu vāresu tisso tissova paṭisambhidā vibhattā.
analyzed: imesu vāresu tissā tissā uva paṭisambhidā vibhattā

original: Tattha yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hotīti yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ phasso
analyzed: tattha yāya niruttiyā tesam dhammānam paññatti hoti iti yāya niruttiyā tesam phasso

original: hotītiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ “ayaṃ phasso, ayaṃ vedanā”ti evaṃ paññatti
analyzed: hoti itiādinā nayena vuttānam dhammānam ayam phassaḥ ayam vedanā ti evam paññatti

original: hoti. Tattha dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṃ atthe dhamme ca pavattamānāya tassā
analyzed: hoti tattha dhamma nirutta abhilāpe ñāṇan ti tasmin atthe dhamme ca pavattamānāya tassā

original: dhammaniruttiyā sabhāvapaññattiyā abhilāpe ñāṇaṃ. Abhilāpasaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
analyzed: dhamma niruttiyā sabhāva paññattiyā abhilāpe ñāṇam abhilāpa saddam ārammaṇam katvā

original: uppannañāṇameva idhāpi kathitaṃ. Yena ñāṇenāti yena paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāñāṇena.
analyzed: uppanna ñāṇam eva idha api kathitam yena ñāṇena ati yena paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā ñāṇena

original: Tāni ñāṇāni jānātīti itarāni tīṇi paṭisambhidāñāṇāni jānāti.
analyzed: tāni ñāṇāni jānāti iti itarāni tīṇi paṭisambhidā ñāṇāni jānāti

original: Idāni yathā yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tāni ñāṇāni jānāti, tathā tassa tesu pavattiṃ dassetuṃ imāni
analyzed: idāni yathā yam ñāṇam tāni ñāṇāni jānāti tathā tassa tesu pavattim dassetuṃ imāni

original: ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti vuttaṃ. Tattha idamatthajotakānīti imassa atthassa jotakāni
analyzed: ñāṇāni idam attha jotakāni iti vuttam tattha idam attha jotakāni iti imassa atthassa jotakāni

original: pakāsakāni; imaṃ nāma atthaṃ jotenti pakāsenti paricchindantīti attho. Iti ñāṇesu
analyzed: pakāsakāni imam nāma attham jotenti pakāsenti paricchindanti iti attho iti ñāṇesu

original: ñāṇanti iminā ākārena pavattaṃ tīsu ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā nāma.
analyzed: ñāṇanti iminā ākārena pavattam tīsu ñāṇesu ñāṇam paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā nāma

original: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā ‘imissā idaṃ kiccaṃ, imissā idaṃ kicca’nti
analyzed: tattha kiñca api ayam paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā imissā idam kiccam imissā idam kiccanti

original: itarāsaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ kiccaṃ jānāti, sayaṃ pana tāsaṃ kiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
analyzed: itarāsam paṭisambhidānam kiccam jānāti sayam pana tāsam kiccam kātum na sakkoti

original: bahussutadhammakathiko viya appassutadhammakathikassa. Dve kira bhikkhū. Eko bahussuto,
analyzed: bahussuta dhamma kathikaḥ viya appassuta dhamma kathikassa dve kira bhikkhū ekaḥ bahussutaḥ

original: eko appassuto. Te ekatova ekaṃ dhammakathāmaggaṃ uggaṇhiṃsu. Tattha appassuto sarasampanno
analyzed: ekaḥ appassutaḥ te ekatas va ekam dhamma kathā maggam uggaṇhiṃsu tattha appassutaḥ sara sampanno

original: ahosi, itaro mandassaro. Tesu appassuto gatagataṭṭhāne attano sarasampattiyā sakalaparisaṃ
analyzed: ahosi itaraḥ mandassaro tesu appassutaḥ gata gata ṭṭhāne attano sara sampattiyā sakala parisam

original: khobhetvā dhammaṃ kathesi. Dhammaṃ suṇamānā haṭṭhatuṭṭhamānasā hutvā – ‘yathā esa
analyzed: khobhetvā dhammam kathesi dhammam suṇamānā haṭṭha tuṭṭha mānasā hutvā yathā esa

original: dhammaṃ kathesi, eko tipiṭakadharo maññe bhavissatī’ti vadanti. Bahussutabhikkhu
analyzed: dhammam kathesi ekaḥ tipiṭaka dharaḥ maññe bhavissati iti vadanti bahu ssuta bhikkhu

original: pana – ‘dhammasavane jānissatha ayaṃ tipiṭakadharo vā no vā’ti āha. So kiñcāpi evamāha,
analyzed: pana dhammasavane jānissatha ayam tipiṭaka dharaḥ vā no vā iti āha saḥ kiñcā api evam āha

original: yathā pana sakalaparisaṃ khobhetvā dhammaṃ kathetuṃ sakkoti, evamassa kathanasamatthatā
analyzed: yathā pana sakala parisam khobhetvā dhammam kathetum sakkoti evam assa kathana samattha tā

original: natthi. Tattha kiñcāpi paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā, bahussuto viya appassutassa, itarāsaṃ
analyzed: natthi tattha kiñcā api paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā bahu ssutaḥ viya appassutassa itarāsam

original: kiccaṃ jānāti, sayaṃ pana taṃ kiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
analyzed: kiccam jānāti sayam pana tam kiccam kātum na sakkoti iti veditabbam sesam uttāna ttham eva

original: 746. Evaṃ kusalacittuppādādivasena paṭisambhidā vibhajitvā idāni tāsaṃ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
analyzed: evam kusala cittuppāda ādi vasena paṭisambhidāḥ vibhajitvā idāni tāsam uppatti ṭṭhāna bhūtam

original: khettaṃ dassetuṃ puna catasso paṭisambhidātiādimāha. Tattha tisso paṭisambhidā kāmāvacarakusalato
analyzed: khettam dassetum puna catasso paṭisambhidā ti ādim āha tattha tissaḥ paṭisambhidā kāmāvacara kusalato

original: catūsu ñāṇasampayuttesu cittuppādesūti idaṃ sekkhānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Tesañhipi dhammapaccavekkhaṇakāle
analyzed: catūsu ñāṇa sampayuttesu cittuppādesu iti idam sekkhānam vasena vuttam tesam hi pi dhamma paccavekkhaṇa kāle

original: heṭṭhā vuttaṃ pañcappakāraṃ dhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakusalacittesu
analyzed: heṭṭhā vuttam pañca ppakāram dhammam ārammaṇam katvā catūsu ñāṇa sampayutta kusala cittesu

original: dhammapaṭisambhidā uppajjati. Tathā niruttipaccavekkhaṇakāle saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
analyzed: dhamma paṭisambhidā uppajjati tathā nirutti paccavekkhaṇa kāle saddam ārammaṇam katvā

original: niruttipaṭisambhidā; ñāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle sabbatthakañāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
analyzed: nirutti paṭisambhidā ñāṇam paccavekkhaṇa kāle sabbatthaka ñāṇam ārammaṇam katvā paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā ti

original: Kiriyato catūsūti idaṃ pana asekkhānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Tesañhi dhammaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle
analyzed: kiriyato catūsu iti idam pana asekkhānam vasena vuttam tesam hi dhammam paccavekkhaṇa kāle

original: heṭṭhā vuttaṃ pañcappakāraṃ dhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittesu
analyzed: heṭṭhā vuttam pañca ppakāram dhammam ārammaṇam katvā catūsu ñāṇa sampayutta kiriya cittesu

original: dhammapaṭisambhidā uppajjati. Tathā niruttipaccavekkhaṇakāle saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
analyzed: dhamma paṭisambhidā uppajjati tathā nirutti paccavekkhaṇa kāle saddam ārammaṇam katvā

original: niruttipaṭisambhidā; ñāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle sabbatthakañāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
analyzed: nirutti paṭisambhidā ñāṇam paccavekkhaṇa kāle sabbatthaka ñāṇam ārammaṇam katvā paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā ti

original: Atthapaṭisambhidā etesu ceva uppajjatīti idaṃ pana sekkhāsekkhānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: attha paṭisambhidā etesu ca iva uppajjati iti idam pana sekkha asekkhānam vasena vuttam

original: Tathā hi sekkhānaṃ atthapaccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttappabhedaṃ atthaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tathā hi sekkhānam attha paccavekkhaṇa kāle heṭṭhā vutta ppabhedam attham ārammaṇam

original: katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakusalacittesu ayaṃ uppajjati, maggaphalakāle ca maggaphalesu.
analyzed: katvā catūsu ñāṇa sampayutta kusala cittesu ayam uppajjati magga phala kāle ca magga phalesu

original: Asekkhassa pana atthaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttappabhedameva atthaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: asekkhassa pana attham paccavekkhaṇa kāle heṭṭhā vutta ppabhedam eva attham ārammaṇam

original: katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittesu uppajjati, phalakāle ca uparime sāmaññaphaleti.
analyzed: katvā catūsu ñāṇa sampayutta kiriya cittesu uppajjati phala kāle ca uparime sāmañña phala iti

original: Evametā sekkhāsekkhānaṃ uppajjamānā imāsu bhūmīsu uppajjantīti bhūmidassanatthaṃ
analyzed: evam etā sekkhā sekkhānam uppajjamānāḥ imāsu bhūmīsu uppajjanti iti bhūmi dassana attham

original: ayaṃ nayo dassitoti.
analyzed: ayam nayaḥ dassito ti

original: Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: abhidhammabhājanīya vaṇṇanā

original: 3. Pañhāpucchakavaṇṇanā
analyzed: pañhāpucchaka vaṇṇanā

original: 747. Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo.
analyzed: pañhāpucchake pāḷi anusārena iva catunnam paṭisambhidānam kusala ādi bhāvaḥ veditabbo

original: Ārammaṇattikesu pana niruttipaṭisambhidā saddameva ārammaṇaṃ karotīti parittārammaṇā.
analyzed: ārammaṇa ttikesu pana nirutti paṭisambhidā saddam eva ārammaṇam karoti iti paritta ārammaṇā

original: Atthapaṭisambhidā kāmāvacaravipākakiriyasaṅkhātañceva paccayasamuppannañca atthaṃ
analyzed: attha paṭisambhidā kāmāvacara vipāka kiriya saṅkhātañca iva paccaya samuppannañca attham

original: paccavekkhantassa parittārammaṇā; vuttappabhedameva rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṃ atthaṃ
analyzed: paccavekkhantassa paritta ārammaṇāḥ vutta ppabhedam eva rūpāvacara arūpāvacaram attham

original: paccavekkhantassa mahaggatārammaṇā; lokuttaravipākatthañceva paramatthañca nibbānaṃ
analyzed: paccavekkhantassa mahaggata ārammaṇāḥ lokuttara vipāka tthañca iva paramatthañca nibbānaṃ

original: paccavekkhantassa appamāṇārammaṇā. Dhammapaṭisambhidā kāmāvacaraṃ kusaladhammaṃ akusaladhammaṃ
analyzed: paccavekkhantassa appamāṇa ārammaṇā dhamma paṭisambhidā kāmāvacaram kusala dhammaṃ akusala dhammaṃ

original: paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa parittārammaṇā; rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ
analyzed: paccaya dhammam ca paccavekkhantassa paritta ārammaṇāḥ rūpāvacara arūpāvacaram kusalam

original: dhammaṃ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa mahaggatārammaṇā; lokuttaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ
analyzed: dhammam paccaya dhammañca paccavekkhantassa mahaggata ārammaṇā lokuttaram kusalam dhammaṃ

original: paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa appamāṇārammaṇā. Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā kāmāvacarakusalavipākakiriyañāṇāni
analyzed: paccaya dhammañca paccavekkhantassa appamāṇa ārammaṇā paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā kāmāvacara kusala vipāka kiriya ñāṇāni

original: paccavekkhantassa parittārammaṇā; rūpāvacarārūpāvacarāni kusalavipākakiriyañāṇāni
analyzed: paccavekkhantassa paritta ārammaṇāḥ rūpāvacara arūpāvacarāni kusala vipāka kiriya ñāṇāni

original: paccavekkhantassa tesaṃ ārammaṇāni vijānantassa mahaggatārammaṇā; lokuttarāni kusalavipākañāṇāni
analyzed: paccavekkhantassa tesam ārammaṇāni vijānantassa mahaggata ārammaṇāḥ lokuttarāni kusala vipāka ñāṇāni

original: paccavekkhantassa appamāṇārammaṇā.
analyzed: paccavekkhantassa appamāṇa ārammaṇā

original: Atthapaṭisambhidā sahajātahetuvasena siyā maggahetukā, vīriyajeṭṭhikāya maggabhāvanāya
analyzed: attha paṭisambhidā sahajāta hetu vasena siyā magga hetukā vīriya jeṭṭhikāya magga bhāvanāya

original: siyā maggādhipati, chandacittajeṭṭhikāya navattabbā, phalakālepi navattabbā eva.
analyzed: siyā magga adhipati chanda citta jeṭṭhikāya na vattabbā phala kāle pi na vattabbā eva

original: Dhammapaṭisambhidā maggaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle maggārammaṇā, maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa
analyzed: dhamma paṭisambhidā maggam paccavekkhaṇa kāle magga ārammaṇā maggam garum katvā paccavekkhantassa

original: ārammaṇādhipativasena maggādhipati. Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā maggañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle
analyzed: ārammaṇa adhipati vasena magga adhipati paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā magga ñāṇam paccavekkhaṇa kāle

original: maggārammaṇā, maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa maggādhipati, sesañāṇaṃ pañcavekkhaṇakāle
analyzed: magga ārammaṇāḥ maggam garum katvā paccavekkhantassa magga adhipati sesa ñāṇam pañcavekkhaṇa kāle

original: navattabbārammaṇā. Niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannameva saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti paccuppannārammaṇā.
analyzed: navattabba ārammaṇā nirutti paṭisambhidā paccuppannam eva saddam ārammaṇam karoti iti paccuppanna ārammaṇā

original: Atthapaṭisambhidā atītaṃ vipākatthaṃ kiriyatthaṃ paccayasamuppannañca paccavekkhantassa
analyzed: attha paṭisambhidā atītam vipāka ttham kiriya ttham paccaya samuppannam ca paccavekkhantassa

original: atītārammaṇā, anāgataṃ paccavekkhantassa anāgatārammaṇā, paccuppannaṃ paccavekkhantassa
analyzed: atīta ārammaṇā anāgatam paccavekkhantassa anāgata ārammaṇā paccuppannam paccavekkhantassa

original: paccuppannārammaṇā, lokuttaraṃ paramatthaṃ paccavekkhantassa navattabbārammaṇā. Dhammapaṭisambhidā
analyzed: paccuppanna ārammaṇā lokuttaram paramattham paccavekkhantassa navattabba ārammaṇā dhamma paṭisambhidā

original: atītaṃ kusalaṃ akusalaṃ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa atītārammaṇā, anāgataṃ
analyzed: atītam kusalam akusalam paccaya dhammañca paccavekkhantassa atīta ārammaṇāḥ anāgatam

original: paccavekkhantassa anāgatārammaṇā, paccuppannaṃ paccavekkhantassa paccuppannārammaṇā.
analyzed: paccavekkhantassa anāgata ārammaṇā paccuppannam paccavekkhantassa paccuppanna ārammaṇā

original: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā atītaṃ kusalañāṇaṃ vipākañāṇaṃ kiriyañāṇañca paccavekkhantassa
analyzed: paṭibhāna paṭisambhidā atītam kusala ñāṇam vipāka ñāṇam kiriya ñāṇañca paccavekkhantassa

original: atītārammaṇā, anāgataṃ paccavekkhantassa anāgatārammaṇā, paccuppannaṃ paccavekkhantassa paccuppannārammaṇā.
analyzed: atīta ārammaṇā anāgatam paccavekkhantassa anāgata ārammaṇā paccuppannam paccavekkhantassa paccuppanna ārammaṇā

original: Niruttipaṭisambhidā saddārammaṇattā bahiddhārammaṇā. Itarāsu tīsu atthapaṭisambhidā
analyzed: nirutti paṭisambhidā sadda ārammaṇa ttā bahiddha ārammaṇā itarāsu tīsu attha paṭisambhidā

original: ajjhattaṃ vipākatthaṃ kiriyatthaṃ paccayasamuppannañca paccavekkhantassa ajjhattārammaṇā,
analyzed: ajjhattam vipāka ttham kiriya ttham paccaya samuppannam ca paccavekkhantassa ajjhatta ārammaṇā

original: bahiddhā paccavekkhantassa bahiddhārammaṇā, ajjhattabahiddhā paccavekkhantassa ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā,
analyzed: bahiddhā paccavekkhantassa bahiddha ārammaṇā ajjhatta bahiddhā paccavekkhantassa ajjhatta bahiddhā ārammaṇā

original: paramatthaṃ paccavekkhantassa bahiddhārammaṇā eva. Dhammapaṭisambhidā ajjhattaṃ kusalākusalaṃ

original: Idhāpi tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā; atthapaṭisambhidā lokiyalokuttarā. Imasmiñhi paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge

original: sammāsambuddhena tayopi nayā lokiyalokuttaramissakattā ekaparicchedāva kathitā. Tīsupi
analyzed: sammāsambuddhena tayaḥ api nayāḥ lokiya lokuttara missaka ttā eka paricchedā ava kathitā tīsu pi

original: 16. Ñāṇavibhaṅgo

original: 1. Ekakamātikādivaṇṇanā
751. Idāni tadanantare ñāṇavibhaṅge ekavidhena ñāṇavatthūtiādinā nayena paṭhamaṃ

original: Tattha ekavidhenāti ekappakārena, ekakoṭṭhāsena vā. Ñāṇavatthūti ettha pana ñāṇañca
analyzed: tattha ekavidhena ati eka ppakārena eka koṭṭhāsena vā ñāṇa vatthu iti ettha pana ñāṇam ca

original: taṃ vatthu ca nānappakārānaṃ sampattīnanti ñāṇavatthu; okāsaṭṭhena ñāṇassa vatthūtipi
analyzed: tam vatthu ca nānappakārānam sampattīnam ti ñāṇa vatthu okāsa ṭṭhena ñāṇassa vatthu uti pi

original: ñāṇavatthu. Idha pana purimenevatthena ñāṇavatthu veditabbaṃ. Teneva ekavidhaparicchedāvasāne
analyzed: ñāṇa vatthu idha pana purimena iva atthena ñāṇa vatthu veditabbam tena iva ekavidha pariccheda avasāne

original: cakkhuviññāṇādīni pañca. Na hetūtiādīni heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni pañca na hetu uti ādīni heṭṭhā dhamma saṅgaha ṭṭhakathā ayam vutta nayena iva

original: veditabbāni. Saṅkhepato panettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ niddesavāre āvi bhavissati. Yathā
analyzed: veditabbāni saṅkhepataḥ pana ittha yam vattabbam tam niddesavāre bhavissati yathā

original: cettha, evaṃ dukamātikādipadesupi yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ tattheva āvi bhavissati. Nikkhepaparicchedamattaṃ

original: panettha evaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ettha hi “na hetu ahetukā”tiādīhi tāva dhammasaṅgahamātikāvasena,

original: padehi ekakamātikā nikkhittā.
analyzed: padehi ekaka mātikā nikkhittā

original: Dukānurūpehi pana pañcatiṃsāya dukehi dukamātikā nikkhittā.
analyzed: duka anurūpehi pana pañcatiṃsāya dukehi duka mātikā nikkhittā

original: Tikānurūpehi “cintāmayā paññā”tiādīhi catūhi bāhirattikehi, “vipākā paññā”tiādīhi

original: vuttehi terasahi, tathā dutiyapadena, tatiyapadena niyamitapaññāvasena vuttehi dvādasahīti
analyzed: vuttehi terasahi tathā dutiya padena tatiya padena niyamita paññā vasena vuttehi dvādasahi iti

original: aṭṭhāsītiyā tikehi tikamātikā nikkhittā.
analyzed: aṭṭhāsītiyā tikehi tika mātikā nikkhittā

original: Catukkamātikā pana ‘kammassakatañāṇa’ntiādīhi ekavīsatiyā catukkehi, pañcakamātikā

analyzed: dasaka mātikā vaṇṇanā

original: tathāgatassa. Nārāyanasaṅkhātabalantipi idameva vuccati. Tadetaṃ pakatihatthīnaṃ

analyzed: ajjhattika vatthukā ti ajjhatta ajjhatta vasena vuttam tāni hi ajjhattike pañca pasāde

original: vatthuṃ katvā uppajjanti. Bāhirārammaṇāti bāhirarūpādiārammaṇā. Tattha catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ
analyzed: vatthum katvā uppajjanti bāhira ārammaṇā ati bāhira rūpa ādi ārammaṇā tattha catukkam veditabbam

original: – pañcaviññāṇā hi pasādavatthukattā ajjhattikā ajjhattikavatthukā, manoviññāṇaṃ hadayarūpaṃ
analyzed: pañca viññāṇāḥ hi pasāda vatthuka ttā ajjhattikāḥ ajjhattika vatthukāḥ manaḥ viññāṇam hadaya rūpam

original: vatthuṃ katvā uppajjanakāle ajjhattikaṃ bāhiravatthukaṃ, pañcaviññāṇasampayuttā tayo
analyzed: vatthum katvā uppajjana kāle ajjhattikam bāhira vatthukam pañca viññāṇa sampayuttā tayo

original: khandhā bāhirā ajjhattikavatthukā, manoviññāṇasampayuttā tayo khandhā hadayarūpaṃ
analyzed: khandhāḥ bāhirāḥ ajjhattika vatthukāḥ manaḥ viññāṇa sampayuttā tayo khandhāḥ hadaya rūpam

original: vatthuṃ katvā uppajjanakāle bāhirā bāhiravatthukā.
analyzed: vatthum katvā uppajjana kāle bāhirā bāhira vatthukā

original: Asambhinnavatthukāti aniruddhavatthukā. Na hi te niruddhaṃ atītaṃ vatthuṃ paṭicca uppajjanti. Asambhinnārammaṇatāyapi eseva nayo.
analyzed: asambhinna vatthukā ati aniruddha vatthukā na hi te niruddham atītam vatthum paṭicca uppajjanti esa eva nayo

original: Aññaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu ca ārammaṇañcātiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇassa hi aññaṃ vatthu,
analyzed: aññam cakkhu viññāṇassa vatthu ca ārammaṇam ca ati ādīsu cakkhu viññāṇassa hi aññam vatthu

original: aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Aññaṃ sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotapasādādīsu aññataraṃ
analyzed: aññam ārammaṇam aññam sota viññāṇa ādīnam cakkhu viññāṇam sota pasāda ādīsu aññataram

original: vatthuṃ, saddādīsu vā aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kappato kappaṃ gantvāpi na uppajjati;
analyzed: vatthum sadda ādīsu vā aññataram ārammaṇam katvā kappataḥ kappam gantvā api na uppajjati

original: cakkhupasādameva pana vatthuṃ katvā rūpañca ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati. Evamassa vatthupi
analyzed: cakkhu pasādam eva pana vatthum katvā rūpam ca ārammaṇam katvā uppajjati evam assa vatthu pi

original: dvārampi ārammaṇampi nibaddhaṃ, aññaṃ vatthuṃ vā dvāraṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ vā na saṅkamati,
analyzed: dvāram pi ārammaṇam pi nibaddham aññam vatthum vā dvāram vā ārammaṇam vā na saṅkamati

original: nibaddhavatthu nibaddhadvāraṃ nibaddhārammaṇameva hutvā uppajjati. Sotaviññāṇādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: nibaddha vatthu nibaddha dvāram nibaddha ārammaṇam eva hutvā uppajjati sota viññāṇa ādīsu pi esa iva nayo

original: 763. Na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhontīti ettha aññamaññassa cakkhu sotassa,
analyzed: na aññamaññassa gocara visayam paccanubhonti iti ettha aññamaññassa cakkhu sotassa

original: sotaṃ vā cakkhussāti evaṃ ekaṃ ekassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhotīti attho. Sace
analyzed: sotam vā cakkhussa ati evam ekam ekassa gocara visayam na paccanubhoti iti attho sace

original: hi nīlādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ samodhānetvā sotindriyassa upaneyya ‘iṅgha tāva naṃ
analyzed: hi nīla ādi bhedam rūpa ārammaṇam samodhānetvā sotindriyassa upaneyyaḥ tāva naṃ

original: vavatthāpehi vibhāvehi – kiṃ nāmetaṃ ārammaṇa’nti, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vināpi mukhena
analyzed: vavatthāpehi vibhāvehi kim nāma etam ārammaṇanti cakkhu viññāṇam vinā api mukhena

original: attano dhammatāya evaṃ vadeyya – ‘are andhabāla, vassasatampi vassasahassampi paridhāvamāno
analyzed: attanaḥ dhamma tāya evam vadeyya are andha bāla vassa satam pi vassa sahassam pi paridhāvamānaḥ

original: aññatra mayā kuhiṃ etassa jānanakaṃ labhissasi; āhara naṃ cakkhupasāde upanehi; ahametaṃ
analyzed: aññatra mayā kuhim etassa jānanakam labhissasi āhara nam cakkhu pasāde upanehi aham etam

original: ārammaṇaṃ jānissāmi – yadi vā nīlaṃ yadi vā pītakaṃ. Na hi eso aññassa visayo; mayhameveso
analyzed: ārammaṇam jānissāmi yadi vā nīlam yadi vā pītakam na hi esaḥ aññassa visayaḥ mayham eva iso

original: visayo’ti. Sesaviññāṇesupi eseva nayo. Evamete aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhonti nāma.
analyzed: visayo ti sesa viññāṇesu pi esa iva nayaḥ evam ete aññam aññassa gocara visayam na paccanubhonti nāma

original: 764. Samannāharantassāti āvajjaneneva samannāharantassa.
analyzed: samannāharantassa ati āvajjanena iva samannāharantassa

original: Manasikarontassāti āvajjaneneva manasikarontassa. Etāni hi cittāni āvajjanena samannāhaṭakāle manasikatakāleyeva ca uppajjanti.
analyzed: manasikarontassa ati āvajjanena iva manasikarontassa etāni hi cittāni āvajjanena ca uppajjanti

original: Na abbokiṇṇāti aññena viññāṇena abbokiṇṇā nirantarāva nuppajjanti. Etena tesaṃ anantaratā paṭikkhittā.
analyzed: na abbokiṇṇā ati aññena viññāṇena abbokiṇṇāḥ nirantarāḥ ava nuppajjanti etena tesam anantara tā paṭikkhittā

original: 765. Na apubbaṃ acarimanti etena sabbesampi sahuppatti paṭikkhittā. Na aññamaññassa samanantarāti etena samanantaratā paṭikkhittā.
analyzed: na apubbam acariman ti etena sabbesam pi sahuppatti paṭikkhittā na aññamaññassa samanantarā ti etena samanantara tā paṭikkhittā

original: 766. Āvaṭṭanā vātiādīni cattāripi āvajjanasseva nāmāni. Tañhi bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭanato
analyzed: āvaṭṭanā vāti ādīni cattāri pi āvajjanassa iva nāmāni tat hi bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭanato

original: āvaṭṭanā, tasseva ābhujanato ābhogo, rūpādīnaṃ samannāharaṇato samannāhāro, tesaṃyeva
analyzed: āvaṭṭanā tassa iva ābhujanataḥ ābhogaḥ rūpa ādīnam samannāharaṇataḥ samannāhāraḥ tesam yeva

original: manasikaraṇato manasikāroti vuccati. Evamettha saṅkhepato pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ āvajjanaṭṭhāne
analyzed: manasikaraṇataḥ manasikāraḥ ti vuccati evam ettha saṅkhepato pañcannam viññāṇānaṃ āvajjana ṭṭhāne

original: ṭhatvā āvajjanādikiccaṃ kātuṃ samatthabhāvo paṭikkhitto.
analyzed: ṭhatvā āvajjana ādi kiccam kātum samattha bhāvaḥ paṭikkhittaḥ

original: Na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātīti “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ekampi kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na paṭivijānāti.
analyzed: na kañci dhammam paṭivijānāti iti manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti evam vuttam ekam pi kusalam vā akusalam vā na paṭivijānāti

original: Aññatra abhinipātamattāti ṭhapetvā rūpādīnaṃ abhinipātamattaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
analyzed: aññatra abhinipāta mattā ati ṭhapetvā rūpa ādīnam abhinipāta mattam idam vuttam hoti

original: supaṇḍitopi puriso, ṭhapetvā āpāthagatāni rūpādīni, aññaṃ kusalākusalesu ekadhammampi
analyzed: su paṇḍitaḥ api purisaḥ ṭhapetvā āpātha gatāni rūpa ādīni aññam kusala akusalesu eka dhammam pi

original: pañcahi viññāṇehi na paṭivijānāti. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ panettha dassanamattameva hoti.
analyzed: pañcahi viññāṇehi na paṭivijānāti cakkhu viññāṇam pana ittha dassana mattam eva hoti

original: Sotaviññāṇādīni savanaghāyanasāyanaphusanamattāneva. Dassanādimattato pana muttā
analyzed: sota viññāṇa ādīni dassana ādi mattataḥ pana muttā

original: aññā etesaṃ kusalādipaṭiviññatti nāma natthi.
analyzed: aññā etesam kusala ādi paṭiviññatti nāma natthi

original: Manodhātuyāpīti sampaṭicchanamanodhātuyāpi. Sampiṇḍanattho cettha pikāro. Tasmā manodhātuyāpi
analyzed: manaḥ dhātuyā api iti sampaṭicchana manaḥ dhātuyā api sampiṇḍana attho ca ittha pikāro tasmā manaḥ dhātuyā api

original: tato parāhi manoviññāṇadhātūhipīti sabbehipi pañcadvārikaviññāṇehi na kañci kusalākusalaṃ
analyzed: tatas manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūhi pi iti sabbehi pi pañcadvārika viññāṇehi na kañci kusala akusalam

original: dhammaṃ paṭivijānātīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: dhammam paṭivijānāti iti evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Na kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappetītiādīsupi eseva nayo. Na hi pañcadvārikaviññāṇehi gamanādīsu
analyzed: na kañci iriyāpatham kappeti itiādīsu pi esā iva nayaḥ na hi pañca dvārika viññāṇehi gamana ādīsu

original: kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappeti, na kāyakammaṃ na vacīkammaṃ paṭṭhapeti, na kusalākusalaṃ
analyzed: kañci iriyāpatham kappeti na kāya kammam na vacī kammam paṭṭhapeti na kusala akusalam

original: dhammaṃ samādiyati, na samādhiṃ samāpajjati lokiyaṃ vā lokuttaraṃ vā, na samādhito
analyzed: dhammam samādiyati na samādhim samāpajjati lokiyam vā lokuttaram vā na samādhito

original: vuṭṭhāti lokiyā vā lokuttarā vā, na bhavato cavati, na bhavantare upapajjati. Sabbampi
analyzed: vuṭṭhāti lokiyā vā lokuttarā vā na bhavataḥ cavati na bhavantare upapajjati sabbam pi

original: hetaṃ kusalākusaladhammapaṭivijānanādivacanapariyosānaṃ kiccaṃ manodvārikacitteneva
analyzed: kusala akusala dhamma paṭivijānana ādi vacana pariyosānam kiccam manodvārika cittena iva

original: hoti, na pañcadvārikenāti sabbassāpetassa kiccassa karaṇe sahajavanakāni vīthicittāni
analyzed: hoti na pañcadvārikena ati sabbassa apetassa kiccassa karaṇe sahaja vanakāni vīthi cittāni

original: paṭikkhittāni. Yathā cetesaṃ etāni kiccāni natthi, evaṃ niyāmokkamanādīnipi. Na hi
analyzed: paṭikkhittāni yathā ca etesam etāni kiccāni natthi evam niyāma ukkamana ādīni pi na hi

original: pañcadvārikajavanena micchattaniyāmaṃ okkamati, na sammattaniyāmaṃ; na cetaṃ javanaṃ
analyzed: pañcadvārika javanena micchatta niyāmam okkamati na sammatta niyāmam na ca itam javanam

original: nāmagottamārabbha javati, na kasiṇādipaṇṇattiṃ; na lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena
analyzed: nāma gottam ārabbha na kasiṇa ādi paṇṇattim na lakkhaṇa ārammaṇika vipassanā vasena

original: pavattati, na vuṭṭhānagāminībalavavipassanāvasena; na rūpārūpadhamme ārabbha javati,
analyzed: pavattati na vuṭṭhāna gāminī balava vipassanā vasena na rūpa arūpa dhamme ārabbha javati

original: na nibbānaṃ; na cetena saddhiṃ paṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ uppajjati, na abhiññāñāṇaṃ, na sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ,
analyzed: na nibbānam na ca etena saddhim paṭisambhidā ñāṇam uppajjati na abhiññā ñāṇam na sāvaka pāramī ñāṇam

original: na paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ, na sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Sabbopi panesa pabhedo manodvārikajavaneyeva labbhati.
analyzed: na pacceka bodhi ñāṇam na sabbaññuta ñāṇam sabbaḥ api pana esa pabhedaḥ manodvārika javaneya iva labbhati

original: Na supati na paṭibujjhati na supinaṃ passatīti sabbenāpi ca pañcadvārikacittena neva
analyzed: na supati na paṭibujjhati na supinam passati iti sabbena api ca pañca dvārika cittena na eva

original: niddaṃ okkamati, na niddāyati, na paṭibujjhati, na kiñca supinaṃ passatīti imesu
analyzed: niddam okkamati na niddāyati na paṭibujjhati na kiñca supinam passati iti imesu

original: tīsu ṭhānesu saha javanena vīthicittaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ.
analyzed: tīsu ṭhānesu saha javanena vīthi cittam paṭikkhittaṃ

original: Niddāyantassa hi mahāvaṭṭiṃ jāletvā dīpe cakkhusamīpe upanīte paṭhamaṃ cakkhudvārikaṃ
analyzed: niddāyantassa hi mahā vaṭṭim jāletvā dīpe cakkhu samīpe upanīte paṭhamam cakkhudvārikam

original: āvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ na āvaṭṭeti, manodvārikameva āvaṭṭeti. Atha javanaṃ javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ
analyzed: āvajjanam bhavaṅgam naḥ āvaṭṭeti manodvārikam eva āvaṭṭeti atha javanam javitvā bhavaṅgam

original: otarati. Dutiyavāre cakkhudvārikaṃ āvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti. Tato cakkhuviññāṇādīni
analyzed: otarati dutiya vāre cakkhu dvārikam āvajjanam bhavaṅgam āvaṭṭeti tatas cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni

original: javanapariyosānāni pavattanti. Tadanantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ pavattati. Tatiyavāre manodvārikaāvajjanena
analyzed: javana pariyosānāni pavattanti tad anantaram bhavaṅgam pavattati tatiya vāre manodvārika āvajjanena

original: bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite manodvārikajavanaṃ javati. Tena cittena ñatvā ‘kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ
analyzed: bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite manodvārika javanam javati tena cittena ñatvā kim ayam imasmin

original: ṭhāne āloko’ti jānāti.
analyzed: ṭhāne jānāti

original: Tathā niddāyantassa kaṇṇasamīpe tūriyesu paggahitesu, ghānasamīpe sugandhesu vā duggandhesu
analyzed: tathā niddāyantassa kaṇṇa samīpe tūriyesu paggahitesu ghāna samīpe sugandhesu vā duggandhesu

original: vā pupphesu upanītesu, mukhe sappimhi vā phāṇite vā pakkhitte, piṭṭhiyaṃ pāṇinā pahāre
analyzed: vā pupphesu upanītesu mukhe sappimhi vā phāṇite vā pakkhitte piṭṭhiyam pāṇinā pahāre

original: dinne paṭhamaṃ sotadvārikādīni āvajjanāni bhavaṅgaṃ na āvaṭṭenti, manodvārikameva
analyzed: dinne paṭhamam sotadvārika ādīni āvajjanāni bhavaṅgam na āvaṭṭenti manodvārikam eva

original: āvaṭṭeti. Atha javanaṃ javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. Dutiyavāre sotadvārikādīni āvajjanāni
analyzed: āvaṭṭeti atha javanam javitvā bhavaṅgam otarati dutiya vāre sotadvārikā ādīni āvajjanāni

original: bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭenti. Tato sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇādīni javanapariyosānāni pavattanti.
analyzed: bhavaṅgam āvaṭṭenti tatas sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇa ādīni javana pariyosānāni pavattanti

original: Tadanantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ pavattati. Tatiyavāre manodvārikaāvajjanena bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite
analyzed: tad anantaram bhavaṅgam pavattati tatiya vāre manodvārika āvajjanena bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite

original: manodvārikajavanaṃ javati. Tena cittena ñatvā ‘kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne saddo – saṅkhasaddo,
analyzed: manaḥ dvārika javanam javati tena cittena ñatvā kim ayam imasmin ṭhāne saddo saṅkha saddo

original: bherisaddo’ti vā ‘kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne gandho – mūlagandho, sāragandho’ti vā ‘kiṃ
analyzed: bheri saddo ti vā kim ayam imasmin ṭhāne gandhaḥ mūla gandho sāra gandho ti vā kim

original: idaṃ mayhaṃ mukhe pakkhittarasaṃ – sappīti vā phāṇita’nti vā ‘kenamhi piṭṭhiyaṃ pahato,
analyzed: idam mayham mukhe pakkhitta rasam sappi iti vā phāṇitanti vā kenamhi piṭṭhiyam pahato

original: atithaddho me pahāro’ti vā vattāro honti. Evaṃ manodvārikajavaneneva paṭibujjhati,
analyzed: atithaddhaḥ me pahāraḥ iti vā vattāraḥ honti evam manodvārika javanena iva paṭibujjhati

original: na pañcadvārikena. Supinampi teneva passati, na pañcadvārikena.
analyzed: na pañcadvārikena supinam pi tena eva passati na pañcadvārikena

original: Tañca panetaṃ supinaṃ passanto catūhi kāraṇehi passati – dhātukkhobhato vā anubhūtapubbato
analyzed: tat ca pana itam supinam passantaḥ catūhi kāraṇehi passati dhātu kkhobhataḥ vā anubhūta pubbataḥ

original: vā devatopasaṃhārato vā pubbanimittato vāti. Tattha pittādīnaṃ khobhakaraṇapaccayayogena
analyzed: vā devatā upasaṃhārataḥ vā pubba nimittataḥ vā ati tattha pitta ādīnam khobha karaṇa paccaya yogena

original: khubhitadhātuko ‘dhātukkhobhato’ supinaṃ passati. Passanto ca nānāvidhaṃ supinaṃ
analyzed: khubhita dhātukaḥ dhātu khobhataḥ supinam passati passantaḥ ca nānāvidham supinam

original: passati – pabbatā patanto viya, ākāsena gacchanto viya, vāḷamigahatthicorādīhi anubaddho
analyzed: passati pabbatā patantaḥ viya ākāsena gacchantaḥ viya vāḷami gahatthi cora ādīhi anubaddhaḥ

original: viya ca hoti. ‘Anubhūtapubbato’ passanto pubbe anubhūtapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ passati.
analyzed: viya ca hoti anubhūta pubbataḥ passantaḥ pubbe anubhūta pubbam ārammaṇam passati

original: ‘Devatopasaṃhārato’ passantassa devatā atthakāmatāya vā anatthakāmatāya vā atthāya
analyzed: devatā upasaṃhārataḥ passantassa devatāḥ attha kāma tāya vā anattha kāma tāya vā atthāya

original: vā anatthāya vā nānāvidhāni ārammaṇāni upasaṃharanti. So tāsaṃ devatānaṃ ānubhāvena
analyzed: vā anatthāya vā nānāvidhāni ārammaṇāni upasaṃharanti saḥ tāsam devatānam ānubhāvena

original: tāni ārammaṇāni passati. Pubbanimittato passanto puññāpuññavasena uppajjitukāmassa
analyzed: tāni ārammaṇāni passati pubba nimittataḥ passanto puñña apuñña vasena uppajjitu kāmassa

original: atthassa vā anatthassa vā pubbanimittabhūtaṃ supinaṃ passati bodhisattamātā viya
analyzed: atthassa vā anatthassa vā pubba nimitta bhūtam supinam passati bodhisatta mātā viya

original: puttapaṭilābhanimittaṃ, bodhisatto viya pañca mahāsupine, kosalarājā viya ca soḷasa supineti.
analyzed: putta paṭilābha nimittam bodhisatto viya pañca mahā supine kosala rājā viya ca soḷasa supina iti

original: Tattha yaṃ dhātukkhobhato anubhūtapubbato ca supinaṃ passati, na taṃ saccaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tattha yam dhātu khobhataḥ anubhūta pubbataḥ ca supinam passati na tat saccam hoti

original: Yaṃ devatopasaṃhārato passati, taṃ saccaṃ vā hoti alikaṃ vā. Kuddhā hi devatā upāyena
analyzed: yam devatā upasaṃhārataḥ passati tam saccam vā hoti alikam vā kuddhāḥ hi devatāḥ upāyena

original: vināsetukāmā viparītampi katvā dassenti. Tatridaṃ vatthu – rohaṇe kira nāgamahāvihāre

original: Saccānulomikaṃ vāti vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Tañhi catunnaṃ saccānaṃ anulomanato saccānulomikanti
analyzed: sacca ānulomikam vāti vipassanā ñāṇam tat hi catunnam saccānam anulomanato sacca ānulomikan ti

original: vuccati. Idānissa pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ rūpaṃ aniccanti vātiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca
analyzed: vuccati idānissa pavattana ākāram dassetum rūpam aniccanti vā tiādi vuttam ettha ca

original: aniccalakkhaṇameva āgataṃ, na dukkhalakkhaṇaanattalakkhaṇāni, atthavasena pana āgatānevāti
analyzed: anicca lakkhaṇam eva āgatam na dukkha lakkhaṇa anatta lakkhaṇāni attha vasena pana āgatān eva ati

original: daṭṭhabbāni – yañhi aniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattāti.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbāni yat hi aniccam tat dukkham yat dukkham tat anattā ti

original: Yaṃ evarūpinti yaṃ evaṃ heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ anulomikaṃ. Khantintiādīni sabbāni
analyzed: yam evarūpin ti yam evam heṭṭhā niddiṭṭha sabhāvam anulomikam sabbāni

original: paññāvevacanāneva. Sā hi heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ kammāyatanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ kāraṇānaṃ apaccanīkadassanena
analyzed: sā hi heṭṭhā vuttānam kamma āyatana ādīnam pañcannam kāraṇānam apaccanīka dassanena

original: anulometīti anulomikā. Tathā sattānaṃ hitacariyāya anulometi, maggasaccassa anulometi,
analyzed: anulomā iti iti anulomikā tathā sattānam hita cariyāya anulomā iti magga saccassa anulomā iti

original: paramatthasaccassa nibbānassa anulomanato anulometītipi anulomikā. Sabbānipi etāni
analyzed: paramattha saccassa nibbānassa anulomanataḥ anulomā iti iti pi anulomikā sabbāni pi etāni

original: kāraṇāni khamati sahati daṭṭhuṃ sakkotīti khanti, passatīti diṭṭhi, rocetīti ruci,
analyzed: kāraṇāni khamati sahati daṭṭhum sakkoti iti khanti passati iti diṭṭhi roceti iti ruci

original: mudatīti mudi, pekkhatīti pekkhā. Sabbepissā te kammāyatanādayo dhammā nijjhānaṃ
analyzed: mudati iti mudi pekkhati iti pekkhā sabbe pi issā te kamma āyatana ādayaḥ dhammāḥ nijjhānam

original: khamanti, visesato ca pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātā dhammā punappunaṃ aniccadukkhānattavasena
analyzed: khamanti visesato ca pañca kkhandha saṅkhātāḥ dhammāḥ punappunam anicca dukkha anatta vasena

original: nijjhāyamānā taṃ nijjhānaṃ khamantīti dhammanijjhānakhantī.
analyzed: nijjhāyamānā tam nijjhānam khamanti iti dhamma nijjhāna khantī

original: Parato assutvā paṭilabhatīti aññassa upadesavacanaṃ assutvā sayameva cintento paṭilabhati.
analyzed: paratas a sutvā paṭilabhati iti aññassa upadesa vacanam a sutvā sayam eva cintentaḥ paṭilabhati

original: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ cintāmayā paññā nāma vuccati. Sā panesā na yesaṃ kesañci uppajjati,
analyzed: ayam vuccati iti ayam cintā mayā paññā nāma vuccati sā pana esā na yesam kesañci uppajjati

analyzed: bodhisattānam uppajjati sesa paññā sabbesam pi pūrita pāramīnam mahā paññānam uppajjati iti veditabbā

original: Parato sutvā paṭilabhatīti ettha kammāyatanādīni parena kariyamānāni vā katāni vā

original: paṭiladdhā sabbā parato sutvāyeva paṭiladdhā nāmāti veditabbā.
analyzed: paṭiladdhā sabbā paratas sutvāya iva paṭiladdhā nāma ati veditabbā

original: Samāpannassāti samāpattisamaṅgissa; antosamāpattiyaṃ pavattā paññā bhāvanāmayā nāmāti attho.
analyzed: samāpannassa ati samāpatti samaṅgissa antosamāpattiyam pavattā paññā bhāvanā mayā nāma ati attho

analyzed: dānam ārabbha ati dānam paṭicca dāna cetanā paccayā ati atthaḥ dāna adhigacchā ati dānam

analyzed: adhigacchantassa pāpuṇantassa ati atthaḥ yā uppajjati iti yā evam dāna cetanā sampayuttā

original: paññā uppajjati, ayaṃ dānamayā paññā nāma. Sā panesā ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cintentassa,
analyzed: paññā uppajjati ayam dāna mayā paññā nāma sā pana esā dānam dassāmi iti cintentassa

original: tividhena uppajjati.
analyzed: tividhena uppajjati

original: Sīlaṃ ārabbha sīlādhigacchāti idhāpi sīlacetanāsampayuttāva sīlamayā paññāti adhippetā.

original: pubbacetanā, muñcacetanā, aparacetanāti tividheneva uppajjati. Bhāvanāmayā heṭṭhā vuttāyeva.
analyzed: pubba cetanā muñca cetanā apara cetanā ati tividhena iva uppajjati bhāvanā mayā heṭṭhā vuttāya iva

original: 770. Adhisīlapaññādīsu sīlādīni duvidhena veditabbāni – sīlaṃ, adhisīlaṃ; cittaṃ,

original: adhicittaṃ; paññā, adhipaññāti. Tattha “uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ

analyzed: sā dhātu dhamma ṭṭhita tā dhamma niyāma tā ati imāya tantiyā saṅgahita vasena

original: sīlāni dasapi sīlāni sīlaṃ nāma. Tañhi tathāgate uppannepi anuppannepi hoti. Anuppanne
analyzed: sīlāni dasa api sīlāni sīlam nāma tat hi tathāgate uppanne pi anuppanne pi hoti anuppanne

analyzed: ke paññāpenti iti tāpasa paribbājakā sabbaññu bodhisattā cakkavatti rājāno ca paññāpenti

original: Uppanne sammāsambuddhe bhikkhusaṅgho, bhikkhunīsaṅgho, upāsakā, upāsikāyo ca paññāpenti.
analyzed: uppanne sammāsambuddhe bhikkhu saṅghaḥ bhikkhunī saṅghaḥ upāsakāḥ upāsikāyo ca paññāpenti

original: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ pana sabbasīlehi adhikaṃ uppanneyeva tathāgate uppajjati,
analyzed: pātimokkha saṃvara sīlam pana sabba sīlehi adhikam uppanne iya iva tathāgate uppajjati

original: no anuppanne. Sabbaññubuddhāyeva ca naṃ paññāpenti. “Imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ vītikkame

original: idaṃ nāma hotī”ti paññāpanañhi aññesaṃ avisayo, buddhānaṃyeva esa visayo, buddhānaṃ

analyzed: balam iti yasmai pātimokkha saṃvaraḥ adhisīlam tasmai tam adhisīla paññam dassetum pātimokkha saṃvaraṃ

original: saṃvarantassātiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: saṃvarantassa atiādi vuttam

original: Heṭṭhā vuttāya eva pana tantiyā saṅgahitavasena vaṭṭapādikā aṭṭha samāpattiyo cittaṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhā vuttāya eva pana tantiyā saṅgahita vasena vaṭṭa pādikāḥ aṭṭha samāpattiyaḥ cittam

analyzed: nāma tat hi tathāgate uppanne pi hoti an uppanne pi an uppanne ke nibbattenti iti tāpasa paribbājakāḥ

analyzed: samāpajjantassa atiādi vuttam

original: Heṭṭhā vuttāya eva pana tantiyā saṅgahitavasena kammassakatañāṇaṃ paññā nāma. Tañhi
analyzed: heṭṭhā vuttāya eva pana tantiyā saṅgahita vasena kammassakata ñāṇam paññā nāma tat hi

original: tathāgate uppannepi hoti anuppannepi. Anuppanne velāmadānavessantaradānādivasena

analyzed: uppajjati uppanne tena ñāṇena mahādānam pavattentānam pamāṇam natthi magga phala paññā

original: 771. Āyakosallādiniddese yasmā āyoti vuḍḍhi, sā anatthahānito atthuppattito ca duvidhā;

original: – idaṃ apāyakosallaṃ nāmāti attho. Āyakosallaṃ tāva paññā hotu; apāyakosallaṃ kathaṃ

analyzed: veditabbam sesam sabbattha uttāna attham eva ati

original: Tikaniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: tika niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: (4.) Catukkaniddesavaṇṇanā
793. Catubbidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese atthi dinnantiādīsu dinnapaccayā phalaṃ atthīti
analyzed: catubbidhena ñāṇa vatthu niddese atthi dinna nti ādīsu dinna paccayā phalam atthi iti

analyzed: bahum dānam datvā āpe nibbānam pattānam gaṇana pathaḥ natthi ṭhapetvā sacca ānulomikam

original: ñāṇanti maggasaccassa paramatthasaccassa ca anulomanato saccānulomikanti laddhanāmaṃ
analyzed: ñāṇanti magga saccassa paramattha saccassa ca anulomanato sacca ānulomikanti laddha nāmaṃ

original: vipassanāñāṇaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā sabbāpi sāsavā kusalā paññā kammassakatañāṇamevāti attho.
analyzed: vipassanā ñāṇam ṭhapetvā avasesā sabbā api sa āsavā kusalā paññā kammassakata ñāṇam eva ti attho

original: 794. Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇanti ettha ekameva maggañāṇaṃ catūsu saccesu ekapaṭivedhavasena catūsu ṭhānesu saṅgahitaṃ.
analyzed: magga samaṅgissa ñāṇam dukkhe petam ñāṇam ti ettha ekam eva magga ñāṇam catūsu saccesu eka paṭivedha vasena catūsu ṭhānesu saṅgahitam

original: 796. Dhamme ñāṇanti ettha maggapaññā tāva catunnaṃ saccānaṃ ekapaṭivedhavasena dhamme
analyzed: dhamme ñāṇam ti ettha magga paññā tāva catunnam saccānam eka paṭivedha vasena dhamme

original: ñāṇaṃ nāma hotu; phalapaññā kathaṃ dhamme ñāṇaṃ nāmāti? Nirodhasaccavasena. Duvidhāpi
analyzed: ñāṇam nāma hotu phala paññā katham dhamme ñāṇam nāma ati nirodha sacca vasena duvidhā api

original: hesā paññā aparappaccaye atthapaccakkhe ariyasaccadhamme kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca
analyzed: he sā paññā apara ppaccaye attha paccakkhe ariya sacca dhamme kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca

original: pavattattā dhamme ñāṇanti veditabbā. So iminā dhammenāti ettha maggañāṇaṃ dhammagocarattā
analyzed: pavatta ttā dhamme ñāṇan ti veditabbā saḥ iminā dhammena ati ettha magga ñāṇam dhamma gocara ttā

original: gocaravohārena dhammoti vuttaṃ, upayogatthe vā karaṇavacanaṃ; imaṃ dhammaṃ ñātenāti
analyzed: gocara vohārena dhammo ti vuttam upayoga atthe vā karaṇa vacanam imam dhammam ñātena ati

original: attho; catusaccadhammaṃ jānitvā ṭhitena maggañāṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Diṭṭhenāti dassanena;
analyzed: attho catu sacca dhammam jānitvā ṭhitena magga ñāṇena ati vuttam hoti diṭṭhena ati dassanena

original: dhammaṃ passitvā ṭhitenāti attho. Pattenāti cattāri ariyasaccāni patvā ṭhitattā dhammaṃ
analyzed: dhammaṃ passitvā ṭhitena ati atthaḥ pattena ati cattāri ariya saccāni patvā ṭhita ttā dhammaṃ

original: pattena. Viditenāti maggañāṇena cattāri ariyasaccāni viditāni pākaṭāni katāni. Tasmā
analyzed: pattena viditena ati magga ñāṇena cattāri ariya saccāni viditāni pākaṭāni katāni tasmā

original: taṃ dhammaṃ viditaṃ nāma hoti. Tena viditadhammena. Pariyogāḷhenāti catusaccadhammaṃ
analyzed: tam dhammam viditam nāma hoti tena vidita dhammena pariyogāḷhena ati catu sacca dhammaṃ

original: pariyogāhetvā ṭhitena. Nayaṃ netīti atīte ca anāgate ca nayaṃ neti harati peseti.
analyzed: pariyogāhetvā ṭhitena nayam neti iti atīte ca anāgate ca nayam neti harati peseti

original: Idaṃ pana na maggañāṇassa kiccaṃ, paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa kiccaṃ. Satthārā pana maggañāṇaṃ
analyzed: idam pana na magga ñāṇassa kiccam paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇassa kiccam satthārā pana magga ñāṇam

original: atītānāgate nayaṃ nayanasadisaṃ kataṃ. Kasmā? Maggamūlakattā. Bhāvitamaggassa hi
analyzed: atīta anāgate nayam nayana sadisam katam kasmā magga mūlaka ttā bhāvita maggassa hi

original: paccavekkhaṇā nāma hoti. Tasmā satthā maggañāṇameva nayaṃ nayanasadisaṃ akāsi. Apica
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇā nāma hoti tasmā satthā magga ñāṇam eva nayam nayana sadisam akāsi apica

original: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo – yadetaṃ iminā catusaccagocaraṃ maggañāṇaṃ adhigataṃ,
analyzed: evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ yat etam iminā catu sacca gocaram magga ñāṇam adhigatam

original: tena ñāṇena kāraṇabhūtena atītānāgate paccavekkhaṇañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ nayaṃ neti.
analyzed: tena ñāṇena kāraṇa bhūtena atīta anāgate paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇa saṅkhātam nayam neti

original: Idāni yathā tena nayaṃ neti, taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ ye hi keci atītamaddhānantiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni yathā tena nayam neti tam ākāram dassetum ye hi keci atītam addhā ananti ādim āha

original: Tattha abbhaññaṃsūti jāniṃsu paṭivijjhiṃsu. Imaññevāti yaṃ dukkhaṃ atīte abbhaññaṃsu,
analyzed: tattha abbhaññaṃsu iti jāniṃsu paṭivijjhiṃsu imaññeva ati yam dukkham atīte abbhaññaṃsu

original: yañca anāgate abhijānissanti, na taññeva imaṃ; sarikkhaṭṭhena pana evaṃ vuttaṃ. Atītepi
analyzed: yat ca anāgate abhijānissanti na tañca eva imam sarikkhaṭṭhena pana evam vuttam atīte pi

original: hi ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmakakkhandheyeva dukkhasaccanti paṭivijjhiṃsu, taṇhaṃyeva
analyzed: hi ṭhapetvā taṇham tebhūmaka khandheya iva dukkha saccanti paṭivijjhiṃsu taṇham yeva

original: samudayasaccanti nibbānameva nirodhasaccanti ariyamaggameva maggasaccanti paṭivijjhiṃsu,
analyzed: samudaya saccanti nibbānam eva nirodha saccanti ariyamaggam eva magga saccanti paṭivijjhiṃsu

original: anāgatepi evameva paṭivijjhissanti, etarahipi evameva paṭivijjhantīti sarikkhaṭṭhena
analyzed: anāgate pi evam eva paṭivijjhissanti etarahi pi evam eva paṭivijjhanti iti sa rikkhaṭṭhena

original: “imaññevā”ti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuccati anvaye ñāṇanti idaṃ anugamanañāṇaṃ nayanañāṇaṃ
analyzed: imaññeva iti vuttam idam vuccati anvaye ñāṇam ti idam anugamana ñāṇam nayana ñāṇam

original: kāraṇañāṇanti vuccati.
analyzed: kāraṇa ñāṇam ti vuccati

original: Pariye ñāṇanti cittaparicchedañāṇaṃ. Parasattānanti ṭhapetvā attānaṃ sesasattānaṃ.
analyzed: pariye ñāṇanti citta pariccheda ñāṇam para sattānam ti ṭhapetvā attānam sesa sattānam

original: Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Cetasā ceto paricca pajānātīti attano cittena tesaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: itaram tassa iva vevacanam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāti iti attanaḥ cittena tesam cittam

original: sarāgādivasena paricchinditvā nānappakārato jānāti. Sarāgaṃ vātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
analyzed: sa rāga ādi vasena paricchinditvā nānā pakārataḥ jānāti sa rāgam vā ati ādīsu yam vattabbam

original: taṃ heṭṭhā satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge vuttameva. Ayaṃ pana viseso – idha anuttaraṃ vā cittaṃ
analyzed: tat heṭṭhā sati paṭṭhāna vibhaṅge vuttam eva ayam pana visesaḥ idha anuttaram vā cittam

original: vimuttaṃ vā cittanti ettha lokuttarampi labbhati. Avipassanūpagampi hi paracittañāṇassa visayo hotiyeva.
analyzed: vimuttam vā cittanti ettha lokuttaram pi labbhati a vipassanā upagam pi hi para citta ñāṇassa visayaḥ

original: Avasesā paññāti dhamme ñāṇādikā tisso paññā ṭhapetvā sesā sabbāpi paññā ñāṇanti sammatattā sammutiñāṇaṃ nāma hoti. Vacanattho panettha sammutimhi ñāṇanti sammutiñāṇaṃ.
analyzed: avasesā paññā ti dhamme ñāṇa ādikā tissaḥ paññāḥ ṭhapetvā sesā sabbā api paññā ñāṇanti sammata ttā sammutiñāṇam nāma hoti vacana atthaḥ pana ittha sammutimhi ñāṇanti sammutiñāṇam

original: 797. Kāmāvacarakusale paññāti ayañhi ekantena vaṭṭasmiṃ cutipaṭisandhiṃ ācinateva,
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusale paññā ati ayam hi ekantena vaṭṭasmim cuti paṭisandhim ācinatā iva

original: tasmā “ācayāya no apacayāyā”ti vuttā. Lokuttaramaggapaññā pana yasmā cutipaṭisandhiṃ
analyzed: tasmai ācayāya no apacayāya ati vuttā lokuttara magga paññā pana yasmā cuti paṭisandhim

original: apacinateva, tasmā “apacayāya no ācayāyā”ti vuttā. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarapaññā cutipaṭisandhimpi
analyzed: apacinatā iva tasmai apacayāya no ācayāya ati vuttā rūpāvacara arūpāvacara paññā cuti paṭisandhim pi

original: ācinati, vikkhambhanavasena kilese ceva kilesamūlake ca dhamme apacinati, tasmā “ācayāya
analyzed: ācinati vikkhambhana vasena kilese ca iva kilesa mūlake ca dhamme apacinati tasmai ācayāya

original: ceva apacayāya cā”ti vuttā. Sesā neva cutipaṭisandhiṃ ācinati na apacinati, tasmā
analyzed: ca iva apacayāya ca ati vuttā sesā na iva cuti paṭisandhim ācinati na apacinati tasmā

original: “neva ācayāya no apacayāyā”ti vuttā.
analyzed: na iva ācayāya na u apacayāya ati vuttā

original: 798. Na ca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhatīti idaṃ paṭhamajjhānapaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sā
analyzed: na ca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhati iti idam paṭhamajjhāna paññam sandhāya vuttam sā

original: hissa kāmavivekena pattabbattā kilesanibbidāya saṃvattati. Tāya cesa kāmesu vītarāgo
analyzed: hissa kāma vivekena pattabba ttā kilesa nibbidāya saṃvattati tāya ca isa kāmesu vīta rāgaḥ

original: hoti, abhiññāpādakabhāvaṃ pana appattatāya neva pañca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhati, nimittārammaṇattā
analyzed: hoti abhiññā pādaka bhāvam pana appatta tāya na iva pañca abhiññāyaḥ paṭivijjhati nimitta ārammaṇa ttā

original: na saccāni paṭivijjhati. Evamayaṃ paññā nibbidāya hoti no paṭivedhāya. Svevāti paṭhamajjhānaṃ
analyzed: na saccāni paṭivijjhati evam ayam paññā nibbidāya hoti no paṭivedhāya su eva ati paṭhamajjhānam

original: patvā ṭhito. Kāmesu vītarāgo samānoti tathā vikkhambhitānaṃyeva kāmānaṃ vasena vītarāgo.
analyzed: patvā ṭhitaḥ kāmesu vīta rāgaḥ tathā vikkhambhitānam yeva kāmānam vasena vīta rāgaḥ

original: Abhiññāyo paṭivijjhatīti pañca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhati. Idaṃ catutthajjhānapaññaṃ
analyzed: abhiññāyaḥ paṭivijjhati iti pañca abhiññāyaḥ paṭivijjhati idam catuttha jhāna paññam

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Catutthajjhānapaññā hi abhiññāpādakabhāvenāpi pañca abhiññāyo paṭivijjhati,
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam catuttha jhāna paññā hi abhiññā pādaka bhāvena api pañca abhiññāyaḥ paṭivijjhati

original: abhiññābhāvappattiyāpi paṭivijjhati eva. Tasmā sā paṭivedhāya hoti. Paṭhamajjhānapaññāya
analyzed: abhiññā bhāva ppattiyā api paṭivijjhati eva tasmā sā paṭivedhāya hoti paṭhama jhāna paññāya

original: eva pana kilesesupi nibbindattā no nibbidāya. Yā panāyaṃ dutiyatatiyajjhānapaññā,
analyzed: eva pana kilesesu pi nibbinda tā no nibbidāya yā pana ayam dutiya tatiya jhāna paññā

original: sā katarakoṭṭhāsaṃ bhajatīti? Somanassavasena paṭhamajjhānampi bhajati, avitakkavasena
analyzed: sā katara koṭṭhāsam bhajati iti somanassa vasena paṭhamajjhānam pi bhajati avitakka vasena

original: catutthajjhānampi. Evamesā paṭhamajjhānasannissitā vā catutthajjhānasannissitā vā
analyzed: catuttha jhānam pi evam esā paṭhama jhāna sannissitā vā catuttha jhāna sannissitā vā

original: kātabbā. Nibbidāya ceva paṭivedhāya cāti maggapaññā sabbasmimpi vaṭṭe nibbindanato
analyzed: kātabbā nibbidāya ca iva paṭivedhāya ca ati magga paññā sabbasmim pi vaṭṭe nibbindanato

original: nibbidāya, chaṭṭhaṃ abhiññaṃ paṭivijjhanato paṭivedhāya ca hoti.
analyzed: nibbidāya chaṭṭham abhiññam paṭivijjhanataḥ paṭivedhāya ca hoti

original: 799. Paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhītiādīsu yvāyaṃ appaguṇassa paṭhamajjhānassa lābhī.
analyzed: paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī iti ādīsu yvā ayam appaguṇassa paṭhamajjhānassa lābhī

original: Taṃ tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti
analyzed: tam tatas vuṭṭhitam ārammaṇa vasena kāma sahagatāḥ hutvā saññā manasikārā samudācaranti

original: tudanti codenti. Tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā
analyzed: tudanti codenti tassa kāma anupakkhandānam saññā manasikārānam vasena sā paṭhamajjhāna paññā

original: hāyati parihāyati; tasmā hānabhāginīti vuttā. Tadanudhammatāti tadanurūpasabhāvā.
analyzed: hāyati parihāyati tasmā hāna bhāginī iti vuttā tad anudhamma tā ati tad anurūpa sabhāvā

original: Sati santiṭṭhatīti idaṃ micchāsatiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na sammāsatiṃ. Yassa hi paṭhamajjhānānurūpasabhāvā
analyzed: sati santiṭṭhati iti idam micchāsatim sandhāya vuttam na sammāsatim yassa hi paṭhamajjhāna anurūpa sabhāvā

original: paṭhamajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato disvā assādayamānā abhinandamānā nikanti uppajjati,
analyzed: paṭhamajjhānam santataḥ paṇītataḥ disvā assādayamānā abhinandamānā nikanti uppajjati

original: tassa nikantivasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā neva hāyati, na vaḍḍhati, ṭhitikoṭṭhāsikā
analyzed: tassa nikanti vasena sā paṭhamajjhāna paññā na iva hāyati na vaḍḍhati ṭhiti koṭṭhāsikā

original: hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ṭhitibhāginī paññāti. Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ
analyzed: hoti tena vuttam ṭhiti bhāginī paññā iti avitakka sahagatā ati avitakkam dutiya jhānam

original: santato paṇītato manasikaroto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā. Samudācarantīti paguṇato
analyzed: santataḥ paṇītataḥ manasikaroto ārammaṇa vasena a vitakka sahagatā samudācaranti iti paguṇataḥ

original: paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya tudanti codenti. Tassa upari
analyzed: paṭhama jhānataḥ vuṭṭhitam dutiya jhāna adhigama tthāya tudanti codenti tassa upari

original: dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā visesabhūtassa
analyzed: dutiya jhāna anupakkhandānam saññā manasikārānam vasena sā paṭhama jhāna paññā visesa bhūtassa

original: dutiyajjhānassa uppattiṭṭhānatāya visesabhāginīti vuttā. Nibbidāsahagatāti tameva
analyzed: dutiya jhānassa uppatti ṭṭhāna tāya visesa bhāginī iti vuttā nibbidā sahagatā ati tam eva

original: paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ nibbidāsaṅkhātena vipassanāñāṇena sahagatā. Vipassanāñāṇañhi
analyzed: paṭhama jhānataḥ vuṭṭhitam nibbidā saṅkhātena vipassanā ñāṇena sahagatā vipassanā ñāṇam hi

original: jhānaṅgabhede vattante nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati, tasmā nibbidāti vuccati. Samudācarantīti
analyzed: jhāna aṅga bhede vattante nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati tasmā nibbidā ati vuccati samudācaranti iti

original: nibbānasacchikiriyatthāya tudanti codenti. Virāgūpasañhitāti virāgasaṅkhātena nibbānena
analyzed: nibbāna sacchikiriya tthāya tudanti codenti virāgu upasañhitā ati virāga saṅkhātena nibbānena

original: upasaṃhitā. Vipassanāñāṇamhi sakkā iminā maggena virāgaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikātunti pavattito
analyzed: upasaṃhitā vipassanā ñāṇamhi sakkā iminā maggena virāgam nibbānam sacchikātun ti pavattito

original: “virāgūpasañhita”nti vuccati. Taṃsampayuttā saññāmanasikārāpi virāgūpasañhitā eva
analyzed: virāga upasañhitanti vuccati tad sampayuttā saññā manasikārā api virāga upasañhitā eva

original: nāma. Tassa tesaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā ariyamaggapaṭivedhassa
analyzed: nāma tassa tesam saññā manasikārānam vasena sā paṭhamajjhāna paññā ariya magga paṭivedhassa

original: padaṭṭhānatāya nibbedhabhāginīti vuttā. Evaṃ catūsu ṭhānesu paṭhamajjhānapaññāva
analyzed: padaṭṭhāna tāya nibbedha bhāginī iti vuttā evam catūsu ṭhānesu paṭhama jhāna paññā ava

original: kathitā. Dutiyajjhānapaññādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
analyzed: kathitā dutiya jhāna paññā ādīsu pi iminā ava nayena atthaḥ veditabbo

original: 801. Kicchena kasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassāti lokuttarasamādhiṃ uppādentassa pubbabhāge
analyzed: kicchena kasirena samādhim uppādentassa ati lokuttara samādhim uppādentassa pubba bhāge

original: āgamanakāle kicchena kasirena dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamantassa kilese
analyzed: āgamana kāle kicchena kasirena dukkhena sa saṅkhārena sa payogena kilamantassa kilese

original: vikkhambhetvā āgatassa. Dandhaṃ taṇṭhānaṃ abhijānantassāti vikkhambhitesu kilesesu
analyzed: vikkhambhetvā āgatassa dandham taṇṭhānam abhijānantassa ati vikkhambhitesu kilesesu

original: vipassanāparivāse ciraṃ vasitvā taṃ lokuttarasamādhisaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ dandhaṃ saṇikaṃ
analyzed: vipassanā parivāse ciram vasitvā tam lokuttara samādhi saṅkhātam ṭhānam dandham saṇikam

original: abhijānantassa paṭivijjhantassa, pāpuṇantassāti attho. Ayaṃ vuccatīti yā esā evaṃ
analyzed: abhijānantassa paṭivijjhantassa pāpuṇantassa ati atthaḥ ayam vuccati iti yā esā evam

original: uppajjati, ayaṃ kilesavikkhambhanapaṭipadāya dukkhattā, vipassanāparivāsapaññāya
analyzed: uppajjati ayam kilesa vikkhambhana paṭipadāya dukkhattā vipassanā parivāsa paññāya

original: ca dandhattā maggakāle ekacittakkhaṇe uppannāpi paññā āgamanavasena dukkhapaṭipadā
analyzed: ca dandha ttā magga kāle eka citta kkhaṇe uppannā api paññā āgamana vasena dukkha paṭipadā

original: dandhābhiññā nāmāti vuccati. Upari tīsu padesupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
analyzed: dandhābhiññā nāma ati vuccati upari tīsu padesu pi iminā ava nayena atthaḥ veditabbo

original: 802. Samādhissa na nikāmalābhissāti yo samādhissa na nikāmalābhī hoti, so tassa na
analyzed: samādhissa na nikāma lābhissa ati yaḥ samādhissa na nikāma lābhī hoti saḥ tassa na

original: nikāmalābhī nāma. Yassa samādhi uparūpari samāpajjanatthāya ussakkituṃ paccayo na
analyzed: nikāma lābhī nāma yassa samādhi upari upari samāpajjana tthāya ussakkitum paccayaḥ na

original: hoti, tassa appaguṇajjhānalābhissāti attho. Ārammaṇaṃ thokaṃ pharantassāti paritte

original: vipulanti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ tādisameva.

804. Pañcavidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese pītipharaṇatādīsu pītiṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti
dvīsu jhānesu paññā pītipharaṇatā nāma. Sukhaṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti tīsu jhānesu
analyzed: dvīsu jhānesu paññā pīti pharaṇa tā nāma sukham pharamānā uppajjati iti tīsu jhānesu

analyzed: paññā sukha pharaṇa tā nāma paresam cetaḥ pharamānā uppajjati iti cetaḥ pariya paññā cetaḥ pharaṇa tā

analyzed: nāma ālokam pharamānā uppajjati iti dibba cakkhu paññā āloka pharaṇa tā nāma paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇam

original: Tattha ca pītipharaṇatā sukhapharaṇatā dve pādā viya, cetopharaṇatā ālokapharaṇatā

original: dassesi. Ayaṃ pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhīti ayaṃ hatthapādasīsasadisehi pañcahi aṅgehi

original: yutto sammāsamādhīti pādakajjhānasamādhiṃ kathesi.
analyzed: yuttaḥ sammāsamādhi iti pādaka jhāna samādhim kathesi

original: Ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho cevātiādīsu arahattaphalasamādhi adhippeto. So hi appitappitakkhaṇe
analyzed: ayam samādhi paccuppanna sukho ca iva ati ādīsu arahatta phala samādhi adhippeto saḥ hi appita ppita kkhaṇe

original: paccayattā āyatiṃ sukhavipāko. Santaṃ sukhumaṃ phalacittaṃ paṇītaṃ madhurarūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.

original: Phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa hi sabbakāyānugataṃ sukhasamphassaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ paṭicca

original: sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati. Imināpi pariyāyena āyatiṃ sukhavipāko. Kilesehi
analyzed: sukha sahagatam kāya viññāṇam uppajjati iminā api pariyāyena āyatim sukha vipākaḥ kilesehi

original: ārakattā ariyo. Kāmāmisavaṭṭāmisalokāmisānaṃ abhāvā nirāmiso. Buddhādīhi mahāpurisehi

original: sevitattā akāpurisasevito. Aṅgasantatāya ārammaṇasantatāya sabbakilesadarathasantatāya
analyzed: sevitattā a kāpurisa sevitaḥ aṅga santatāya ārammaṇa santatāya sabba kilesa daratha santatāya

original: ca santo. Atappanīyaṭṭhena paṇīto. Kilesapaṭippassaddhiyā laddhattā kilesapaṭippassaddhibhāvassa

original: vā laddhattā paṭippassaddhiladdho. Paṭippassaddhaṃ paṭippassaddhīti hi idaṃ atthato
analyzed: vā laddhattā paṭippassaddhi laddhaḥ paṭippassaddham paṭippassaddhi iti hi idam atthataḥ

original: ekaṃ. Paṭippassaddhakilesena vā arahatā laddhattāpi paṭippassaddhiladdho. Ekodibhāvena
analyzed: ekam paṭippassaddha kilesena vā arahatā laddha ttā api paṭippassaddhi laddhaḥ eka udi bhāvena

original: adhigatattā ekodibhāvameva vā adhigatattā ekodibhāvādhigato. Appaguṇasāsavasamādhi
analyzed: adhigata ttā ekodi bhāvam eva vā adhigata ttā ekodi bhāva adhigataḥ appaguṇa sa āsava samādhi

original: viya sasaṅkhārena sappayogena cittena paccanīkadhamme niggayha kilese vāretvā anadhigatattā
analyzed: sa saṅkhārena sa payogena cittena paccanīka dhamme niggayha kilese vāretvā anadhigata ttā

original: na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato. Tañca samādhiṃ samāpajjanto tato vā vuṭṭhahanto
analyzed: na sa saṅkhāra niggayha vārita gataḥ tam ca samādhim samāpajjantaḥ tatas vā vuṭṭhahantaḥ

original: sativepullappattattā satova samāpajjati satova vuṭṭhahati. Yathāparicchinnakālavasena
analyzed: sati vepulla ppatta ttā sataḥ iva samāpajjati sataḥ iva vuṭṭhahati yathā paricchinna kāla vasena

original: ñāṇaṃ uppajjati – taṃ ekamaṅgaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Evamimehi pañcahi paccavekkhaṇañāṇehi

original: ayaṃ samādhi pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi nāma vuttoti.
analyzed: ayam samādhi pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi nāma vutto ti

analyzed: chabbidhena ñāṇa vatthu niddese iddhi vidhe ekaḥ api hutvā bahudhā hoti iti ādi naya ppavatte

analyzed: dibba sota dhātuyāḥ ñāṇam iminā api a vitakka a vicārā upekkhā sahagatā rūpa avacarā pakati sota visaya atīta sadda ārammaṇā

original: ekacittakkhaṇikā appanāpaññāva kathitā. Paracitte ñāṇanti parasattānaṃ cittaparicchede
analyzed: eka citta khaṇikā appanā paññā ava kathitā para citte ñāṇam ti para sattānam citta paricchede

analyzed: ñāṇam iminā api yathā vutta ppakārā paresam sa rāga ādi citta ārammaṇā eka citta khaṇikā appanā paññā va

analyzed: kathitā pubbenivāsa anussatiyāḥ ñāṇanti pubbenivāsa anussati sampayuttam ñāṇam iminā api

analyzed: yathā vutta ppakārā pubbe nivuttha kkhandha anussaraṇa sati sampayuttā eka citta kkhaṇikā

analyzed: appanā paññā ava kathitā sattānam cutūpapāte ñāṇam ti sattānam cutiyam ca upapāte ca

original: ñāṇaṃ. Imināpi yathāvuttappakārā cavanakaupapajjanakānaṃ sattānaṃ vaṇṇadhātuārammaṇā
analyzed: ñāṇam iminā api yathā vutta ppakārā cavanaka aupapajjanakānam sattānam vaṇṇa dhātu ārammaṇā

original: ekacittakkhaṇikā appanāpaññāva kathitā. Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇanti saccaparicchedajānanañāṇaṃ.

analyzed: evam atīte ñāṇa dvayam anāgate ñāṇa dvayanti cha tāni dhamma ṭṭhiti ñāṇena saddhiṃ

original: satta. Tattha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti paccayākārañāṇaṃ. Paccayākāro hi dhammānaṃ pavattiṭṭhitikāraṇattā
analyzed: satta tattha dhamma ṭṭhiti ñāṇan ti paccaya ākāra ñāṇam paccaya ākāraḥ hi dhammānam pavatti ṭṭhiti kāraṇa ttā

original: dhammaṭṭhitīti vuccati; tattha ñāṇaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ. Etasseva chabbidhassa ñāṇassetaṃ
analyzed: dhamma ṭṭhiti iti vuccati tattha ñāṇam dhamma ṭṭhiti ñāṇam etassa eva chabbidhassa ñāṇassa etam

analyzed: adhivacanam evam eka ekasmin aṅge imāni satta satta katvā ekādasasu aṅgesu satta sattati

original: honti. Tattha khayadhammanti khayagamanasabhāvaṃ. Vayadhammanti vayagamanasabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: honti tattha khaya dhammanti khaya gamana sabhāvam vaya dhammanti vaya gamana sabhāvam

original: Virāgadhammanti virajjanasabhāvaṃ. Nirodhadhammanti nirujjhanasabhāvaṃ. Iminā kiṃ
analyzed: virāga dhammanti virajjana sabhāvam nirodha dhammanti nirujjhana sabhāvam iminā kim

original: kathitaṃ? Aparavipassanāya purimavipassanāsammasanaṃ kathitaṃ. Tena kiṃ kathitaṃ
analyzed: kathitam apara vipassanāya purima vipassanā sammasanam kathitam tena kim kathitam

original: hoti? Sattakkhattuṃ vipassanāpaṭivipassanā kathitā. Paṭhamañāṇena hi sabbasaṅkhāre
analyzed: hoti satta kkhattum vipassanā paṭivipassanā kathitā paṭhama ñāṇena hi sabba saṅkhāre

original: aniccā dukkhā anattāti disvā taṃ ñāṇaṃ dutiyena daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭati, dutiyaṃ tatiyena,
analyzed: aniccā dukkhā anattā ati disvā tam ñāṇam dutiyena daṭṭhum vaṭṭati dutiyam tatiyena

original: tatiyaṃ catutthena, catutthaṃ pañcamena, pañcamaṃ chaṭṭhena, chaṭṭhaṃ sattamena.

original: Evaṃ satta vipassanāpaṭivipassanā kathitā hontīti.

original: Sattakaniddesavaṇṇanā.
807. Aṭṭhavidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese sotāpattimagge paññāti sotāpattimaggamhi paññā. Iminā sampayuttapaññāva kathitā. Sesapadesupi eseva nayoti.
analyzed: aṭṭhavidhena ñāṇa vatthu niddese sotāpatti magge paññā ati sotāpatti maggamhi paññā iminā sampayutta paññā ava kathitā sesa padesu pi esā iva nayo ti

original: Aṭṭhakaniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: aṭṭhaka niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 808. Navavidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese anupubbavihārasamāpattīsūti anupubbavihārasaṅkhātāsu

analyzed: samāpattīsu tāsam anupubbena anupaṭipāṭiyā vihāritabba ṭṭhena anupubba vihāra tā samāpajjitabba ṭṭhena

original: samāpattitā daṭṭhabbā. Tattha paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā paññātiādayo aṭṭha sampayuttapaññā
analyzed: samāpatti tā daṭṭhabbā tattha paṭhama jhāna samāpattiyā paññāti ādayaḥ aṭṭha sampayutta paññā

original: veditabbā. Navamā paccavekkhaṇapaññā. Sā hi nirodhasamāpattiṃ santato paṇītato paccavekkhamānassa
analyzed: veditabbā navamā paccavekkhaṇa paññā sā hi nirodha samāpattim santataḥ paṇītataḥ paccavekkhamānassa

original: pavattati. Tena vuttaṃ – “saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇa”nti.

original: Navakaniddesavaṇṇanā.

original: (10.) Dasakaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: dasaka niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: Paṭhamabalaniddeso
809. Dasavidhena ñāṇavatthuniddese aṭṭhānanti hetupaṭikkhepo. Anavakāsoti paccayapaṭikkhepo.
analyzed: dasavidhena ñāṇa vatthu niddese aṭṭhānam ti hetu paṭikkhepaḥ anavakāso ti paccaya paṭikkhepaḥ

original: Ubhayenāpi kāraṇameva paṭikkhipati. Kāraṇañhi tadāyattavuttitāya attano phalassa
analyzed: ubhayena api kāraṇam eva paṭikkhipati kāraṇam hi tad āyatta vutti tāya attanaḥ phalassa

original: ṭhānanti ca avakāsoti ca vuccati. Yanti yena kāraṇena. Diṭṭhisampannoti maggadiṭṭhiyā
analyzed: ṭhānam ti ca avakāso ti ca vuccati yanti yena kāraṇena diṭṭhi sampanno ti magga diṭṭhiyā

original: sampanno sotāpanno ariyasāvako. Kañci saṅkhāranti catubhūmakesu saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu
analyzed: sampanno sotāpannaḥ ariya sāvako kañci catu bhūmakesu saṅkhata saṅkhāresu

original: kañci ekaṃ saṅkhārampi. Niccato upagaccheyyāti niccoti gaṇheyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti
analyzed: kañci ekam saṅkhāram pi niccatas upagaccheyya ati niccaḥ uti gaṇheyya na itam ṭhānam vijjati iti

original: etaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi, na upalabbhati. Yaṃ puthujjanoti yena kāraṇena puthujjano. Ṭhānametaṃ

original: vijjatīti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthi; sassatadiṭṭhiyā hi so tebhūmakesu saṅkhāresu kañci
analyzed: vijjati iti etam kāraṇam atthi sassata diṭṭhiyā hi so tebhūmakesu saṅkhāresu kañci

original: saṅkhāraṃ niccato gaṇheyyāti attho. Catutthabhūmakasaṅkhāro pana tejussadattā divasaṃ
analyzed: saṅkhāram niccatas gaṇheyya ati attho catuttha bhūmaka saṅkhāro pana divasam

original: santatto ayoguḷo viya makkhikānaṃ diṭṭhiyā vā aññesaṃ vā akusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na
analyzed: santattaḥ ayaḥ guḷaḥ viya makkhikānam diṭṭhiyā vā aññesam vā akusalānam ārammaṇam na

original: hoti. Iminā nayena kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhatotiādīsupi attho veditabbo. Sukhato upagaccheyyāti
analyzed: hoti iminā nayena kañci saṅkhāram sukhataḥ tiādīsu pi atthaḥ veditabbo sukhataḥ upagaccheyya ati

original: “ekantasukhī attā hoti arogo parammaraṇā”ti evaṃ attadiṭṭhivasena sukhato gāhaṃ sandhāyetaṃ
analyzed: ekanta sukhī attā hoti arogo evam atta diṭṭhi vasena sukhataḥ gāham sandhāya itam

original: vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhivippayuttacittena pana ariyasāvako pariḷāhābhibhūto pariḷāhavūpasamatthaṃ,
analyzed: vuttam diṭṭhi vippayutta cittena pana ariya sāvako pariḷāha abhibhūto pariḷāha vūpasamattham

original: mattahatthīparitāsito viya, sucikāmo pokkhabrāhmaṇo gūthaṃ kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato
analyzed: matta hatthī paritāsitaḥ viya su cikāmaḥ pokkha brāhmaṇaḥ gūtham kañci saṅkhāram sukhataḥ

original: upagacchati. Attavāde kasiṇādipaṇṇattisaṅgahatthaṃ saṅkhāranti avatvā kañci dhammanti
analyzed: upagacchati atta vāde kasiṇa ādi paṇṇatti saṅga hattham saṅkhāranti avatvā kañci

original: vuttaṃ. Idhāpi ariyasāvakassa catubhūmakavasena paricchedo veditabbo, puthujjanassa
analyzed: vuttam idha api ariya sāvakassa catu bhūmaka vasena paricchedaḥ veditabbo puthujjanassa

original: tebhūmakavasena; sabbavāresu vā ariyasāvakassāpi tebhūmakavaseneva paricchedo vaṭṭati.
analyzed: tebhūmaka vasena sabba vāresu vā ariyasāvakassa api tebhūmaka vasena iva paricchedaḥ vaṭṭati

original: Yaṃ yañhi puthujjano gaṇhāti, tato tato ariyasāvako gāhaṃ viniveṭheti. Puthujjano
analyzed: yam yam hi puthujjanaḥ gaṇhāti tatas tatas ariya sāvakaḥ gāham viniveṭheti puthujjanaḥ

original: hi yaṃ yaṃ niccaṃ sukhaṃ attāti gaṇhāti, taṃ taṃ ariyasāvako aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti

original: gaṇhanto gāhaṃ viniveṭheti.
analyzed: gaṇhantaḥ gāham viniveṭha iti

original: Mātarantiādīsu janikāva mātā. Manussabhūtova khīṇāsavo arahāti adhippeto. Kiṃ pana
analyzed: mātaranti ādīsu janikā iva mātā manussa bhūtaḥ uva khīṇa āsavaḥ arahā ati adhippetaḥ kim pana

original: ariyasāvako aññaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti? Etampi aṭṭhānaṃ. Sacepi bhavantaragataṃ ariyasāvakaṃ
analyzed: ariya sāvako aññam jīvitā voropeyya ati etam pi aṭṭhānam sace pi bhavantara gatam ariya sāvakam

original: attano ariyasāvakabhāvaṃ ajānantampi koci evaṃ vadeyya – ‘imaṃ kunthakipillikaṃ jīvitā

original: voropeyya. Atha vāpi naṃ evaṃ vadeyyuṃ – ‘sace imaṃ na ghātessasi, sīsaṃ te chindissāmā’ti,

original: sīsamevassa chindeyyuṃ, neva so taṃ ghāteyya. Puthujjanabhāvassa pana mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ

original: ariyasāvakassa ca baladīpanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – sāvajjo puthujjanabhāvo,

original: yatra hi nāma puthujjano mātughātādīnipi ānantariyāni karissati. Mahābalo ariyasāvako;
analyzed: yatra hi nāma puthujjanaḥ mātughāta ādīni pi ānantariyāni karissati mahā balaḥ ariya sāvako

original: so etāni kammāni na karotīti.
analyzed: saḥ etāni kammāni na karoti iti

original: Paduṭṭhena cittenāti dosasampayuttena vadhakacittena. Lohitaṃ uppādeyyāti jīvamānakasarīre

original: samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitaṃ pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅghaṃ bhindeyya, vuttañhetaṃ – “pañcahupāli,
analyzed: samāna sīmā ayam ṭhitam pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅgham bhindeyya vuttam ha etam

original: ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati – kammena, uddesena, voharanto, anussāvanena, salākaggāhenā”ti.
analyzed: ākārehi saṅghaḥ bhijjati kammena uddesena voharantaḥ anussāvanena salākaggāhena ati

original: Tattha ‘kammenā’ti apalokanādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarena kammena. ‘Uddesenā’ti
analyzed: tattha kammena ati apalokana ādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarena kammena uddesena ati

original: pañcasu pātimokkhuddesesu aññatarena uddesena. ‘Voharanto’ti kathayanto, tāhi tāhi
analyzed: pañcasu pātimokkha uddesesu aññatarena uddesena voharanto ti kathayanto tāhi tāhi

original: uppattīhi ‘adhammaṃ dhammo’tiādīni aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni dīpento. ‘Anussāvanenā’ti
analyzed: uppattīhi adhammam dhamma uti ādīni aṭṭhārasa bheda kara vatthūni dīpentaḥ anussāvanena ati

original: ‘nanu tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca! Mādiso nāma
analyzed: nanu tumhe jānātha mayham uccākulā pabbajita bhāvam bahu suta bhāvam ca mādisaḥ nāma

original: uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ gāheyyāti cittampi uppādetuṃ tumhākaṃ na yuttaṃ.
analyzed: uddhammam ubbinayam satthu sāsanam gāheyyāti cittam pi uppādetum tumhākam na yuttam

original: Kiṃ mayhaṃ avīci nīluppalavanaṃ viya sītalo? Kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī’tiādinā nayena

original: kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena. ‘Salākaggāhenā’ti evaṃ anussāvetvā tesaṃ
analyzed: kaṇṇa mūle vacībhedam katvā anussāvanena salākaggāhena ati evam anussāvetvā tesam

original: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ vohārānussāvanasalākaggāhā pana pubbabhāgā.

original: Tesaṃ āvibhāvatthaṃ –
analyzed: tesam āvi bhāva attham

analyzed: a muñcitvā ava vicaritvā api kāyassa bhedā nirayam eva upapajjati yaḥ pana sayam manussa bhūto

analyzed: ānantariyam na phusati mātā piti abhisandhinā mātā pitaraḥ phusatā iva

original: Esa nayo itarasmimpi catukkadvaye. Yathā ca mātāpitūsu, evaṃ arahantepi etāni catukkāni
analyzed: itarasmin pi catukka dvaye yathā ca mātā pitūsu evam etāni catukkāni

original: ānantariyasadisameva.

analyzed: yā pana bodhisākhā bodhigharam bādhati tam geha rakkhaṇa attham chinditum na labbhati

analyzed: bodhi attham hi geham na geha atthāya bodhi āsana ghare pi esa iva nayaḥ yasmim pana āsana ghare

analyzed: kammam vā karontassa uddesam vā uddisantassa bhedo ca hoti ānantariya kammam ca samagga saññāya

analyzed: pana vaṭṭati samagga saññāya hi karontassa na iva bhedaḥ hoti na ānantariya kammam tathā

original: navato ūnaparisāyaṃ. Sabbantimena pana paricchedena navannaṃ janānaṃ yo saṅghaṃ bhindati,

analyzed: ekatas cattāraḥ navamaḥ anussāveti salākam gāheti ayam dhammaḥ ayam vinayaḥ idam

original: saṅghabhedo ca. Navannaṃ vā, upāli, atirekanavannaṃ vā saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo cā”ti.

original: Etesu ca pana pañcasu saṅghabhedo vacīkammaṃ, sesāni kāyakammānīti. Evaṃ kammatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.

original: ‘Dvārato’ti sabbāneva cetāni kāyadvāratopi vacīdvāratopi samuṭṭhahanti. Purimāni

analyzed: pana natthi sesāni cattāri kammāni honti na kappa ṭṭhitiyāni iti evam ettha
