original: santikaṃ gantvā adhigatavisesaṃ saṃsandetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṃ
analyzed: santikam gantvā adhigata visesam saṃsandetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammam

original: pucchi; so ācikkhi; tassa vacanasamanantarameva mahāsatto taṃ sampādesi; evameva
analyzed: pucchi saḥ ācikkhi tassa vacana samanantaram eva mahāsatto tam sampādesi evam eva

original: paññavā bhikkhu pariyattiṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti. Tasmā pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanaṃ
analyzed: paññavā bhikkhu pariyattim sutvā dve api pūreti tasmai pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanam

original: ṭhitaṃ hoti. Yadā pana sā antaradhāyati tadā paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nassati.
analyzed: ṭhitam hoti yadā pana sā antaradhāyati tadā paṭhamam abhidhamma piṭakam nassati

original: Tattha paṭṭhānaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ antaradhāyati. Anukkamena pacchā dhammasaṅgaho. Tasmiṃ
analyzed: tattha paṭṭhānam sabba paṭhamam antaradhāyati anukkamena pacchā dhamma saṅgaho tasmin

original: antarahite itaresu dvīsu piṭakesu ṭhitesu sāsanaṃ ṭhitameva hoti.
analyzed: antar ahite itaresu dvīsu piṭakesu ṭhitesu sāsanam ṭhitam eva hoti

original: Tattha suttantapiṭake antaradhāyamāne paṭhamaṃ aṅguttaranikāyo ekādasakato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: tattha suttanta piṭake antaradhāyamāne paṭhamam aṅguttara nikāyo ekādasakataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: yāva ekakā antaradhāyati. Tadanantaraṃ saṃyuttanikāyo cakkapeyyālato paṭṭhāya yāva
analyzed: yāva ekakā antaradhāyati tad anantaram saṃyutta nikāyo cakkapeyyālato paṭṭhāya yāva

original: oghataraṇā antaradhāyati. Tadanantaraṃ majjhimanikāyo indriyabhāvanato paṭṭhāya yāva
analyzed: ogha taraṇā antaradhāyati tad anantaram majjhima nikāyaḥ indriya bhāvanataḥ paṭṭhāya yāva

original: mūlapariyāyā antaradhāyati. Tadanantaraṃ dīghanikāyo dasuttarato paṭṭhāya yāva brahmajālā
analyzed: mūla pariyāyāḥ tad anantaram dīgha nikāyaḥ paṭṭhāya yāva brahmajālā

original: antaradhāyati. Ekissāpi dvinnampi gāthānaṃ pucchā addhānaṃ gacchati; sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ
analyzed: antaradhāyati ekissā api dvinnam pi gāthānam pucchā addhānam gacchati sāsanam dhāretum

original: na sakkoti sabhiyapucchā viya āḷavakapucchā viya ca. Etā kira kassapabuddhakālikā
analyzed: na sakkoti sabhiya pucchā viya āḷavaka pucchā viya ca etā kira kassapa buddha kālikā

original: antarā sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
analyzed: antarā sāsanam dhāretum na asakkhiṃsu

original: Dvīsu pana piṭakesu antarahitesupi vinayapiṭake ṭhite sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati. Parivārakhandhakesu
analyzed: dvīsu pana piṭakesu antarahitesu pi vinaya piṭake ṭhite sāsanam tiṭṭhati parivāra khandhakesu

original: antarahitesu ubhatovibhaṅge ṭhite ṭhitameva hoti. Ubhatovibhaṅge antarahite mātikāya
analyzed: anta rahitesu ubhatas vibhaṅge ṭhite ṭhitam eva hoti ubhatas vibhaṅge anta rahite

original: ṭhitāyapi ṭhitameva hoti. Mātikāya antarahitāya pātimokkhapabbajjāupasampadāsu ṭhitāsu
analyzed: ṭhitāya api ṭhitam eva hoti mātikāya antara hitāya pātimokkha pabbajjā upasampadāsu ṭhitāsu

original: sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati. Liṅgaṃ addhānaṃ gacchati. Setavatthasamaṇavaṃso pana kassapabuddhakālato
analyzed: sāsanam tiṭṭhati liṅgam addhānam gacchati setavattha samaṇa vaṃso pana kassapa buddha kālato

original: paṭṭhāya sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ nāsakkhi. Pacchimakassa pana saccapaṭivedhato pacchimakassa
analyzed: paṭṭhāya sāsanam dhāretum na asakkhi pacchimakassa pana sacca paṭivedhato pacchimakassa

original: sīlabhedato ca paṭṭhāya sāsanaṃ osakkitaṃ nāma hoti. Tato paṭṭhāya aññassa buddhassa uppatti na vāritā.
analyzed: sīla bhedato ca paṭṭhāya sāsanam osakkitam nāma hoti tatas paṭṭhāya aññassa buddhassa uppatti na vāritā

original: Tīṇi parinibbānāni nāma – kilesaparinibbānaṃ, khandhaparinibbānaṃ, dhātuparinibbānanti.
analyzed: tīṇi parinibbānāni nāma kilesa parinibbānam khandha parinibbānam dhātu parinibbānanti

original: Tattha ‘kilesaparinibbānaṃ’ bodhipallaṅke ahosi, ‘khandhaparinibbānaṃ’ kusinārāyaṃ,
analyzed: tattha kilesa parinibbānam bodhipallaṅke ahosi khandha parinibbānam kusinārāyam

original: ‘dhātuparinibbānaṃ’ anāgate bhavissati. Sāsanassa kira osakkanakāle imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe
analyzed: dhātu parinibbānam anāgate bhavissati sāsanassa kira osakkana kāle imasmin tambapaṇṇidīpe

original: dhātuyo sannipatitvā mahācetiyaṃ gamissanti, mahācetiyato nāgadīpe rājāyatanacetiyaṃ,
analyzed: dhātuyaḥ sannipatitvā mahācetiyam gamissanti mahācetiyataḥ nāgadīpe rāja āyatana cetiyam

original: tato mahābodhipallaṅkaṃ gamissanti. Nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi brahmalokatopi dhātuyo
analyzed: tatas mahā bodhipallaṅkam gamissanti nāga bhavanataḥ pi deva lokataḥ pi brahma lokataḥ pi

original: mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti. Sāsapamattāpi dhātu na antarā nassissati. Sabbā
analyzed: mahā bodhi pallaṅkam eva gamissanti sāsapa mattā api dhātu na antarā sabbā

original: dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekaghanā hutvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo
analyzed: dhātuyaḥ mahā bodhi pallaṅke rāsi bhūtā suvaṇṇa kkhandhaḥ viya eka ghanā hutvā chabbaṇṇa raṃsiyaḥ

original: vissajjessanti. Tā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharissanti. Tato dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā
analyzed: vissajjessanti tāḥ dasa sahassi lokadhātum pharissanti tatas dasa sahassa cakkavāḷa devatā

original: sannipatitvā “ajja satthā parinibbāti, ajja sāsanaṃ osakkati, pacchimadassanaṃ dāni
analyzed: sannipatitvā ajja satthā parinibbāti ajja sāsanam osakkati pacchima dassanam dāni

original: idaṃ amhāka”nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṃ kāruññaṃ karissanti.
analyzed: idam amhākam ti dasabalassa parinibbuta divasataḥ mahantataram kāruññam karissanti

original: Ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave avasesā sakabhāvena sandhāretuṃ na sakkhissanti. Dhātūsu
analyzed: ṭhapetvā anāgāmi khīṇāsave avasesā saka bhāvena sandhāretum na sakkhissanti dhātūsu

original: tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati. Sāsapamattāyapi dhātuyā sati
analyzed: tejaḥ dhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokāḥ uggacchissati dhātuyā sati

original: ekajālāva bhavissati; dhātūsu pariyādānaṃ gatāsu pacchijjissati. Evaṃ mahantaṃ ānubhāvaṃ
analyzed: bhavissati dhātūsu pariyādānam gatāsu pacchijjissati evam mahantam ānubhāvam

original: dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti. Yāva evaṃ na antaradhāyati
analyzed: dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanam antarahitam nāma hoti yāva evam na antaradhāyati

original: tāva acarimaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ – netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
analyzed: tāva acarimam nāma hoti evam apubbam acarimam uppajjeyyum na itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Kasmā pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ na uppajjantīti? Anacchariyattā. Buddhā hi acchariyamanussā,
analyzed: kasmā pana apubbam acarimam na uppajjanti iti an acchariya ttā buddhāḥ hi acchariya manussā

original: yathāha – “ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke upajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso. Katamo
analyzed: yathā āha eka puggalaḥ bhikkhave loke upajjamānaḥ uppajjati acchariya manussaḥ katamaḥ

original: ekapuggalo? Tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti. Yadi ca dve vā cattāro
analyzed: eka puggalaḥ tathāgataḥ bhikkhave araham sammāsambuddhaḥ ti yadi ca dve vā cattāro

original: vā aṭṭha vā soḷasa vā ekato uppajjeyyuṃ, na acchariyā bhaveyyuṃ. Ekasmiñhi vihāre
analyzed: vā aṭṭha vā soḷasa vā ekatas uppajjeyyum na acchariyāḥ bhaveyyum ekasmin hi vihāre

original: dvinnaṃ cetiyānampi lābhasakkāro uḷāro na hoti, bhikkhūpi bahutāya na acchariyā jātā,
analyzed: dvinnam cetiyānam pi lābha sakkāro uḷāraḥ na hoti bhikkhū upi bahu tāya na acchariyā jātā

original: evaṃ buddhāpi bhaveyyuṃ; tasmā nuppajjanti. Desanāya ca visesābhāvato. Yañhi satipaṭṭhānādibhedaṃ
analyzed: evam buddhāḥ api bhaveyyum tasmā nuppajjanti desanāya ca visesa abhāvataḥ yat hi sati paṭṭhāna ādi bhedam

original: dhammaṃ eko deseti, aññena uppajjitvāpi sova desetabbo siyā. Tato anacchariyo siyā.
analyzed: dhammam ekaḥ deseti aññena uppajjitvā api saḥ uva desetabbaḥ siyā tatas an acchariyaḥ siyā

original: Ekasmiṃ pana dhammaṃ desente desanāpi acchariyā hoti. Vivādabhāvato ca. Bahūsu ca
analyzed: ekasmin pana dhammam desente desanā api acchariyā hoti vivāda bhāvato ca bahūsu ca

original: buddhesu uppannesu bahūnaṃ ācariyānaṃ antevāsikā viya ‘amhākaṃ buddho pāsādiko, amhākaṃ
analyzed: buddhesu uppannesu bahūnam ācariyānam antevāsikāḥ viya amhākam buddhaḥ pāsādikaḥ amhākam

original: buddho madhurassaro lābhī puññavā’ti vivadeyyuṃ; tasmāpi evaṃ nuppajjanti.
analyzed: buddhaḥ madhurassaraḥ lābhī puññavāti vivadeyyum tasmā api evam nuppajjanti

original: Apicetaṃ kāraṇaṃ milindaraññā puṭṭhena nāgasenattherena vitthāritameva. Vuttañhi tattha –
analyzed: apica itam kāraṇam milinda raññā puṭṭhena nāgasena therena vitthāritam eva vuttam hi tattha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṃ bhagavatā – “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā aṭṭhānam etam bhikkhave anavakāsaḥ yaṃ

original: ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ – netaṃ
analyzed: ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahantaḥ sammāsambuddhāḥ apubbam acarimam uppajjeyyum na itaṃ

original: ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti. Desentā ca, bhante nāgasena, sabbepi tathāgatā sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme
analyzed: ṭhānam vijjati iti desentā ca bhante nāgasena sabbe api tathāgatā sattatiṃsa bodhi pakkhiya dhamme

original: desenti, kathayamānā ca cattāri ariyasaccāni kathenti, sikkhāpentā ca tīsu sikkhāsu
analyzed: desenti kathayamānā ca cattāri ariya saccāni kathenti sikkhāpentā ca tīsu sikkhāsu

original: sikkhāpenti, anusāsamānā ca appamādapaṭipattiyaṃ anusāsanti. Yadi, bhante nāgasena,
analyzed: sikkhāpenti anusāsamānā ca appamāda paṭipattiyam anusāsanti yadi bhante nāgasena

original: sabbesampi tathāgatānaṃ ekā desanā ekā kathā ekā sikkhā ekānusiṭṭhi, kena kāraṇena
analyzed: sabbesam pi tathāgatānam ekā desanā ekā kathā ekā sikkhā ekā anusiṭṭhi kena kāraṇena

original: dve tathāgatā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti? Ekenapi tāva buddhuppādena ayaṃ loko obhāsajāto.
analyzed: dve tathāgatāḥ eka kkhaṇe nu uppajjanti ekena api tāva buddhuppādena ayam lokaḥ obhāsa jātaḥ

original: Yadi dutiyo buddho bhaveyya, dvinnaṃ pabhāya ayaṃ loko bhiyyoso mattāya obhāsajāto
analyzed: yadi dutiyaḥ buddhaḥ bhaveyya dvinnam pabhāya ayam lokaḥ bhiyyosaḥ mattāya obhāsa jātaḥ

original: bhaveyya. Ovadantā ca dve tathāgatā sukhaṃ ovadeyyuṃ, anusāsamānā ca sukhaṃ anusāseyyuṃ.
analyzed: bhaveyya ovadantā ca dve tathāgatā sukham ovadeyyum anusāsamānā ca sukham anusāseyyum

original: Tattha me kāraṇaṃ dassehi yathāhaṃ nissaṃsayo bhaveyya”nti.
analyzed: tattha me kāraṇam dassehi yathā aham nissaṃsayaḥ bhaveyyanti

original: “Ayaṃ, mahārāja, dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī, ekasseva tathāgatassa guṇaṃ
analyzed: ayam mahā rāja dasa sahassī lokadhātu eka buddha dhāraṇī ekassa iva tathāgatassa guṇam

original: dhāreti. Yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, nāyaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya, caleyya
analyzed: dhāreti yadi dutiyaḥ buddhaḥ uppajjeyya na ayam dasa sahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya caleyya

original: kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṃseyya, na ṭhānamupagaccheyya.
analyzed: kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṃseyya na ṭhānam upagaccheyya

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, nāvā ekapurisasandhāraṇī bhaveyya, ekasmiṃ purise abhirūḷhe sā
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja nāvā eka purisa sandhāraṇī bhaveyya ekasmin purise abhirūḍhe sā

original: nāvā samupādikā bhaveyya. Atha dutiyo puriso āgaccheyya tādiso āyunā vaṇṇena vayena
analyzed: nāvā samupādikā bhaveyya atha dutiyaḥ purisaḥ āgaccheyya tādisaḥ āyunā vaṇṇena vayena

original: pamāṇena kisathūlena sabbaṅgapaccaṅgena. So taṃ nāvaṃ abhirūheyya. Apinu sā, mahārāja,
analyzed: pamāṇena kisathūlena sabbaṅga paccaṅgena saḥ tam nāvam abhirūheyya apinu sā mahā rāja

original: nāvā dvinnampi dhāreyyā”ti? “Na hi, bhante, caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya
analyzed: nāvā dvinnam pi dhāreyya ati na hi bhante caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya

original: vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṃseyya, na ṭhānamupagaccheyya, osīdeyya udake”ti. “Evameva
analyzed: vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṃseyya na ṭhānam upagaccheyya osīdeyya udaka iti evam eva

original: kho, mahārāja, ayaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī ekasseva tathāgatassa
analyzed: kho mahā rāja ayam dasa sahassī lokadhātu eka buddha dhāraṇī ekassa iva tathāgatassa

original: guṇaṃ dhāreti. Yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, nāyaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya,
analyzed: guṇam dhāreti yadi dutiyaḥ buddhaḥ uppajjeyya na ayam dasa sahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya

original: caleyya…pe… na ṭhānamupagaccheyya.
analyzed: na ṭhānam upagaccheyya

original: “Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, puriso yāvadatthaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya chādentaṃ yāvakaṇṭhamabhipūrayitvā.
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja purisaḥ yāvadattham bhojanam bhuñjeyya chādentam yāva kaṇṭham abhipūrayitvā

original: So tato pīṇito paripuṇṇo nirantaro tandīgato anonamitadaṇḍajāto punadeva tattakaṃ
analyzed: saḥ tatas pīṇitaḥ paripuṇṇaḥ nirantaraḥ tandī gataḥ anonamita daṇḍa jātaḥ punar eva

original: bhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya. Apinu kho so, mahārāja, puriso sukhito bhaveyyā”ti? “Na hi, bhante,
analyzed: bhojanam bhuñjeyya apinu kho saḥ mahā rāja purisaḥ sukhitaḥ bhaveyya ati na hi bhante

original: sakiṃ bhuttova mareyyā”ti. Evameva kho, mahārāja, ayaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī…pe…
analyzed: sakim bhuttaḥ uva mareyya iti evam eva kho mahā rāja ayam dasa sahassī lokadhātu ekabuddha dhāraṇīpe

original: na ṭhānamupagaccheyyā”ti.
analyzed: na ṭhānam upagaccheyya iti

original: “Kiṃ nu kho, bhante nāgasena, atidhammabhārena pathavī calatī”ti? “Idha, mahārāja,
analyzed: kim nu kho bhante nāgasena ati dhamma bhārena pathavī calati iti mahā rāja

original: dve sakaṭā ratanaparipūritā bhaveyyuṃ yāvasmā mukhasamā. Eka sakaṭato ratanaṃ gahetvā
analyzed: dve sakaṭāḥ ratana paripūritāḥ bhaveyyum yāvasmai mukha samāḥ sakaṭataḥ ratanam

original: ekamhi sakaṭe ākireyyuṃ. Apinu taṃ, mahārāja, sakaṭaṃ dvinnampi sakaṭānaṃ ratanaṃ
analyzed: ekamhi sakaṭe ākireyyuṃ apinu tam mahā rāja sakaṭam ratanam

original: dhāreyyā”ti? “Na hi, bhante, nābhipi tassa caleyya, arāpi tassa bhijjeyyuṃ, nemipi
analyzed: dhāreyya ati na hi bhante nābhi pi tassa caleyya arā api tassa bhijjeyyum nemi pi

original: tassa opateyya, akkhopi tassa bhijjeyyā”ti. “Kinnu kho, mahārāja, atiratanabhārena
analyzed: tassa opateyya akkhopi tassa bhijjeyya ati kinnu kho mahā rāja ati ratana bhārena

original: sakaṭaṃ bhijjatī”ti? “Āma, bhante”ti. “Evameva kho, mahārāja, atidhammabhārena pathavī calatīti.
analyzed: sakaṭam bhijjati iti āma bhante iti evam eva kho mahā rāja ati dhamma bhārena pathavī calati iti

original: “Apica, mahārāja, imaṃ kāraṇaṃ buddhabalaparidīpanāya osāritaṃ. Aññampi tattha patirūpaṃ
analyzed: apica mahā rāja imam kāraṇam buddha bala paridīpanāya osāritam aññam pi tattha patirūpam

original: kāraṇaṃ suṇohi yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti. Yadi, mahārāja,
analyzed: kāraṇam suṇohi yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhāḥ eka kkhaṇe nu pajjanti yadi mahā rāja

original: dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṃ, parisāya vivādo uppajjeyya – ‘tumhākaṃ
analyzed: dve sammāsambuddhāḥ eka kkhaṇe uppajjeyyum parisāya vivādaḥ uppajjeyya tumhākam

original: buddho, amhākaṃ buddho’ti ubhatopakkhajātā bhaveyyuṃ. Yathā, mahārāja, dvinnaṃ balavāmaccānaṃ
analyzed: buddhaḥ amhākam buddhaḥ iti ubhatas pakkha jātāḥ bhaveyyum yathā mahā rāja dvinnam

original: parisāya vivādo uppajjeyya – ‘tumhākaṃ amacco, amhākaṃ amacco’ti ubhatopakkhajātā
analyzed: parisāya vivādaḥ uppajjeyya tumhākam amaccaḥ amhākam amaccaḥ iti ubhatas pakkha jātā

original: honti; evameva kho, mahārāja, yadi dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṃ, tesaṃ
analyzed: honti evam eva kho mahā rāja yadi dve sammāsambuddhāḥ eka khaṇe uppajjeyyum tesam

original: parisāya vivādo uppajjeyya – ‘tumhākaṃ buddho, amhākaṃ buddho’ti ubhatopakkhajātā

810. Dutiyabalaniddese gatisampattipaṭibāḷhānīti gatisampattiyā paṭibāhitāni nivāritāni

original: paṭisedhitāni. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ettha ca gatisampattīti sampannā gati devaloko
analyzed: paṭisedhitāni sesa padesu pi esā iva nayo ettha ca gati sampattī iti sampannā deva loko

original: ca manussaloko ca. Gativipattīti vipannā gati cattāro apāyā. Upadhisampattīti attabhāvasamiddhi.
analyzed: ca manussa loko ca gati vipatti iti vipannā cattāraḥ apāyāḥ upadhi sampatti iti atta bhāva samiddhi

original: Upadhivipattīti hīnaattabhāvatā. Kālasampattīti surājasumanussakālasaṅkhāto sampannakālo.
analyzed: upadhi vipatti iti hīna atta bhāva tā kāla sampatti iti su rāja su manussa kāla saṅkhāto sampanna kālaḥ

original: Kālavipattīti durājadumanussakālasaṅkhāto vipannakālo. Payogasampattīti sammāpayogo.
analyzed: kāla vipatti iti du rāja dumanussa kāla saṅkhātaḥ vipanna kālaḥ payoga sampatti iti sammāpayogaḥ

original: Payogavipattīti micchāpayogo.
analyzed: payoga vipatti iti micchā apayogaḥ

original: Tattha ekaccassa bahūni pāpakammāni honti. Tāni gativipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa vipacceyyuṃ.
analyzed: tattha ekaccassa bahūni pāpa kammāni honti tāni gati vipattiyam ṭhitassa vipacceyyuṃ

original: So pana ekena kalyāṇakammena gatisampattiyaṃ devesu vā manussesu vā nibbatto. Tādise
analyzed: so pana ekena kalyāṇa kammena gati sampattiyam devesu vā manussesu vā nibbattaḥ tādise

original: ca ṭhāne akusalassa vāro natthi, ekantaṃ kusalasseva vāroti. Evamassa tāni kammāni
analyzed: ca ṭhāne akusalassa vāro natthi ekantam kusalassa iva vāro ti evam assa tāni kammāni

original: gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantīti pajānāti.
analyzed: gati sampatti paṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti iti pajānāti

original: Aparassāpi bahūni pāpakammāni honti. Tāni upadhivipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa vipacceyyuṃ.
analyzed: aparassa api bahūni pāpa kammāni honti tāni upadhi vipattiyam ṭhitassa vipacceyyuṃ

original: So pana ekena kalyāṇakammena upadhisampattiyaṃ ṭhito susaṇṭhitaṅgapaccaṅgo abhirūpo
analyzed: so pana ekena kalyāṇa kammena upadhi sampattiyam ṭhitaḥ su saṇṭhita aṅga paccaṅgaḥ abhirūpaḥ

original: dassanīyo brahmavacchasadiso. Sacepi dāsiyā kucchismiṃ dāsajāto hoti ‘evarūpo attabhāvo
analyzed: dassanīyaḥ brahma vaccha sadisaḥ sace pi dāsiyā kucchismim dāsa jātaḥ hoti evarūpaḥ atta bhāvo

original: kiliṭṭhakammassa nānucchaviko’ti hatthimeṇḍaassabandhakagopālakakammādīni taṃ na
analyzed: kiliṭṭha kammassa na anucchavikaḥ ti hatthi meṇḍa assabandhaka gopālaka kamma ādīni tam na

original: kārenti; sukhumavatthāni nivāsāpetvā bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānādīsu ṭhapenti. Sace itthī
analyzed: kārenti su khuma vatthāni bhaṇḍāgārika ṭṭhāna ādīsu ṭhapenti sace itthī

original: hoti, hatthibhattapacanādīni na kārenti; vatthālaṅkāraṃ datvā sayanapālikaṃ vā naṃ
analyzed: hoti hatthi bhattapacana ādīni na kārenti vattha alaṅkāram da tvā sayana pālikam vā

original: karonti, somadevi viya vallabhaṭṭhāne vā ṭhapenti. Bhātikarājakāle kira gomaṃsakhādake
analyzed: karonti vallabha ṭṭhāne vā ṭhapenti bhātika rāja kāle kira go maṃsa khādake

original: bahujane gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ. Te ‘daṇḍaṃ dātuṃ sakkothā’ti puṭṭhā ‘na sakkomā’ti
analyzed: bahu jane gahetvā raññaḥ dassesum te daṇḍam dātum sakkotha ati puṭṭhāḥ na sakkoma ati

original: vadiṃsu. Atha ne rājaṅgaṇe sodhake akaṃsu. Tesaṃ ekā dhītā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā.
analyzed: vadiṃsu atha ne rājaṅgaṇe sodhake tesam ekā dhītā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā

original: Taṃ disvā rājā antepuraṃ abhinetvā vallabhaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sesañātakāpi tassā ānubhāvena
analyzed: tam disvā rājā antepuram abhinetvā vallabha ṭṭhāne ṭhapesi sesa ñātakā api tassāḥ ānubhāvena

original: sukhaṃ jīviṃsu. Tādisasmiñhi attabhāve pāpakammānipi vipākaṃ dātuṃ na sakkonti. Evaṃ
analyzed: sukham jīviṃsu tādisasmin hi atta bhāve pāpa kammāni api vipākam dātum na sakkonti evam

original: upadhisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantīti pajānāti.
analyzed: upadhi sampatti paṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti iti pajānāti

original: Ekassa bahūni pāpakammāni honti. Tāni kālavipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa vipacceyyuṃ. So pana
analyzed: ekassa bahūni pāpa kammāni honti tāni kāla vipattiyam ṭhitassa vipacceyyum saḥ pana

original: ekena kalyāṇakammena paṭhamakappikānaṃ vā cakkavattirañño vā buddhānaṃ vā uppattisamaye
analyzed: ekena kalyāṇa kammena paṭhama kappikānam vā cakkavatti raññaḥ vā buddhānam vā uppatti samaye

original: surājasumanussakāle nibbatto. Tādise ca kāle nibbattassa akusalassa vipākaṃ dātuṃ
analyzed: su rāja su manussa kāle nibbattaḥ tādise ca kāle nibbattassa akusalassa vipākam dātum

original: okāso natthi, ekantaṃ kusalasseva okāsoti. Evaṃ kālasampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantīti pajānāti.
analyzed: okāsaḥ natthi ekantam kusalassa iva okāsaḥ ti evam kāla sampatti paṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti iti pajānāti

original: Aparassāpi bahūni pāpakammāni honti. Tāni payogavipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa vipacceyyuṃ.
analyzed: aparassa api bahūni pāpa kammāni honti tāni payoga vipattiyam ṭhitassa vipacceyyum

original: So pana ekena kalyāṇakammena payogasampattiyaṃ ṭhito pāṇātipātādīhi virato kāyavacīmanosucaritāni
analyzed: saḥ pana ekena kalyāṇa kammena payoga sampattiyam ṭhitaḥ pāṇa atipāta ādīhi virataḥ kāya vacī manaḥ su caritāni

original: pūreti. Tādise ṭhāne akusalassa vipaccanokāso natthi, ekantaṃ kusalasseva okāsoti.
analyzed: pūreti tādise ṭhāne akusalassa vipaccanokāsaḥ natthi ekantam kusalassa iva okāso ti

original: Evaṃ payogasampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantīti pajānāti.
analyzed: evam payoga sampatti paṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti iti pajānāti

original: Aparassāpi bahūni pāpakammāni honti. Tāni gatisampattiyaṃ ṭhitassa na vipacceyyuṃ.
analyzed: aparassa api bahūni pāpa kammāni honti tāni gati sampattiyam ṭhitassa na vipacceyyum

original: So panekena pāpakammena gativipattiyaṃyeva nibbatto. Tatthassa tāni kammāni upagantvā
analyzed: so panekena pāpa kammena gati vipattiyaṃ yeva nibbattaḥ tattha assa tāni kammāni upagantvā

original: vārena vārena vipākaṃ denti – kālena niraye nibbattāpenti, kālena tiracchānayoniyaṃ,

original: kālena pettivisaye, kālena asurakāye, dīghenāpi addhunā apāyato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ
analyzed: kālena pettivisaye kālena asura kāye dīghena api addhunā apāyataḥ sīsam ukkhipitum

original: na denti. Evaṃ gatisampattipaṭibāhitattā vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontāni gativipattiṃ āgamma
analyzed: na denti evam gati sampatti paṭibāhita ttā vipākam dātum a sakkontāni gati vipattim āgamma

original: vipaccantīti pajānāti.
analyzed: vipaccanti iti pajānāti

original: Aparassāpi bahūni pāpakammāni honti. Tāni upadhisampattiyaṃ ṭhitassa na vipacceyyuṃ.
analyzed: aparassa api bahūni pāpa kammāni honti tāni upadhi sampattiyam ṭhitassa na vipacceyyum

original: So pana ekena pāpakammena upadhivipattiyaṃyeva patiṭṭhito dubbaṇṇo durūpo dussaṇṭhito

original: bībhaccho pisācasadiso. So sace dāsiyā kucchiyaṃ dāsajāto ‘imāni etassa anucchavikānī’ti
analyzed: bībhacchaḥ pisāca sadisaḥ saḥ sace dāsiyā kucchiyam dāsa jātaḥ imāni etassa anucchavikāni iti

analyzed: sabbāni nam kiliṭṭha kammāni kārenti antamasaḥ pupphachaḍḍaka kammam upādāya sace itthī

original: hoti ‘imāni etissā anucchavikānī’ti sabbāni naṃ hatthibhattapacanādīni kiliṭṭhakammāni
analyzed: hoti imāni etissā anucchavikāni iti sabbāni nam hatthi bhatta pacana ādīni kiliṭṭha kammāni

original: kārenti. Kulagehe jātampi baliṃ sādhayamānā rājapurisā ‘gehadāsī’ti saññaṃ katvā
analyzed: kārenti kula gehe balim sādhayamānāḥ rāja purisāḥ geha dāsī iti saññam katvā

original: bandhitvā gacchanti, kotalavāpīgāme mahākuṭumbikassa gharaṇī viya. Evaṃ upadhisampattipaṭibāhitattā
analyzed: bandhitvā gacchanti kotala vāpī gāme mahākuṭumbikassa viya evam upadhi sampatti paṭibāhita ttā

original: vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontāni upadhivipattiṃ āgamma vipaccantīti pajānāti.
analyzed: vipākam dātum a sakkontāni upadhi vipattim āgamma vipaccanti iti pajānāti

original: Aparassāpi bahūni pāpakammāni honti. Tāni kālasampattiyaṃ nibbātassa na vipacceyyuṃ.
analyzed: aparassa api bahūni pāpa kammāni honti tāni kāla sampattiyam nibbātassa na vipacceyyum

original: So pana ekena pāpakammena kālavipattiyaṃ durājadumanussakāle kasaṭe niroje dasavassāyukakāle
analyzed: saḥ pana ekena pāpa kammena kāla vipattiyam du rāja du manussa kāle kasaṭe niroje dasa vassa āyuka kāle

original: nibbatto, yadā pañca gorasā pacchijjanti, kudrūsakaṃ aggabhojanaṃ hoti. Kiñcāpi manussaloke
analyzed: nibbattaḥ yadā pañca gorasā pacchijjanti kudrūsakam agga bhojanam hoti kiñcā api manussa loke

original: nibbatto, migapasusarikkhajīviko pana hoti. Evarūpe kāle kusalassa vipaccanokāso
analyzed: nibbattaḥ miga pasu sarikkha jīviko pana hoti evarūpe kāle kusalassa vipaccanokāsaḥ

original: natthi, ekantaṃ akusalasseva hoti. Evaṃ kālasampattipaṭibāhitattā vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontāni
analyzed: natthi ekantam akusalassa iva hoti evam kāla sampatti paṭibāhita ttā vipākam dātum a sakkontāni

analyzed: kāla vipattim āgamma vipaccanti iti pajānāti

original: Aparassāpi bahūni pāpakammāni honti. Tāni payogasampattiyaṃ ṭhitassa na vipacceyyuṃ.
analyzed: aparassa api bahūni pāpa kammāni honti tāni payoga sampattiyam ṭhitassa na vipacceyyum

original: So pana payogavipattiyaṃ ṭhito pāṇātipātādīni dasa akusalakammāni karoti. Tamenaṃ
analyzed: so pana payoga vipattiyam ṭhito pāṇātipāta ādīni dasa akusala kammāni karoti tam enam

original: sahoḍḍhaṃ gahetvā rañño dassenti. Rājā bahūkammakāraṇāni kāretvā ghātāpeti. Evaṃ
analyzed: sahoḍḍham gahetvā raññaḥ dassenti rājā bahu kamma kāraṇāni kāretvā ghātāpeti evam

original: payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontāni payogavipattiṃ āgamma vipaccantīti
analyzed: payoga sampatti paṭibāhita ttā vipākam dātum a sakkontāni payoga vipattim āgamma vipaccanti iti

original: pajānāti. Evaṃ catūhi sampattīhi paṭibāhitaṃ pāpakammaṃ vipākaṃ adatvā catasso vipattiyo āgamma deti.
analyzed: pajānāti evam catūhi sampattīhi paṭibāhitam pāpa kammam vipākam a datvā catassaḥ vipattiyaḥ āgamma deti

original: Yathā hi kocideva puriso kenacideva kammena rājānaṃ ārādheyya. Athassa rājā ṭhānantaraṃ
analyzed: yathā hi kocid eva purisaḥ kenacid eva kammena rājānam ārādheyya athassa rājā

original: datvā janapadaṃ dadeyya. So taṃ sammā paribhuñjituṃ asakkonto makkaṭena gahitabhattapuṭaṃ
analyzed: da tvā janapadam dadeyya saḥ tam sammā paribhuñjitum a sakkontaḥ makkaṭena gahita bhatta puṭam

original: viya bhindeyya; yassa yaṃ yānaṃ vā vāhanaṃ vā dāsaṃ vā dāsiṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā vatthuṃ

original: vā sampannarūpaṃ passati, sabbaṃ balakkārena gaṇheyya. Manussā ‘rājavallabho’ti kiñci

original: vattuṃ na sakkuṇeyyuṃ. So aññassa vallabhatarassa rājamahāmattassa virujjheyya. So
analyzed: vattum na sakkuṇeyyum saḥ aññassa vallabhatarassa rāja mahāmattassa virujjheyya saḥ

original: taṃ gahetvā supothitaṃ pothāpetvā bhūmiṃ piṭṭhiyā ghaṃsāpento nikkaḍḍhāpetvā rājānaṃ

analyzed: bandhāpetvā asukena nāma kassa kim nagare bherim carāpeyya manussā

original: āgantvā ‘mayhaṃ idaṃ gahitaṃ, mayhaṃ idaṃ gahita’nti viravasahassaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyuṃ.
analyzed: āgantvā mayham idam gahitam mayham idam gahitanti virava sahassam uṭṭhāpeyyuṃ

original: Rājā bhiyyoso mattāya kuddho nānappakārena taṃ bandhanāgāre kilametvā ghātāpetvā
analyzed: rājā bhiyyosaḥ mattāya kuddhaḥ nānappakārena tam bandhanāgāre kilametvā ghātāpetvā

original: Tassa hi purisassa hi kenacideva kammena rājānaṃ ārādhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ laddhakālo

original: sagge nibbatte akusalassa vipaccanokāsaṃ alabhanakālo. Tassa ekadivasaṃ ekasmiṃ rājavallabhatare

analyzed: virajjhitvā tena kuddhena nam pothāpetvā raññaḥ ārocetvā bandhanāgāre bandhāpita kālaḥ

original: viya imassa saggato cavitvā niraye nibbattakālo. Manussānaṃ ‘mayhaṃ idaṃ gahitaṃ,

original: mayhaṃ idaṃ gahita’nti viravakālo viya tasmiṃ niraye nibbatte sabbākusalakammānaṃ

original: sannipatitvā gahaṇakālo. Susāne chaḍḍetvā saṅkhalikānaṃ āharaṇakālo viya ekekasmiṃ

original: kamme khīṇe itarassa itarassa vipākena nirayato sīsaṃ anukkhipitvā sakalakappaṃ nirayamhi
analyzed: kamme khīṇe itarassa itarassa vipākena nirayataḥ sīsam an ukkhipitvā sakala kappam nirayamhi

original: paccanakālo. Kappaṭṭhitikakammañhi katvā ekakappaṃ nirayamhi paccanakasattā neva
analyzed: paccana kālaḥ kappa ṭṭhitika kammam hi katvā eka kappam nirayamhi paccanaka sattā na iva

original: eko, na dve, na sataṃ, na sahassaṃ. Evaṃ paccanakasattā kira gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.

original: Atthekaccāni kalyāṇāni kammasamādānāni gativipattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantītiādīsupi

original: evaṃ yojanā veditabbā. Idhekaccassa bahūni kalyāṇakammāni honti. Tāni gatisampattiyaṃ

original: ṭhitassa vipacceyuṃ. So pana ekena pāpakammena gativipattiyaṃ niraye vā asurakāye

original: vā nibbatto. Tādise ca ṭhāne kusalaṃ vipākaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti, ekantaṃ akusalameva

original: sakkotīti. Evamassa tāni kammāni gativipattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantīti pajānāti.
analyzed: sakkoti iti evam assa tāni kammāni gati vipatti paṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti iti pajānāti

original: Aparassāpi bahūni kalyāṇakammāni honti. Tāni upadhisampattiyaṃ ṭhitassa vipacceyyuṃ.
analyzed: aparassa api bahūni kalyāṇa kammāni honti tāni upadhi sampattiyam ṭhitassa vipacceyyum

original: So pana ekena pāpakammena upadhivipattiyaṃ patiṭṭhito dubbaṇṇo hoti pisācasadiso.
analyzed: so pana ekena pāpa kammena upadhi vipattiyam patiṭṭhitaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ hoti pisāca sadiso

original: So sacepi rājakule nibbatto pituaccayena ‘kiṃ imassa nissirīkassa rajjenā’ti rajjaṃ

original: Dutiyabalaniddesavaṇṇanā.

analyzed: ekaḥ tena iva kammena niraye nibbattati ekaḥ tiracchānayoniyam ekaḥ petti visaye tam

original: tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva ‘iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa niraye nibbattissati,
analyzed: tathāgataḥ āyūhana kkhaṇe iva iminā nīhārena āyūhita ttā esa niraye nibbattissati

original: esa tiracchānayoniyaṃ, esa pettivisaye’ti pajānāti. Niraye nibbattamānampi ‘esa aṭṭhasu
analyzed: tiracchānayoniyam esa petti visaya iti pajānāti niraye nibbattamānam pi esa aṭṭhasu

original: mahānirayesu nibbattissati, esa soḷasasu ussadanirayesu nibbattissatī’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: mahānirayesu nibbattissati esa soḷasasu ussada nirayesu nibbattissati iti pajānāti

original: Tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattamānampi ‘esa apādako bhavissati, esa dvipādako, esa catuppādako,

original: esa bahuppādako’ti pajānāti. Pettivisaye nibbattamānampi ‘esa nijjhāmataṇhiko bhavissati,
analyzed: esa bahu ppādakaḥ ti pajānāti petti visaye nibbattamānam pi esa nijjhāma taṇhikaḥ bhavissati

original: esa khuppipāsiko, esa paradattūpajīvī’ti pajānāti. Tesu ca kammesu ‘idaṃ kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
analyzed: esa khuppipāsikaḥ esa para dattūpajīvī iti pajānāti tesu ca kammesu idam kammam paṭisandhim

original: Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu ekato piṇḍapātaṃ dadamānesu sabbesampi cetanā piṇḍapātārammaṇāva
analyzed: tathā sakala gāmavāsikesu ekatas piṇḍapātam dadamānesu sabbesam pi cetanā piṇḍapāta ārammaṇā ava

analyzed: hoti tam pana kammam tesam āyūhanakkhaṇeya iva purima nayena nānā hoti tesu keci deva loke

analyzed: nibbattissanti keci manussa loke tam tathāgataḥ āyūhana kkhaṇeya iva iminā nīhārena

original: āyūhitattā esa manussaloke nibbattissati, esa devaloke’ti pajānāti. Devaloke nibbattamānānampi

analyzed: esa tāvatiṃsesu esa cātumahārājikesu esa bhummadevesu esa pana jeṭṭhaka deva rājā

original: hutvā nibbattissati, esa etassa dutiyaṃ vā tatiyaṃ vā ṭhānantaraṃ karonto paricārako
analyzed: hutvā nibbattissati esaḥ etassa dutiyam vā tatiyam vā karonto paricārako

original: hutvā nibbattissatī’ti pajānāti. Manussesu nibbattamānānampi ‘esa khattiyakule nibbattissati,
analyzed: hutvā nibbattissati iti pajānāti manussesu nibbattamānānam pi esa khattiya kule nibbattissati

original: esa brāhmaṇakule, esa vessakule, esa suddakule; esa pana manussesu rājā hutvā nibbattissati,

original: esa etassa dutiyaṃ vā tatiyaṃ vā ṭhānantaraṃ karonto paricārako hutvā nibbattissatī’ti
analyzed: esaḥ etassa dutiyam vā tatiyam vā ṭhāna ntaram karonto paricārakaḥ hutvā nibbattissati iti

original: dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkaṃ bhavissatī’ti pajānāti.

original: Tathā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentesuyeva yena nīhārena vipassanā āraddhā, ‘esa arahattaṃ

original: Catutthabalaniddesavaṇṇanā.
Pañcamabalaniddeso
813. Pañcamabalaniddese hīnādhimuttikāti hīnajjhāsayā. Paṇītādhimuttikāti kalyāṇajjhāsayā.

analyzed: upasaṅkamanti attanā sadise hīna adhimuttike eva upasaṅkamanti

original: Taṃ uttānatthameva. Idaṃ pana dussīlānaṃ dussīlasevanameva, sīlavantānaṃ sīlavantasevanameva,

original: Ajjhāsayadhātu niyāmeti. Sambahulā kira bhikkhū ekaṃ gāmaṃ gaṇabhikkhācāraṃ caranti.

original: Pañcamabalaniddesavaṇṇanā.
Chaṭṭhabalaniddeso

analyzed: evam chaṭṭha balassa mātikam ṭhapetvā idāni yathā paṭipāṭiyā bhājento katamo ca

original: sattānaṃ āsayotiādimāha. Tattha sassato lokotiādīnaṃ attho heṭṭhā nikkhepakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ
analyzed: sattānam āsayo tiādim āha tattha sassataḥ loko ti ādīnam atthaḥ heṭṭhā nikkhepa kaṇḍa vaṇṇanā ayam

original: vuttoyeva. Iti bhavadiṭṭhisannissitā vāti evaṃ sassatadiṭṭhiṃ vā sannissitā. Sassatadiṭṭhi
analyzed: vuttā yā iva iti bhava diṭṭhi sannissitā vā ati evam sassata diṭṭhim vā sannissitā sassata diṭṭhi

original: hi ettha bhavadiṭṭhīti vuttā; ucchedadiṭṭhi ca vibhavadiṭṭhīti. Sabbadiṭṭhīnañhi
analyzed: hi ettha bhava diṭṭhī iti vuttā uccheda diṭṭhi ca vibhava diṭṭhī iti sabba diṭṭhīnam hi

original: sassatucchedadiṭṭhī hi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā imāva dve diṭṭhiyo
analyzed: hi saṅgahita ttā sabbe pi diṭṭhi gatikā sattā imā va dve diṭṭhiyaḥ

original: sannissitā honti. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “dvayasannissito kho panāyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena
analyzed: sannissitāḥ honti vuttam pi ca itam dvaya sannissitaḥ kho pana ayam kaccāna lokaḥ yebhuyyena

original: – atthitañceva natthitañcā”ti. Ettha hi atthitāti sassataṃ, natthitāti ucchedo. Ayaṃ
analyzed: atthitam ca iva na atthitam ca ati ettha hi atthitā ati sassatam na atthitā ati ucchedaḥ ayam

original: tāva vaṭṭasannissitānaṃ puthujjanasattānaṃ āsayo.
analyzed: tāva vaṭṭa sannissitānam puthujjana sattānam āsayaḥ

original: Idāni vivaṭṭasannissitānaṃ suddhasattānaṃ āsayaṃ dassetuṃ ete vā pana ubho ante anupagammātiādi
analyzed: idāni vivaṭṭa sannissitānam suddha sattānam āsayam dassetuṃ ete vā pana ubho ante an upagamma itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha ete vā panāti eteyeva. Ubho anteti sassatucchedasaṅkhāte dve ante.
analyzed: vuttam tattha ete vā pana ati ubho ante iti sassatu cheda saṅkhāte dve ante

original: Anupagammāti anallīyitvā. Idappaccayatā paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesūti idappaccayatāya
analyzed: an upagamma ati an allīyitvā idappaccaya tā paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu iti idappaccaya tāya

original: ceva paṭiccasamuppannadhammesu ca. Anulomikā khantīti vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Yathābhūtaṃ
analyzed: ca iva paṭiccasamuppanna dhammesu ca anulomikā khanti iti vipassanā ñāṇam yathābhūtam

original: vā ñāṇanti maggañāṇaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yā paṭiccasamuppāde ceva paṭiccasamuppannadhammesu
analyzed: vā ñāṇam ti magga ñāṇam idam vuttam hoti yā paṭiccasamuppāde ca iva paṭiccasamuppanna dhammesu

original: ca ete ubho sassatucchedaante anupagantvā vipassanā paṭiladdhā, yañca tato uttarimaggañāṇaṃ
analyzed: ca ete ubho an upagantvā vipassanā paṭiladdhā yat ca tatas uttari magga ñāṇaṃ

original: – ayaṃ sattānaṃ āsayo, ayaṃ vaṭṭasannissitānañca vivaṭṭasannissitānañca sabbesampi
analyzed: ayam sattānam āsayaḥ ayam vaṭṭa sannissitānam ca vivaṭṭa sannissitānam ca sabbesam pi

original: sattānaṃ āsayo, idaṃ vasanaṭṭhānanti. Ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ samānatthakathā.
analyzed: sattānam āsayaḥ idam vasanaṭṭhānan ti ayam ācariyānam samāna attha kathā

original: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha – ‘maggo nāma vāsaṃ viddhaṃsento gacchati, nanu tvaṃ maggo vāsoti
analyzed: vitaṇḍa vādī pana āha maggaḥ nāma vāsam gacchati nanu tvam maggaḥ vāsa iti

original: vadesī’ti? So vattabbo ‘tvaṃ ariyavāsabhāṇako hosi na hosī’ti? Sace pana ‘na homī’ti
analyzed: vadesi iti so vattabbo tvam ariya vāsa bhāṇakaḥ hosi na hosi iti sace pana na homi iti

original: vadati, ‘abhāṇakatāya na jānāsī’ti vattabbo. Sace ‘bhāṇakosmī’ti vadati, ‘suttaṃ
analyzed: vadati abhāṇaka tāya na jānāsi iti vattabbo sace bhāṇakaḥ asmi iti vadati suttam

original: āharā’ti vattabbo. Sace āharati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ; no ce āharati sayaṃ āharitabbaṃ
analyzed: āharāti vattabbaḥ sace āharati icca etam kusalam no ce āharati sayam āharitabbam

original: – “dasayime, bhikkhave, ariyavāsā, ye ariyā āvasiṃsu vā āvasanti vā āvasissanti vā”ti.
analyzed: dasa yime bhikkhave ariya vāsāḥ ye ariyāḥ āvasiṃsu vā āvasanti vā āvasissanti vā ati

original: Etañhi suttaṃ maggassa vāsabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Tasmā sukathitamevetanti. Idaṃ pana bhagavā
analyzed: etat hi suttam maggassa vāsa bhāvam dīpeti tasmā su kathitam eva itan ti idam pana bhagavā

original: sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānanto imesañca diṭṭhigatānaṃ vipassanāñāṇamaggañāṇānaṃ appavattikkhaṇepi
analyzed: sattānam āsayam jānantaḥ imesam ca diṭṭhi gatānam vipassanā ñāṇa magga ñāṇānam appavatti kkhaṇe pi

original: jānāti eva. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
analyzed: jānāti eva

original: “Kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti. Nekkhammaṃ
analyzed: kāmam sevantañca eva jānāti ayam puggalaḥ kāma garukaḥ kāma āsayaḥ kāma adhimuttaḥ ti nekkhammam

original: sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti.
analyzed: sevantañca na eva jānāti ayam puggalaḥ nekkhamma garukaḥ nekkhamma āsayaḥ nekkhamma adhimuttaḥ ti

original: Byāpādaṃ…pe… abyāpādaṃ… thinamiddhaṃ…pe… ālokasaññaṃ nekkhammaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti
analyzed: byāpādam pe a byāpādam thinamiddham pe āloka saññam nekkhammam sevantam ñeva jānāti

original: sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo ālokasaññāgaruko ālokasaññāsayo ālokasaññādhimutto”ti.
analyzed: sevantam ñeva jānāti ayam puggalaḥ āloka saññā garukaḥ āloka saññā sayaḥ āloka saññā adhimuttaḥ ti

original: 816. Anusayaniddese kāmarāgo ca so appahīnaṭṭhena anusayo cāti kāmarāgānusayo. Sesapadesupi
analyzed: anusaya niddese kāma rāgo ca so appahīna ṭṭhena anusayo ca ati kāma rāga anusayo sesa padesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Yaṃ loke piyarūpanti yaṃ imasmiṃ loke piyajātikaṃ. Sātarūpanti sātajātikaṃ
analyzed: eṣā iva nayaḥ yam loke yam imasmin loke piya jātikam sāta jātikam

original: assādapadaṭṭhānaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ. Ettha sattānaṃ rāgānusayo anusetīti etasmiṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe
analyzed: assāda padaṭṭhānam iṭṭha ārammaṇam ettha sattānam rāga anusayaḥ anuseti iti etasmin iṭṭha ārammaṇe

original: sattānaṃ appahīnaṭṭhena rāgānusayo anuseti. Yathā nāma udake nimuggassa heṭṭhā ca
analyzed: sattānam appahīna ṭṭhena rāga anusayaḥ anuseti yathā nāma udake nimuggassa heṭṭhā ca

original: upari ca samantabhāge ca udakameva hoti, evameva iṭṭhārammaṇe rāguppatti nāma sattānaṃ
analyzed: upari ca samanta bhāge ca udakam eva hoti evam eva iṭṭha ārammaṇe rāga uppatti nāma sattānam

original: āciṇṇasamāciṇṇā. Tathā aniṭṭhārammaṇe paṭighuppatti. Iti imesu dvīsu dhammesūti evaṃ
analyzed: āciṇṇa samāciṇṇā tathā aniṭṭha ārammaṇe paṭigha uppatti iti imesu dvīsu dhammesu iti evam

original: imesu dvīsu kāmarāgapaṭighavantesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇadhammesu. Avijjānupatitāti kāmarāgapaṭighasampayuttā
analyzed: imesu dvīsu kāma rāga paṭighavantesu iṭṭha aniṭṭha ārammaṇa dhammesu avijjā anupatitā ati kāma rāga paṭigha sampayuttā

original: hutvā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avijjā anupatitā. Tadekaṭṭhoti tāya avijjāya sampayuttekaṭṭhavasena
analyzed: hutvā ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena avijjā anupatitā tad ekaṭṭhaḥ ti tāya avijjāya sampayutta ikaṭṭha vasena

original: ekaṭṭho. Māno ca diṭṭhi ca vicikicchā cāti navavidho māno, dvāsaṭṭhividhā diṭṭhi,
analyzed: ekaṭṭhaḥ māno ca diṭṭhi ca vicikicchā ca ati navavidhaḥ mānaḥ dvāsaṭṭhividhā diṭṭhi

original: aṭṭhavatthukā ca vicikicchā. Bhavarāgānusayo panettha kāmarāgānusayeneva saṅgahitoti veditabbo.
analyzed: aṭṭha vatthukā ca vicikicchā bhava rāga anusayaḥ pana ittha kāma rāga anusayena iva saṅgahito ti veditabbo

original: 817. Caritaniddese terasa cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro, dvādasa apuññābhisaṅkhāro, catasso
analyzed: carita niddese terasa cetanā puñña abhisaṅkhāro dvādasa apuñña abhisaṅkhāro catasso

original: āneñjābhisaṅkhāro. Tattha kāmāvacaro parittabhūmako, itaro mahābhūmako. Tīsupi vā
analyzed: āneñja abhisaṅkhāro tattha kāmāvacaro paritta bhūmakaḥ itaraḥ mahā bhūmakaḥ vā

original: etesu yo koci appavipāko parittabhūmako, bahuvipāko mahābhūmakoti veditabbo.
analyzed: etesu yaḥ koci appa vipākaḥ paritta bhūmakaḥ bahu vipākaḥ mahā bhūmakaḥ ti veditabbo

original: 818. Adhimuttiniddeso heṭṭhā pakāsitova. Kasmā panāyaṃ adhimutti heṭṭhā vuttāpi puna
analyzed: adhimutti niddesaḥ heṭṭhā pakāsitaḥ uva kasmā pana ayam adhimutti heṭṭhā vuttā api puna

original: gahitāti? Ayañhi heṭṭhā pāṭiyekkaṃ baladassanavasena gahitā, idha sattānaṃ tikkhindriyamudindriyabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
analyzed: gahitā ti ayam hi heṭṭhā pāṭiyekkam bala dassana vasena gahitā idha sattānam tikkhindriya mud indriya bhāva dassana attham

original: 819. Mahārajakkhaniddese ussadagatānīti vepullagatāni. Pahānakkamavasena cesa uppaṭipāṭiyā niddeso kato.
analyzed: mahārajakkha niddese ussada gatāni iti vepulla gatāni pahāna kkama vasena ca isa uppaṭi pāṭiyā niddeso kato

original: 820. Anussadagatānīti avepullagatāniṃ. Tikkhindriyamudindriyaniddese upanissayaindriyāni nāma kathitāni. Uppaṭipāṭiyā niddese panettha payojanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: anussada gatāni iti tikkhindriya mudindriya niddese upanissaya aindriyāni nāma kathitāni uppaṭipāṭiyāḥ niddese pana ittha payojanam heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: 823. Tathā dvākāraniddesādīsu pāpāsayāti akusalāsayā. Pāpacaritāti apuññābhisaṅkhāraparipūrakā. Pāpādhimuttikāti sakkāyābhiratā vaṭṭajjhāsayā.
analyzed: tathā dvi ākāra niddesa ādīsu pāpa āsayā ati akusala āsayā pāpa caritā ati apuñña abhisaṅkhāra paripūrakā pāpa adhimuttikā ati sakkāya abhiratā vaṭṭajjhāsayā

original: 824. Svākāraniddese yasmā kalyāṇako nāma anusayo natthi, tasmā kalyāṇānusayāti na vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttavipariyāyena veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: su ākāra niddese yasmā kalyāṇakaḥ nāma anusayaḥ natthi tasmā kalyāṇa anusayā ti na vuttam sesam vutta vipariyāyena veditabbam

original: 826. Bhabbābhabbaniddese kammāvaraṇenāti pañcavidhena ānantariyakammena. Kilesāvaraṇenāti
analyzed: bhabba abhabba niddese kamma āvaraṇena ati pañcavidhena ānantariya kammena kilesa āvaraṇena ati

original: niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā. Vipākāvaraṇenāti ahetukapaṭisandhiyā. Yasmā pana duhetukānampi
analyzed: niyatam icchā diṭṭhiyā vipāka āvaraṇena ati ahetuka paṭisandhiyā yasmai pana

original: ariyamaggapaṭivedho natthi, tasmā duhetukapaṭisandhipi vipākāvaraṇamevāti veditabbā.
analyzed: ariya magga paṭivedhaḥ natthi tasmā du hetuka paṭisandhi pi vipāka āvaraṇam eva ti veditabbā

original: Assaddhāti buddhādīsu saddhārahitā. Acchandikāti kattukamyatākusalacchandarahitā.
analyzed: assaddhā ati buddha ādīsu saddhā rahitā acchandikā ati kattu kamyatā akusala chanda rahitā

original: Uttarakurukā manussā acchandikaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā. Duppaññāti bhavaṅgapaññāya parihīnā.
analyzed: uttarakurukāḥ manussāḥ acchandika ṭṭhānam paviṭṭhāḥ duppaññā ati bhavaṅga paññāya parihīnā

original: Bhavaṅgapaññāya pana paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa pādakaṃ na hoti,
analyzed: bhavaṅga paññāya pana yassa bhavaṅgam lokuttarassa pādakam na hoti

original: so duppaññoyeva nāma. Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu
analyzed: so duppaññaḥ yā iva nāma abhabbā niyāmam okkamitum kusalesu dhammesu kusalesu

original: dhammesu sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ okkamituṃ abhabbā.
analyzed: dhammesu sammatta niyāma saṅkhātam maggam okkamitum abhabbā

original: 827. Na kammāvaraṇenātiādīni vuttavipariyāyena veditabbāni. Idaṃ dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ
analyzed: na kamma āvaraṇena ati ādīni vutta vipariyāyena veditabbāni idam dvinnam ñāṇānam

original: bhājanīyaṃ – indriyaparopariyattiñāṇassa ca āsayānusayañāṇassa ca. Ettha hi āsayānusayañāṇena
analyzed: bhājanīyam indriya paropariyatti ñāṇassa ca āsaya anusaya ñāṇassa ca ettha hi āsaya anusaya ñāṇena

original: indriyaparopariyattiñāṇampi bhājitaṃ. Iti imāni dve ñāṇāni ekato hutvā ekaṃ balañāṇaṃ nāma jātanti.
analyzed: bhājitam iti imāni dve ñāṇāni ekatas hutvā ekam balañāṇam nāma jātanti

original: Chaṭṭhabalaniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: chaṭṭha bala niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: Sattamabalaniddeso
analyzed: sattama bala niddeso

original: 828. Sattamabalaniddese jhāyatīti jhāyī. Cattāro jhāyīti jhāyino cattāro janā vuccanti.
analyzed: sattama bala niddese jhāyati iti jhāyī cattāraḥ jhāyī iti jhāyino cattāro janāḥ vuccanti

original: Tattha paṭhamacatukke tāva paṭhamo samāpattilābhī samānoyeva ‘na lābhīmhī’ti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tattha paṭhama catukke tāva paṭhamaḥ samāpatti lābhī samāno yeva na kammaṭṭhānaṃ

original: samānaṃyeva ‘na kammaṭṭhāna’nti saññī hoti. Ayaṃ appaguṇajjhānalābhīti veditabbo.
analyzed: samānam yeva na kammaṭṭhānan ti saññī hoti ayam appaguṇa jhāna lābhī iti veditabbo

original: Dutiyo samāpattiyā alābhīyeva ‘lābhīmhī’ti, akammaṭṭhānaṃ samānaṃyeva ‘kammaṭṭhāna’nti
analyzed: dutiyaḥ samāpattiyā a lābhīya iva lābhīmhi iti akammaṭṭhānam samānam yeva kammaṭṭhānam ti

original: saññī hoti. Ayaṃ niddājhāyī nāma. Niddāyitvā paṭibuddho evaṃ maññati. Tatiyo samāpattilābhī
analyzed: saññī hoti ayam niddājhāyī nāma niddāyitvā paṭibuddhaḥ evam maññati tatiyaḥ samāpatti lābhī

original: samāno ‘samāpattilābhīmhī’ti, kammaṭṭhānameva samānaṃ ‘kammaṭṭhāna’nti saññī hoti.
analyzed: samānaḥ samāpatti lābhīmhi iti kammaṭṭhānam eva samānam kammaṭṭhānam ti saññī hoti

original: Ayaṃ paguṇajjhānalābhīti veditabbo. Catuttho alābhīyeva ‘alābhīmhī’ti, akammaṭṭhānaṃyeva
analyzed: ayam paguṇa jhāna lābhī iti veditabbo catutthaḥ alābhīya iva alābhīmhi iti

original: ‘akammaṭṭhāna’nti saññī hoti. Evamettha dve janā ajjhāyinova jhāyīnaṃ anto paviṭṭhattā jhāyīti vuttā.
analyzed: a kammaṭṭhānam ti saññī hoti evam ettha dve janā ajjhāyinaḥ iva jhāyīnam antar paviṭṭhattā jhāyī iti vuttā

original: Dutiyacatukke sasaṅkhārena sappayogena samādhipāribandhikadhamme vikkhambhento dandhaṃ
analyzed: dutiya catukke sa saṅkhārena sa payogena samādhi pāribandhika dhamme vikkhambhentaḥ dandham

original: samāpajjati nāma. Ekaṃ dve cittavāre ṭhatvā sahasā vuṭṭhahantā khippaṃ vuṭṭhahati
analyzed: samāpajjati nāma ekam dve citta vāre ṭhatvā sahasā vuṭṭhahantā khippam vuṭṭhahati

original: nāma. Sukheneva pana samādhipāribandhikadhamme sodhento khippaṃ samāpajjati nāma.
analyzed: nāma sukhena iva pana samādhi pāribandhika dhamme sodhento khippam samāpajjati nāma

original: Yathāparicchedena avuṭṭhahitvā kālaṃ atināmetvā vuṭṭhahanto dandhaṃ vuṭṭhāti nāma.
analyzed: yathā paricchedena a vuṭṭhahitvā kālam atināmetvā vuṭṭhahantaḥ dandham vuṭṭhāti nāma

original: Itare dvepi imināva nayena veditabbā. Ime cattāropi janā samāpattilābhinova.
analyzed: itare dve pi iminā ava nayena veditabbā ime cattāraḥ api janā samāpatti lābhinaḥ va

original: Tatiyacatukke ‘idaṃ jhānaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ, idaṃ caturaṅgika’nti evaṃ aṅgavavatthānaparicchede
analyzed: tatiya catukke idam jhānam pañcaṅgikam idam catur aṅgikam ti evam aṅga vavatthāna paricchede

original: cheko samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo nāma. Nīvaraṇāni pana vikkhambhetvā cittamañjūsāya
analyzed: chekaḥ samādhismim samādhi kusalaḥ nāma nīvaraṇāni pana vikkhambhetvā citta mañjūsāya

original: cittaṃ ṭhapetuṃ acheko no samādhismiṃ samāpattikusalo nāma. Itarepi tayo imināva
analyzed: cittam ṭhapetum achekaḥ no samādhismim samāpatti kusalaḥ nāma itare pi tayo

original: nayena veditabbā. Imepi cattāro samāpattilābhinoyeva.
analyzed: nayena veditabbāḥ ime pi cattāraḥ samāpatti lābhinaḥ yā iva

original: Idāni yāni jhānāni nissāya ime puggalā ‘jhāyī’ nāma jātā, tāni dassetuṃ cattāri jhānānītiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni yāni jhānāni nissāya ime puggalāḥ jhāyī nāma jātā tāni dassetum cattāri jhānāni iti ādim āha

original: Tattha cattāri jhānāni tayo ca vimokkhā atthato heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyameva

original: mado. Majjanākāro majjanā. Majjitabhāvo majjitattaṃ. Māno maññanātiādīni heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ

original: vuttatthāneva. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evaṃ jātiyā sati taṃ jātiṃ nissāya uppanno majjanākārappavatto

original: Ārogyamadādīsu ‘ahaṃ arogo, avasesā rogabahulā, gadduhanamattampi mayhaṃ byādhi nāma natthī’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno ārogyamado nāma.
analyzed: ārogya mada ādīsu aham arogaḥ avasesāḥ roga bahulāḥ mayham byādhi nāma natthi iti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ ārogya madaḥ nāma

original: ‘Ahaṃ taruṇo, avasesasattānaṃ attabhāvo papāte ṭhitarukkhasadiso, ahaṃ pana paṭhamavaye ṭhito’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno yobbanamado nāma.
analyzed: aham taruṇaḥ avasesa sattānam atta bhāvo papāte ṭhita rukkha sadisaḥ aham pana paṭhama vaye ṭhitaḥ ti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ yobbana madaḥ nāma

original: ‘Ahaṃ ciraṃ jīviṃ, ciraṃ jīvāmi, ciraṃ jīvissāmi; sukhaṃ jīviṃ, sukhaṃ jīvāmi, sukhaṃ jīvissāmī’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno jīvitamado nāma.
analyzed: aham ciram jīvim ciram jīvāmi ciram jīvissāmi sukham jīvim sukham jīvāmi sukham jīvissāmi iti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ jīvita madaḥ nāma

original: ‘Ahaṃ lābhī, avasesā sattā appalābhā, mayhaṃ pana lābhassa pamāṇaṃ nāma natthī’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno lābhamado nāma.
analyzed: aham lābhī avasesā sattāḥ appalābhāḥ mayham pana lābhassa pamāṇam nāma natthi iti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ lābhamadaḥ nāma

original: ‘Avasesā sattā yaṃ vā taṃ vā labhanti, ahaṃ pana sukataṃ paṇītaṃ cīvarādipaccayaṃ labhāmī’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno sakkāramado nāma.
analyzed: avasesā sattā yam vā tam vā labhanti aham pana su katam paṇītam cīvara ādi paccayam labhāmi iti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ sakkāramadaḥ nāma

original: ‘Avasesabhikkhūnaṃ pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ akkamitvā gacchantā manussā ayaṃ samaṇotipi na vandanti,
analyzed: avasesa bhikkhūnam pāda piṭṭhiyam akkamitvā gacchantāḥ manussāḥ ayam samaṇaḥ ti pi na vandanti

original: ‘Uppanno pañho mayhameva mukhena chijjati, bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantāpi mameva purato katvā parivāretvā gacchantī’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno purekkhāramado nāma.
analyzed: uppannaḥ pañhaḥ mayham eva mukhena chijjati bhikkhācāram gacchantā api mama eva puratas katvā parivāretvā gacchanti iti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ purekkhāramadaḥ nāma

original: ahaṃ mahāparivāro ceva suciparivāro cā’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno parivāramado nāma.
analyzed: aham mahā parivāraḥ ca iva suci parivāraḥ ca ati majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ parivāramadaḥ nāma

analyzed: bhogo pana kiñcā api lābha ggahaṇena iva gahito hoti imasmim pana ṭhāne

analyzed: kitti saddaḥ deva manussesu pākaṭaḥ iti pi theraḥ bahu ssutaḥ itipi sīlavā itipi dhuta guṇa yutto ti

original: majjanavasena uppanno māno vaṇṇamado nāma.
analyzed: majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ vaṇṇamadaḥ nāma

original: ‘Avasesā sattā appassutā, ahaṃ pana bahussuto’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno sutamado nāma.
analyzed: avasesā sattā appassutā aham pana bahu ssutaḥ ti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ sutamadaḥ nāma

original: ‘Avasesā sattā appaṭibhānā, mayhaṃ pana paṭibhānassa pamāṇaṃ natthī’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno paṭibhānamado nāma.
analyzed: avasesā sattā appaṭibhānā mayham pana paṭibhānassa pamāṇam natthi iti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ paṭibhānamadaḥ nāma

original: ‘Ahaṃ rattaññū asukaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ, rājavaṃsaṃ, janapadavaṃsaṃ, gāmavaṃsaṃ, rattindivaparicchedaṃ, nakkhattamuhuttayogaṃ jānāmī’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno rattaññumado nāma.
analyzed: aham rattaññū asukam buddha vaṃsam rāja vaṃsam janapada vaṃsam gāma vaṃsam ratti indiva paricchedam nakkhatta muhutta yogam jānāmi iti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ rattaññumadaḥ nāma

original: ‘Avasesā bhikkhū antarā piṇḍapātikā jātā, ahaṃ pana jātipiṇḍapātiko’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno piṇḍapātikamado nāma.
analyzed: avasesāḥ bhikkhū antarā piṇḍapātikāḥ jātāḥ aham pana jāti piṇḍapātikaḥ iti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ piṇḍapātika madaḥ nāma

original: ‘Avasesā sattā uññātā avaññātā, ahaṃ pana anuññāto anavaññāto’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno anavaññātamado nāma.
analyzed: avasesā sattā uññātā avaññātā aham pana anuññātaḥ anavaññātaḥ ti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ anavaññātamadaḥ nāma

original: ‘Avasesānaṃ iriyāpatho apāsādiko, mayhaṃ pana pāsādiko’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno iriyāpathamado nāma.
analyzed: avasesānam iriyāpathaḥ apāsādikaḥ mayham pana pāsādikaḥ iti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ iriyāpatha madaḥ nāma

original: ‘Avasesā sattā chinnapakkhakākasadisā, ahaṃ pana mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo’ti vā ‘ahaṃ yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ karomi, taṃ taṃ ijjhatī’ti vā majjanavasena uppanno māno iddhimado nāma.
analyzed: avasesā sattā chinna pakkha kāka sadisā aham pana mahiddhikaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ ti vā aham yam yam kammam karomi tam tam ijjhati iti vā majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ iddhi madaḥ nāma

original: Heṭṭhā parivāraggahaṇena yaso gahitova hoti. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne upaṭṭhākamado nāma
analyzed: heṭṭhā parivāra ggahaṇena yasaḥ gahitaḥ iva hoti imasmin pana ṭhāne upaṭṭhākamadaḥ nāma

original: gahito. So agārikenapi anagārikenapi dīpetabbo. Agāriko hi ekacco aṭṭhārasasu seṇīsu
analyzed: gahitaḥ saḥ agārikena api anagārikena api dīpetabbaḥ agārikaḥ hi ekaccaḥ aṭṭhārasasu seṇīsu

original: ekissā jeṭṭhako hoti, tassa ‘avasese purise ahaṃ paṭṭhapemi, ahaṃ vicāremī’ti; anagārikopi
analyzed: ekissā jeṭṭhakaḥ hoti tassa avasese purise aham paṭṭhapemi aham vicāremi iti anagārikaḥ pi

original: ekacco katthaci jeṭṭhako hoti, tassa ‘avasesā bhikkhū mayhaṃ ovāde vattanti, ahaṃ
analyzed: ekacco katthaci jeṭṭhakaḥ hoti tassa avasesā bhikkhū mayhaṃ ovāde vattanti aham

original: jeṭṭhako’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno yasamado nāma.

original: ‘Avasesā sattā dussīlā, ahaṃ pana sīlavā’ti majjanavasena uppanno māno sīlamado nāma.
analyzed: avasesā sattā dussīlā aham pana sīlavāti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ sīlamadaḥ nāma

original: ‘Avasesasattānaṃ kukkuṭassa udakapānamattepi kāle cittekaggatā natthi, ahaṃ pana
analyzed: avasesa sattānam kukkuṭassa udaka pāna matte pi kāle citta ekagga tā natthi aham pana

analyzed: upacāra ppanānam lābhī iti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ jhānamadaḥ nāma

analyzed: avasesāḥ sattāḥ nissippāḥ aham pana sippavā āti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ sippa madaḥ

analyzed: nāma avasesā sattā rassāḥ aham pana dīghaḥ ti majjana vasena uppannaḥ mānaḥ āroha madaḥ

analyzed: nāma avasesā sattā rassāḥ vā honti dīghā vā aham majjana vasena

original: uppanno māno pariṇāhamado nāma. ‘Avasesasattānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ,

original: uppanno māno pāripūrimado nāma.
analyzed: uppannaḥ mānaḥ pāripūrimadaḥ nāma

original: 845. Iminā ettakena ṭhānena savatthukaṃ mānaṃ kathetvā idāni avatthukaṃ nibbattitamānameva dassento tattha katamo madotiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthameva.

original: 846. Pamādaniddese cittassa vossaggoti imesu ettakesu ṭhānesu satiyā aniggaṇhitvā
analyzed: pamāda niddese cittassa vossaggo ti imesu ettakesu ṭhānesu satiyā a niggaṇhitvā

original: punappunaṃ vissajjananti attho. Asakkaccakiriyatāti etesaṃ dānādīnaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ
analyzed: punappunam vissajjananti atthaḥ etesam dāna ādīnam kusala dhammānam

analyzed: bhāvanāya puggalassa vā deyya dhammassa vā asakkacca karaṇa vasena asakkacca kiriyā

original: Anaṭṭhitakaraṇaṃ anaṭṭhitakiriyatā. Yathā nāma kakaṇṭako thokaṃ gantvā thokaṃ tiṭṭhati,

analyzed: thambha niddese thaddha aṭṭhena thambho khaliyā thaddha sāṭakassa viya cittassa

analyzed: ettha kathitā thambhana ākāraḥ thambhanā thambhitassa bhāvaḥ thambhita ttam

original: Kakkhaḷassa puggalassa bhāvo kakkhaḷiyaṃ. Pharusassa puggalassa bhāvo phārusiyaṃ.
analyzed: kakkhaḷassa puggalassa bhāvaḥ kakkhaḷiyam pharusassa puggalassa bhāvaḥ phārusiyam

original: Abhivādanādisāmīcirahānaṃ tassā sāmīciyā akaraṇavasena ujumeva ṭhapitacittabhāvo

original: 848. Sārambhaniddese sārambhanavasena sārambho. Paṭippharitvā sārambho paṭisārambho.
analyzed: sārambha niddese sārambhana vasena sārambho paṭippharitvā sārambho paṭisārambho

analyzed: na aham etassa heṭṭhā bhavissāmi iti aparaḥ dve gaṇhāti aparaḥ tayaḥ aparaḥ cattāraḥ

analyzed: atriccham ati lobhena ati lobha madena ca

original: Kassapabuddhakālepi mittavindako nāma seṭṭhiputto assaddho appasanno mātarā ‘tāta,
analyzed: kassapa buddha kāle pi mittavindakaḥ nāma seṭṭhi putto assaddhaḥ appasannaḥ mātarā tāta

analyzed: upaṭṭhāka majjhe nisinnaḥ mayā asuka kāle nāma dīgha nikāyaḥ uggahitaḥ

original: asukakāle majjhimo, saṃyuttako, aṅguttariko; antarā olokanaṃ nāma natthi, icchiticchataṭṭhāne
analyzed: asuka kāle majjhimaḥ saṃyuttakaḥ aṅguttarikaḥ antarā olokanam nāma natthi icchiticchata ṭṭhāne

original: mukhāruḷhova tanti āgacchati; ime panaññe bhikkhū eḷakā viya mukhaṃ phandāpentā viharantī”ti
analyzed: mukha āruḷhaḥ iva tanti āgacchati ime pana aññe bhikkhū eḷakāḥ viya mukham phandāpentā viharanti iti

original: vadati. Manussā ‘natthi ayyena sadiso upaṭṭhitasatī’ti pasannā sakkāraṃ karonti.
analyzed: vadati manussāḥ na atthi ayyena sadisaḥ upaṭṭhita satī iti pasannā sakkāram karonti

original: Asamāhitopi upaṭṭhākānaṃ sammukhe aṭṭhakathācariye pañhaṃ pucchati – ‘kasiṇaṃ nāma
analyzed: asamāhitaḥ api upaṭṭhākānam sammukhe aṭṭhakathā cariye pañham pucchati kasiṇam nāma

original: kathaṃ bhāveti? Kittakena nimittaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti? Kittakena upacāro? Kittakena
analyzed: katham bhāveti kittakena nimittam uppannam nāma hoti kittakena upacāraḥ kittakena

original: appanā? Paṭhamassa jhānassa kati aṅgāni? Dutiyassa tatiyassa catutthassa jhānassa
analyzed: appanā paṭhamassa jhānassa kati aṅgāni dutiyassa tatiyassa catutthassa jhānassa

original: kati aṅgāni”ti pucchati. Tehi attano uggahitānurūpena kathitakāle sitaṃ katvā ‘kiṃ,
analyzed: kati aṅgāni iti pucchati tehi attanaḥ uggahita anurūpena kathita kāle sitam katvā kim

original: āvuso, evaṃ na hosī’ti vutte ‘vaṭṭati, bhante’ti attano samāpattilābhitaṃ sūceti.
analyzed: āvuso evam na hosi iti vutte vaṭṭati bhante iti attanaḥ samāpatti lābhitam sūceti

original: Manussā ‘samāpattilābhī ayyo’ti pasannā sakkāraṃ karonti.
analyzed: manussā samāpatti lābhī pasannā sakkāram karonti

original: Duppaññopi upaṭṭhākānaṃ majjhe nisinno ‘majjhimanikāye me pañcattayaṃ olokentassa
analyzed: duppaññaḥ api upaṭṭhākānam majjhe nisinnaḥ majjhima nikāye me pañcattayam olokentassa

original: sahiddhiyāva maggo āgato. Pariyatti nāma amhākaṃ na dukkarā. Pariyattivāvaṭo pana
analyzed: maggo āgataḥ pariyatti nāma amhākam na dukkarā pariyatti vāvaṭaḥ pana

original: dukkhato na muccatīti pariyattiṃ vissajjayimhā’tiādīni vadanto attano mahāpaññataṃ
analyzed: dukkhataḥ na muccati iti pariyattim vissajjayimha atiādīni vadantaḥ attanaḥ mahā paññatam

original: dīpeti. Evaṃ vadanto panassa sāsane pahāraṃ deti. Iminā sadiso mahācoro nāma natthi.
analyzed: dīpeti evam vadantaḥ pana assa sāsane pahāram deti iminā sadisaḥ mahā coraḥ nāma natthi

original: Na hi pariyattidharo dukkhato na muccatīti. Akhīṇāsavopi gāmadārake disvā ‘tumhākaṃ
analyzed: na hi pariyatti dharaḥ dukkhataḥ na muccati iti akhīṇa āsavaḥ api gāma dārake disvā tumhākam

original: mātāpitaro amhe kiṃ vadantī”ti? “Arahāti vadanti, bhante”ti. ‘Yāva chekā gahapatikā,
analyzed: mātā pitaraḥ amhe kim vadanti iti vadanti bhante iti

original: na sakkā vañcetu’nti attano khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
analyzed: na sakkā vañcetunti attanaḥ khīṇāsava bhāvam dīpeti

original: Aññepi cettha cāṭiarahantapārohaarahantādayo veditabbā – eko kira kuhako antogabbhe
analyzed: aññe pi ca ittha cāṭi arahanta pāroha arahanta ādayaḥ veditabbā ekaḥ kira kuhakaḥ antogabbhe

original: cāṭiṃ nikhaṇitvā manussānaṃ āgamanakāle pavisati. Manussā ‘kahaṃ thero’ti pucchanti.
analyzed: cāṭim nikhaṇitvā manussānaṃ āgamana kāle pavisati manussā kaham thero ti pucchanti

original: ‘Antogabbhe’ti ca vutte pavisitvā vicinantāpi adisvā nikkhamitvā ‘natthi thero’ti
analyzed: antogabbhā iti ca vutte pavisitvā vicinantā api a disvā nikkhamitvā natthi thero ti

original: vadanti. ‘Antogabbheyeva thero’ti ca vutte puna pavisanti. Thero cāṭito nikkhamitvā
analyzed: vadanti thero ca vutte puna pavisanti thero cāṭitaḥ nikkhamitvā

original: pīṭhe nisinno hoti. Tato tehi ‘mayaṃ, bhante, pubbe adisvā nikkhantā, kahaṃ tumhe
analyzed: pīṭhe nisinnaḥ hoti tatas tehi mayam bhante pubbe a disvā nikkhantā kaham tumhe

original: gatatthā”ti vutte ‘samaṇā nāma attano icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantī’ti vacanena
analyzed: gatattha iti vutte samaṇāḥ nāma attanaḥ icchiticchita ṭṭhānam gacchanti iti vacanena

original: attano khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
analyzed: attanaḥ khīṇāsava bhāvam dīpeti

original: Aparopi kuhako ekasmiṃ pabbate paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasati. Paṇṇasālāya ca pacchato papātaṭṭhāne
analyzed: aparaḥ api kuhakaḥ ekasmin pabbate paṇṇa sālāyam vasati paṇṇa sālāya ca pacchatas papāta ṭṭhāne

original: eko kacchakarukkho atthi. Tassa pāroho gantvā parabhāge bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito. Manussā
analyzed: ekaḥ kacchaka rukkhaḥ atthi tassa pārohaḥ gantvā parabhāge bhūmiyam patiṭṭhitaḥ manussā

original: maggenāgantvā nimantenti. So pattacīvaramādāya pārohena otaritvā gāmadvāre attānaṃ
analyzed: maggena āgantvā nimantenti saḥ patta cīvaram ādāya pārohena otaritvā gāma dvāre attānam

original: dasseti. Tato manussehi pacchā āgantvā ‘katarena maggena āgatattha, bhante’ti puṭṭho
analyzed: dasseti tatas manussehi pacchā āgantvā katarena maggena āgatattha bhante iti puṭṭhaḥ

original: ‘samaṇānaṃ āgatamaggo nāma pucchituṃ na vaṭṭati, attano icchiticchitaṭṭhāneneva āgacchantī’ti
analyzed: samaṇānam āgata maggaḥ nāma pucchitum na vaṭṭati attanaḥ icchiticchita ṭṭhānena iva āgacchanti iti

original: vacanena khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Taṃ pana kuhakaṃ eko viddhakaṇṇo ñatvā ‘pariggahessāmi
analyzed: vacanena khīṇāsava bhāvam dīpeti tam pana kuhakam ekaḥ viddha kaṇṇaḥ ñatvā pariggahessāmi

original: na’nti ekadivasaṃ pārohena otarantaṃ disvā pacchato chinditvā appamattakena ṭhapesi.
analyzed: eka divasam pārohena otarantam disvā pacchatas chinditvā appamattakena ṭhapesi

original: So ‘pārohato otarissāmī’ti ‘ṭha’nti patito, mattikā patto bhijji. So ‘ñātomhī’ti
analyzed: saḥ pārohataḥ otarissāmi iti ṭhanti patitaḥ mattikā pattaḥ bhijji saḥ ñātaḥ ahi iti

original: nikkhamitvā palāyi. Pāpicchassa bhāvo pāpicchatā. Lakkhaṇato pana asantaguṇasambhāvanatā,
analyzed: nikkhamitvā palāyi pāpa icchassa bhāvaḥ pāpa iccha tā lakkhaṇato pana asanta guṇa sambhāvana tā

original: paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā; etaṃ pāpicchatālakkhaṇanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññu tā etam pāpa iccha tā lakkhaṇam ti veditabbam

original: 852. Siṅganiddese vijjhanaṭṭhena siṅgaṃ; nāgarikabhāvasaṅkhātassa kilesasiṅgassetaṃ
analyzed: siṅga niddese vijjhan aṭṭhena siṅgam nāgarika bhāva saṅkhātassa kilesa siṅgassa etam

original: nāmaṃ. Siṅgārabhāvo siṅgāratā, siṅgārakaraṇākāro vā. Caturabhāvo caturatā. Tathā
analyzed: siṅgāra bhāvaḥ siṅgāra tā siṅgāra karaṇa ākāraḥ vā catura bhāvaḥ catura tā tathā

original: cāturiyaṃ. Parikkhatabhāvo parikkhatatā; parikhaṇitvā ṭhapitasseva daḷhasiṅgārabhāvassetaṃ
analyzed: cāturiyam parikkhata bhāvaḥ parikkhata tā parikhaṇitvā ṭhapitassa iva daḷha siṅgāra bhāvassa etam

original: nāmaṃ. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Evaṃ sabbehipi padehi kilesasiṅgāratāva kathitā.
analyzed: itaram tassa iva vevacanam evam sabbehi pi padehi kilesa siṅgāra tā ava kathitā

original: 853. Tintiṇaniddese tintiṇanti khīyanaṃ. Tintiṇāyanākāro tintiṇāyanā. Tintiṇena ayitassa
analyzed: tintiṇa niddese tintiṇanti khīyanam tintiṇāyana ākāraḥ tintiṇāyanā tintiṇena

original: tintiṇasamaṅgino bhāvo tintiṇāyitattaṃ. Lolupabhāvo loluppaṃ. Itare dve ākārabhāvaniddesā.
analyzed: tintiṇa samaṅginaḥ bhāvaḥ lolupa bhāvaḥ loluppam itare dve ākāra bhāva niddesā

original: Pucchañjikatāti lābhalabhanakaṭṭhāne vedhanākampanā nīcavuttitā. Sādhukamyatāti paṇītapaṇītānaṃ
analyzed: pucchañjika tā ati lābha labhanaka ṭṭhāne vedhanā kampanā nīca vutti tā sādhu kamya tā ati paṇīta paṇītānam

original: patthanā. Evaṃ sabbehipi padehi suvānadoṇiyaṃ kañjiyaṃ pivanakasunakhassa aññaṃ sunakhaṃ
analyzed: patthanā evam sabbehi pi padehi suvāna doṇiyam kañjiyam pivanaka su nakhassa aññam su nakham

original: disvā bhubhukkaraṇaṃ viya ‘tava santakaṃ, mama santaka’nti kilesavasena khīyanākāro kathito.
analyzed: disvā bhubhukkaraṇam viya tava santakam mama santakanti kilesa vasena kathitaḥ

original: 854. Cāpalyaniddese ākoṭitapaccākoṭitabhāvādīhi cīvarassa maṇḍanā cīvaramaṇḍanā.
analyzed: cāpalya niddese ākoṭita paccākoṭita bhāva ādīhi cīvarassa maṇḍanā cīvara maṇḍanā

original: Maṇivaṇṇacchavikaraṇādīhi pattassa maṇḍanā pattamaṇḍanā. Cittakammādīhi puggalikasenāsanassa
analyzed: maṇi vaṇṇa chavi karaṇa ādīhi pattassa maṇḍanā patta maṇḍanā citta kamma ādīhi puggalika senāsanassa

original: maṇḍanā senāsanamaṇḍanā. Imassa vā pūtikāyassāti imassa manussasarīrassa. Yathā hi
analyzed: maṇḍanā senāsana maṇḍanā imassa vā pūti kāyassa ati imassa manussa sarīrassa yathā hi

original: tadahujātopi siṅgālo jarasiṅgālotveva ūruppamāṇāpi ca gaḷocilatā pūtilatātveva saṅkhaṃ
analyzed: tad ahu jātaḥ api siṅgālaḥ ca gaḷocilatā saṅkham

original: gacchati, evaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi manussakāyo pūtikāyotveva vuccati. Tassa antarantarā

original: rattavaṇṇapaṇḍuvaṇṇādīhi nivāsanapārupanādīhi sajjanā maṇḍanā nāma. Bāhirānaṃ vā
analyzed: ratta vaṇṇa paṇḍu vaṇṇa ādīhi nivāsana pārupana ādīhi sajjanāḥ maṇḍanāḥ nāma vā

original: parikkhārānanti ṭhapetvā pattacīvaraṃ sesaparikkhārānaṃ; athavā yā esā cīvaramaṇḍanā
analyzed: parikkhārānanti ṭhapetvā patta cīvaram sesa parikkhārānan athavā yā esā cīvara maṇḍanā

original: pattamaṇḍanāti vuttā, sā tehi vā parikkhārehi kāyassa maṇḍanā tesaṃ vā bāhiraparikkhārānaṃ
analyzed: pattamaṇḍanā ti vuttā sā tehi vā parikkhārehi kāyassa maṇḍanā tesam vā bāhira parikkhārānaṃ

original: maṇḍetvā ṭhapanavasena maṇḍanāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Maṇḍanā vibhūsanāti ettha
analyzed: maṇḍetvā ṭhapana vasena maṇḍanā ati evam ettha atthaḥ veditabbaḥ maṇḍanā vibhūsanā ti ettha

original: ūnaṭṭhānassa pūraṇavasena maṇḍanā, chavirāgādivasena vibhūsanāti veditabbā. Keḷanāti
analyzed: ūna ṭṭhānassa pūraṇa vasena maṇḍanā chavi rāga ādi vasena vibhūsanā ati veditabbā keḷanā ati

analyzed: kīḷanā parikeḷanā ati parikīḷanā giddhika tā ati gedha yutta tā giddhi kattanti tassa iva

original: vevacanaṃ. Capalabhāvo capalatā. Tathā cāpalyaṃ. Idaṃ vuccatīti idaṃ cāpalyaṃ nāma
analyzed: vevacanam capala bhāvo capala tā tathā cāpalyam idam vuccati iti idam cāpalyam nāma

original: vuccati, yena samannāgato puggalo vassasatikopi samāno tadahujātadārako viya hoti.
analyzed: vuccati yena samannāgataḥ puggalaḥ vassa satikaḥ api samānaḥ tad ahu jāta dārakaḥ viya hoti

original: 855. Asabhāgavuttiniddese vippaṭikūlaggāhitāti ananulomaggāhitā. Vipaccanīkasātatāti
analyzed: asabhāga vutti niddese vippaṭikūla ggāhi tā ati ananuloma ggāhi tā vipaccanīka sāta tā ati

analyzed: vipaccanīkena paṭiviruddha karaṇena sukhāyanā anādara bhāvaḥ anādariyam tathā anādariya tā

original: Agāravassa bhāvo agāravatā. Jeṭṭhakabhāvassa akaraṇaṃ appatissavatā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti
analyzed: agāravassa bhāvaḥ agārava tā jeṭṭhaka bhāvassa a karaṇam appatissava tā ayam vuccati iti

analyzed: ayam asabhāgavutti nāma vuccati visabhāga jīvika tā ti attho yāya samannāgataḥ puggalo

analyzed: mātaram pitaram vā gilānam paṭivattitvā api na oloketi pitu santakassa kāraṇā mātarā

analyzed: saddhim mātusantakassa kāraṇā pitarā saddhim kalaham karoti visabhāga jīvitam jīvati

analyzed: mātā pitūnam santakassa kāraṇā jeṭṭhena vā kaniṭṭhena vā bhātarā saddhim kalaham karoti

original: nillajjavacanaṃ vadati, ācariyassa vā upajjhāyassa vā vattapaṭivattaṃ na karoti,

original: buddhasāvakesu na lajjati, saṅghe cittīkāraṃ na karoti, mātimattapitimattādīsu garuṭṭhānīyesu
analyzed: buddha sāvakesu na lajjati saṅghe cittīkāram na karoti mātimatta pitimatta ādīsu garuṭṭhānīyesu

original: hirottappaṃ na paccupaṭṭhāpeti. Tassevaṃ pavattamānassa sabbā pesā kiriyā mātarītiādīsupi
analyzed: hirottappam na paccupaṭṭhāpeti tassa ivam pavattamānassa sabbā pe sā kiriyā mātari iti ādīsu pi

original: vatthūsu asabhāgavuttitā nāma hoti.
analyzed: vatthūsu asabhāgavutti tā nāma hoti

original: 856. Aratiniddese pantesūti dūresu vivittesu vā. Adhikusalesūti samathavipassanādhammesu.
analyzed: arati niddese pantesu iti dūresu vivittesu vā adhi kusalesu iti samatha vipassanā dhammesu

original: Aratīti ratipaṭikkhepo. Aratitāti aramaṇākāro. Anabhiratīti anabhiratabhāvo. Anabhiramaṇāti
analyzed: arati iti rati paṭikkhepaḥ arati tā ati aramaṇa ākāraḥ an abhirati iti an abhirata bhāvaḥ an abhiramaṇā ati

original: anabhiramaṇākāro. Ukkaṇṭhitāti ukkaṇṭhanākāro. Paritassitāti ukkaṇṭhanavaseneva paritassanā.
analyzed: an abhiramaṇa ākāraḥ ukkaṇṭhitā ati ukkaṇṭhana ākāraḥ paritassitā ati ukkaṇṭhana vasena iva paritassanā

original: 857. Tandīniddese tandīti jātiālasiyaṃ. Tandiyanāti tandiyanākāro. Tandimanakatāti
analyzed: tandīniddese tandī iti jāti ālasiyam

original: tandiyā abhibhūtacittatā. Alasassa bhāvo ālasyaṃ. Ālasyāyanākāro ālasyāyanā. Alasyāyitassa
analyzed: tandiyā abhibhūta citta tā alasassa bhāvaḥ ālasyam ālasya ayana ākāraḥ ālasya ayanāḥ alasyāyitassa

original: bhāvo ālasyāyitattaṃ. Iti sabbehipi imehi padehi kilesavasena kāyālasiyaṃ kathitaṃ.
analyzed: iti sabbehi pi imehi padehi kilesa vasena kāya ālasiyam kathitam

original: 858. Vijambhitāniddese jambhanāti phandanā. Punappunaṃ jambhanā vijambhanā. Ānamanāti
analyzed: vijambhitā niddese jambhanā ati phandanā punappunam jambhanā vijambhanā ānamanā ati

original: purato namanā. Vinamanāti pacchato namanā. Sannamanāti samantato namanā. Paṇamanāti
analyzed: puratas namanā vinamanā ati pacchatas namanā sannamanā ati samantataḥ namanā paṇamanā ati

original: yathā hi tantato uṭṭhitapesakāro kismiñcideva gahetvā ujukaṃ kāyaṃ ussāpeti, evaṃ
analyzed: yathā hi tantataḥ uṭṭhita pesakāraḥ kismiñcid eva gahetvā ujukam kāyam ussāpeti evam

original: kāyassa uddhaṃ ṭhapanā. Byādhiyakanti uppannabyādhitā. Iti sabbehipi imehi padehi
analyzed: kāyassa uddham ṭhapanāḥ uppanna byādhitāḥ iti sabbehi pi imehi padehi

original: kilesavasena kāyaphandanameva kathitaṃ.
analyzed: kilesa vasena kāya phandanam eva kathitam

original: 859. Bhattasammadaniddese bhuttāvissāti bhuttavato. Bhattamucchāti bhattagelaññaṃ;
analyzed: bhatta sammada niddese bhutta avissāti bhuttavataḥ bhatta mucchāti bhatta gelaññam

original: balavabhattena hi mucchāpatto viya hoti. Bhattakilamathoti bhattena kilantabhāvo.
analyzed: balava bhattena hi mucchā pattaḥ viya hoti bhattena kilanta bhāvaḥ

original: Bhattapariḷāhoti bhattadaratho. Tasmiñhi samaye pariḷāhuppattiyā upahatindriyo hoti,
analyzed: bhattapariḷāho ti bhattadaratho tasmin hi samaye pariḷāha uppattiyā upahata indriyaḥ hoti

original: kāyo jīrati. Kāyaduṭṭhullanti bhattaṃ nissāya kāyassa akammaññatā.

original: bhante, kassa kumārikā’ti? ‘Amhākaṃ upaṭṭhāyikāya telakandarikāya dhītā, āvuso. Imissā
