original: mātā mayi gehaṃ gate sappiṃ dadamānā ghaṭeneva deti, ayampi mātā viya ghaṭeneva detī’ti ukkāceti.
analyzed: mātā mayi geham gate sappim dadamānā ghaṭena iva deti ayam pi mātā ghaṭena iva deti iti

original: Sabbatobhāgena punappunaṃ ukkācanā samukkācanā. Anuppiyabhāṇitāti saccānurūpaṃ vā
analyzed: sabbatobhāgena punappunam ukkācanā samukkācanā anuppiya bhāṇitā ati sacca anurūpam vā

original: dhammānurūpaṃ vā anapaloketvā punappunaṃ piyabhaṇanameva. Cāṭukamyatāti nīcavuttitā;
analyzed: dhamma anurūpam vā an apaloketvā punappunam piya bhaṇanam eva cāṭu kamyatā ati nīca vutti tā

original: attānaṃ heṭṭhato ṭhapetvā vattanaṃ. Muggasūpyatāti muggasūpasadisatā. Yathā muggesu
analyzed: attānam heṭṭhatas ṭhapetvā vattanam mugga sūpya tā ati mugga sūpa sadisa tā yathā muggesu

original: paccamānesu kocideva na paccati, avasesā paccanti; evaṃ yassa puggalassa vacane kiñcideva
analyzed: paccamānesu kocid eva na paccati avasesā paccanti evam yassa puggalassa vacane kiñcid eva

original: saccaṃ hoti, sesaṃ alikaṃ – ayaṃ puggalo muggasūpyoti vuccati. Tassa bhāvo muggasūpyatā.
analyzed: saccam hoti sesam alikam ayam puggalo mugga sūpyaḥ ti vuccati tassa bhāvaḥ mugga sūpya tā

original: Pāribhaṭayatāti pāribhaṭayabhāvo. Yo hi kuladārake dhātī viya aṅkena vā khandhena
analyzed: pāribhaṭaya tā ati pāribhaṭaya bhāvaḥ yaḥ hi kula dārake aṅkena vā khandhena

original: vā paribhaṭati, dhāretīti attho; tassa paribhaṭassa kammaṃ pāribhaṭayaṃ; pāribhaṭayassa
analyzed: vā paribhaṭati dhāreti iti attho tassa paribhaṭassa kammam pāribhaṭayam pāribhaṭayassa

original: bhāvo pāribhaṭayatāti.
analyzed: pāribhaṭayata ati

original: 863. Nemittikatāniddese nimittanti yaṃkiñci paresaṃ paccayadānasaṃyojanakaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ. Nimittakammanti nimittassa karaṇakosallaṃ.
analyzed: nemittika tā niddese nimittam ti yaṃ kiñci paresam paccaya dāna saṃyojanakam kāya vacī kammam nimitta kammam ti nimittassa karaṇa kosallam

original: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira piṇḍapātiko upaṭṭhākakammārassa gehadvāraṃ gantvā ‘kiṃ
analyzed: tatra idam vatthu ekaḥ kira piṇḍapātikaḥ upaṭṭhāka kammārassa geha dvāram gantvā kim

original: bhante’ti pucchito cīvarantarena hatthaṃ nīharitvā vāsipaharaṇākāraṃ akāsi. Kammāro
analyzed: bhanta iti pucchitaḥ cīvara antarena hattham nīharitvā vāsi paharaṇa ākāram akāsi kammāraḥ

original: ‘sallakkhitaṃ me, bhante’ti vāsiṃ katvā adāsi. Obhāsoti paccayapaṭisaṃyuttakathā.
analyzed: sallakkhitam me bhante iti vāsim katvā adāsi obhāso ti paccaya paṭisaṃyutta kathā

original: Obhāsakammanti vacchakapālake disvā ‘kiṃ ime vacchā khīragovacchā, takkagovacchā’ti
analyzed: vaccha kapālake disvā kim ime vacchā khīra go vacchā takka go vacchā ati

original: pucchitvā ‘khīragovacchā, bhante’ti vutte ‘na khīragovacchā, yadi khīragovacchā siyuṃ
analyzed: pucchitvā khīra go vacchā bhante ti vutte na khīra go vacchā yadi khīra go vacchā siyum

original: bhikkhūpi khīraṃ labheyyu’nti evamādinā nayena tesaṃ dārakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ nivedetvā
analyzed: bhikkhū api khīram labheyyunti evamādinā nayena tesam dārakānam mātā pitūnam nivedetvā

original: khīradāpanādikaṃ obhāsakaraṇaṃ. Sāmantajappāti samīpaṃ katvā jappanaṃ.
analyzed: khīra dāpana ādikam sāmantajappāti samīpam katvā jappanam

original: Jātakabhāṇakavatthu cettha kathetabbaṃ. Eko kira jātakabhāṇakatthero bhuñjitukāmo
analyzed: jātaka bhāṇaka vatthu ca ittha kathetabbam ekaḥ kira jātaka bhāṇaka theraḥ bhuñjitu kāmo

original: upaṭṭhāyikāya gehaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi. Sā adātukāmā ‘taṇḍulā natthī’ti bhaṇantī taṇḍule
analyzed: upaṭṭhāyikāya geham pavisitvā nisīdi sā a dātu kāmā taṇḍulāḥ natthi iti bhaṇantī taṇḍule

original: āharitukāmā viya paṭivissakagharaṃ gatā. Bhikkhu antogabbhaṃ pavisitvā olokento kavāṭakoṇe
analyzed: āharitu kāmā viya paṭivissaka gharam gatā bhikkhu antogabbham pavisitvā olokento kavāṭa koṇe

original: ucchuṃ, bhājane guḷaṃ, piṭake loṇamacchaphālaṃ, kumbhiyaṃ taṇḍule, ghaṭe ghataṃ disvā
analyzed: ucchum bhājane guḷam piṭake loṇam acchaphālam kumbhiyam taṇḍule ghaṭe ghatam disvā

original: nikkhamitvā nisīdi. Gharaṇī ‘taṇḍulaṃ nālattha’nti āgatā. Thero ‘upāsike, ajja bhikkhā
analyzed: nikkhamitvā nisīdi gharaṇī taṇḍulam āgatā theraḥ upāsike ajja bhikkhā

original: na sampajjissatī’ti paṭikacceva nimittaṃ addasa’nti āha. ‘Kiṃ, bhante’ti? ‘Kavāṭakoṇe
analyzed: na sampajjissati iti paṭikaccā iva nimittam addasanti āha kim bhante iti kavāṭa koṇe

original: nikkhittaṃ ucchuṃ viya sappaṃ addasaṃ; ‘taṃ paharissāmī’ti olokento bhājane ṭhapitaṃ
analyzed: nikkhittam ucchum viya sappam addasam tam paharissāmi iti olokentaḥ bhājane ṭhapitam

original: guḷapiṇḍaṃ viya pāsāṇaṃ leḍḍukena; pahaṭena sappena kataṃ, piṭake nikkhittaloṇamacchaphālasadisaṃ,
analyzed: guḷa piṇḍam viya pāsāṇam leḍḍukena pahaṭena sappena katam piṭake nikkhitta loṇam accha phāla sadisam

original: phaṇaṃ; tassa taṃ leḍḍuṃ ḍaṃsitukāmassa, kumbhiyā taṇḍulasadise dante; athassa kupitassa,
analyzed: phaṇam tassa tam leḍḍum ḍaṃsitu kāmassa kumbhiyā taṇḍula sadise dante athassa kupitassa

original: ghaṭe pakkhittaghatasadisaṃ, mukhato nikkhamantaṃ visamissakaṃ kheḷa’nti. Sā ‘na
analyzed: ghaṭe pakkhitta ghata sadisam mukhataḥ nikkhamantam visamissakam kheḷanti sā na

original: sakkā muṇḍakaṃ vañcetu’nti ucchuṃ datvā odanaṃ pacitvā ghataguḷamacchehi saddhiṃ
analyzed: sakkā muṇḍakam vañcetunti ucchum datvā odanam pacitvā ghata guḷa macchehi saddhim

original: adāsīti. Evaṃ samīpaṃ katvā jappanaṃ sāmantajappāti veditabbaṃ. Parikathāti yathā
analyzed: adāsi iti evam samīpam katvā jappanam sāmantajappā iti veditabbam parikathā ati yathā

original: taṃ labhati tathā parivattetvā parivattetvā kathanaṃ.
analyzed: tam labhati tathā parivattetvā parivattetvā kathanam

original: 864. Nippesikatāniddese akkosanāti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanā. Vambhanāti paribhavitvā
analyzed: nippesikatā niddese akkosanā ati dasahi akkosa vatthūhi akkosanā vambhanā ati paribhavitvā

original: kathanaṃ. Garahanāti ‘assaddho appasanno’tiādinā nayena dosāropanā. Ukkhepanāti ‘mā
analyzed: kathanam garahanā ati assaddhaḥ appasannaḥ ti ādinā nayena dosa āropanā ukkhepanā ati mā

original: etaṃ ettha kathethā’ti vācāya ukkhipanaṃ. Sabbatobhāgena savatthukaṃ sahetukaṃ katvā
analyzed: etam ettha kathetha ati vācāya ukkhipanam sabbatobhāgena sa vatthukam sa hetukam katvā

original: ukkhepanā samukkhepanā. Athavā adentaṃ ‘aho dānapatī’ti evaṃ ukkhipanaṃ ukkhepanā.
analyzed: ukkhepanā samukkhepanā athavā a dentam aho dānapati iti evam ukkhipanam ukkhepanā

original: ‘Mahādānapatī’ti evaṃ suṭṭhu ukkhepanā samukkhepanā. Khipanāti ‘kiṃ imassa jīvitaṃ
analyzed: mahā dānapati iti evam suṭṭhu ukkhepanā samukkhepanā khipanā ati kim imassa jīvitaṃ

original: bījabhojino’ti evaṃ uppaṇḍanā. Saṅkhipanāti ‘kiṃ imaṃ adāyakoti bhaṇatha yo niccakālaṃ
analyzed: bīja bhojino ti evam uppaṇḍanā saṅkhipanā ati kim imam bhaṇatha yaḥ nicca kālam

original: sabbesampi natthīti vacanaṃ detī’ti evaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ uppaṇḍanā. Pāpanāti adāyakattassa
analyzed: sabbesam pi na atthi iti vacanam deti iti evam suṭṭhutaram uppaṇḍanā pāpanā ati a dāyaka ttassa

original: avaṇṇassa vā pāpanaṃ. Sabbatobhāgena pāpanā sampāpanā. Avaṇṇahārikāti ‘evaṃ me avaṇṇabhayāpi
analyzed: avaṇṇassa vā pāpanam sabbatobhāgena pāpanā sampāpanā avaṇṇa hārikā ati evam me avaṇṇa bhayā api

original: dassatī’ti gehato gehaṃ, gāmato gāmaṃ, janapadato janapadaṃ avaṇṇaharaṇaṃ. Parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatāti
analyzed: dassati iti gehataḥ geham gāmataḥ gāmam janapadataḥ janapadam avaṇṇa haraṇam parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatā ati

original: purato madhuraṃ bhaṇitvā parammukhe avaṇṇabhāsitā. Esā hi abhimukhaṃ oloketuṃ asakkontassa
analyzed: puratas madhuram bhaṇitvā parammukhe avaṇṇa bhāsitā esā hi abhimukham oloketum a sakkontassa

original: parammukhānaṃ piṭṭhimaṃsakhādanaṃ viya hoti. Tasmā parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatāti vuttā. Ayaṃ
analyzed: parammukhānam piṭṭhi maṃsa khādanam viya hoti tasmā parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatā ati vuttā ayam

original: vuccati nippesikatāti ayaṃ yasmā veḷupesikā viya abbhaṅgaṃ parassa guṇaṃ nippeseti
analyzed: vuccati nippesika tā ti ayam yasmā veḷu pesikā viya abbhaṅgam parassa guṇam nippeseti

original: nipuñchati, yasmā vā gandhajātaṃ nipisitvā gandhamagganā viya paraguṇe nipisitvā
analyzed: nipuñchati yasmai vā gandha jātam nipisitvā gandha magganā viya para guṇe nipisitvā

original: vicuṇṇetvā esā lābhamagganā hoti, tasmā nippesikatāti vuccatīti.
analyzed: vicuṇṇetvā esā lābha magganā hoti tasmā nippesikatā ati vuccati iti

original: 865. Lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatāniddese nijigīsanatāti magganā. Ito laddhanti imamhā
analyzed: lābhena lābham nijigīsana tā niddese nijigīsana tā ati magganā itas

original: gehā laddhaṃ. Amutrāti amukamhi gehe. Eṭṭhīti icchanā. Gaveṭṭhīti magganā. Pariyeṭṭhīti
analyzed: gehā laddham amutra ati amukamhi gehe eṭṭhī iti icchanā gaveṭṭhī iti magganā pariyeṭṭhī iti

original: punappunaṃ magganā. Ādito paṭṭhāya laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ tatra tatra kuladārakānaṃ
analyzed: punappunam magganā āditas paṭṭhāya laddham laddham bhikkham tatra tatra kula dārakānam

original: datvā ante khīrayāguṃ labhitvā gatabhikkhuvatthu cettha kathetabbaṃ. Esanātiādīni
analyzed: datvā ante khīra yāgum labhitvā gata bhikkhu vatthu ca ittha kathetabbam esanā ti ādīni

original: eṭṭhītiādīnaṃ vevacanāni, tasmā eṭṭhīti esanā, gaveṭṭhīti gavesanā, pariyeṭṭhīti
analyzed: eṭṭhī iti ādīnam vevacanāni tasmai eṭṭhī iti esanā gaveṭṭhī iti gavesanā pariyeṭṭhī iti

original: pariyesanā. Iccevamettha yojanā veditabbā.
analyzed: pariyesanā icca evam ettha yojanā veditabbā

original: 866. Seyyamānaniddese jātiyāti khattiyabhāvādijātisampattiyā. Gottenāti gotamagottādinā
analyzed: seyyamāna niddese jātiyā ati khattiya bhāva ādi jāti sampattiyā gottena ati gotama gotta ādinā

original: ukkaṭṭhagottena. Kolaputtiyenāti mahākulabhāvena. Vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti vaṇṇasampannasarīratāya.
analyzed: ukkaṭṭha gottena kola puttiyena ati mahā kula bhāvena vaṇṇa pokkhara tāya ati vaṇṇa sampanna sarīra tāya

original: Sarīrañhi pokkharanti vuccati, tassa vaṇṇasampattiyā abhirūpabhāvenāti attho. Dhanenātiādīni
analyzed: sarīram hi pokkharanti vuccati tassa vaṇṇa sampattiyā abhirūpa bhāvena ati atthaḥ dhanena atiādīni

original: uttānatthāneva. Mānaṃ jappetīti etesu yena kenaci vatthunā ‘seyyohamasmī’ti mānaṃ pavatteti karoti.
analyzed: uttāna tthānā iva mānam jappeti iti etesu yena kenacid vatthunā seyya uham asmi iti mānam pavattā iti karoti

original: 867. Sadisamānaniddese mānaṃ jappetīti etesu yena kenaci vatthunā ‘sadisohamasmī’ti mānaṃ pavatteti. Ayamettha atthato viseso. Pāḷiyaṃ pana nānākaraṇaṃ natthi.
analyzed: sadisa māna niddese mānam jappeti iti etesu yena kenacid vatthunā sadisaḥ ham asmi iti mānam pavatteti ayam ettha atthataḥ visesaḥ pāḷiyam pana nānākaraṇam natthi

original: 868. Hīnamānaniddese omānaṃ jappetīti heṭṭhāmānaṃ pavatteti. Omānoti lāmako heṭṭhāmāno.
analyzed: hīna māna niddese omānam jappeti iti heṭṭhāmānam pavatteti omānaḥ ti lāmakaḥ heṭṭhāmānaḥ

original: Omaññanā omaññitattanti ākārabhāvaniddeso. Hīḷanāti jātiādīhi attajigucchanā. Ohīḷanāti
analyzed: ākāra bhāva niddesaḥ hīḷanā ati jāti ādīhi atta jigucchanā ohīḷanā ati

original: atirekato hīḷanā. Ohīḷitattanti tasseva bhāvaniddeso. Attuññāti attānaṃ hīnaṃ katvā
analyzed: atirekataḥ hīḷanā tassa iva bhāva niddeso attuññā ti attānam hīnam katvā

original: jānanā. Attāvaññāti attānaṃ avajānanā. Attaparibhavoti jātiādisampattināmameva jātāti
analyzed: jānanā attāvaññā ati attānam avajānanā atta paribhavā iti jāti ādi sampatti nāmam eva jātā ati

original: attānaṃ paribhavitvā maññanā. Evamime tayo mānā puggalaṃ anissāya jātiādivatthuvaseneva
analyzed: attānam paribhavitvā maññanā evam ime tayo mānā puggalam a nissāya jāti ādi vatthu vasena iva

original: kathitā. Tesu ekeko tiṇṇampi seyyasadisahīnānaṃ uppajjati. Tattha ‘seyyohamasmī’ti
analyzed: kathitā tesu ekekaḥ tiṇṇam pi seyya sadisa hīnānam uppajjati tattha seyyā uham asmi iti

original: māno seyyasseva yāthāvamāno, sesānaṃ ayāthāvamāno. ‘Sadisohamasmī’ti māno sadisasseva
analyzed: mānaḥ seyyassa iva yāthāvamānaḥ sesānam a yāthāvamānaḥ sadisaḥ ham asmi iti mānaḥ sadisassa iva

original: yāthāvamāno, sesānaṃ ayāthāvamāno. ‘Hīnohamasmī’ti māno hīnasseva yāthāvamāno, sesānaṃ ayāthāvamāno.
analyzed: yāthāvamānaḥ sesānam a yāthāvamānaḥ hīnaḥ aham asmi iti mānaḥ hīnassa iva yāthāvamānaḥ sesānam a yāthāvamānaḥ

original: 869. Tattha katamo seyyassa seyyohamasmītiādayo pana nava mānā puggalaṃ nissāya kathitā.
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ seyyassa seyyā uham asmi iti ādayo pana nava mānā puggalam nissāya kathitā

original: Tesu tayo tayo ekekassa uppajjanti. Tattha dahatīti ṭhapeti. Taṃ nissāyāti taṃ seyyato
analyzed: tesu tayo tayo ekekassa uppajjanti tattha dahati iti ṭhapeti tam nissāya ati tam seyyataḥ

original: dahanaṃ nissāya. Ettha pana seyyassa seyyohamasmīti māno rājūnañceva pabbajitānañca
analyzed: dahanam nissāya ettha pana seyyassa seyyā uham asmi iti mānaḥ rājūnam ca iva pabbajitānam ca

original: uppajjati. Rājā hi ‘raṭṭhena vā dhanena vā vāhanehi vā ko mayā sadiso atthī’ti etaṃ
analyzed: uppajjati rājā hi raṭṭhena vā dhanena vā vāhanehi vā kaḥ mayā sadisaḥ atthi iti etam

original: mānaṃ karoti. Pabbajitopi ‘sīladhutaṅgādīhi ko mayā sadiso atthī’ti etaṃ mānaṃ karoti.
analyzed: mānam karoti pabbajitaḥ api sīla dhutaṅga ādīhi kaḥ mayā sadisaḥ atthi iti etam mānam karoti

original: 870. Seyyassa sadisohamasmīti mānopi etesaṃyeva uppajjati. Rājā hi ‘raṭṭhena vā dhanena
analyzed: seyyassa sadisaḥ ham asmi iti mānaḥ api etesam yeva uppajjati rājā hi raṭṭhena vā dhanena

original: vā vāhanehi vā aññarājūhi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇa’nti etaṃ mānaṃ karoti. Pabbajitopi
analyzed: vā vāhanehi vā añña rājūhi saddhim mayham kim nānākaraṇam ti etam mānam karoti pabbajitaḥ api

original: ‘sīladhutaṅgādīhi aññena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ mayhaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇa’nti etaṃ mānaṃ karoti.
analyzed: sīla dhutaṅga ādīhi aññena bhikkhunā saddhim mayham kim nānākaraṇan ti etam mānam karoti

original: 871. Seyyassa hīnohamasmīti mānopi etesaṃyeva uppajjati. Yassa hi rañño raṭṭhaṃ vā
analyzed: seyyassa hīnaḥ ham asmi iti mānaḥ api etesam yeva uppajjati yassa hi raññaḥ raṭṭham vā

original: dhanaṃ vā vāhanāni vā sampannāni na honti, so ‘mayhaṃ rājāti vohārasukhamattameva;
analyzed: dhanam vā vāhanāni vā sampannāni na honti saḥ mayham rājā ati vohāra sukham attam eva

original: kiṃ rājā nāma aha’nti etaṃ mānaṃ karoti. Pabbajitopi ‘appalābhasakkāro ahaṃ. Dhammakathiko
analyzed: kim rājā nāma aham ti etam mānam karoti pabbajitaḥ api appa lābha sakkāraḥ aham dhamma kathikaḥ

original: bahussuto mahātheroti kathāmattameva. Kiṃ dhammakathiko nāmāhaṃ, kiṃ bahussuto nāmāhaṃ,
analyzed: bahussutaḥ mahā thero ti kathā mattam eva kim dhammakathikaḥ nāma aham kim bahussutaḥ nāma aham

original: kiṃ mahāthero nāmāhaṃ yassa me lābhasakkāro natthī’ti etaṃ mānaṃ karoti.
analyzed: kim mahātheraḥ nāma aham yassa me lābha sakkāro na atthi iti etam mānam karoti

original: 872. Sadisassa seyyohamasmīti mānādayo amaccādīnaṃ uppajjanti. Amacco hi raṭṭhiyo
analyzed: sadisassa seyya uham asmi iti māna ādayaḥ amacca ādīnam uppajjanti amaccaḥ hi raṭṭhiyaḥ

original: vā ‘bhogayānavāhanādīhi ko mayā sadiso añño rājapuriso atthī’ti vā ‘mayhaṃ aññehi
analyzed: vā bhoga yāna vāhana ādīhi kaḥ mayā sadisaḥ aññaḥ rāja purisaḥ atthi iti vā mayham aññehi

original: saddhiṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇa’nti vā ‘amaccoti nāmamattameva mayhaṃ; ghāsacchādanamattampi
analyzed: vai nānākaraṇanti vai nāma mattam eva ghāsa chādana mattam pi

original: me natthi. Kiṃ amacco nāmāha’nti ete māne karoti.
analyzed: me natthi kim amaccaḥ nāma ahanti ete māne karoti

original: 875. Hīnassa seyyohamasmīti mānādayo dāsādīnaṃ uppajjanti. Dāso hi ‘mātito vā pitito
analyzed: hīnassa seyyā uham asmi iti māna ādayaḥ dāsa ādīnam uppajjanti dāsaḥ hi mātitaḥ vā pititaḥ

original: vā ko mayā sadiso añño dāso nāma atthi’ aññe jīvituṃ asakkontā kucchihetu dāsā nāma
analyzed: vā kaḥ mayā sadisaḥ aññaḥ dāsaḥ nāma atthi aññe jīvitum a sakkontā kucchi hetu dāsāḥ nāma

original: jātā. Ahaṃ pana paveṇīāgatattā seyyo’ti vā ‘paveṇīāgatabhāvena ubhatosuddhikadāsattena
analyzed: jātā aham pana paveṇī āgata ttā vā paveṇī āgata bhāvena ubhatosuddhika dāsattena

original: asukadāsena nāma saddhiṃ kiṃ mayhaṃ nānākaraṇa’nti vā ‘kucchivasenāhaṃ dāsabyaṃ upagato.
analyzed: asuka dāsena nāma saddhim kim vā kucchi vasena aham dāsabyam upagataḥ

original: Mātāpitukoṭiyā pana me dāsaṭṭhānaṃ natthi. Kiṃ dāso nāma aha’nti vā ete māne karoti.
analyzed: mātā pitu koṭiyā pana me dāsa ṭṭhānam natthi kim dāsaḥ nāma ahanti vā ete māne karoti

original: Yathā ca dāso evaṃ pukkusacaṇḍālādayopi ete māne karontiyeva.
analyzed: yathā ca dāsaḥ evam pukkusa caṇḍāla ādayaḥ api ete māne

original: Ettha ca ‘seyyassa seyyohamasmī’ti uppannamānova yāthāvamāno, itare dve ayāthāvamānā.
analyzed: ettha ca seyyassa seyyā uham asmi iti uppanna mānā iva itare dve a yāthāvamānā

original: Tathā ‘sadisassa sadisohamasmī’ti ‘hīnassa hīnohamasmī’ti uppannamānova yāthāvamāno,
analyzed: tathā sadisassa sadisaḥ uham asmi iti hīnassa hīnaḥ uham asmi iti uppanna mānaḥ uva yāthāvamānaḥ

original: itare dve ayāthāvamānā. Tattha yāthāvamānā arahattamaggavajjhā, ayāthāvamānā sotāpattimaggavajjhā.
analyzed: itare dve ayāthāvamānā tattha yāthāvamānā arahatta magga vajjhā ayāthāvamānā sotāpatti magga vajjhā

original: 878. Evaṃ savatthuke māne kathetvā idāni avatthukaṃ nibbattitamānameva dassetuṃ tattha katamo mānotiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: evam sa vatthuke māne kathetvā idāni avatthukam nibbattita mānam eva dassetum tattha katamaḥ mānaḥ tiādi vuttaṃ

original: 879. Atimānaniddese seyyādivasena puggalaṃ anāmasitvā jātiādīnaṃ vatthuvaseneva niddiṭṭho. Tattha atimaññatīti ‘jātiādīhi mayā sadiso natthī’ti atikkamitvā maññati.
analyzed: atimāna niddese seyyā ādi vasena puggalam an āmasitvā jāti ādīnam vatthu vasena iva niddiṭṭhaḥ tattha atimaññati iti jāti ādīhi mayā sadisaḥ natthi iti atikkamitvā maññati

original: 880. Mānātimānaniddese yo evarūpoti yo eso ‘ayaṃ pubbe mayā sadiso, idāni ahaṃ seṭṭho,
analyzed: māna atimāna niddese yaḥ evarūpaḥ ti yaḥ esaḥ ayam pubbe mayā sadisaḥ idāni aham seṭṭhaḥ

original: ahaṃ hīnataro’ti uppanno māno. Ayaṃ bhārātibhāro viya purimaṃ sadisamānaṃ upādāya
analyzed: aham hīnataraḥ iti uppannaḥ mānaḥ ayam bhāra atibhāraḥ viya purimam upādāya

original: mānātimānoti dassetuṃ evamāha.
analyzed: māna atimānaḥ ti dassetum evam āha

original: 881. Omānaniddeso hīnamānaniddesasadisoyeva. Veneyyavasena pana so ‘hīnohamasmī’ti
analyzed: omāna niddesaḥ veneyya vasena pana saḥ hīnaḥ uham asmi iti

original: māno nāma vutto – ayaṃ omāno nāma. Apicettha ‘tvaṃ jātimā, kākajāti viya te jāti;
analyzed: mānaḥ nāma vuttaḥ ayam omānaḥ nāma apica ittha tvam jātimā kāka jāti viya te jāti

original: tvaṃ gottavā, caṇḍālagottaṃ viya te gottaṃ; tuyhaṃ saro atthi, kākassaro viya te
analyzed: tvam caṇḍāla gottam viya te gottam tuyham saraḥ atthi kākassaraḥ viya te

original: saro’ti evaṃ attānaṃ heṭṭhā katvā pavattanavasena ayaṃ omānoti veditabbo.
analyzed: saroti evam attānam heṭṭhā katvā pavattana vasena ayam omāno ti veditabbo

original: 882. Adhimānaniddese appatte pattasaññitāti cattāri saccāni appatvā pattasaññitāya.
analyzed: adhimāna niddese appatte patta saññi tā ati cattāri saccāni ap patvā patta saññi tāya

original: Akateti catūhi maggehi kattabbakicce akateyeva. Anadhigateti catusaccadhamme anadhigate.
analyzed: akatā iti catūhi maggehi kattabba kicce akatā iya iva anadhigatā iti catu sacca dhamme anadhigate

original: Asacchikateti arahattena apaccakkhakate. Ayaṃ vuccati adhimānoti ayaṃ adhigatamāno nāma vuccati.
analyzed: asacchikatā iti arahattena apaccakkhakate ayam vuccati adhimāno ti ayam adhigata māno nāma vuccati

original: Ayaṃ pana kassa uppajjati, kassa nuppajjatīti? Ariyasāvakassa tāva nuppajjati. So
analyzed: ayam pana kassa uppajjati kassa nuppajjati iti ariya sāvakassa tāva nuppajjati so

original: hi maggaphalanibbānapahīnakilesāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇena sañjātasomanasso ariyaguṇapaṭivedhe
analyzed: hi magga phala nibbāna pahīna kilesa avasiṭṭha kilesa paccavekkhaṇena sañjāta somanassaḥ ariya guṇa paṭivedhe

original: nikkaṅkho. Tasmā sotāpannādīnaṃ ‘ahaṃ sakadāgāmī’tiādivasena māno nuppajjati; dussīlassāpi
analyzed: nikkaṅkho tasmā sotāpanna ādīnam aham sakadāgāmī iti ādi vasena mānaḥ nuppajjati dussīlassa api

original: nuppajjati; so hi ariyaguṇādhigame nirāsova. Sīlavatopi pariccattakammaṭṭhānassa
analyzed: nuppajjati saḥ hi ariya guṇa adhigame nirāsaḥ uva sīlavataḥ pi pariccatta kammaṭṭhānassa

original: niddārāmatādimanuyuttassa nuppajjati.
analyzed: niddā rāma tā ādi manuyuttassa nuppajjati

original: Parisuddhasīlassa pana kammaṭṭhāne appamattassa nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā paccayapariggahena
analyzed: parisuddha sīlassa pana kammaṭṭhāne appamattassa nāma rūpam vavatthapetvā paccaya pariggahena

original: vitiṇṇakaṅkhassa tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa āraddhavipassakassa
analyzed: vitiṇṇa kaṅkhassa ti lakkhaṇam āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa āraddha vipassakassa

original: uppajjati; uppanne ca suddhasamathalābhī vā suddhavipassanālābhī vā antarā ṭhapeti.
analyzed: uppajjati uppanne ca suddha samatha lābhī vā suddha vipassanā lābhī vā antarā ṭhapeti

original: So hi dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi vassāni kilesasamudācāraṃ apassanto ‘ahaṃ sotāpanno’ti
analyzed: so hi dasa pi vīsam pi tiṃsam pi vassāni kilesa samudācāram a passantaḥ aham sotāpannaḥ ti

original: vā ‘sakadāgāmī’ti vā ‘anāgāmī’ti vā maññati. Samathavipassanālābhī pana arahatteyeva
analyzed: vā sakadāgāmī iti vā anāgāmī iti vā maññati samatha vipassanā lābhī pana

original: ṭhapeti. Tassa hi samādhibalena kilesā vikkhambhitā, vipassanābalena saṅkhārā supariggahitā.
analyzed: ṭhapeti tassa hi samādhi balena kilesāḥ vikkhambhitāḥ vipassanā balena saṅkhārā su pariggahitā

original: Tasmā saṭṭhipi vassāni asītipi vassāni vassasatampi kilesā na samudācaranti; khīṇāsavasseva
analyzed: tasmā saṭṭhi pi vassāni asīti pi vassāni vassa satam pi kilesāḥ na samudācaranti khīṇāsavassa iva

original: cittacāro hoti. So evaṃ dīgharattaṃ kilesasamudācāraṃ apassanto antarā aṭṭhatvāva
analyzed: citta cāraḥ hoti saḥ evam dīgharattam kilesa samudācāram a passantaḥ antarā aṭṭhatvā ava

original: ‘arahā aha’nti maññati, uccamālaṅkavāsī mahānāgatthero viya, haṅkanakavāsī mahādattatthero
analyzed: arahā ahanti maññati haṅkanaka vāsī mahādatta tthero

original: viya, cittalapabbate niṅkapoṇṇapadhānagharavāsī cūḷasumatthero viya ca.
analyzed: viya cittala pabbate niṅka poṇṇa padhāna ghara vāsī cūḷasuma theraḥ ca

original: Tatridaṃ ekavatthuparidīpanaṃ – talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnatthero kira nāma eko pabhinnapaṭisambhido
analyzed: tatra idam eka vatthu paridīpanam talaṅgara vāsī dhammadinna theraḥ kira nāma ekaḥ pabhinna paṭisambhidaḥ

original: mahākhīṇāsavo mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādadāyako ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ attano divāṭṭhāne
analyzed: mahākhīṇāsavaḥ mahataḥ bhikkhu saṅghassa ovāda dāyakaḥ ahosi saḥ eka divasam attanaḥ divāṭṭhāne

original: nisīditvā ‘kinnu kho amhākaṃ ācariyassa uccataliṅkavāsīmahānāgattherassa samaṇakiccaṃ
analyzed: nisīditvā kinnu kho amhākam ācariyassa uccataliṅka vāsī mahānāga ttherassa samaṇa kiccam

original: matthakaṃ patto, no’ti āvajjanto puthujjanabhāvamevassa disvā ‘mayi agacchante puthujjanakālakiriyameva
analyzed: matthakam pattaḥ no ti āvajjanto puthujjana bhāvam eva assa disvā mayi agacchante puthujjana kālakiriyam eva

original: karissatī’ti ca ñatvā iddhiyā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnassa therassa samīpe
analyzed: karissati iti ca ñatvā iddhiyā vehāsam uppatitvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnassa therassa samīpe

original: orohitvā vanditvā vattaṃ dassetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. ‘Kiṃ, āvuso dhammadinna, akāle
analyzed: orohitvā vanditvā vattam dassetvā ekamantam nisīdi kim āvuso dhammadinna akāle

original: āgatosī’ti ca vutto ‘pañhaṃ, bhante, pucchituṃ āgatomhī’ti āha.
analyzed: āgato asi iti ca vuttaḥ pañham bhante pucchitum āgataḥ amhi iti āha

original: Tato ‘pucchāvuso, jānamāno kathayissāmī’ti vutto pañhāsahassaṃ pucchi. Thero pucchitapucchitaṃ
analyzed: tatas puccha āvuso jānamāno kathayissāmi iti vutto pañhā sahassam pucchi thero pucchita pucchitam

original: pañhaṃ asajjamānova kathesi. Tato ‘atitikkhaṃ te, bhante, ñāṇaṃ. Kadā tumhehi ayaṃ
analyzed: pañham a sajjamānaḥ iva kathesi tatas atitikkham te bhante ñāṇam kadā tumhehi ayam

original: dhammo adhigato’ti vutto ‘ito saṭṭhivassakāle, āvuso’ti āha. ‘Samādhimpi, bhante,
analyzed: dhammaḥ adhigataḥ ti vuttaḥ itas saṭṭhivassa kāle āvuso ti āha samādhim pi bhante

original: vaḷañjethā’ti? ‘Na idaṃ, āvuso, bhāriya’nti. ‘Tena hi, bhante, ekaṃ hatthiṃ māpethā’ti.
analyzed: vaḷañjetha ati naḥ idam āvuso bhāriyanti tena hi bhante ekam hatthim māpetha ati

original: Thero sabbasetaṃ hatthiṃ māpesi. ‘Idāni, bhante, yathā ayaṃ hatthī añcitakaṇṇo pasāritanaṅguṭṭho
analyzed: theraḥ sabbasetam hatthim māpesi idāni bhante yathā ayam hatthī añcita kaṇṇaḥ pasārita naṅguṭṭhaḥ

original: soṇḍaṃ mukhe pakkhipitvā bheravaṃ koñcanādaṃ karonto tumhākaṃ abhimukho āgacchati
analyzed: soṇḍam mukhe pakkhipitvā bheravam koñca nādam karonto tumhākam abhimukhaḥ āgacchati

original: tathā taṃ karothā’ti. Thero tathā katvā vegena āgacchato hatthissa bheravaṃ ākāraṃ
analyzed: tathā tam karotha ati theraḥ tathā katvā vegena āgacchataḥ hatthissa bheravam ākāram

original: disvā uṭṭhāya palāyituṃ āraddho. Tamenaṃ khīṇāsavatthero hatthaṃ pasāretvā cīvarakaṇṇe
analyzed: disvā uṭṭhāya palāyitum āraddhaḥ tam enam khīṇāsava theraḥ hattham pasāretvā cīvara kaṇṇe

original: gahetvā ‘bhante, khīṇāsavassa sārajjaṃ nāma hotī’ti āha. So tasmiṃ kāle attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ
analyzed: gahetvā bhante khīṇāsavassa sārajjam nāma hoti iti āha saḥ tasmin kāle attanaḥ puthujjana bhāvam

original: ñatvā ‘avassayo me, āvuso dhammadinna, hohī’ti vatvā pādamūle ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdi. ‘Bhante,
analyzed: ñatvā avassayaḥ me āvuso dhammadinna hohi iti vatvā pāda mūle ukkuṭikam nisīdi bhante

original: tumhākaṃ avassayo bhavissāmiccevāhaṃ āgato, mā cintayitthā’ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
analyzed: tumhākam avassayaḥ bhavissāmi icca eva aham āgataḥ mā cintayittha ati kammaṭṭhānam kathesi

original: Thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā caṅkamaṃ āruyha tatiye padavāre aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
analyzed: thero kammaṭṭhānam gahetvā caṅkamam āruyha tatiye padavāre agga phalam arahattam pāpuṇi

original: Thero kira dosacarito ahosi.
analyzed: theraḥ kira dosa caritaḥ ahosi

original: 883. Asmimānaniddese rūpaṃ asmīti mānoti ‘ahaṃ rūpa’nti uppannamāno. Chandoti mānaṃ anugatacchandova. Tathā anusayo. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: rūpam asmi iti māno ti aham uppanna māno chando ti mānam anugata chandaḥ uva tathā anusayaḥ vedanā ādīsu pi esa iva nayo

original: 884. Micchāmānaniddese pāpakena vā kammāyatanenāti ādīsu pāpakaṃ kammāyatanaṃ nāma
analyzed: micchāmāna niddese pāpakena vā kamma āyatanena ati ādīsu pāpakam kamma āyatanam nāma

original: kevaṭṭamacchabandhanesādādīnaṃ kammaṃ. Pāpakaṃ sippāyatanaṃ nāma macchajālakhipanakuminakaraṇesu
analyzed: kevaṭṭa macchabandha nesāda ādīnam kammam pāpakam sippāyatanam nāma maccha jāla khipana kumina karaṇesu

original: ceva pāsaoḍḍanasūlāropanādīsu ca chekatā. Pāpakaṃ vijjāṭṭhānaṃ nāma yā kāci parūpaghātavijjā.
analyzed: ca iva pāsa oḍḍana sūla āropana ādīsu ca cheka tā pāpakam vijjāṭṭhānam nāma yā kāci para upaghāta vijjā

original: Pāpakaṃ sutaṃ nāma bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ. Pāpakaṃ paṭibhānaṃ nāma
analyzed: pāpakam sutam nāma bhārata yuddha sītā haraṇa ādi paṭisaṃyuttam pāpakam paṭibhānam nāma

original: dubbhāsitayuttaṃ kappanāṭakavilappanādipaṭibhānaṃ. Pāpakaṃ sīlaṃ nāma ajasīlaṃ gosīlaṃ.
analyzed: dubbhāsita yuttam kappa nāṭaka vilappana ādi paṭibhānam pāpakam sīlam nāma aja sīlam go sīlam

original: Vatampi ajavatagovatameva. Pāpikā diṭṭhi pana dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatesu yā kāci diṭṭhi.
analyzed: vatam pi ajavata govatam eva pāpikā diṭṭhi pana dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhi gatesu yā kāci diṭṭhi

original: 885. Ñātivitakkaniddesādīsu ‘mayhaṃ ñātayo sukhajīvino sampattiyuttā’ti evaṃ pañcakāmaguṇasannissitena
analyzed: ñāti vitakka niddesa ādīsu mayham ñātayo sukha jīvino sampatti yuttāḥ ti evam pañca kāmaguṇa sannissitena

original: gehasitapemena ñātake ārabbha uppannavitakkova ñātivitakko nāma. ‘Khayaṃ gatā vayaṃ
analyzed: geha sitapemena ñātake ārabbha uppanna vitakkaḥ va ñātivitakkaḥ nāma khayam gatāḥ vayam

original: gatā saddhā pasannā’ti evaṃ pavatto pana ñātivitakko nāma na hoti.
analyzed: gatā saddhā pasannā ti evam pavattaḥ pana ñāti vitakkaḥ nāma na hoti

original: 886. ‘Amhākaṃ janapado subhikkho sampannasasso’ti tuṭṭhamānassa gehasitapemavaseneva
analyzed: amhākam janapadaḥ subhikkhaḥ sampanna sassaḥ ti tuṭṭhamānassa geha sita pema vasena iva

original: uppannavitakko janapadavitakko nāma. ‘Amhākaṃ janapade manussā saddhā pasannā khayaṃ
analyzed: uppanna vitakkaḥ janapada vitakkaḥ nāma amhākam janapade manussā saddhā pasannā khayaṃ

original: gatā vayaṃ gatā’ti evaṃ pavatto pana janapadavitakko nāma na hoti.
analyzed: gatāḥ vayam gatāḥ iti evam pavattaḥ pana janapada vitakkaḥ nāma na hoti

original: 887. Amaratthāya vitakko, amaro vā vitakkoti amaravitakko. Tattha ‘ukkuṭikappadhānādīhi
analyzed: amara atthāya vitakkaḥ amaraḥ vā tattha ukkuṭika ppadhāna ādīhi

original: dukkhe nijjiṇṇe samparāye attā sukhī hoti amaro’ti dukkarakārikaṃ karontassa tāya
analyzed: dukkhe nijjiṇṇe samparāye attā sukhī hoti dukkara kārikam karontassa tāya

original: dukkarakārikāya paṭisaṃyutto vitakko amaratthāya vitakko nāma. Diṭṭhigatiko pana
analyzed: dukkara kārikāya paṭisaṃyuttaḥ vitakkaḥ amara atthāya vitakkaḥ nāma diṭṭhi gatikaḥ pana

original: ‘sassataṃ vadesī’tiādīni puṭṭho ‘evantipi me no, tathātipi me no’ aññathātipi me
analyzed: sassatam vadesi itiādīni puṭṭhaḥ evam iti pi me no tathā atipi me no aññathā atipi me

original: no, notipi me no, no notipi me no’ti vikkhepaṃ āpajjati, tassa so diṭṭhigatapaṭisaṃyutto
analyzed: no no tipi me no no no tipi me no ti vikkhepam āpajjati tassa so diṭṭhigata paṭisaṃyutto

original: vitakko. Yathā amaro nāma maccho udake gahetvā māretuṃ na sakkā, ito cito ca dhāvati,
analyzed: vitakkaḥ yathā amaraḥ nāma macchaḥ udake gahetvā māretum na sakkā itas citas ca dhāvati

original: gāhaṃ na gacchati; evameva ekasmiṃ pakkhe asaṇṭhahanato na maratīti amaro nāma hoti.
analyzed: gāham na gacchati evam eva ekasmin pakkhe a saṇṭhahanataḥ na marati iti amaraḥ nāma hoti

original: Taṃ duvidhampi ekato katvā ayaṃ vuccati amaravitakkoti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tam duvidham pi ekatas katvā ayam vuccati amara vitakkaḥ ti vuttam

original: 888. Parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyuttoti anuddayatāpatirūpakena gehasitapemena paṭisaṃyutto.
analyzed: para anuddaya tā paṭisaṃyuttaḥ ti anuddaya tā patirūpakena geha sita pemena paṭisaṃyuttaḥ

original: Sahanandītiādīsu upaṭṭhākesu nandantesu socantesu ca tehi saddhiṃ diguṇaṃ nandati,
analyzed: saha nandi iti ādīsu upaṭṭhākesu nandantesu socantesu ca tehi saddhim diguṇam nandati

original: diguṇaṃ socati; tesu sukhitesu diguṇaṃ sukhito hoti, dukkhitesu diguṇaṃ dukkhito
analyzed: diguṇam socati tesu sukhitesu diguṇam sukhitaḥ hoti dukkhitesu diguṇam dukkhitaḥ

original: hoti. Uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesūti tesu mahantesu vā khuddakesu vā kammesu uppannesu.
analyzed: hoti uppannesu kicca karaṇīyesu iti tesu mahantesu vā khuddakesu vā kammesu uppannesu

original: Attanā vā yogaṃ āpajjatīti tāni tāni kiccāni sādhento paññattiṃ vītikkamati, sallekhaṃ
analyzed: attanā vā yogam āpajjati iti tāni tāni kiccāni sādhentaḥ paññattim vītikkamati sallekham

original: kopeti. Yo tatthāti yo tasmiṃ saṃsaṭṭhavihāre, tasmiṃ vā yogāpajjane gehasito vitakko
analyzed: kopeti yaḥ tattha ati yaḥ tasmin saṃsaṭṭha vihāre tasmin vā yoga āpajjane geha sitaḥ vitakko

original: – ayaṃ parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko nāma.
analyzed: ayam para anuddaya tā paṭisaṃyuttaḥ vitakkaḥ nāma

original: 889. Lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyuttoti cīvarādilābhena ceva sakkārena ca kittisaddena ca saddhiṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭisaṃyutto.
analyzed: lābha sakkāra siloka paṭisaṃyuttaḥ ti cīvara ādi lābhena ca iva sakkārena ca kitti saddena ca saddhim ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena paṭisaṃyuttaḥ

original: 890. Anavaññattipaṭisaṃyuttoti ‘aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyuṃ, na pothetvā viheṭhetvā
analyzed: an avaññatti paṭisaṃyuttaḥ ti aho vata mama pare na avajāneyyum na pothetvā viheṭhetvā

original: katheyyu’nti evaṃ anavaññātabhāvapatthanāya saddhiṃ uppajjanavitakko. Yo tattha gehasitoti
analyzed: katheyyunti evam anavaññāta bhāva patthanāya saddhim uppajjana vitakko yaḥ tattha geha sito ti

original: yo tasmiṃ ‘mā maṃ pare avajāniṃsū’ti uppanne citte pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhātagehanissito
analyzed: yaḥ tasmin mā mama pare avajāniṃsu iti uppanne citte pañca kāmaguṇa saṅkhāta geha nissitaḥ

original: hutvā uppannavitakko. Sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭamevāti.
analyzed: hutvā uppanna vitakkaḥ sesam sabbattha pākaṭam eva ati

original: Ekakaniddesavaṇṇanā.
(2.) Dukaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: duka niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 891. Dukesu kodhaniddesādayo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Heṭṭhā anāgatesu pana
analyzed: dukesu kodha niddesa ādayaḥ heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbā heṭṭhā anāgatesu pana

original: upanāhaniddesādīsu pubbakālaṃ kodhaṃ upanayhatīti aparakālakodho upanāho nāma. Upanayhanākāro
analyzed: upanāha niddesa ādīsu pubba kālam kodham upanayhati iti apara kāla kodhaḥ upanāhaḥ nāma upanayhana ākāraḥ

original: upanayhanā. Upanayhitassa bhāvo upanayhitattaṃ. Aṭṭhapanāti paṭhamuppannassa anantaraṭṭhapanā
analyzed: upanayhanā upanayhitassa bhāvaḥ upanayhitattam aṭṭhapanā ti paṭhama uppannassa anantaraṭṭhapanā

original: mariyādaṭṭhapanā vā. Ṭhapanāti pakatiṭhapanā. Saṇṭhapanāti sabbatobhāgena punappunaṃ
analyzed: mariyāda ṭhapanā vā ṭhapanā ati pakati ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā ati sabbatobhāgena punappunam

original: āghātaṭṭhapanā. Anusaṃsandanāti paṭhamuppannena kodhena saddhiṃ antaraṃ adassetvā
analyzed: āghāta ṭṭhapanā anusaṃsandanā ti paṭhama uppannena kodhena saddhim antaram a dassetvā

original: ekībhāvakaraṇā. Anuppabandhanāti purimena saddhiṃ pacchimassa ghaṭanā. Daḷhīkammanti
analyzed: ekībhāva karaṇā an uppabandhanā ti purimena saddhim pacchimassa ghaṭanā daḷhīkammanti

original: thirakaraṇaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ upanandhanalakkhaṇo veraṃ appaṭinissajjanaraso
analyzed: thira karaṇam ayam vuccati iti ayam upanandhana lakkhaṇaḥ veram appaṭinissajjana rasaḥ

original: upanāhoti vuccati; yena samannāgato puggalo veraṃ nissajjituṃ na sakkoti; ‘evaṃ nāma
analyzed: upanāhaḥ ti vuccati yena samannāgataḥ puggalaḥ veram nissajjitum na sakkoti evam nāma

original: maṃ esa vattuṃ ananucchaviko’ti aparāparaṃ anubandhati; ādittapūtialātaṃ viya jalateva;
analyzed: mama apara aparam anubandhati apara aparam

original: dhoviyamānaṃ acchacammaṃ viya, vasātelamakkhitapilotikā viya ca na parisujjhati.
analyzed: dhoviyamānam accha cammam viya vasā tela makkhita pilotikā viya ca na parisujjhati

original: 892. Makkhanabhāvavasena makkho; paraguṇamakkhanāya pavattentopi attano kāraṇaṃ,
analyzed: makkhana bhāva vasena makkho para guṇa makkhanāya pavattentaḥ api attanaḥ kāraṇam

original: gūthapaharaṇakaṃ gūtho viya, paṭhamataraṃ makkhetīti attho. Tato parā dve ākārabhāvaniddesā.
analyzed: gūtha paharaṇakam gūthaḥ viya paṭhamataram makkheti iti attho tatas parā dve ākāra bhāva niddesā

original: Niṭṭhurabhāvo niṭṭhuriyaṃ; ‘taṃ nissāya ettakampi natthī’ti kheḷapātananti attho.
analyzed: niṭṭhura bhāvaḥ niṭṭhuriyam tam nissāya ettakam pi natthi iti kheḷa pātanam ti attho

original: Niṭṭhuriyakammanti niṭṭhuriyakaraṇaṃ. Gahaṭṭho vā hi gahaṭṭhaṃ, bhikkhu vā bhikkhuṃ
analyzed: niṭṭhuriya kammanti niṭṭhuriya karaṇam gahaṭṭhaḥ vā hi gahaṭṭham bhikkhu vā bhikkhum

original: nissāya vasanto appamattakeneva kujjhitvā ‘taṃ nissāya ettakampi natthī’ti kheḷaṃ
analyzed: nissāya vasantaḥ appamattakena iva kujjhitvā tam nissāya ettakam pi natthi iti kheḷam

original: pātetvā pādena maddanto viya niṭṭhuriyaṃ nāma karoti. Tassa taṃ kammaṃ niṭṭhuriyakammanti
analyzed: pātetvā pādena maddantaḥ viya niṭṭhuriyam nāma karoti tassa tat kammam niṭṭhuriya kammanti

original: vuccati. Lakkhaṇādito panesa paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo makkho, tesaṃ vināsanaraso,
analyzed: vuccati lakkhaṇa āditaḥ pana esa para guṇa makkhana lakkhaṇaḥ makkhaḥ tesam vināsana raso

original: parena sukatānaṃ kiriyānaṃ avacchādanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: parena su katānam kiriyānam avacchādana paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Paḷāsatīti paḷāso; parassa guṇe dassetvā attano guṇehi samaṃ karotīti attho. Paḷāsassa
analyzed: paḷāsati iti paḷāsaḥ parassa guṇe dassetvā attanaḥ guṇehi samam karoti iti attho paḷāsassa

original: āyanā paḷāsāyanā. Paḷāso ca so attano jayāharaṇato āhāro cāti paḷāsāhāro. Vivādaṭṭhānanti
analyzed: āyanā paḷāsa ayanā paḷāso ca so attano jaya āharaṇato āhāro ca ati paḷāsa āhāro vivāda ṭhānanti

original: vivādakāraṇaṃ. Yugaggāhoti samadhuraggahaṇaṃ. Appaṭinissaggoti attanā gahitassa appaṭinissajjanaṃ.
analyzed: vivāda kāraṇam yuga ggāho ti samadhura ggahaṇam appaṭinissaggo ti attanā gahitassa appaṭinissajjanam

original: Lakkhaṇādito panesa yugaggāhalakkhaṇo paḷāso, paraguṇehi attano guṇānaṃ samakaraṇaraso,
analyzed: lakkhaṇa āditaḥ pana isa yuga ggāha lakkhaṇaḥ paḷāsaḥ para guṇehi attanaḥ guṇānam sama karaṇa rasaḥ

original: paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena upaṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhāno. Paḷāsī hi puggalo dutiyassa dhuraṃ
analyzed: paresam guṇa ppamāṇena upaṭṭhāna paccupaṭṭhāno paḷāsī hi puggalo dutiyassa dhuram

original: na deti, samaṃ pasāretvā tiṭṭhati, sākacchamaṇḍale aññena bhikkhunā bahūsu suttesu
analyzed: na deti samam pasāretvā tiṭṭhati sākaccha maṇḍale aññena bhikkhunā bahūsu suttesu

original: ca kāraṇesu ca ābhatesupi ‘tava ca mama ca vāde kiṃ nāma nānākaraṇaṃ? Nanu majjhe
analyzed: ca kāraṇesu ca tava ca mama ca vāde kim nāma nānākaraṇam nanu majjhe

original: bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ekasadisameva amhākaṃ vacana’nti vadati. Issāmacchariyaniddesā vuttatthā eva.
analyzed: bhinna suvaṇṇam viya eka sadisam eva amhākam vacananti vadati issā macchariya niddesāḥ vutta tthāḥ eva

original: 894. Māyāniddese vācaṃ bhāsatīti jānaṃyeva ‘paṇṇattiṃ vītikkamantā bhikkhū bhāriyaṃ
analyzed: māyā niddese vācam bhāsati iti jānaṃya iva paṇṇattim vītikkamantāḥ bhikkhū bhāriyam

original: karonti, amhākaṃ pana vītikkamaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī’ti upasanto viya bhāsati. Kāyena
analyzed: karonti amhākam pana vītikkama ṭṭhānam nāma natthi iti upasantaḥ viya bhāsati kāyena

original: parakkamatīti ‘mayā kataṃ idaṃ pāpakammaṃ mā keci jāniṃsū’ti kāyena vattaṃ karoti.
analyzed: parakkamati iti mayā katam idam pāpa kammam mā keci jāniṃsu iti kāyena vattam karoti

original: Vijjamānadosapaṭicchādanato cakkhumohanamāyā viyāti māyā. Māyāvino bhāvo māyāvitā.
analyzed: vijjamāna dosa paṭicchādanato cakkhu mohana māyā viyāti māyā māyāvinaḥ bhāvaḥ māyāvi tā

original: Katvā pāpaṃ puna paṭicchādanato aticca āsaranti etāya sattāti accāsarā. Kāyavācākiriyāhi
analyzed: katvā pāpam puna paṭicchādanataḥ aticca āsaranti etāya sattā ati accāsarā

original: aññathā dassanato vañcetīti vañcanā. Etāya sattā nikarontīti nikati; micchākarontīti
analyzed: aññathā dassanataḥ vañceti iti vañcanā etāya sattā nikaronti iti nikati micchā karonti iti

original: attho. ‘Nāhaṃ evaṃ karomī’ti pāpānaṃ vikkhipanato vikiraṇā. ‘Nāhaṃ evaṃ karomī’ti
analyzed: atthaḥ na aham evam karomi iti pāpānam vikkhipanataḥ vikiraṇāḥ na aham evam karomi iti

original: parivajjanato pariharaṇā. Kāyādīhi saṃvaraṇato gūhanā. Sabbatobhāgena gūhanā parigūhanā.
analyzed: parivajjanato pariharaṇā kāya ādīhi saṃvaraṇato gūhanā sabbatobhāgena gūhanā parigūhanā

original: Tiṇapaṇṇehi viya gūthaṃ kāyavacīkammehi pāpaṃ chādetīti chādanā. Sabbatobhāgena chādanā
analyzed: tiṇa paṇṇehi viya gūtham kāya vacī kammehi pāpam chādeti iti chādanā sabbatobhāgena chādanā

original: paṭicchādanā. Na uttānaṃ katvā dassetīti anuttānīkammaṃ. Na pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetīti
analyzed: paṭicchādanā na uttānam katvā dasseti iti an uttānīkammam na pākaṭam katvā dasseti iti

original: anāvikammaṃ. Suṭṭhu chādanā vocchādanā. Katapaṭicchādanavasena punapi pāpassa karaṇato
analyzed: an āvikammam suṭṭhu chādanā vocchādanā kata paṭicchādana vasena puna api pāpassa karaṇato

original: pāpakiriyā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ katapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā nāma vuccati; yāya
analyzed: pāpa kiriyā ayam vuccati iti ayam kata paṭicchādana lakkhaṇā māyā nāma vuccati yāya

original: samannāgato puggalo bhasmāpaṭicchanno viya aṅgāro, udakapaṭicchanno viya khāṇu, pilotikāpaliveṭhitaṃ
analyzed: samannāgataḥ puggalaḥ bhasma apaṭicchannaḥ viya aṅgāro udaka paṭicchannaḥ viya khāṇu pilotikā paliveṭhitam

original: viya ca satthaṃ hoti.
analyzed: viya ca sattham hoti

original: Sāṭheyyaniddese saṭhoti asantaguṇaparidīpanato na sammā bhāsitā. Sabbatobhāgena saṭho
analyzed: sāṭheyya niddese saṭho ti asanta guṇa paridīpanato na sammā bhāsitā sabbatobhāgena saṭho

analyzed: yam tattha ati yam tasmin puggale saṭhanti asanta guṇa dīpanam kerāṭiyam

original: Saṭhatāti saṭhākāro. Kakkaratāti padumanālissa viya aparāmasanakkhamo kharapharusabhāvo.
analyzed: saṭha tā ati saṭhākāro kakkara tā ati paduma nālissa viya a parāmasana khamaḥ khara pharusa bhāvo

original: Kakkariyantipi tasseva vevacanaṃ. Parikkhattatā pārikkhattiyanti padadvayena nikhaṇitvā
analyzed: tassa iva vevacanam parikkhatta tā pārikkhattiyanti pada dvayena nikhaṇitvā

original: ṭhapitaṃ viya daḷhakerāṭiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuccatīti idaṃ attano avijjamānaguṇappakāsanalakkhaṇaṃ

original: sāṭheyyaṃ nāma vuccati; yena samannāgatassa puggalassa kucchiṃ vā piṭṭhiṃ vā jānituṃ na sakkā.
analyzed: sāṭheyyam nāma vuccati yena samannāgatassa puggalassa kucchim vā piṭṭhim vā jānitum na sakkā

original: Vāmena sūkaro hoti, dakkhiṇena ajāmigo;
analyzed: vāmena sūkaraḥ hoti dakkhiṇena ajāmigo

original: Sarena nelako hoti, visāṇena jaraggavoti.
analyzed: sarena nelakaḥ hoti visāṇena jaraggavaḥ ti

original: Evaṃ vuttayakkhasūkarasadiso hoti. Avijjādiniddesā vuttatthā eva.
analyzed: evam vutta yakkha sūkara sadisaḥ hoti avijja ādi niddesāḥ vutta tthāḥ eva

original: 902. Anajjavaniddese anajjavoti anujutākāro. Anajjavabhāvo anajjavatā. Jimhatāti
analyzed: anajjava niddese anajjavā iti anujuta ākāraḥ anajjava bhāvaḥ anajjava tā

original: candavaṅkatā. Vaṅkatāti gomuttavaṅkatā. Kuṭilatāti naṅgalakoṭivaṅkatā. Sabbehipi
analyzed: canda vaṅka tā vaṅka tā ati gomutta vaṅka tā kuṭila tā ati naṅgala koṭi vaṅka tā sabbehi pi

original: imehi padehi kāyavacīcittavaṅkatāva kathitā.
analyzed: imehi padehi kathitā

original: Amaddavaniddese na mudubhāvo amudutā. Amaddavākāro amaddavatā. Kakkhaḷabhāvo kakkhaḷiyaṃ.
analyzed: amaddava niddese na mudu bhāvaḥ amudu tā a maddava ākāraḥ a maddava tā kakkhaḷa bhāvaḥ kakkhaḷiyam

original: Maddavakarassa sinehassa abhāvato pharusabhāvo phārusiyaṃ. Anīcavuttitāya ujukameva
analyzed: maddava karassa sinehassa abhāvataḥ pharusa bhāvaḥ phārusiyam anīca vutti tāya ujukam eva

original: ṭhitacittabhāvo ujucittatā. Puna amudutāgahaṇaṃ tassā visesanatthaṃ ‘amudutāsaṅkhātā
analyzed: ṭhita citta bhāvaḥ uju citta tā puna amudu tā gahaṇam tassāḥ visesana attham amudu tā saṅkhātā

original: ujucittatā, na ajjavasaṅkhātā ujucittatā’ti.
analyzed: uju citta tā na ajjava saṅkhātā uju citta tā ati

original: 903. Akkhantiniddesādayo khantiniddesādipaṭipakkhato veditabbā.
analyzed: akkhanti niddesa ādayaḥ khanti niddesa ādi paṭipakkhataḥ veditabbā

original: 908. Saṃyojananiddese ajjhattanti kāmabhavo. Bahiddhāti rūpārūpabhavo. Kiñcāpi hi
analyzed: saṃyojana niddese kāma bhavaḥ bahiddhā ati rūpa arūpa bhavaḥ kiñca api hi

original: sattā kāmabhave appaṃ kālaṃ vasanti kappassa catutthameva koṭṭhāsaṃ, itaresu tīsu
analyzed: sattā kāma bhave appam kālam vasanti kappassa catuttham eva koṭṭhāsam itaresu tīsu

original: koṭṭhāsesu kāmabhavo suñño hoti tuccho, rūpārūpabhave bahuṃ kālaṃ vasanti, tathāpi

original: nesaṃ yasmā kāmabhave cutipaṭisandhiyo bahukā honti, appā rūpārūpabhavesu, yattha
analyzed: na isam kāma bhave cuti paṭisandhiyaḥ bahukāḥ honti rūpa arūpa bhavesu

original: ca cutipaṭisandhiyo bahukā tattha ālayopi patthanāpi abhilāsopi bahu hoti, yattha

original: appā tattha appo, tasmā kāmabhavo ajjhattaṃ nāma jāto, rūpārūpabhavā bahiddhā nāma.

original: Iti ajjhattasaṅkhāte kāmabhave bandhanaṃ ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ nāma, bahiddhāsaṅkhātesu
analyzed: iti ajjhatta saṅkhāte kāma bhave bandhanam ajjhatta saṃyojanam nāma bahiddhā saṅkhātesu

original: rūpārūpabhavesu bandhanaṃ bahiddhāsaṃyojanaṃ nāma. Tattha ekekaṃ pañcapañcavidhaṃ
analyzed: rūpa arūpa bhavesu bandhanam bahiddhāsaṃyojanam nāma tattha ekekam pañca pañcavidham

original: hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “pañcorambhāgiyāni pañcuddhambhāgiyānī”ti. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho
analyzed: hoti tena vuttam pañca orambhāgiyāni pañca uddhambhāgiyāni iti tatra ayam vacana atthaḥ

original: – oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, tattha upapattinipphādanato taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni.
analyzed: oram vuccati kāmadhātu tattha upapatti nipphādanato tam oram bhajanti iti orambhāgiyāni

original: Uddhaṃ vuccati rūpārūpadhātu, tattha upapattinipphādanato taṃ uddhaṃ bhajantīti uddhambhāgiyānīti.
analyzed: uddham vuccati rūpa arūpa dhātu tattha upapatti nipphādanato tam uddham bhajanti iti uddhambhāgiyāni iti

original: Dukaniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: duka niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: (3.) Tikaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: tika niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 909. Tikaniddese tīhi akusalamūlehi vaṭṭamūlasamudācāro kathito. Akusalavitakkādīsu
analyzed: tika niddese tīhi akusala mūlehi vaṭṭa mūla samudācāraḥ kathitaḥ akusala vitakka ādīsu

original: vitakkanavasena vitakko, sañjānanavasena saññā, sabhāvaṭṭhena dhātūti veditabbā.
analyzed: vitakkana vasena vitakko sañjānana vasena saññā sabhāva ṭṭhena dhātu uti veditabbā

original: Duccaritaniddese paṭhamanayo kammapathavasena vibhatto, dutiyo sabbasaṅgāhikakammavasena,
analyzed: duccarita niddese paṭhama nayaḥ kammapatha vasena vibhattaḥ dutiyaḥ sabba saṅgāhika kamma vasena

original: tatiyo nibbattitacetanāvaseneva.
analyzed: tatiyaḥ nibbattita cetanā vasena iva

original: 914. Āsavaniddese suttantapariyāyena tayova āsavā kathitā.
analyzed: āsava niddese suttanta pariyāyena āsavā kathitā

original: 919. Esanāniddese saṅkhepato tattha katamā kāmesanāti ādinā nayena vutto kāmagavesanarāgo
kāmesanā. Yo bhavesu bhavacchandotiādinā nayena vutto bhavagavesanarāgo bhavesanā.
analyzed: kāma īsanā yaḥ bhavesu bhava chandaḥ iti ādinā nayena vuttaḥ bhava gavesana rāgaḥ bhavesanā

original: Sassato lokotiādinā nayena vuttā diṭṭhigatikasammatassa brahmacariyassa gavesanā
analyzed: sassataḥ lokaḥ iti ādinā nayena vuttā diṭṭhigatika sammatassa brahmacariyassa gavesanā

original: diṭṭhi brahmacariyesanāti veditabbā. Yasmā ca na kevalaṃ rāgadiṭṭhiyo eva esanā,
analyzed: diṭṭhi brahmacariya isanā ti veditabbā yasmā ca na kevalam rāga diṭṭhiyaḥ eva esanā

original: tadekaṭṭhaṃ pana kammampi esanā eva, tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ dutiyanayo vibhatto. Tattha
analyzed: tad ekaṭṭham pana kammam pi esanā eva tasmā tam dassetum dutiya nayaḥ vibhattaḥ tattha

original: tadekaṭṭhanti sampayuttekaṭṭhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha kāmarāgekaṭṭhaṃ kāmāvacarasattānameva
analyzed: tat ekaṭṭham ti sampayutta ikaṭṭham veditabbam tattha kāma rāga ekaṭṭham kāmāvacara sattānam eva

original: pavattati; bhavarāgekaṭṭhaṃ pana mahābrahmānaṃ. Samāpattito vuṭṭhāya caṅkamantānaṃ
analyzed: pavattati bhava rāga ekaṭṭham pana mahābrahmānam samāpattitaḥ vuṭṭhāya caṅkamantānam

original: jhānaṅgānaṃ assādanakāle akusalakāyakammaṃ hoti, ‘aho sukhaṃ aho sukha’nti vācaṃ
analyzed: jhāna aṅgānam assādana kāle akusala kāya kammam hoti aho sukham aho sukhanti vācam

original: bhinditvā assādanakāle vacīkammaṃ, kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā manasāva assādanakāle
analyzed: bhinditvā assādana kāle vacī kammam kāyaṅga vācaṅgāni a copetvā manasā ava assādana kāle

original: manokammaṃ. Antaggāhikadiṭṭhivasena sabbesampi diṭṭhigatikānaṃ caṅkamanādivasena tāni hontiyeva.
analyzed: manaḥ kammam antaggāhika diṭṭhi vasena sabbesam pi diṭṭhi gatikānam caṅkamana ādi vasena tāni

original: 920. Vidhāniddese “kathaṃvidhaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadanti, kathaṃvidhaṃ paññavantaṃ vadantī”tiādīsu
analyzed: vidhā niddese kathaṃvidham sīlavantam vadanti kathaṃvidham paññavantam vadanti itiādīsu

original: ākārasaṇṭhānaṃ vidhā nāma. “Ekavidhena ñāṇavatthū”tiādīsu koṭṭhāso. “Vidhāsu na vikampatī”tiādīsu
analyzed: ākāra saṇṭhānam vidhā nāma ekavidhena ñāṇa vatthu uti ādīsu koṭṭhāsaḥ vidhāsu na vikampati iti ādīsu

original: māno. Idhāpi mānova vidhā nāma. So hi seyyādivasena vidahanato vidhāti vuccati. Ṭhapanaṭṭhena
analyzed: mānaḥ idha api mānaḥ uva vidhā nāma saḥ hi seyyā ādi vasena vidahanataḥ vidhā ati vuccati ṭhapana ṭṭhena

original: vā vidhā. Tasmā ‘seyyohamasmī’ti evaṃ uppannā mānavidhā mānaṭhapanā seyyohamasmīti
analyzed: vā vidhā tasmā seyyā uham asmi iti evam uppannā māna vidhā māna ṭhapanā seyyā uham asmi iti

original: vidhāti veditabbā. Sesapadadvayesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: vidhāti veditabbā sesa pada dvayesu pi esā iva nayaḥ

original: 921. Bhayaniddese jātiṃ paṭicca bhayanti jātipaccayā uppannabhayaṃ. Bhayānakanti
analyzed: bhaya niddese jātim paṭicca bhayanti jāti paccayā uppanna bhayam bhayānakam ti

analyzed: ākāra niddeso bhaya vasena gatta calanam lomahaṃso ti lomānam haṃsanam

original: uddhaggabhāvo. Iminā padadvayena kiccato bhayaṃ dassetvā puna cetaso utrāsoti sabhāvato dassitaṃ.
analyzed: iminā pada dvayena kiccataḥ bhayam dassetvā puna cetasaḥ sabhāvataḥ dassitam

original: 922. Tamaniddese vicikicchāsīsena avijjā kathitā. “Tamandhakāro sammoho, avijjogho
mahabbhayo”ti vacanato hi avijjā tamo nāma. Tiṇṇaṃ pana addhānaṃ vasena desanāsukhatāya
analyzed: mahabbhayo ti vacanataḥ hi avijjā tamaḥ nāma tiṇṇam pana addhānam vasena desanā sukhatāya

original: vicikicchāsīsena desanā katā. Tattha ‘kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atīte khattiyo ahosiṃ udāhu
analyzed: vicikicchā sīsena desanā katā tattha kim nu kho aham atīte khattiyaḥ ahosim udāhu

original: brāhmaṇo vesso suddo kāḷo odāto rasso dīgho’ti kaṅkhanto atītaṃ addhānaṃ ārabbha

original: kaṅkhati nāma. ‘Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ anāgate khattiyo bhavissāmi udāhu brāhmaṇo vesso…pe…

original: dīgho’ti kaṅkhanto anāgataṃ addhānaṃ ārabbha kaṅkhati nāma. ‘Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ etarahi

original: khattiyo udāhu brāhmaṇo vesso suddo; kiṃ vā ahaṃ rūpaṃ udāhu vedanā saññā saṅkhārā
analyzed: khattiyaḥ udāhu brāhmaṇaḥ vessaḥ suddaḥ kim vai aham rūpam udāhu vedanā saññā saṅkhārā

original: viññāṇa’nti kaṅkhanto paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ ārabbha kaṅkhati nāma.
analyzed: viññāṇanti kaṅkhantaḥ paccuppannam addhānam ārabbha kaṅkhati nāma

original: Tattha kiñcāpi khattiyo vā attano khattiyabhāvaṃ, brāhmaṇo vā brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ, vesso

analyzed: khattiya jīva ādīnam vaṇṇa ādi bhedam sutvā kīdisaḥ nu kho amhākam abbhantare jīvaḥ kim

original: nu kho nīlako udāhu pītako lohitako odāto caturaṃso chaḷaṃso aṭṭhaṃso’ti kaṅkhanto evaṃ kaṅkhati nāma.
analyzed: nu kho nīlakaḥ udāhu pītakaḥ lohitakaḥ odāto catur aṃso chaḷ aṃso aṭṭha aṃso ti kaṅkhantaḥ evam kaṅkhati nāma

original: 923. Titthāyatanānīti titthabhūtāni āyatanāni, titthiyānaṃ vā āyatanāni. Tattha titthaṃ
analyzed: tittha āyatanāni iti tittha bhūtāni āyatanāni titthiyānam vā āyatanāni tattha tittham

analyzed: nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyaḥ titthiyāḥ nāma yesam tāḥ diṭṭhiyaḥ ruccanti khamanti āyatanaṭṭho

original: heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Tattha yasmā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sañjāyamānā imesuyeva tīsu ṭhānesu

analyzed: sañjāyanti samosaramānā api samosaranti sannipatanti diṭṭhigatika bhāve

analyzed: ca kāraṇāni tasmā titthāni ca tāni sañjātāni itiādinā atthena āyatanāni

analyzed: nāma yaḥ yathā jānāti tassa tathā vuccati paṭisaṃvedeti iti attano santāne uppannam

analyzed: jānāti paṭisaṃviditam karoti anubhavati vā pubbekata hetū ti pubbe kata kāraṇā pubbe

analyzed: te kamma vedanañca kiriya vedanañca paṭikkhipitvā ekam vipāka vedanam eva sampaṭicchanti

original: Pittasamuṭṭhānādīsu ca aṭṭhasu ābādhesu satta paṭikkhipitvā aṭṭhamaṃyeva sampaṭicchanti,

analyzed: sampaṭicchanti kusala akusala vipāka kiriya saṅkhātāsu ca catūsu cetanāsu vipāka cetanaṃyā iva sampaṭicchanti

original: Issaranimmānahetūti issaranimmānakāraṇā; brahmunā vā pajāpatinā vā issarena nimmitattā
analyzed: issara nimmāna hetū ti issara nimmāna kāraṇā brahmunā vā pajāpatinā vā issarena nimmita ttā

analyzed: paccuppanne attanā kata mūlakena vā āṇatti mūlakena vā pubbe katena vā ahetu appaccayā

analyzed: sabbam paṭikkhipanti

original: 924. Kiñcanāti palibodhā. Rāgo kiñcananti rāgo uppajjamāno satte bandhati palibundheti,
analyzed: kiñcana ati palibodhā rāgaḥ kiñcana nti rāgaḥ uppajjamānaḥ satte bandhati palibundhā iti

original: avindu”nti āgataṭṭhāne bhūmippadeso aṅgaṇaṃ. “Tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya
analyzed: avindunti āgata ṭṭhāne bhūmi ppadesaḥ aṅgaṇam tassa iva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya

original: vāyamatī”ti āgataṭṭhāne yaṃ kiñci malaṃ vā paṅko vā. “Sāṅgaṇova samāno”ti āgataṭṭhāne
analyzed: āgata ṭṭhāne yam kiñci malam vā paṅkaḥ vā āgata ṭṭhāne

original: nānappakāro tibbakileso. Idhāpi tadeva kilesaṅgaṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Teneva rāgo aṅgaṇantiādimāha.

original: Malānīti malinabhāvakaraṇāni. Rāgo malanti rāgo uppajjamāno cittaṃ malinaṃ karoti, malaṃ gāhāpeti, tasmā malanti vuccati. Itaresupi dvīsu eseva nayo.
analyzed: malāni iti malina bhāva karaṇāni rāgaḥ malanti rāgaḥ uppajjamānaḥ cittam malinam karoti malam gāhāpeti tasmā malanti vuccati itaresu pi dvīsu esa eva nayaḥ

original: Visamaniddese yasmā rāgādīsu ceva kāyaduccaritādīsu ca sattā pakkhalanti, pakkhalitā ca pana sāsanatopi sugatitopi patanti, tasmā pakkhalanapātahetuto rāgo visamantiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: visama niddese yasmā rāga ādīsu ca iva kāya duccarita ādīsu ca sattā pakkhalanti pakkhalitā ca pana sāsanataḥ pi sugatitaḥ pi patanti tasmā pakkhalana pāta hetutaḥ rāgaḥ visama tiādi vuttam

original: Aggīti anudahanaṭṭhena aggi. Rāgaggīti rāgo uppajjamāno satte anudahati jhāpeti,
analyzed: aggi iti anudahana ṭṭhena aggi rāga aggi iti rāgaḥ uppajjamānaḥ satte anudahati jhāpeti

original: tasmā aggīti vuccati. Dosamohesupi eseva nayo. Tattha vatthūni – ekā kira daharabhikkhunī

original: manopadosikā devā daṭṭhabbā. Mohassa anudahanatāya khiḍḍāpadosikā devā daṭṭhabbā.

original: Mohanavasena hi tesaṃ satisammoso hoti. Tasmā khiḍḍāvasena āhārakālaṃ ativattitvā
analyzed: mohana vasena hi tesam sati sammosaḥ hoti tasmā khiḍḍā vasena āhāra kālam ativattitvā

original: ojavantaṃ natthi, tasmā rāgo kasāvotiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ojavantam na atthi tasmā rāgo kasāvaḥ ti ādi vuttaṃ

original: 925. Assādadiṭṭhīti assādasampayuttā diṭṭhi. Natthi kāmesu dosoti kilesakāmena vatthukāmapaṭisevanadoso
analyzed: assāda diṭṭhi iti assāda sampayuttā diṭṭhi natthi kāmesu doso ti kilesa kāmena vatthu kāma paṭisevana doso

original: natthīti vadati. Pātabyatanti pātabbabhāvaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ ajjhoharaṇaṃ. Evaṃvādī
analyzed: na atthi iti vadati pātabba tanti pātabba bhāvam paribhuñjanam ajjhoharaṇam evaṃvādī

original: hi so vatthukāmesu kilesakāmaṃ pivanto viya ajjhoharanto viya paribhuñjati. Attānudiṭṭhīti
analyzed: hi so vatthu kāmesu kilesa kāmam pivantaḥ viya ajjhoharantaḥ viya paribhuñjati attā anudiṭṭhī iti

original: attānaṃ anugatā diṭṭhi. Micchādiṭṭhīti lāmakā diṭṭhi. Idāni yasmā ettha paṭhamā sassatadiṭṭhi

analyzed: hoti dutiyā sakkāya diṭṭhi tatiyā uccheda diṭṭhi tasmā tam attham dassetum sassata diṭṭhi

original: assādadiṭṭhītiādimāha.
analyzed: assāda diṭṭhi itiādim āha

original: 926. Aratiniddeso ca vihesāniddeso ca vuttatthoyeva. Adhammassa cariyā adhammacariyā,
analyzed: arati niddeso ca vihesā niddeso ca adhammassa cariyā adhamma cariyā

original: adhammakaraṇanti attho. Visamā cariyā, visamassa vā kammassa cariyāti visamacariyā.

original: Dovacassatāpāpamittatā niddesā vuttatthā eva. Puthunimittārammaṇesu pavattito nānattesu
