analyzed: nānatta saññā kosajja pamāda niddesesu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vissaṭṭha cittassa

original: kusaladhammabhāvanāya ananuyogavasena līnavuttitā kosajjaṃ, pamajjanavasena pamattabhāvo
analyzed: kusala dhamma bhāvanāya ananuyoga vasena līna vutti tā kosajjam pamajjana vasena pamatta bhāvo

original: pamādoti veditabbo. Asantuṭṭhitādiniddesā vuttatthā eva.
analyzed: pamādaḥ ti veditabbaḥ asantuṭṭhita ādi niddesāḥ vutta tthāḥ eva

original: 931. Anādariyaniddese ovādassa anādiyanavasena anādarabhāvo anādariyaṃ. Anādariyanākāro
analyzed: anādariya niddese ovādassa anādiyana vasena anādara bhāvaḥ anādariyam

original: anādaratā. Sagaruvāsaṃ avasanaṭṭhena agāravabhāvo agāravatā. Sajeṭṭhakavāsaṃ avasanaṭṭhena
analyzed: an ādara tā sa garu vāsam a vasana ṭṭhena agārava bhāvaḥ agārava tā sa jeṭṭhaka vāsam a vasana ṭṭhena

original: appatissavatā. Anaddāti anādiyanā. Anaddāyanāti anādiyanākāro. Anaddāya ayitassa
analyzed: appatissavatā anaddā ati an ādiyanā anaddāyanā ati an ādiyana ākāraḥ anaddāya

original: bhāvo anaddāyitattaṃ. Asīlassa bhāvo asīlyaṃ. Acittīkāroti garucittīkārassa akaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: bhāvaḥ a sīlassa bhāvaḥ a sīlyam garu cittīkārassa a karaṇam

original: 932. Assaddhabhāvo assaddhiyaṃ. Asaddahanākāro asaddahanā. Okappetvā anupavisitvā aggahaṇaṃ anokappanā. Appasīdanaṭṭhena anabhippasādo.
analyzed: assaddha bhāvaḥ assaddhiyam asaddahana ākāraḥ asaddahanā okappetvā an upavisitvā aggahaṇam an okappanā appasīdana ṭhena anabhippasādaḥ

original: Avadaññutāti thaddhamacchariyavasena ‘dehi, karohī’ti vacanassa ajānatā.
analyzed: avadaññu tā ti dehi karohi iti vacanassa a jānatā

original: 934. Buddhā ca buddhasāvakā cāti ettha buddhaggahaṇena paccekabuddhāpi gahitāva.
analyzed: buddhā ca buddha sāvakā ca ati ettha buddha ggahaṇena paccekabuddhā api gahitā ava

original: Asametukamyatāti tesaṃ samīpaṃ agantukāmatā. Saddhammaṃ asotukamyatāti sattatiṃsa
analyzed: a sametu kamya tā ati tesam samīpam a gantu kāma tā saddhammam a sotu kamya tā ati sattatiṃsa

original: bodhipakkhiyadhammā saddhammo nāma, taṃ asuṇitukāmatā. Anuggahetukamyatāti na uggahetukāmatā.
analyzed: bodhi pakkhiya dhammā saddhammaḥ nāma tam a suṇitu kāma tā an ugga hetu kamyatā ati na ugga hetu kāma tā

original: Upārambhacittatāti upārambhacittabhāvo. Yasmā pana so atthato upārambhova hoti, tasmā
analyzed: upārambha citta tā ati upārambha citta bhāvaḥ yasmā pana saḥ atthato upārambhaḥ uva hoti tasmā

original: taṃ dassetuṃ tattha katamo upārambhotiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha upārambhanavasena upārambho.
analyzed: tam dassetum tattha katamaḥ upārambha iti ādi vuttam tattha upārambhana vasena upārambho

original: Punappunaṃ upārambho anupārambho upārambhanākāro upārambhanā. Punappunaṃ upārambhanā
analyzed: punar punar upārambhaḥ an upārambhaḥ upārambhana ākāraḥ upārambhanā punar punar upārambhanā

original: anupārambhanā. Anupārambhitassa bhāvo anupārambhitattaṃ. Uññāti heṭṭhā katvā jānanā.
analyzed: an upārambhanā an upārambhitassa bhāvaḥ an upārambhi tattam uññā ati heṭṭhā katvā jānanā

original: Avaññāti avajānanā. Paribhavanaṃ paribhavo. Randhassa gavesitā randhagavesitā. Randhaṃ
analyzed: avaññā ati avajānanā paribhavanam paribhavaḥ randhassa gavesitā randha gavesitā randham

original: vā gavesatīti randhagavesī, tassa bhāvo randhagavesitā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ paravajjānupassanalakkhaṇo
analyzed: vā gavesati iti randha gavesī tassa bhāvaḥ randha gavesitā ayam vuccati iti ayam para vajja anupassana lakkhaṇo

original: upārambho nāma vuccati, yena samannāgato puggalo, yathā nāma tunnakāro sāṭakaṃ pasāretvā
analyzed: upārambhaḥ nāma vuccati yena samannāgataḥ puggalaḥ yathā nāma tunnakāraḥ sāṭakam pasāretvā

original: chiddameva oloketi, evameva parassa sabbepi guṇe makkhetvā aguṇesuyeva patiṭṭhāti.
analyzed: chiddam eva oloketi evam eva parassa sabbe api guṇe makkhetvā aguṇesu yeva patiṭṭhāti

original: 936. Ayoniso manasikāroti anupāyamanasikāro. Anicce niccanti anicceyeva vatthusmiṃ
analyzed: ayonisaḥ manasikāro ti anupāya manasikāro anicce niccanti anicceya iva vatthusmiṃ

original: ‘idaṃ nicca’nti evaṃ pavatto. Dukkhe sukhantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Saccavippaṭikulena
analyzed: idam niccanti evam pavattaḥ dukkhe sukham ti ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ sacca vippaṭikulena

original: cāti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ ananulomavasena. Cittassa āvaṭṭanātiādīni sabbānipi āvajjanasseva
analyzed: ca ati catunnam saccānam ananuloma vasena cittassa āvaṭṭana ati ādīni sabbāni pi āvajjanassa iva

original: vevacanāneva. Āvajjanañhi bhavaṅgacittaṃ āvaṭṭetīti cittassa āvaṭṭanā. Anuanu āvaṭṭetīti
analyzed: āvajjanan hi bhavaṅga cittam āvaṭṭeti iti cittassa āvaṭṭanāḥ anu anu āvaṭṭeti iti

original: anāvaṭṭanā. Ābhujatīti ābhogo. Bhavaṅgārammaṇato aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ samannāharatīti
analyzed: an āvaṭṭanā ābhujati iti ābhogaḥ bhavaṅga ārammaṇataḥ aññam ārammaṇam samannāharati iti

original: samannāhāro. Tadevārammaṇaṃ attānaṃ anubandhitvā uppajjamāne manasikarotīti manasikāro.
analyzed: samannāhāraḥ tat eva ārammaṇam attānam anubandhitvā uppajjamāne manasikaroti iti manasikāraḥ

original: Karotīti ṭhapeti. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ anupāyamanasikāro uppathamanasikāralakkhaṇo
analyzed: karoti iti ayam vuccati iti ayam an upāya manasikāraḥ uppatha manasikāra lakkhaṇo

original: ayonisomanasikāro nāma vuccati. Tassa vasena puggalo dukkhādīni saccāni yāthāvato
analyzed: ayonisomanasikāro nāma vuccati tassa vasena puggalo dukkha ādīni saccāni yāthāvato

original: āvajjituṃ na sakkoti.
analyzed: āvajjitum na sakkoti

original: Kummaggasevanāniddese yaṃ kummaggaṃ sevato sevanā kummaggasevanāti vuccati, taṃ dassetuṃ tattha katamo kummaggoti dutiyapucchā katā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
analyzed: kummagga sevanā niddese yam kummaggam sevato sevanā kummagga sevanā ti vuccati tam dassetum tattha katamaḥ kummaggaḥ ti dutiya pucchā katā sesam sabbattha uttānam eva ati

original: Tikaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: tika niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: (4.) Catukkaniddesavaṇṇanā
939. Catukkaniddese taṇhuppādesu cīvarahetūti ‘kattha manāpaṃ cīvaraṃ labhissāmī’ti
analyzed: catukka niddese taṇhuppādesu cīvara hetū ti kattha manāpam cīvaram labhissāmi iti

original: cīvarakāraṇā uppajjati. Itibhavābhavahetūti ettha itīti nidassanatthe nipāto; yathā
analyzed: cīvara kāraṇā uppajjati iti bhava abhava hetu iti ettha iti iti nidassana tthe nipātaḥ yathā

original: cīvarādihetu evaṃ bhavābhavahetūtipi attho. Bhavābhavoti cettha paṇītapaṇītatarāni
analyzed: cīvara ādi hetu evam atthaḥ bhava abhava iti ca ittha paṇīta paṇītatarāni

original: telamadhuphāṇitādīni adhippetāni. Imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ taṇhuppādānaṃ pahānatthāya
analyzed: tela madhu phāṇita ādīni adhippetāni imesam pana catunnam taṇhuppādānam pahāna tthāya

original: paṭipāṭiyāva cattāro ariyavaṃsā desitāti veditabbā.
analyzed: paṭipāṭiyā ava cattāro ariya vaṃsā desitā ati veditabbā

original: Agatigamanesu chandāgatiṃ gacchatīti chandena pemena agatiṃ gacchati, akattabbaṃ
analyzed: agati gamanesu chanda agatim gacchati iti chandena pemena agatim gacchati a kattabbam

original: karoti. Parapadesupi eseva nayo. Tattha yo ‘ayaṃ me mitto vā sandiṭṭho vā sambhatto
analyzed: karoti para padesu pi esa iva nayaḥ tattha yaḥ ayam me mittaḥ vā sandiṭṭhaḥ vā sambhatto

original: vā ñātako vā lañjaṃ vā pana me detī’ti chandavasena assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti – ayaṃ
analyzed: vā ñātakaḥ vā lañjam vā pana me deti iti chanda vasena assāmikam sāmikam karoti ayam

original: chandāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Yo ‘ayaṃ me verī’ti pakativeravasena vā taṅkhaṇuppannakodhavasena
analyzed: chandāgatim gacchati nāma yaḥ ayam me verī iti pakati vera vasena vā taṅkhaṇa uppanna kodha vasena

original: vā sāmikaṃ assāmikaṃ karoti – ayaṃ dosāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Yo pana mandattā momūhattā
analyzed: vā sāmikam assāmikam karoti ayam dosāgatim gacchati nāma yaḥ pana mandattā momūhattā

original: yaṃ vā taṃ vā vatvā assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti – ayaṃ mohāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Yo pana
analyzed: yam vā tam vā vatvā assāmikam sāmikam karoti ayam moha āgatim gacchati nāma yaḥ pana

original: ‘ayaṃ rājavallabho vā visamanissito vā anatthampi me kareyyā’ti bhīto assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ
analyzed: ayam rāja vallabhaḥ vā visama nissitaḥ vā anattham pi me kareyya ati bhītaḥ a sāmikam sāmikam

original: karoti – ayaṃ bhayāgatiṃ gacchati nāma. Yo vā pana bhājiyaṭṭhāne kiñci bhājento ‘ayaṃ
analyzed: karoti ayam bhayāgatim gacchati nāma yaḥ vā pana bhājiya ṭṭhāne kiñci bhājentaḥ ayam

original: me mitto vā sandiṭṭho vā sambhatto vā’ti pemavasena atirekaṃ deti, ‘ayaṃ me verī’ti
analyzed: me mittaḥ vā sandiṭṭhaḥ vā sambhattaḥ vā ati pema vasena atirekam deti ayam me verī iti

original: dosavasena ūnakaṃ deti, momūhattā dinnādinnaṃ ajānamāno kassaci ūnakaṃ kassaci adhikaṃ
analyzed: dosa vasena ūnakam deti momūhattā dinna a dinnam a jānamānaḥ kassaci ūnakam kassaci adhikam

original: deti, ‘ayaṃ imasmiṃ adīyamāne mayhaṃ anatthampi kareyyā’ti bhīto kassaci atirekaṃ
analyzed: deti ayam imasmin a dīyamāne mayham anattham pi kareyya ati bhīto kassaci atirekam

original: deti, so catubbidhopi yathānukkamena chandāgatiādīni gacchati nāma. Ariyā etāya na
analyzed: deti saḥ catubbidhaḥ api yathā anukkamena chandāgati ādīni gacchati nāma ariyāḥ etāya na

original: gacchantīti agati, anariyā iminā agatiṃ gacchantīti agatigamanaṃ. Imaṃ dvayaṃ catunnampi
analyzed: gacchanti iti agati anariyāḥ iminā agatim gacchanti iti agati gamanam imam dvayam

original: sādhāraṇavasena vuttaṃ. Chandena gamanaṃ chandagamanaṃ. Idaṃ dosādīnaṃ asādhāraṇavasena
analyzed: sādhāraṇa vasena vuttam chandena gamanam chanda gamanam idam dosa ādīnam asādhāraṇa vasena

original: vuttaṃ. Sakapakkharāgañca parapakkhadosañca purakkhatvā asamaggabhāvena gamanaṃ vaggagamanaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam saka pakkha rāgañca para pakkha dosañca purakkhatvā asamagga bhāvena gamanam vagga gamanam

original: Idaṃ chandadosasādhāraṇavasena vuttaṃ. Vārino viya yathāninnaṃ gamananti vārigamanaṃ.
analyzed: idam chanda dosa sādhāraṇa vasena vuttam vārinaḥ viya yathā ninnam gamanan ti vāri gamanam

original: Idaṃ catunnampi sādhāraṇavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: idam catunnam api sādhāraṇa vasena vuttam

original: Vipariyāsesu aniccādīni vatthūni niccantiādinā nayena viparītato esantīti vipariyāsā,
analyzed: vipariyāsesu anicca ādīni vatthūni niccanti ādinā nayena viparītataḥ esanti iti vipariyāsā

original: saññāya vipariyāso saññāvipariyāso. Itaresupi dvīsu eseva nayo. Evamete catunnaṃ
analyzed: saññāya vipariyāso saññā vipariyāso itaresu pi dvīsu esa iva nayo evam ete catunnam

original: vatthūnaṃ vasena cattāro, yesu vatthūsu saññādīnaṃ vasena dvādasa honti. Tesu aṭṭha
analyzed: vatthūnam vasena cattāro yesu vatthūsu saññā ādīnam vasena dvādasa honti tesu aṭṭha

original: sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti. Asubhe subhanti saññācittavipallāsā sakadāgāmimaggena
analyzed: sa utāpatti maggena pahīyanti asubhe saññā citta vipallāsā sakadāgāmi maggena

original: tanukā honti, anāgāmimaggena pahīyanti. Dukkhe sukhanti saññācittavipallāsā arahattamaggena
analyzed: tanukāḥ honti anāgāmi maggena pahīyanti dukkhe sukhanti saññā citta vipallāsāḥ arahatta maggena

original: pahīyantīti veditabbā.
analyzed: pahīyanti iti veditabbā

original: Anariyavohāresu anariyavohārāti anariyānaṃ lāmakānaṃ vohārā. Diṭṭhavāditāti ‘diṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: anariya vohāresu anariya vohārā ati anariyānam lāmakānam vohārāḥ diṭṭha vādi tā ati diṭṭham

original: mayā’ti evaṃ vāditā. Ettha ca taṃ taṃ samuṭṭhāpikacetanāvasena attho veditabbo. Saha
analyzed: mayā iti evam vāditā ettha ca tam tam samuṭṭhāpika cetanā vasena attho veditabbo saha

original: saddena cetanā kathitātipi vuttameva. Dutiyacatukkepi eseva nayo. Ariyo hi adisvā
analyzed: saddena cetanā kathitā ati pi vuttam eva dutiya catukke pi esā iva nayaḥ ariyaḥ hi a disvā

original: vā ‘diṭṭhaṃ mayā’ti disvā vā ‘na diṭṭhaṃ mayā’ti vattā nāma natthi; anariyova evaṃ
analyzed: vā diṭṭham mayā ati disvā vā na diṭṭham mayā ati vattā nāma natthi anariyaḥ uva evam

original: vadati. Tasmā evaṃ vadantassa etā saha saddena aṭṭha cetanā anariyavohārāti veditabbā.
analyzed: vadati tasmai evam vadantassa etā saha saddena aṭṭha cetanāḥ anariya vohārā ti veditabbā

original: Duccaritesu paṭhamacatukkaṃ veracetanāvasena vuttaṃ, dutiyaṃ vacīduccaritavasena.
analyzed: duccaritesu paṭhama catukkam vera cetanā vasena vuttam dutiyam vacī duccarita vasena

original: Bhayesu paṭhamacatukke jātiṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ bhayaṃ jātibhayaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Dutiyacatukke rājato uppannaṃ bhayaṃ rājabhayaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: bhayesu paṭhama catukke jātim paṭicca uppannam bhayam jāti bhayam sesesu pi esa iva nayaḥ dutiya catukke rājataḥ uppannam bhayam rāja bhayam sesesu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: Tatiyacatukke cattāri bhayānīti mahāsamudde udakaṃ orohantassa vuttabhayāni. Mahāsamudde
analyzed: tatiya catukke cattāri bhayāni iti mahā samudde udakam orohantassa vutta bhayāni mahā samudde

original: kira mahindavīci nāma saṭṭhi yojanāni uggacchati. Gaṅgāvīci nāma paṇṇāsa. Rohaṇavīci
analyzed: kira mahindavīci nāma saṭṭhi yojanāni uggacchati gaṅgāvīci nāma rohaṇavīci

original: nāma cattālīsa yojanāni uggacchati. Evarūpā ūmiyo paṭicca uppannaṃ bhayaṃ ūmibhayaṃ
analyzed: nāma cattālīsa yojanāni uggacchati evarūpāḥ ūmiyaḥ paṭicca uppannam bhayam ūmi bhayam

original: nāma. Kumbhīlato uppannaṃ bhayaṃ kumbhīlabhayaṃ. Udakāvaṭṭato bhayaṃ āvaṭṭabhayaṃ.
analyzed: nāma kumbhīlataḥ uppannam bhayam kumbhīla bhayam udaka avaṭṭataḥ bhayam āvaṭṭa bhayam

original: Susukā vuccati caṇḍamaccho; tato bhayaṃ susukābhayaṃ.
analyzed: susukā vuccati caṇḍamacchaḥ tatas bhayam susukābhayam

original: Catutthacatukke attānuvādabhayanti pāpakammino attānaṃ anuvadantassa uppajjanakabhayaṃ.
analyzed: catuttha catukke atta anuvāda bhayanti pāpa kamminaḥ attānam anuvadantassa uppajjanaka bhayaṃ

original: Parānuvādabhayanti parassa anuvādato uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Daṇḍabhayanti agārikassa
analyzed: para anuvāda bhayanti parassa anuvādataḥ uppajjanaka bhayam daṇḍa bhayanti agārikassa

original: raññā pavattitadaṇḍaṃ, anagārikassa vinayadaṇḍaṃ paṭicca uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Duggatibhayanti
analyzed: raññā pavattita daṇḍam anagārikassa vinaya daṇḍam paṭicca uppajjanaka bhayam duggati bhayanti

original: cattāro apāye paṭicca uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Iti imehi catūhi catukkehi soḷasa mahābhayāni nāma kathitāni.
analyzed: cattāraḥ apāye paṭicca uppajjanaka bhayam iti imehi catūhi catukkehi soḷasa mahābhayāni nāma kathitāni

original: Diṭṭhicatukke timbarukadiṭṭhi nāma kathitā. Tattha sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkhanti vedanaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭhi catukke timbarukadiṭṭhi nāma kathitā tattha sayaṃkatam sukha dukkhanti vedanaṃ

original: attato samanupassato vedanāya eva vedanā katāti uppannā diṭṭhi. Evañca sati tassā
analyzed: attataḥ samanupassato vedanāya eva vedanā katā ati uppannā diṭṭhi evañca sati tassā

original: vedanāya pubbepi atthitā āpajjatīti ayaṃ sassatadiṭṭhi nāma hoti. Saccato thetatoti
analyzed: vedanāya pubbe pi atthi tā āpajjati iti ayam sassatadiṭṭhi nāma hoti saccataḥ thetato ti

original: saccato thirato. Paraṃkatanti paccuppannavedanato aññaṃ vedanākāraṇaṃ vedanattānaṃ
analyzed: saccataḥ thirataḥ paraṃkatanti paccuppanna vedanataḥ aññam vedanā kāraṇam vedanā ttānam

original: samanupassato ‘aññāya vedanāya ayaṃ vedanā katā’ti uppannā diṭṭhi. Evaṃ sati purimāya
analyzed: samanupassato aññāya vedanāya ayam vedanā katā ati uppannā diṭṭhi evam sati purimāya

original: kāraṇavedanāya ucchedo āpajjatīti ayaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhi nāma hoti. Sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañcāti
analyzed: kāraṇa vedanāya ucchedaḥ āpajjati iti ayam ucchedadiṭṭhi nāma hoti sayaṃkatam ca paraṃkatam ca ati

original: yathāvutteneva atthena ‘upaḍḍhaṃ sayaṃkataṃ, upaḍḍhaṃ parena kata’nti gaṇhato uppannā
analyzed: yathā vuttena iva atthena upaḍḍham sayaṃkatam upaḍḍham parena katanti gaṇhataḥ uppannā

original: diṭṭhi – ayaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhi nāma. Catutthā akāraṇā eva sukhadukkhaṃ hotīti
analyzed: diṭṭhi ayam nāma catutthā akāraṇā eva sukha dukkham hoti iti

original: gaṇhato uppannā diṭṭhi. Evaṃ sati ayaṃ ahetukadiṭṭhi nāma. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthamevāti.
analyzed: gaṇhataḥ uppannā diṭṭhi evam sati ayam ahetuka diṭṭhi nāma sesam ettha heṭṭhā vutta naya ttā uttāna attham eva ati

original: Catukkaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: catukka niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: (5.) Pañcakaniddesavaṇṇanā
940. Pañcakaniddese yasmā yesaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni appahīnāni, te bhavaggepi nibbatte
analyzed: pañcaka niddese yasmā yesam sakkāya diṭṭhi ādīni appahīnāni te bhava gge pi nibbatte

original: etāni ākaḍḍhitvā kāmabhaveyeva pātenti, tasmā orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanānīti vuttāni.
analyzed: etāni ākaḍḍhitvā tasmai orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni iti vuttāni

original: Iti etāni pañca gacchantaṃ na vārenti, gataṃ pana ānenti. Rūparāgādīnipi pañca gacchantaṃ
analyzed: iti etāni pañca gacchantam na gatam pana ānenti pañca gacchantam

original: na vārenti, āgantuṃ pana na denti. Rāgādayo pañca lagganaṭṭhena saṅgā, anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena pana sallāti vuttā.
analyzed: na vārenti āgantum pana na denti rāga ādayaḥ pañca laggana ṭṭhena saṅgāḥ anupaviṭṭha ṭṭhena pana vuttā

original: 941. Cetokhilāti cittassa thaddhabhāvā kacavarabhāvā khāṇukabhāvā. Satthari kaṅkhatīti
analyzed: cetokhilā ati cittassa thaddha bhāvā kacavara bhāvā khāṇuka bhāvā satthari kaṅkhati iti

original: satthu sarīre vā guṇe vā kaṅkhati. Sarīre kaṅkhamāno ‘dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
analyzed: satthu sarīre vā guṇe vā kaṅkhati sarīre kaṅkhamānaḥ dvattiṃsa vara lakkhaṇa paṭimaṇḍitam

original: nāma sarīraṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati. Guṇe kaṅkhamāno ‘atītānāgatapaccuppannajānanasamatthaṃ
analyzed: nāma sarīram atthi nu kho natthi iti kaṅkhati guṇe kaṅkhamānaḥ atīta anāgata paccuppanna jānana samattham

original: sabbaññutañāṇaṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati. Vicikicchatīti vicinanto kicchati,
analyzed: sabbaññuta ñāṇam atthi nu kho na atthi iti kaṅkhati vicikicchati iti vicinantaḥ kicchati

original: dukkhaṃ āpajjati, vinicchetuṃ na sakkoti. Nādhimuccatīti ‘evameta’nti adhimokkhaṃ
analyzed: dukkham āpajjati vinicchetum na sakkoti na adhimuccati iti evam etat ti adhimokkham

original: na paṭilabhati. Na sampasīdatīti guṇesu otaritvā nibbicikicchabhāvena pasīdituṃ anāvilo
analyzed: na paṭilabhati na sampasīdati iti guṇesu otaritvā nibbicikiccha bhāvena pasīditum anāvilaḥ

original: bhavituṃ na sakkoti.
analyzed: bhavitum na sakkoti

original: Dhammeti pariyattidhamme ca paṭivedhadhamme ca. Pariyattidhamme kaṅkhamāno ‘tepiṭakaṃ
analyzed: dhamme iti pariyatti dhamme ca paṭivedha dhamme ca pariyatti dhamme kaṅkhamāno tepiṭakam

original: buddhavacanaṃ caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassānīti vadanti, atthi nu kho etaṃ natthī’ti
analyzed: buddha vacanam catur āsīti dhammakkhandha sahassāni iti vadanti atthi nu kho etam na atthi iti

original: kaṅkhati. Paṭivedhadhamme kaṅkhamāno ‘vipassanānissando maggo nāma, magganissando
analyzed: kaṅkhati paṭivedha dhamme kaṅkhamānaḥ vipassanā nissandaḥ maggaḥ nāma magga nissandaḥ

original: phalaṃ nāma, sabbasaṅkhārapaṭinissaggo nibbānaṃ nāmāti vadanti, taṃ atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhati’.
analyzed: phalam nāma sabba saṅkhāra paṭinissaggo nibbānam nāma ati vadanti tam atthi nu kho natthi iti kaṅkhati

original: Saṅghe kaṅkhatīti ‘ujuppaṭipannotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena evarūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannā
analyzed: saṅghe kaṅkhati iti ujuppaṭipannaḥ ti ādīnam padānam vasena evarūpam paṭipadam paṭipannā

original: cattāro maggaṭṭhā cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭhannaṃ puggalānaṃ samūhabhūto saṅgho nāma
analyzed: cattāraḥ magga ṭṭhā cattāro phala ṭṭhā ti aṭṭhannam puggalānam samūha bhūtaḥ saṅghaḥ nāma

original: atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati. Sikkhāya kaṅkhamāno ‘adhisīlasikkhā nāma adhicittasikkhā
analyzed: atthi nu kho na atthi iti kaṅkhati sikkhāya kaṅkhamānaḥ adhi sīla sikkhā nāma adhi citta sikkhā

original: nāma adhipaññā sikkhā nāmāti vadanti, sā atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati.
analyzed: nāma adhipaññā sikkhā nāma ati vadanti sā atthi nu kho natthi iti kaṅkhati

original: Cetasovinibandhāti cittaṃ bandhitvā muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā viya gaṇhantīti cetasovinibandhā.
analyzed: cetasovinibandhā iti cittam bandhitvā muṭṭhiyam katvā gaṇhanti iti cetasovinibandhā

original: Kāmeti vatthukāmepi kilesakāmepi. Kāyeti attano kāye. Rūpeti bahiddhā rūpe. Yāvadatthanti
analyzed: kāme iti vatthu kāme pi kilesa kāme pi kāye iti attano kāye rūpe iti bahiddhā rūpe yāvat atthanti

original: yattakaṃ icchati tattakaṃ. Udarāvadehakanti udarapūraṃ. Tañhi udaraṃ avadehanato
analyzed: icchati tattakam udara avadehakanti udara pūram tat hi udaram

original: udarāvadehakanti vuccati. Seyyasukhanti mañcapīṭhasukhaṃ utusukhaṃ vā. Passasukhanti
analyzed: udara avadehakam ti vuccati seyya sukham ti mañca pīṭha sukham utu sukham vā passa sukham

original: yathā samparivattakaṃ sayantassa dakkhiṇapassavāmapassānaṃ sukhaṃ hoti, evaṃ uppannasukhaṃ.
analyzed: yathā samparivattakam sayantassa dakkhiṇa passa vāma passānam sukham hoti evam uppanna sukham

original: Middhasukhanti niddāsukhaṃ. Anuyuttoti yuttapayutto viharati. Paṇidhāyāti patthayitvā.
analyzed: middha sukham ti niddā sukham anuyuttaḥ ti yutta payuttaḥ viharati paṇidhāya ati patthayitvā

original: Sīlenātiādīsu sīlanti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. Vatanti vatasamādānaṃ. Tapoti tapacaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: catu pārisuddhi sīlam vatanti tapa caraṇam

original: Brahmacariyanti methunavirati. Devo vā bhavissāmīti mahesakkhadevo vā bhavissāmi.
analyzed: devaḥ vā bhavissāmi iti mahesakkha devaḥ vā bhavissāmi

original: Devaññataro vāti appesakkhadevesu vā aññataro. Kusaladhamme āvaranti nivārentīti nīvaraṇāni.
analyzed: devaññataraḥ vā ati appesakkha devesu vā aññataraḥ kusala dhamme āvaranti nivārenti iti nīvaraṇāni

original: Mātā jīvitā voropitā hotīti manusseneva sakajanikā manussamātā jīvitā voropitā hoti. Pitāpi manussapitāva. Arahāpi manussaarahāva. Duṭṭhena cittenāti vadhakacittena.
analyzed: mātā jīvitā voropitā hoti iti manussena iva saka janikā manussa mātā jīvitā voropitā hoti pitā api manussa pitā ava arahā api manussa arahā ava duṭṭhena cittena ati vadhaka cittena

original: Saññīti saññāsamaṅgī. Arogoti nicco. Ittheke abhivadantīti itthaṃ eke abhivadanti,
analyzed: saññī iti saññā samaṅgī arogo ti nicco itthā ike abhivadanti iti ittham eke abhivadanti

original: evameke abhivadantīti attho. Ettāvatā soḷasa saññīvādā kathitā. Asaññīti saññāvirahito.
analyzed: evam eke abhivadanti iti attho ettāvatā soḷasa saññīvādā kathitā asaññī iti saññā virahito

original: Iminā padena aṭṭha asaññīvādā kathitā. Tatiyapadena aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā kathitā.
analyzed: iminā padena aṭṭha asaññī vādā kathitā tatiya padena aṭṭha nevasaññī nāsaññī vādā kathitā

original: Sato vā pana sattassāti athavā pana vijjamānasseva sattassa. Ucchedanti upacchedaṃ.
analyzed: sataḥ vā pana sattassa ati athavā pana vijjamānassa iva sattassa ucchedam upacchedam

original: Vināsanti adassanaṃ. Vibhavanti bhāvavigamaṃ. Sabbānetāni aññamaññavevacanāneva.
analyzed: vināsanti a dassanam vibhavanti bhāva vigamam sabbān etāni aññamañña vevacanāni eva

original: Tattha dve janā ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhanti – lābhī ca alābhī ca. Tattha lābhī arahato
analyzed: tattha dve janāḥ uccheda diṭṭhim gaṇhanti lābhī ca alābhī ca tattha lābhī arahato

original: dibbena cakkhunā cutiṃ disvā upapattiṃ apassanto, yo vā cutimattameva daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti
analyzed: dibbena cakkhunā cutim disvā upapattim a passantaḥ yaḥ vā cutimattam eva daṭṭhum sakkoti

original: na upapātaṃ, so ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Alābhī ‘ko paralokaṃ jānātī’ti kāmasukhagiddhatāya
analyzed: na upapātam saḥ uccheda diṭṭhim gaṇhāti alābhī kaḥ para lokam jānāti iti kāma sukha giddha tāya

original: vā ‘yathā rukkhato paṇṇāni patitāni na puna viruhanti, evaṃ sattā’tiādinā vitakkena
analyzed: vā yathā rukkhataḥ paṇṇāni patitāni na puna viruhanti evam satta ati ādinā vitakkena

original: vā ucchedaṃ gaṇhāti. Idha pana taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena tathā ca aññathā ca vikappetvāva
analyzed: vā ucchedam gaṇhāti idha pana taṇhā diṭṭhīnam vasena tathā ca aññathā ca vikappetvā ava

original: uppannā satta ucchedavādā kathitā. Tesañhi idaṃ saṅgahavacanaṃ. Diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ
analyzed: uppannā satta uccheda vādā kathitā tesam hi idam saṅgaha vacanam diṭṭhadhamma nibbānam

original: vā paneketi ettha diṭṭhadhammoti paccakkhadhammo vuccati. Tattha tattha paṭiladdhattabhāvassetaṃ
analyzed: vā pana eke iti ettha diṭṭha dhammo ti paccakkha dhammo vuccati tattha tattha paṭiladdha tta bhāvassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Diṭṭhadhamme nibbānaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ; imasmiṃyeva attabhāve dukkhā
analyzed: adhivacanam diṭṭhadhamme nibbānam diṭṭhadhamma nibbānam imasmin yeva atta bhāve dukkhā

original: vūpasammanti attho. Idaṃ pañcannaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādānaṃ saṅgahavacanaṃ.
analyzed: vūpasammanti atthaḥ idam pañcannam diṭṭhadhamma nibbāna vādānam saṅgaha vacanaṃ

original: 942. Verāti veracetanā. Byasanāti vināsā. Akkhantiyāti anadhivāsanāya. Appiyoti dassanasavanapaṭikūlatāya
analyzed: verā ati vera cetanā byasanā ati vināsā akkhantiyā ati anadhivāsanāya appiyā ti dassana savana paṭikūla tāya

original: na piyāyitabbo. Cintetumpi paṭikūlattā mano etasmiṃ na appetīti amanāpo. Verabahuloti
analyzed: na piyāyitabbaḥ cintetum pi paṭikūla ttā manaḥ etasmin na appeti iti amanāpaḥ vera bahulaḥ ti

original: bahuvero. Vajjabahuloti bahudoso.
analyzed: bahu veraḥ bahu dosaḥ

original: Ājīvakabhayanti ājīvaṃ jīvitavuttiṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ bhayaṃ. Taṃ agārikassapi hoti
analyzed: ājīvaka bhayam ti ājīvam jīvita vuttim paṭicca uppannam bhayam tam agārikassa api hoti

original: anagārikassapi. Tattha agārikena tāva ājīvahetu bahuṃ akusalaṃ kataṃ hoti. Athassa
analyzed: anagārikassa api tattha agārikena tāva ājīva hetu bahum akusalam katam hoti athassa

original: maraṇasamaye niraye upaṭṭhahante bhayaṃ uppajjati. Anagārikenāpi bahu anesanā katā
analyzed: maraṇa samaye niraye upaṭṭhahante bhayam uppajjati anagārikena api bahu anesanā katā

original: hoti. Athassa maraṇakāle niraye upaṭṭhahante bhayaṃ uppajjati. Idaṃ ājīvakabhayaṃ
analyzed: hoti athassa maraṇa kāle niraye upaṭṭhahante bhayam uppajjati idam ājīvaka bhayam

original: nāma. Asilokabhayanti garahabhayaṃ parisasārajjabhayanti katapāpassa puggalassa sannipatitaṃ
analyzed: nāma asi loka bhayanti garaha bhayam parisa sārajja bhayanti kata pāpassa puggalassa sannipatitam

original: parisaṃ upasaṅkamantassa sārajjasaṅkhātaṃ bhayaṃ uppajjati. Idaṃ parisasārajjabhayaṃ
analyzed: parisam upasaṅkamantassa sārajja saṅkhātam bhayam uppajjati idam parisa sārajja bhayam

original: nāma. Itaradvayaṃ pākaṭameva.
analyzed: nāma itara dvayam pākaṭam eva

original: 943. Diṭṭhadhammanibbānavāresu pañcahi kāmaguṇehīti manāpiyarūpādīhi pañcahi kāmakoṭṭhāsehi
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma nibbāna vāresu pañcahi kāmaguṇehi iti manāpiya rūpa ādīhi pañcahi kāma koṭṭhāsehi

original: bandhanehi vā. Samappitoti suṭṭhu appito allīno hutvā. Samaṅgībhūtoti samannāgato.
analyzed: bandhanehi vā samappito ti suṭṭhu appitaḥ allīnaḥ hutvā samaṅgībhūto ti samannāgataḥ

original: Paricāretīti tesu kāmaguṇesu yathāsukhaṃ indriyāni cāreti sañcāreti ito cito ca upaneti;
analyzed: paricāreti iti tesu kāmaguṇesu yathāsukham indriyāni cāreti sañcāreti itas citas ca upaneti

original: atha vā pana laḷati ramati kīḷatīti. Ettha ca duvidhā kāmaguṇā – mānussakā ceva dibbā
analyzed: atha vā pana laḷati ramati kīḷati iti ettha ca duvidhā kāma guṇā mānussakā ca iva dibbā

original: ca. Mānussakā mandhātukāmaguṇasadisā daṭṭhabbā; dibbā paranimmitavasavattidevarājassa
analyzed: ca mānussakā man dhātu kāma guṇa sadisā daṭṭhabbā dibbā para nimmitavasavatti devarājassa

original: kāmaguṇasadisāti. Evarūpe kāme upagatañhi te paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto hotīti
analyzed: kāma guṇa sadisā ati evarūpe kāme upagatam hi te parama diṭṭhadhamma nibbāna ppattaḥ hoti iti

original: vadanti. Tattha paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānanti paramaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ, uttamanti attho.
analyzed: vadanti tattha parama diṭṭhadhamma nibbānanti paramam diṭṭhadhamma nibbānam uttamanti attho

original: Dutiyavāre hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā; paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā; pakatijahanaṭṭhena
analyzed: dutiya vāre hutvā abhāva ṭṭhena aniccā paṭipīḷana ṭṭhena dukkhā pakati jahana ṭṭhena

original: vipariṇāmadhammāti veditabbā. Tesaṃ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvāti tesaṃ kāmānaṃ vipariṇāmasaṅkhātā
analyzed: vipariṇāma dhammā ti veditabbā tesam vipariṇāma aññathābhāvā ti tesam kāmānam vipariṇāma saṅkhātā

original: aññathābhāvā. ‘Yampi me ahosi tampi me natthī’ti vuttanayena uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā.
analyzed: aññathābhāvā yam pi me ahosi tam pi me natthi iti vutta nayena uppajjanti soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā

original: Tattha antonijjhāyanalakkhaṇo soko; tannissitalālappalakkhaṇo paridevo; kāyapaṭipīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: tattha antar nijjhāyana lakkhaṇo soko tad nissita lālappa lakkhaṇo paridevo kāya paṭipīḷana lakkhaṇam

original: dukkhaṃ; manovighātalakkhaṇaṃ domanassaṃ; vighātalakkhaṇo upāyāso.
analyzed: dukkham manaḥ vighāta lakkhaṇam domanassam vighāta lakkhaṇaḥ upāyāsaḥ

original: Vitakkitanti abhiniropanavasena pavatto vitakko. Vicāritanti anumajjanavasena pavatto
analyzed: vitakkitanti abhiniropana vasena pavattaḥ vitakkaḥ vicāritanti anumajjana vasena pavattaḥ

original: vicāro. Etena etanti etena vitakkena ca vicārena ca etaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ oḷārikaṃ
analyzed: vicāraḥ etena etat ti etena vitakkena ca vicārena ca etam paṭhamajjhānam oḷārikam

original: sakaṇṭakaṃ viya khāyati.
analyzed: sa kaṇṭakam viya khāyati

original: Pītigatanti pītimeva. Cetaso uppilāvitanti cittassa uppilabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Cetaso ābhogoti
analyzed: pīti gatanti pītim eva cetasaḥ cittassa uppila bhāva karaṇam cetasaḥ

original: jhānā vuṭṭhāya tasmiṃ sukhe punappunaṃ cittassa ābhogo manasikāroti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
analyzed: jhānā vuṭṭhāya tasmim sukhe punappunam cittassa ābhogaḥ manasikāraḥ iti sesam sabbattha uttāna attham eva ati

original: Pañcakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
(6.) Chakkaniddesavaṇṇanā
944. Chakkaniddese yasmā kuddho vā kodhavasena, sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī vā sandiṭṭhiparāmāsitāya kalahaṃ viggahaṃ vivādaṃ āpajjati, tasmā kodhādayo ‘vivādamūlānī’ti vuttā.
analyzed: chakka niddese yasmā kuddhaḥ vā kodha vasena sandiṭṭhi parāmāsī vā sandiṭṭhi parāmāsitāya kalaham viggaham vivādam āpajjati tasmā kodha ādayaḥ vivāda mūlāni iti vuttā

original: Chandarāganiddese kāmagehasitattā chandarāgā gehassitā dhammāti saṅgahato vatvā puna
analyzed: chandarāga niddese kāma geha sitattā chanda rāgāḥ geha ssitāḥ dhammā ti saṅgahataḥ vatvā puna

original: pabhedato dassetuṃ manāpiyesu rūpesūtiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha manāpiyesūti manavaḍḍhanakesu
analyzed: pabhedataḥ dassetum manāpiyesu rūpesu utiādi vuttam tattha manāpiyesu ti mana vaḍḍhanakesu

original: iṭṭhesu. Virodhā eva virodhavatthūni. Amanāpiyesūti aniṭṭhesu.
analyzed: iṭṭhesu virodhāḥ eva virodha vatthūni amanāpiyesu iti aniṭṭhesu

original: 945. Agāravesu agāravoti gāravavirahito. Appatissoti appatissayo anīcavutti. Ettha
analyzed: agāravesu agāravaḥ ti gārava virahitaḥ appatissaḥ ti appatissayaḥ anīca vutti ettha

original: pana yo bhikkhu satthari dharamāne tīsu kālesu upaṭṭhānaṃ na yāti, satthari anupāhane
analyzed: pana yaḥ bhikkhu satthari dharamāne tīsu kālesu upaṭṭhānam na yāti satthari an upāhane

original: caṅkamante saupāhano caṅkamati, nīce caṅkame caṅkamante ucce caṅkame caṅkamati, heṭṭhā
analyzed: caṅkamante saupāhano caṅkamati nīce caṅkame caṅkamante ucce caṅkame caṅkamati heṭṭhā

original: vasante upari vasati, satthudassanaṭṭhāne ubho aṃse pārupati, chattaṃ dhāreti, upāhanaṃ
analyzed: vasante upari vasati satthu dassana ṭṭhāne ubho aṃse pārupati chattam dhāreti upāhanam

original: dhāreti, nhāyati, uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karoti, parinibbute vā pana cetiyaṃ vandituṃ
analyzed: dhāreti nhāyati uccāram vā passāvam vā karoti parinibbute vā pana cetiyam vanditum

original: na gacchati, cetiyassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne satthudassanaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ sabbaṃ karoti –
analyzed: na gacchati cetiyassa paññāyana ṭhāne satthu dassana ṭhāne vuttam sabbam karoti

original: ayaṃ satthari agāravo nāma. Yo pana dhammasavane saṅghuṭṭhe sakkaccaṃ na gacchati,
analyzed: ayam satthari agāravaḥ nāma yaḥ pana dhammasavane saṅghuṭṭhe sakkaccam na gacchati

original: sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ na suṇāti, samullapanto nisīdati, na sakkaccaṃ gaṇhāti, na sakkaccaṃ
analyzed: sakkaccam dhammam na suṇāti samullapantaḥ nisīdati na sakkaccam gaṇhāti na sakkaccam

original: vāceti – ‘ayaṃ dhamme agāravo nāma. Yo pana therena bhikkhunā anajjhiṭṭho dhammaṃ
analyzed: vācā iti ayam dhamme agāravaḥ nāma yaḥ pana therena bhikkhunā an ajjhiṭṭhaḥ dhammaṃ

original: deseti, pañhaṃ katheti, vuḍḍhe bhikkhū ghaṭṭento gacchati, tiṭṭhati, nisīdati, dussapallatthikaṃ
analyzed: deseti pañham katheti vuḍḍhe bhikkhū ghaṭṭentaḥ gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati dussa pallatthikam

original: vā hatthapallatthikaṃ vā karoti, saṅghamajjhe ubho aṃse pārupati, chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti
analyzed: vā hattha pallatthikam vā karoti saṅgha majjhe ubho aṃse pārupati chattu pāhanam dhāreti

original: – ayaṃ saṅghe agāravo nāma. Ekabhikkhusmimpi hi agārave kate saṅghe agāravo katova
analyzed: ayam saṅghe agāravaḥ nāma eka bhikkhusmim pi hi agārave kate saṅghe agāravaḥ kataḥ uva

original: hoti. Tisso sikkhā pana apūrayamānova sikkhāya agāravo nāma. Appamādalakkhaṇaṃ ananubrūhayamāno
analyzed: hoti tissaḥ sikkhā pana a pūrayamānaḥ iva sikkhāya agāravaḥ nāma appamāda lakkhaṇam an anubrūhayamānaḥ

original: appamāde agāravo nāma. Duvidhaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ akaronto paṭisanthāre agāravo nāma.
analyzed: appamāde agāravaḥ nāma duvidham paṭisanthāram a karontaḥ paṭisanthāre agāravaḥ nāma

original: Parihāniyā dhammāti parihānakarā dhammā. Kammārāmatāti navakamme vā cīvaravicāraṇādīsu
analyzed: parihāniyāḥ dhammā ti parihāna karāḥ dhammā kamma ārāma tā ti nava kamme vā cīvara vicāraṇā ādīsu

original: vā kammesu abhirati yuttapayuttatā. Bhassārāmatāti tiracchānakathāvasena bhasse yuttapayuttatā.
analyzed: vā kammesu yutta payutta tā bhassa ārāma tā ati tiracchāna kathā vasena bhasse yutta payutta tā

original: Niddārāmatāti niddāya yuttapayuttatā. Saṅgaṇikārāmatāti saṅgaṇikāya yuttapayuttatā.
analyzed: niddā ārāma tā ati niddāya yutta payutta tā saṅgaṇika ārāma tā ati saṅgaṇikāya yutta payutta tā

original: Saṃsaggārāmatāti savanasaṃsagge, dassanasaṃsagge, samullāpasaṃsagge, paribhogasaṃsagge,
analyzed: saṃsagga ārāma tā ati savana saṃsagge dassana saṃsagge samullāpa saṃsagge paribhoga saṃsagge

original: kāyasaṃsaggeti pañcavidhe saṃsagge yuttapayuttatā. Papañcārāmatāti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcesu yuttapayuttatā.
analyzed: kāya saṃsagga iti pañcavidhe saṃsagge yutta payutta tā papañca ārāma tā ati taṇhā māna diṭṭhi papañcesu yutta payutta tā

original: 946. Somanassupavicārādīsu somanassena saddhiṃ upavicarantīti somanassupavicārā.
analyzed: somanassupavicāra ādīsu somanassena saddhim upavicaranti iti somanassupavicārā

original: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvā. Somanassaṭṭhāniyanti somanassassa
analyzed: cakkhunā rūpam disvā ati cakkhu viññāṇena rūpam passitvā somanassa ṭṭhāniyanti somanassassa

original: ārammaṇavasena kāraṇabhūtaṃ. Upavicaratīti tattha vicārappavattanena upavicarati.
analyzed: ārammaṇa vasena kāraṇa bhūtam upavicarati iti tattha vicāra ppavattanena upavicarati

original: Vitakko pana taṃsampayutto vāti iminā nayena tīsupi chakkesu attho veditabbo.
analyzed: vitakkaḥ pana tad sampayuttaḥ vā ti iminā nayena tīsu pi chakkesu atthaḥ veditabbo

original: 947. Gehasitānīti kāmaguṇanissitāni. Somanassānīti cetasikasukhāni. Domanassānīti cetasikadukkhāni. Upekkhāti aññāṇasampayuttā upekkhā vedanā, aññāṇupekkhātipi etāsaṃyeva nāmaṃ.
analyzed: geha sitāni iti kāmaguṇa nissitāni somanassāni iti cetasika sukhāni domanassāni iti cetasika dukkhāni upekkhā ati aññāṇa sampayuttā upekkhā vedanā aññāṇupekkhā atipi etāsam yeva nāmaṃ

original: 948. Atthi me attāti vāti sabbapadesu vā-saddo vikappattho; evaṃ vā diṭṭhi uppajjatīti
analyzed: atthi me attā ati vā ati sabba padesu vā saddaḥ vikappa atthaḥ evam vā diṭṭhi uppajjati iti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Atthi me attāti cettha sassatadiṭṭhi sabbakālesu attano atthitaṃ gaṇhāti.
analyzed: vuttam hoti atthi me attā ati ca ittha sassata diṭṭhi sabba kālesu attanaḥ atthitam gaṇhāti

original: Saccato thetatoti bhūtato ca thirato ca; idaṃ saccanti suṭṭhu daḷhabhāvenāti vuttaṃ
analyzed: saccataḥ thetataḥ ti bhūtataḥ ca thirataḥ ca idam saccanti suṭṭhu daḷha bhāvena ati vuttam

original: hoti. Natthi me attāti ayaṃ pana ucchedadiṭṭhi, sato sattassa tattha tattha vibhavaggahaṇato.
analyzed: hoti natthi me attā ati ayam pana uccheda diṭṭhi sato sattassa tattha tattha vibhava ggahaṇato

original: Atha vā purimāpi tīsu kālesu atthīti gahaṇato sassatadiṭṭhi, paccuppannameva atthīti
analyzed: atha vā purimā api tīsu kālesu atthi iti gahaṇato sassata diṭṭhi paccuppannam eva atthi iti

original: gaṇhantī ucchedadiṭṭhi. Pacchimāpi atītānāgatesu natthīti gahaṇato ‘bhasmantā āhutiyo’ti
analyzed: gaṇhantī uccheda diṭṭhi pacchimā api atīta anāgatesu natthi iti gahaṇataḥ bhasmantā āhutiyo ti

original: gahitadiṭṭhikānaṃ viya ucchedadiṭṭhi, atīteyeva natthīti gaṇhantī adhiccasamuppannikasseva
analyzed: gahita diṭṭhikānam viya uccheda diṭṭhi atītā iya iva natthi iti gaṇhantī adhiccasamuppannikassa iva

original: sassatadiṭṭhi. Attanā vā attānaṃ sañjānāmīti saññākkhandhasīsena khandhe attāti gahetvā
analyzed: attanā vā attānam sañjānāmi iti saññā khandha sīsena khandhe attā ati gahetvā

original: saññāya avasesakkhandhe sañjānanato ‘iminā attanā imaṃ attānaṃ sañjānāmī’ti evaṃ
analyzed: saññāya avasesa kkhandhe sañjānanataḥ iminā attanā imam attānam sañjānāmi iti evam

original: hoti. Attanā vā anattānanti saññākkhandhaṃyeva attāti gahetvā itare cattāro khandhe
analyzed: hoti attanā vā anattā ananti saññā khandham yā iva attā ati gahetvā itare cattāro khandhe

original: anattāti gahetvā saññāya tesaṃ jānanato evaṃ hoti. Anattanā vā attānanti saññākkhandhaṃ
analyzed: anattā ati gahetvā saññāya tesam jānanataḥ evam hoti anattanā vā attānan ti saññā kkhandham

original: anattāti itare ca cattāro khandhe attāti gahetvā saññāya tesaṃ jānanato evaṃ hoti.
analyzed: anattā ati itare ca cattāro khandhe attā ati gahetvā saññāya tesam jānanato evam hoti

original: Sabbāpi sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyova.
analyzed: sabbā api

original: Vado vedeyyoti ādayo pana sassatadiṭṭhiyā eva abhinivesākārā. Tattha vadatīti vado;
analyzed: vado vedeyyo ti ādayo pana sassata diṭṭhiyā eva abhinivesa ākārā tattha vadati iti vado

original: vacīkammassa kārakoti vuttaṃ hoti. Vedayatīti vedeyyo; jānāti anubhavati cāti vuttaṃ
analyzed: vacī kammassa kārako ti vuttam hoti vedayati iti vedeyyaḥ jānāti anubhavati ca ati vuttam

original: hoti. Idāni yaṃ so vedeti taṃ dassetuṃ tatra tatra dīgharattaṃ kalyāṇapāpakānantiādi
analyzed: hoti idāni yam saḥ veda iti tam dassetum tatra tatra dīgharattam kalyāṇa pāpaka ananti ādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha tatra tatrāti tesu tesu yonigatiṭhitinivāsanikāyesu ārammaṇesu vā.
analyzed: vuttam tattha tatra tatra ati tesu tesu yoni gati ṭhiti nivāsa nikāyesu ārammaṇesu vā

original: Dīgharattanti cirarattaṃ. Paccanubhotīti paṭisaṃvedayati. Na so jāto nāhosīti so
analyzed: dīgharattanti cirarattam paccanubhoti iti paṭisaṃvedayati na saḥ jātaḥ na ahosi iti so

original: attā ajātidhammato na jāto nāma; sadā vijjamāno yevāti attho. Teneva atīte nāhosi,
analyzed: attā a jāti dhammataḥ na jātaḥ nāma sadā vijjamānaḥ tena iva atīte

original: anāgatepi na bhavissati. Yo hi jāto so ahosi, yo ca jāyissati so bhavissatīti. Athavā
analyzed: anāgate pi na bhavissati yaḥ hi jātaḥ saḥ ahosi yaḥ ca jāyissati saḥ bhavissati iti athavā

original: ‘na so jāto nāhosī’ti so sadā vijjamānattā atītepi na jātu nāhosi, anāgatepi na jātu
analyzed: na saḥ jātaḥ na ahosi iti saḥ sadā atīte api na jātu na ahosi anāgate api na jātu

original: na bhavissati. Niccoti uppādavayarahito. Dhuvoti thiro sārabhūto. Sassatoti sabbakāliko.
analyzed: na bhavissati niccaḥ ti uppāda vaya rahitaḥ dhuvaḥ ti thiraḥ sāra bhūto sassatoti sabbakāliko

original: Avipariṇāmadhammoti attano pakatibhāvaṃ avijahanadhammo kakaṇṭako viya nānappakārattaṃ
analyzed: a vipariṇāma dhammo ti attanaḥ pakati bhāvam a vijahana dhammo kakaṇṭakaḥ viya nānā pakāra ttam

original: nāpajjati. Evamayaṃ sabbāsavadiṭṭhi nāma kathitā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
analyzed: na āpajjati evam ayam sabbāsavadiṭṭhi nāma kathitā sesam sabbattha uttāna attham eva ati

original: Chakkaniddesavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: chakka niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: (7.) Sattakaniddesavaṇṇanā
949. Sattakaniddese thāmagataṭṭhena appahīnaṭṭhena ca anusentīti anusayā. Vaṭṭasmiṃ
analyzed: sattaka niddese thāma gata ṭṭhena appahīna ṭṭhena ca anusenti iti anusayāḥ vaṭṭasmin

original: satte saṃyojenti ghaṭentīti saṃyojanāni. Samudācāravasena pariyuṭṭhahantīti pariyuṭṭhānāni.
analyzed: satte saṃyojenti ghaṭenti iti saṃyojanāni samudācāra vasena pariyuṭṭhahanti iti pariyuṭṭhānāni

original: Kāmarāgova pariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: kāma rāgaḥ uva pariyuṭṭhānam kāma rāga pariyuṭṭhānam sesesu pi esa iva nayo

original: 950. Asataṃ dhammā, lāmakaṭṭhena vā asantā dhammāti asaddhammā. Rāgādīhi dosehi duṭṭhāni caritānīti duccaritāni. Tena tenākārena maññantīti mānā.
analyzed: asatam dhammā lāmakaṭṭhena vā asantā dhammā ati asat dhammāḥ rāga ādīhi dosehi duṭṭhāni caritāni iti duccaritāni tena tena ākārena maññanti iti mānā

original: 951. Diṭṭhiniddese rūpīti rūpavā. Cātumahābhūtikoti catumahābhūtamayo. Mātāpitūnaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭhi niddese rūpī iti rūpavā cātumahābhūtikaḥ iti catu mahābhūta mayaḥ mātā pitūnam

original: etanti mātāpettikaṃ. Kintaṃ? Sukkasoṇitaṃ. Mātāpettike sambhūto jātoti mātāpettikasambhavo.
analyzed: etat ti mātāpettikam kintam sukka soṇitam mātāpettike sambhūtaḥ jātaḥ iti mātāpettika sambhavaḥ

original: Idha rūpakāyasīsena manussattabhāvaṃ attāti vadati. Dutiyo taṃ paṭikkhipitvā dibbattabhāvaṃ
analyzed: idha rūpa kāya sīsena manussa atta bhāvam attā ati vadati dutiyaḥ tam paṭikkhipitvā dibba tta bhāvam

original: vadati. Dibboti devaloke sambhūto. Kāmāvacaroti chakāmāvacaradevapariyāpanno. Kabaḷīkāraṃ
analyzed: vadati dibbaḥ iti deva loke sambhūto kāmāvacaro ti cha kāmāvacara deva pariyāpanno kabaḷīkāram

original: bhakkhayatīti kabaḷīkārabhakkho. Manomayoti jhānamanena nibbatto. Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgīti
analyzed: bhakkhayati iti kabaḷīkāra bhakkhaḥ manaḥ mayaḥ ti jhāna manena nibbattaḥ sabbaṅga paccaṅgī iti

original: sabbaṅgapaccaṅgayutto. Ahīnindriyoti paripuṇṇindriyo; yāni brahmaloke atthi tesaṃ
analyzed: sabbaṅga paccaṅga yuttaḥ paripuṇṇa indriyaḥ yāni brahmaloke atthi tesam

original: vasena, itaresañca saṇṭhānavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagoti ākāsānañcāyatanabhāvaṃ
analyzed: vasena itaresam ca saṇṭhāna vasena itam vuttam ākāsa anañcāyatana upagaḥ ti ākāsa anañcāyatana bhāvam

original: upagato. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
analyzed: upagataḥ itaresu pi esa iva nayaḥ sesam sabbattha uttāna attham eva ati

original: Sattakaniddesavaṇṇanā.
(8.) Aṭṭhakaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: aṭṭhaka niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 952. Aṭṭhakaniddese kilesāyeva kilesavatthūni. Kusītavatthūnīti kusītassa alasassa
analyzed: aṭṭhaka niddese kilesāya iva kilesa vatthūni kusīta vatthūni iti kusītassa alasassa

original: vatthūni, patiṭṭhā, kosajjakāraṇānīti attho. Kammaṃ kātabbaṃ hotīti cīvaravicāraṇādikammaṃ
analyzed: vatthūni patiṭṭhā kosajja kāraṇāni iti attho kammam kātabbam hoti iti cīvara vicāraṇā ādi kammam

original: kātabbaṃ hoti. Na vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ nārabhati. Appattassāti jhānavipassanāmaggaphaladhammassa
analyzed: kātabbam hoti na vīriyam ārabhati iti duvidham pi vīriyam na ārabhati appattassa āti jhāna vipassanā magga phala dhammassa

original: appattassa pattiyā. Anadhigatassāti tasseva anadhigatassa adhigamatthāya. Asacchikatassāti
analyzed: appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa ati tassa iva anadhigatassa adhigama tthāya a sacchikatassa ati

original: tasseva asacchikatassa sacchikaraṇatthāya. Idaṃ paṭhamanti ‘idaṃ handāhaṃ nipajjāmī’ti
analyzed: tassa iva a sacchikatassa sacchikaraṇa atthāya idam paṭhamanti idam handa aham nipajjāmi iti

original: evaṃ osīdanaṃ paṭhamaṃ kusītavatthu. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
analyzed: evam osīdanam paṭhamam kusīta vatthu iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo

original: Māsācitaṃ maññeti ettha pana māsācitaṃ nāma tintamāso; yathā tintamāso garuko hoti, evaṃ garukoti adhippāyo. Gilānā vuṭṭhito hotīti gilāno hutvā pacchā vuṭṭhito hoti.
analyzed: māsācitam maññeti ettha pana māsācitam nāma tinta māsaḥ yathā tinta māsaḥ garukaḥ hoti evam garukaḥ iti adhippāyaḥ gilānā vuṭṭhitaḥ hoti iti gilānaḥ hutvā pacchā vuṭṭhitaḥ hoti

original: 954. Aṭṭhasu lokadhammesūti ettha lokassa dhammāti lokadhammā. Etehi vimutto nāma
analyzed: aṭṭhasu loka dhammesu iti ettha lokassa dhammā ati loka dhammā etehi vimuttaḥ nāma

original: natthi, buddhānampi honti eva. Tasmā ‘lokadhammā’ti vuccanti. Paṭighātoti paṭihaññanākāro.
analyzed: natthi buddhānam pi honti eva tasmā loka dhammā ti vuccanti paṭighāto ti paṭihaññanā ākāro

original: Lābhe sārāgoti ‘ahaṃ lābhaṃ labhāmī’ti evaṃ gehasitasomanassavasena uppanno sārāgo;
analyzed: lābhe sārāgaḥ ti aham lābham labhāmi iti evam geha sita somanassa vasena uppanno sārāgaḥ

original: so cittaṃ paṭihanati. Alābhe paṭivirodhoti ‘ahaṃ lābhaṃ na labhāmī’ti domanassavasena
analyzed: saḥ cittam paṭihanati alābhe paṭivirodhaḥ ti aham lābham na labhāmi iti domanassa vasena

original: uppannavirodho; sopi cittaṃ paṭihanati. Tasmā ‘paṭighāto’ti vutto. Yasādīsupi ‘ahaṃ
analyzed: uppanna virodhaḥ saḥ api cittam paṭihanati tasmā paṭighāto ti vuttaḥ yasa ādīsu pi aham

original: mahāparivāro, ahaṃ appaparivāro, ahaṃ pasaṃsappatto, ahaṃ garahappatto, ahaṃ sukhappatto,
analyzed: mahā parivāraḥ aham appa parivāraḥ aham pasaṃsa ppatto aham garaha ppatto aham sukha ppatto

original: ahaṃ dukkhappato’ti evametesaṃ uppatti veditabbā. Anariyavohārāti anariyānaṃ vohārā.
analyzed: aham dukkha ppato ti evam etesam uppatti veditabbā anariya vohārā ati anariyānam vohārā

original: 957. Purisadosāti purisānaṃ dosā. Na sarāmīti ‘mayā etassa kammassa kataṭṭhānaṃ na
analyzed: purisa dosā ati purisānam dosā na sarāmi iti mayā etassa kammassa kata ṭṭhānam na

original: sarāmi na sallakkhemī’ti evaṃ assatibhāvena nibbeṭheti moceti. Codakaṃyeva paṭippharatīti
analyzed: sarāmi na sallakkhemi iti evam assati bhāvena nibbeṭheti moceti ca udakam yā iva paṭippharati iti

original: paṭiviruddho hutvā pharati, paṭibhāṇitabhāvena tiṭṭhati. Kiṃ nu kho tuyhanti ‘tuyhaṃ
analyzed: paṭiviruddhaḥ hutvā pharati paṭibhāṇita bhāvena tiṭṭhati kim nu kho tuyhanti tuyham

original: bālassa abyattassa bhaṇitena nāma kiṃ’ yo tvaṃ neva vatthunā āpattiṃ, na codanaṃ
analyzed: bālassa abyattassa bhaṇitena nāma kim na iva vatthunā āpattim na codanam

original: jānāsī’ti dīpeti; ‘tvaṃ pi nāma evaṃ kiñci ajānanto bhaṇitabbaṃ maññissasī’ti ajjhottharati.
analyzed: jānāsi iti dīpeti tvam pi nāma evam kiñci a jānantaḥ bhaṇitabbam maññissasi iti ajjhottharati

original: Paccāropetīti ‘tvaṃ pi khosī’tiādīni vadanto paṭiāropeti. Paṭikarohīti desanāgāminiṃ
analyzed: paccāropeti iti tvam pi kho asi itiādīni vadanto paṭiāropeti paṭikarohi iti desanā gāminim

original: desehi, vuṭṭhānagāminito vuṭṭhāhi tato suddhante patiṭṭhito aññaṃ codessasī’ti dīpeti.
analyzed: desehi vuṭṭhāna gāminitaḥ vuṭṭhāhi tatas suddhante patiṭṭhitaḥ aññam codessasi iti dīpeti

original: Aññenāññaṃ paṭicaratīti aññena kāraṇena vacanena vā aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vā paṭicchādeti.
analyzed: aññena aññam paṭicarati iti aññena kāraṇena vacanena vā aññam kāraṇam vacanam vā paṭicchādeti

original: ‘Āpattiṃ āpannosī’ti vutto ‘ko āpanno? Kiṃ āpanno? Kathaṃ āpanno? Kismiṃ āpanno?
analyzed: āpattim āpanno asi iti vutto kaḥ āpanno kim āpanno katham āpanno kismin āpanno

original: Kaṃ bhaṇatha? Kiṃ bhaṇathā’ti vadati. ‘Evarūpaṃ kiñci tayā diṭṭha’nti vutte ‘na suṇāmī’ti
analyzed: kam bhaṇatha kim bhaṇatha ati vadati evarūpam kiñci tayā diṭṭhanti vutte na suṇāmi iti

original: sotaṃ vā upaneti. Bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmetīti ‘itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī’ti puṭṭho
analyzed: sotam vai upaneti bahiddhā katham apanāmeti iti itthannāmam āpattim āpannaḥ asi iti puṭṭhaḥ

original: ‘pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī’ti vatvā puna ‘tava pāṭaliputtagamanaṃ na pucchāmā’ti vutte

analyzed: gehe pacchimantena asīti koṭi dhanam nidhāna gatam hoti dasa ambaṇāni

original: divasavaḷañjo nikkhamati – ayaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālo nāma. Yassa pana gehe pacchimantena
analyzed: divasa vaḷañjaḥ nikkhamati ayam brāhmaṇamahāsālaḥ nāma yassa pana gehe pacchimantena

original: koṭisatadhanaṃ nidhānagataṃ hoti, kahāpaṇānañca vīsati ambaṇāni divasavaḷañjo nikkhamati

original: – ayaṃ khattiyamahāsālo nāma.
analyzed: ayam khattiyamahāsālaḥ nāma

original: Sahabyatanti sahabhāvaṃ; sabhāgā hutvā nibbattantīti attho. Cātumahārājikānantiādīsu

analyzed: cātumahārājikāḥ nāma sineru pabbatassa vemajjhe honti tesu pabbata ṭṭhakā api atthi

original: sītavalāhakā, uṇhavalāhakā, candimā devaputto, sūriyo devaputtoti ete sabbepi cātumahārājikadevalokaṭṭhakā eva.
analyzed: sītavalāhakāḥ uṇhavalāhakā candimā devaputto sūriyo devaputto ti ete sabbe pi cātumahārājika deva loka ṭṭhakāḥ eva

original: Tettiṃsa janā tattha upapannāti tāvatiṃsā. Apica tāvatiṃsāti tesaṃ devānaṃ nāmamevāti
analyzed: tettiṃsa janā tattha upapannā ati tāvatiṃsāḥ apica tāvatiṃsā ati tesam devānam nāmam eva ati

analyzed: pattā tathā yāma ādīnam eka deva loke pi hi devānam paramparā cakkavāḷa pabbatam appattā

original: nāma natthi. Tattha dibbaṃ sukhaṃ yātā payātā sampattāti yāmā. Tuṭṭhā pahaṭṭhāti

original: paranimmitavasavattī.
analyzed: para nimmita vasa vattī

original: (2.) Āyuppamāṇaṃ
analyzed: āyu pamāṇam

original: 1022. Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti dutiyaṃ vassasataṃ appatvā vīsāya vā tiṃsāya vā cattālīsāya

analyzed: dutiyam vassa satam appattattā appanti vuttam

original: 1024. Brahmapārisajjādīsu mahābrahmānaṃ pārisajjā paricārikāti brahmapārisajjā. Tesaṃ
analyzed: brahma pārisajja ādīsu mahābrahmānam pārisajjā paricārikā ati brahmapārisajjā tesam

original: vasanti; āyuantaraṃ pana nesaṃ nānā.
analyzed: vasanti āyu antaram pana nānā

original: acci viya etesaṃ sarīrato ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī viya sarati visaratīti
analyzed: acci viya etesam sarīrataḥ ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī viya sarati visarati iti

analyzed: ime api tayaḥ janā eka tale vasanti āyu antaram pana nānā

original: 1027. Ārammaṇanānattatāti ārammaṇassa nānattabhāvo. Manasikāranānattatādīsupi eseva

original: Ekassa pathavīkasiṇe chando hoti…pe… ekassa odātakasiṇeti idaṃ chandanānattaṃ. Eko
analyzed: ekassa pathavī kasiṇe chandaḥ hoti pe ekassa odāta kasiṇā iti idam chanda nānattam ekaḥ

analyzed: pubba bhāgena kathitā chanda paṇidhi adhimokkha abhinīhārāḥ vattanti upacāre pi

original: Paññā pana lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.
analyzed: paññā pana lokiya lokuttara missakā kathitā

analyzed: kappam tiṭṭhamānā api atthiyā iva

original: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīnaṃ pana kiṃ niyameti? Paguṇajjhānaṃ. Yadevassa paguṇaṃ hoti,

original: tena uppajjati. Sabbesu pana paguṇesu kiṃ niyameti? Patthanā. Yattha upapattiṃ pattheti

original: Maraṇasamaye samāpannā natthi, kiṃ niyameti? Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti. Ekaṃsena

original: tatrūpapattipi hoti uparūpapattipi na heṭṭhūpapatti. Puthujjanānaṃ pana tatrūpapattipi

original: gacchanti, na adho, tattha tattheva parinibbāyantīti. Idamettha pakiṇṇakaṃ.

original: 7. Abhiññeyyādivāravaṇṇanā
1030. Sattamavāre salakkhaṇapariggāhikāya abhiññāya vasena abhiññeyyatā veditabbā.
analyzed: sattama vāre sa lakkhaṇa pariggāhikāya abhiññāya vasena abhiññeyya tā veditabbā

original: Ñātatīraṇapahānapariññānaṃ vasena pariññeyyatā. Sā ca rūpakkhandho abhiññeyyo pariññeyyo

analyzed: pariññeyyam pahātabbam tiādīsu pahāna pariññā vasena

original: Aṭṭhamavāre rūpādiārammaṇānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vasena sārammaṇānārammaṇatā veditabbā.

original: Navamavāro uttānatthoyeva. Dasamavārepi yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā taṃ sabbaṃ tattha tattha
analyzed: navama vāraḥ uttāna tthaḥ yā iva dasama vāre pi yat vattabbam siyā tat sabbam tattha tattha

original: pañhāpucchakavāre vuttamevāti.
analyzed: pañhāpucchaka vāre vuttam eva ati

original: Sammohavinodaniyā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: sammoha vinodaniyā vibhaṅga ṭṭhakathāya

original: Dhammahadayavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dhamma hadaya vibhaṅga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Ettāvatā ca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Abhidhammaṃ desento, dhammagaru dhammagāravayuttānaṃ;
analyzed: abhidhammam desentaḥ dhamma garu dhamma gārava yuttānam

original: Devānaṃ devapure, devagaṇasahassaparivāro.
analyzed: devānam deva pure deva gaṇa sahassa parivāro

original: Dutiyaṃ adutiyapuriso, yaṃ āha vibhaṅgapakaraṇaṃ nātho;

original: Aṭṭhārasahi vibhaṅgehi, maṇḍitamaṇḍapeyyaguṇo.
analyzed: aṭṭhārasahi vibhaṅgehi maṇḍita maṇḍapeyya guṇaḥ

original: Atthappakāsanatthaṃ, tassāhaṃ yācito ṭhitaguṇena;
analyzed: attha ppakāsana ttham tassa aham yācitaḥ ṭhita guṇena

original: Yatinā adandhagatinā, subuddhinā buddhaghosena.
analyzed: yatinā adandhagatinā subuddhinā buddhaghosena

original: Yaṃ ārabhiṃ racayituṃ, aṭṭhakathaṃ sunipuṇesu atthesu;
analyzed: yam ārabhim racayitum aṭṭha katham su nipuṇesu atthesu

original: Sammohavinodanato, sammohavinodaniṃ nāma.
analyzed: sammohavinodanataḥ sammohavinodanim nāma

original: Porāṇaṭṭhakathānaṃ, sāraṃ ādāya sā ayaṃ niṭṭhaṃ;
analyzed: porāṇa aṭṭhakathānam sāram ādāya sā ayam niṭṭham

original: Pattā anantarāyena, pāḷiyā bhāṇavārehi.
analyzed: pattāḥ anantarāyena pāḷiyāḥ bhāṇa vārehi

original: Cattālīsāya yathā, ekena ca evameva sabbepi;
analyzed: yathā ekena ca evam eva sabbe pi

original: Niṭṭhaṃ vajantu vimalā, manorathā sabbasattānaṃ.
analyzed: niṭṭham vajantu vimalāḥ manorathāḥ sabba sattānam

original: Saddhammassa ṭhitatthaṃ, yañca imaṃ racayatā mayā puññaṃ;
analyzed: saddhammassa ṭhita ttham yat ca imam racayatā mayā puññam

original: Pattaṃ tena samattaṃ, pāpuṇatu sadevako loko.
analyzed: pattam tena sa mattam pāpuṇatu sa devakaḥ lokaḥ

original: Suciraṃ tiṭṭhatu dhammo, dhammābhirato sadā bhavatu loko;
analyzed: su ciram tiṭṭhatu dhammaḥ dhamma abhirataḥ sadā bhavatu lokaḥ

original: Niccaṃ khemasubhikkhādi-sampadā janapadā hontūti.

original: Paramavisuddhasaddhābuddhivīriyapaṭimaṇḍitena sīlācārajjavamaddavādiguṇasamudayasamuditena
analyzed: parama visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriya paṭimaṇḍitena sīla ācāra java maddava ādi guṇa samudaya samuditena

original: sakasamayasamayantaragahanajjhogāhaṇasamatthena paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatena tipiṭakapariyattippabhede

analyzed: sa aṭṭhakathe satthu sāsane appaṭihata ñāṇa ppabhāvena mahā veyyākaraṇena karaṇa sampatti janita sukha viniggata madhura udāra vacana lāvaṇṇa yuttena

original: yuttamuttavādinā vādīvarena mahākavinā pabhinnapaṭisambhidāparivāre chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidādippabhedaguṇapaṭimaṇḍite
analyzed: yutta mutta vādinā vādīvarena mahā kavinā pabhinna paṭisambhidā parivāre chaṣ abhiññā paṭisambhidā ādi ppabheda guṇa paṭimaṇḍite

original: uttarimanussadhamme suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ

analyzed: tāva tiṭṭhatu lokasmim loka nittharaṇa īsinam

original: Dassentī kulaputtānaṃ, nayaṃ paññāvisuddhiyā.

original: Yāva buddhoti nāmampi, suddhacittassa tādino;

original: Lokamhi lokajeṭṭhassa, pavattati mahesinoti.
analyzed: lokamhi loka jeṭṭhassa pavattati mahesino ti

original: Sammohavinodanī nāma vibhaṅga-aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sammohavinodanī nāma vibhaṅga aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā
